Creator_description: Lotte (31) is from The Netherlands and Kasper (33) is from Denmark. We are not fashion people, but we have been in the industry for a while and we love technology. As a real Dutchie Lotte is passionate about making fashion practical and comfortable. She holds degrees in Psychology and Business Economics. As a real Dane Kasper is passionate about simple minimalistic design that never goes out of style. He holds business degrees from Denmark and China and LABFRESH is his third startup.
Project_description: WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re back! It took 1 year, but we finally cracked how to engineer  pique polo shirts and t-shirts  that make it easier than ever to dress stylish without compromising on comfort.   The outside repels stains, while the inside is anti-bacterial and odour repellent.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ              Pique is an amazing fabric. The pique polo was invented in the thirties by French tennis champion RenÃÂÃÂ© Lacoste, and it is one of  the most breathable and luxurious fabric constructions .  Through extensive research and prototyping we have created a unique treatment mix called  FreshCoreÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ . By manipulating cotton fibers we shield them from both bacteria and liquids. Our treatments do not affect the hand feel of the fabric and we are able to reach  the same level of breathability  than any untreated cotton polo in the market.ÃÂÃÂ    Learn more about our technology    HERE  .                     Repels all water-based stains, including red wine, beetroot juice, and coffee.         Odour and sweat repellent ,  keeping you fresh all day and beyond.              Choose from grey, light blue, white and navy.               Don't take our word for it. We use the unfiltered platform Trustpilot for all reviews - both the good and the bad. We have no way to interfere with the reviews. This is a part of our commitment to full transparency in both production, sustainability and customer experience.  Click   HERE   to read more reviews.            More than 120 media have told our story and tested our products. We have also been the runner-up finalists at the Dutch Innovation Awards and Get in The Ring, where we competed with startups from over 100 countries.ÃÂÃÂ                    Not all heroes wear capes. Some wear lab coats. And we work with the best of them in Switzerland and Portugal. LABFRESH is helping these creators get their smart inventions out of the lab and into closets across the globe.  When we develop a new product we put our back into it. We obsess. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we only launched 2 products in 2 years.ÃÂÃÂ         By reducing the need for washing we extend the life-time of our products.  By investing in longevity, durability and wearability we contribute to lowering consumerism.  Wash less. Wear more. Buy less.ÃÂÃÂ    We keep a close eye on our environmental footprint and as a company we take full responsibility. This includes ensuring the best work environment at our manufacturer in Portugal.ÃÂÃÂ   At LABFRESH we work from a technology-based vision and non-seasonal approach towards building a collection that embraces longevity and essentials.  Read more about   REACH   ,    OEKO-TEX   and   Bluesign   .ÃÂÃÂ    Learn more about our approach to sustainability   HERE   .             Our story began 2 years ago on this platform, when we launched the odour and stain repellent shirt. ÃÂÃÂ   We got 1000% funded and immediately quit our jobs, so we could turn LABFRESH into a real business. ÃÂÃÂ   Without Kickstarter we wouldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be here today.ÃÂÃÂ   Launching new products is scary. It requires a lot of resources to get new technologies out of the lab and into a real supply chain.ÃÂÃÂ   That is why we would like to see if the Kickstarter community is interested in our new invention, before we go into full-scale production. ÃÂÃÂ   Our mission hasnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t changed. We want to fight fast fashion and over-consumption by creating products engineered to last a lifetime. Wear more. Wash less. Buy less. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                                                                                Unlimited cancellation.  You are able to cancel your order at any point in time and get a full refund (until the day the product is shipped).ÃÂÃÂ    90 days size guarantee.  If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge (we do not provide free return labels).  If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge. We offer free exchange shipping for the Netherlands, Denmark, Germany, Austria, Belgium and France.   Free and easy shipping across the EU, US & Canada.  Shipping costs to other parts of the world is only ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬15.ÃÂÃÂ    Stain repellency   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We guarantee that our polos and t-shirts will repel stains that are caused by water-based fluids and semi-fluids. If stains are caused by oil-based fluids, such as skin oils or greasy food, the product will need to be washed or cleaned with stain remover.  We test the stain repellency for 30 washes at 30 degrees with ironing after each wash and no tumble-drying or bleaching. A lot depends on the type of machine, washing program, and detergent used, which is why we are not comfortable extending the guarantee above 30 washes for the stain repellency. Since the products need significantly less washing than a traditional cotton product 30 washes will give you a lot of wears.   Odour repellency   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We guarantee that our polos and t-shirts will repel odour caused by bacteria, such as odour from sweat. Our shirts will not repel odour from cigarettes or cooking. Due to the many different variations and levels of perspiration we unfortunately cannot guarantee a specific amount of days the products will last before odour starts being absorbed into the fabric. We know that our current customers wear it 3,5 days. But we guarantee that the anti-bacterial treatment will be active for at least 100 washes.   Shrinkage   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We pre-wash all garments and guarantee that shrinkage will be maximum 1%.ÃÂÃÂ    Sweat stains   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Our products block moderate amounts of sweat, but if we made it 100% hydrophobic the sweat would stay on the body and hence not be comfortable in a warm or humid environment. What we can promise is that LABFRESH products block perspiration better than a traditional shirt, and it dry up faster. ÃÂÃÂ    Lifespan technology   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We guarantee that the stain repellency will last for 30 washes and the odour repellency for 100 washes.  Keep in mind that you have to wash LABFRESH shirts less, so itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s still a lot of wears.                            Risks and challenges  LABFRESH is fashion, not sportswear. You might be able to run a marathon in it without smelling, but that is not what our products are intended for.  With regards to stains we have been able to wash off any liquids and semi-liquids with water. However if you rub a substance into the fabric with force or if a very oily sauce comes in contact with the fabric, it will eventually make a slightly visible stain. You'll have to put it in the washer at 30 degrees to get the stain off.  Technology: It took as a full year to optimize our Pique fabric. The main explanation is that Pique fabric differs from our standard jersey t-shirt as it has a textured, waffle weave look whereas jersey (normal t-shirts) have a smooth, flat surface. This is particularly nice for a knit pique since its super breathable and can easily be worn in warm summer months. However this also means that a Pique fabric literally has tiny holes. We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t work magic on a fabric, so holes will be holes, which means bigger spills might make your body a little bit wet (without staining the fabric). Besides this the pique fabric is as stain repellant as any other product we make.  Production delays and unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. This is however not our first rodeo. We have made more than 20,000 t-shirts with our manufacturer and we are confident they will produce the pique fabric on time as well.

Creator_description: We created Bolt Drones out of our inability to find a complete ready-to-fly First Person View drone bundle at an affordable price point. We believe drones, First Person View piloting and virtual reality are the future. However for many people, knowing where to start is a challenge. We created Bolt Drones to introduce the make exciting world of First Person View piloting and racing easily accessible to everyone. Our team is passionate about introducing the FPV drone experience to everyone and consists of military veterans, product designers, engineers and drone enthusiasts.
Project_description: The Bolt is a carbon fiber drone that introduces the exciting world of First Person View (FPV) piloting and racing to everyone. When designing and engineering our drone, we made sure of these objectives:   Introduce as many people as possible to the FPV drone experience without breaking the bank  Follow a rigorous design & engineering process and manufacture using the highest quality materials  Come ready to fly out of the box with no assembly or tools required  Ensure the drone is safe and easy to pilot for beginners        Featuring a innovative FPV goggle and controller system, HD camera, altitude stabilization and a carbon fiber frame, the Bolt packs cutting edge technology at a radical price point that offers amazing value. The Bolt is a complete easy-to-fly solution that makes FPV drone piloting and racing accessible to everyone.ÃÂÃÂ              1.	Line of Sight -  First for beginners, to start flying simply turn on the drone and turn on the controller. The two will sync up and pair, and you can take off. The drone features altitude stabilization and a beginners mode that makes picking up the basics a breeze. Learn how to safely and confidently maneuver and control your drone.        2.	Screen on Controller -  Next, for those ready to expand their skills and horizons, attach the screen to the controller and start piloting the drone further away. Simply turn on the drone and the screen. The camera on the drone will automatically sync with the screen and broadcast a live high definition feed. Mount the screen on the controller and youre ready to go.        3.	First Person View Goggles -  Finally for those ready for the full First Person View experience, swap the screen into the goggles and prepare for a whole new drone experience. Immerse yourself into the world of FPV piloting and cruise around high in the sky.       Or try your hand at FPV  drone racing  and experience the incredible excitement from every twist and turn. Drone racing is a new and exciting sport that is quickly growing around the world. Using FPV goggles, pilots race their drones around obstacles and courses to compete for the fastest times. It is truly the sport of the future.       The Bolt can be used to experience drone racing at an accessible price point.ÃÂÃÂ  Simply turn on the drone, put on your FPV goggles and start racing! It is an exciting virtual reality flying experience!                                     The Bolt features a unique and innovativeÃÂÃÂ FPV viewing system that allows seamless transition from traditional viewing on controller to FPV viewing using goggles. Simply slide the screen into the goggles for FPV piloting & racing, or swap it back to the controller for recreational flying. Experience virtual reality flying! *        DESIGN ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  The Bolt Drone was designed and tested in Los Angeles by a team of expert product designers, aerospace engineers and drone enthusiasts. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve spent over two years working with our manufacturers to develop prototypes and perfect our designs. We obsessed over every last detail and are proud to present our drone.       Product Highlights   Carbon Fiber Frame - durable and lightweight  HD Photo and Video recording  5.8 ghz receiver/transmitter for reliable and clear performance  Quick swap batteries with long battery life  Modular design for quick replacement of parts  Altitude Stabilization for easy piloting  Adjustable flying speeds suitable for beginners to experts  Innovative screen and goggle system for FPV and virtual reality flying    MANUFACTURING ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  We have deep relationships with some of the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most established and experienced drone manufacturers. Thanks to our manufacturing partnerships and direct-to-consumer approach, we skip the industryÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s middle men markups (importers, distributors and retailers) and pass these savings to you.   CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE -  We will do whatever it takes for you to be completely satisfied with your drone. We find happiness in your happiness. We are extremely responsive to our backers and hope to grow our community around the world!   TRUE QUALITY -  Our drone has been created by some of the industry's most skilled and qualified designers and engineers. We believe we are offering a revolutionary product at a radical price point. We're so confident in the quality of our drone that we're offering an industry best 18 month limited warranty.                                      ÃÂÃÂ Drone Size: Frame is 8.5 inches (length) x 8.5 inches (width). Approximately 260mmÃÂÃÂ measured diagonally from motor to motor.   ÃÂÃÂ Drone Weight: 0.5 lbs   ÃÂÃÂ Drone Motors: 1020 Brushed coreless motors   ÃÂÃÂ Drone Battery Capacity: 7.4v 1000mAhÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ LCD Screen Resolution: 640 x 480   ÃÂÃÂ LCD Screen Battery Capacity: 3.7v 500mAh   ÃÂÃÂ Refresh Rate: 50 Hz  ÃÂÃÂ Screen Transmitter/Receiver: 5.8ghz frequencyÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ HD Photo and Video: 1280 x 720   ÃÂÃÂ Lens: Wide angle 120 degree lens   ÃÂÃÂ Memory Card: 4 GB Micro SD card   ÃÂÃÂ Video Output: AVI   ÃÂÃÂ Video Standard: PAL/NTSCÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ Photo Output: JPG   ÃÂÃÂ Flight Time:ÃÂÃÂ 12 - 15 minutes per fully charged batteryÃÂÃÂ    Top Speed: Approximately 30 mph        We created Bolt Drones out of our inability to find a complete ready-to-fly First Person View drone bundle at an affordable price point. We believe drones, First Person View piloting and virtual reality are the future. However for many people, knowing where to start is a challenge. We created Bolt Drones to introduce the make exciting world of First Person View piloting and racing easily accessible to everyone. Our drone won't break the bank, and is safe and easy to fly.ÃÂÃÂ   Our team is passionate about introducing the FPV drone experience to everyone and consists of military veterans, product designers, engineers and drone enthusiasts. Key members include:   San is a former Marine and is currently an FAA licensed drone cinematographer. Some of his clients include Toyota, Subaru and Cushman Wakefield. He has years of experience operating, building and repairing drones. He has dipped his toes into the world of professional drone racing and hopes to keep working his way up the rankings.  Stephen is U.S Army military veteran and is passionate about building robotics and flying drones. He has worked in a range of commercial industries including aerospace and construction. He is a rocket scientist with a M.S degree in Astronautical Engineering from the Viterbi School of Engineering at the University of Southern California.ÃÂÃÂ   Matthew is our product designer and was tasked with breathing life and soul into the Bolt Drone. He enjoys solving problems and creating innovative ideas, artifacts and systems.. He is finishing up his studies at the world renowned Art Center College of Design in Pasadena.ÃÂÃÂ    WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re on Kickstarter to raise the funds we need to complete our first mass production run. We want to restore the Kickstarter communityÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s faith in drone projects and hope you will join us on this journey!  Flight Demo Videos (3 Speed and Altitude Hold) :ÃÂÃÂ       First Person View and Camera Demo:           ÃÂÃÂ Follow Bolt Drones ÃÂÃÂ                 ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  WHY WE ARE DIFFERENT  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re keenly aware of the different crowdfunding success and failure stories in the drone industry and also in the broader crowdfunding community. While there are a variety of reasons for campaigns failing to deliver their products, we believe it comes down to the following reasons: 1. Manufacturing Experience 2. Honesty & Transparency 3. Crowdfunding Project Execution  1.	Manufacturing Experience ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Our team has over 10+ years of experience working with electronics, remote control vehicle and drone manufacturers. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve developed deep relationships with our manufacturing partners and we know what their capabilities and strengths are. There are established product development processes and procedures that we have refined and perfected together over many years. Also our experience in supply chain and logistics means that our backers will enjoy efficient and smooth shipping and delivery.  Many failed crowdfunding campaigns donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t start actually developing their product until after the campaign is over. We believe that to be an unwise decision that usually leads to unexpected challenges, delays and eventual failure. At Bolt Drones, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve actually completed all the design and development work upfront. Our designers and engineers have already done all the foundational work and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re now just tweaking and perfecting the product. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve gone through numerous prototypes and are almost ready for our first large production run.  2.	Honesty & Transparency ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Many failed drone campaigns embellished and oversold the capabilities of their product. They also werenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t honest with their backers and were slow to respond to their questions and concerns. We believe in the opposite. We believe in accurately describing the capabilities of our drone and being clear and upfront with all our backers. We arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t promising a self-flying, autonomous, teleporting, auto tracking turbo super fantasy drone. We are realistic and have developed an innovative and versatile first person view drone at a radical price.  3.	Crowdfunding Project Execution ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> A successful crowdfunding campaign is not easy to execute. Planning and preparing to launch a campaign is only a small part of the equation. Once a successful campaign is completed, there is still a ton of work to complete: finalizing product development, beginning mass production, customer engagement, logistics, shipping, delivery and many other small but important steps. Members of our team have successfully completed other Kickstarter projects in the past. Backers of these projects received their rewards on time and as described. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve done everything possible to minimize the risk to backers. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been through the entire Kickstarter project cycle before and are confident we will deliver.  We want to restore the Kickstarter communityÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s faith in drone projects and hope you will join us on this journey!  Kickstarter Superbackers ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> You are valued and important members of the Kickstarter crowdfunding community. We plan to organize a few events where you will get a chance to fly an advanced prototype of the Bolt drone and give us feedback. Please contact us with your name and backer number to be added to our contact list for these events.

Project_description: The complete guide to self-promotion for tech people and startups.   We need your help to make a course that teaches coders soft skills. 'Soft skills' include networking, communication and management skills.ÃÂÃÂ   If you want to start your own coding business, there much more to it than the technical aspects of the job. We want to teach coders how to stand out in the tech industry and successfully start their own business.ÃÂÃÂ   Even if you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to make your own company, this course will teach you skills that will make you invaluable wherever you work. ÃÂÃÂ   Marketing yourself as a coder is a strategic career plan. Learning to code is becoming as important as learning to read. The world economy has a growing software industry.ÃÂÃÂ You donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need to buy expensive machinery or an office building to create the next blockbuster app or software tool.ÃÂÃÂ   Learning to code is not enough to start your own coding business. There is much more to it than the technical aspects of the job.   There is a gap in the skill set coders enter the marketplace with. Many coders lack of soft skills. That's why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re making a course to help the Steve Wozniaks of the world be a little more like Steve Jobs.        ÃÂÃÂ   True, a large part of what you do as a coder is technical. But to be successful, you need to do just as much interacting with clients, other coders and stakeholders.  With the right soft skills, you can easily understand what a client wants. You can communicate your own needs and solve problems such as inter-team conflict.        1.	We have a unique approach.        We based this course on proven psychological methods and on our experience in the coding industry.ÃÂÃÂ WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve narrowed down the specific skills you need to keep your business running.ÃÂÃÂ   Other soft skills courses donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t cater to the unique challenges of coding. We do.  At the end of each section, you will know how to apply soft skills to your work. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re committed to updating the course in response to input from you. We want to create dynamic solutions and share knowledge with the whole student community.ÃÂÃÂ   2. We've got fascinating topics.  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve developed a curriculum of the best skills to complement a coding business.ÃÂÃÂ 6 key areas can strengthen the core of your coding business:ÃÂÃÂ    The psychology of entrepreneurship  Fusing soft skills and software development  The code of human interaction  The art of persuasion  Expanding creativity  Mastering team dynamics   Too many courses that involve psychology are obsessed with theory. Our course will give you practical advice that will make you more effective at running a business.  3. We will support you.  The teachers behind this course are known for their dedicated student support. We offer 365-days-a-year support. (Yes, even on Christmas!)  This means that if you need help with something, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get help within a few hours depending on your time zone.  We are committed to listening to student feedback and using that information to update the course and make it better. If you take this course, you won't have a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>fire and forgetÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ experience. You will become part of a community of students supported by us.ÃÂÃÂ   WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be there to provide support and advice by revising and updating the course material throughout the useful life of the course.  4. We use realistic examples.       We donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t believe in hypotheticals. Our course will provide you with practical examples of issues youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll face in the coding industry.ÃÂÃÂ   Where will the course be published?  Our primary publication platform will be Udemy.com. Udemy is a reliable hosting site. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve used Udemy to host our courses for years. By backing the course, you will receive a Udemy code to unlock the course for free. Non-backers will get to buy the course on Udemy.  Udemy provides a robust interface across multiple platforms. This means that we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to bear any hosting costs. Through Udemy, you can access your course material from just about any device or browser.  What we'll use your money for.  Having published so many courses in the past, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re better positioned than most to understand the costs of creating online course material.ÃÂÃÂ We plan to improve our video production quality, produce a higher volume of video than usual and bring on writing talent to polish everything like never before.ÃÂÃÂ   Is this course for me?       This course targets students who:   Have coding skills that are ready to sell  Want to start their own business and build a successful brand of their own as a coder   You can still benefit from this course even if you're not the exact target audience. You can apply the information to meet your needs.   If you havenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t completed your core coding studies,ÃÂÃÂ  this course can be done in parallel to any coding course. This course does not deal explicitly with coding itself. As well, some of the information is applicable primarily when you are working in a business or team setting.   If you arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t starting your own business,ÃÂÃÂ  you can still find this course useful. These skills apply even if you are working for someone else. Whether you are part of a coding team or management in client-facing position, you can benefit.       Who are we?  Hi, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m John Bura. IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m the coding brains behind this course and have been making video games since 1997. IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been teaching game development since 2002.  IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m the owner of my own game development studio, Mammoth Interactive. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve created software for the Xbox 360, iPhone, iPad and more. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve sold our own games to companies like Nickelodeon and have contributed to 40 commercial games. Our iOS apps have been in the App StoreÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Top 10.ÃÂÃÂ   This course is going to transform the way that a coder thinks about and performs their business.ÃÂÃÂ   Hi, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m Libby Seery, the founder of Renaissance Life Therapies and the psychology brains behind this course. Although I am not a coder, I know a thing or two about facilitating success for coders.ÃÂÃÂ   I have worked with high-profile clients in the tech industry, ensuring they realize their visions and helping them to create and run hugely successful enterprises within the field.ÃÂÃÂ   As well as working with clients on a one-to-one basis, I am an accredited training provider with the CPD Standards Office, a globally recognized body. My experience includes training other professionals in advanced psychology methods across a wide range of industries. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   I am passionate about what we teach in this program because I know first-hand what it can achieve.ÃÂÃÂ This course bridges the gap between simply being a good coder and being a key contributor to your company.ÃÂÃÂ   As instructors, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve had the pleasure of teaching more than 280,000 happy students, spanning 170 countries, with incredible reviews. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    This course will change your outlook and equip you with the skills to negotiate the complexity of human nature. You'll go from talented coder to formidable business champion.        Risks and challenges  There are very few risks involved here. Mammoth Interactive has a track record of providing as promised.   The only issue would be if our video editing team suddenly disappeared. In this case, it might take a bit longer to get you your content. We don't foresee this happening.

Project_description: PiPlay Portable         The PiPlay Portable is a gaming system kit that you build yourself. ÃÂÃÂ Based around a Raspberry Pi Zero, the PiPlay Portable brings tons of awesome retro gaming right to your pocket. ÃÂÃÂ Designed over the past year, we are proud to present this device to the public.    All you need to build the kit is some basic soldering skills. ÃÂÃÂ The components plug right into the soldered headers that you install. ÃÂÃÂ It also means you can remove and upgrade components as they become available. Headphone Jack - Portable tunes. ÃÂÃÂ Includes Raspberry Pi Zero and pre made SD card (games not included).       ÃÂÃÂ We are Shea Silverman and Jacob Bates.  Shea is a member of FamiLAB (Orlando's Makerspace), works in online learning, and is a major DIY maker. ÃÂÃÂ He has exhibited at Maker Faire Orlando for the past 4 years, and has helped to create all manner of gaming software for the Raspberry Pi.  Jacob is a Computer Engineer, gamer, and technology enthusiast who also works in online learning. ÃÂÃÂ He enjoys crafting, whether it's with a sewing machine, soldering iron, or band saw. ÃÂÃÂ His current obsessions are VR and 3D printers.ÃÂÃÂ   This will be our 3rd Kickstarter. ÃÂÃÂ In the past 3 years we have developed the PiPLAY software and Deskcade hardware, and successfully shipped them to our backers.       ÃÂÃÂ We have presented at Maker Faire Orlando and the Orlando Science Center           Risks and challenges  This is our 3rd Kickstarter.  Our last 2 were successfully backed, and we were able to manufacture and ship our backers items.  We have already sourced the materials and found our PCB supplier. Creator_description: We're a tech startup based in Brooklyn, NY. Our mission: To steer the world toward its wireless future.We're wired differently.We're wired to wireless.
Project_description: This is what your average bedside table looks like:        This is what your average bedside table could look like:        LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s try it with your office desk. What it probably looks like vs/ what it could look like:        And your coffee table too. You get the drill.       Welcome to iQonAir: The world's first all-in-one wireless charging dock.              The iQonAir is chock-full of exciting features:  1. Wirelessly charge any two cell phones - including Android, Apple, or any Qi wireless charging device.         2. Wirelessly charge another additional device (think AirPods, another cell phone, or-of course-East Brooklyn Labs's SliQ).         3. Place any smartwatch in the rotatable holder.         4. Charge additional devices in one of the 4 USB ports (2 x 1Amp, 1 x 2Amp & 1 USB-C)         5. Pair your phone, MP3 player or TV and play audio over the Bluetooth 5.0 speaker.        6. Wake up in the morning to your selection from the suite of built-in alarms.ÃÂÃÂ         7. And easily pack it away to take with you when you travel.       The iQonAir really is the only one bedside or office table companion you'll ever need!                  Hi Kickstarter, my name is Dovid and IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m the Head of Product Development at East Brooklyn Labs.ÃÂÃÂ   Like most people today, I have multiple electronic devices I use daily. Between my cell phone, smart watch, AirPods and iPad, I have a lot of charging I need to do every evening. Add to that my wife and my kids' devices, and you can imagine the amount of messy wires I have lying around all over my home.  The world is moving toward wireless technology, but weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re still using individual charging docks for each of our devices. I decided to change that. To create the only one charging dock youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll ever need - for every one of your different devices.  It took us two years of research, product design, development and manufacturing, but we finally came up with iQonAir: The worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s first all-in-one universal wireless charging device.ÃÂÃÂ   You can keep the iQonAir on your bedside table, your office desk, coffee table, or anywhere you regularly keep your chargers, and easily charge all your devices without any messy wires.ÃÂÃÂ   With your help weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll finally say goodbye to the constant search for a phone charger. With your help weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll finally say goodbye to always running out of wall sockets. And with your help weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll finally say goodbye to the pain of tangled wires.ÃÂÃÂ   With your help, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll say hello to iQonAir.ÃÂÃÂ        Back in 2017, we sat down with a team of product designers and electrical engineers to brainstorm for the iQonAir. ÃÂÃÂ   We knew 3 things about the product we wanted to create:   It would have to charge multiple devices at once.    It would have to be lightweight and compact.    It would have to become the only item anyone ever needed on their bedside table.ÃÂÃÂ    Now it was time to figure out how.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  We look forward to this project being a great success and filling a giant need for the everyday consumer. Like any project, though, there are challenges which we hope to overcome.

Blurb: A website which promotes awareness and the modernisation of African fashion. The website will be aesthetically pleasing and creative.
Creator_description: Hi! I have a master's degree and I formerly worked part-time at a high-end Department store in London. I find African fashion beautiful and I aim to make it more mainstream and accessible to the masses.
Project_description: We are raising funds to kick-start our business idea of promoting African culture through building a website which promotes awareness and creativity. The funds will go into creating an aesthetic website to support our main agenda of showcasing and modernising African fashion through leveraging on technology. We will also use the funds to hire our own models, meet with Designers and effectively market our product throughout the African continent and beyond.  The African fashion industry is a market with a lot of potential and creative people. It is estimated to be worth $31 billion. The main reason why it is still untapped is due to the fact that there is lack of centralised discovery platforms that allow for the various stakeholders in the fashion industry to meet.  To address this problem, we came up with Zendea. Zendea is a platform that helps designers meet with their potential clients through online showcasing of their work. The aim is to simplify the idea of fashion exhibitions into a website which strives to give the same experience. We believe the website needs to look aesthetically pleasing, elegant and genuinely African. In addition, unique features will also be included in the website, in order to attract and retain our websiteÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s users.  I recently worked in one of the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s best high-end department stores, which is located in London. Many brands were on display in the department store including Gucci, Chanel but I couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t find any African-inspired clothing. Furthermore, when I travelled to South Africa and Kenya, I realised that very few city dwellers wore African fashion. My projectÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s mission is to make African fashion designers and fashion lines, have a greater domestic and international appeal.      Risks and challenges  My Co-founder(Philip Ombasa) and I, plan to consult with Lawyers, to make sure our website operates responsibly.   Most Founders of young and exciting companies tend to have unrealistic expectation but my Co-founder and I, have access to and will utilise the professional support of our former university's Multi-disciplinary Business Incubator.   With regards to marketing, we will use flyers, Word-of-mouth marketing, social media and other relevant forms of advertising.   We will ensure that our website is secure and functional by investing in a good web hosting platform.  As long as we secure our funding goal, we will be able to fulfil all of our rewards promises. We are committed to turning this idea into reality and keeping our promises. If unforeseeable circumstances occur, we will adapt and effectively overcome them.

With WuDuSimple, you will only use 0.3 liters per ablution. Overall, that is a large amount of water that could be used in different ways around the world. What companies there are that support you? what mindset you need to have in order to realize an idea? So here we after more than a year. Now the time has come and we have a finished product: WuDuSimple.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Before launching WuDusimple on Kickstarter, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve made multiple prototypes. The above videos and pictures shown on the campaign page are working prototypes. Please feel free to contact us via email to  wudusimple@gmail.com  if are any questions.

Creator_description: I look for new trends to introduce to our north american market. Its time we look for unique ways and break out of the old and boring trends.
Project_description: 4 in 1 Multifunctional Anti-theft Backpack  Moving around or travelling has finally become less stressful. We can now pack anything and everything we may need along the way.ÃÂÃÂ  Its also got the name a mobile office.     Perfectly designed to hold everything that you may require along the way in a very organized fashion       Its a closet completely redesigned to take the shape of a backpack    This backpack also comes with many safety and security features like the Double Layer four teeth zipper. This zipper makes it very difficult for intruders that would try or even think about reaching whats inside your bag. The four teeth zipper is unbreakable and strong.     Extra layer of safety to give us a piece of mind    Another safety feature is the TSA approved locks. This makes it travel perfect and no need to carry extra locks and its keys around. The hassel of old fashion locks is old news.ÃÂÃÂ      TSA approved locks    Im sure we all have been there when it unexpectedly starts raining and we run for cover. But thats not the end usually, as we end up spending a lot of time after that trying to dry up our belongings and worrying about our electronics. Its time we change the trend and go with high density waterproof backpack. If it rains all we will need is a cloth wipe it off and being confident and stress free that our belongings are exactly in the same state we put them there.     100% waterproof       As an added feature it also comes with a rain cover    With new tech we also need to ensure our bodies are taken care of. Designing a beautiful multipurpose bag would be incomplete if it did not complement our shoulders and backs. Comfortable straps almost make it feel like a below on the back and the ergonomical design gives our posture a pleasant boost. The breathable mesh design makes it easier to carry on the back for longer durations.     Ergonomically designed with comfortable straps    The qualities if this backpack does not stop here. It also comes with a faster charging USB port placed perfectly on the side, which makes it easier to connect and use without opening the rest of the bag.     Easy phone connection through USB    Thoughtfully placed with a durable cover     Extra cover to protect from the elements of the weather    Connecting to the USB is as simple as it gets without the need of plugging it into the wall. First we connect the powerbank to the internal wire provided with the bag, then we connect our phone charging cord to the USB port and finally conect pur phone to the phone cord to begin charging.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                    You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  Its multifunctional design also stands out for its hidden pocket design with extra padding. Safety and security is as important to this backpack buddy of yours as to you.     Back hidden pocket    Size and space is perfect for our daili, business, school or travel needs. Perfect for storage or carried on the lap.     Dimensions made to cater for your needs    Side pocket access is ideal for daily use and we have taken that into account. Taking quick supplies in and out is an ease we need to have in our backpacks. After all it is a backpack.     Side pockets    As an ideal backpack buddy it should definately be road ready. These reflective strips become and extra layer of safety for the owners.     Reflective strips    This 4 in 1 backpack is designed for you. Are you ready to claim it.      Risks and challenges  All the rewards will be calculated in the funding stage.  We will also open the door to canadian innovators and our company will be working very closely with them to innovate more products.

Blurb: Non-Toxic | Bio-Degradable | Child SAFE | Pet SAFE | Wildlife SAFE Antifreeze | Coolant | Winterizing products

Creator_description: Hi , My name is Bradley Miller I am a Design, Metalurgical, & Mechanical Engineer that has worked most of my (35)+ year Professional career in Motorsports (Racing) & performance industries solving problems or creating safety products. I have been fortune to have worked in the highest levels designing & developing products in the world's toughest conditions. I have developed the safest | non-toxic | mammal | Pet safe antifreeze recently.
Project_description: Here is YOUR chance to save lives. Will you take it ?  SAFE Antifreeze | Coolant | Winterize  Goal:  To save lives: Humans, pets and wildlife. We are growing a socially responsible company to share our earth-friendly products.   Why:   We love our children, our pets and Mother Earth.ÃÂÃÂ      A rare survivor of Ethylene Glycol poisoning, he didn't know that water on the curb wasn't safe !     How:   After decades of experience working in the automotive and racing industry we understand how dangerous chemicals related to keeping your cars on the road are. In developing a high-performance product for racing, we found a way to make some of those chemicals safe.ÃÂÃÂ      If we only knew then what we know now ! Bradley Miller, developer of SAFE Antifreeze  Circa 87' shown working the Month of May @ Indy500 Developer of the 1st Digital Fuel Injection Systems used in IndyCar & Formula 1 Racing & many other safety related products in Motorsports     SAFE Antifreeze  is the safest, most environmentally friendly antifreeze ever developed.   Experience:   We have the technical and business education and training to meet the challenges ahead.ÃÂÃÂ   Why hasn't it been done before?  We have developed & rigorously tested proven products & methods that improve performance while staying absolutely Non-Toxic. Others have tried but their products still contain dangerous Toxic additives & formulations from what we see on the store shelves.  Change takes inspiration, effort and means. We need a little help with the means. That's where the visionary involvement of Kickstarter members comes in:     SAFE Antifreeze | Coolant | Winterizing | Ready to use | 3.78Liters (1 Gallon)    Be a part of something huge and SAFE for our families, pets and Mother Earth. Sponsor  SAFE   Antifreeze  today! Thank you for your help & support , if you can't donate please share this link with friends & family that will truly help our cause. Thank you for watching and reading too.ÃÂÃÂ We simply need your help with a small purchase or donation to help off-set our 1st production batch to manufacture on a highly automated scale to make affordable we will take it from there and be good stewards to use our income wisely to promote the products and deliver them directly with affordable pricing & great value.ÃÂÃÂ        Antigua Women's shirt as shown       Antigua Men's Shirt as shown       T-Shirt (back)  Black ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Saving the Elephants to the Bees along with the Grasses and Trees"        T-Shirt (Front) Black       * No Animals were harmed during the filming of this videoÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  Potential markets:  Primary:  98% of every vehicle on the road, anywhere on earth. If it has a liquid-cooled engine, it can use our SAFE Antifreeze.  Secondary: Marine and industrial liquid-cooled engines and equipment.  Volume: Ethylene Glycol (EG) is used in a variety of end segment applications.  How much new antifreeze is produced each year? Worldwide, well over 400+ million gallons of antifreeze concentrate are sold each year.  After the typical 50% dilution with water, this yields about 800+ million gallons of engine coolant. Between 25 and 50% of this volume ends up improperly in the environment, and dumping by consumers is a major cause of this pollution.  Approximately 90+% of the remainder is mixed with wastewater, treated, then discarded to surface waters.  Since Ethylene Glycol is a petrochemical product, its price rises along with natural gas and crude oil prices.  Governments like Australia are imposing more regulations concerning antifreeze management in Mining operations but this is a slow process so SAFE Antifreeze wants to lead the way in making these products more accessibleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008B> & affordable globally.  Consumers are expecting more regarding responsible resource stewardship that is where SAFE Antifreeze comes in.  Proper cooling system maintenance and removal of Ethylene Glycol based Antifreeze can mitigate the harmful effects of antifreeze on our environment.  What is the difference between ethylene glycol and propylene glycol? Ethylene glycol and propylene glycol are chemically similar but extremely different in toxicity. Ethylene glycol has the chemical formula C2H6O2. Propylene has the chemical formula C3H8O2. Ethylene glycol has a slightly higher boiling point than Propylene Glycol. Ethylene glycol is much less expensive to produce and is more widely used. Propylene Glycol is GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) by the FDA non-toxic.  Pricing: SAFE Antifreeze | Coolant vs Competitors  Our competition is going to come from a comparison of a traditional poison Ethylene Glycol (EG) product being a few dollars less because it's always on-sale since 1927.   Other Propylene Glycol (PG) 50/50 Based Antifreeze | Coolants we have found to contain Silicates over 250+ppm plus other toxic inhibitors such as Nitrites so we don't see these today as our competitors.  Our competitors are large marketers of the dangerous products we want to replace and they will have their less toxic entries but the reality is their incomes are made from the other hazardous products they haven't stopped producing. Please help us to change the marketplace.   Time to Market: 2-3 Weeks from Kickstarter releasing funds if we reach our goal.   Distribution: Online Purchase either directly  www.safeantifreeze.com  or through Amazon.  Please donate we need your help!

Blurb: Vision is an intelligent mobile app that supports you and assists you with daily activities.
Creator_description: The company was founded in 2016. We deal with the practical application of Artificial Intelligence.The team of people working on new technologies added, among others IT engineers from UWM and Warsaw University of Technology. Until mid-2016, the team created an efficiently functioning network, and its first commercial application was the launch in 2017 of an intelligent mobile application recognizing text labels and processing the most important information contained in them.
Project_description: Vision is an intelligent mobile app that supports you and assists you with daily activities. The algorithms are based on neural network allow to control most of the electrical devices like TV, lights or kitchen devices. In addition, Vision makes it easy to find out information on the Internet. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ» Advanced Light Control ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ» Learning new voice commands ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ» Play Music (Spotify integration) ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ» Kitchen recipes ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ» Rescue Options (life-saving mode) ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ» Individual Personalization         Vision, allows you to create a home management center without destroying the walls in your home, and will turn the traditional home into the house of the future. This is how Vision was created whichÃÂÃÂ combines possibilities of home and office friend as well as our communication center with other devices and online access to knowledge.         Vision is a system that   allows for any personalization   starting from the appearance, this what he says and how he says.ÃÂÃÂ We can connect him with other devices and give himÃÂÃÂ many other possibilities.  ÃÂÃÂ         A real   smart home without making holes in walls   and pulling cables. Controlling lights and devices in home or office by voice   haveÃÂÃÂ never been so easy. Add devices that integrate with Vision and feel the comfort. Your smartphone or tablet   will gain new great features. They will   become intelligent.  ÃÂÃÂ         In order to get the full VisionÃÂÃÂ voice range at home,ÃÂÃÂ we can set several devices with the installed application.         You will make your Smart home   quickly, cheaply and impressively.  ÃÂÃÂ         You can   easily pair many devices   in one big system.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ         Rescue option   - Vision canÃÂÃÂ call for help in trulyÃÂÃÂ need situation. This option is intended for   criticalÃÂÃÂ life-saving situations, as well as older people who urgentlyÃÂÃÂ need to contact a senior care assistant. All they need to do is say "   Vision help me   ".  ÃÂÃÂ                             Vision also plays the role of a   home entertainment center, paired with a Bluetooth speaker   worksÃÂÃÂ as a   voice controlled music player   (useful when bathing in a bathtub or in the shower)         It also works great as a   children's fairy-tale player. Children can open their favorite stories by voice, which we add to the playlist.                                              Vision is   easy to install   and can be done in three easy steps.          1. Take a smartphone or tablet withÃÂÃÂ Android versionÃÂÃÂ 5.0 or higher to connect to theÃÂÃÂ Internet.   2. Install the application ofÃÂÃÂ VisionÃÂÃÂ and configure to your personal configuration.   3. Put the device in the stand.         Done, have a nice usage.              Vision has the ability to   freely define your own commands   and their meanings.ÃÂÃÂ We can add different types of commands, for example, commands that work whenÃÂÃÂ they hear the name given to the device (we can give any name to the device)ÃÂÃÂ or commands that he will respond to when he heard when we talk to him.ÃÂÃÂ          It gives you   unlimited possibilities to develop conversational and personalizationÃÂÃÂ skills   for our needs. Blurb: My invention harnesses the reaction force of a spinning body and turns it into useable energy.
Creator_description: My whole life seems to have been lived so that I end up at this point in time with this device, and attempt to help the world overcome the greatest ever threat to its future survival. I have had several patents and registered designs, but nothing comes close to the importance of this invention.
Project_description: This project will be the turning point at which the world starts winding back the CO2 emissions that we produce, our mission and your future. Another year and another 30 giga tonnes of CO2 will be emitted into our atmosphere which needs to be taken back out, this device will allow nature to do her job and turn CO2 into wood and oxygen.ÃÂÃÂ   Climate change doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need to be tied up in politics and targets, but rather be empowered by a series of small shifts that together will make a big difference.  I invented a device that harnesses the reaction force of any rotating body, turning it into useable energy. This device can be fitted to almost anything that spins, from automobiles to power stations, improving energy production and/or efficiency without fundamentally changing any other process, making it fast and relatively cheap to execute and hence, most importantly, attractive for industry and governments to want to implement. Stage one of a four stage plan has been completed, a small scale test was conducted to support the principle using a 0.75kW motor, and now I need your help to move forward.  Stage two requires production of detailed CAD drawings and simulation utilising powerful computers and professional software which will be used to engineer stage three ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the development and manufacture of a precision engineered working prototype. To secure the resources needed for stage two I need to raise $35,000.  Stage 3 can't be properly costed without the drawings for CNC machines, gears, other machined pieces, web site development, patents and sundries but it would be in the region of $100,000. Stage 3 would be concluded by the end of December 2019, with regular updates on how it is proceeding throughout the year if the funds are raised.ÃÂÃÂ   Stage 4 is to get approval to establish the Gayle F McKeachnie and Donal E Kolb research wind farm in Vernal, Utah, USA. The Vernal region will become our ground zero for the global fight on climate change. The wind farm could become a tourist attraction that will live in history forever as the starting point where we began to wrestle back our home from this atmospheric fire. Our plan will supply enough clean renewable energy for 18,400 homes and be carbon neutral in about 6 months. The turbines would be retro fitted with the device and 4mW generators but using the same body, hub and blades of the 2mW generators. This would turn 11 x 2mW (total 22mW) into a 44mW farm proving the energy infrastructure we have can be converted to produce more electricity. I have sourced 11 surplus wind turbines which could possibly be purchased for $12,000,000, with the entire project cost of about $22,000,000.ÃÂÃÂ      Surplus Wind Turbines to be utilised    My device will benefit the entire planet, with every ecosystem and living organism being given a reprieve. We need to stop waiting around for our governments to get beyond policy talks and multi-nationals with political and financial games to play. It is time to take action, help me get this project to the next stage whilst there is still time and together we can make a difference.  If the device were to be installed immediately on all nuclear, hydro, wind, wave, pumped water and geothermal generating power stations worldwide around 6 giga tonnes of CO2 would be saved from entering the atmosphere each year as most of the coal, oil and gas power stations could be taken off the power grid.  If I can leave you with one last thought, "If we have met then it is through these words".  "I have learned to use the word impossible with the greatest of caution" - Wernher von BraunÃÂÃÂ   "To see the future, you have to create the future" - Brett Elliott      Risks and challenges  The principle has been proven with a crudely manufactured device and I firmly believe the main risk and challenges will come from Governments and multi-national businesses. This is where a ground swell of support from the average person must come to lift climate change above politics and profits. This couldn't have been imagined only a few years ago, lobbyists and politicians would have just turned a blind eye and shelved it. Remember that there is a presidential election soon.

Blurb: Online Tech Educational Programm for Graduates and Business Owner.
Creator_description: Years of experience in the educational field, mostly on technology. I emigrated from Ecuador to the United States when I was in my late 30's. I had been involved with numerous educational programs in favor of immigrants.
Project_description: Traditionally higher education had been the pillar in which society relies on the advancement of human evolution, it is through formal and higher education that people had the opportunity to only expand their knowledge but to thrive on it. I found the need to reach out to a broader audience, and audience that is more global and connected than ever before.  Online teaching courses with a backend on AI (Artificial Inteliigence) as a business is not only thriving nowadays, but it is the future. The online courses will be mostly related to the technology field, from developing user experience (UX) methodologies to User Interface (UI) programming and AI coding, our courses will be concise and practical so students can put to work and shared what they had learned. My team is bilingual and so we are planning to launch this courses in English and Spanish language.  I have a team of 4 people with an educational background experience and skills who are eager to jump on board this endervour. As mentioned our online programs are based in three categories, all of them related to technology:   1.) Ai (Artificial Inteligence) courses on: ME (Machine Learning) and DE (Deep Learning) - basics, principales, evolution and advance.  2.) UX (User Experience) development and design courses in areas such as, but not limited to: concept and design principles, UX processes, UX prototypes, and UX execution and deployment.  3.) UI (User Interface) development and design courses in areas such as, but not limited to: design principles and practices, design essentials, and design software tools.   I had experience in the traditional educational field, and I know how difficult it is sometimes to have the time and resources to fulfill this goal, there is no doubt it is difficult but not impossible. It is important to teach and share knowledge in areas such as Artificial Intelligence, not only because it is the future but the present. There is so much information out there about the infinite possibilites in areas such as AI, and so teaching these courses will really create an impact on people's mind on how important it is to acquiere knowledge in this field.  I had acquired through the years the trust of many tech firms that will allow me and my team to embark in this journey. It is through my partnership with them that I pledge to share this knowledge to audiences everwhere so students or proffesionals can think about how these concepts will influence their everyday life.  Our plan is to start with free 15 minute videos where we talk about the importance of these technologies and how students or proffesionals can take these courses for free once they have another person sign up as well. The idea is for students and proffesionasl to share their experience with their friends or colleages in order to create a fan base and traffic to our site. We are in the process of creating a site and social media channels where we are going to provide as much information possible.  In order to start this project we need a solid financial base where I can incentive my four collegaes to venture in this long term proyect. Through the online courses we are not only going to raise money to keep this project alive but to keep the momentum where other people want to jump on board.ÃÂÃÂ   Our main obstacles is competition, but our main difference will be to give students or proffesional access to up-to date articles or information in our site that will keep them interested in our courses. What we want to offer everyone is practical business case studies where they can how practial and important are these topics, and the growing market that will impract all levels of society.  Our main goal is to incentive users to share knowledge and be the channel (through our site) where people can share knowledge and the latest trend related to the development of ÃÂÃÂ AI and subsequet fields.  Lastly I want to thank you for reading this staement and I really do hope you support us in this crazy adventure...it is by being crazy that we believe we can change this world.      Risks and challenges  Risks might be that some people will not be able to connect since they don't have internet, but I will open a Youtube channel where they can see a summary and shared with more people.

Blurb: Join the bike revolution with the innovative trolley that is unlike anything you have ever seen.

Project_Community_top_countries: |Germany:39 backers|United States:33 backers|France:13 backers|United Kingdom:12 backers|Canada:11 backers|Switzerland:11 backers|Israel:7 backers|Japan:7 backers|Australia:6 backers|Austria:4 backers
Creator_description: Industrial Designer with strong mechanical knowledge. An avid cyclist who believes cycling is the optimum solution for short commutes in the city.
Project_description: We love riding our bikes! And if you feel the same, then TReGo is fot you!  Our trolley upgrades your bike unlike anything you have seen  and adds a unique transportation dimension to your ride!         Fun meets Functionality   TReGo is a trolley, made to carry heavy things anywhere you go. But what makes it unique is that it's the first trolley that turns YOUR bike into a practical cargo bike in seconds.       It's that simple: no tools needed, no permanent modifications to your bike and never get your hands dirty, thanks to our  patented FAST-connector .  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        TReGo is a true door-to-door solution! It's a practical way to transport heavy loads or bring groceries home on your bike.        ÃÂÃÂ AND use it as a standalone trolley to take it with you where your bike can not go.        Not limited to the front of the bike, TReGo can also be used with our towing cart kit. Connect it to the rear axle and tow it behind you for long travels and bulky, heavier loads.       ÃÂÃÂ        Once TReGo is attached to your bike, your new riding experience begins. The two tilting wheels make turning corners a blast.   ÃÂÃÂ We've made sure you'll enjoy your ride, whether you're in a rush...       ÃÂÃÂ   or have time to play around...       Check out TReGo in the skate-park  here .       ÃÂÃÂ    The FAST-Connector   It's never been easier to upgrade your ride. The innovation of TReGo is our FAST-Connector. Our patented connecting system allows you to  connect & disconnect the trolley to just about any adult bike. No greasy hands, no tools needed and no permanent modifications to your bike neither.         Once attached to the fork the FAST-Connector has three functions:    1.  Enables you to connect & disconnect  the TReGo trolley in seconds. Connect to just about any adult bike (26" or bigger)   2.  Functions as a bike stand . The bike stands firmly when the trolley is not connected and the fork is protected from any damage  3.  Enhances Bike security . When the trolley is disconnected, no one will be able to drive off with your bike. The FAST-Connector is securely locked to the fork of your bike. A special screwdriver is provided so only you can take it off when necessary  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Don't buy another bike, just utilize the bike you already have, upgrade it and start carrying. TReGo has the benefits of traditional Cargo Bikes, but offers the following key advantages. TReGo       is smaller, easier to store   is multi-functional  adds theft security   is fun to ride   costs lessÃÂÃÂ         TReGo is compact in size and is easy to store.       Folds easily into a compact size (telescope handle bars)   Small enough to be stored at home   Even when fully loaded, your bike dimensions don't change much         ÃÂÃÂ        TReGo has undergone extensive test rides on different terrains. We set the highest safety standards for ourselves and guarantee TReGo will live up to them. Our trolley will be certified in the US and the European Union and abide by all safety standards.   Disc Brakes   We have equipped TReGo with  two hydraulic disc brakes , one on each wheel. The brakes are part of the trolley and can be controlled by a separate brake lever.        The hydraulic brakes provide high braking power when connected to the bike for safely controlling a fully loaded trolley       Just move the brake lever from the trolley to the handlebar, using our adapters and you're ready to go. The brake lever also includes a locking button that locks TReGo's wheels whenever you are parked.  ÃÂÃÂ        In choosing manufacturers it was important for us to know that our partner breaths and lives bicycles. We have therefore partnered with professional bicycle manufacturers who  master the technology and understand the engineering which will guarantee the highest quality.       The TReGo Trolley  TReGo is equipped with an aluminum rack (made in Canada). The big loading surface is the base to carry your heavy loads.       ÃÂÃÂ   Carry up to 25 kg/ 40 lbs on the rack and enjoy a new transportation dimension on your bike.ÃÂÃÂ    We will offer the rack in different colors.  Up-Cycled TReGo Bag  We have designed a special bag for our trolley. It fits right onto the rack and is big enough to fit 40 L/ 10 Gallons.        The bag is made of  up-cycled materials  and will be produced in the US by  ECOLOGICDESIGNS , Colorado. Using up-cycled materials will ensure that every bag will end up with a unique design, no two bags will look alike.   The bag can also be used without TReGo, thanks to the added shoulder strap.   Bag Features:         Size: 20x33x80 cm / 8x13x30 in   Volume: 40 liters/ 10 gallons   Materials: reclaimed billboards   Adjustable size shoulder strap   Velcro closure for weather resistanceÃÂÃÂ    Reflective light patches for nighttime visibility   Made in the USA   Towing Cart Kit      TReGo is truly multi functional and is not limited to being connected to the front of your bike. We developed a special aluminum box that attaches to the trolley. The cart easy hooks up to the rear wheel of the bicycle.   This allows you to transport heavier loads up toÃÂÃÂ 40 kg / 88 lbs on different terrains with greater ease and comfort.        ÃÂÃÂ    Towing Cart Features:        Box size: 74x42x10 cm / 29x16.5x4 in   Load capacity: 40 kg / 88 lbs   Material: Powder coated Aluminum  Made in CANADA  We will offer the box in different colors   COLOR OPTIONS:  TReGo's Rack and Box come in five different colors:ÃÂÃÂ  red, blue, white, gray and black. Before manufacturing we will contact you to ask for your choice.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ    Bicycle fitting:    TReGo is compatible to just about any adult bike . As long as they have a standard fork (forks with and without suspensions), made of steel or aluminum and have a standard dropouts. TReGo fits bikes with all kinds of brakes.   TReGo will NOT fit:         Forks made of Carbon fiber   Lefty forks ( forks with only one blade )   Bicycles with small wheels (less than 26'' or ISO-559 mm)   Forks with  through axle  (if you don't know what it is you don't have it)   Fat bikes (forks with hub-spacing of more than 100 mm)   Still not sure?  Learn more                        Ofir Yadan : The Inventor         Portfolio    Rafael Yahlomi:  The Finance Guru       ÃÂÃÂ    Zak Friedrich Wesche:  The Marketeer        Portfolio        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    Balancing assistance:  During the past few years we had many people with balancing difficulties approaching us and asking if TReGo will help them get back on their bicycles. We had several such test rides and found out that there is no conclusive answer- Some found it easier and helpful while others did not. We think It depends on the severance of the balancing difficulty.   We do not have any scientific results and unfortunately can not guaranty that TReGo will help you balancing while riding.          ÃÂÃÂ 2017:           ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  We have been developing TReGo for more than 4 years now, testing all components and perfecting the riding experience. We have full commitment and quotations from our manufacturers and parts suppliers and are ready to start mass production. Our logistics partner is also up to speed, so we are confident in our supply-chain.  Nevertheless, like all startups and new projects there can be unforeseen obstacles and delays along the way. We are committed and have done everything in our power to minimize any risks in the production process to date.
