Creator_description: Meet the Team: Toni Kfoury (Founder) Erika Cortez (Co-founder) Rabih Kfoury (CEO)ErikaÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s creativity was the ultimate complement to Toni's business savvy disposition.As we grew together, so did our love for our cats. It was then when we discovered a common problem, our disdain for our catsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> litter box odor. Unsatisfied with off-the-shelf ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>odor eliminators" available at retailers, Toni set out to transform our home and maintain it odor-free by creating the Kitty Vent.  Years later, we both found ourselves in awe of our odor-free home, which proved to be a capable pet waste odor remover. It is then when we decided to share our Kitty Vent with the world, in hopes that cats and homeowners alike could bask in odor-free environments just like us.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ        Eliminate Litter Box Odor Permanently       Kitty Vent uses airflow to literally drive the bad odor away. Even if there is no room to hide the litter box, owners will likely forget itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s there.  ÃÂÃÂ   EASY INSTALLATION        Step 1:  Mount the adjustable bracket on nearly any window in your home. ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008B>ÃÂÃÂ    Step 2:  Attach the hose into Kitty Vent and the back of the litter box. ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008B>    Step 3:  Plug in the power adapter. And just like that make your home unconditionally odor free!   ÃÂÃÂ   Fits Vertical & Horizontal Windows       ÃÂÃÂ The adjustable bracket containing the fan can be placed in any existing sliding window measuring  3 to 4 feet. ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ   SECURITY       The aluminum window sash lock provides maximum security for your home.   ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  The desire to share our Kitty Vent with households across the world has driven our team to overcome challenging tasks to bring this idea to life. The most daunting challenge ahead will be funding manufacturing.The financial support of backers will help resolve this monetary challenge. We have taken Kitty Vent as far as our team could, without the aid of investors or financial debt to keep Kitty Vent a family brand wholeheartedly dedicated to improve the way feline friends coexist with humans. All we need now is support to take it even further and share it with feline households around the world.

Blurb: A 3D-printable, Arduino-powered kit for students, hobbyists and educators that teaches how to build and program robotic exoskeletons.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Toronto-Canada:5 backers|Houston-United States:4 backers|Warsaw-Poland:3 backers|Sydney-Australia:3 backers|Seoul-South Korea:3 backers|Milton Keynes-United Kingdom:2 backers|Siena-Italy:2 backers|Delft-Netherlands:2 backers|Oslo-Norway:2 backers|Singapore-Singapore:2 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:57 backers|Canada:13 backers|France:9 backers|Netherlands:9 backers|United Kingdom:9 backers|Germany:8 backers|Italy:8 backers|Australia:7 backers|Switzerland:7 backers|Belgium:4 backers
Creator_description: Hi, I am Volker and I recently passed my PhD defense at ETH in ZÃÂÃÂ¼rich, Switzerland where I developed and researched robotic exoskeletons. Over the last couple of years I was involved in several medical and experimental exoskeleton projects and taught a variety of exoskeleton classes and labs.During this time it became clear that many students get very excited about robotic exoskeleton technology once they hear about it, but often there is no possibility for them to get involved and learn about it. To change that, we launched the EduExo project.
Project_description: The EduExo  The EduExo is a robotic exoskeleton kit that you assemble and program yourself. It contains the hardware that you need to build an elbow exoskeleton. An accompanying handbook contains a tutorial that will guide you through the different assembly steps. In addition, the handbook provides background information on exoskeleton history, functionality and technology. In the end, you will have a good understanding about exoskeleton technology and its application, together with hands-on experience building and programming your own robotic exoskeleton.      The EduExo kit contains all parts that you need to assemble an elbow exoskeleton and a handbook with a tutorial.    The EduExo hardware combines off-the-shelf components (motor, force sensor and Arduino microcontroller) with a rigid exoskeleton structure and cuff interfaces.        Quick Facts:    What it is:        It is an educational robotics kit that will help you to learn about exoskeleton technology.   It is a do-it-yourself kit that requires your active participation and willingness to learn and try new things.    For whom it is:        For high school and college students who want to learn about robotic exoskeleton technology to prepare themselves for a career in exoskeletons and wearable robotics.   For makers and hobbyists who are looking for an interesting and entertaining project in a fascinating field.   For teachers and professors who want to set up exoskeleton courses or labs. The EduExo provides additional teaching material and can save a lot of time and money.   Project Background  When thinking of robotic exoskeletons, movies such as Iron Man, Aliens or Elysium may come to your mind. But already today there are many real world exoskeletons that support rehabilitation of stroke patients, enable people with paraplegia to walk again or assist workers lifting heavy objects.      Examples for existing exoskeletons. Left: a stationary arm rehabilitation exoskeleton e.g. for stroke therapy. Right: leg exoskeleton that enables users with paraplegia to walk. Pictures used with permission of ETH ZÃÂÃÂ¼rich, Switzerland.    And todays systems are just the beginning of a very promising and quickly growing field that is in need of many skilled talents within the next years.  Due to the novelty of the field, getting involved and learning about robotic exoskeletons is difficult as learning material or even exoskeleton course or classes are not widely available yet. This is made even more difficult as learning about exoskeletons is not possible by theory alone, but also requires practical hands on experience (you have to see and feel it to understand it). Unfortunately, the necessary exoskeleton hardware is expensive and there are no dedicated and affordable learning devices available. This is what we intend to change with the EduExo.  The EduExo recently won the Wearable Robotics Association Innovation Competition in April 2017.         ÃÂÃÂ    This prize was awarded to us by a jury of CEOs and CTOs of leading exoskeleton companies, highlighting their demand for exoskeleton talents. Click on the banner above to learn more.   What Others Say       "Given that it strikes a nice balance between educational and ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Holy sh** I just built an exoskeleton,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ it isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t surprising EduExoÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Kickstarter campaign is a success." - SnapMunk   "...you now have the opportunity to support this fantastic introduction to wearable robotics and augmentation technology kit"  - Exoskeleton Report   "EduExo, now available on Kickstarter, is an attempt to bring this technology to the masses."  - Arduin  "The main challenge of the project is to design exoskeleton hardware that is both cheap enough to be affordable for a high school student, but still complex enough to be an appropriate learning platform that teaches relevant and state of the art exoskeleton technology. EduExo, in my opinion, achieved its objective." - Open Electronics   "But the new EduExo exoskeleton kit on Kickstarter, is looking to democratize exoskeleton development. " - Robotics Trends   "So you would like to learn more how robotic exoskeletons work? The EduExo STEM kit has you covered." - Robotic Gizmos  "The core concept behind EduExo is pretty cool; a robotic exoskeleton kit that you can assemble and program yourself. " - All3DP   What You Will Learn  By going through the tutorial, you will learn how the mechanical design resembles the human anatomy, how to connect the sensors and the electronics board, and how to design and program a control system. Further, you will  connect the exoskeleton to a computer and learn how to use it as a haptic device in combination with virtual reality. Each chapter of the tutorial introduces one topic, starting with the necessary theoretical background, followed by a set of exercises that the user implements with the hardware.     Excerpt from the Handbook. Each chapter introduces one topic, starting with the theoretical background followed by a set of excercises.    The following topics are covered:ÃÂÃÂ    Exoskeleton Introduction   The first chapter will introduce you to the field of robotic exoskeletons and to exoskeletontechnology. What are robotic exoskeletons? What are they used for? How do they work? Since when are they being developed and used? The introduction will get you started and inspired.        Mechanics and Anatomy ÃÂÃÂ   This chapter covers the basics of human functional anatomy and exoskeleton mechanics: How does the human create forces and is able to move? How does the exoskeleton provide support? How is the exoskeleton designed to match the form of the human and how is it attached? During this tutorial, you assemble and wear the exoskeleton.        Electronics and Software ÃÂÃÂ   The next chapter covers the electronic and software components that convert the mechanical exoskeleton into a robotic exoskeleton. You will connect the electronic components, sensors and actuators to an Arduino microcontroller, and write the basic software routines to read sensor signals and control the motor.        Control Systems ÃÂÃÂ   The control system defines the behavior of the exoskeleton. After a general introduction into exoskeleton control, different controllers that define the exoskeleton-user interaction are introduced. Step-by-step we discuss, implement and test them.        Virtual Reality and Video Games ÃÂÃÂ   Video games and virtual reality simulations are well-established methods in use with medical exoskeletons. They are used to increase motivation in patients that use exoskeletons for rehabilitation, e.g. after a stroke, to keep them engaged even in therapy sessions that can last for hours. You will learn how to create a computer game, connect the exoskeleton to your computer (Windows PC) and use it as a game controller.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              The Muscle Control Extension ÃÂÃÂ   The muscle control extension adds a muscle activity sensor (EMG) and a new chapter to the handbook.       Measuring the user's muscle activity to estimate movement intentions is an interesting way to control a robotic exoskeleton and the EduExo will show you how it can be done.ÃÂÃÂ   The extension contains a muscle activity (electromyography-EMG) sensor, cables to connect it to the Arduino microcontroller and electrodes to connect to the user to get you started.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             We chose to offer it separately because the EMG sensor is comparatively expensive. This way you can decide for yourself if you want to learn about this advanced robotic exoskeleton control approach or if you prefer to first get started with the basic kit. The extension will be offered separately after the full release of the kit.  Beyond the Tutorial  The EduExo tutorial introduces you to all you need to know for a deeper understanding of robotic exoskeletons. But, of course, there are many more possibilities of what you can do, and the EduExo is the perfect platform for your own experiments and ideas. Maybe you want to develop your own control algorithm or a new computer game that can be controlled with the EduExo? Or you want to learn more about mechanical design; you can start by designing new parts and interfaces to optimize the exoskeleton for your own arm anatomy. If you have implemented a great idea with the EduExo, we will be happy to share it on our website and YouTube channel.  Why we need your support  We have working prototypes of all components and have written many sections of the handbook. But we still have to finalize the hardware, finish handbook and tutorial, scale production and order the components. Therefore, we need your support. By contributing you will help us to create a STEM education kit to make robotic exoskeleton technology truly accessible. In return, you will be among the first to get the EduExo and gain knowledge and skills in a seminal field    Stretch Goals  We have reached 150% of our minimum funding goal (or 12k CHF)! Thank you so much for the support!  As we have more than two weeks to go, we added stretch goals in case the campaign gets even more support. Of course, the stretch goals will benefit all backers.       The Rewards       Project TimelineÃÂÃÂ    The EduExo project started as a side project (besides a PhD in robotic exoskeleton research) and has been in development from early 2016. But only with the beginning of this year we were able to commit more time to turn the prototypes into a product to offer the EduExo to interested users, schools and universities. With your support, we expect to finish the development within the next months and start shipping in August. When we fulfilled all Kickstarter rewards, the EduExo kit will be fully released.  Spread the Word  If you like our project, we would highly appreciate if you helped us spread the word and share this campaign through your social media channels. Our  Facebook  and  Twitter  username is @eduexokit.  What the EduExo is not  To make sure that your expectations match our intentions, here are the things that the EduExo is not:       It is not a medical device that is intended to be used for any kind of therapy or medical application.   It is not an exoskeleton that will make you super strong. The actuation is weak. It is only intended to illustrate basic exoskeleton principles while being affordable and safe. You will not be able to do more chin-ups. It rather provides a gentle guidance of your voluntary movements.   It is not a plug-and-play device that works out of the box. You have to make it work, that is a feature!   Requirements  The EduExo is designed for users that are new to robotic exoskeletons. Basic programming and electronics skills are benefitial, but you can learn everything you need while using the kit. The tutorial includes step by step explanations and sample solutions.  To use the EduExo some preparation is necessary. Most of the electronics can be connected without soldering and a breadboard  and jumper cables are included to get you started. The force sensor requires soldering to connect it. For that you need a soldering iron and some basic tools. Don't worry If you have not done this before. The equipment is not expensive and we include a step-by-step explanation in the tutorial. The Muscle Control extension also requires soldering. To program the exoskeleton (Arduino UNO microcontroller) you need to install the Arduino IDE. It is for free and can be downloaded on the Arduino website for several operation systems. For the "virtual reality and video games" chapter, you need to install the Unity 3D game engine. It is for free for private and non-commercial use but requires registration. So far we have only tested the Windows (7 and 10) version of it and cannot promise that the communication between exoskeleton and game works (similar) on other platforms.  Due to shipping regulations no battery is included. For all the tutorials we use the Arduino's power out to supply the sensors and the motor. While it is limited in power, it is sufficient for the tutorial. You can expand it later with a motor shield and even replace the actuator if you like. The Arduino itself has to be battery powered when wearing the exoskeleton (safety).  Shipping and Taxes  We are shipping the EduExo from Switzerland and ship worldwide. The shipping fees are listed with the rewards and will be added during checkout. You are responsible for any taxes, customs charges, etc. required by your country. We will attach the bill to the parcel and the product will be labeled as 'educational robotics kit' with its real value (what you paid for it). This should minimize any delay in case it gets processed by customs.      Risks and challenges  We use mostly off-the-shelf components that are widely available. But sometimes products change, are (for some time) not available and in stock or are discontinued. To minimize these risks we use parts which are interchangeable with little adaptation of the design.  In case we run into supply problems and have to adapt the design, it could delay manufacturing and shipping of the boxed kits. If you choose the maker edition (3D print it yourself), we will send you new STL files in case we update the design because of component supply problems.

Blurb: What is it about showers that seem to provide temporary relief to tinnitus sufferers. Imagine a device that could simulate that relief!
Creator_description: I'm a software engineer suffering from tinnitus.
Project_description: Imagine if you had a device that could simulate the effects of the shower on tinnitus without actually taking a shower. I still can not believe a cure has not been found seeing howÃÂÃÂ it isÃÂÃÂ basicallyÃÂÃÂ the same as if we had a person immune to a virus but haven't found out what makes the person immune. I think it's because people are so set on thinking that it must be sound related. The simple fact that people who claim to experience relief during a shower also say they do not get that relief simply listening to shower sounds seems to indicate something else is going on.  Has anyone ever seen the movie Daredevil and specifically the rain scene where Daredevil can actually see by means of sonar? It is my belief that the sound waves that echo off during a shower create a sort of sonar that vibrates off the skull creating the effect. I'dÃÂÃÂ like to research the effects of sonar on tinnitus.  Funds raised thru this project will be used to purchase the necessary equipment to properly record the vibrations generated when water from a shower hits the flower and walls which I believe creates an echoing effect that vibrates off of a personsÃÂÃÂ head. It is these vibrations that I believe can be simulated with aÃÂÃÂ pulsating device that can be worn on a person's head. The funds will then be applied to find appropriate manufacturers to create the end product.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  I'm a engineer by trade and have the incentive to fully research this possible solution as I have been suffering from bad tinnitus for over 6 years now.

Creator_description: My name is Kirill Eremenko and I am super-psyched that you are reading this. I teach online courses in the spaces of Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence and I'm passionate about democratizing Data skills.https://www.udemy.com/u/kirilleremenko/
Project_description: Update: Even More Course Features to Boost Your AI Skillset       ÃÂÃÂ        Artificial Intelligence is reshaping your relationship with the world and itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s just getting started. TeslaÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s autopilot, job automation, the products you ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>stumble uponÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> online - it's entering our daily lives, careers, businesses, even our homes with such blistering pace you probably havenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t even realized it. ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most likely an AI resting in your pocket this very second. Crazy, right?ÃÂÃÂ   With this exponential growth in AI weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re teetering on the edge of a new industrial revolution. There's a reason Andrew Ng, the founder of $100m company Coursera said "Artificial Intelligence is the new electricity" - soon itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be as much a part of your daily life as your smartphone, except without the off button.ÃÂÃÂ    But hereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s where things get really crazy.  This time round, the revolution will see machines taking on tasks no human intellect could ever perform. Imagine how that will change the world in the next 50 years! WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re just setting the ball in motion, and thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s exactly why this brand new course is so highly requested...       All of this means thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a massive opportunity for people like you, equipped with the right AI skillset, to either:ÃÂÃÂ     Join talent-hungry tech companies and be at the forefront of global innovationÃÂÃÂ     Launch unique businesses or apps for the next generationÃÂÃÂ     Simply have huge amounts of fun with cool AI projects at home     We know what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re thinkingÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>But donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t these pioneering companies and exciting tech startups need a college degree to even get my foot in the door?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ - not quite. Elon Musk, the founder of Tesla, himself said during an interview  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no need to even have a degree at all, or even high school...if thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a track record of exceptional abilityÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ....skill trumps credentials.  And if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re just looking to enjoy the huge potential for fun creative projects with AI from the comfort of your own home, thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s possible too. AI can be deployed anywhere, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll show you!   But where can you learn the AI skills needed for all this?  Not everyone has the 7 years it takes to get a PhD in computer science or the patience to self teach from scattered sources and dense text books. The world needs to gain access to these valuable skills in a fun and engaging way without all the time and bank-busting financial investment, and it needs it nowÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦       Our Deep Learning A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ Kickstarter was a huge hit ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> ranked top 6 world-wide at the time. Since then weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been asked non-stop for a course on the explosive field of Artificial Intelligence, which would teach the broader range of skills needed to solve real-world problems in a fun and exciting way. Deep Learning is great for specific problems, but AIÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s uses are truly limitless.ÃÂÃÂ   Today weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re excited to announce  Artificial Intelligence A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ , a brand new course teaching you how to unleash the full power of AI and open up countless doors for innovation across any field or personal project.  So how are we going to tackle a topic as complex as AI?  Well, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got something new and exciting for you in mindÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦       As humans we learn best through games and pretend scenarios. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s how we evolve. And since AI is based on the human brain that's exactly how AI learns most effectively. Using  OpenAI Gym  (a project backed by Elon Musk, Microsoft, Amazon, and others) youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll create Artificial Intelligence able to  teach itself  to win games like Breakout, Doom and Self-driving cars. YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll even sit back and in wonder as it crushes your high score.   "Building an AI to play games won't change the world, it wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t even run my coffee machine".   Remember, the game is only the  training ground  for your AI. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s like going to the gym, you train your body to complete more challenging lifts. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the same here (hence OpenAI ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>GymÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ). YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re training your AI to take on more challenging problems before being deployed in real-world scenarios - like increasing business efficiency, developing new tech or running your home based on your lifestyle.ÃÂÃÂ   Games are just simplified version of the real world. If your AI can teach itself to beat a game based on its rules, inputs and constraints, it can do it in our world too. All you have to do is apply the skills you learn in this course to your chosen challenges and problemsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦   ...or keep on crushing video games, thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s plenty of fun in itself!     HereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s some perspective...    The same team that built Alpha Go (the AI that beat the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s best Go player...at the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most difficult game), built an AI that created an innovative way to control Google's cooling system in one of their data warehouses, saving the company  40% on their electricity bill.  Imagine  nearly halving some of the costs in your own business or home?    The point is the videogames are just training wheels, the world is your AIÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s real challenger.        Introduction Module:  Learn key AI concepts and intuition training to get you quickly up to speed with all things AI. Covering:   How to  start building AI  with no previous coding experience using Python  How to  merge AI with OpenAI Gym  to learn as effectively as possible  How to  optimize your AI  to reach its maximum potential in the real world         Module 1: Breakout  - Each module contains its own entire mini course, taking you from beginner to expert in each field. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll start simple in Module 1 and build up in difficulty.   Module 2: Doom  - Build more complex AI as you progress through the course. In module 2 we will be taking on the challenge of passing a level in the popular game Doom. Watch in amazement as your own AI improves itself in front of your eyes! (not for those who take pride in holding the highest score...).   Module 3: Self-driving cars simulation  In the final module, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll face your most exciting challenge yet ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> we will show you how to create an AI for self-driving cars! This will bring you even closer to the cutting-edge applications in use today and prepare you for deploying your AI in the real world.  Each module will contain enough high-quality material to stand alone as its  own  course, but with  Artificial Intelligence A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢  you will benefit from not 1 but  3 courses in a single package,  meaning you get extra practice with advanced knowledge and skill in time for this ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>New Industrial RevolutionÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ.       (Note: This is a mockup. Actual design may differ)ÃÂÃÂ        SPECIAL BONUS for Kickstarter backers ONLY. Not available anywhere else:   Bonus Module 4: Pacman  - Included with your Kickstarter pledge. Learn how to program your AI to conquer this era-defining arcade classic and benefit from even more practice developing cutting-edge AI.  ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s 33% extra course material!   And whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> these examples will trigger your creative mind to spark unique ideas for your own intuitive solutions. Either in the physical world or in digital products such as high-potential apps, rather than copying a typical ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>recipe bookÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> course.       ÃÂÃÂ        Plus! We really want you to succeed in building AI and that's why we are going to add the following three Bonuses to any pledge level you choose (starting from Super Early Bird and above):    An AI cheat sheetÃÂÃÂ  to enhance your creations' learning abilities and potential   AI one-pager LaTeX  with relevant formulas for you to have handy whenever you need it   Bonus video  where weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll talk about the full power of AI and how itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s rapidly changing the world as we know it         1. Complete beginner to expert AI skills  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Learn to code self-improving AI for a range of purposes. In fact, we code together with you. Every tutorial starts with a blank page and we write up the code from scratch. This way you can follow along and understand exactly how the code comes together and what each line means.   2. Code templates ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  Plus, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get downloadable Python code templates for every AI you build in the course. This makes building truly unique AI as simple as changing a few lines of code. If you unleash your imagination, the potential is unlimited.   3. Intuition Tutorials ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> ÃÂÃÂ Where most courses simply bombard you with dense theory and set you on your way, we believe in developing a deep understanding for not only what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing, but why youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing it. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t throw complex mathematics at you, but focus on building up your intuition in coding AI making for infinitely better results down the line.   4. Real-world solutions ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll achieve your goal in not only 1 game but in 4 (incl. Bonus module). Each module is comprised of varying structures and difficulties, meaning youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be skilled enough to build AI adaptable to any environment in real life, rather than just passing a glorified memory ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>test and forgetÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ like most other courses. Practice truly does make perfect.   5. In-course support ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> ÃÂÃÂ WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re fully committed to making this the most accessible and results-driven AI course on the planet. This requires us to be there when you need our help. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve put together a team of professional Data Scientists to support you in your journey, meaning youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a response from us within 48 hours maximum.        ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>What if I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have any need for AI right now?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   AI is rapidly expanding into our lives each and every day, meaning even though you may not have many uses now, soon youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have hundreds. Picture this, those who first heard about the concept of ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>electricityÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ would have thought exactly the same, now look at the world. Same thing goes for tech ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> you would have been puzzled by the need for a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>SmartphoneÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ten years ago, yet now we canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t imagine our lives without one. The true potential only becomes apparent in time, do you want to risk missing out?   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I like that thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no complex maths, but this isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t TOO simple, right?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Not at all. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll take you to the same level as if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d learned AI the long, hard way - we just choose to teach in ways that are a lot more fun (and less headache-inducing). By the end of this course youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be able to implement complex AI in your personal life, business or career and achieve amazing results.   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve seen other courses charge for a certificate, is this course the same?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   We donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t believe in charging $300 just for a certificate of completion. If you pass this course you deserve the right to show your new skills by default - thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why our certificate of completion comes free for you to show to future employers, further your business credentials or simply to show off to friends.   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve already done the Deep Learning course, will this course still benefit me?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Deep Learning is a great asset when applied to very narrow problems, interpreting data points in niche business algorithms for example. However, these constraints mean it falls short when tackling a wider range of problems. Learning general AI opens up a whole host of new possibilities not just in narrow business solutions, but across entertainment, robotics, health, transportation, or anything you put your mind to!       ÃÂÃÂ        WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be on hand to support you along your  entire journey!         See what other students just like you are saying about our recent best-selling courses:ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Upon completion of this course youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a verifiable electronic certificate which you can use to boost business credentials, increase the chances of landing that dream job in tech or simply show off to your connections on Linkedin (the actual design will differ):       ÃÂÃÂ        We hope youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re as excited about this idea as we are. AI will be a huge part of all our lives so itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s only fair that you have an equal opportunity to get involved. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re passionate about bringing AI to the world, and today we need your help to ensure this groundbreaking course becomes a reality.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¨ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¨Thank you,  Kirill and Hadelin     Visiting MIT, Boston, May 2017    ÃÂÃÂ                    ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  There are numerous risks associated with creating an online course. Some of the major ones include: sourcing the right equipment, learning to produce clear and engaging tutorials, finding what exactly interests our students, having the appropriate level of subject matter expertise.  Having built up a substantial level of expertise in the space of online education we are confident that we are well-equipped to face any challenges: we have tried and tested equipment including backup hardware and software; between the two of us we have already produced over 20 courses with hundreds of hours of content and almost a thousand tutorials enabling us to develop our unique engaging teaching styles; we constantly interact with our existing 150,000+ students including Q&A, webinars and surveys - this allows us to know exactly what common painpoints we need to address in the course content; and finally, we do have extensive backgrounds in Data Science, Machine Learning and Deep Learning but we are constantly doing research and deepening our own knowledge to make sure we can deliver the best of the best to our students in Artificial Intelligence A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢.

Blurb: We are creating the 1st ever Affiliate Marketing Mobile App! \\nNo longer will a Business Affiliate Program require an eCommerce website!
Creator_description: I am a US Army Veteran. Since exiting the Army in 2011, I have owned my own advertising company until I started Affiliate Worldwide, LLC.
Project_description: Our mobile app will be the first ever on the market for Affiliate Marketing. Up until now only businesses that had an eCommerce website could use an Affiliate Marketing Program. So, from a business standpoint anyone from retail to contractors can now utilize our app to allow them to have affiliates working for them to send them referrals and they do not have to pay out commissions until they are already paid and since they are affiliates they do not have to pay expensive employee costs or benefits. From an affiliate standpoint now they can work with their local small businesses and help them drive sales and build the local economy from the palm of their hand by sharing on social media, by word of mouth using their affiliate code or sending a direct message to the business with their referrals contact information all from within the app and when the referral makes a purchase the business will pay the affiliate through the payment options the affiliate chose when setting up their profile.      Risks and challenges  Without funding we will not be able to finish our mobile app. However, we are confident in our product and we see it being a dominant service once it launches.

Creator_description: Erin Madore fell in love with the world of fitness and wellness many years ago - first as a way to relieve stress from her demanding corporate job, and then over years it became more about connecting to her true self. ErinÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s diverse background includes many different certifications: Registered Yoga Teacher through South Boston Yoga, NASM Certified Personal Trainer, Reiki Master, and Spinning Instructor. For the last 4+ years she has been fully immersed in the fitness industry logging over 2,000 hours teaching and helping over 150 people change their lifestyles, their behaviors and their bodies through personal training. Her many passions and skills provide her with inspiration and knowledge to create thoughtful and intelligently designed workouts, classes and workshops. Erin is best known for her genuine and upbeat attitude, and loves challenging and motivating people to do their very best, to have fun while exercising, and to be proud of their efforts.Josh Wilcox is a Software Engineer passionate about health and wellness. After working in many different financial and tech companies (from marketing to health to car sharing) Josh has gained the skills and experience necessary to create a truly amazing fitness platform. Plus with a background in competitive hockey and a love for all things fitness (you can find him biking to and from work everyday and often at a local yoga or spin class), he brings an understanding of the fitness industry from the client perspective to the GW team.
Project_description: Grounded Warrior is dedicated to providing all of the tools and services you need to stay healthy along with the accountability, support and motivation to stay on track every single week.ÃÂÃÂ     No more skipping workouts, no more playing catch up, no more confusion or frustration. Instead, with Grounded Warrior youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have: consistency, clarity, confidence and focus to stay healthy day in and day out.   We at Grounded Warrior (GW) believe that the best fitness and wellness program should be: well rounded, creative, versatile, and challenging. We also believe in the importance of incorporating all different types of exercise including: strength training, conditioning, cardio, yoga, stretching, and even meditation (exercise for your mind).ÃÂÃÂ   By following our fitness and wellness program our plan is that you will feel GREAT each and every day.ÃÂÃÂ   YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have energy, strength and be able to do the things you love! From salsa dancing, to running, to skiing, to surfing to anything else you desire! Your body will be ready to live your life!   Grounded Warrior is the way you can fill in the blanks and create a solid and sustainable routine that is engaging and consistent.         With membership youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have access to:ÃÂÃÂ     Weekly Workout Programs  including: Total Body Conditioning, Strength Training, Cardio and Yoga! These will be available via video and written out so theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re easy to follow and understand and delivered to your inbox every Sunday so you can plan your week in advance and know exactly what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be doing.   3 LIVE Weekly Motivational Group Check-Ins  with your awesome founder, Erin! This is your chance to get a quick but effective dose of motivation and inspiration to stay on track!    Weekly Meditations  and mind/body prompts to help you create a healthy mindset that promotes a positive and healthy lifestyle.   Easy-to-use Progress and Goal Tracker  so you stay focused and determined each and everyday.   Online Group Page  where you can connect with other members and ask questions.   VirtualÃÂÃÂ One-on-One Coaching  from certified and knowledgeable professionals including nutrition consulting, virtual personal training, and mindset coaching.  ALL of these services, tools and support means you'll have:  more TIME ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> no more searching and scrolling  more CLARITY ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> no more confusion and overwhelm  more CONFIDENCE ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> know what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing and why  more VARIETY ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> no more boredom  more FREEDOM ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> workout when and where you want to  more CONSISTENCY ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> stop the cycle of starting and stopping and playing catch up  more ENERGY ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092>ÃÂÃÂ to do the things you love    Essentially MORE of life! Sounds good, right?!         What does Membership to Grounded Warrior look like?  Grounded Warrior is a SOLUTION not a Band-Aid. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a program that you sign up for because youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re tired of cycling through countless programs each month with nothing to show.ÃÂÃÂ    Grounded Warrior is for those that want guidance, and who doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t?ÃÂÃÂ  This is especially for YOU if:    You truly want lasting changeÃÂÃÂ   You want to lose weight, get stronger, and be more flexible FOREVER  You realize that doing the same exercises every week is leaving you stuck in a plateau  YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re sick of wasting time searching for new workouts and exercises  YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re tired of running, running, and running with no direction  Your body is begging you for a change  You want to feel really good every single day! ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Grounded Warrior Membership Levels       As you can see we offer 3 different levels so everyone can find a program that fits their lifestyle and needs.ÃÂÃÂ On top of our membership services we will also be offering Nutrition Services and Mindset Coaching a la carte.  Like we said, we are trying to provide all of the different services, tools and support you need to be active and healthy!ÃÂÃÂ   We Need Your Help!ÃÂÃÂ    To create Grounded Warrior as an incredible online fitness platform and community we would love your help supporting our KickStarter campaign to fund:      The actual website design and developmentÃÂÃÂ   The high-quality video production for the weekly workouts ÃÂÃÂ   Science-backed programming and content to help you workout safely and effectivelyÃÂÃÂ   And marketing and PR as we want to inspire as many people as we can! We figure the more people that are healthier the better the entire world will be!ÃÂÃÂ    Now our goal is $11,000 but if we are able to hit our stretch goal of $16,000 weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be able to focus on providing even more information and inspiration by hiring a Registered Dietitian, another trainer and providing more services to our members from the very beginning!        With your donation youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be helping turn Grounded Warrior into a reality and help spread health, wellness and positivity! ÃÂÃÂ    And if you really want to help please donate and then share ÃÂÃÂ this campaign with all those that you want to inspire to be healthier ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> parents, friends, spouses, co-workers, everyone! Just think, if we are all healthier weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll probably all be happier too!  Time Line  Our plan for the next 5 months after KickStarter ends:     June  - Send out Summer Total Body Workouts so you can stay healthy all summer long!   July  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Send an update on programming and planningÃÂÃÂ    August  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Send out Stickers, Water bottles and Gym Bags to our amazing supportersÃÂÃÂ    September ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  Soft beta launch with all of our awesome KickStarter Founding Members   October  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> FULL Global Launch of Grounded Warrior online platform to the world!!        Risks & Challenges  We understand that starting any business is inherently risky, especially one in the fitness industry which is admittedly saturated. The good news is that we are heading into this project with years of experience under our belts, an intense sense of dedication, and most importantly a ton of passion for helping people live healthier lives. We believe we can handle whatever challenges come our way!   Our promise to you: if problems do come up that can affect your reward or membership we will let you know right away. We will keep the communication lines open at all times and do our best to create an incredible fitness and wellness platform that helps YOU create a healthier lifestyle!  Thank YOU!  Finally, HUGE THANK YOU to all those that helped us create our KickStarter Campaign including, but not limited to: our amazing friends and family, Laura, Juliette, Mary, Linda, Justin, Jessi, Cindy, Mike, Sue, Vena, Aurelie, Mike, Vladimyr, Yurish, Aliza and David and Todd for letting us use their beautiful South Boston Yoga studio!  And to all of those considering to donate... isn't your health and wellness worth it? We think so! Thank you in advance!ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  *Included above.

Creator_description: Tempus Electric BikesWe Build Bold Electric Bikes Modelled After Vintage Motorcycles
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Why We Do It  The thrill of riding an e-bike is one of those things that you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t explain until youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve actually done it. For one person, the thrill might come from the nostalgia of going bike riding as a kid, with a little more speed. We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t tell you what exactly makes an e-bike so much fun, but this is why we ride: Between feeling the wind like youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re in a convertible with no doors, being able to weave through traffic ever so smoothly, or feeling the instantaneous acceleration when you hit the throttle, every time we ride is just as exhilarating.  Our goal is not to build just another e-bike. We have a passion for innovation, design, and performance. The never ending pursuit of it is what drives us. By donating to our campaign, you are not just helping us build cool bikes, you are helping us pursue our passion.    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         Wired  - "Several companies are rethinking the e-bike aesthetic, drawing on some of the coolest motorcycles of the past to build something new yet retro. The latest comes from the Canadians at Tempus Electric Bikes."   Designboom  - "TempusÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> CR-T1 electric bike stands out because of its design that recalls the form of a 1960ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s cafe racer motorcycle. the result is a bike that boldly brings together the newest battery and motor technology with a stylish motif of the past, combining all the ease of riding a bicycle with the power and looks of a motorcycle."   Treehugger  - "If your desire is for old-school looks coupled with high-tech features and performance, then this e-bike certainly fits the bill with its cafÃÂÃÂ© racer lines and 1000W electric motor."   Bike Rumor  - "Seeking to combine the best elements of motorcycles and bikes, Tempus added todayÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology to a classic look to create their debut model, called the CR-T1."   Inhabitat  - "The founders of Tempus Electric Bikes started their business with one simple goal in mind: to build an e-bike with a truly unique and striking design, and theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve certainly succeeded with their first model."ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ      50 km/h top speed    We use the highest quality 1000 Watt Brushless DC Hub motor, located in the hub of the rear wheel. Hub motors are the most reliable type of e-bike motor, because they only have one moving part. Having a hub motor in the rear wheel gives the CRT1 great motor efficiency and a low centre of gravity. This way, our bike can handle extremely well, while supplying a thrilling amount of power. When given full power, the 1000 Watt Hub Motor allows the bike to reach a top speed of 50km/h. You can use the thumb throttle, or pedal assist in order to power it.      48V 17Ah. 50 km range    Our 48V 17Ah (816 Watt-hour) removable battery located on the bikeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s downtube is powered by LG lithium Ion cells and, is 33% larger than the industry standard (545 Watt-hour. Think of this like the size of the gas tank; the higher the Watt-hour, the more range you have) and weighs only 9lbs. Additionally, the battery can be locked to the frame of the bike with a key, or can be removed which allows you to take the battery inside to charge. Our battery comes with a 4Ah charger, so you can fully charge the battery in 4-5 hours. It has a lifespan of over 600 cycles (30,000 Kilometers) and also includes a 5V USB port for charging any device on the go.       With a motorcycle seat and a tough ABS Controller Tank, we designed our bike to look, feel and ride like a vintage motorcycle. The controller tank doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just look good, it protects the brains of the bike: the 30A Sin wave motor controller, the 12V power converter and the wiring used in our electrical system. Waterproof connectors and the controller tank keeps all of the electrical components safe, and adds to the aesthetic of the bike.       Each bike comes with a Full Color Display LCD that gives you Speed, Distance, Time, and Battery Percentage. With the LCD, you can set a 4 digit password, choose your pedal assist level, and customize many other ride stats. Additionally, the LCD is connected to the motor controller, which allows you to program other settings like motor power and speed. You can check your local e-bike laws and adjust the settings to make your CRT1 legal in any country. In most countries, e-bikes do not require insurance.       When youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re going as fast as 50 km/h, a reliable frame is crucial. To save on cost, most bike companies build with aluminum, which can fracture under extreme torque. We design and custom build each of our frames with Aircraft Grade Chromoly Steel, so you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to worry about reliability. The CRT1 might make you feel like youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re flying but our frame will make sure that doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t actually happen.       Our bike includes bright integrated 12V head and rear LEDs that run off the main battery, so that you can see where youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re going and others can see you. Most e-bikes donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have integrated lighting systems, which is dangerous and requires buying additional lights that you have to recharge separately. We hide our 12V power converter inside the controller tank to hide ugly wires and maintain a clean design.       ÃÂÃÂ These brakes are smooth as butter, and stop the bike on a dime. The 180mm Front and 160mm rear hydraulic disc brakes outperform mechanical disc brakes in both comfort, and stopping power.       We did something most e-bike companies do not: we added high quality dual crown locking front suspension forks. We wanted the CRT1 to be comfortable, and give the rider the option to take the bike off-road; the front suspension forks do just that. They absorb most of the shock and vibrations from bumps, which keeps you riding longer whether thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s on the road or off.       Soft, comfortable, and big enough to take a friend for a ride.       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        If we achieve our goal, we will be able to fully launch our business with our first production run. With the money raised, we plan to rigorously test suppliers and purchase the necessary tools and parts required to build the bikes.       Our goal is to continuously push the boundaries of design in the e-bike market. Regardless of the result of this campaign, we will continue to do that and move our company forward.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        In order to thank you for contributing to our campaign, we will be offering some awesome rewards. Some of these perks include a heartfelt Thank You, a Tempus Hat, an Extra Battery, and the chance to purchase one of our first production models at a discounted price!  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ      *Message us about additional color options!    ÃÂÃÂ        Canada/US Flat Rate: $549CAD/$399USD  Pick Up in Toronto, Canada: FREE!  International Shipping: Please Contact Us for a Quote       When would I ride an e-bike?  WhatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s great about e-bikes is their versatility. There are many opportunities to use them everyday. Whether you use it to go for a coffee or to the gym, to get to work, exploring your area, or looking for exercise, an e-bike can fit in perfectly with your lifestyle. They do not require gas, licensing, or insurance. Our controller can limit motor power and speed so that everyone can ride legally and have the top speed available for off road fun. They are legally classified as e-bikes in most places, usually making it more efficient than a car or bus during rush hour. You can lock it anywhere you would lock a regular bicycle, making it exceptionally easy to park.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Since July 2015, we have worked countless hours to bring our e-bike to market. We have built 4 prototypes of the CRT1, making huge improvements every iteration. Now, we can confidently say that we are ready for our first production run.       Our Story  5 years ago we built our first high speed electric bike and fell in love with the freedom, power and flexibility that e-bikes offer. Like many startups, Tempus was started in a garage. In the summer of 2015, we started the company and started our journey towards building bold electric bikes. A few months later, we wrote a full business plan, rendered 3D models, and began working on bringing our bike to market.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Co-founders Ikenna Ofoha (left) & Xavier Chan (right)    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. If you cannot contribute, we completely understand. There are many ways other than contributing that could greatly support our campaign. We would be extremely grateful if you could share our campaign page and like and follow us on social media. By increasing the amount of people who see our campaign, you are helping us increase the likelihood that we reach our crowdfunding goal. Another way you could help support our campaign is to talk about it to family, friends and anyone who would be interested in checking us out. Any kind of support from you means the world to us. Without it, none of this would be possible!        ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Risks and challenges  Our first production run for has now been our goal for two years and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re finally here. We have planned out everything we have to do to for it, and the associated risks. When backing a company in its early stages, there is always risk associated. The best that we can do to minimize our risk is plan for anything that could go wrong, and be ready for it. This way, we wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be taken by surprise when we hit an obstacle. Some of the risks we have identified and are prepared for are:  Large-scale production: Until now, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve never brought a product to full-scale production. Luckily, our mentor has years of experience in developing and bringing products to market.  Supplier Testing: Our bikes are custom crafted with high quality components. Some of the parts we test however, will not be. We have planned out a rigorous testing method for our components to make sure that our suppliers are top-quality.   Shipping: If our shipping procedures are not sound, there could be huge delays for our backers. We have been working closely with shipping and customs brokers to make sure we know international shipping procedures and the associated costs.

Creator_description: I'm a software and hardware engineer, passionate about electronics and good design. I was born in Italy and now i'm based in Madrid, Spain.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Arduino is the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most popular open-source electronics tool, used every day by millions of people for experimenting and learning electronics. Thanks to the support of the maker community, anyone can share their knowledge and learn from thousands of other projects. You can create anything using basic components like switches and LEDs, or more advance components like digital interfaces and wireless communication modules. The only limit is your imagination!  Makers around the world have asked themselves the same question: where do I find reliable and easy to use circuit diagrams for my projects? I've spent years tinkering and making stuff with Arduino, ARM mbed, ESP8266, etc. and one of the things that always annoyed was how difficult it was to find reliable, simple to read and aesthetically pleasing circuit diagrams, reference tables and pinouts.   Back in 2013 I began designing my own and making them available for free on my website  pighixxx.com . I have created so far more than 300 high quality circuit diagrams and pinouts that are used by more than 500,000 makers worldwide. The feedback from the community has been amazing and it has encouraged me to create more and more content. The only problem is that they're not very convenient to use on your computer screen where the programming environment should be the main open window. Also, printing the diagrams can only add more clutter to your desk.   We've been working hard for the past months to deliver a great product that will solve these problems.   ABC: Basic Connections        ABC: Basic Connections is a completely redesigned selection of the best circuit diagrams, reference tables and pinouts from  pighixxx.com , plus many new unreleased designs.   The book is a collection of neat, easy to read circuit diagrams and pinouts that will show you how to properly connect almost anything to your Arduino, ARM mbed or ESP8266 compatible boards. ABC: Basic Connections is great for both beginners and professionals and it can be used as a resource for teaching electronics.   Press         ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Learn how to connect LEDs, decoders, shift registers, 7-segment displays, mux/demux, light bulbs, DC motors, solenoids, relays, buzzers, IR detectors and emitters, LCDs, encoders, keypads, temperature sensors, and so much more!  The book will contain more than  100 high quality, 200gsm, coated, A5 (8.27x5.83 in) sheets inside a custom ring binder, with multi-color tab dividers . The sheets are removable giving you the flexibility to use only the ones you need for each project, minimizing the clutter on your desk. There is enough room for 50 additional sheets, allowing you to add your own printed sheets to the collection, as well as additional sheets from the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>expansion kitsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ we are planing to release in the future.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        The first pre-release units were delivered to us by our manufacturing partner a couple of weeks ago and I must say they look amazing! The pictures don't do justice to how great it looks and feels. Bear in mind that these pre-release copies were printed using digital printing technology. Also, the colors may look duller due to the color grading applied to the pictures. The books will be printed using offset printing technology, achieving much more vibrant colors and professional quality results!   We want to support local manufacturing in Spain, that's why we partnered with a printing company that has been making high quality print media for more than 35 years in the south of Madrid. By doing this, we can also reduce lead times for manufacturing and shipping, and oversee the full production to ensure that the book will meet our strict quality standards.        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         Extra content   You're not only receiving a book with high quality circuit diagrams.  Every page on the book will have an online tutorial website with additional diagrams, bill of materials, theory, tips, code, etc.  We're using our own link shortening service 0-1.es for that purpose.     Page from ABC: Basic Connections    ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ      Bill of Materials    ÃÂÃÂ      Breadboard Diagram    ÃÂÃÂ      Microcontroller Board Connections    ÃÂÃÂ      Code    Fritzing breadboard diagrams can either look good, or look like a total mess, depending on who designs them. But they don't teach you anything about the circuit at first glance, what you do when you use them is copy the diagram on your breadboard mechanically...  Breadboard diagrams will be available online as well, but we encourage you to assemble the board using the circuit diagrams and use the breadboard diagrams only to make sure all the connections are properly made and nothing is missing.  Those who purchased the first edition of ABC (ABC: The Book) will be able to access the online content at no extra cost!     Fritzing project vs ABC: Basic Connections    ÃÂÃÂ      Fritzing project vs ABC: Basic Connections    Stretch Goals  The following featueres will be included with the book when each funding goal is reached.        Current stateof the project      Timeline    The book is currently undergoing a thorough review process. With the feedback we're receiving from our reviewers, plus your feedback during the campaign, we will be able to have the book ready by the end of the campaign. Our manufacturing partner will be notified in advance and the manufacturing process will begin right after the campaign ends. We are confident that all rewards will be shipped in August.  Shipping will be done with one fo the best global fulfilment companies. We're doing everything we can to offer affordable shipping to all of you, but unfortunately it's not easy to do it for some countries, considering the complexity of the logistics and that the book weighs almost 1kg. ABC: Basic Connections will be shipped from the US to our US backers.   Back in 2013 and thanks to more than 2800 backers on Indiegogo, I was able deliver more than 4000 units of ABC: The Book around the world. Unfortunately, no more copies were printed after the campaign.   ABC: Basic Connections features a completely redesigned version of each circuit diagram found in the 2013 edition of ABC, plus many more unreleased designs.  More than 100 sheets (200+ pages!), more than double compared to the 2013 edition of ABC.     Disclaimer   I have no relationship with Arduino (the company). When I say "Arduino", I'm referring to the ecosystem and the community.  I would like to remark that right after the rewards of my ABC: The Book campaign back in 2013 were delivered, and after countless headaches and less hair on my head, I severed all ties with smARtMAKER, Inc., the company that was responsible for managing the fulfilment and the campaign. We have absolutely no relationship with them. For this campaign, my team and I are 100% in charge of design, publishing and fulfilment. ;)      Risks and challenges  Our manufacturing partner has proven to be reliable and reachable at all times. It's a family run business that has been producing high quality print media for the past 35 years. They are based in the south of Madrid, a short drive away from our office. We have toured their company and manufacturing facilities and inspected some of the finished products they were making and the results look and feel amazing. However, will be overseeing the manufacturing process actively to make sure everything is done according to our specifications. ;)  Back in 2013 and thanks to more than 2800 backers on Indiegogo, I was able deliver more than 4000 units of ABC: The Book around the world swiftly and hassle-free. For this campaign, lead times will be shorter and everything will be under our direct supervision.  In order to make this book affordable enough, we need to print at least 2000 copies. Printing in Europe is more expensive than doing it in China, we need your help to keep the costs low, please share this campaign with your friends and colleagues and help us spread the word!! :D  With your feedback, we can make the book even better! Please send us your comments at  feedback@abcthebook.com   If the campaign is successful, I will be dedicating much more time to making more and more content. Thank you very much to all of you for supporting the creation of more circuit diagrams and pinouts for the past years!   <3 PighiXXX

Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ  ENGLISH BELOW   El SUP, paddle Surf o Stand Up Paddle Board es un deporte fantÃÂÃÂ¡stico, es lo mÃÂÃÂ¡s parecido a caminar sobre el agua pero no tiene la estabilidad de un kayak. Al ir de pie subimos el centro de gravedad, somos mÃÂÃÂ¡s inestables y es mÃÂÃÂ¡s difÃÂÃÂ­cil de dominar. En un recorrido largo o cuando estamos aprendiendo nos sentamos para descansar o estabilizarnos y no hay una forma cÃÂÃÂ³moda de hacerlo. Existen asientos para los paddle surf copiados de los kayaks pero no son nada cÃÂÃÂ³modos.       Espalda recta y comodidad en las piernas, rodillas y tobillos. Al mismo tiempo podemos cambiar de posiciÃÂÃÂ³n y llevar dos remos fÃÂÃÂ¡cilmente, de una pala para ir de pie y de dos palas para ir sentado. El PaddleSit multiplica las posibilidades de uso.    ÃÂÃÂ¿QUÃÂ<U+0089> ES EL PADDLE SIT? MATERIALES DE CALIDAD  Elegimos, no obstante materiales de calidad, como:   ÃÂÃÂ  Gomaespuma de cÃÂÃÂ©lulas cerradas.  No absorbe el agua, por lo que  flota . ASÃÂÃÂ EMPEZÃÂ<U+0093> TODO       NacÃÂÃÂ­ y me criÃÂÃÂ© junto al mar en el Parque Natural de Cabo de Gata, un lugar fantÃÂÃÂ¡stico de acantilados volcÃÂÃÂ¡nicos y aguas transparentes, con fondos marinos repletos de vida. Me encanta el Cabo de Gata y acabÃÂÃÂ© trabajando en ÃÂÃÂ©l como guÃÂÃÂ­a marino en  El cabo a Fondo,  donde realizo excursiones guiadas en barco.ÃÂÃÂ   El Paddle surf me llamÃÂÃÂ³ la atenciÃÂÃÂ³n desde el principio y en cuanto lo probÃÂÃÂ©, me enganchÃÂÃÂ³.ÃÂÃÂ Con el paso del tiempo el Cabo de Gata ha pasado de ser un lugar aislado y desconocido a ser apreciado cada vez por mÃÂÃÂ¡s gente, por la belleza limpia de su paisaje semidesÃÂÃÂ©rtico. Las actividades marinas como el kayak han proliferado al calor de la gente que busca hacer ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>turismo activoÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ en lugar de quedarse ÃÂÃÂºnicamente tostÃÂÃÂ¡ndose al sol. Yo me preguntaba porquÃÂÃÂ© el paddle surf, siendo un deporte estÃÂÃÂ©ticamente tan bonito y completo no terminaba de cuajar. La respuesta es que es mÃÂÃÂ¡s difÃÂÃÂ­cil, no todo el mundo se sube a la primera, se avanza menos que un kayak y le afecta mÃÂÃÂ¡s el viento, por lo que no era adecuado para una travesÃÂÃÂ­a.ÃÂÃÂ   Si querÃÂÃÂ­a dar mÃÂÃÂ¡s versatilidad la paddle surf habÃÂÃÂ­a que ponerle un asiento. Liberto es propietario junto con su familia de  Carretillas Amate , esta empresa innovadora ha revolucionado el trabajo de la agricultura de AlmerÃÂÃÂ­a con nuevas soluciones para invernaderos. Puntera a nivel mundial han desarrollado incluso un nuevo modelo de tractor, La tizona, adaptado para trabajar en lugares estrechos. Esta empresa tenÃÂÃÂ­a la experiencia y capacidad necesaria para hacer un producto de calidad.ÃÂÃÂ   Liberto es ademÃÂÃÂ¡s un gran aficionado al mar y a los deportes de remo, enseguida captÃÂÃÂ³ las ventajas de la idea y decidimos asociarnos para este proyecto. Con su empuje y experiencia, el  PaddleSit  ha pasado de ser un prototipo a obtener el acabado profesional que buscamos y aquÃÂÃÂ­ tenÃÂÃÂ©is el resultado.   ENGLISH VERSION  SUP, Paddle Surf, or Stand Up Paddle Board is a fantastic sport. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s as close as you can get to walking on water but it doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have the stability of a kayak. As you stand up, your center of gravity rises with you and you become more unstable. Managing the board becomes more difficult. On a long trip or while you are still learning, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll want to sit and rest or just get your balance back and normally there is no comfortable way to do it. There are kayak style seats available for paddle surfers, but these really donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t give you the comfort and support you need       A straight back and comfort and support for legs, knees and ankles. PaddleSit allows you to easily change your position, and there is space for you can carry an additional paddle, a main paddle for standing and a kayak style paddle for sitting.  PaddleSit  gives you a variety of new ways to use your SUP.  WHAT IS THE PADDLE SIT?        PaddleSit  is a new seat concept for Paddle boards. It is designed to be used in a kneeling position, with slightly elevated ergonomically designed cushions to support your legs and a seat that can be adjusted for both height and angle, distributing your weight and giving you maximum balance. This position is so comfortable that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll find terrestrial versions of the set in yoga and meditation classes.   HOW TO SIT IN THE PADDLESIT?  There are several ways you can use  PaddleSit. ÃÂÃÂ  This flexibility extends your enjoyment of the sport, and allows to participate in a wider range of conditions. ÃÂÃÂ YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll exercise different muscles groups depending on the position you adopt, and get a more complete workout. One of the disadvantages of Stand Up Paddle Board is that you need a little practice to get started. With  PaddleSit  you can get on the water and enjoy your board from day one.       Another common problem is that a little wind makes your body act like a sail and can make it difficult to return to shore. The  PaddleSit  increases your stability and gives you ÃÂÃÂ that  extra power  that can get you out of a jam if weather conditions start to deteriorate.  MAIN POSITION: KNEELINGÃÂÃÂ        The  PaddleSit  is designed to be used in a kneeling position. ÃÂÃÂ Although not immediately familiar, this position is surprisingly comfortable and perfect for keeping your  back straight .   SECOND OPTION: CONVENTIONAL.       One of the strong points of  PaddleSit  is the  possibility to change  to a sitting position. Any position becomes uncomfortable if it is held for a long time. This way we can use Paddlesit as a conventional seat inclining the central seat almost vertically to use as a backrest. With a little practice you will be able to change position on the go.  THIRD OPTION: STANDINGÃÂÃÂ        The  PaddleSit  has a central housing that  allows you to carry a second paddle , this is very useful if we want to paddle standing, the position for which the paddle surf was designed. To do this we change paddles and move the PaddleSit a little forward to place ourselves in the center and paddle normally.   FOURTH OPTION: LAYING DOWNÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ This position allows us to relax as much as possible, even whilst paddle,  using the central seat or the leg cushions as headrests . To do this, you can detach the velcro from the leg cushions and turn them around.  OTHER USES       A common position for yoga meditation is the so-called "Hero PoseÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ or ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Virasana", which consists of sitting on your knees helped by a meditation bench. The  PaddleSit  facilitates this position making it more comfortable, allowing you to keep your  back straight  and  legs relaxed  without putting undue force on your ankles.   WITH A FRIEND         PaddleSit  gives you much more stability on your board. ÃÂÃÂ You can even take a friend with you. ÃÂÃÂ WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d recommend you adopt a sitting or kneeling position if you are taking a passenger.   HOW TO ATTACH THE PADDLESIT TO YOUR BOARD        You donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need any special equipment or ties to attach your Paddlesit. Most paddle boards have a high grip rubber surface so the  PaddleSit  will not move. No fixing straps are needed. As your PaddleSit is not fixed, you can easily move it forward on your board when you choose to paddle standing up and need to stand in the center of your board.  However we have designed the  PaddleSit  with some side holes that you can use to tie it to the board with straps if you prefer. Another option is to tie it simply with a leash to the board so that in case of overturning it does not separate from it.  And if it falls into the water...  it floats !! You're not going to lose it easily.   PADDLESIT FOR COMPANIESÃÂÃÂ        Elegance and simplicity makes paddle surfing a fashionable sport. On the coast, rivers or inland lagoons youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll find companies that offer boards to rent or who are giving courses. The disadvantage is that it is a little more difficult to get started than kayaking for example, ÃÂÃÂ and a little practice is needed. YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be able to take clients with a wider range of skills on your routes. ÃÂÃÂ Giving your clients the option of changing positions, also allows for a more varied and complete fun activity.  Companies that include  PaddleSit  in their rental, activities or courses, are going to stand out from the competition.   DESIGNÃÂÃÂ         PaddleSit  is designed primarily with comfort in mind, we made numerous prototypes before we got it just right. For example,  the height of the leg support is critical , the higher the seat the more comfortable it is, but the higher we are, the less comfortable it is to paddle. It took us several iterations to get this right. ÃÂÃÂ Making the leg supports adjustable, allows the user to tailor the shape easily to their body form. ÃÂÃÂ Allowing the back support/seat to tilt, means that you can adjust it for power paddling by inclining the body forward. ÃÂÃÂ Tilting it back, gives a more relaxed position for a gentler activity.  For aesthetics we looked for a minimalist solution. The paddle surf is in itself a simple model, a flat board and an oar. That's why we have avoided complicated and ostentatious designs.  QUALITY MATERIALS  We choose quality materials such as:   Closed-cell foam. It does not absorb water, so it floats.    Upholstered in a material adapted to marine conditions and soft to the touch.    Metallic pieces all stainless steel and aluminum.    Plastic base made of a 100% recyclable material combining the properties of resistance and rigidity that we were looking for.   Our commitment is that the  PaddleSit  has as long a life as possible to avoid obsolescence, for this reason we have used durable materials in its construction and we are committed to supplying each of the elements separately.   ÃÂÃÂ  THAT'S HOW IT ALL STARTED. ÃÂÃÂ        I was born and raised by the sea in Cabo de Gata Natural Park, a fantastic place of volcanic cliffs and clear waters, with seabeds full of life. I love Cabo de Gata and ended up working on its waters as a marine guide at the deep end where and I do boat routes at the company  El Cabo a Fondo . Paddle surfing caught my attention from the beginning and as soon as I tried it, I was hooked.  With the passing of time Cabo de Gata has gone from being an isolated and unknown place to being appreciated by more and more people for the clean beauty of its semi-desert landscape. Marine activities such as kayaking have proliferated, with people seeking to do "active tourism" rather than just sunbathing. I wondered why paddle surfing, being such an aesthetically pleasing and complete sport, wasnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t more popular. The answer is that it is more difficult, not everyone will be able to stand and paddle first time out, you cover less distance than with a kayak and your more affected by the wind. ÃÂÃÂ Altogether this makes the SUP less than ideal for long and medium distance trips.  If you wanted to give more versatility to paddle surf, it needed a seat. I began to look if there were seats adapted for paddle boards, but the only thing I found were based on lightweight kayak seats. I tried them but they were uncomfortable. I then looked at how people sat so as not to lose their balance and the most common pose is kneeling, a position that offers a good paddle but is very uncomfortable. There had to be a chair to suit this position. I searched the internet and found nothing, I found ergonomic office chairs and numerous ingenious solutions for construction workers who are on their knees for many hours but nothing for paddle surfing. So I I set to the task. I soon discovered that it's one thing to have an idea that works and another to make it and sell it. Fortunately my friend Liberto came to the rescue.  Liberto runs the family business  Carretillas Amate , this innovative company has revolutionized the work of agriculture in Almeria with new solutions for greenhouses, even developing a tractor to work in confined spaces, which it markets internationally. This company had the experience and ability to make a quality product.  Liberto is also a great fan of the sea and paddle sports, he immediately grasped the advantages of the idea and we decided to partner for this project. With his drive and experience, the PaddleSit has gone from being a prototype to obtaining the professional finish we are looking for and here you have the result.      Risks and challenges  El PaddleSit estÃÂÃÂ¡ abalado por dos empresas:  - El Cabo a Fondo S.L. que cuenta con casi 20 aÃÂÃÂ±os de experiencia y cuenta con 5 aÃÂÃÂ±os de certificado de excelencia en TripAdvisor que lo certifican como una empresa que antepone la satisfacciÃÂÃÂ³n de sus clientes por encima de todo. - Carretillas Amate S.L. que fabricarÃÂÃÂ¡ el PaddleSit, tiene una larga trayectoria y es pionera en fabricaciÃÂÃÂ³n de todo tipo de maquinaria para la agricultura y que estÃÂÃÂ¡ considerada como una empresa innovadora con gran nÃÂÃÂºmero de diseÃÂÃÂ±os patentados y que exporta sus creaciones a todo el mundo.

Creator_description: My goal is to empower people to build things on their own, so they can build anything they want in life.I'm a mexican entrepreneur that spent 4 years studying in a US, and then co-founded a successful startup that is still running (Parlevel Systems - parlevelsystems.com). Project_description: Easily learn fundamental DIY skills like welding, electronics, and more, by building a powerful electric scooter right at home.    1. Easily learn skills like welding, electronics, building battery packs, choosing electric motors, using power tools, and much more, from scratch.  2. Build a powerful electric scooter in less than a week, or a month, regardless of your skill level. It's up to you how fast you want to go.ÃÂÃÂ   3. Step-by-step instructional videos throughout the entire building process + purchase links to all the parts and tools.         #1. Brief Story Video   Check out the main design concept of The Monster Scooter and how everything originated.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.
