The Monster Scooter V1.0 and What's-Inside-It Video   It took me months of watching Youtube videos, Wikipedia research, and doing things myself to figure out how to make the electric scooter that I wanted. Some of the questions I had were: What type of batteries should I use? How do I build a battery pack on my own? How on earth do I start welding? Should I attend a course? What type of welder should I buy?ÃÂÃÂ I want to shorten this gap for you and share all of the knowledge I gained.  I will make some important improvements like: use a much more efficient motor (with the same budget) to increase power in the back axle by at least 30%, have less friction, be much lighter, thinner body, have a foldable handle, be easier to build, and sexier overall.  If you want to see every component in detail, check the video below.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   #3. The Technology Inside of The Monster Scooter V2.0 (it doesn't matter if you don't understand this... you will)    Aiming over 40km/h max speed.    Aiming over 30km of range.    78 x 18650 Li-Ion batteries (same batteries used in Tesla vehicles) in 13 series and 6 parallel which becomes a 48V, 20A battery pack.    Great battery output: 960W of battery output power (4x more powerful than typical street scooters).    Massive battery capacity: 865.8Wh of power capacity (3x more than typical street scooters).    1000W motor controller with electronic throttle (with battery life indicator and key switch).    1000W BLDC motor or hacked alternator (depending on cost/benefit analysis).    Slimmer, less bulky (30-40% less volume), and sexier than V1.0. Contents will be tightly packed.    Environmentally friendly.ÃÂÃÂ     Total parts cost will be around $600 USD - around 40% less than scooters with similar characteristics in the market (also cost optimizations compared to V1).    Designed and built with easily sourceable parts.              #4. The Skills That You Will Learn   This course is GREAT FOR BEGINNERS. You will learn skills that will allow you to make cool projects after this one. Plus, you'll have a kickass scooter to use.ÃÂÃÂ   Some of the most important skills I will be covering are:   Electronics for DIY projects (choosing batteries, battery management systems (BMS) , motor controllers, electronic throttles, electric motors, wiring and their gauges, etc.).    Homemade battery pack assemblies (series and parallel configurations).    Using precision tools (vernier calipers, rotary tools, etc.).    Welding with a MIG welder (flux-cored "gasless") and an electronic mask. This is the easiest method to weld at a low cost.    Steel plates and profiles gauges (and tricks to find them in a local blacksmith shop).    Using a grinder and a drill with different add-ons.    Building pillow block bearings from scratch for axles.    Building an oversized, bike disk breaking system from disks to clamps.    Assembling a custom power transmission system with a motorcycle chain and sprockets.    Using an air compressor for automotive painting.    Overall hacks to make the scooter simpler and sexier.    Soldering.    Using a multimeter.              #5. What's Inside The Monster Scooter Course    The most basic version of the course will consist of PDFs for all of the text-oriented and image content, and private Vimeo videos for the instructional walkthroughs (the PDFs will have links and passwords to the videos).   The Monster Scooter course will be very straightforward but rich in content. It will be organized as a walkthrough.   There will be an overall/introductory section that will explain the project overall.    The course will be divided into sections for each part of the scooter (e.g. Introduction, Battery System, Scooter Body, Axles, Disk Breaking System, Painting, etc.).    Each section will have a list of materials and tools that will be needed.    There will be multiple purchase links to all parts and tools. I will try to keep this as global as possible.    The entire building process (from the battery pack assembly to the paint and finishing) will be recorded and explained.    There will be instructional videos on how to safely use every single tool.    I will also mention all of the materials that can be bought at any local hardware store (nuts, bolts, drill bits, etc.).        ÃÂÃÂ  If I reach $400k MXN (atenciÃÂÃÂ³n hispanohablantes):    Stretch goal of $400k MXN - Custom website for all content + subtÃÂÃÂ­tulos en EspaÃÂÃÂ±ol ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    I will invest in a custom website to host all content, and give you a username and password (lifetime).ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  Esp:  Voy a invertir en una pÃÂÃÂ¡gina hecha a la medida para subir todo el contenido. Les darÃÂÃÂ© un usuario y contraseÃÂÃÂ±a que no expirarÃÂÃÂ¡.    TambiÃÂÃÂ©n voy a agregar subtÃÂÃÂ­tulos a todos los videos y traducir todo el texto a EspaÃÂÃÂ±ol.         ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!            Risks and challenges  Building the V1.0 really opened the door of the right way of building a sexy-looking, powerful electric scooter at home. I feel confident I can make a much more improved V2.0 and record the entire process to create the course.

Blurb: Online education course to teach students about the risks and dangers of vaping
Creator_description: The online leader in Vape Education
Project_description: According to the U.S. Surgeon GeneralÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s report, e-cigarette use has grown ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>an astounding 900%ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ among high school students from 2011 to 2015. This is cause for alarm.   It has been reported that more than half of middle school students have tried e-cigarettes.   With the use of new technology increasing, the number of adolescents and young adults addicted to nicotine is becoming easier. These products are not only addictive, but they also allow a large number of harmful chemicals to enter the body. E-Cigarettes are affecting the body. However, many do not realize they are also affecting the education of many students. Students are getting suspended from school at alarming rates because they are getting caught using e-cigarette devices.  Unfortunately, there is not a lot of information available to parents and schools about e-cigarettes. The mission of VapeEducate.com is to provide schools, administrators, parents, and concerned community groups with an additional tool to aid in the vape education of young adults. Education is what can bring change in order to allow our children to grow up as healthy adults.    Who can learn from this program?   Vape Educate is an online course originally designed to be completed by middle and high school students.ÃÂÃÂ  However, it most certainly can be beneficial to anyone interested in learning more about e-cigarettes, vaping and Juuling.ÃÂÃÂ  It can also be used as an educational program for teachers, parents, and other community members.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The program is designed to be used as a tool which provides supplemental material to educate students about vaping.   Course topics include:    What is vaping?    Vaping Health Risks    How Marketing Targets the Young    Vape Addiction    Society, Vape and You   There are five lessons on vaping. Each lesson contains pertinent information regarding vaping and the use of vape products. Short quizzes are built into each lesson for students to actively participate and recall information presented to them. At the end of each of the five units, students are required to take an assessment.ÃÂÃÂ  A student must receive at least 80% in order to successfully complete each unit. Final results are then emailed in real time to the principal, administrator, parent, or community group administering the program.      Risks and challenges  We are an established company with customers in all fifty states and in multiple countries around the world.

Blurb: At 700 or 1400 watts e-Bladez will accelerate you there.
Creator_description: Hello:  I'm Mark Shipowick, founder of New River Advent Company.  I've been building electric personal mobility vehicles for thirty years back when few saw that the future of transportation was electric.My mother is a southerner, born in Richmond VA, my father a farm boy from the Canadian prairies first, then devout preacher, now deceased.  I'm a Canadian trained lawyer - Queen's '89.  In 2007 I got to know another lovely southerner and migrated to the US in 2008 after working as a business adviser and tax auditor for ten years with Canada Revenue Agency, the Canadian IRS.  I was admitted to the New York Bar July 17, 2014.  My main purpose in taking this project on is to provide training and employment for families and individuals in my community which, like much of America is being ravaged by opiods, alcohol and other things. Since I want to equip people with leadership and marketable skills, in addition to investing in leading edge technology, CNC machinery, metal 3D printing and tooling I'll be equally in skilled instructors and craftsmen.  Experienced machinists and craftsmen who are apt to teach and instruct will double as quality control personnel.I'm a careful person and because I value my reputation I am committed to delivering in all areas as promised.  I've refined my prototypes making them stronger, lighter, safer  and more fun.  I'm equally committed to making a positive impact in my community.Thanks a lot for your interest.Mark ShipowickPS.  I also have an 8 acre retreat called New River Gorge Guesthouse listed on Airbnb and Vacation Rentals.  There are many reviews on Air.
Project_description: Thanks for stopping by.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    e-Bladez, the powered inline skate   Durable - 6005A-T6 Aluminum alloy frames, sealed high precision bearingsÃÂÃÂ     Powerful - two 700 watt brushless DC motors for 1400 watts    Range - 25 km.ÃÂÃÂ  8 Amp hour battery pack. ÃÂÃÂ Extend your range by your input. ÃÂÃÂ At 950 grams, take along a second battery for a 50 km range.ÃÂÃÂ     Speed - 20 km/h    Progressive dual ÃÂÃÂ braking    Quality light-weight boot options by Powerslide    Low center of gravity                 Why e-BladezÃÂÃÂ   Light-weight but powerful, e-Bladez accelerate your feet, spice up your outdoor experience,ÃÂÃÂ  invigorate your commute.ÃÂÃÂ   Besides your own two feet this product is perhaps the lightest, most efficient and fun personal trans. (More on this below.) Which raises the question: Why weren't they manufactured long ago?ÃÂÃÂ   Learning from Segway     Segway    ÃÂÃÂ The  Segway  inventors solved the problem of balancing the inverted pendulum (the human body) about 20 years ago. But Segway's technology is not readily transferable to inline skates where two independent platforms (your feet) are involved in balancing a single load (your body).ÃÂÃÂ   When the Segway was under development the inventor and others such as Steve Jobs predicted a transportation revolution. Jobs who could usually sniff out the tech market better than a hound got this one wrong - the revolution never materialized. In the age of wearables, the Segway is not something you can wear. While it was definitely a technological mile stone it had too big a foot print. Enter the e-Bladez with the foot print of, well, a foot print, a low carbon one.ÃÂÃÂ   A question of balance  So what about balance?ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ That problem can be solved in one of two ways, a low tech solution or a high. It made sense for me to start with the simple and move to the more complex. ÃÂÃÂ So I went to work building my first low tech prototype. Some months later when I went to try them out in downtown Hinton, West Virginia, I knew on my first run that with some tweaking they could be used safely by the average person without a electronic balancing enhancement.     Prototype 1    ÃÂÃÂ At my initial test run I was 58. Now I'm 59. I'm not especially athletic, and I hadn't roller bladed in 20 years but within half an hour I had mastered them and enjoyed it too.ÃÂÃÂ  It's a exhilarating sensation accelerating in your own shoes.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      Prototype 2    Fresh air + exercise + sunlight + recreation - emissions = SPT (Sensible Personal Transportation.)   Product  The e-BladezÃÂÃÂ productÃÂÃÂ    a single or a pair of powered frames    battery pack    hand held remote control    your choice of quality boots by Powerslide    6005A-T6 aluminum drive train and design    charger   Battery Pack  Notice to backers: Rather than housing the battery in the skate frame as shown in the video, ÃÂÃÂ the battery pack clips to your belt, waist band or fanny pack belt. ÃÂÃÂ The lighter the skate the greater control, the less fatigue and greater range. ÃÂÃÂ The skates are as light or lighter than some inline skates. ÃÂÃÂ This also allows for rapid pack replacement. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ And the switch will be on the pack within easy reach.      e-Bladez with Swell boot option by Powerslide       e-Bladez with doop Powerslide boot - strap onto your own foot wear.       Air e-Bladez TMT with 125 mm air wheels and the Next boot option by Powerslide       e-Bladez with 110 mm rubber rear wheel and World Cup boot option by Powerslide       Remote control and charger.      Recommended Gear   Carbon poles for complete upper body workout,ÃÂÃÂ  as range extenders and for beginners    Helmet, elbow, wrist and knee protection   OperationÃÂÃÂ   Clip on and connect your battery pack and skates, turn on the hand-held remote control, turn on the battery pack, push off then apply power.ÃÂÃÂ  Carbon poles and powering one skate at a time is recommended for beginners.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   PerformanceÃÂÃÂ   1400 watts will accelerate you up and over almost any grade.ÃÂÃÂ  A top speed of 20 kph is faster than most will want to go.ÃÂÃÂ  Head, elbow, wrist and knee protection are recommended.ÃÂÃÂ   Safety  For beginners to inline skates, poles are helpful but not essential.ÃÂÃÂ  Get comfortable first in unpowered mode (they freewheel) then power one skate.ÃÂÃÂ  Once single power is mastered, dual power is the next step.ÃÂÃÂ  For commuters, powering one skate at a time extends the range.  EnergyÃÂÃÂ efficiencyÃÂÃÂ   So, how do these compare?ÃÂÃÂ  While an electric bicycle with its much larger wheels has less rolling resistance, a bicycle is also several times heavier. But, e-Blades have another edge: they naturally invite your input. Since you are already standing erect you naturally stride along making your own natural contribution. ÃÂÃÂ I notice their efficiency on my first trial. I wasn't expecting such good results. ÃÂÃÂ   Human powerÃÂÃÂ vs.ÃÂÃÂ Horse powerÃÂÃÂ   An athletic adult averages between 50 and 150 watts output for an hour of vigorous exercise. (50 to 150 watts is 1/16 to 1/5 horsepower.) So having 1400 watts of auxiliary power would be like having 14 fit menÃÂÃÂ  available to push you along or about 2 horsepower.ÃÂÃÂ  In real life, one fit person would be enough to push you along at a fast jog on level ground - about 60 watts.ÃÂÃÂ  You would rarely need fourteen fit men but they would come in handy climbing a steep hill or for pushing you into a storm-force headwind.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Unless you like pushing the envelope you'll seldom need that kind of power, but it's nice knowing it's at your fingertips when you do need it.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Quality control will be the first priority.  Two days ago I was talking to a middle manager for one of Intel's major service contractors and as I expected, quality control is Intel's first priority.  In this context that means the project will have time deadlines but quality will trump deadlines.  Because power is being increased over the prototype and because there are other less important changes as well, all of these will be thoroughly tested before the  production prototype is accepted.    Quality components will be sourced from reliable suppliers.  A major purpose in taking this project on is to provide training and employment for families and individuals in local communities which are being ravaged by opioids, alcohol and other things. Since I want to equip people with marketable skills, in addition to investing in CNC machinery and tooling we will also invest in skilled instructors and craftsmen.  Experienced machinists who are apt to teach and instruct will double as quality control personnel.

Blurb: Women in Tech World is embarking on a journey to put together an extensive report on the current state of Women in Tech across Canada.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Vancouver-Canada:37 backers|Toronto-Canada:6 backers|North Vancouver-Canada:5 backers|Surrey-Canada:4 backers|Owen Sound-Canada:3 backers|Barrie-Canada:3 backers|Calgary-Canada:2 backers|Port Moody-Canada:2 backers|Port Coquitlam-Canada:2 backers|Berlin-Germany:2 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |Canada:72 backers|United States:4 backers|Germany:2 backers|Australia:1 backer|Czech Republic:1 backer|Iceland:1 backer|Mexico:1 backer|Thailand:1 backer|United Kingdom:1 backer|Vietnam:1 backer
Creator_description: I am a writer and consultant for startups and entrepreneurs, with ten years of experience as an administrative professional and a background in writing and research for academia, non-profit, public and private sectors. I joined Women in Tech World five months ago as the Communications Co-Chair for Women in Tech Week 2017, leading a team of 20 volunteers to grow and engage our online community from zero to 1000 followers in two months, reaching 490K people. Given my background in research, I recently took on the role of Program Director, Community Based Research for Driving WinTech. I moved I am constantly inspired by the people I work with, and couldn't be more excited to be a part of the Women in Tech World team!
Project_description: "It's an opportunity to be a part of something truly impactful for women in Canada; it's about connecting with community members and giving them a voice to communicate what's going on in their backyard - what unique challenges have they encountered and how can we work together to create a tailored solution for their community. Going on this tour means that I have this magnificent chance to facilitate change from the ground up...and that's everything to me. It's the trip of a lifetime."ÃÂÃÂ     - Melanie EwanÃÂÃÂ (Director of Community Based Research and Co-captain on this Canada-wide tour)   The Driving WinTech Journey  This fall,  Women in Tech (WinTech)  is conducting aÃÂÃÂ  Canada-wide research tour to   understand and record the experiences of women in technology  and toÃÂÃÂ promote vibrant women in tech communities across the country.ÃÂÃÂ   This adventure will take us from  BC to Newfoundland over a two month period . In this time we will:    Facilitate 50 community forums ÃÂÃÂ across the country.ÃÂÃÂ    Connect with over 10,000 people  from diverse communities and sectors.ÃÂÃÂ    Create and share a National Report  on the experiences of women in tech in Canada (barriers, challenges, successes, resources).   Create a set of Playbooks (regional recommendations) ÃÂÃÂ to facilitate more inclusive and diverse tech communities in Canada.   Share our  ÃÂÃÂ findings ÃÂÃÂ with community members and stakeholders to ensure active steps are taken as a result of Driving WinTech.   While there are smaller qualitative and quantitative studies and lots of anecdotal evidence of women's experiences in tech in Canada, no one has taken on a project of this magnitude or mandate before. Let's do this!ÃÂÃÂ      Driving WinTech: Connecting with women in tech across Canada      Who were those people in the video?  ÃÂÃÂ In the video above, you met the co-founders of WinTech,  Alicia Close  and  Elena Yugai , and the Director of Community Based Research,  Melanie Ewan . Alicia and Melanie will be hitting the road September 1st, 2017, with Elena and other members of the team joining them along the way.  What would success look like?  Great question! Our answer is two-fold:  (1) For tech ecosystem members and stakeholders to adopt policies and programs that are informed by our findings and recommendations (i.e. the experiences of women in tech, as reported by community members), and;ÃÂÃÂ   (2) To create a network across Canada of organizations and people who are working to elevate women in tech.  Why is this important?  We are living in an increasingly  tech-enabled world , which means that there are more and more jobs opening up in the tech sector. Problem is, while the Computer Science workforce has grown by 60% since 1991, the  percentage of young women going into the industry has declined  (Stats Canada 2011).ÃÂÃÂ And this isn't a matter of gender differences in education or interests:ÃÂÃÂ    As reported in Macleans , " Despite an increase in women with STEM degrees , the percentage of women working in the fields has barely changed in almost 30 years."     Women in STEM: Educations v. Workforce (Stats Canada)     What's going on here?   That's precisely what we are wondering. To date, there have been  no large-scale qualitative research projects  conducted on the lived experiences of women in tech in Canada. What are the existing resources and services available? Are there particular gaps or barriers that they face? What kinds of tools does a community need to create more inclusive tech communities?  As women in tech, we believe that every woman should have the opportunity to succeed in the tech industry.ÃÂÃÂ    Change starts by understanding what is really going onÃÂÃÂ  and by creating opportunities and tools for women in tech to connect with each other and meet women in leadership positions. Fostering these connections is incredibly empowering, allowing women to envision new possibilities for their careers in tech.     Youth Tech Day - WinTech Week 2017     This is why we are dedicated to increasing the knowledge of what is really going on in Canadian tech communities.ÃÂÃÂ   Creating change in the tech industry  The information we gather will be used to create a  National Report and set of guidelines  for Canada. The report will be qualitative, based on the interviews, focus groups, and community conversations that we facilitate.ÃÂÃÂ We will present this report to provincial and federal governments and will encourage groups to use it to launch local initiatives.   Our National Report and guidelines will:     Bring attention to key findings from the road trip, with the aim of increasing awareness across all sectors;  open doors for collaboration and funding opportunities for organizations in this field;  create best practices for how to mobilize communities, duplicate existing successes, and create inclusive and diverse tech communities across Canada.      Kickoff Breakfast - Women in Tech Week 2017    It's also important for us to celebrate and share the stories of the women and tech communities that we connect with. We plan to do this through our social media channels, blog posts, podcast and visual content. Creating a documentary from the road trip is definitely on our wish list as well!  About the Community Forums  We get that every community is different, with their own unique set of stakeholders, goals, and challenges. As such, we are creating a set of research activities that we can offer:   Community Conversations (e.g., breakout groups discussing the current ecosystem, including gaps and ideal outcomes)ÃÂÃÂ   The above + panel discussions (e.g., on current state of women in tech community, what resources and challenges exist)ÃÂÃÂ   Focus Groups with industry experts and officialsÃÂÃÂ    Each activity will provide a unique and interactive way to dive into important questions about the challenges and experiences held by women in the tech industry.     Youth Day - WinTech Week 2017    Why us?  WinTech is a truly unique organization made up of 140+ outstanding women in tech. The women leading this group are passionate and driven; they are professionals from diverse backgrounds in marketing and STEM who are dedicated to actively promoting, empowering, and celebrating women of all ages in tech.     Women in Tech Volunteer Team    We have organized over 22 events in seven cities across North America this year alone, and have given away $50,000 in tech scholarships to young women. We believe that by creating inclusive, collaborative, and diverse communities, we will be better equipped to take on new challenges that are thrown our way.     Women's Pitch Night - Women in Tech Week 2017    We count ourselves lucky to have a strong leadership team, and an extensive network of partners across Canada to support us on our mission. We couldn't do this without you!  Our Core Mission at Women in Tech  ToÃÂÃÂ work with communities, nationally and internationally, to define and execute actionable steps to increase the quantities of women in the technology sector, as well as the quality of roles available to these women (i.e., leadership positions). ÃÂÃÂ   Our Core Values:   Community  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> To create a vibrant and collaborative network of women who work in tech communities across Canada (e.g., through research and events).   Empowerment  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> To promote and provide access to mentorship and technical education, and sponsor high qualified, underrepresented tech talent.   Thought Leadership  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> To showcase trailblazing women, create opportunities for community discussion, and commit to ongoing reporting and tracking of data on womenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s experiences.  Leadership Team   Alicia Close, Co-Founder and CEO, WinTech   Alicia is an outstanding leader with a passion for social entrepreneurship; she has a strong background in program development and has had a blast leading the Women in Tech team. With a love for tech and analytics, Alicia drives the operational strategy and scalability for WinTech. She also happens to love running (just did her first marathon!) and pretty much every type of cheese...although, who doesn't? Follow Ali on twitter. Follow Ali on twitter.    Elena Yugai, Co-Founder and CGO, WinTech   Connecting and inspiring people comes naturally to Elena. She's well known as a strong leader in the tech community, and has made it her personal mission to build and engage WinTechÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s global audiences and create an exceptional experience for WinTechÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s 140+ volunteers. She is also the Head of Operations at tech startup, Contiq, and is a self-professed dog lover, foodie and all around nerd.  Follow Elena on twitter.    Melanie Ewan, Program Director, Community Based Research   Writer and consultant for startups in Vancouver, Melanie (or Mel) brings a background in research and communications to the WinTech team. She is passionate in her mission to foster community and empower women to pursue their dreams. Mel is a food reviewer, travel writer, and proud aunt who's working on her pull-ups game (can almost do one!).  Follow Melanie on twitter.      From left: Elena Yugai, Melanie Ewan, Alicia Close    Tour details.  Five WinTech volunteers are going to drive across the country in a branded RV, starting on the west coast (Vancouver headquarters), before heading north to the Canadian territories, and then east across the country to the Maritime provinces.ÃÂÃÂ   We will be hitting  all capital cities and major tech hubs , as well as  any spots identified by our community  (let us know if you want us to come to you!).       Our road trip team will be supported by a network of volunteers throughout the country, including provincial ambassadors who are plugged into the tech communities in their region.   Note: while Canada is the perfect place to start, being our home and headquarters, we intend to work with women in tech communities worldwide to identify other hubs that are keen to organize a Driving WinTech initiative.   What does the Kickstarter fund?  The biggest expense of any road trip areÃÂÃÂ the hidden costs of simply being on the road. Funds raised from thisÃÂÃÂ KickstarterÃÂÃÂ will cover the following costs for our two-month mission:    Power Up  - Fuel to get us across the country ($2,500)   Keep A Float  - Ferry costs over the water to Newfoundland ($1,300)   Stay Safe  - CAA membership and auto insurance to ensure assistance is readily available ($3000)   Lunch Money  - Food for our volunteers on the road ($12,200)*   Rest Up  - Accommodations for our volunteers from camp sites to couch surfing to bed and breakfasts ($4,575)*   Hot off the Press  - print and facilitation resources for the tech communities we visit ($6,550)    *every effort will be made to keep costs to a minimum. We want to ensure we can focus on our mission while having enough financial flexibility for those volunteering their time to reasonably continue the two-month tour.   We are actively seeking funds from sponsors and grants to pay for the upfront vehicle costs and the costs to run the town halls and produce the National report on the Status of Women in Technology. These costs are not included in our Kickstarter goal but are referenced in the video ($50K total mentioned to get us on the road).  WinTech in the Media   Vancouver is Awesome:  The Enlightened Nerd   Vancouver Tech Podcast:  Episode 80   Entrepreneur Roadmap Podcast:  Episode 150   Techvibes:  Women in Tech Week Aims to Engage, Empower Girls to Pursue STEM Careers   Miss 604:  Women in Tech Week: Vancouver Event   Espresso Capital:  Women in Tech Week 2017   Daily Hive:  Women in Tech Week co-founder tells us what it's really like for women in tech       Youth Day - Women in Tech Week 2017    ÃÂÃÂ Stay in Touch! ÃÂÃÂ   Connect with us on  Facebook ,  Twitter ,  LinkedIn  and  Instagram ÃÂÃÂ and join the conversation using #DrivingWinTech!  Find us on  Angel List   Check out our website to learn more:  drivingwomenintech.com  ÃÂÃÂ   Or send us an email at  hello@drivingwomenintech.com  ÃÂÃÂ   Your support and suggestions mean the world to us!       ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Our two key challenges are funding and people. The minimum that we need to go on this road trip is $30,000, however, that will just get us on the road. The more funding we can raise, the more communities we can visit, and the more resources we can put into creating truly impactful content. We are reaching out to past partners, setting up meetings with potential sponsors, and getting out the word on what we are doing through local events, networking, and the launch of our new website and brand.  In terms of people, this will be a huge undertaking. We are grateful to have two solid team members who can be part of the entire two-month road trip,  but they will need support along the way. We are currently working with the Women in Tech Directors to define teams and conduct interviews for our volunteer positions nation-wide.

Creator_description: Jae Son - Creative Engineer, Inventor, Entrepreneur, grateful father and husbandI enjoy inventing creative solutions.  Many of them are driven by my personal need.  My son tells me that he'll never forget using a trash can lid as a sled because he was so embarrassed learning afterwards, but I don't see much of a difference.  Also used an iron to grill a cold sandwich for him in the hotel.  For this project, I am proud of inventing a small pump that had 8 times more flow rate and pressure than what was available to purchase as well as making a giant caliper to measure the height of pillows.You can learn more about what I do some the links below and I enjoy the diversity of projects that I get to work on and embrace the ancient greek idea of Arete.  Excelling at everything not being a specialist. Member of BackerClub.co
Project_description: Get Your Project Funded Today!    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ         Over 60% of the world sleeps on their side, yet...ÃÂÃÂ   the pillow industry has virtually ignored their need for a more supportive pillow that fits each individual's height needs, but is still comfortable. Side sleepers have largely been conditioned through the years to not expect to find a pillow that feels like it was made for us. We have had to fold our pillow, or stick our arm under it for our entire lives.ÃÂÃÂ   Today, common sense and technology have brought us exactly what we've needed.ÃÂÃÂ Meet the SleepSmart Pillow for side sleepers. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        The SleepSmart pillow can improve your sleep. And your life.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ       Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!    ÃÂÃÂ         At SleepSmart, our vision is to help people rest better. We aim to be the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most trusted source for developing products that improve the quality of your life by improving the quality of your rest.  When we started this journey to build the perfect pillow for side sleepers, we gathered a lot of information from experts around the world, and lots of people just like you. We wanted to fully understand what people needed in order to get a good night's rest.ÃÂÃÂ        Over 60% of the population primarily sleep on their side, but we found that the pillows available for side sleepers didn't adequately meet their unique needs. Pillows are fixed and mass produced, so each one is only a solution for some. The fact is, side sleepers have different needs than back sleepers, and those needs vary significantly from person to person.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ         How are side sleepers and back sleepers different?  The gap between your head and the surface of the mattress is what we refer to as the  Support Void . In order to keep your spine in proper alignment, your pillow should perfectly fill this space.       The Support Void also changes depending on the firmness of your mattress.       If you sleep on your side, then you can probably relate to all of these challenges.ÃÂÃÂ        Some pillows are designed to provide support, while others are designed to provide comfort. Consumers are generally forced to sacrifice one for the other. Not anymore.        Premium, soft materials that are hypoallergenic and 100% cotton. The stretchable and breathable AirMesh band around the comfort layer promotes airflow as you sleep.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Down-alternative comfort layer that offers low-friction characteristics for a luxurious feel.ÃÂÃÂ Including a 3D structured knit acting as a micro-cushion to provide additional comfort.       ÃÂÃÂ         ADJUSTABLE SUPPORT LAYER  -ÃÂÃÂ This component enables height adjustment, serving as the proprietary support layer that sits underneath the comfort layer. Air travels in and out of the bladder to increase or decrease the support height into the optimal position. This layer is comprised of soft, stretchable fabric that is airtight and heat sealed at production.   SENSING ÃÂÃÂ  SYSTEM  - We incorporated an air-pressure sensor into the air bladder. This enables us to accurately detect when your head is on the pillow as well as any additional motion associated with your sleep. The information is sent to your SleepSmart mobile app, which analyzes the data and provides valuable insights for improving your rest.    VIBRATION ALARM  - The inflation chamber uses vibration waves to create a silent alarm. The SleepSmart app can be used for time setting as well as controlling the intensity of the vibration. When enabled, thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s an additional Smart Wake Time feature that will automatically wake you up while youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re in the lightest phase of your sleep cycle.         More than 2" of height adjustment  for personalized support and comfort. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         Lower the height ÃÂÃÂ by squeezing the valve while your head is on the pillow. ÃÂÃÂ         Raise the height ÃÂÃÂ by squeezing the valve while your head is off the pillow. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         Adjust valve easily  to find the perfect position you wish to sleep in.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ         Vibrating Smart Alarm  will help you wake up at the right time without disturbing your partner.       Our mobile app monitors your sleep, then leverages the data to teach you how to improve your rest. Now that's powerful.        ÃÂÃÂ         Track the metrics  that you want to see the most. Then make informed improvements so you can rest better.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ         Sound Monitoring Stats  -  shown with a demonstration app, not the app that will ship. ÃÂÃÂ          Head Pressure Monitoring Stats  -  shown with a demonstration app, not the app that will ship.         Meet Chester.  He never imagined that a pillow would have functions. Then he was introduced to SleepSmart.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                               Meet Susan.  She often woke up sore and was skeptical that a pillow could meet all of her support needs.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                               Meet Mike.  He thought his mattress was making him uncomfortable, but discovered the solution was actually a pillow.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                               Meet Ryan and Jenna.  They each have their own pillow preferences, but SleepSmart adjusts to make them both happy.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        We surveyed over  1,000 people  about their sleep habits. Our extensive research revealed that over 60% of the population are side sleepers, while in contrast most pillows are designed for those who sleep on their back. We also discovered a general lack of understanding around the importance of sleep. ÃÂÃÂ        We investigated over  100 ÃÂÃÂ  pillows . Our results proved that out of the pillows that are currently on the market, some are designed to provide support, while others are designed to provide comfort. Consumers are forced to sacrifice one for the other. ÃÂÃÂ        After years of market research, we spent  10 months  actively developing our product,ÃÂÃÂ rapidly iterating through prototypes and incorporating feedback. We tested 8 rounds of prototypes - always with the side sleeper in mind - and landed on a design that offers the ideal head and neck posture for this demographic. ÃÂÃÂ        We arrived at the  1 SleepSmart Pillow . A fully-adjustable design that offers both support and comfort. Accompanied with the SleepSmart mobile app, you can make informed improvements to your sleep and start living better.        Dr. Jae Son  is the CEO of an innovative technology company and holds a doctorate in Engineering Robotics from Harvard ( see LinkedIn profile here ). As an engineer and inventor, heÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s familiar with successfully bringing ideas to life. SleepSmart is one of those ideas, and was birthed out of a personal search for a solution. For years Jae had neck pains caused by deterioration of the spinal discs C3 and C4. Consequently, he struggled to find a pillow that could meet his comfort and support needs. He tried the typical folding the pillow in half, sleeping with an arm under his pillow, or even stacking two - but nothing was ideal. Then he discovered that by placing an inflatable pillow under his regular one, he could adjust the support height while still remaining comfortable. This was the beginning ideation of a new kind of pillow - and thus the SleepSmart pillow was born.       Brandon Larson  is a technologist with Red Bull studying how to improve elite athletes' and executivesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> performance. He dedicated 6 months researching the science of sleep and evaluation of apps and trackers to understand what works and more importantly, what doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t. He has also been collecting personal sleep data for over 3 years in his quest to better understand the role of sleep in performance. What he discovered was that as a society, we have been focusing on minutia details of sleep enabled by technology. The most important factors of getting a good nightÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s rest are how long you sleep, how consistent your sleep routine is, and how you feel during the day. Combining this information with his approach to coaching was the inspiration for a more impactful way to track and interpret sleep data.    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  We have been developing technology for over 20 years, and we know what it takes to make a reliable product. This was demonstrated previously with the production of several medical devices, which grew into companies such as SureTouch which won numerous awards.  Our goal is to deliver by December 2017. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve done our best to forecast demand, and we have already identified our suppliers and are actively working with a trusted logistics management company to ensure youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get your rewards swiftly.   We want to ship as quickly as possible, but we also donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to ship products that are not fully tested. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll use the money collected through this campaign for testing design verification, environmental standards, and reliability. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll also use the support for translating the design from prototype to mass production, tooling for manufacturing, and purchasing materials.

Project_description: iMoovÃÂÃÂ    USE ANY DEVICE, ANYWHERE, WITH THE WORLD'S MOST VERSATILE AND ERGONOMIC STANDÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        The iMoov Astuto is the only transformable device stand designed to work on your lap or any flat surface, and with any device you own. Pair it with the Teclado Bluetooth keyboard, and you have the ultimate solution for working on the go.       ÃÂÃÂ   iMoov is...    ULTRA-PORTABLE -  The iMoov Astuto stand and Teclado keyboard together are no wider than an iPad when folded, and are designed to always be available on the go.ÃÂÃÂ    ERGONOMIC -  The Astuto stand places your devices near eye level whether you're working on your lap or a desk, fighting back pain, heavy shoulders, and lumbago.ÃÂÃÂ    MULTI-DEVICE -  The iMoov Astuto's cleverly designed slots and the Teclado's Bluetooth connectivity are optimized to work great with practically any digital device.   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Nous parlons aussi franÃÂÃÂ§ais. Question?   Ecrivez-nous  !ÃÂÃÂ     Wir sprechen auch Deutsch. Frage ?   Schreiben Sie uns  !ÃÂÃÂ     Hablamos tambien espanol. ÃÂÃÂ¿Pregunta? ÃÂÃÂ¡  Escribanos  !ÃÂÃÂ     Wij spreken ook nederlands. Vraag?   Schrijf ons  !    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Jared Green is a massage therapist with extensive expertise in the field of ergonomics. Check out his review above to see why he thinks the iMoov is the best way to stay healthy while working on the go.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        iMoov's unique combination of sturdy feet and leatherette-velvet straps let you use it anywhere.       ÃÂÃÂ    Use iMoov in your home office, watching TV or Netflix, travelling in airports or on trains, or anywhere you can sit or stand next to a flat surface.        Whether you are a frequent traveler, home office worker, or just want a better way to use your favorite mobile devices without craning your neck or holding them up, iMoov is right for you.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        At just 1.1" thick and 1.74 lbs, the iMoov Astuto provides a portable workplace that is easy to pack.         Add in our .26" thick Teclado Bluetooth keyboard, and the whole package still doesn't take up much more space than an iPad.ÃÂÃÂ     Both fit perfectly in our lightweight 10" and 14" BagIT shoulder bags, along with your tablet or ultrabook.         Thanks to our patented design combining sturdy legs and straps for your lap, you can truly use the iMoov Astuto and Teclado wherever you go.        iMoov is extremely compact, making it easy to grab and take along, even if you are packing light. Suddenly, the whole world opens itself up as a comfortable, efficient working environment.  iMoov even comes in handy at home, letting you use your tablet or laptop in bed or on the couch without worrying about strained necks and overheating devices.         iMoov's straps fit neatly across your legs, sturdily conforming to your body.ÃÂÃÂ         Anywhere you can sit, you can use iMoov. The Astuto stand is incredibly stable whether supported by its straps or its feet.         The iMoov Astuto folds to about the size of an iPad, and the Teclado snaps magnetically into place.ÃÂÃÂ         You can easily store your iMoov in your own laptop bags, or opt for one of our BagIT bags, designed specifically to fit the Astuto, Teclado, and either a tablet or laptop of your choice.        ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        iMoov banishes back pain, strained necks, and lumbago, bringing your devices to eye level so you can work comfortably. ÃÂÃÂ         Working with devices sitting in your lap can have seriously detrimental effects to your health. More and more people are using their devices everywhere they go.    iMoov takes the pain out of using your devices while travelling or away from your desk.          The Astuto stand brings all your devices much closer to eye level, giving you an ergonomic working position.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        iMoov is also perfect for watching your favorite shows in bed, gaming on your laptop, or even giving presentations at the office.ÃÂÃÂ   In any scenario, iMoov will give you a vastly improved viewing angle and seating or standing position.         With six different use positions and endless device configurations, you won't run our of ways to use iMoov.        The iMoov Astuto allows you to place it on your lap supported by its straps, use it on a flat surface, or even use it with the legs folded in, to elevate your laptop for better air circulation.ÃÂÃÂ   The Teclado Bluetooth keyboard is compatible with Windows, Android, Mac, and iOS devices, as well as some smart TVs. Use it in cramped spaces like trains and cabs, to watch your shows comfortably in your bed, or at the cafe.  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  The iMoov stand is built from premium quality materials, and designed to remain stable through years of use.        ÃÂÃÂ   The iMoov Astuto can support up to 11 pounds of weight. It is robust and resilient, and will fold and unfold in seconds. It features an anti-slip and anti-scratch rubberized surface, perfect for keeping your devices securely in place.        ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        iMoov patented design will accommodate practically all phones, tablets, and laptops on the market. ÃÂÃÂ         The Astuto stand is designed to have enough room for any device you may want to use, thanks to a sticky rubber work surface and two slots to fit your mobile phones and tablets. ÃÂÃÂ          Two angled slots - one fully adjustable to the thickness of your devices - make it a breeze to comfortably view your mobile phones and tablets, while the sturdy stand will support computers up to 17".ÃÂÃÂ         The slots provide two different viewing angles. The rear slot is fully adjustable with sliders to support devices of differing thickness.         The Teclado Bluetooth keyboard connects to all your devices, transforming tablets into powerful productivity companions.        The ultra-slim keyboard magnetically attaches to your Astuto stand, slotting securely into divots on the Astuto's surface. It boasts a built-in multi-touch touchpad, Bluetooth pairing memory for 3 devices, and a 500mAH battery good for up to 120 hours of continuous use.ÃÂÃÂ   It is compatible with Android, Windows, iOS and Mac. The Teclado is equiped with special symbol keys standard to windows, iOS, and Apple keyboards. You can even use it to control your Bluetooth equipped smart TV (provided it supports third party devices), thanks to the 33 foot range.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   $60,000 - New Keyboard layouts       ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Should our campaign reach $60,000, we will unlock three new keyboard layouts - QWERTY Scandinavian, AZERTY, and QWERTZ. You'll be able to select your preferred keyboard layout via a survey at the end of the campaign. See our Update #4 for more details!  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Which iMoov package is right for you?  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ    iMoov Astuto   Measurements:  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Closed: 7.72 x 1.12 x 10.43 inches (WxDxH) (196 x 28.4 x 265 mm)  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Opened: 14.57 x 10.43 inches (WxH) (370 x 265 mm)ÃÂÃÂ   Weight : 1.74 lb (790 gr)ÃÂÃÂ   Materials: ABS +PC plastic, Thermoplastic elastomer, aluminum, steel, leatherette, velvet  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    iMoov TecladoÃÂÃÂ    QWERTY US/UK layout keyboard with 17 shortcut / function keys (other layouts available upon request)  Memory for 3 paired devices   Built-in multi-touch touchpad w/left and right click   Magnetically slots into recessed divots in Astuto stand   Color: White with black lettersÃÂÃÂ   Dimensions: LWH 10.16 x 6.78 x 0.26 inches (258 x 172 x 6.5 mm)ÃÂÃÂ   Weight: .56 lbs (254 gr)ÃÂÃÂ   Touchpad on/off keyÃÂÃÂ   Battery: 500 mAh Li-Ion. Upt to 90 days standby, 120 hours continuous use, sub-4 hour charge time. Sleep mode after 10 minutes of idle.ÃÂÃÂ   Bluetooth 3.0: 33ft (10m) rangeÃÂÃÂ   Compatibility - Bluetooth enabled Android/Windows/iOS / Mac devices and some Smart TVs. Touchpad not supported on iPad and iPhone.ÃÂÃÂ   On/off switch; Bluetooth status LED; Power LEDÃÂÃÂ   USB-to-micro USB charging cable & user manual includedÃÂÃÂ   Certifications: CE, FCC, RoHS  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    iMoov Bag IT 10 & Bag IT 14ÃÂÃÂ     Bag IT 10  ÃÂÃÂ    Internal Measurements: 10.63 x 7.87 x 1.57 (WxHxD ) (270 x 200 x 40 mm)ÃÂÃÂ   External Measurements: 11.41 x 8.66 x 1.97 (WxHxD) (290 x 220 x 50 mm)ÃÂÃÂ   Weight : 0.7 lb with shoulder strap (320 g)ÃÂÃÂ   Materials: Polyamide, polyethylene foam, polyurethane accents, lockable metal zipper   Bag IT 14ÃÂÃÂ    Internal Measurements: 14.17 x 9.5 x 1.97 (WxHxD ) (360 x 242 x 50 mm)ÃÂÃÂ   External Measurements: 14.96 x 10.24 x 2.36 (WxHxD) (380 x 262 x 60 mm)ÃÂÃÂ   Weight : 1.04 lb with shoulder strap (475 g)ÃÂÃÂ   Materials: Polyamide, polyethylene foam, polyurethane accents, lockable metal zipper       The history of iMoov  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   Say hello to the people that made the iMoov possible.       ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The biggest potential risks and challenges of this project are linked to the selection of suppliers for plastic injection, keyboard and assembly. Our team has strong experience in this field and we have eliminated these risks by taking the necessary time to select the right partners to offer the best support and the best quality.  Another challenge could be in the logistics and shipping to avoid mistakes and errors. Having seen the challenges some projects currently face with quality issues and delays in production, we preferred to go live with our project once all major product & technology related questions were solved and our product was ready for manufacturing. To further limit this risk, we have invested in an ERP software platform which should prevent such problems and provide first class communication with the backers, avoid shipping to wrong addresses, etc.  We are proud to say that we have set everything well in place to guarantee the quality the backers expect and deserve, as well as to respect the promised delivery timeline.

Creator_description: I'm the co-founder of a monthly meetup called Providence Geeks and also of the Providence Mini Maker Faire. Both of these are volunteer projects that allow me to give back to the Rhode Island community. I also give a few free youth workshops on design and computer programming throughout the year.
Project_description: Launched in 2009 at Slater Mill, the birthplace of the American Industrial Revolution, Rhode IslandÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s own Mini Maker Faire celebrates grassroots innovation, do-it-yourself inspiration, and creative education.ÃÂÃÂ   We're coming together for our 9th year to bring builders, inventors, and designers to Providence to show off what they've made.The City of Providence is presenting this Faire in conjunction with their annual PVDFest. I'm one of the co-founders of the RI Mini Maker Faire, and I'm helping produce it. You can, too!   Your support will pay for the infrastructure needed to make this happen (components and tools for hands-on activities, tents, signage, and all the other stuff that makers need to show off their creations).  Photos in video by Carolyn Fahm ( 1 ,  2 ),  Cindy Miranda , and  s_p_e_x .      Risks and challenges  The hardest part of putting on this event is making everything come together over the course of the two days: day one is setup, day two is the event itself. Because we're a small team, a forgotten extension cord or lamp can cause us to lose a key person's time for an hour or more. We address this by making lists, checking them twice, and bringing extra things (because stuff breaks, too).  The other obstacle is making sure we have the right makers to exhibit and create engaging experiences. Without a set of compelling exhibitors, we'd have a pretty boring event. Fortunately, the team members have wide and complementary networks of friends and collaborators to draw on, and we've already got over a dozen makers committed.

We've developed the product and production line, so we have no issues concerning our product reaching its audience of coffee drinkers. The product itself has several aspects that customers should be aware of while using. The first things our customers should know when using G-Presso is that our product has been made to be used with room temperature or cool and hot water. The second issue that could occur is that G-Presso could vibrate if coffee is not evenly pressed/tamped into the filter basket. For G-Presso to work quietly and smoothly, the coffee needs to be flat and even. However, if customers don't tamp evenly, G-Presso will still make coffee, the device will simply shake while operating. And if you work on a silicon pad provided by g-presso, the shaking can be reduced.

Blurb: A dating app that will eliminate catfishing.
Creator_description: Connexion II is a grass roots company that will help make it easier for singles to safely meet other singles in a carefree environment. With only a few clicks away and the ability to share your likes and dislikes will put you on your way to an experience that is hassle free, no outside marketing and commercial free.
Project_description: Hey I'm one of those people that value my time just as much as the next person. Like most people trying to build a career and have a social life, time can be limited. I've put together new ideas to eliminate unwelcomed social experiences, by building a dating app that will eliminate catfishing. It's great for everyone. Imagine this! Every moment counts, so let's stop wasting time. ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   The Connexion II Mobile App is offering up to three years access on our ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ app. The funds pledged will go towards paying the operating cost and ÃÂÃÂ research study. The design of the Connexion II Mobile App ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ last September 2018. Now we are in the coding and launching faze. Our launch date will be in between September and November of 2019. As the days progress closer to the projected launch timeframe. I'll be able to give an accurate time of launch between the months mentioned above.  ÃÂÃÂ   I care about this app because I understand the online dating world and the flaws that come with dating apps. We have designed a dating app based on my ideas and eliminated the idea of people being scammed and deceived. You actually get what you see on The Connexion II Mobile App. No more of these negative obstacles and scams you have to go through on dating apps while searching and connecting to the one compatible. The Connexion II ÃÂÃÂ Mobile App is paving the way for a new era on how dating apps are viewed and percieved. We are raising the bar and the standards to create a more wholesome experience. ÃÂÃÂ   Mike Angelo--CEO/Founder of the Connexion II Corporation/Mobile App ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The challenge is getting our customer base up. So far, we are putting together a newsletter and reaching out to over 100 social media networks. The risk is more established online dating apps doing similar approaches to gain customers.

NuMicrobe  is raising funds to set up manufacturing to develop new organic microbe technologies that will provide sustainable, green, eco-friendly, resources for the world in which we live.        NuMicrobe  is introducing groundbreaking technology  in a way that you can try    yourself.   Whether you have acres and acres, or just an herb garden in your window, this is a natural, organic way to grow lush vegetables and flowers. Sorry - Times Up!             Sorry - Times Up!                       PLANT GROWTH    NuMicrobe  offers a natural alternative to chemicals for the use of soil amendment, water treatment, agriculture and livestock health using a proprietary blend of probiotic bacteria.  Our proprietary blend is made up of several strains of aerobic bacteria, normally present in our world, they work together to balance any system they inhabit. This balance allows that system to function efficiently whether itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s in a pond, a compost, a garden, or even a cow!     Microbes improve roots fitness and access to nutrients     Here are actual photos showing just what these powerful microbes can do for your lawn: ÃÂÃÂ      Before application of NuMicrobe Lawn & Garden POWER       One week after application the grass is already filling in the yellow areas    Within a few weeks the brown spots had filled in with lush, green grass.   NuMicrobe's  Lawn & Garden POWER is extremely cost-effective, too. It would take over 30 boxes of the leading chemical treatment, and cost you over $200, to equal the effectiveness of one box of Lawn & Garden POWER. Instead of adding more chemicals into our ecosystem, why not use the natural, organic, microbial solution instead ?        Flowers grow like crazy after using  NuMicrobe  Lawn & Garden POWER. ÃÂÃÂ Just take a look at this amazing growth.     PHEBE'S FLOWERS       PHEBE'S FLOWERS             A raspberry patch of epic proportion!    BacteriaÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s ability to accomplish these results is not something new. In fact, ever since life was on the Earth, bacteria, fungi, and microorganisms have been key components for the life cycle of every living organism on the planet. These microscopic partners allow plants, animals, and humans alike to extract nutrients to use in various ways. Cells require organic bacteria and other ingredients to grow and function at their highest efficiency. Microbes along with other bacteria help living organisms create antibiotics, natural vitamins, and are a dominant factor in fighting disease.  In summation, life cannot exist without the help of bacteria.ÃÂÃÂ    We all know that human consumption of probiotic microbes keeps our bodies healthy, repopulates gut flora, and allows the body to heal itself naturally. This is also true in natureÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s ecosystems.        With your support, we will sell the microbes that will improve our lives. Land with glyphosate damage can actually be brought back into production.       Trial Study:ÃÂÃÂ    Bryce Farms, Blythe, CA ÃÂÃÂ  November 2017    Gourmet Baby Red Potatoes     ÃÂÃÂ  16 Acres untreated ÃÂÃÂ      16 Acres treated with NuMicrobes Soil Conditioner      36% Yield Increase      100% reduction in destructive nematodes       Treated potatoes on the left side has a full root system Untreated on the right side has sparse, damaged roots          TRIAL STUDY:    Radix Laboratories, CA ÃÂÃÂ  November 2016    4 Different Vegetables      Greenhouse Atmosphere      19 Day Growth Study           You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. NuMicrobeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s  line of incredible products also assist the environment by consuming toxins and pathogens, while healing lakes, rivers, or soils, returning organic natural life back to areas once polluted and toxic.       COMPOSTING     NuMicrobeÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ Super Composter Mockup    Anyone who has done composting knows that the awful smell is part of the game. Too much moisture and it stinks. Not enough moisture and it stinks! Not with  NuMicrobe's  Super Composter. Just add the microbes, and the smell is gone within hours. Blurb: Sick of TV ads?\\nOur technology recognizes them, and, fully automatically, will mute the sound or play your favorite music playlists!
Creator_description: Hi there! I am an IT business expert, adviser, and investor, living my life in high tech. After many years of corporate work at top positions in blue chip companies, I directed my attention and interest to startups. New technologies are changing the world, and I am so excited to be its part.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ  ReMute:  you install it on your smartphone, tablet, or Smart TV.  and an optional hardware device you connect to your TV receiver.  They will automatically, in real time, detect the ads and - according to your choice -  mute the ads, half mute, or even start your own playlist . So that you aren't bothered with the commercial breaks any more - and no one is!  We are creating it - the technology that will completely change your TV experience. And the landscape of TV business.   And there is also UNmute technology.   You have a workout in a gym. Hang out in a bar. Wander in an airport. Arrays of TV's flicker around. A Superbowl game, breaking news, your favorite show, presidential debate.. you name this. You want to watch it... yes, you can of course. But you cannot hear. All these TV's are muted.  Here comes our technology. It will  allow you to listen to the muted TV in a public facility , using your own headphones, through integration with the venue's infrastructure and using the app on your device.  The commercial beta release should be ready by upcoming October.  So exciting! Can you imagine this?   We can. And we know how to make it. In fact, we are already making it.   We've put together an  enthusiastic team  of hardware, software, and cable experts who created the first prototype. Under the hood are C#, ASP.NET, MS SQL, Azure cloud, and our proprietary algorithms for real time analysis and processing of TV signal.  We raised interest among  owners of chain businesses , such as sport bars and fitness centers. They are ready to roll out our technology in their premises and  bring excitement  to their customers.  We've got a promise from  prominent Instagram bloggers  - they will be happy to spread the message across  millions of their followers .  We are going to quickly roll out  nation wide , expand internationally, and  go public within 60 months .  This is going to be huge.  Today, we just need $99,999 to jump from currently existing software prototype to a  beta commercial release .  We are planning to engage a  strong 6-people team , who will complete the work within  12 weeks . We are planning to spend 90% of funds ($90K) to pay  developers and engineers , with remaining 10% for operational expenses (office, basic marketing and biz dev). We will also bring in a few interns who will will contribute for free.ÃÂÃÂ   Once we have the beta release - it will explode.  You are about to become a part of it.  Isn't this cool?   Join and pledge.ÃÂÃÂ     Your pledge makes you the hero changing the world of entertainment.    Invest as little as $9 and become eligible for great perks and benefits.       Risks and challenges  Each innovation project is associated with risks. We the ReMute team spent weeks talking through them, and we believe we have good consideration of them.  Here are the key challenges we are addressing:  1. The technology allowing real-time recognition of ads. No one has done this before (at massive commercial scale). This is a big technological challenge. We developed and tried out 4 (four) different methods to distinguish commercial contents, and they work. Some of them rely on hardware analysis of TV signal characteristics, others are software related. They all work in real time, with milliseconds of delay - i.e., practically instantly. Out of these 4, we will be able to pick the best.  2. Many innovation products fail because people don't buy them. This is not the case for our product. We talked to dozens and hundreds of potential clients. Businesses (like pubs and gyms) are extremely interested and are ready to adopt our technology in their venues. Individuals are excited to get rid of annoying ads. We will be able to reach out to the market, and we are confident that our product will be more than welcome.  3. Competition. In brief: no one has done this before, and there are no other products like ours. In fact, it looks like no one is getting any close to what we do. We welcome competition, but today it looks like we are grabbing the entire market.  4. Is it legal to suppress the ads? Yes, absolutely. As a user of your TV, you are free to turn it on, off, and adjust volume and picture the way you like it, when you want it, either manually or automatically.   5. By changing the user experience, we are going to shake the entire TV broadcasting market. The cable company will have to react, and we debated a lot what they will do. But, though we are changing the market, we are not killing cable companies. Though ads will reach less customers at homes - more people will start listening to ads in gyms, bars, airports, and other public places. All in all, cable companies will not lose their audience.  6. Financial sustainability of operations. Yes, we crunched lots of numbers to test our financial model. With an affordable subscription cost for end users, we expect to eventually engage hundreds of thousands of customers to ensure steady flow of revenue, so we can provide you with uninterrupted service.

Blurb: Modification of our existing prototype of small wind turbine:\\nhigher Efficiency and made of natural, renewable materials
Creator_description: After high school and military, I studied mechanical engineering with a focus on production engineering at the University of Applied Sciences Augsburg. With the diploma thesis I found the way to the plastic. While leading functions in extrusion and injection molding business, I was managing director of a company producing a cast polyamide until mid-2017. My consulting firm VSM Innovation was founded with the aim of supporting designers in finding solutions to complex component issues. Now I use my network and my decades of experience in both technical application as well as the economical aspects of material selection and components for developing and manufacturing of several Units.
Project_description: Your CO2-neutral electricity production - with the small wind turbine "LITE ROT" against climate change  Today's global climate situation demands everybody to use more sustainable resources to meet our energy needs. Many innovations based on wind and solar energy have already been developed and realized in recent years.  In the meantime, unfortunately large wind turbines are already part of the public picture for supplying energy to townships and cities. However, these are built in windy areas and the electricity must be transported to consumers over long distances. In terms of environment this is not really the best solution. Plenty of power lines are necessary, land use and intervention in nature.  ÃÂÃÂ Why not producing electricity where it is really consumed. Best at your home. But how?  My project team and I have been brooded about this question for several years. A photovoltaic system makes sense, but you can produce electricity only in the daytime and when the sun is shining. Also think about that the weather extremes are increasing. Hot summers, but also windy autumn and winter days. And that's where you need electrical power.  This is where our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ micro-wind turbine comes into. CO2-neutral power production even at low wind speeds.   You already have a photovoltaic system, but want to produce your own electricity even in windy-bad weather? With the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ you increase your independence and can cover your electricity costs    You have a cottage in the countryside or a garden plot? With our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ in conjunction with a solar panel you can switch off your annoying emergency generator.    You have a building with a flat roof? No matter which direction the wind blows, our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ produces electricity.    Help the technical aid organizations and civil protection with providing electrical energy population in emergency cases. The ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ systems are fast and easy assembled.    Help people in poorer countries to stay Independent by producing their own electrical energy e.g. for having light or for using their water pumps. The currently used emergency generators are not the solution under environmental aspects and have permanent running cost. By using the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ it is just a one-time investment.ÃÂÃÂ    But is a wind turbine really CO2-neutral, even if it is not made of sustainable materials? Not for us.ÃÂÃÂ   Due to many years of experience of the project members in different branches of industry, we have found combinations of materials not burden our environment. The keywords are renewable resources. We plan to build the frame out of wood and the blades should get their strength by using a compound made of hemp or coconut fibers. In addition innovative 3D printing nature-based materials are to be used, for example in the area of fasteners.  ÃÂÃÂ The goal is a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ with a base area of 2-2.5 sqm and a height of 2.0 m. The power is about 2KW.  The ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ should be built either on house roofs or in the garden on stilts. Due to the design the running noise is low. With higher flow velocities ÃÂÃÂ the operation of the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ is more efficient.  ÃÂÃÂ Are you also convinced that this will make a positive contribution to climate change possible? Then support us in the development of ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009E> LITE ROT ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> systems. ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The LITE ROT wind turbine is a vertically rotating turbine. In order to increase the efficiency significantly, the air resistance of the blade running against the airflow must be as low as possible. Here we fold the wing blade and thus reduce the attack surface. We have already patented this concept. It is important here that the planned materials also endure the loading of the folding mechanism permanently.

Blurb: DollarLitterClub is science-based so that you can avoid the pain of losing a loved one to treatable but undetected feline illness.
Creator_description: We believe that love can change the world. After experiencing the loss of love in fatal feline illness, DollarLitterClub decided to create the first science-based cat litter. DollarLitterClub is on a mission to prove to itself and the world that the love and connection from our pets can help us in loving ourselves and sharing that love with others.
Project_description: DollarLitterClub - Feel Like Proud Cat Parents     Science-Based Premium Cat LitterÃÂÃÂ   If you walked into our home now, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d suspect weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve always been proud knowing for certain we were being the best cat parents. Thank you DollarLitterClub - You have gone above and beyond to create something beautiful.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    -Emily B,  becke@gmail.com , Toronto, CanadaÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Before DollarLitterClub, my cat had been on Feline Pine pellet litter since he was born, but about a year in we started to have issue with him urinating on the carpet and refusing to use the box pretty often. Within a few days of transitioning to this new litter, when he peed it was green. So I got him into the vet and lo and behold, he had a horrible UTI. Litter Scooper Testimonials:    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>As you can imagine, cleaning cat boxes is a chore that must be repeated several times a day for 8 cats. This Scoop is incredible. I don't care if the rubber tip of the handle breaks like some people complained about. I'm concerned about being able to scoop the box and not have to clean the scooper too and this works great!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ -Vanessa H,    Vsnes7452@gmail.com   , Vancouver, CanadaÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    Risk Free, Hassle Free. We hope our return policy allows you to feel safe trying us with your cats and our money back guarantee shows you we believe in trust.ÃÂÃÂ   Frequently Asked Questions   Will my cat like DollarLitterClub?   Feel pleased for choosing DollarLitterClub when you pour our premium seven-pound litter into your litter box and immediately receive the certainty of your catÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s purring approval. Most catÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s take to DollarLitterClubÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s premium cat litter right away and our experts at DollarLitterClub have mastered the transition process to make it as easy as possible. Does DollarLitterClub work in multi-cat homes?ÃÂÃÂ    Many DollarLitterClub customers have multiple cats in their home and DollarLitter club was designed for multi-cat homes. One bag lasts an entire month for one cat. If you have multiple cats, just add another bag per cat to your box. Our team of experts is here for you to answer any questions you may have along the way to make your journey a success.   How will I know which cat is sick? Can this be used with kittens?   DollarLitterClub was designed for use with cats of all ages including kittens, adult cats and mature cats. DollarLitterClub's premium, science-based litter is soft on the paws of kittens and helps new pet parents keep an eye on the wellbeing of their fur-babies to feel safe knowing for certain they are making meaningful contributions to the wellbeing of their cats. Blurb: Help fund a new kind of activity kit that unlocks creativity through hands-on, digital play. For ages 5+
