Creator_description: Gepeto is a Canadian interactive media company that is using new technologies like Augmented Reality, Computer Vision, and Machine Learning to bring hands-on play to mobile devices. Our mission is to produce experiences for kids that combine the best qualities of physical and digital play to spark imagination and inspire creativity. Gepeto - Hands-on play for a digital generation!
Project_description: We've done a lot of work to get to this stage, including developing new technologies, game play, and prototypes for physical activities. But your help is still needed for us to push through the final stages of the kit's design and manufacturing processes.       And by supporting us in this campaign, you'll be able to get one of the first copies of the Rubu Activity Kit ever made. You'll also play a part in building valuable momentum that will help our company develop more creativity inspiring experiences for kids everywhere.            WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re introducing three original Rubu Activity Kits for our awesome Kickstarter backers!  Each kit contains everything kids need to play and get creative. Adventure Kit #2 and #3 have unique features weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re prototyping, which makes them extra cool.                                The Rubu Adventure Kit uses Augmented Reality to transform screen time into creative, hands-on play. Here's a more in-depth look!             Helps guide kids through missions.    Secret codes and hints will help during game play.    Kids progress from more guided creative activities to more open ones.                          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Game play features a variety of fun, physical interactions that are used to solve puzzles.    Wordless game play encourages kids to form their own interpretations & retell their stories.                    Augmented reality technology allows kids to interact with their devices in ways that mimic toy play.    We're finding this gesture based form of interaction in 3D space to be far more immersive than tapping on a screen.                         Kids refer to this physical map to orient themselves and locate their next missions.    A fun and tactile way to navigate!ÃÂÃÂ                                These collectible cards utilize Computer Vision technology and allow kids to customize Rubu.    Inspires curiosity as kids experiment with cards in different game play situations.                        Kids are clearly attracted to devices like iPads and tablets, but digital content isn't as enriching as it could be. Which is why parents encourage physical play, like toys, drawing, and colouring. Our goal was to combine the engagement of digital devices with the meaningfulness of physical play to create a magical experience for kids.ÃÂÃÂ        We believe we did just that. By combining digital and physical play, we brought out the  best  of both mediums, and developed an experience for kids that  encourages play  and  nurtures creativity .ÃÂÃÂ        Along the way weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve secured funding from the Canada Media Fund and Ontario Creates who validated and supported our approach. With their support, we were able to assemble an eclectic team to realize our collective vision.ÃÂÃÂ        Fast forward to now. The Rubu Adventure Kit is ready to launch. We truly believe weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re introducing children to a new world of play.ÃÂÃÂ   So from the whole Gepeto team (and Rubu!) we thank you for your support, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re excited for you to join the adventure.                Risks and challenges  Our aim is to manufacture a high quality product thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s environmentally responsible and within budget. To achieve this, we are working with trusted advisors who have helped us estimate the realistic timeframe required for production; this valued partnership will assist in bringing the Rubu Adventure Kit to life. We donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t anticipate any major delays, but if any arise, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll contact our backers immediately and keep everyone in the loop.

Blurb: A campaign to introduce my patent pending state of the art invention that will augment the bicycle industry.
Creator_description: I am 58 years of age.  I have lived here in Western  Massachusetts for 25 years.  IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m the type of individual that if I see a need without a solution, I get busy to find or create a solution.  My family, friends and neighbors would attest to this habit of mine.I am a self educated Tinkerer/Inventor.  I have designed and built everything from bridges to bandstands to drones to exercise equipment.  Now, I want to build up my community.  Simple as that.
Project_description: NOTE: STOP AND START THE FOLLOWING ILLUSTRATION AS OFTEN AS YOU MAY NEEDÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ My name is Norman Beamon. ÃÂÃÂ The day I contacted my Patent Attorney for the first time to pitch the Beamon 1st Class Crank, he said to me that there were over 86,000 patents for bicycles alone. ÃÂÃÂ He then went on to say that most likely, what ever I had designed has already been thought of, but if I wanted his time, that I would have to provide a prototype. ÃÂÃÂ I figured that he wanted to inconvenience me to deter me from pursuing any further legal service from him. ÃÂÃÂ But, I was ready to demonstrate a prototype. ÃÂÃÂ There was one problem, it was winter and there was snow everywhere. ÃÂÃÂ I did not want him to put me off until spring, so I talked him into allow me to bring the prototype to his home and set it up on a stationary stand, so he could try it out for himself, which he did. ÃÂÃÂ I could tell by his willingness to try it, that he may not have seen anything like it before. ÃÂÃÂ The rest is like they say, is history.    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ So, this is a summarized background of the Patent Pending Beamon 1st Class Bicycle Crank. ÃÂÃÂ There are several ways to convert a bicycle riderÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s physical exertion in to mechanical rotational power. ÃÂÃÂ In general, standard methods depend solely on selectable gear ratios to aide the bicycle rider when encountering increasingly resistant force while pedaling on uphill grades. ÃÂÃÂ And, while on that uphill grade, the rider on the bicycle, depends largely on the maintenance of forward momentum necessary to climb and summit each hill. ÃÂÃÂ The lose of that forward momentum increases the need for the rider to increase their exertion until either they summit the hill or fatigue and have to dismount and walk their bike the rest of the way up the hill.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ The standard bicycle crank is a bilateral mechanism, each side having one pedal arm attached at the center of rotation at one end and the pedal at the other end. ÃÂÃÂ This creates a 2nd Class leverage mechanism such as a wheel barrow or a water well handle. ÃÂÃÂ When the right side pedal arm is at the 12 oÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>clock position, the left side pedal arm is at the 6 oÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>clock position.    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ The power stroke sector on the right side of the bicycle crank begins, when the pedal, in the up position, moves clockwise slightly forward of the 12 oÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>clock position and ends, when the same pedal approaches its 6 oÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>clock position. ÃÂÃÂ To propel, the rider and bicycle, forward, with a standard crank, the rider exerts a downward force on the right side pedal during the power stroke sector until the left side pedal reaches its 12 oÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>clock position. ÃÂÃÂ Then the same process is repeated on the left side, but counterclockwise.    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ The right side crank arm rotates in a clockwise rotation when generating forward power and the left side crank arm rotates in a counterclockwise rotation when generating power. ÃÂÃÂ Alternating power strokes generates momentum and propels the rider on their bicycle forward. ÃÂÃÂ As described earlier, the maintenance of momentum is necessary for forward motion, especially on an uphill grade. ÃÂÃÂ On downhill and level grades the maintenance of momentum is easier and may even require no effort. ÃÂÃÂ Reason for this, is that the rider has less resistance when rotating the bicycle crank arms to the power stroke sector. ÃÂÃÂ But, as the rider on their bicycle encounters an uphill grade, it starts to lose momentum and gain resistance causing the rider to continuously pedal to sustain the rider and their bicycleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s forward motion. ÃÂÃÂ At the point in time, when the rider has fatigued enough and is unable to reach the power stroke sector, on either side, all forward momentum will be lost. ÃÂÃÂ The rider will have to stop, dismount the bicycle and continue uphill on foot. ÃÂÃÂ The heavier the rider, the more likely and sooner they will encounter insurmountable resistance.    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ The inspiration for the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Beamon 1st Class CrankÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ mechanism came from two incidents. ÃÂÃÂ I weighed roughly 240 lbs. My youngest children, Isabella and Gabriel, were roughly 125 and 150 pounds, respectively. ÃÂÃÂ I was 56 years old and they were 15 and 16 years old respectively, when these incidents occurred. ÃÂÃÂ In June 2017, we three, went out for a bike ride. ÃÂÃÂ Not for the lack of trying, I was always trying to catch them as they road ahead. ÃÂÃÂ When it came to the hills, I fell behind even farther. ÃÂÃÂ And, finally, the bicycle gods, wanting to give me a break and an excuse for falling behind, put a hill in front of me that I could not conquer. ÃÂÃÂ I was giving it my all, when finally my chain broke. ÃÂÃÂ If it hadnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t broken, I would have still quit due to fatigue unable to pedal another stroke. ÃÂÃÂ My children, realizing that I was no longer making progress, returned to find me vanquished. ÃÂÃÂ To add to my embarrassment, I hadnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t even made it a mile from home. ÃÂÃÂ But, in my defense, it was mostly uphill. ÃÂÃÂ The second incident took place shortly after that. ÃÂÃÂ My son, Gabriel, ask if I would allow him to ride from Pittsfield to Tyringham, on his bike. ÃÂÃÂ I agreed. ÃÂÃÂ This bike ride is about 15 and 1/2 Miles. ÃÂÃÂ Home is on Webster Rd in Tyringham. ÃÂÃÂ When you turn on to Webster Rd. from Main Rd., it is all uphill and about a 1/2 of a mile to my door. ÃÂÃÂ ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s about an 7% grade from point A, Main Rd, to point B, my door. ÃÂÃÂ The day my son did his ride, he pedaled nonstop from Pittsfield to Tyringham, with the toughest hill being the last portion of his ride. ÃÂÃÂ I was waitng out on the driveway and witnessed my son pedal right up this last hill to our house.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve always known that this can be accomplished by any young and fit person, especially one who bike rides regularly. ÃÂÃÂ But, l, am not nearly any of the above. ÃÂÃÂ I could have the momentum of a Mack Truck, while riding a bicycle and when I would turn onto Webster Rd. from Main Rd., I would grind to a stop within 100 feet. ÃÂÃÂ ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s right, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d hit the wall. ÃÂÃÂ ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a long walk uphill from there. ÃÂÃÂ Trust me, I do it all the time, especially when riding my bike. ÃÂÃÂ So, these are the two incidents that inspired this endeavor. ÃÂÃÂ My daughter once made me smile, because she said that I always turn everything into a learning experience. ÃÂÃÂ At first, I thought that she was complaining, but she quickly put me at ease, saying that she loved how it was always pertinent with the subject at hand. ÃÂÃÂ This endeavor was no exception.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ It was perplexing to Isabella and Gabriel how someone so big and strong, ME, could peter out so easily. Of course I havenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t told them that it is only my liposuction and silicone implants that make me look so fit. ÃÂÃÂ They donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need to know this. ÃÂÃÂ IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m just joking! ÃÂÃÂ We went into the computer room and sat down to discuss ways we could make the effort of riding a bicycle uphill easier. ÃÂÃÂ Both of them have taken science classes and though cloudy, sort of remember the different types of sciences they have touched on. ÃÂÃÂ I asked them which of the sciences would be most helpful with this project? ÃÂÃÂ I think my son blurted out - Physics. I said, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s correctÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ. ÃÂÃÂ I then asked them had they touched on levers and pulleys in any of their science classes. ÃÂÃÂ Though it seemed uncommitted, they both said yes. ÃÂÃÂ So, l asked them, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>When looking at your bicycle, what kind of mechanism is the drivetrain, the pedals, sprockets and chain?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Gabriel jumped on, that it was a lever. ÃÂÃÂ I clarified that it was both a lever and a pulley. ÃÂÃÂ Next question was, where in this mechanism, can we improve, to help, the big guy, ME, climb hills? ÃÂÃÂ By this time both were afraid to give a wrong answer, so I had to pry answers out of them. ÃÂÃÂ I asked them, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> What changes, when they pedal up hill?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Somebody said the gears. ÃÂÃÂ Somebody said that it gets tougher. ÃÂÃÂ And then someone said that you have to stand up on the pedals. ÃÂÃÂ That is where, I wanted them to go. ÃÂÃÂ I asked, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> Why do you stand up?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Gabriel said, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>To put more weight on the pedals.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Then Isabella said, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> It gives her more leverage.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ I told them, that they were both correct. ÃÂÃÂ I told them, that both of their actions work together to create a rhythm with, minute alternating shiftings, ( a little wordy there) of their weight, allows them to keep their weight over the pedal which is approaching the power stroke sector of its rotation. ÃÂÃÂ Did they understand any of that? ÃÂÃÂ I am not certain, but, It doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t matter, because these interactions are meant to train them to problem solve. One day, they will be better off, because of it. ÃÂÃÂ I hope!ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ I then asked if either of them had ever heard of Archimedes? ÃÂÃÂ The look in their eyes said, - NO. ÃÂÃÂ I then told them his famous quote.    "Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world." - Archimedes    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Our discussion then turned to the different types of leverage systems. ÃÂÃÂ How many there are and how each works. ÃÂÃÂ I asked, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>What lever system, from their observation, do they think the standard bicycle crank utilizes?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ And, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>What is the best way to improve on it?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We discussed everything that we have seen, but I knew that just because we have not seen it, does not mean that other things do not exist. ÃÂÃÂ Thus, began my search for what existed out in the bicycle world now. ÃÂÃÂ What I found, was pretty impressive. ÃÂÃÂ Many improvements were electric or electronic and weight reduction. ÃÂÃÂ But, from bikes costing more than $500,000 ( I couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t believe it either, but it was on eBay ) down to the $100 cheappy, the crank systems were all the same, with one exception.    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ This exception is the Penny-Farthing. The Penny-Farthing is that old bicycle with the very large front wheel andÃÂÃÂ a very small rear wheel. ÃÂÃÂ They are from the early 1800's. ÃÂÃÂ It utilizes a reciprocating bilateral mechanism, which I assume was borrowed from steam engine trainÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology from its time. ÃÂÃÂ This does not mean that it is the only exception, because humans are always trying to figure out a better way of doing everything. ÃÂÃÂ YouTube shows some amazing mechanisms for people propulsion. ÃÂÃÂ Some are simply awesome. ÃÂÃÂ Some are very complicated. ÃÂÃÂ All, are schools for thought. ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ The ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Beamon 1st Class CrankÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ is designed utilizing a 1st Class lever. ÃÂÃÂ I have tried to keep the design of the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Beamon 1st Class CrankÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ as simple as possible. ÃÂÃÂ It would be possible to place the driving mechanisms on one side of the crank or even integrate it into a bicycle frame, but it would make for a more complicated engaging apparatus. ÃÂÃÂ This prototype is designed solely to demonstrate its feasibility. ÃÂÃÂ It is bulky and Frankenstein-esque. ÃÂÃÂ In fact, this prototype is made of steel, which when substituted for the original standard crank added a great deal of weight to the bicycle. ÃÂÃÂ But, because it is a 1st Class lever, the additional weight is rendered insignificant. ÃÂÃÂ Production models will be made of high grade aluminum. ÃÂÃÂ It will be anodized, powder coated, streamlined and made to look boldly attractive. ÃÂÃÂ I can not wait to see what this advancement in bicycling technology can do in the hands of those with the Right Stuff. ÃÂÃÂ But, first things first... We need your help to move from a Patent Pending Prototype in to full production. ÃÂÃÂ Make it happen! ÃÂÃÂ Please support our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Beamon 1st Class CrankÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ Kickstarter campaign and turn your bicycle into a MACHINE. ÃÂÃÂ So, may all your uphills from now on be easier.    LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Crank It Up!    Godspeed,    Mr. Norman Beamon, Jr.       Risks and challenges  As with all manufactured product their comes risks and challenges.  Initially, we will be facing the challenge of building a library of bicycle manufacturers specifications of their varying drivetrains that we will augment.  This is why our customers will be shipping their bicycles to us.  This initially may delay delivery of a customers newly augmented bicycle, but as our library grows with specifications of these varying Makes and Models of Bicycles, our turnaround times will drop precipitously.

Blurb: Super-drones aiding & transforming your neighborhood. Building hospitals, schools, bridges, homes... you name it! Back the future.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Orlando-United States:6 backers|Kissimmee-United States:3 backers|Perpignan-France:1 backer|Melbourne-Australia:1 backer|Apex-United States:1 backer|Castro Valley-United States:1 backer|Chicago-United States:1 backer|Dublin-United States:1 backer|Lakeland-United States:1 backer|Los Angeles-United States:1 backer

Creator_description: Trying to make the world a better place. One cool project at a time.
Project_description: (Kickstarter Photo Credit:  Richard Unten) ÃÂÃÂ   Hello everyone, so there is limited funding for senior design projects at University of Central Florida and when I proposed the project I was told the project will cost a lot of money... and that  "there's no way in hell you can raise 4.5k by yourself" ... well, I've taken to the internet to ask for help so I can have a voice for this project. The next paragraph shares my proposal. In my opinion, senior design should showcase the ingenuity and creativity of a graduating engineer. My project is realistic and involves actual numbers (provided at the bottom).  Here goes... Drones are a great new technology with the potential to change global conventions. Including emergency services such as life-saving drug transportation in developing nations, advanced firefighting, transporting AED's in distant or rural areas, etc. But what about construction and community infrastructure? Alongside life preservation, there needs to be development in construction. With the right design, a semi-flexible body of drones could replace the capabilities of a small or even medium size construction crane while providing for cheaper machinery costs, faster lifting, lesser space and traffic consumption, affordability, and a huge step in advanced construction. Plus, it'll be so cool!   Imagine   Glass sheet transport     Glass pane transport    Steel beam transport     Steel beam lifting    Imagine a third-world country capable of embracing progress and constructing larger hospitals and cities using the help of these drones. Imagine the progress a first world country could make.  As a mechanical engineer backed with a responsibility to use ideas to improve society and give back to my community, I implore the readers to fund to this cause.  This a great idea for advanced global infrastructure development. It's pretty awesome.   2 prototype designs:    Setup [1]   Eco-friendly choice! (Preferred)   Fully electric powered  P80-KV120  T-motors:ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      P80-KV120 T-motor    ÃÂÃÂ Larger than average drone motors with  30in  carbon-fiber (dual-blade) propellers capable of delivering a maximum thrust of 17 kg  (~37.5 Lbs ).  Electronic Speed Controller (ESC)  FLAME 80A-HV:      Flame 80A-HV    ÃÂÃÂ Handles up to 80 Amps  of high-voltage, which is more than enough for the motor which consumes a maximum current of 60 Amps  at 100% throttle.   Multirotor types and specs:      Duocopter: ÃÂÃÂ    2 ESC + 2 Motor + 2 CF prop.=    34kg (~75Lbs) max. thrust ($975.50)        Tricopter:    3 ESC + 3 Motor + 3 CF prop. =    51kg (~112.5Lbs)max. thrust ($1,631.20)        Quadcopter:    4 ESC + 4 Motor + 4 CF prop. =    68kg (~150Lbs)max. thrust ($1,951.00)        Hexcopter:    6 ESC + 6 Motor + 6 CF prop. =    102kg (~225Lbs)max. thrust ($2,926.50)        Octocopter:    8 ESC + 8 Motor + 8 CF prop. =    136kg (~300Lbs)max. thrust ($3,902.00)        Duo-Octo:    12 ESC + 12 Motor + 12 CF prop. =    204kg(~450Lbs)max. thrust ($5,853.00)       Setup [2]   Eco-friendly choice! (also Preferred)   Fully electric powered  F80-KV1900  T-motors:     F80-KV1900 T-motor    ÃÂÃÂ New FPV drone motors with polymer (triple-blade) propellers capable of delivering a maximum thrust of 2.115 kg  (~4.66 Lbs ) and handling sharp turns!  Electronic Speed Controller (ESC)  F45A 6S 4in1 (32bit):      F45A 6S 4 in 1 ESC    Handles up to 4 motors at once! Providing a cost effective component for greater maximum lift capacities.   Multirotor types and specs:      Octocopter:    2 ESC + 8 Motor + 8 prop.    = 16.9kg (~37Lbs)max. thrust ($354.96)        Duo-Octo:    4 ESC + 16 Motor + 16 prop.    = 33.8kg (~75Lbs)max. thrust ($709.92)        IV-Octo:    8 ESC + 32 Motor + 32 prop.    = 67.6kg (~150Lbs)max. thrust ($1,419.84)        VI-Octo:    12 ESC + 48 Motor + 48 prop.    = 101.5kg (~224Lbs)max. thrust ($2,093.88)        XII-Octo:    24 ESC + 96 Motor + 96 prop.    = 203kg (~448Lbs)max. thrust ($3,503.76)        Design Conclusions:    Setup [1] yields a maximum thrust of 450Lbs at the cost of $5,853, meanwhile Setup [2] nearly matches that max. thrust at 448Lbs at the cost of $3,504 - mainly due to bulk order benefits.  Either way, this project is a proof of concept;ÃÂÃÂ   Setup [2] requires 108 to 216 components to be carefully adjusted and combined, providing more moving parts, larger room for error and time consumption, while providing greater stability and flexibility in design.  Setup [1] requires 18 to 36 components with less time consumption overall.  Super-drone will either be Setup [1] Hexcopter/Octocopter OR Setup [2] VI-Octo/XII-Octo. These designs will provide enough room for extra budget.  This conclusion does not include drone frame cost, nor flight controller software cost, nor the cost of shipping. Settling on a minimum budget of $4,500 to account for error.    Thank you.   All funds will go towards the project, the rest will be kept for future projects' funding.      Risks and challenges  Challenges will include thrust to weight ratios, stability, and design functionality.  In the end the drone will be a part of a modular and transforming drone, capable of lifting heavy material.

Creator_description: Bobby is a lifetime and avid fisherman who was born and raised in Central Illinois. He owns a professional construction and property leasing business locally, as well the patent pending Looter Lure Series. He is also an Illinois State Record holder for Hybrid Striped Bass and uses the Looter Lure with every fishing trip. The Looter Lure has helped catch thousands of fish from the Great Lakes to smaller ponds in the Midwest, and Bobby attributes much of his fishing success to the Premium Silver Lure.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ Help Looter Lure Co. Send the Bass Fishing Lure to Production! ÃÂÃÂ   Looter Lure's goal with our Kickstarter is to use the raised money for new packaging, manufacturing molds, and advertising for our new Bass fishing lure... the Looter Ultra-vibe!ÃÂÃÂ      Ultra-Vibe Bass Fishing Lure           Backstory:ÃÂÃÂ    The Looter Lure was invented in the early 1980's on lake Michigan. It's been used ever since as it was tried & proven by 3 generations of Professional Fishing Guides. The Looter Lure is a premium lure made from solid brass that is then platedÃÂÃÂ with jewelry quality silver & gold.ÃÂÃÂ What makes the Looter LureÃÂÃÂ special is that its pure silver or gold qualityÃÂÃÂ will retain its color at any depth, which is where other metals and colors would loose their quality below certain water depths. The Looter Lure can be casted, trolled, or jigged, although its original purpose was intended to be trolled for salmon on the Great Lakes.ÃÂÃÂ   The Looter Lure was designed specifically for -ÃÂÃÂ    Looter Lure Salmon fishingÃÂÃÂ     Looter Lure Striped Bass FishingÃÂÃÂ     Looter Lure Large Mouth Bass Fishing    Looter Lure Walleye FishingÃÂÃÂ     Looter Lure Trolling    Looter Lure Casting    Looter Lure Jigging    Saltwater, Freshwater, Ice-fishing   But can be used anywhere, at any time!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      LOOTER LURE MAGNUM SILVER       Looter Lure Ultra-lite size 3 in Orange!        Looter Lure Original Silver     The Journey:ÃÂÃÂ    The Original Lures -ÃÂÃÂ   Looter Lure Co. started with a single concept for a lure that is still available in three sizes - Micro, Original, and Magnum. They are each made up of stamped brass disks, plated with Silver, that can be rearranged in any configuration simply with a pair of split-ring pliers. That idea grew and cultivated enough interest for us to engineer the same set in Gold, and then further into each coming in 2 different weights, one lighter and one heavier. These quality lures have certainly "caught" the hearts of fisherman and tackle shops from across the nation.ÃÂÃÂ   Looter Lasers + Ultra-lites -  Not long after the 12 Silver and Gold Lures hit the market, a new idea sparked in the form of fiber-optics! Thus, the Looter Laser was born. The 5 different sizes of Looter Lasers take the form of your favorite individual Looter Lure disks, with a circular fiber-optic color in the middle. You wouldn't believe the action these pieces add to the already impressive Looter Lure! After we had the pieces and started experimenting, the Ultra-lites were born. These lures are small but mighty, taking on all kinds of fishing trips, especially on the ice!ÃÂÃÂ The Lasers and the Ultra-lites come in 9 fiber-optic colors and 1 glow-in-the-dark color.ÃÂÃÂ   Check out our diagrams on how to customize the Looter Lures and Ultra-lites below.ÃÂÃÂ                        Why Looter Lure is better than your average lure:ÃÂÃÂ    Unlike most lures on the market, there is no wrong way to fish the Looter Lure. It is proven successful while fished at every single configuration you can think of.  The diagrams above are our suggestions, but they are not the only successful solutions!  This Lure is made to stimulate the creativity in every fisherman, and the fish are going crazy for it. We do, however, recommend a couple of different configurations for certain desired actions. They are as followed:ÃÂÃÂ        Again, these are only our suggestions based on our research and customer feedback. You can fish your Looter Lure in as many ways and you can think of!ÃÂÃÂ     OWNER -ÃÂÃÂ BOBBY VERICELLA      Robert Vericella     Bobby is a lifetime and avid fisherman who was born and raised in Central Illinois. He owns a professional construction and property leasing business locally, as well the patent pending Looter Lure Series. He is also anÃÂÃÂ Illinois State Record holder for Hybrid Striped Bass and uses the Looter Lure with every fishing trip. The Looter Lure has helped catch thousands of fish from the Great Lakes, smaller ponds in the Midwest, inshore, and offshore saltwater fishing trips. Bobby attributes much of his fishing success to the Premium Silver Lure.ÃÂÃÂ     INVENTORS    Tony Angello, Bob Angello, and Bobby Vericella     Questions? Feel free to email us at looterlure@gmail.com!       Risks and challenges  Looter Lure is no different than any other hardware startup in that we will be creating a product which consumers will interact with, and with that will come challenges. Looter Lure is a product meant to be used in the harsh environment of the open ocean and various water types, and those environments are never kind Integrity and functionality of the device in its final, production form will be of the utmost importance and we are committed to not shipping a device which is subpar.  Looter Lure is a relatively low-cost hardware product operating in a harsh environment and as such, will require production of higher volumes. In order to meet these production demands, Looter Lure is designed for manufacturability and ease of assembly. Each process required to create Looter Lure will be engineered for scale and repeatability.  We have tried to be very conservative in our estimated delivery date and will make every effort to meet this date. However, when it comes down to it, we hold ourselves to a very high standard and will only ship a product which we are confident that fishermen will find value with and enjoy using over and over again.

They had a fantastic concept but they had no idea about how to protect it. They came up with a fantastic concept.  However they had no clue about how to protect their idea. Those two friends stressed that using confidentiality agreements quickly discouraged potential business partners. At the same time, even before turning to the national or international IP institutions, all of the steps that would have been necessary to register their creations seemed complex, time-consuming, and financially burdensome.ÃÂÃÂ   Through this chaos of trying to figure out the usual protecting systems, the idea of IPLocked, a simple, transparent, and cheap protecting alternative, was born.ÃÂÃÂ      THANKS TO IPLOCKED TWO FRIENDS MADE THEIR DREAM COME TRUE: ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>SandyPointÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, a healthy and responsible fast-food restaurant using local ingredients while also providing wellness coaching thanks to a mobile app.      3. ÃÂÃÂ   Any photos, videos, paints, concepts, logos, softwares, designs, drawings or books can be protected by the calculation of a digital imprint that allows you to store and transmit information transparently and securely.ÃÂÃÂ    A NEW ECOSYSTEMÃÂÃÂ    At IPLocked we are setting up a new ecosystem, the goal of which is to provide the general public and businesses with an easy-to-use platform for recording, verifying and interacting with intellectual property in general.   OUR CONCEPTÃÂÃÂ    A decentralized certification platform allows creators, startups, inventors, and artists of all types to certify and verify their works. In addition to being able to generate certificates of authenticity, the platform is able to easily create contracts and licenses for their work.   OUR ECONOMIC MODEL   We seek to reduce transaction costs for the trade of IP works by simplifying the authentication process and using the security offered by the blockchain product. Therein, ÃÂÃÂ licenses, payment management and media can be streamlined as well.  The blockchain technology guarantees the integrity of the document. The digital footprint of each document is unique and any modification will lead to the creation of a new hash. This solution is the electronic proof that the author is protected.    ÃÂÃÂ   95ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>000 CHF  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  Provide users with opportunity to integrate IPLocked's technology;    ÃÂÃÂ   More CHF  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  Expand the IP Blockchain platform globally      MORE..      7. HOW I WANT TO SHAKE UP THE INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY WORLD?    Many startups believe that they do not need intellectual property protection because they do not realize that they have intellectual property assets.   If you are creating value through your business you indeed hold intellectual property.  ÃÂÃÂ   Statistically, nine out of ten startups fail(Forbes). Why ? Startups spread a huge amount of time working  in ÃÂÃÂ boring stuff anesthetize their brains and they overlook key aspects of business process.ÃÂÃÂ Also,  they ran out of cash.ÃÂÃÂ    Protecting their own projects, their ideas or their IP assets should be the first step!ÃÂÃÂ The problem is that intellectual property registration usually much exceeds the budget of rising talents. Protecting your project means not being able to put money elsewhere. Well at least that's what it meant until now.        ÃÂÃÂ 8. ADVANCED TECHNICAL INFORMATIONS    The blockchain guarantees the integrity of the creation   Blockchain guarantees the integrity of the creation. The digital footprint of each creativeÃÂÃÂ work is unique (certification page). Any modification will lead to the creation of a new hash. This solution is the electronic proof that the creatorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s work is protected.  Using logos and slogans as an example, an ideal blockchain-based database enables a user to access the productÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s digital certificate of authenticity, and this demonstrates where the trademarked product or service came from (its origin) and who owns the rights to the work.  Anyone can trace the product back to its origin and find the certificate of authenticity (verification page), thereby being to distinguish authentic products from counterfeit in market circulation.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ  Based on Geographical Indications, we will develop a tracing of the product protocol.   ÃÂÃÂ  Are you ready to change the future?ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Considered a disrupt technology, Blockchain has already drastically changed the deeply ingrained structure and patterns of interaction, since the invention of the Internet in the 1970ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s.   Since its recent emergence, this technology has gradually reformed the running of industries such as car sharing, real estate transactions, banking transactions just to name a few. What does it have to offer to the field of intellectual property and innovation protection?  Applying our blockchain technology to IP management would permit creations to be indelibly and immediately stamped. This is why we provide a dated and time-stamped certificate when entrepreneurs and creators submit their creation or idea.   In this manner, they are able to later certify that their data existed at the stamped time. Using a decentralized certification system based on the bitcoin network, our online service allows you to publicly prove you possession of certain data.

Blurb: Respooler is the only handheld, motorized fishing line stripper and recycling device.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Sydney-Australia:1 backer|Kuala Lumpur-Malaysia:1 backer|Albany-United States:1 backer|Apopka-United States:1 backer|Delmar-United States:1 backer|Melbourne-United States:1 backer|Oregon City-United States:1 backer|Palm Bay-United States:1 backer|Richmond-United States:1 backer|San Francisco-United States:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:8 backers|Australia:1 backer|Malaysia:1 backer
Creator_description: All my life, I have had a special bond with nature and wildlife. As far back as I can remember, I have always loved the outdoors and doing things like going camping and fishing. The preparations I would make the day before so that I would have everything needed for a safe adventure the next day always made me so excited. Then after a night of restless sleep dreaming about finally landing the big one I would wake up to the smells of the early morning dew along the waters edge and the sounds of the water rippling along the shoreside which reminded me why it was my favorite place to be. I would unpack my gear and start my adventure hiking along the shore looking for the perfect place to make my first cast. I fished all day long, and I was on cloud nine. This was until I was making my way back to camp.While walking back to camp on this particular trip, I noticed something disturbing along the water. A loon had been caught up in a large amount of discarded fishing line and had died from monofilament fishing line strangulation. Instant sadness came over me because I wasn't aware that something I was having fun doing could cause such a horrible death to a beautiful creature.Fast forward 30 years, the problem of monofilament fishing line entanglements has become a world wide epidemic. Today the amounts of monofilament fishing line sales are at record levels, and the number of entanglement deaths have increased to over 1,000,000 deaths per year. The unfortunate, painful death to these animals needs to be stopped. After doing research, I noticed that the current methods and devices used to strip the fishing line from an anglers fishing reel will often add to the problem and they end up in large piles of fishing line that are left behind. This results in a death sentence to the animals it may entangle. I came up with the Respooler and assembled a team that have helped me to design and produce the first and only hand held fishing line stripper. It has a revolutionary spool winder to collect the fishing line for recycling. The Respooler is an ergonomically designed fishing line stripper that will help assist anglers in recycling their unwanted fishing line for recycling. It will help make sure we put an end to monofilament fishing line entanglements, and if needed the Respooler can also be used as an emergency cell phone power source. We are using our many years of combined product development and marketing sales experience to launch Respooler to the global recreational fishing marketplace.Our company will lanch recycling incentive campaigns to help increase the sales of our new product the Respooler, and at the same time this will help to decrease the number of monofilament fishing line entanglements. We will also start receycling programs to help collect the fishing line for recycling. The recyclined fishing line will then be shipped to us, and we will recycle it to help make more Respoolers. By doing this we will decrease the numbers of entanglements, and help keep the ocean and lakes clean.

Because this is something completely new it is much more challenging to predict sales  I know the  kids scooter   has a big flaw , ÃÂÃÂ standing on one leg and bending that one leg while you push with the other is hard work ( i know as used to build my scooters out of planks of wood and ballbearings and bits from the ironmonger as a 6 year old )  so I set out to invent a scooter ÃÂÃÂ where you can  scoot with 2 legsÃÂÃÂ     the results ÃÂÃÂ worked out ÃÂÃÂ so well not only can you scoot with 2 legs its hands free and you sit down !  it is much safer than the scooter  (  4 points of contact with the ground and a big front wheel ) it turns round on the spot  so good for indoors as wellÃÂÃÂ    It turned out its not a scooter as you don't scoot with 2 legs so I called it a Scoo-B.ÃÂÃÂ     the Scoo-B B 10 inch wheel ( pink one ) and the Soo-B U for the 12 inch ( blue one )    there are over 2 million scooters sold in the uk year ? ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ( subject to design and testing )   The walking wheel chair version  would be developed next ? it is aimed at people with no balance but have some use in their legs, for a better quality of life   the Scoo B Uni  will be for the younger types who enjoy a challenge. much easier than the unicycle but still not easy. The detachable/fold up ÃÂÃÂ pedals means it converts from a  Scoo-B uni  to a  Scoo-B glider , so it can go almost anywhereÃÂÃÂ    the water walker walker inland  ÃÂÃÂ is for people who just want to walk on water and converts to a  SB glider  on landÃÂÃÂ   who is it for ? Blurb: We bring fun to your Sports Clothing by integrating Fashion with Technology
Creator_description: My name is Paul Cheung and I am the Founder and CEO of Wear X Ltd. This company was formed last year and is funded by the Hong Kong Science & Technology Park under the Hong Kong Government. Our offices are at the HKSTP offices therefore endorsed by the Hong Kong Government. We are passionately about bringing Fashion and Technology together and believe there is market for this in the future.
Project_description: 2 years ago the founders of Wear X Limited wanted to create a crossover of fashion with technology to give the best end user experience as possible. Ladies and gentlemen alike will enjoy a jacket with multiple technology functions, being playful and functional. Hence the first IoT Jacket was born. We are a team of passionate technologists whose interest is to succeed in creating and starting a trend of fashionable clothing mixed with technology. Therefore we are inviting 5000 first time users to join us on this journey. We are limiting it to 5000 users withÃÂÃÂ  intention to focus on these 5000 users who will use this amazing jacket with the features we have mentioned and we will continue to improve this following our roadmap. Each jacket will have a unique number and comes with a special Wear X package containing a goodies bag, ideal for a present. All users who sponsor us will have their names recognized on a plaque in our offices and be part of our history in helping us in sponsoring our company. ÃÂÃÂ Overview The Jacket has built in lights and controlled via the gloves through Bluetooth. By pressing on the fingers which have sensors ÃÂÃÂ to control left, right and brake. The Jacket also incorporates the IoT sensors to give you statistics of calories expended, steps taken, heartbeat and the blood pressure. All these data will be seen in a single dashboard via your phone or via a web browser. The Sports jacket itself comprises of many useful pockets to place your phones, chargers, water bottles and swipe cards with detachable sleeves and vents to cool you down after your exercise. This Jacket is suitable for many sports from cycling to skateboarding or Skiing. There is currently no jacket on the market which integrates so well with technology therefore it is unique.ÃÂÃÂ   The sizes are:ÃÂÃÂ                  ÃÂÃÂ The Jacket:       The Glove:                   You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ Accessories:       ÃÂÃÂ Webcam covers:            Caps are free size  Sizing for T-Shirts       Sizing for Hoodies            Please remember to state your sizing when ordering items.  The Design:       ÃÂÃÂ How does it work?           Risks and challenges  We have mitigated this risk since we have already completed the prototype which we have invested 2 years time researching and implementing . The templates and designs are already set up therefore they have experience in producing the jackets in large quantity. The current manufacturers have been doing this type of complex designs for many years and working with them for these past 2 years have solidified our relationship and optimized our production flow.  Wear X Limited is funded by Hong Kong Government via the Hong Kong Science & Technology Park (HKSTP) with a goal to inspire Innovation.   https://www.hkstp.org/en

Blurb: Designed and custom made by an occupational therapist, THERACRAFT is created for rehabilitation therapy, home use and school settings.
Creator_description: Kevin Grob MS, OTR/LI attended Loma Linda University and graduated in 2014.I am currently employed as an occupational therapist in San Diego and have experience working acute inpatient, SNF rehabilitation and pediatric settings.  After my undergratuate studies at SDSU, I fell in love with occupational therapy while working in special education at Stein Education Center. During that time, I worked closely with the students modifying bicycles enabling them to participate in the bike program. This is what inspired me to go into occupational therapy, so that I could help people obtain their highest quality of life and independence. It has become a passion of mine. THERACRAFT was developed for arm and hand motor control training activities. This product is hopefully only the beginning of ways I can help people participate in and experience their environment. My dream and long term plan is a larger facility to design and build creative rehabilitation products for people across the lifespan. Thank you for being interested in this project.
Project_description: THERACRAFT is an evolution of the classic therapy pipe tree activity commonly used in rehabilitation settings. Originally this product was developed as a functional activity to be used by therapists helping stroke survivors regain upper extremity motor control skills. After much encouragement and ÃÂÃÂ four years refinement, THERACRAFT has been designed for use across the lifespan in rehabilitation, home and school settings to improve functional ÃÂÃÂ outcomes.ÃÂÃÂ        THERACRAFT can be defined as a functional assembly activity comprised of pipes, fittings and sturdy bases. Included activity manual illustrates 25 graded examples to follow individually or with assistance. All items are made for durability and can be easily sanitizedÃÂÃÂ in clinical environments.     Motor control training       Cognitive exercise       Fun funtional activities       Activity Manual    ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ THERACRAFT is intended as a multi-purpose activity that can be used with other common rehabilitation, home and school items such as rings and bean bags to create a dynamic experience to fit the needs of the individual and therapist. ÃÂÃÂ      Ring tree activity.       Bean bag toss goal post.         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ Project Backing Rewards: ÃÂÃÂ      Theracraft Logo Sticker       The Man       Limited Edition THERACRAFT        Risks and challenges  Currently THERACRAFT is in the marketing phase of its beginnings; It cost A LOT and requires copious time. This kickstarter is to raise money for exhibit fee/costs at rehabilitation expos, especially the AOTA (American Occupational Therapy Association) Annual Conference & Expo. We want to have a stellar booth and product display in order to demonstrate how THERACRAFT can improve functional outcomes during treatment in occupational therapy.  If over funded additional monies will be used toward fees/cost at other rehabilitation expos we would also like to attend such as APTA and OTAC. Also many other improvements are going on such as media/marketing development videos that need funding help as well.   THERACRAFT prides itself on generating continued evidence based research using our products in various treatment settings/populations as well as the expansion of our product manufacturing when necessary. We appreciate all the help given so far!  Similar product examples can be seen by searching an engine for 'therapy pipe tree'.  Backing this project THERACRAFT guarantees all reward tier level gifts or monies raised will be promptly refunded at request. THERACRAFT is confident with meeting demand and is dedicated to honest customer service. Thank you for your support! It is so much appreciated. Please email with any questions:  theracraftproducts@gmail.com   More detailed information about this product can be viewed at theracraftproducts.com

Blurb: Quick & Easy Baby Seat Tite Strap In - Be sure your child is secure before you drive by using the ultimate Seat Tightener.
Creator_description: Current inventor of Seat-Tite, Graduate of US Naval Academy with degree in Engineering, Inventor of Mighty-Tite, past owner of Diono car seats.
Project_description: Safe Kids Worldwide say that 80% of all children's car seats are put in too loosely. ÃÂÃÂ Therefore in the event of an accident a child's head or face can hit the back of the front seat causing a serious injury. ÃÂÃÂ   Race car drivers seats are welded into the car so that in the event of an accident the energy released is transmitted to the car rather than to the driver. ÃÂÃÂ If a car seat is installed so that there is little movement if you have an accident the energy created is transmitted to the seat and not to the child. ÃÂÃÂ   All car seat manufacturers say that is alright to have some movement when installing the car seat that is because up until the invention of Seat-Tite there was no way to install a car seat without movement. ÃÂÃÂ Seat-Tite guarantees that your child's car seat will be "secure" in your car. By using Seat-Tite this allows you to get to the recommended 1 inch of movement or less for your car seat.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Seat-Tite is patented Worldwide. ÃÂÃÂ Seat-Tite works equally well on rear facing car seats as well as infant carrier installations      Risks and challenges  Common risks and challenges for my project would be finalizing the product packaging and possible delay in making the tools for production,

Blurb: To help create a natural, chemical free, sustainable apiary located in Eden, NY.
Creator_description: Hey I'm Kristin! I'm al full time nurse who loves helping wildlife on the side.
Project_description: Save the bees!  I am asking for donations for a ÃÂÃÂ Bee Preservation Program I am working on. With spring quickly approaching I am planning on opening up a private apiary in Western NY and asking for donations to help save the bees. Over the past several years the bee population has been on a steady decline due to colony collapse, disease and, environmental issues. Recently it has been discovered that most bee colonies are dying off because the bees are coming in contact with pesticide and insecticide sprays. It is my hope that by starting an apiary it can help improve the overall population of the bees while increasing pollination rates and helping the survival of other wildlife species as well.ÃÂÃÂ Your contribution will be used to help purchase bees and,ÃÂÃÂ bee supplies for the bees such as wood for hives, frames and bases. ÃÂÃÂ Over 70% of our global crops are pollinated by bees and 90% of the flowering plant species are dependent on bees. I have access to 27 acres of land that was previously used for farming and I would like to plant a flower field/pollen field for the bees on the land. Typically bees will travel no more than 5 miles to collect pollen and water. The available location will allow the bees to have access to water on the property from a small creek and, I am hoping to provide enough pollen so bees will not have to travel far distances and come in contact with pesticides and insecticides. With your contribution I am hopeful that we together can help protect the bees and increase the bee population.      Risks and challenges  Beekeeping is a very risky thing to do.  Honeybees can be affected by low pollen/nectar, cold weather, rain and, illness. Despite the best care colony collapse can still occur. While we cannot guarantee success I can assure you there will be open communication and updates on our progress.  One of my biggest concerns is being unable to fulfill the honey rewards, I have given the bees ample time to produce enough honey for rewards.

Blurb: We have a free tipping app, currently available to download, but we need to upgrade it to provide a bespoke tipping experience to all!
Project_Community_top_cities: |London-United Kingdom:3 backers|Madrid-Spain:2 backers|Cambridge-United Kingdom:1 backer|Liverpool-United Kingdom:1 backer|Kampong Sungai Gelugor-Malaysia:1 backer|San Francisco-United States:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United Kingdom:5 backers|Spain:2 backers|Malaysia:1 backer|United States:1 backer
Creator_description: I have a background in finance and a keen interest in NGO work. I have most recently run two fitness studios in the UK and now I've turned my attention to an app development start-up, with Gratitude Tipping London being my first venture!
Project_description: Gratitude Tipping is an app which helps travellers tip accurately across the world. We've designed it once, built it, redesigned it and had upgrades made. The problem with it being our first app is that it's a learning experience and we're now close to the end of our budget. The app's free for everyone and the feedback we've had so far is positive. Along the way we've picked up constructive criticism which we want to include in an upgrade to make the app fully functional. We want to enhance the tipping advice, increasing accuracy. Currently we have a tipping percentage for each country which is included in our algorithm. These tipping percentages are then used to determine a tip, based on the level of service that the user receives and the bill amount. It's quick easy and can help people navigate the problems of cultural differences in tipping.ÃÂÃÂ   Whilst tipping is a divisive topic, it is something that a lot of people rely on in many countries across the world. However, it's also something that can cause offence in other places. So we just want to help people get it right.ÃÂÃÂ   Currently we offer four services, which are restaurant, bar, taxi and porter tipping. We'd like to expand this to include other options, such as housekeeping and hairdresser services.ÃÂÃÂ   There are a few issues with the user experience of the app which we really need to address to ensure users find it easy to navigate and use.ÃÂÃÂ   We also have a mini travel guide in the app, which needs to be expanded. This requires research and then implementation. We want to provide the user with information such as emergency numbers for the country, local company links and any important information they might need for their travels. Currently the travel guide offers a few language tips and facts about the country they're in, but it needs to be made more comprehensive.ÃÂÃÂ   With the money we are hoping to raise, we'd also like to pay for another year of hosting (to keep us online) and to pay for some advertising to help reach potential users of the app.ÃÂÃÂ   We feel that the initial feedback and first year of the app being live has provided us with enough proof of concept to continue should we be able to raise the required funds to keep us online.ÃÂÃÂ   Going forward, we would like to raise awareness of dining culture across the world. There are so many cultural differences between nations and it's easy to offend accidentally. Whilst this may not bother some people, it's best avoided!ÃÂÃÂ   We collect non sensitive data from users, such as costs of meals in various locations and amount tipped in certain areas, which we are hoping to be able to utilise to provide a key insight into tipping cultures around the world. You could be part of that! :)  Thanks for reading!      Risks and challenges  The app is currently performing modestly across iOS and Android, but to take it to the next level we need to be able to make the changes mentioned above. We have a developer in-place, ready to make the changes and we don't foresee any issues with being able to get the app developed to where we need it to be. The main challenge comes with the advertisement and marketing of the app. On a small budget we need to be able to reach out to the right people to help us promote the app effectively. We have a long PR list which we plan to utilise to help ensure we get the most bang for our buck!

Blurb: Innovative Building Product
Creator_description: We are general builders looking to launch our proprietary clip. We have had meetings with retailers and big building companies and need to raise awareness of this product and demonstrate its need in the market.
Project_description: Introducing a fire retardant insulation board clip that doubles as a noggin without restricting the air void.   The new insulation retaining clip is the revolutionary way to insulate and erect ceilings in one operation. It was developed out of necessity and patented by a contractor with over 40 years trade experience. It has been endorsed by quantity surveyors, architects and tradesmen. Our problem was that 50-150mm urethane based insulation has to be friction fitted. But friction fit only works until air dries the timber member and releases the board allowing the 25mm air-gap to irritate the slab and cause drywall screw heads to pop. The main objective of our noggin or clip is to ensure that the 25mm air-gap is not blocked.      Risks and challenges  The costs have been calculated so that we get our tooling and everyone gets their order.

Blurb: Blockchain step by step instruction videos

Risks and challenges  Risks could be that people donÃÂÃÂ´t want to see women teach them about Blockchain.

Blurb: Track all your activities with easy-to-use paperless templates.
Creator_description: I am passionate in business models. Always translating any action to past, present and future numbers.As well, I do have a family to which I try to drive into my culture of numbers.
Project_description: "Start by doing what's necessary, then do what's possible; and suddenly you will be doing the impossible"  ÃÂÃÂ said Francis of Assisi.ÃÂÃÂ   With your support, Boostu360 is an attempt to make lives easier. Every day people spend hours trying to measure their fitness levels, compute their financial status, maintain their professional goals and make notes of hundreds and thousands of concerns, events or goals. Scribbling these thoughts and numbers on a piece of paper is often not enough to help them achieve the desired goals.ÃÂÃÂ   We joined hands to convert these thoughts into reality. ÃÂÃÂ With your help and support from Kickstarter, we want to bring a paperless solution, that not only will be easy to use, but also will organize information such that users can track their progress and chase their goals with much higher efficiency.ÃÂÃÂ   Boostu360 offers several templates for various different purposes. Users trying to lose weight can track their progress every single day along with their fitness partner(s). No more do they not have to start over several times a year due to lack of tracking. They can discontinue and get back on track anytime they want. Similarly, users can track their blood pressure several times a day and if required, take medicines and keep a record of every action and blood pressure levels. Being healthy will become so much easier.ÃÂÃÂ        Users can just feed in the data they measure into these templates and let the tool compute the results. It will effectively indicate how close is the user to the desired goals. No more worries of when and how to reach the goals. Our templates will take care of all calculations and present the information to the users in the most efficient way.ÃÂÃÂ        People often have a tough time planning their financial freedom, selecting the most suited loan option for home, education or vehicle loan purposes. Our templates will help them put all information in a clear way to be able to make the best decision according to their needs. Which loan interest, down payment or loan term will give the best return over a period of several years, will be very easy to decide.ÃÂÃÂ        There are several other templates for specific purposes that we created to help our users become more efficient. They can maintain their information, track activities and analyze their performances over time without worrying about lost data of the past. These templates are designed for plug & play usage, so there is absolutely nothing to setup or configure. Download the file and use it, and that too FREE of cost.ÃÂÃÂ    The later versions of the templates will also include Artificial Intelligence to be able to inform the users about the positives and negatives related to the progress tracked. In some cases, the templates will predict the short term future events and warn the users of the same, so they can take appropriate measures to stay in control of their health, finances, schedules or other relevant activities.ÃÂÃÂ     The big plans   This project is planned to empower as many users on this planet as it can. We have already made several templates available for download on the website. The templates are easy to use and are designed for plug & play usage so anyone can just browse the website and download the templates and start using it without any setup or configurations. Some files (seemingly complicated) have very clear and concise instructions to use it. The goal is to make more and more people use these templates and solve their day-to-day problems more efficiently. They can save several hours every week with these templates. There will be so many more templates available by the end of August 2019.ÃÂÃÂ   We intend to offer these templates at FREE of cost to everyone and help them become more productive not only at a professional level, but also at a personal level. We would like to empower our users to solve every small and big problems using a customized template. We are going to market these solutions through our users and visitors on site to have the maximum spread and visibility. People will be able to present these templates as gifts to their friends and families to make each other more productive and use the saved time for each other or chasing something more desirable.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ With Artificial Intelligence solutions on their way, the templates are set to make a much greater impact. By the first quarter of 2020, the AI powered templates will be a revolution for monitoring health records, managing financial possibilities and managing daily activities.ÃÂÃÂ     Why this project? ÃÂÃÂ   After helping several professionals and individuals solve these day-to-day problems of tracking and computing information, we joined hands to make this available for everyone. We realized our skills could be useful for the society at a much larger scale and here we are with this project trying to make an impact. We want people to focus on their goals rather than worrying about whether or not they will be able to achieve them. This project is an attempt to empower everyone with the ability to save time and become more efficient. And all this is done paperless! If successful, we will save hundreds of thousands of paper per year. With the growing risk of losing the green planet, this is our step towards helping our planet and its people. ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ We believe, this is all possible with your help and support from Kickstarter. The world is changing, let's be on the positive side of change, together!ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have taken care of the technical perspective and are motivated enough to make this solution available to a huge number of users. But, the financial restrictions and the marketing strategy are the two major risk areas for us. If we do not achieve our financial goal, our plan will shift focus and we will not be able to create the impact we desire. The marketing strategy also plays a vital role and if we do not execute the actions as planned, there will be definite lack of awareness and the impact will again be sacrificed. But we are ready to face the challenges with the possibility to overcome them with the funding we hope to achieve via Kickstarter.

Blurb: My invention is a slip on cover for wheelchair users to put on their wheels in order to have grip on ice and snow like snow chains.
Creator_description: I am a  husband and father of 2 with 3 beautiful grandchildren. I am also a retired veteran of 25 yrs. My career was spent mainly in supply and distribution as a supply technician managing an assortment of commodities. Since returning I have become disabled having lost a leg in feb2018.  I have spent many months using a wheelchair and now a prosthetic leg. Bit throughout the balance of my life I will continue to require a wheelchair at times. One day I found myself stuck alone in the back alley unable to move because of snow and ice. My wife was unable to push me . After finally getting help from a cab driver I set out to find a solution to this ongoing problem that everyone in wheelchairs has encountered thru winter conditions.  Hence enters Wint-o-Grip. The solution to every wheelchair users winter nightmare.
Project_description: Wint O Grip is a slip on slip off cover    Used for manual wheelchairs and scooters to enable users to have grip on ice ad snow during wintet   months. Presently people get stuck ÃÂÃÂ   d they cannot get around on snow and ice. Wint O Grip will solve this problem and give them the freedom to move around on snow covered and icy pathways, sidewalks, and parking lots.months. Presently people get stuck and thir wheels spin andy cannot get around on snow and ice. Wint O Grip will solve this problem and give them the freedom to move around on snow covered and icy pathways, sidewalks, and parking lots.  At present I am looking for funding to support a Patent application, a Website, and th first inventory of 500 sets. In addition funds received will also allow some marketing costs included.  It can be marketed on the Web, in medical Equipment supply outlets, seniors homes, Amazon, Hospital Gift shops and much more.  This product solves a huge problem worldwide for disabled persons and also temporarily disabld persons, elderly people on moblity scooters as well as they also spin on the snow and ice.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The only risk associated would be timeline deadlines due to shipping from china. I have given conservative estimates and should be on time. Present manufacturer is sending a market ready  sample of 1 each Studded and non studded. At this time I forsee low risk. My market audience are people who use manual wheel chairs and mobility scooters.  Wow....I received my sales samples from China in just 4 days. I now know that receiving the product should not be of any issue.   Ps....when I tried it in ice and snow it proved to be awesome. It's like having chains on my wheelchair.
