Creator_description: DiplÃÂÃÂ´mÃÂÃÂ© d'un Master en Gestion des Entreprises, Emeuric se lance trÃÂÃÂ¨s tÃÂÃÂ´t dans l'aventure entrepreneuriale. PassionnÃÂÃÂ© par le secteur du ferroviaire, il dirige le projet Spacetrain depuis 2017.
Project_description: Spacetrain is an autonomous and high speed shuttle, circulating on a monorail, lifted by air cushions, propelled by linear motors and powered by hydrogen. It is able to carry up until 250 passengers with an average speed of 500 km/h, and travel 150 km in less than 20 minutes.    Thanks to its low ÃÂÃÂ development cost, it could offer high speed travel to the most isolated areas, and is the best mobility solution between metropolises and medium-sized cities.     Emeuric Gleizes, CEO of the Spacetrain project    Today the Spacetrain project needs funds to finalize its "POC" (proof of concept),consisting in the construction of a monorail in our laboratory where a scale 1:2 demonstrator will be tested in the next months ÃÂÃÂ (Total value 3,5 million euros). This first prototype will be introduce to the public at the Paris Air Show in June 2019, then shown to the main partners in order to to continue this exciting adventure.                             More information about Spacetrain : ÃÂÃÂ                             The Spacetrain technology is the best compromise between three strategic priorities in transport innovation :  - Speed  - Development and building cost  - Environmental impact ÃÂÃÂ        Mainly based on the integration of proven solutions (linear motors, hydrogen fuel cells etc ...), Spacetrain technology perfects the levitation system of the mythical Aerotrain (70s): ÃÂÃÂ the air cushions.ÃÂÃÂ   Its unique onboard energy management system allows it to evolve on a "passive" infrastructure and therefore is more economical to develop and maintain than any other land guided high speed transportation.      Cliquer sur l'image pour plus d'information sur la technologie      Many partners already support this project :         More information ? You can consult :   - Our website :  https://spacetrain.fr/   - Our blog :  https://space-train.fr/blog/   - Press reviews :  2017-2018 :ÃÂÃÂ    https://space-train.fr/revue-de-presse-2018-semestre-2/    https://space-train.fr/revue-de-presse-2018-semestre-1/   2019 :   https://space-train.fr/revue-de-presse-2019-semestre-1/       Risks and challenges  The technology is mature, the project juste have to be tested in order to improve the energy consumption, reduce the noise level and increase the travelers comfort.

Blurb: Developing Vertical Take-off and Landing Aircraft of the Future
Creator_description: Mr. Marcus is a self-driven independent inventor/entrepreneur. He received his B.S. from University of Alexandria, Egypt. He has over 25 years of experience in the field of mechanical engineering and 5 years business management experience. He owns five U.S. patents in the fields of dynamic compressors, turbine engines, and automotive control systems. Mr. Marcus is the inventor of the currently proposed Compact Propeller Technology that will enable the production of a new type of VTOL Aircraft.
Project_description: We are an innovation driven startup company looking for your support to fund Phase I of the Research and Development of a lift generating mechanism that will enable the production of a new type of Vertical Take-off and Landing (VTOL) Aircraft expected to replace currently used Helicopters and small and medium sized Business Jets. ÃÂÃÂ        Our new type of VTOL Aircraft is expected to have lower production costs compared to conventional helicopters, while being easier to control, and cheaper to operate and maintain. In addition, this new type of Aircraft will be able to fly at speeds of up to 0.83 Mach, cruise at altitudes of up to 36,000 feet, and ÃÂÃÂ travel for up to 7,000 miles in one trip, which is not attainable by any of the currently in-use civilian VTOL Aircraft. Of course, we are not accounting here for few VTOL Aircraft used by the Army, as they have several operational challenges making them incompatible for civilian applications.  Our Technology  Due to the current high market demand for an Aircraft that can take off and land vertically like a helicopter, but can still go as fast, as high, and as far as a winged aircraft can go, several companies have been proposing various types of Aircraft that can do this. However, as all the proposed designs are based on modifications in already in-use technology, none of them provided the ideal solution for this quest, with most development projects being discontinued.       On the contrary, our proposed VTOL Aircraft will employ an innovative Compact Propeller to lift the aircraft. Our breakthrough compact propeller uses a novel low angle-of-attack propellers' layout that enables providing high disk loading (up to 250 pounds per foot square), paired with high hover lift efficiency (up to 20 pounds per horse power). This will enable positioning the compact propellers in ducts in the central part of the aircraftÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s fuselage, which will enable designing the aircraftÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s power train with less moving parts, when compared to a conventional helicopterÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s power train. This ÃÂÃÂ will make our VTOL Aircraft cheaper to produce and maintain, and less prone to accidents due to component failure. This will also allow for operating the aircraft at relatively higher speeds and altitudes, while avoiding the adverse effect of any surrounding wind that maybe encountered during the flight.       As our technology includes several IP information that is not covered by patent applications yet, we are not in a position to freely discus it openly as this will be considered public disclosure, which will limit our ability to protect it with patents later on.ÃÂÃÂ        Our Products  An ideal VTOL aircraftÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s propeller would be a propeller providing relatively high hover lift efficiency, preferably more than 15 pounds per horsepower, and high disk loading, preferably more than 200 pounds per square foot, to enable reducing the diameter of the propellerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s rotor, which will provide more flexibility in the VTOL aircraft design. Such propellerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s performance parameters can only be provided by using a propeller having a number of low angle-of-attack blades positioned in close proximity to one another.       However, due to the negative effect the low angle-of-attack blades have on the potential flow and pressure distribution of the working air at the leading edges of one another, so they need to be positioned apart from each other, resulting in a relatively low disk loading whenever low angle-of-attack blades are employed.  To overcome this challenge, our innovative technology provides a compact lift-generating propeller design that enables positioning the low angle-of-attack blades in close proximity to one another, while modifying the potential flow and the pressure distribution of the working fluid around the leading edges of the propeller blades to maximum the efficiency.       The feasibility of our technology was successfully assessed using the reputable Multi-Element Airfoil CFD Analysis tool developed by Hanley innovations, which is currently used by NASA and several other Aeronautical Research Centers.  Based on this assessment, our technology will enable the production of lift-generating Propellers providing a high hover lift efficiency of up to 20 pounds per horsepower, and high disk loading of up to 250 pounds per foot square. ÃÂÃÂ   These unique performance characteristics will enable decreasing the size of the lift-force generating propellers so that they can be ducted and placed in the middle part of the Aircraft's fuselage, which will enable flying the Aircraft at speeds of up to 0.83 Mach, and at altitudes of up to 36,000 feet, while providing marked reduction in the Aircraft's rate of fuel consumption.  Competitive Advantages  Once the development of our technology is complete, it will enable producing quieter Vertical Take-off and Landing (VTOL) Aircraft that are cheaper to produce and maintain, safer and easier to operate, and can fly at higher speeds and altitudes. Accordingly, once fully developed, it is expected to find application in all future VTOL Aircraft, and to boost the worldwide production in this sector.  The competitive advantages of our technology are as follows:   ÃÂÃÂ  Exceptional Fuel Saving Potentials:  Based on provisional performance calculations, employing the Compact propeller Technology within an aircraft will provide between 30-40% reductions in the aircraftÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s rate of fuel consumption. This will decrease the aircraftÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s operating costs, and extend its operating range, making it desirable for small and medium sized aircraft operators to use in their fleets.    ÃÂÃÂ  Vertical Take-off and Landing Super Plane:  Employing the Compact propeller Technology within an aircraft will enable it to take-off and land vertically, while maintaining all the competitive advantages a conventional winged aircraft has, i.e. being safer to fly and quieter to operate, can fly at speeds of up to 0.83 Mach, can cruise at altitudes of up to 36,000 feet, and can travel non-stop for up to 7,000 miles.    ÃÂÃÂ  Compatibility with ÃÂÃÂ Current Technologies:  Employing our technology in an already in-production aircraft model will necessitate minimal modifications to the aircraft design, so it can be adapted by aircraft manufacturers in their production lines at a minimal cost. This will also be justified by the expected high market demand for the Aircraft employing this technology.    ÃÂÃÂ  High Durability and Reliability:  Due to the simplicity of the design, rigidity of the structure, and the minimal number of moving parts within the Compact Propeller power train, we believe that Compact Propellers will be highly reliable with a service life similar to, or exceeding, that of other conventional aircraft power train parts.   Our MarketÃÂÃÂ   Once fully developed and introduced to the market, our innovative technology is predicted to answer the quest for an Aircraft that combines the advantages of Helicopters with those of winged Aircraft. So, in addition to being able to take-off and land vertically and to hover for extended time in the air, they will be able to go as fast as 640 mph (0.83 Mach), and to operate at altitudes up to 36,000 feet, will be cheaper to build, maintain and operate, easier to fly, and less prone to accidents due to pilot error or mechanical failure. These competitive advantages will enable building Aircraft that is better suited for many military and civilian applications.ÃÂÃÂ        Accordingly, once fully developed and introduced to the market, it is expected to find wide scale application in both the Helicopter Market and the Business Aircraft Market.   Helicopter Market:  Due their ability to take-off and land vertically, almost anywhere, without the need for a runway; their ability to fly lower and slower than airplanes or even hover for extended time in the air; their ability to carry payloads internally or externally via slings or winches; and their ability to reduce the travel time from one point to another while being able to go to places where no other means of transportation can go, Helicopters find wide scale application in many fields.ÃÂÃÂ   These markets include: military defense and surveillance; offshore oil and gas platforms and exploration; health emergency and medical services; law enforcement; VIP transport; and others, with over 55,000 Helicopters being currently in use worldwide, and with over 1,200 Helicopters being added annually to the civilian working fleets with a market value of over $1 billion.  As mentioned herein above, as our proposed new type of VTOL Aircraft combines the competitive advantages of Helicopters with those of winged Aircraft, it is expected to eat up a big portion of the Helicopters market share as it will provide Helicopter customers with a VTOL aircraft that is cheaper to buy, maintain and operate; easier to fly; can fly faster; and provides the safety and comfort of a winged aircraft. Accordingly, this proposed new type of VTOL Aircraft is expected to get more than 70% of the current Helicopters market share, with more than 1,400 units produced annually and with a net revenue of over $15 Billion/year.ÃÂÃÂ    Business jet Market:  Business Jet Aircraft are widely used worldwide as they are cost effective and a safe mode of travel. The ability to conduct business privately during flights, on-demand flight scheduling, reduced travel time and direct access to company sites are major benefits of these Aircraft.ÃÂÃÂ   On 1 April 2017, there were 22,368 business jets in the worldwide fleet. For the decade starting in 2017, Aviation Week predicts 11,346 deliveries of business aircraft (jets or not) valued at $250.1 billion, with a fleet growing from 31,864 aircraft to 36,702 aircraft (64% in North America): 4,838 more at an average annual growth rate of 1.6%, with 5,835 retirements.  Based on the competitive advantages of our new type of VTOL Aircraft, it is expected to eat up a portion of the Business Aircraft market share, as it will provide businessmen with an Aircraft that has all the advantages a conventional Business Aircraft has while being able to take-off and land vertically almost anywhere, which will relieve businessmen from the need to commute to a nearby airport to get on an Aircraft. Accordingly, this proposed new type of VTOL Aircraft is expected to get more than 30% of the current Business Aircraft market share, with more than 300 units produced annually and with a net revenue of over $7 Billion/year.ÃÂÃÂ        We believe our technology will boost worldwide production of Aircraft in these two sectors, as current Helicopter and Business Aircraft customers will tend to replace their fleets with safer, faster, and quieter VTOL Aircraft employing our proposed technology.  Research and Development Plan  The R&D work that needs to be done before this technology can be employed in future Vertical Take-off and Landing Aircraft is divided into three phases:   Phase I : during which technology feasibility will be conclusively assessed. The work performed in this phase will include:  ÃÂÃÂ· Designing and building a proof-of-concept prototype for the ÃÂÃÂ lift generating mechanism that will enable the production of the above mentioned new type of VTOL Aircraft.  ÃÂÃÂ· Preparing and submitting U.S. & PCT Patent applications.   Phase II:  during which an unmanned VTOL aircraft model employing this technology will be built and tested, while securing our IP rights in other countries.   Phase III:  during which a marketing campaign, aiming at licensing the technology to major Helicopter and Business jet aircraft manufacturers, will be executed.  Before launching this crowdfunding campaign we tried several funding routes, with all funding parties requesting a working prototype for the technology before investing in it.ÃÂÃÂ   We also submitted a proposal to the NSF through their Seed Fund program,  https://seedfund.nsf.gov/ . Although our proposal received positive technical reviews from the NSF experts, which they shared with us, the proposal was declined mostly due to funding unavailability.  Accordingly, we are looking for your support to fund Phase I of this R&D endeavor, after which we will be able to secure future funding from private sector investors.ÃÂÃÂ   Our CompanyÃÂÃÂ        Our company is currently located in the Technology Incubator of North Carolina State University (NCSU), which gives us direct access to the NCSU research community, facilities, and resources, from which we will recruit our consultants and workforce. For more information about our company please visit our website at  www.novoaerotech.com/.ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  The main challenge we have is securing the funding needed to build and test a proof-of-concept prototype for this technology. Although the feasibility of our technology was successfully assessed using the Multi-Element Airfoil CFD Analysis tool, developed by ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Hanley innovationsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, which is currently used by NASA and several other Aeronautical Research Centers, a proof-of-concept prototype needs to be built and tested for the conclusive assessment of the potentials of this technology.  The next challenge will be to secure funding from the private sector to further develop the technology, secure its IP rights, and market it. To overcome this challenge, we plan on seeking different routes to secure needed funding, such as Equity Crowdfunding and Angel Investors, once the proof-of-concept prototype is built and tested. Please support us on this endeavor and share this crowdfunding campaign with family and friends to enable us to get this unique technology out to the market in the near future.

Blurb: How Safe Is Your Environment?
Creator_description: My name is Maurizio Antolini and together with my coworkers we have a Dutch company registered in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands, and we are specialized in developing and designing electronic and mechanical equipment
Project_description: How much do you know about electromagnetic pollution?       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>ElectrosmogÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ describes the electromagnetic waves surrounding us in our environment. Electric and magnetic fields are invisible areas of energy (also called radiation).  At present, electromagnetic radiation, or electrosmog has become a problem of great concern to international public opinion .  As you sit watching TV, not only are there visible light waves from the TV striking your eyes, but also radio waves, transmitting from a nearby station, and microwaves carrying cellphone calls and text messages, and waves from your neighborÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s WiFi, and GPS units in the cars driving by.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   There is a chaos of waves from all across the spectrum passing through your room right now.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Electromagnetic Spectrum    The level of exposure to electrosmog that is harmful remains highly debated. However, numerous studies have provided us with sufficient data to support the conclusion that electrosmog  is  harmful. Additionally, many of these studies suggest that currently established limits for exposure are insufficient. Electromagnetic radiation may lead to the changes in physiological indices, genetic effects, and immune function and affect the health and immune function in people. Research has shown a direct correlation between exposure to electromagnetic radiation and cancer. Increased risk of brain, vestibular nerve and salivary gland tumors are associated with mobile phone use, or prolonged exposure to high intensity radio frequencies  Very few people feel the presence of electrosmog. It is invisible and its effects subtle. But now there are more and more sufferers, which react to high-frequency radiation, primarily, with physical pains. In almost all cases, the sensitivity begins with a dull feeling in the head, dizziness and lack of concentration. If you take the time to be aware of how you feel in different environments, however, you may see a correlation between how much youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re exposed and how you feel. Take the time, for example, to see how you feel over a period of time in a big city (high levels of exposure) versus how you feel in the country away from cell towers, Wi-Fi, high tension lines, and other sources of electrosmog.  The types of electrosmog which are particularly harmful are the high-frequency radiation fields created by cellular and cordless phones, cellular phone towers, Wi-Fi, and microwaves. Besides all this, what to think about the newly developed 5G cellular network? The electric field in the air will go from 6V/m to 61V/m, we will literally be surrounded by millimeter and submillimeter wave frequencies, and what are the consequences?     Also  on the  horizontal  plane  you  can see  significant  differences  in Volt/m,  caused  from the lobes of radiation of all the various antennas  fixed  on  the support pole    While of course you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t see electrosmog, there are some simple things you can take into account when considering how much you are exposed. For example, do I live or work near a cell phone tower, power station, or high voltage lines? What devices do I have in my house? Do I have Wi-Fi, cordless phones, baby monitors, etc.? Do I use a microwave oven?  ÃÂÃÂ  What is   SNIFFER ÃÂÃÂ®  ? ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             Therefore we created Sniffer, the Electrosmog Detector. Even though this device will not solve the problem of harmful radiation in your environment, it will however show you exactly where in your home or workplace you can find major concentrations of electromagnetic radiation. It is disturbing to see that only moving a few meters, high concentrations of radiation can suddenly disappear. This device allows you for example to discover if your microwave is leaking radiation because of a faulty door seal, to detect the presence of bugs, microspyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s or hidden video cameraÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s in your home or workplace, or it gives you the opportunity to re-arrange the furniture in your home, avoiding the continuous exposure to toxic radiation when you are sitting on the couch when watching tv, or to change the position of the beds in your childrenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s bedroom or the head end of your own bed, to protect their and your health and for a better nightÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s sleep, so you can feel rested and relaxed when you wake up.  Despite its small size, it has been designed taking advantage of the high sensitivity of the sensor, which is able to detect very weak signals which are amplified through a wideband monolithic amplifier with high dynamic range, capable of managing a frequency range up to 8GHz. This signal, once amplified will pass through a special circuit and converted into a visual and audible signal, i.e. a LED and a buzzer, with an intermittent variable according to the distance and the intensity of the detected signal.  We created two types of Sniffer; the small one, suitable for all, and the more sophisticated one. These two SNIFFERS, both portable, though performing the same functions, have different characteristics.  ÃÂÃÂ   SNIFFERÃÂÃÂ®  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ This Sniffer Is cylindrical, with the size of a key ring, and is powered by a 12 volt battery (not rechargeable). Its reception sensitivity is invariable and it is able to detect signals ranging from 100 MHz up to 8 GHz, at distances from 50 cm up to about 2 meters from, for example, cell phones, bugs, video cameras, routers, and wireless connections. Regarding the signals from radio towers and cell towers, although the simple Sniffer is not equipped with a sensitivity adjustment function, it is able to identify the exact location of major concentrations of radio frequencies.  The signal detected by the sensor will be amplified and modulated, therefore depending on the amplitude of the signal, the Led will be activated.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        The material of which the Sniffer is made (aerospace aluminum), provides a perfect shield for both the internal circuit and the external interference signals, but not for the signals that are detected by the sensor through a small internal antenna, but shielded from the circuit.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      It is powered by a 12V battery, not rechargeable, included in the kit     The case is entirely made and refinished in aerospace aluminum and brass, machining on the CNC from solid  ÃÂÃÂ   SNIFFER ÃÂÃÂ® PRO  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ The Sniffer PRO Is more sophisticated, besides having a sensitivity adjustment function, is equipped with an external antenna. It is also possible to mount other types of antennas , like the logarithmic models, with very high sensitivity.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        It is able to intercept even the weakest signals and operating the sensitivity potentiometer ÃÂÃÂ it is possible to detect signals over a distance of more than 10 meters (cell phones, bugs, video cameras, routers, and wireless connections), Regarding radio towers and cell towers, given its sensitivity, the Sniffer can inspect large areas and identify the locations where the antenna lobes release the highest RF concentrations.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ When it detects a signal, depending on the intensity, a bar LED lights up, and when the detected signal reaches its maximum amplitude, an intermittent acoustic signal is activated.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        The material of which the   SNIFFER    ÃÂÃÂ®   PRO   is made (aerospace aluminum) provides a perfect shield for both the internal circuit and the external interference signals.ÃÂÃÂ           It is powered by a lithium battery, rechargeable through the network or the computer; the kit includes the antenna, a network transformer and USB cable.    The case is entirely made and refinished in aerospace aluminum and brass, machining on the CNC from solid   Why Do People Need    SNIFFER   ÃÂÃÂ®ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ                            ÃÂÃÂ Two small precious instruments, indispensable safeguards for you and your children, to let you see and avoid the invisible dangers in your environment.   ÃÂÃÂ  Media Reviews ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ TIMELINE             Risks and challenges  If the Sniffer is successfully funded, we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. The funding raised on Kickstarter will be used for manufacturing of this new line.  We are confident that we can manage and supply our backers with all pledge rewards! We will personally be in charge of packaging and shipping once the campaign has ended.

Blurb: Support the creation of an e-learning platform around Digital Marketing to help people get an affordable education in this industry.
Creator_description: With over 10 yearsÃÂÃÂ´ experience in Digital Marketing, having worked in companies such as Google, Accenture, Ogilvy or Merkle, Sergio decided to launch Onservatory to help others get into this industry and democratize the education market.
Project_description: Why:    I still remember how I felt when I decided to get into the digital marketing space:   I didnÃÂÃÂ´t really know where to start.    The price of that masterÃÂÃÂ´s degree that I liked was unaffordable.    None of the online courses I did, met my expectations.   I was frustrated.ÃÂÃÂ   I had the time and I wanted to learn... but there was a huge gap between what the education market had to offer and what agencies & companies actually needed.  IÃÂÃÂ´ve been lucky enough to end up working for international companies such as Google, Merkle, Ogilvy or Accenture, but ten years later, I still see the same problems!  And thatÃÂÃÂ´s why I built Onservatory, to bridge the gap between "I want to do it" and " I did it".    How:    ÃÂÃÂ Click play to see how:                            We are suggesting something different than what is out there: a membership model.  This means, students will be able to try it out, see if this is what they are looking for and cancel anytime if it doesnÃÂÃÂ´t meet their expectations. Why taking the risk?   Our favourite feature is our roadmap , an interactive, proven, step-by-step plan that will act as a personal coach for all our students in order to design, set up, optimize and report all their digital marketing campaigns.ÃÂÃÂ        We understand people are busy, and thatÃÂÃÂ´s why we use a microlearning approach, where all our lessons are 5-10 minute long. This means students wonÃÂÃÂ´t need to compromise their day in order to learn about what they love, they can spend as much time or as little as they want!ÃÂÃÂ        LetÃÂÃÂ´s not forget weÃÂÃÂ´re talking e-learning here, since this is all online... the commute or rush hour wonÃÂÃÂ´t be an issue either! Can even study in your tablet why in bed... why not?    What:    We are making things simple. One membership where students will have access to everything:   ÃÂÃÂ  Our library:  We are planning to have courses around all Digital Marketing channels, a list that will always be growing and evolving, including SEM, Display, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Analytics, GTM, Data Studio... Why making students choose one?         ÃÂÃÂ  All our interviews  with the best experts in the market! We have interviews with companies such as Google, LinkedIn, Seedtag, Weborama, Zeotap, Experian, Neo, Verizon Media, Boomerang TV... and are planning to bring many more!         ÃÂÃÂ  All our materials:  WeÃÂÃÂ´re providing all kind of materials to make things easier for our students! From checklists, guides, step-by-step processes, templates, tools...          The investment:    In order to improve this industry, weÃÂÃÂ´d like to invite other talented marketers who are keen to cooperate and share their expertise to help us create new courses and interviews so we can democratize this education market.  Last but not least, we are keen to start working on new initiatives to keep improving the project and add extra value to everyone, such as building a community.  The funding will help us bring talented people, invest in new features and develop our project faster!      Risks and challenges  LetÃÂÃÂ´s face it: this industry changes on a daily basis. We need real experts to keep all courses updated and to develop new ones in order to bridge the gap between what agencies & companies might need and the education market.   Creating engaging courses requires time. ItÃÂÃÂ´s not just about the content, but also about the delivery: videos, animation, comments, downloadables materials, excercises, demos... The more people we get, the faster weÃÂÃÂ´ll be able to grow, and the more people weÃÂÃÂ´ll be able to help.

Blurb: Re-imagine Yourself.
Creator_description: Recent graduate and young entrepreneur willing to dedicate his time and effort for this project. Having ample knowledge and experience in business
Project_description: Smart Mirror is a mirror using LED technology that can virtually add to or change your real image. Designed to look like and be the size of a regular mirror, but can let you edit in real time to modify your image.  -Designed to look like and perform the function of a regular mirror, but also uses built in editing software to modify the "reflection."  -Can modify the reflection using LED technology; users can edit and modify their clothing, body composition, and make cosmetic facial changes.  -Edits designed to look realistic, using the same technology as the top image editing software.   -Uses touch-screen methods, or a phone app, to let users edit their image in real-time.  Our first milestone is to file a patent on this novel idea. With a pledge amount of 700$, we will cross our first milestone in making this project a reality,      Risks and challenges  the project itself: technology and budget.

Creator_description: My name is Robert Simpson and I am the founder of Slick Revolution. I started this journey back in August 2015 as all good business ideas start with some mates over a pint.I first saw an electric skateboard when I was on holiday in Surfers Paradise down the East coast of Australia. I loved them and from that point on I knew I wanted to start my own business and get involved in this awesome industry.I did a ton of research and bought about 5 electric skateboards from different companies. There wasnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t a lot out there really, just a few companies with expensive eboards and a lot of companies with really cheap eboards.I read up online on the big brands out there and what was on offer. I tested the hell out of all the boards I bought and came up with these conclusionsIf you want a quality eboard you need to spend well over ÃÂÃÂ£1200. (plus import costs and shipping)Any eboard less than this was generally poor quality and did not live up to the claimed mileage and speed.ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s lots of companies out there outside the UK and EU but not many at all right here.I knew what I had to do. If I wanted to stand out in the market, I would need to source eboards to retail for between ÃÂÃÂ£500 and ÃÂÃÂ£900 whilst still maintaining the quality of the more expensive eboards. As our second kickstarter we are back and bigger than ever with our latest range of eboards.

Chunky Rough Stuff Wheels for easy cruising on poor tarmac    Swap out the Rough Stuff Wheels for Road Wheels    Flexible deck for a comfortable ride    Swap out the deck easily for new designs    Advanced flexible battery case for an evenly weighted and flexible eboard    Great performance and specificationÃÂÃÂ     Unrivalled ride comfort    12 month warranty as standard          ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ            ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          Missed out on the Kickstarter? Pre-order the Flex-Eboard hereÃÂÃÂ  https://www.slickrevolution.co.uk/product/flex-eboard-2/          ÃÂÃÂ          Rough Stuff Wheels  Greater size, knobbly tread, no punctures for aÃÂÃÂ smooth ride overÃÂÃÂ roughÃÂÃÂ terrain.   Swap between Rough Stuff Wheels and road wheels  85A hardness - smooth ride and hardwearing  110mm diameter - cruise over lumps and bumps  Convex design for less resistance on smooth and more grip on rough terrainÃÂÃÂ   Polyurethane material- no punctures or hassleÃÂÃÂ           ÃÂÃÂ          Each set of Rough Stuff Wheels comes with 2 x Sprockets/Pulley Wheels to mount on to a standard 35mm bearing. Each Pulley has 40 teeth.ÃÂÃÂ          The convex design allows for less rolling resistance on flat, with the Rough Stuff Wheel running in the centre 20mm. When you take to rougher stuff the rest of the wheel comes in to play offering superior grip.       ÃÂÃÂ          Advanced Flexible Battery Case Design   Rides just like a normal longboard with a flexible deck. Better weight distribution, more stable, smoother and grounded ride  Protected, bash proof, dust proof and water resistant design  Removable battery case and easy connectors  'Bolt-on' designÃÂÃÂ to change decks with minimal hassle  On-board LED battery level display  USB output for charging any tech and the wireless controller  Slim design for greater ground clearance and sleek look          ÃÂÃÂ          Deck Choice  Bamboo Deck  Symmetrical rounded shape with central cutouts for more torsional flex and a more grounded ride. Made from several bamboo layers this deck is flexible and responsive.  Carbon Composite Deck  This smooth responsive deck is the perfect partner to the Rough Stuff wheel.	Made from 7 plys of premium Canadian maple fused with a multi layer carbon fibre matrix providing unrivalled ride and control. Toe heel concave to lock your feet for stability while the flexible cambered deck soaks up bumps at any speed.ÃÂÃÂ          How it works  The subtle positive camber when compressed by the riders weight tensions the mono directional fibres of the carbon matrix producing a smooth and progressive flex that absorbs larger bumps and shocks like the springs of a car.ÃÂÃÂ   X tow configuration of carbon fibre in the nose and tail ensures tight responsive turning and control at speed.ÃÂÃÂ   Then combine these ultra thin layers of carbon fibre with premium Canadian rock maple laminate and its high density absorbs higher frequency harmonic vibration for a less fatiguing ride. Many solid eboard decks, especially with hub motors are a real bone shaker to ride.  Level riding technology. This deck rides flat whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re 60kg or 120kg as Carbon Fibre can only stretch to 110% of its original length.  Carbon Composite Deck vs Full Carbon  Carbon fibre is very very strong under tension. So it allows flex but adds a great amount of strength to a deck when used in conjunction with layers of maple. So our Carbon Flex-E has a layer of Carbon Fibre on its underside with cross strands running underneath this.  A full Carbon deck cannot flex at all as as soon as you add a camber or concave the structure becomes rigid and can only snap, not flex.  Ever seen a picture of a Carbon Fibre bicycle which has snapped? Carbon Fibre cannot resist impact very well at all. Carbon fibre once set in epoxy resin cannot be repaired. Its strength lies in its tensile strength. The Carbon Flex-Eboard adds a carbon layer to save weight and add a whole new dimension of awesomeness.         ÃÂÃÂ Missed out on the Kickstarter? Pre-order the Flex-Eboard hereÃÂÃÂ  https://www.slickrevolution.co.uk/product/flex-eboard-2/          ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ          Wheel Choice  Whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re taking to the rough UK roads or a smooth track, choose the best setup for the terrain.    Swap between Rough Stuff Wheels and road wheels in just a couple of minutes  Ride to your style, terrain and comfort  The Flex-Eboard's drive sprocket is compatible with our wheels as well as ABEC 11 flywheels and many others on the eboard market          Multi Grip Deck  Traditional or Goofy, your feet will perfectly grip the coarse layers of grip tape.   Coarser grip tape than most eboards for a more secure and grippier ride  Carbon inspired design with 120-degree angle         Powerful Electric MotorsÃÂÃÂ   The 2 x 1200W motors give plenty of power for riders up to 120kg and gives great hill climbing ability.   Fast Acceleration  Huge torque  15% hill climb ability   ÃÂÃÂ          Missed out on the kickstarter? Pre-order here:ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.slickrevolution.co.uk/product/flex-eboard-2/          USB Port and Battery Display   Charge your tech on the goÃÂÃÂ    Charges any device via USB cable as well as the wireless remote control  On-board battery display in 20% increments. Can be used when Flex-Eboard is off          Protected Lithium Ion (Li+) Battery  Safe and Certified   Protected from overcharging and overheatingÃÂÃÂ   Slightly more powerful than our other eboards at 26V, 196Wh          Riding Modes  The Flex-Eboard has 3 riding modes:   Fun Mode   Learning to ride for the first time? This mode reduces the top speed to just below half of maximum. Run in to trouble or want to jump off? At 10mph youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be perfectly safe. Top Speed in Fun Mode: 10mph (16km/h)   Thrill Mode   When youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re ready to take things to the next level. Greater acceleration and up to the maximum speed for real adrenaline action. Top speed in Thrill Mode: 22mph (35km/h)   Cruise Mode   With a click of the hand controller, stay at any speed with no need to use the controller, simply brake to deactivate. Easy to use and saves energy, increasing range.   ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ        HUB VS BELT DRIVEÃÂÃÂ   A belt driven eboard has the motor mounted outside the motor with a belt connecting the motor and wheel with a sprocket.  A hub motor has the motor mounted inside the wheel with no need for a belt.ÃÂÃÂ   Belt Drive  Our belt drive system allows for interchangeable wheels and of course a full polyurethane wheel for a more comfortable ride and greater customisation.ÃÂÃÂ   The 3:1 gear ratio offers so much more torque than a hub motor of the same power.ÃÂÃÂ Faster acceleration, better hill climbing ability and power over rough terrain where hub motors are left in the Flex-Eboard's dust.         Hub Drive  With just a few mm of Polyurethane separating the motor and the riding surface, hub motors don't provide a very comfortable ride on anything but the smoothest of roads.  Yep, we admit, hub motors are more discreet and look great.  If you prefer the look of a hub motor then thats fine, but if you prefer more torque, acceleration and complete customisation then belt drive is the way forward.         In each Flex-Eboard box you will find:   A Flex-Eboard with the deck of your choice  A set of 4 Rough Stuff Wheels on the Eboard  A set of 4 Road Wheels  Wireless Remote Control  Certified Adaptor and Plug (with UK, European or US plug)  USB to micro USB Cable  Eboard spanner and Allen Key  Carry Bag  Full instruction Manual          Timeline         Our Story  Why we are different  Slick Revolution have been designing and retailing electric skateboards in the European market place for just over 2 years.ÃÂÃÂ We are electric longboardÃÂÃÂ geeks. ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s just nothing quite like them and thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s nothing quite like ours.ÃÂÃÂ   We have our production line set up to go in to manufacture as soon as the kickstarter project reaches its target. We have a great relationship with our manufacturers in China as well as feet on the ground over there. Our internal PCBÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s, wireless control and technical aspects have all been tested extensively, not only by our team but you guys, our awesome customers in our current range of eboards.ÃÂÃÂ   We have feedback from all of our customers which have led us to this design. Skaters, long boarders and eboarders have all chipped in to create exactly what the eboard market is missing.  The new elements of the new design are aesthetic and practical and so itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a re-design of a proven model essentially.Many Kickstarter projects (particulary some US eboard ones) do succeed and reach their target but very often do not come to fruition as those running the campaign have very little manufacturing knowledge. So many Kickstarters fall down at this last hurdle with no prior knowledge of where to go at this point.  Why the Flex-Eboard is different  Lots ofÃÂÃÂ eboard manufacturersÃÂÃÂ are moving towards integrated battery decks which is fine, but that's where the Flex-Eboard is different.An integrated battery means you lose the flexibility of the deck, plus youÃÂÃÂ are stuck with one deck design.ÃÂÃÂ   Plus we have chosen not to move to Hub motors for a few reasons.   They have poor torque whereas the Flex-Eboard is geared up in a 3:1 ratio.  They have a tiny thickness of PU wheel on the outside of the hub motor. This reduces the ride to a bone shaking experience on anything but a perfect surface.  Our customers can upgrade motors in the future when more powerful ones become available. No need for a whole new expensive hub motor.ÃÂÃÂ    Our innovative battery case is flexible and 'bolt-on' style meaning you have a flexible more grounded ride and you aren't tied to a single design. It's really easy to swap the deck in the future and means that customisation is endless.  We've also developed Rough Stuff polyurethane wheels which are far more suitable for UK and European roads. We're not calling them 'Off-Road' wheels as our aim was to give a more comfortable ride on Multi-Terrain. Which for most people is poor quality tarmac and light gravel paths. We also wanted to offer the choice, so designed our wheels to fit a standard 35mm bearing and 6 prong sprocket so it can fit ABEC 11 Flywheels and many other brands too.ÃÂÃÂ   To date we have sold over 500 electric longboardsÃÂÃÂ and have our electronics perfected. So no teething problems or connection issues to worry about with our new design. We have it tested, re-tested and tested it again. Not on a bench in a workshop but by all of our current customers riding all over the world.  Why we need your helpÃÂÃÂ   In all manufacturing, there are discounts for larger quantities. With guaranteed orders at these quantities, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be able to keep the price low and create supply chains to allow us to get the Flex-Eboard to customers around the world. We have finalised the Flex-Eboard design, formed partnerships and have a solid production plan in place. To ramp up production we need your help to pay for expensive moulds in order to produce on a mass scale. Then we can increase production and bring the costs down.ÃÂÃÂ   Thank you for all your support. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re looking forward to seeing Flex-Eboard being ridden all around the world. ÃÂÃÂ         Stretch Goals  Once our kickstarter target of ÃÂÃÂ£10,00 has been met, these are our stretch goals. Reach these and we will be able to offer the following:       ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    SAFETY  The Flex-Eboard is an electric skateboard. You should learn at slow speeds in Fun mode before moving to Thrill Mode. Always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear in case anything happens. Ride within your limits and read our full instruction manual before using the Flex-Eboard.ÃÂÃÂ   LEGALITY  Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric skateboards, vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.  FAQ's   Q: I am not livingÃÂÃÂ in the UK, can I buy a Flex-Eboard?   A: We ship to the UK, EU Countries and the US. Check each pledge for the total shipping costs.ÃÂÃÂ    Q:ÃÂÃÂ Can I use normal road style wheels on the Flex-Eboard?   A: Yep, it's compatible with both flat road and our Rough Stuff Wheels. The sprockets mounts on to 35mm bearings and can fit on ABEC 11 Flywheels.   Q: Can I mount the Rough Stuff Wheels on another eboard or board?   A: Absolutely. Each set of Rough Stuff wheels comes with a 2 drive sprockets to mount on a standard 35mm bearing, as well as 2 belt drive covers.   Q: Does my Flex-Eboard come with a warranty?   A: Each Flex-Eboard comes with a 12 month warranty against manufacturers defects. For full Warranty information check out our Warranty section at www.slickrevolution.co.uk   Q: Is the Flex-Eboard waterproof?   A: It's water resistant which means that you can ride on wet ground, however if water is splashing up then thats too wet. 5 minutes of drizzle to get home will be ok too. It is electrical at the end of the day so just be careful near water.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: What could I do if my Flex-E runs out of battery?   A: Just like a normal longboard or skateboard you can ride without power. There is some slight resistance from the motors but it isn't too much at all.   Q: Can I bring the Flex-Eboard on aeroplanes or check-in?   A: Since ÃÂÃÂ  the recent issues with Hoverboards and Samsung Galaxy Note 7's most airlines are very cautious and as a general rule most will not allow batteries above 100Wh. The Flex-Eboard's batteries are 194Wh.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: What is the return policy ?   A: Don't worry! We get you here! We have 14-Day Satisfaction Guaranteed.ÃÂÃÂ We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchases. Orders are fully refundable at any time prior to shipping. If youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not happy with the product within 14 days, simply return it back to us for a full refund. *Items returned for refund must be returned within 14ÃÂÃÂ days from delivery.ÃÂÃÂ   Under no circumstances will we issue refunds after 14ÃÂÃÂ days of delivery.*Customers are responsible for shipping costs for all return claims and are subject to restocking fee of 20% if the eboard has been ridden or are not in store bought condition with packaging in new, sellable form.   Q: What does the 12 month Warranty cover?   A: Our twelve month warranty covers all manufacturers defects. If you have a problem with your Flex-eboard due to a manufacturers defect we will arrange pickup for free and repair the eboard as soon as we can within the UK, then send it back out to you. For other countries we will send out spare parts based on a diagnosis of the issue. We also offer a repair service for eboards which are damaged or broken due to user negligence or accidents.   Q: What is the maximum user weight of the Flex-Eboard?   A: 120kg or 265lbs is our recommended maximum user weight.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: ÃÂÃÂ I'm closer to the top end of the weight limit, will I get the same performance?   A: Our performance spec's are based on an 80kg rider on smooth tarmac. If you weight heavier than this you won't achieve the same ranges or quite touch the top speed however with the torque of the 2 x 1200W motors riders up to 120kg won't be far off.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: I'm new to Kickstarter, what are the stretch goals?   A: Once we have reached our goal of ÃÂÃÂ£10,000, the project has succeeded and production will begin. The stretch goals are further targets which would allow us further production of Rough Stuff Wheel colour options at ÃÂÃÂ£50,000 and a new style controller at ÃÂÃÂ£75,000. We also have an exciting option at ÃÂÃÂ£250,000. If we are lucky enough to reach that goal we will of course release more details about it.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: Where are the Flex-Eboards shipping from?   A: The Flex-Eboard is manufactured in China after which they will be shipped to the UK. After further quality control checks by our team they will then be shipped to you, our awesome backers! Once they arrive in the UK shipping to the US and Europe will take around 2 weeks.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: Once I have backed the Flex-Eboard, what happens then?   A: No money will leave your account until we have reached our goal and the project has therefore succeeded. We will keep you updated about production, manufacturing, shipping and all the important things that you want to know, right here on this page.   Q: The kickstarter has reached its goal, now what happens?   A: Funding continues above 100% and we aim to reach the stretch goals at ÃÂÃÂ£50k ÃÂÃÂ£75k and ÃÂÃÂ£250k. Keep backing us for more releases! ÃÂÃÂ     Q: What if theres a delay in production?   A: We have built in to our predicted shipping time, buffer periods to allow for any delay at every stage from manufacture of the moulds to shipping. If however there is a delay we will notify you immediately and keep you well up to date on any change in the timescale.  Missed out on the kickstarter? Pre-order here:ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.slickrevolution.co.uk/product/flex-eboard-2/    ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  Slick Revolution is prepared to begin production of the Flex-Eboard at the conclusion of this campaign, however, with the release of any product, there may be unforeseen obstacles that could prevent us from getting certain elements of the product just right. As we strive to provide you with the ultimate user experience and would not feel comfortable releasing any product until it is perfect, there is always the possibility of delays.  We promise to do our best to keep you as up to date as possible on any and all Flex-Eboard related developments and are working to reduce as many issues as possible before the Flex-Eboard and Rough Stuff Wheels official release.

Creator_description: The invention of this product combines experts from nano-technology and aquaculture. Dr. Lian, the patent holder, is an achieved professor in the field of nano-material. He put great effort in studying the features of this nano-material, which opened the door for applications. Dr. Hu, the founder of PrettyWater Solutions LLC, took great interest in this material's unique clarifier features in water. Being an aquaculturist and fish biologist, Dr. Hu projected the revolutionary future of this cutting-edge nano-material. This product, Crystal Orb, will be the first application in aquarium; more exciting inventions will follow.
Project_description: New materials have been changing our lives. Countless innovations already make daily life easier: silicone bakeware, ceramic knives, corian chopping boards, etc.. Finding fresh applications for a new material is as exciting as inventing it.  Crystal Orb is the first application of this patented nanomaterial ( US 9574136 B2 ) in ornamental culture.  The unique water clarifying features of Crystal Orb will benefit hobbyists, culturists and aquarium owners.     Crystal Orb in aquarium    ÃÂÃÂ        An aquarium is an artificial environment that requires careful balance of the already-skewed trophic structure, because of the artificial nutrition source (feed) and semi-intense culture condition (density of animals). ÃÂÃÂ      The role of microbe in aquarium    Most of the time, the aquarium nurtures a large number of invisible organisms which are largely responsible for some of the muddy appearances and fish sickness. To meet the high appearance standards of home decoration, microorganisms need to be strictly controlled.       One of the most common methods of controlling microbes is chemical treatment. The aquarium and aquaculture industry has relied on chemical salts and synthesized antibiotics because those treatments are accessible. The direct consequence:  aquarium water becomes a "soup" of chemicals; and discharging aquarium water is pouring chemicals into the soil. ÃÂÃÂ This abuse not only leads to negative environmental impact, but also slowly reinforces the "addiction" of chemical use.  Crystal Orb is intended to stop this.        The most common and effective routine of aquariums is water change. Monthly water change is almost required regardless of the condition of the water. Especially with antibiotic treatments, the frequency of water treatment is as high as 3 times a week. With Crystal Orb, the water change can be dramatically reduced.  A bucket less water change is a bucket of water saved!  For a home aquarium (20-gal), Crystal orb can help save 60-100 gallons per year!ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Predicted water save on a 20-gal home aquarium    ÃÂÃÂ        Crystal Orb adapted the nanomaterial that maintains its physical form while under water. That means:  no soluble chemical!  Through the oxidation-reduction reactions on the surface, the Crystal Orb creates a "sterile zone" that eliminates all single cell organisms upon contact. With water flow and physical filtration, the entire water body can be sterilized and dead cells will be removed. With these qualities,  Crystal Orb is the perfect alternative to your current water clarifier, algaecide, anti-fungi and antibiotics combined! ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             To make sure Crystal Orb will have satisfying performance, we tested different conditions and scenarios in the past 3 years.   Many milestone results are posted in the Gallery section. Be sure to check them out!         Avoiding routine chemical addition is also a huge advantage in time management. Normal chemical treatments require routinely additions on a weekly basis, or bi-daily treatments for fish antibiotics. Comparatively, Crystal Orb follows a  one-time  1-2-3 protocol:  1. remove the Crystal Orb from its package; 2. rinse it with water for 30 sec; 3. place it into the aquarium (preferablyÃÂÃÂ near the filter).  Once the Crystal Orb is in,  NO MORE TREATMENTS . The microorganism associated symptoms will not bother you forÃÂÃÂ  6 months  (  one Crystal Orb for 15-gal indoor aquariumÃÂÃÂ or 7.5-gal outdoor aquarium  ).     Crystal Orb can attach to aquarium wall using suction cup    ÃÂÃÂ      place the Crystal Orb near filter for best performance    ÃÂÃÂ        Economically, despite the costly production of the new nanomaterial, this version of Crystal Orb still manages to be competitive to all alternative products.ÃÂÃÂ      Crystal Orb is a worthy investment    Routine use of major brand chemical treatments can cost $80-$240/yr for a 15 to 20-gal aquarium; a set UV lights costs a minimum of $60 with constant electricity bill; a pair of Crystal Orbs only cost $35. Therefore,  choosing Crystal Orb is a money-saving decision.        ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ      Each box contains two Crystal Orbs!    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        The nanomaterial will lose its capability of balancing ion composition eventually. That is why this product has an optimal usage duration of 3-6 months and a shelf-life of 3 years.  The good news is: the nanomaterial is rechargeable!  The recharged nanomaterial will function the same and the cost is substantially lower.ÃÂÃÂ   As we are preparing the Kickstarter campaign, we are also designing the future logistics of the recycling and recharging service for retail market (products in-use for 6 months). Those strategies will include  mail-in used product for rebate  and  subscription service for continuous exchange .  We want toÃÂÃÂ bring less trash to the environment and more savings to all users. ÃÂÃÂ What a Win-Win!  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Scientific excellency has been our primary focus during all tests and development. Great efforts have been invested to ensure the safety and efficacy of each every product, no matter to the users or to the cultured animals. We have tested marine and fresh-water finfish and crustaceans. However, the aquarium industry has many diverse demands. Rare and exotic species enter the market all the time. Despite our confidence, there are many ornamental species such as jellyfish, coral and molluscs that have not yet been tested. Please apply Crystal Orb with caution. Also, if you are interested to help us expand the list of species that are comfortable with Crystal Orb, we encourage and welcome you to contact us with your experience.  The development stage is the most time-consuming stage, and that is all behind us. With the current production scale, the produced nanomaterial can already supply a medium-size market. With assembly and QC inspection, we will manage to fulfill the orders on time. We are as eager as you are to have Crystal Orb in your aquarium!  For any unforeseeable challenges, we will keep you updated. Thank you for your support!

Creator_description: I am 30 years old from the Bronx , I was born in the Dominican Republic brought to the United States at the aged of 7. All my life I been a hard working men and today I am happily married and working on changing the world with Pay-ometric.
Project_description: With your pledge get this wireless terminal with every feature ( Biometrics , Magstripe , EMV chip , NFC contactless.       Our POS will be accessible for every type of business. Wireless terminal with long lasting battery and a strong secure WiFi connectivity. Be one of the first to receive it by making a pledge of 400$ or more                                ÃÂÃÂ Funds raised will help on the development of ÃÂÃÂ our mobile app for androids and iphones. Funds will also go to the development of our payment portals that give the option to pay with credit card cards, mobile apps, and fingerprints (Payometric).ÃÂÃÂ   This new way to make a purchase is very important to me and to about 38 million ÃÂÃÂ consumers who are victims of credit card frauds yearly. I been a victim multiple times and I thought how can we make this stop. The major problems is that credit cards information is easily stolen. It could be stolen at a restaurant, movie theatre, Bar or clubs, gas stations, etc. We are so trusted on handling our credit cards that we forget that someone could just write down the numbers display on the front of the card! That's all it takes.  With your help I will create a mobile app where you could store your fingerprints for the sole purpose of using it to make a purchase. I will create a database system with the best security.ÃÂÃÂ      mobile app welcome home page        Payometric system     After the mobile app is build we will have a database that will be link to our payment portals where you securely will place your fingers to complete the transactions.      Risks and challenges  People will  be skeptical at first with using their biometrics as a form of payment.  I know there will be questions like "is my fingerprints used for something else?" how secure Payometric is compared to other companies?.  My answer is Payometric, will  be the most secure form of payment around the world, over pasing cash. It is scientifically proven that everyone has a unique set of fingerprints. There's should only be one with access to your fingerprints and your finances, (YOU). The technology of fingerprints it's already here! We use it to unlock our phones, to unlock our apps. Therefore we could overcome the skepticism and fears of using out biometrics, for a better way to  complete a transaction.

Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                                                 Thanks to the use of innovative bone conduction technology and a microphone, you can listen to just about anything youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d normally be able to listen to on your phone or through headphones by simply bringing your finger to your ear. This includes social and email notifications, audio and text messages and even phone calls.  The getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ bracelet decodes sound waves and converts them into vibrations that can be received directly by your earÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s cochlea without the use of your eardrum. GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ also has advanced vocal coordination to make interactions with vocal assistants, like Alexa, Siri and Google, easier than ever.  With getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, your voice is completely in control.            GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ uses biometric tracking to monitor your physical activity and generate statistics like the amount of calories burned and if you should spend more or less time exercising. It is perfect for those who like to run, bike, canoe or take fitness classes. GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ uses that biometric data to notify you when itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s time to do routine functions such as drink water or take a quick activity break.  GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ also tracks your sleep cycles and can notify you when itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s time to wake up or go to sleep. Our technology merges your sleep activity with your biometric parameters, allowing you to always be at your best.            GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ provides completely secure contactless payments using NFC technology and your biometric fingerprint authentication for each transaction. Customizable to your specific needs, our device works with all networks.  Credit card details are safely stored inside your wristband, so pickpocketers canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ them out. In addition, getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ provides unfasten detection, which auto locks credit cards and personal info when the bracelet is taken off. No one can use your getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, but you do have the ability to set up multiple users.            Because getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have a touch-display or buttons, it uses gesture recognition to interpret your instructions. This gesture control feature allows getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ to control specific mobile apps. Unique motion sensors allow you to switch between songs, power your smart TV on or off, adjust your Alexa volume or even flip channels.  GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ uses haptic vibrations, sounds, and LED signals to provide personal, discrete feedback and notifications to you. Feedback is especially useful when communicating navigation directions. Whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re driving, running, hiking or biking, getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ can help you get you there. For example, the band will vibrate once to tell you to turn right and two times to let you know to turn left.            GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ introduces an Italian-inspired product that uses an innovative, clean and environmentally friendly welding process. The bracelet is uniquely made with hi-tech fabrics to be seamless, ultralight, and waterproof up to 10 meters deep. We used an original, patented technique to make several layers of durable, laminated fabric into one perfect band.  The battery lasts up to five days on a single charge and takes only one hour to fully charge. Simply drop it on its wireless dock, and youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be good to go in no time.                                          O2Forest  is an Italian company that deals with environmental services, eco-sustainable purchases and renewable energy. Through their projects, they commit to restoring man and nature balance in a modern perspective. O2Forest strives to turn everyday habits into eco-sustainable opportunities and projects for everyone. For the first time, people have an effective, simple, fun and environmentally friendly tool that can change the world without too many sacrifices.ÃÂÃÂ                    You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                    You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             I'm Edoardo Parini, the founder of getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢. As a previous media and interaction designer and current product manager, it is my goal to enhance the relationship between human beings and technology.  GetÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ was my project diploma at ECAL in 2015. My focus was on Human-Machine Interface ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> I was not satisfied with existing smartwatches, their usability, and their excessive costs. I tested several different interactive installations and bone conduction was by far the most intriguing and influential. Soon after acknowledging that I wanted to use bone conduction technology in my device, I watched a remarkable video of gesture recognition ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> I had to find a way to incorporate this additional technology. I decided the wrist/hand area would be an ideal space to exploit gesture recognition and bone conduction together. I started prototyping and before I knew it, the first version of getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ was born.              We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ a reality.ÃÂÃÂ   We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t give a dollar or purchase a getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!ÃÂÃÂ                     Risks and challenges  There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re completely prepared to bring getÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ to you, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be the first to know.

Project_description: The touchpad access is faster and more convenient than getting up to flip a switch, open your mobile app or even call out to a smart home voice assistant. Its upgraded mobility puts your devicesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> control at your fingertips and in the palm of your hand, making them readily accessible whenever you need them.  The touchpad is illuminated with status icons that give you the whole picture without the need to login into a mobile application. After a short period of inactivity, these icons turn off making the touchpad a good bedside companion. The touchpad also has a configurable nightlight feature that conveniently turns on automatically in low ambient light to help you find your way.ÃÂÃÂ        The Smart Plug 2.0 touchpad even comes with a soft lock, which can be activated or deactivated from the touchpad or the mobile app. This helps prevent accidental operation and makes it more difficult for children to tamper with.                 The wall plug controls the delivery of the AC power to the connected device, powers the touchpad and responds to its control signals. The wall plug is easy to set up and even easier to use. Because it is connected to the touchpad through a thin cord, you simply plug it into any standard U.S. electrical outlet, plug in your electrical device, then control your device via the tabletop touchpad, mobile app or smart home voice assistant!  You have the flexibility to place the wall plug in any electric wall socket and in tight spaces without sacrificing control and reach of the touchpad, or fear of encountering Wi-Fi dead zones.  The wall plug also protects you and your connected valuable electronic device from unsafe elevated electrical current with its built in fuse.                      The iRealm mobile app is the perfect companion to the iRealm Smart Plug 2.0 model. It enables the remote control of your Smart Plug 2.0s and unleashes their true potential.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ The iRealm mobile app allows multiple users to control lighting settings of their different devices if the touchpad is not within reach. It is user-friendly and compatible with iOS and Android devices.                                            You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Kasmieh has always loved to design and build appealing and user-friendly applications and devices. He also has a talent for simplifying complex problems and getting teams of various sizes and talents to work together to achieve common goals. At times it wasn't easy, but ultimately his passion and ideas persevered. Now he builds and sells unique, useful smart home products.ÃÂÃÂ   Kasmieh created iRealm out of necessity to make life easier for everyone.
