Blurb: We want to create a safe and supportive community for new mums navigating through stigma and finding comfort together in hard times.
Creator_description: I am passionate about sharing valuable information about valuable moments in life and busting 'wives-tales'.
Project_description: There is no doubt that becoming a Mommy and Daddy is one of the most memorable times of ones life. ÃÂÃÂ It is also without a doubt potentially one of the most challenging with all the changes in schedule and lifestyle. ÃÂÃÂ   MommyPouch is here because we believe that there are tons of "advice", both medically and not that are based mostly off both incorrect experience and "old-wives" tails. ÃÂÃÂ   Couple this with changing technology in many aspects and we have ourselves some huge contradicting and misleading information.ÃÂÃÂ   We are not trying to discount medical advice in any way but we simply want to create a network and platform for Mommies to come together and share all things Mommy- and Daddy-hood. ÃÂÃÂ   One such example is the enormous stigma that seems to surround Mommies that are formula-feeding their little ones. ÃÂÃÂ Now although we 100% agree that breastmilk is the best nutrition, we all have to agree that it is not always possible. ÃÂÃÂ Not only just by lifestyle but also through some Mommies not being able to Breast-feed. ÃÂÃÂ There are tons of reports of Mommies being told that they are bad Mommies because they are formula feeding without taking into account the fact that they just cannot breastfeed.  Along with debunking stigma, our Platform is also aimed at bringing Mommies together and providing a safe and supportive community for them to thrive in. ÃÂÃÂ We understand that not all Mommies face the exact same difficulties with relationship differences, Finance differences and even complications, bringing Mommies and Daddies together will go a very long way.   Right now we are working on our website that will be aimed at some massive content surrounding all things Mommies and Daddies. ÃÂÃÂ   Our dream is to take this a whole lot further in fulfilling our mission and creating something that will span right around the world. ÃÂÃÂ   Your pledge will really help us in continuing to move and get this dream off the ground, placing you right at the forefront of something magnificent!ÃÂÃÂ    Our Website Front Page Right Now, Check it Out At  www.mommypouch.com            Risks and challenges  We see very little risk in getting our project out there since it is based off our website and community and it being built.  Progress is already being made and we are in the process of getting awareness out there.

Blurb: An innovative device especially adapted for the deaf and the hard of hearing
Creator_description: Hello everyone ! I am Hassen CHAIEB. I am a deaf person  and devoted myself for years to the conception of Jenile products. In 2014, me and my children founded our family business: Jenile International. My goal is to offer better accessibility to deaf people by helping them to improve their daily lives.This baby surveillance camera is specially designed to help deaf parents take care of their newborn alone. Hoping that you will like my project, because by supporting me you will also support deaf parents, deaf grandparents and all deaf people who are deaf and deaf in charge of the baby.So, thank you for the attention you have given to my project and for all the little babies who will be grateful to you.
Project_description: The Connected and Vibrating Baby Monitor Camera (BBC18)  is the first model to be adaptated for all including deaf and hard of hearing people.  The device is composed of a monitoring camera and a vibrating screen. The latter has an integrated transmitter that is connected to the flashing and vibrating receivers.ÃÂÃÂ    This technical innovation would allow deaf parents to be autonomous with their newborn and restore their confidence in their ability to care for their baby alone.                  It is the only babyphone connected to  flashing and vibrating receivers  that will silently alert not only the hearing but also the deaf and hard of hearing. ÃÂÃÂ   When the baby starts crying, the surveillance camera will detect the scream through its built-in microphone. It will transmit it to the screen which will start vibrating and immediately send a signal to the flashing and vibrating receivers:  Cube flash, Vibrating Cushion, Flash plug, and other Jenile receivers.                  The  Flash Cube CBM19  is a product to be placed on the desk, for example. This cube centralizes all the different types of alarms with a color code associated with each type.ÃÂÃÂ You can  connect it to the Connected and Vibrating Baby Monitor Camera (BBC18)  and the associated color code is blue.  The  Vibrating Cushion COV15  is placed under the pillow and plugged directly into the Jenile receivers (Cube Flash and Flash Plug)  to be alerted of everything that happens in the house while you sleep . As soon as the flash receives a signal, it switches on and transmits the alert to the Vibrating Cushion.ÃÂÃÂ  Sleep in peace!        Light and sound system that you  connect to the Connected and Vibrating Baby Monitor Camera (BBC18)ÃÂÃÂ  and the associated color code is blue.ÃÂÃÂ For more comfort, it contains different ring tones and it is also possible to adjust the volume. You can plug in any room of your home.ÃÂÃÂ    Ideal for people with hearing loss and loss of sight.    Watch our demonstration video to see how it works!          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Find more about the Jenile's solutions on our    website   .ÃÂÃÂ         This is a project that is close to our hearts because it is an innovation for people who are deaf and hard of hearing. TheÃÂÃÂ Connected and Vibrating Baby Monitor Camera (BBC18) ÃÂÃÂ does not emit any WIFI waves  that could affect the child's health. It will  ensure their safety  in complete serenity.       ÃÂÃÂ  Jenile International  wants to:   ÃÂÃÂ Offer  a reassuring solution  to deaf parents that would make them completely independentÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ Propose  an innovative solution  while respecting the health of our usersÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     Making  our solutions accessible worldwide ÃÂÃÂ                                         ÃÂÃÂ   Who is Hassen CHAÃÂÃÂEB ? ÃÂÃÂ    Hassen CHAÃÂÃÂEB,  a deaf person, he devoted himself for years to the conception of Jenile products. In 2014, he and his children founded their family business:  Jenile International.    His objective is to offer better accessibility to deaf people  by helping them to improve their daily lives and develop.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ In 2016, he became laureate of the regional competition for business creation organized by the French Bank "Banque Populaire" and was awarded the double prize of " the family business ".   What solutions does Jenile International offer?   Jenile International  develops powerful tools  to help people with hearing loss on a daily basis. It carries out the development of housing, companies and public housing to make them accessible to the deaf and hard of hearing public.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The deaf population in a few figures....ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   What are the difficulties faced by deaf and hard of hearing people?   They have difficulties to follow a conversation and they can't hear loud sounds such as doorbells, alarms or baby crying.... ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ They can be put at risk because they do not hear any warning sounds.    What do they need?ÃÂÃÂ    Speak slowly and articulate in front of people who are deaf or hard of hearing so that they can read lips.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ They also need the sounds to be transcribed by vibrating and flashing signals in order to alert them in all situations.  * According to statistics from the World Health Organization : ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¯http://www.who.int/fr/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/deafness-and-hearing-loss  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  Our TeamÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  For years, Hassen CHAÃÂÃÂ¯EB has been working on the development of technical aids for the deaf and hard of hearing. His main goal was to overcome all the difilcuties that the deaf and hard of hearing could encounter in their daily life. He has always wanted to offer the same accessibility that hearing people and this is why he founded Jenile International.   For example, in a maternity ward, a hearing woman has the right to keep her baby on the first night. While a deaf woman cannot babysit her child on the first night for safety reasons. Indeed, if she falls asleep during the night and the baby starts crying, she won't hear it.  This is also the case when parents are at home, parents are constantly on the alert. They cannot leave their child alone at night in the room without any supervision as they may not notice that the child has woken up in the night.   That's why Jenile International developed the Connected and Vibrating Baby Monitor Camera (BBC18). Thanks to its unique device with flashing and vibrating receivers, parents will be alerted if the baby starts crying. It is a safety device that has been designed to ensure that parents can be autonomous and serene when welcoming their newborn child into their home.  It is a challenge for us to develop this camera because it must be exactly adapted to the needs of deaf people. Launching this camera on Kickstarter is a way to raise awareness around the world of the extent to which deaf people have a blatant lack of accessibility in their daily lives. It is also important for us to promote the baby surveillance camera and our products to the international deaf community to show them that solutions exist and are within their reach.   So Kickstarter help us to carry out our project to the end and support us with your powerful community!

Blurb: Help us fund art, tutorials, zines and more to support and grow PROCJAM - a community of procedural generation creators!
Project_Community_top_cities: |London-United Kingdom:21 backers|Melbourne-Australia:6 backers|Santa Cruz-United States:6 backers|Boston-United States:5 backers|Chicago-United States:5 backers|Seattle-United States:5 backers|Copenhagen-Denmark:4 backers|Berlin-Germany:4 backers|Los Angeles-United States:4 backers|San Francisco-United States:4 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:125 backers|United Kingdom:64 backers|Australia:12 backers|Canada:12 backers|Germany:7 backers|France:6 backers|Italy:6 backers|Denmark:5 backers|Norway:5 backers|South Korea:4 backers
Creator_description: Mike is a game developer and AI researcher from the UK. He made a game-designing AI called ANGELINA and founded PROCJAM, the Procedural Generation Jam. He makes things that make things.
Project_description: Next Stretch Goal - The PROCJAM Grant    ÃÂÃÂ£5,000 |ÃÂÃÂ  If we meet this stretch goal, we'll award a financial support grant to someone working on a generative project, judged and awarded by a panel of experts from the community. We'll also set aside some travel funding so that the grant recipient can come to a future PROCJAM (2018 onwards) and talk about the cool stuff they did!        PROCJAM is an event celebrating generative software, from programs that stitch intricate artworks to games that simulate the history of fictional worlds. ÃÂÃÂ For the past three years the Procedural Generation Jam has taken place every November, bringing in artists, programmers, game developers, designers, and more together to  Make Something That Makes Something . Over nine days people make toys, games, experiments, tools, and other wonderful things that generate stuff through code.  But PROCJAM is more than just a jam - we're trying to help grow the generative software community, to introduce people to new ideas, to create resources to help people learn, and to organise communication channels to let people share their ideas. In the past we've been lucky enough to get funding to help with these things, but this year we want to try a new experiment in making PROCJAM sustainable - we want your help to fund this year's event!  Why We Need Funding  Here's what we're planning for this year's PROCJAM to make it the best yet.        A brand new art pack. ÃÂÃÂ We'll hire an artist to create a Creative Commons-licensed art pack that's designed to be used in generative projects. Released in time for the jam, and then freely available forever,  along with our existing three packs !        Seeds, Issue 2.  Last year we made a zine that invited everyone to contribute and share their ideas, dreams and work with the community. Organising and editing this was a huge task - the Kickstarter will pay for an editor to put this zine together for a second year.        Video coverage. ÃÂÃÂ PROCJAM doesn't have winners or losers, so to celebrate the hard work everyone puts in we hire game jam expert Jupiter Hadley to make videos about everyone's entries, so that everyone gets a chance in the spotlight!        Tutorials. ÃÂÃÂ Our new addition for 2017. We've promised for so long to create original tutorials to help people get started with procedural generation. This year we're planning to hire community members to write tutorials to share their knowledge, and add to our year-round collection of great procedural generation resources.  As usual, we're also planning to host our day of live talks to start the jam. Every year we collect experts from all around the generative software world to give talks to inspire and teach people. Our talks are broadcast live on YouTube and archived for later on.ÃÂÃÂ We're still planning to make this year's talks day happen, but there are some unknown factors this year in organising the event, so we're not raising funds for it this time. For this year, we're going to focus on Kickstarting our crucial resources, and fund our talks day separately.ÃÂÃÂ   Backer Rewards  Backing us at any tier means you're helping keep PROCJAM growing and supporting a cool community. We'll include your name in our zine and on our live stream! PROCJAM only happens because it has a kind and supportive community - thanks for being a part of it.  If you back us for ÃÂÃÂ£10 or more, you'll receive an amazing reward:  The Generative Mixtape , a collection of small experiments and unreleased projects from some amazing people:    Kate Compton ÃÂÃÂ [ Tracery ,  Crystal Code Palace, Techne ]   Tom Betts ÃÂÃÂ [ Sir! You Are Being Hunted, The Signal From TÃÂÃÂ¶lva ,  In Ruins ]   Strangethink ÃÂÃÂ [ Joy Exhibition, Secret Habitat ,  These Monsters ]   Emily Short ÃÂÃÂ [ Versu ,  Galatea ,  The Annals of the Parrigues  ]   Katie Rose Pipkin ÃÂÃÂ [ Moth Generator, Mirror Lake, Tiny Star Fields ]   Gabriella Barros ÃÂÃÂ [ Data Adventures, ÃÂÃÂ  DeepTingle, WikiMysteries ]   And more to be announced!    This mixtape is a unique collection of cool stuff, produced by some wonderful people from the community. You won't want to miss out on it!  Stretch Goals  After we met our initial funding goal, we announced some stretch goals that we'd like to try and hit with additional funding. Here's what we'll do with your funding above our original goal:   ÃÂÃÂ£3,000 - A Second Art Pack [STRETCH GOAL MET!]   If we clear this stretch goal we can afford to hire another artist and produce a second art pack! Last year we had both a 2D and a 3D art pack, and the variety was amazing, so I really hope we can do the same this year!   ÃÂÃÂ£4,000 - Tutorials, Translated! [STRETCH GOAL MET]   Part of community building is getting resources in place for people, but another part is making sure those resources are accessible. Our plan for this stretch goal is to translate the tutorials we make into new languages. We're looking at translations into  Spanish  and  Arabic  with this initial stretch goal.   ÃÂÃÂ£5,000 - The PROCJAM Grant   If we meet this stretch goal, we'll award a financial support grant to someone working on a generative project, judged and awarded by a panel of experts from the community. We'll also set aside some travel funding so that the grant recipient can come to a future PROCJAM (2018 onwards) and talk about the cool stuff they did!        Risks and challenges  PROCJAM usually has a day of talks associated with it. This Kickstarter isn't for funding that, because they have lots of risks and variability. We want to focus on things we can 100% deliver. Even if our physical talks day doesn't take place, PROCJAM 2017 will still happen online as it always does, and all of our resources funded by this Kickstarter will help it happen.  All of our other objectives, from editing zines to creating art, are much less unpredictable. In the past we've always delivered our art packs, zines and so forth well in advance of deadlines, and they've always been super awesome.  That said, upheaval and unpredictable life changes do happen, so some of our goals may end up delivering later if something unexpected happens with the individual people involved. We'll work hard to make sure everything gets finished eventually, but equally we won't pressure the amazing people creating things for us to overwork themselves just to meet a deadline. Working healthily is a big part of PROCJAM!

Blurb: A deep sea simi perpetual hydro turbin generator.
Creator_description: I am 30 years old and my background has mostly dealt with different marine engineering aspects. I was a machinery Repairman in the navy for 4 years and after I got out of the navy I worked on the road as a journeyman millwright on multiple contracts at paper mills and refinery's. I started working at shipyards in the gulf coast 5 years ago and currently work for a DOD contractor as a systems operator/mechanic building naval ships.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Hello  I have a ever evolving design for a new generation of hydro turbin that is virtually perpetual other than routine maintenance. It will be able to generate power from harnessing the water pressure of the oceans and lakes around the world.The technology is scalable to relatively any size and power output.a few of the many positives to this project are ,it runs on a endless power source (ocean sea water pressure),its a green power source with low impact to the environment and produces no byproducts.the reason I am turning to crowd funding is I lack the resources to make a true prototype it will take alot of 3d design and digital simulation before I can make a working prototype wich I plan to design for 100 foot depth and 1kw+ power output, a true power output cannot be given till I refine the design in a digital simulation.ÃÂÃÂ  But I expect 1kw-10kw for the first prototype.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ I ÃÂÃÂ do Have ÃÂÃÂ a rudimentary proof ÃÂÃÂ of concept and theory, that is why I have decided to move forward .  To end I am very grateful for any help on this project and I will update as much as possible.      Risks and challenges  3d design and simulations, engineering for extreme water pressure.field testing

Posso dire di aver avuto una vita normalissima, ma sono stato particolarmente influenzato da un evento drastico che mi cambiÃÂÃÂ² la vita per sempre. La mia alta ambizione ÃÂÃÂ¨ quella di diventare un bravo imprenditore attento allÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ambiente che contribuisca a migliorare la vita propria e quella degli altri ed il mio scopo nobile ÃÂÃÂ¨ essere ricordato come una delle persone che ha donato di piÃÂÃÂ¹ a questo mondo.Magari non ci riuscirÃÂÃÂ² mai, ma nel frattempo io continuerÃÂÃÂ² ogni giorno ed ogni minuto della mia vita ad impegnarmi verso questÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>obiettivo ed a donare per quello che posso, per poter dire un giorno: ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>ci sono riuscito!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ o ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>ce lÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ho messa tutta!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂSono certo che kickstarter mi permetterÃÂÃÂ  di entrare in contatto con persone straordinarie e non vedo l'ora di conoscerti.Credo in kickstarter e ti ringrazio per aver mostrato interesse verso di me, per qualunque cosa non esitare a contattarmi.
Project_description: ATTENZIONE!!! ----> Trovi la stessa descrizione tradotta in Italiano subito dopo questa in Inglese!   PAY ATTENTION!!! --> You can find the same description traslated in Italian immediately after the English one!          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Travel Vips - Tourism Made Simple    Travel Vips is a place were exchange opinions, tips and travel experiences,    its strong point is the community   . You with all the other travelers, are the strength of Travel Vips!   Anyone who has ever organized a trip knows perfectly well that the suggestions of people who have already had experience on the site can be so important for the success of a trip and here is the reason why ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Travel VipsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, because  together, we can all be "Very important people" for someone else!   The main objective is to simplify the search for tourist information with a streaming platform, in which, everyone, without necessarily having any certification, will be able to upload their own video tour guides while certified tourist guides can also propose themselves for appointments on the spot.ÃÂÃÂ   In short, let's start together as a team on Facebook ( click here  to visit our facebook page) and then get everyone on our own platform! Soon I'll go into more details, but in the meantime ...   Who hides behind Travel Vips?        I'm Alex, born in Messina in 1993, an economics student and a fan of marketing and rock music.ÃÂÃÂ   I consider myself a very inventive person and if I had to make you a list of all the ideas I had, this page would not be enough. I can say I had a very normal life, but I was particularly influenced by a drastic event that changed my life forever. In August 2009, exactly 10 years ago, I had a bad accident, which caused me head and facial trauma, I woke up in the hospital after an interminable operation and 12 hours of pharmacological coma and only in the following years, I elaborated the event, realized what it means to touch death.       My high ambition is to become a good environmentally-friendly entrepreneur who contributes to improving one's life and that of others and my noble purpose is to be remembered as one of the people who has donated more to this world. Maybe I will never succeed, but in the meantime I will continue every day and every minute of my life to commit myself to this goal and to donate for what I can, to be able to say one day: "I succeeded!" or ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I have done everything! "  To date, here is another idea. And after years, this has more potential than any other! ÃÂÃÂ   The idea was born following the publication of some "Video Guide" created by me and consisting of a format that divided each guide into: 3 places to visit, 3 typical dishes, an experience to live on the spot and a curiosity. This format was appreciated, but becouse I wanted to differentiate myself, I tried to make more information available to my audience by trying to create complete guides.  In that moment i discovered:  The tourist information problem!   The searches by tourist attraction (eg Buckingham palace, Tower of London, etc ...) are characterized by text pages that require a real study to be able to subsequently build a guide.ÃÂÃÂ    To do this, needs a team composed of as many people as possible        Here the idea began to take shape. Considering the difficulty for the individual, to build a detailed and complete video guide, wouldn't it be better to build a platform designed to put everyone's strength together?   It was the 11 November 2018  and the idea exploded in my head like 1000 firecrackers in the New Year, I couldn't wait any longer and I started asking myself the most disparate questions!       It took a few months but now I have the answer to all the questions:  What is Travel Vips? ÃÂÃÂ   Travel Vips is a streaming platform for tourist guides, which also opens up the market to those who do not work like professional tour guide(everyone).  Upload your video guide or take advantage of that of others and if you are a professional tour guide, offer also your services on the spot!   What functions will it have? ÃÂÃÂ   Basically, in order to simplify the tour of the city, this new app will allow the tourist to know which tourist attraction is closest to him/her and once chosen the tourist attraction or the city of interest, the user will have a feed of guides created and evaluated by other users, accessing a gallery of specific and quality video guides.ÃÂÃÂ   The notification system will allow to invite people to look at the guide you might have uploaded and Following the viewing, to each user will be asked to check whether or not it is a guide and to evaluate the quality of this in terms of usefulness and lived experience!ÃÂÃÂ    Will it be yours, the next 5-star guide?   What are the advantages of creating a Video guide? ÃÂÃÂ   The biggest problem was: "how do I encourage users to upload guides?" Knowing the job that it requires and the time it needs, I think it is right that the revenue that will come from Travel Vips will be shared with those who will support its growth.  Your guide will become a digital product and you can take advantage of a system of incentives that rewards the quantity and quality of contents.  This means that following 100 evaluations, if your guide is evaluated at 4 or 5 stars, it will be assigned a price, and the one hundred and first tourist and those following will have to pay 0.80 cents or ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 1 to watch your guide and guarantee a 100% quality experience!   For more information about the incentive system, go to www.TravelVips.it   What does Travel Vips offer to tourists? ÃÂÃÂ   Travel Vips in addition to providing geographical indications about the tourist attractions that can be visited provides tourists the possibility to choose between:   The single video tourist guide; ÃÂÃÂ     The complete video guide of the city (group of single videos); ÃÂÃÂ     The certified tour guide to meet on the spot; ÃÂÃÂ     And the V.I.P membership. ÃÂÃÂ    The V.I.P membership is a solution that can be of benefit to the user according to his needs.  It will remove the advertisement from the app and give access to Podcasts, offline mode, and all the digital products (4 and 5 stars)ÃÂÃÂ    And currently there are two ways to become V.I.P:   ÃÂÃÂ  Believe in Travel Vips , me and my project and support me via  kickstarter ; ÃÂÃÂ     Or: Become V.I.P once the app is a reality. ÃÂÃÂ    The substantial difference lies in the fact that  the membership you get by donating will be without deadlines and without any extra cost, while the V.I.P membership that will be available for purchase on the app will cost $ 3.40 per day . A price designed to prevent that the V.I.P membership "cannibalize" the sales of individual videos.  But regardless of this, I ask your help as a traveler, as a dreamer, as a man who can never realize his dream without you, knowing that your participation is fundamental, I'd like to see you be part of this revolution of tourist guides online as a  leader.   I ask for your help hoping that, even today, realizing a dream is possible. Regardless of whether you intend to donate or not, I invite you to be an active member of this community. Compare and exchange tips with other travelers, share  Travel Vips  and tell your friends and relatives what I'm doing.  Help me spread the idea!    How to donate? and what will i get in retun?   It is possible to donate from one euro upwards and the membership is obtained at a price which, as defined by this  article  "is a figure that I do not find absolutely absurd, indeed."   From 12 euros upwards you will get lifetime V.I.P membership (never pay the daily fee of $ 3.40) ÃÂÃÂ     From 19 euros up, get the Lifetime Membership plus the Travel Vips T-shirt. ÃÂÃÂ    For any questions contact me. A big hug, Alex.  The aforementioned article its in italian but i traslated it for you:   "how many of you, after organizing the trip, found themselves on the spot without knowing what to do? To me, it's happened and even when I did research to organize a draft itinerary finally I relied on the advice of the hotel staff therefore throwing away a lot of time and energy. And what if you travel a lot and want to earn some extra income making your experience available for others?    Hi and welcome again on "il Quadernino" that today presents a new emerging platform, which I would like to see become reality, becouse I was really impressed by the business idea.    Just yesterday I came across this Kickstarter project,    travelvips.it   , a completely Italian project who wants to create a community around the travel world where exchange advice about the various tourist destinations to allow those who decide to go on vacation, to have all the information necessary to enjoy their stay to the fullest. Many of you may say that this service would be useless and that everyone with an internet connection can find all the information they need. In this case, I would answer that often the amount of time spent on finding museums, fairs, shows, etc. it's not always anought to find what we interest us most. Often needs to read a lot of articles, reviews and websites to find the one we like most, often with little results. But then wouldn't it be better to know the experience of someone who has already been there and can therefore provide us all the useful information quickly and easily? time is money after all. And my attention goes right on this point, becouse what surprised me most about the project is that everyone can improvise as a tour guide, sharing their experience on the platform and earning money. Oh yes, because the project foresees that every person who participates by creating tourist guide videos will be remunerated depending on how much that is used by other users, favoring "tourist guides" who will create quality content useful to other users. So the more your content is evaluated positively, the more you will earn.    In addition to this, even those who are currently professional tour guides will be able to use the portal to act as a guide on the touristi attraction and thus increase the reach of potential customers. In short, a great possibility for both professionals and amateurs.    The basic service will of course be free, but for those who want to enjoy the best guides without ads, a paid membership will also be offered, but here comes the beauty. For those who participate in the Kickstarter campaign there will be an automatic VIP membership, without having to pay additional costs or anything else. The minimum donation to receive the VIP membership is ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 12, a figure that I don't find absolutely absurd, indeed    I must admit that I was very impressed by the business idea, also because it is still another way to increase earnings, obviously if you are interested in the travel world (but who is not). I leave the link to the description page of the    project    as well as for the    Kickstarter    campaign, in case you are interested like me, and also the connection to the    Facebook Page    of the project to stay informed about the progress of the project. Let me know in the comments section below what you think, I thank you for reading this presentation for the travelvips.it project and I invite you to the next update of ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>il QuaderninoÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ.ÃÂÃÂ      Thanks to quadernino.blog for these beautiful words! Blurb: Changing young lives one dance at a time- First wellbeing dance movie in the world.

Creator_description: We are two passionate educators in the teenage and young adult sphere with multiple years of experience, positively impacting the mental health and growth of young dancers.With our backgrounds in dance and wellbeing education, we have noticed a need for the next generation to have the necessary tools to combat a growing epidemic of depression, anxiety, online bullying and the responsible use of social media. Shannon Hsu, is an innovator and respected educators in the dance industry and initiated the amalgamation of dance and wellness. She has multiple dance and wellness programs attracting hundreds of dancers aged from 7 - 21, through her company Dance Editorial. Tenzing Tsewang is a respected wellness coordinator working in prestigious schools such as, Cranbrook, Kambala, Reddam, St Vincents and St Peters in Adelaide. Shannon and Tenzing have been working in the vouth & wellness space for over a decade in our respective fields, and joined forces to create a program that is meaningful, innovative and creative, while addressing the modern emotional and mental problems teenagers experience today. We want to successfully provoke change, awareness and discussion around the important issues of depression, bullying, anxiety and responsible use of social media.
Project_description: A dance film to engage our teenagers about mental health; bullying, social media and anxiety and to do our part to stop the epidemic of mental health problems in our young people.  The plan is to get this film into high schools as part of the wellness curriculum so we can use dance to impact our next generation in a positive way and to change how our teenagers see themselves and others.ÃÂÃÂ   In order to capture the attention of teenagers we need to communicate with them via a platform that connects and engages them. The answer is simply; technology, music, dance, art and film. We know our important subject matter will be better received through this preferred form of communication, rather than a monotonous, stuffy and mundane lecture. Our program is the vehicle that will engage them.  The program will be delivered through a feature film, with six character storylines portrayed through current and modern dance styles, including hip hop, jazz, dance hall, fusion and contemporary.ÃÂÃÂ      Dance Crew       Dance Crew    The film focuses on a group of school friends who face personal challenges such as bullying, anxiety and identity crises. The film will portray real life situations dealt with by today's teenagers and explores the power of social media and online bullying on their mental health.ÃÂÃÂ    Throughout the film, we will have ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>learning momentsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, where the film will pause in pivotal occasions in the characters story lines, to allow the students to dissect, process and evaluate what they are learning in groups, as well as independently.ÃÂÃÂ    The students will execute this via a log-in to our website, where they will be able to answer the vital discussion questions presented in the film, to assess what they are learning about themselves and their peers. It will also shine a light on their decision making abilities and their emotional and mental well-being; via the physical, with the eventual purpose to start an important dialogue with their peers.ÃÂÃÂ    The message will be delivered to teenagers by teenagers, who understand the implications and the expectations social media places on their age demographic. The cast of performers on the screen are aged between 13-20 making the delivery of our message relatable and identifiable to school aged students.ÃÂÃÂ      Tenz & Shannon         We are two passionate educators in the teenage and young adult sphere with multiple years of experience, positively impacting the mental health and growth of young dancers.  Shannon and Tenzing have been working in the youth & wellness space for over a decade in our respective fields, and joined forces to create a program that is meaningful, innovative and creative, while addressing the modern emotional and mental problems teenagers experience today.ÃÂÃÂ   Shannon Hsu, is an innovator and respected educators in the dance industry and initiated the amalgamation of dance and wellness. She has multiple dance and wellness programs attracting hundreds of dancers aged from 7 - 21, through her company Dance Editorial. Tenzing Tsewang is a respected wellness coordinator working in prestigious schools such as, Cranbrook, Kambala, Reddam, St Vincents and St Peters in Adelaide.  We want to successfully  provoke change, awareness and discussion around the important issues  of depression, bullying, anxiety and responsible use of social media.    Our Previous Work   We are proud of our history of creating meaningful and innovative works that change the lives of those involved and the shift the audience perspective.ÃÂÃÂ    Love Is Love    https://www.danceeditorial.com/our-productions   https://youtu.be/uv4iBd3bZMk    7 Vices    https://www.danceeditorial.com/2016-7-vices   https://youtu.be/cBH_8uqSkr0    For all our work    https://www.danceeditorial.com/     Our Director   Adam SaundersÃÂÃÂ    https://www.killakreative.com/     Our Director Of PhotographyÃÂÃÂ    Glenn Hanns   https://vimeo.com/310026807        With our backgrounds in dance and wellbeing education, we have noticed a need for the next generation to have the necessary tools to combat a growing epidemic of depression, anxiety, online bullying and the responsible use of social media.ÃÂÃÂ   As educators we want to successfully engage teenagers in a creative and fun way that is relevant to them, through the use of an online platform, dance, music and film. In turn creating a safe space to gain the skills and awareness needed. ÃÂÃÂ             Your pledges will go directly to the costs associated with the filming such as:  - choreographers - dancers - film crew - platform development - marketing / promotionsÃÂÃÂ   -technology - editing - original music productions - venue hire - equipment hire; lighting / cameras etcÃÂÃÂ             You will be pleased to know we have already started! ÃÂÃÂ Here is our timeline:  Conceptualisation of idea: November 2017ÃÂÃÂ   Creative team collaborations : June - November 2018ÃÂÃÂ   Rehearsals: January - April 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Original music production - November - April 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Top to toe rehearsals / shot rehearsals - April 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Kickstarter Campaign - May - June 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Filming: June -July 2019  Wellbeing platform development: June - September 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Editing: August - October 2019  Wellbeing program pitched to partnering schools: September 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Premiere: November 2019ÃÂÃÂ   Wellbeing launched in schools around Australia : January 2020ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Risks:  Timeline:  - Taking longer to film and scheduling our large team of dancers and crew (over a 100 people): * mitigated by: Tight scheduling - constant communication with our team - consistent appraisal of our timelines - pre-planning - project management - gantt charting  - Platform development being ready for launch  * mitigated by: due diligence in choosing the right partner for our online platform, with a history of construction of online platforms   Budget:  - raising initial capital for the film / product platform  * Mitigated by: private equity - Kickstarter campaign - Council grant funding

Blurb: Air Filtration Device
Creator_description: Born April 6 1985 in Greenville South Carolina to Cornel and patrica Morris. Adopted in 1995 to parents Annie and LJ Cannon Attended Carolina High School, Voorhees College, Strayer University
Project_description: Albert Einstein said ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited whereas imagination embraces the entire worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>. At one time I was on medication and in remedial classes due to my imagination. My imagination was a form of escape from a difficult childhood dealing with being abandonded and foster care. I never had much so dreaming was always close by. I started designing ideas by age 13. By the age of 20 I was ÃÂÃÂ working for a metal fab company. I designed my 1st alteration to a transportation rack that was approved by a engineer at a top automotive company.I was happy but soon came to find the idea was used but I never was paid. Something sparked inside of me beyond my anger...determination. I knew I had great ideas and began the journey of embracing my imagination. When I designed the filter frame I knew IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d give anything to see it come to life. I ended up giving everything but still having hope as I slept at the park in my car. The frame will change the world so that month and a half was worth the struggle . I cried the day I recieved my patent. I felt pride knowing all that I went through as a young black inventor was not in vein. The filter frame was designed simple to use and easy to understand. I located a filter directly at the exit point of air flow.For countless years the consumer has accepted the quality of air they breathe after the HVAC filter process air at the entrance point for air flow. We are raising the bar because acceptable is not good enough. We want the best for everything that life has to offer. Our family deserves the best. No matter if your an allergen sufferer or simply desire to increase the quality of air emitted out of your homes air duct. Utilizing a filter frame to catch the unwanted dust, irritants, and debree at the exit location (register) is the best opportunity to reduce and eliminate the problem. The technology to protect our families and take a leap into the future has been created. For all of you who believe ÃÂÃÂ what we can witness take place in the next 6 month ..join with me. IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve given everything I have and still have more to give. The world will be forever thankful for your contribution. I will be grateful for your support and call you a member of our filter frame family. Thank youÃÂÃÂ   Joshua Cannon      Risks and challenges  This venture is one that was formed from faith. I am currently working with a 3rd party to manage the overseas manufacturing options. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s hard to trust people to do right by my project. The mold that will be used to build the frames will range from 25 to 30,000 dollars. A big portion of the pledges will cover the cost of the mold. IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll produce 5,000 frames for the 1st run and utilize the last 10 or 15,000 on marketing.

Abklatschprobe (Rodac-Verfahren): Fleischplatz vor Reinigung und nach Reinigung mit Microclean-Superfiber und reinem Wasser       Abklatschprobe (Rodac-Verfahren) Jausenplatz vor und nach Reinigung mit Microclean-Superfiber und reinem Wasser.    My name is Manfred Fixl. ÃÂÃÂ I am from Upper Austria, from the MÃÂÃÂ¼hlviertel, the former weaving stronghold of Austria. My home town was also the only textile technical university in Austria. Already as a child I was enthusiastic about this craft and from an early age I was able to get a deep insight into the development and research of the textile academy through family connections. ÃÂÃÂ In the course of my career, I later came into contact with large companies in the professional cleaning industry.ÃÂÃÂ   When I noticed the dimensions of the enormous consumption of disease-causing and environmentally damaging chemicals for cleaning in my everyday work, this triggered my desire to do something about this flood of chemistry and (micro)plastics.  Of course I knew about the antibacterial effect of silver and its use in textiles such as underwear to alleviate allergies and rashes. There are also dishtowels on the market that have been treated with silver-containing impregnations to prevent the growth of odour-forming bacteria.  So this was my starting point. But can antibacterial silver in a fabric achieve such effectiveness that disinfectants can be dispensed with without any doubt? How do you make a cleaning cloth that absorbs oils and fats even though you only wipe with pure water?  After many years of intensive tinkering, support from doctors, environmental physicians, textile and cleaning experts, but also including "creative" breaks and lots of prototypes that have not yet been able to meet my own high standards of perfection, it is time today to present the SUPERFIBRE to the world. Developed and manufactured in Austria.  The silver, so filigree woven and inseparably connected with the main fibre. This was my greatest challenge, which has now been mastered perfectly. The processed fibres are sanded with a special process before weaving. On the one hand, this greatly increases the amount of the dirt-absorbing surface, and on the other hand, this structures allow deeper penetration into microscopically small unevennesses, which almost every surface has.ÃÂÃÂ   In addition, several expert opinions from authorities and independent institutes have confirmed beyond doubt that 99.9% of surfaces cleaned with MICROCLEAN cloths and pure water are free of germs and pathogens. (according to standard test methods for commercially available disinfectants) But I will go into this later.  There is a growing awareness worldwide how the uninhibited use of chemicals and the littering of waters and the environment by microplastics continuously destroys our basis of life.  Actually, we are obliged to do everything in our power to stop this madness. Unfortunately, we have become very accustomed to the use of chemical cleaning agents. The smell of cleaners and chlorine alone is equated with hygiene in many people's minds. These conditionings must be dissolved. Many disruptive technologies, which are sustainable and serve the environment more than profits, are not adequately promoted and established. Sometimes even slowed down.  With our innovative super fiber, millions of tons of chemicals and (micro)plastic waste can be avoided worldwide. In all areas of life and work!ÃÂÃÂ   I have made great efforts to bring the first Type of these Products close to perfection. Now we can start immediately with the first larger production.ÃÂÃÂ   The aim of this crowdfunding project is to create the economic conditions to become able to expand the Line of Products by the "Health Line" for body care and demake-up. To make it also in this category possible to save 100% Chemical Products and waste. Afterwards the product range will be completed by the "Optic Line", an even more refined variation which is being used for Smartphone Displays to clean those germ- and bacteria-free and remove any grease. Of course the Optic Line will be perfectly suitable for other Screens, Glasses, Lenses and other Optics too.  And of course: The larger the community of users, the higher the positive impact for our planet. Kickstarter is perfect to get the ball rolling and save the environment thousands of tons of chemicals and plastics.  MICROCLEAN superfibers with a long service life allow a deeply and professional cleaning only with pure water and kills 99.9% of all germs and bacteria. Invented in Austria, made in Germany. Creator_description: I am a 39 year old minister, pastor, author, community leader and visionary from Opelousas, LA, located one hour west of the Louisiana capital city of Baton Rouge.  I have been in ministry and community work for 15 years (including a 4 year stint working in disaster recovery for FEMA from 2005 to 2009)!  In addition to ministry, I have vision to help enhance communities through various business strategies.In addition to these things, I write songs and poetry, I exercise regularly and I also lead and host work-out groups and basketball training as an outreach into the community!

ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  This campaign will run for a short time (33 days to be exact) because the aim is to met the goal and then get the items produced, then shipped to the supporters. Blurb: I am developing an app that helps parents, guardians, and nannies Instantly schedule play dates for the children. No more boredom
Creator_description: Hey everyone! For those who donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t know me, my name is Kelvin. I have been working on developing an app called My New Pal! My New Pal is the new way for families to schedule play dates for their kids! I am currently in the developing  stages and seeking to raise   funds to complete the app. Parents, just imagine those days when your kids are being rambunctious, out of control and you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t know what to do. You think to yourself, I wish they could just go play with their friends  or find someone new to play with. At this time, those friends are out of town and away. Now what do you do?   Also imagine you are new to a city and wanting to find and make new friends for your child. I have the answer! My New Pal! This app allows families, guardians or caretakers to instantly schedule play dates with other families who are also seeking play dates at the same exact time! How cool is this! This is the future of play dates! Please help me on my journey!
Project_description: Hi everyone! My name is Kelvin and I am 28 years old. for the last 10 years I have been working with children of all ages. I have a strong passion for children. At the present moment, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m currently a nanny, and a law student. When IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m not in school, I take care of 3 wonderful children. Often times taking care of the children is simple and easy, but other times It can be challenging. How so you might ask? Sometimes kids can entertain themselves and other times its my job to entertain them, or to find some fun activities to do with them. Lately I have found what I think to be a problem that I have a solution for. A few months ago, I was in Florida vacationing with the family I work for and the kids. 1 child had a friend that he knew at the resort and and other child found a place in the shade just to relax. That leaves one more child. I had already played with him, his parents already played with him. He was getting bored wishing he had someone new to play with. Right then and there, It hit me! Why isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t there an app to instantly schedule play dates for children?! There are apps for adults but no App for kids to socialize and network and meet other kids.   When I got back from vacation I did a ton of research, coming to find out that this idea has not been submitted! I had to jump on this fast. I obtained a patent for the layout and design for the app already and have already hired a developing team that has already started the process of creating the app. I have spent a lot of my own personal money and now IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m tapped out. Creating this app and going to law school has led me to kickstarter.  I am looking for backers who believe in my idea. If you have children or youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a nanny and have ever been in that situation where you just wish you could entertain your child so theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not driving you crazy, then this is the future, this will solve your problems!  I am seeking $15,000 dollars to complete the app. the sooner I raise this, the quicker I can launch! In July 2019, My New Pal will be an expo that draws over 25,000 people in Chicago. This is a step in the right direction to help gain publicity for the app!      Risks and challenges  The challenges that IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m facing are just money to continually pay my developers. I pay them in tiers.  Once one portion of the app is complete. So this is why I need your help for me to complete my app. If you think this is a great idea and you have children and you would use this, please support me

Blurb: New nationwide toll-free telephone hotline for people contemplating violence with firearms. Non-profit & trademark legal costs.
Creator_description: Graduate of Florida State University, BS in International Affairs
Project_description: My name is Scott Hite. In 2015, I wanted to start a toll-free hotline for people that are contemplating violence with firearms. After hearing media reports of shootings across the country, I had asked myself many times why there wasn't such a telephone hotline. Due to health & financial reasons, the project was abandoned.  Only a few days ago, a YouTube video popped up while viewing a channel about psychology. I had no idea what it was and let it play. The video was of a psychiatrist interviewing the Colorado movie theater shooter, James Holmes. It was a bit of a shock when Holmes discussed calling a mental health telephone number immediately before entering the theater. Holmes said, "Just one last chance to see if I should turn back or not". No one answered that call. Holmes entered the theater with firearms, body armor and teargas. He killed 12 people and wounded more than 70.  After hearing that, I knew that the hotline for people contemplating violence with firearms needed to become a reality and quickly. The website was quickly created, a toll-free number was obtained at (833) WAITONE or (833) 924-8663. The immediate needs are for legal costs for non-profit, trademark and other costs. After those needs are met, additional funding can be sought through grants.  The callers to the hotline will receive immediate, confidential support and if necessary local counseling will be scheduled to assist the caller. It is possible that the non-profit will have to pay for some of the local counseling. Wait One will grow a listing of qualified counselors willing to meet with clients. Wait One will also follow-up with the caller and counselor.  The long-term goals are to have more than one paid employee other than myself. The employee(s) will be appropriately qualified similar to a MSW or above. Of course, qualified volunteers would be utilized too. The employees will be responsible for taking calls, providing follow-up counseling, etc.ÃÂÃÂ   I am going on a cross country bicycle trip to promote the non-profit but will also be taking all the calls. Right now, WaitOne is doing whatever is possible to help people that are contemplating harming people with firearms. The potential callers go far beyond the mass shooters in the news. Inner city gang members, paroled convicts & other vulnerable people will be targeted with advertising. During the bicycle tour, I plan to talk to gun store owners about placing a poster in their stores and soliciting other advice from the gun store employees.  I'm in this for the long haul and will see WaitOne become successful in preventing violence with firearms!      Risks and challenges  The challenges will be getting the hotline advertised well enough to receive callers. Advertising posters will be placed at gun stores and universities. Maintaining a long-term on-line presence with media coverage should help a lot. Funding may be an issue, but I'm in this for the long haul. The size of the organization WaitOne will not affect the availability of the hotline.

Blurb: Allergy and environmentally friendly detergent-free washing technology.  Praised by World Wildlife Fund and UN Network for Clean Seas.
Creator_description: Smart Water Filters Limited is registered in England and Wales #10076991 and also trades as SWFÃÂÃÂ®.  SWFÃÂÃÂ® has secured exclusive manufacturing and distribution agreements for DIROÃÂÃÂ® in the UK, Ireland and the Channel Islands.Our vision is to promote an allergy and environmentally friendly detergent-free lifestyle.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ    Support Smart Water Filters Limited with our UK manufacturing.    	 www.detergent-free.com ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  www.smart-water-filters.com ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  www.swfltd.uk ÃÂÃÂ        Per Hanson (pictured left) inventor of the patented DIROÃÂÃÂ® method.  Here with a DIROÃÂÃÂ® system which has been installed into a municipal property.ÃÂÃÂ   DIROÃÂÃÂ® by SWATAB is a climate friendly laundry technology without detergent chemicals, praised both by the World Wildlife Fund and the UN Network for Clean Seas.  DIROÃÂÃÂ® is a filter system that is placed between the incoming cold water and washing machines, making detergents totally redundant.  Tested by SWEREA IVF and has a proven cleaning effect according to the EU Ecolabel test for detergents.  Allowing for reductions in energy consumption by 80 percent on commercial washing cycles and by 40 percent for the drying processes.ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ     DIROÃÂÃÂ® Climate Solver Award 2017   WWF Climate Solver | Climate Benefits  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Beyond costs savings for consumers who no longer need to purchase detergents and softeners, DIROÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s benefits are significant. Cutting down on chemical detergents leads to lower acidification in water sources. The DIRO system reduces energy consumption by up to 40 percent. And the service life of machines will be longer because, without detergent, no lime-scale buildup occurs.  If this innovation or others like it penetrates 10 percent of the target market by 2027, the global greenhouse gas emissions would be reduced with 21 million tons of CO2e annually.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  Read more at  www.climatesolver.org/innovations/living/making-laundry-clean-cool-and-detergent-free-developed-scandinavian-water ÃÂÃÂ    SDSN NE Oceans Solutions Report 2017:1  (p.56-57) |  www.unsdsn-ne.org ÃÂÃÂ   UN Network for Clean Seas | Sustainable Development Goals  Positive impact on:  Goal 3: Good Health and Well-being  Goal 6: Clean Water and Sanitation  Goal 7: Affordable and Clean Energy  Goal 9: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure  Goal 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities  Goal 12: Responsible Consumption and Production  Goal 14: Life Below Water  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Solution expected to contribute to SDG 3: Good Health and Well-being.  Chemical residues remain on textiles after conventional washing., resulting in allergies, contact dermatitis, and aggravated eczema. Powder detergents contain zeolites, which appear as a fine dust with particles so small they can enter a personÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s lungs.  Other chemicals in detergents include sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), linear alkyl benzene sulfonates (LAS), petroleum distillates (also known as naphtha), and sodium hypochlorite (household bleach).  Many of the chemicals have negative effects on humans, animals, and/or the environment, such as skin irritation, organ toxicity, liver and kidney damage, toxicity to fish, reproductive and developmental problems in animals, and excessive growth of marine plants, triggering unbalanced ecosystems.  Fabric softeners also contain many hazardous chemicals, including chloroform, benzyl alcohol, ethanol, and linalool.  Human skin is frequently exposed to some of these chemicals as they remain in fabric after washing.  Our solution is also expected to contribute to SDG 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities, by reducing the use of chemicals in society, decreasing the need for transportation, and cutting energy consumption by shortening drying times, lowering washing temperatures, and sending less polluted wastewater to sewage treatment plants.  As for economic effects, it reduces service and maintenance costs, extends the service life of the machines, and lowers the cost per wash compared with conventional washing.  By reducing resource use, the solution will affect SDG 12: Responsible Consumption and Production.  The holding tanks are rotation molded with reused plastic.  Filters have been analysed by SYSAV in MalmÃÂÃÂ¶ and are classified as combustible waste.  The production will be outsourced to countries strategically selected to minimize the environmental impact.  Local household appliance service companies will install and service the systems.  The solution will also contribute to SDG 14: Life Below Water.  Sewer plants and septic systems process large quantities of wastewater but do not always operate properly or remove enough nitrogen and phosphorus before discharging into waterways.  Some detergents contain zeolites instead of phosphorus, and wastewater plants have problems removing these small particles from the water.  Another issue is that detergents and softeners contain microplastics.  Sweden also has over 700,000 private non-approved sewage systems where in many cases the greywater pollutants end up in the streams, lakes, and groundwater.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ     SWATAB owner of DIROÃÂÃÂ®, winner of MalmÃÂÃÂ¶ Cleantech City Award 2016   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>A true innovation uses known technology in brand new applications. The winner of this years MalmÃÂÃÂ¶ Cleantech City Award is indeed such an innovation. The solution has multiple environmental, economic and health benefits. It can easily be installed into existing laundry rooms without any need to exchange machinery. SWATAB has a truly unique solution and it is the choice of the MalmÃÂÃÂ¶ Cleantech City Award jury because this is something they would like to see installed in their laundry rooms.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  Read more at  www.malmocleantechcity.se/stort-grattis-swatab-vinnare-av-malmo-cleantech-city-award-2016    Smart Water Filters Limited  is registered in England and Wales #10076991 and also trades as SWFÃÂÃÂ®.  SWFÃÂÃÂ® has secured exclusive manufacturing and distribution agreements for DIROÃÂÃÂ® in the UK, Ireland and the Channel Islands.   Our vision  is to promote an allergy and environmentally friendly detergent-free lifestyle.  Our water filter technology products will help to:  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Enable a complete detergent-free laundry washing solution.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Protect the health of employees and Residents.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Allow 100% allergy free laundry.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Reduce your carbon footprint and processing times.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Increase the lifetime of washing machines and dryers.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Eliminate the need for expensive and harmful detergents and softeners.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Dramatically cut washing and drying costs.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ All harsh chemicals and contaminants are removed from our water supply.   Present Market   Commercial sites: Care Homes | Spa/Hotels/Apartments | Laundrettes | PPE, HiVis and Workwear  Surface Cleaners   Future Markets   Residential units  Commercial/Residential Kitchen Dish/Glass/Mop washers   Kickstarter   We will use the pledges from this Kickstarter to:  Boost the company which will help us to create more innovative uses for DIROÃÂÃÂ®.  Mobile units, possible utlra-clean detergent-free water units for disaster relief, festival events and shared community.       Ultra-clean detergent-free surface cleaners, allergy and environmentally friendly.       New cabinet designs and production to meet wider customer requirements.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Boost our Manufacturing team  Manufacturing in the UK will mean we can more easily prototype changes to the cabinets in which the patented DIROÃÂÃÂ® systems are installed and the positioning and size of the water tanks.  This will allow bespoke systems to be developed to meet varying customer demands for space and capacity.  Lead times and the carbon footprint of logistics can be greatly reduced.       DIROÃÂÃÂ® is tested according to the requirements of the EU-Eco Label tests for laundry detergents.The patented method of operation is divided into three main sections:  1. DIROÃÂÃÂ® is installed between your existing water feed and your washing machine and works with both new and old machinery. The sleek, Scandinavian designed unit processes the water through several filters so that it emerges ultra-clean and deionized. This filtered water is then pumped into your washing machine in the normal way.  Detergent Free.  2. When the water comes in contact with the fabrics in the washing machine it breaks the ionic bond between the fibres of the fabric and dirt. These unwanted particles are then carried away with the rinse water leaving the fabric clean and chemical free. Since the filtered water is ultra-pure and contains no lime scale or other minerals, the fabrics are left soft without the need for fabric softener. Fabrics are fragrance free and carry a pleasant, natural odour.  3. Since the filtered water is free from salt and minerals, the spin-cycle becomes more effective. Less water molecules bind to the fabric which results in a shorter drying time. This saves energy consumption from your tumble dryers by up to 40% and also saves on wear and tear on the tumble dryers themselves.  At present, all DIROÃÂÃÂ® systems are manufactured in Scandinavia, and when we order them we are having to take the distance into account for lead times, customisation and availability to customers.  We have an agreement in place to manufacture the DIROÃÂÃÂ® systems in the UK, what remains now is to boost our manufacturing capacity through pledges from this Kickstarter project.  Manufacturing in the UK will improve customisation capabilities and response time for customers allowing us to expand the business more easily.  The core functionality of DIROÃÂÃÂ® is washing without detergents. Allergy and Environmentally Friendly!  The following pictures shows how well a cold washing cycle with DIROÃÂÃÂ® is at cleaning away even the heavy dirt on firefighting clothing including HiVis and webbing.ÃÂÃÂ   Before:       After:       Before:       After:       ÃÂÃÂ        Washing with detergents leaves residue within the washing machines (see picture below).       ÃÂÃÂ   Washing with DIROÃÂÃÂ® and without detergents, means that all this residue is now history (see picture below).ÃÂÃÂ        Washing with mains water leaves lime-scale build-up on your machines heating elements, this is reducing the energy efficiency of your machine. (See picture below, left element).  Washing with DIROÃÂÃÂ® means that no lime-scale or dirt build up will occur within your washing machine. (See picture below, right element).       Both of these elements have been in use for 2.5 years (left: normal washing, right: DIROÃÂÃÂ® washing).  Washing with DIROÃÂÃÂ® does not leave lime-scale allowing machines to run better and reduce maintenance.  All of which is better for our environment.  The pledges from Kickstarter will also allow us to:  Boost our Technicians team  Boost our Sales team  Push marketing and our detergent-free vision   New Business    www.smart-water-filters.com/contact   Phone: +44.1234.889743      Risks and challenges  The main R&C is in not setting up manufacturing in the UK quick enough to best handle future orders.  We can overcome this by placing these orders with the patent holder in Sweden, but we would prefer to do the manufacturing in the UK so that we do not add carbon foot print through transportation.

Blurb: Attention Rideshare Drivers/Operators ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Your money! - $1 Rideshare app charge ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> You keep the rest! ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Donate $1 to kickstart!
Creator_description: I'm a 15/year software engineering and I've worked in over 500+ million of commercial, private and governmental digital products and projects.
Project_description: Service provider problem (downward trend):   IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve watched profits slowly escape hard-working service providers as rideshare app companies consume more and more profit. Based on current reports the average ride will cost drivers 25-50% through major ridesharing platforms; i.e. Uber and Lyft. With the growing demand on regulations for higher insurance for drivers and the overhead of maintaining a depreciating asset itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more important than ever to lower app cost.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Despite claiming to take just 25 percent commission on rides, ridesharing companies like Uber actually take up to 42.75 percent of their drivers. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s just for a minimum-price fare ride in San Francisco.  In other words: Short rides are becoming less and less profitable for drivers. For many ridesharing drivers in San Francisco (and elsewhere), almost half of a driverÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s earnings are lost to Uber.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  Other expenses to keep in mind include:   Gas prices    Car maintenance    Tolls    Self-employment taxes    Auto-insurance ÃÂÃÂ    We are proposing a ridesharing app the charges a flat rate of  $1 per ride   to the drivers/service providers . Our concept is to incentive drivers by a small fixed $1 charge per-ride for our ridesharing app and the driver/service provider pockets the rest. We predict that the quality of the ride will also improve for the consumer by lowering the monetary impact of the ridesharing app to the driver. This should raise the quality of service and help drivers save for newer vehicles, etc. ÃÂÃÂ    Our plan of action/strategy:   We are planning a 2/month prototype product release.  But we need your help to kickstart!  We are asking a  $1 contribution from service providers  who are disappointed and dissatisfied with the current state of the rideshare market. The quality of the rideshare service is not a cheap. LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s take back the rideshare market in favor of the people who use it!   Basic features of driver app:     Register/profile/status : with verification (tax number) and approval by an administrator, plus online status and schedule;     Booking : with options to accept or deny the incoming order, info on customer location and destination of a ride visible instantly, plus booking history;     Push notifications : for order alerts, taxi booking data (location, payment, route, etc.), for order updates and/or completion; ÃÂÃÂ      Navigation : e.g. using Google Maps or Google Places to get optimal directions to a customer and to his destination, could be voiced;     Cost estimation, reports, messaging, support .    Basic features of passenger app:     Register/login : email and/or social media login option, accounts, credit cards, payment processing;     Booking interface : a screen to enter the address to call a taxi to, select a cab type (or specific driver), set a location for pickup;     Tracking : to track driverÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s location, to make updates during or after a ride, etc.;     Price calculator : to check the estimated cost of a ride from point A to point B with certain cab type even before ordering;     Payments : cashless and in-app, paid automatically via credit card, users receive an invoice to phone and email, or just plain cash;     Push notifications : to keep users updated on order status, estimated time of taxi arrival, and other details like car model, license plate, etc.;     Messaging, ratings & reviews, booking history.  ÃÂÃÂ    Sincerely GydeCar      Driver Dashboard       Driver Tools       New Route       Route Real-Time       Earning Summary        Risks and challenges  The trend of low-cost hardware and data leasing through AWS and other cloud providers will allow us to minimize our processing and storage costs.  We will allocate roughly 30% to marketing and promotional campaigns to bring the rideshare solution to the immediate hands of users.

Blurb: An app to find a clean and hygienic place to nurse a baby, where ever you are.
Creator_description: I am a German/American. My mother immigrated from Germany about 15 years before I was born. It was always a struggle for her to find a hygienic place to nurse her babies. I have now set out to fix this problem for mothers.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ We want to find you a CLEAN and comfortable place (for example a hotel lobby bathroom). Hundreds of thousands of babies are born every day, but it's not always easy for mothers to find a clean place to nurse or change their baby. Since its not legal to do this in public places, a mother may be forced to take her new born baby into a place like a Mccdonalds or Starbucks bathroom. These bathrooms are sometimes used by thousands of people every week and carry a large concentration of germs. New borns are very susceptible to catching diseases. We want to offer a free app where restaurants and hotel lobby can take pictures of there bathrooms and allow mothers to come in with there baby and take care of them in a clean and comfortable space.     This should not have to be a reality, we can do better. And our app will be the first step in a temporary solution in this fight.    Our app will be the first step in a temporary solution in this fight. The ultimate goal is to change laws one day, ÃÂÃÂ and try to make the already challenging task of being a mother, slightly easier.  Here is a quick demo of the first pages of the prototype. We are still playing around with the color a bit.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                 Here is a little snippet of the prototype we have begun building. Mothers and/or fathers in need of a hygienic area, will be able to see there location and see clean hygienic place to take care of their baby.       Join our cause today! Any contribution helps!        Risks and challenges  It will be difficult to spread the word to restaurants and other establishments. So part of the funding will be allocated to help to bring restaurants, hotels and other places with a clean bathroom on board.
