But we need funds to get even more manufacturing ready as well as begin distribution to companies as well as backers like you. Thank you so much for your support. We cannot do this without you.       ÃÂÃÂ        Hi, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m Alex.Me and my team are avid golfers. We love the game and have been producing golf push carts for more than 18 years. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve made more than a million on the market under different brands. All we think about are golf and golf carts, nothing else.  But as we were making all these carts as an OEM, we were seeing a huge lack of innovation in the space.  Golf carts are big, bulky, and expensive, while golf bags and pushcarts were unwieldy and tiresome. We wanted something affordable that would ease the burden of carrying or pushing our equipment everywhere while still being able to walk and enjoy the course.  So we created eWheels. And...we love it! WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been using it since itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s creation and wondered why we didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t do this sooner. ÃÂÃÂ               ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have the toolings completed and built the first 100 units. Creator_description: We are a small team of creative audio enthusiasts located in Los Angeles, CA.  We believe in reproduction of music to be heard as if you are in front of a music concert or music studio.  We found that Beryllium has been used in home audio speakers for a couple of decades.  It was never really used for small earphones.  Once we created these small single dynamic driver earphones, we tested our earphones through frequency testing and distortion testing.We hope you become part of the Starbrick Team and help us bring the Be4 earphones into your music world.  Let Starbrick Be4 earphones be your new standard for your listening experience.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ    The Starbrick Be4 Earphones were created to enhance the quality of audio earphones. Bringing you music that sounds natural, as if it was being played live right in front of you, from the instruments themselves.   The mission of Starbrick Be4 is to deliver high fidelity audio by harnessing the technology of Beryllium. What is Beryllium? "Beryllium"ÃÂ¯ÃÂ¼<U+008C>it's Number 4 metal element on Periodic table. Atomic weight is 9.012182.Also it is the lightest metal element in Alkaline earth metal elements.ÃÂÃÂ  Since Be4 is the periodic element for Beryllium, we thought it was the perfect name for the Starbrick Be4 Earphones. Known as the fourth lightest metal element, and four times stronger than steel, Beryllium allows for a more coherent, powerful sound. Unlike other metals commonly used in earphones, Beryllium diaphragm speakers continue to provide warm and full sound up to 16 KHz. So, with the Starbrick Be4 Earphones, you can listen to music in itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s authentic form, straight from the studio.   StarBrick Be4 earphones are limited to a production run of 3000 pieces.  Each earphone comes with a hand numbered certificate of authenticity card.         What makes StarBrick Be4 Earphones different   One of the problems with earphones on the market is that construction of the earbuds if using cheap materials. When manufactures that use plastic parts and cheap diaphragms and generic drivers, delivering you muddy sounds and distortion at its highest volume.  The Starbrick Be4 earphones consist of an aluminum casing that is CNC machined on each individual piece.ÃÂÃÂ  The back casing is made of natural dark wood, therefore we combine both casing to bring the sturdy feel and look to these amazing earphones.ÃÂÃÂ  The other integral part of this earphone is the single dynamic Beryllium diaphragm within the casing.ÃÂÃÂ    We all want to experience clear, high quality sound without distortion. Knowing that feeling of being front-row at a concert, hearing the music as it comes alive and rocks with clarity with lush sounds.ÃÂÃÂ    With Starbrick Be4, there are no software effects that enhance the audio. Just the pure quality of the music, as it was mastered in the recording studio, unlocked by the Beryllium earphones.   3D Diaphragm          Frequency Ranges    The Highs   When you listen to high hat with the Starbrick Be4ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s, you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get the harsh sounds that can be piercing with a metallic tizzy. The guitar volume swells. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s smooth and fast at the same time.  The sounds of the cymbals are aggressive. The music comes alive and rings with clarity. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    The Mid Range    With midrange, you want to hear the silky soft sounds. The Starbrick Be4 lets you hear the definition of each instrument used in a song, feeling the physical impression of the instrumentsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> true sound.  YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re able to hear and identify the sweet, velvety voices and distinguish the smooth piano keys from all of your favorite artists.ÃÂÃÂ    The Bass    Bass performance is the most misunderstood aspect of reproduced sound. The popular belief is that the more bass, the better. This is reflected in ads for "subwoofers" that promise things like "earthshaking bass." What matters to the true music lover isn't quantity of bass, but the quality. The Be4 Earphones bring you the highest quality and best reproduction bass through our dynamic driver. You will hear the balanced bass.   Why do so many people in the world buy headphones and earphones?   The majority of users are listening to enjoy music. There are no economic factors as to why people use headphones or earphones.  Surveys tell us that music makes us happy, more productive, and better focused. So are we satisfied with sub par sounds from low-quality, high-priced audio equipment? LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s stand together, and demand more from the world we experience through our audio products.    The Starbrick Be4 Earphones, making high-fidelity Beryllium audio the new standard for every music lover.  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ     Be4 Earphone on top of the Starbrick presentation box        ÃÂÃÂ  Starbrick Be4 Silver Earphone: Starbrick logo on microphone         Be4 Rose Gold Earphone: Front - CNC aluminum casing & Back natural dark wood casing          *3.5mm Gold Plated Jack         In-Line Microphone:ÃÂÃÂ  button for calls(picking and hanging up), play and pause music         Starbrick Be4 Earphone presentation box: bottom compartment drawer        ÃÂÃÂ  Starbrick Be4 Earphone presentation box: Opening of presentation box         Starbrick presentation box: sneak peak of Be4 pouch and ear-tips holder        ÃÂÃÂ  Be4 Earphone Color Choices        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ              ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Limited Warranty   StarBrick, Inc. warrants to the original retail purchaser that this product is to be free from defective materials and workmanship for a period of one (1) year from the date of purchase, if it is properly used and maintained.  Please see www.starbrickinc.com for complete warranty information.        ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  No risks or challenges as Starbrick Beryllium Be4 earphones are in final production.

Creator_description: Where families unite and champions are born. DRR USA is a manufacturer of ATVs headquartered in Brunswick, Ohio. For nearly twenty years, DRR has provided safe ATVs to kids all over the United States. DRRÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s customers have over 99 National Championships under their belts in TT, motocross, flat-track, and cross-country racing. With products approved by the American Motorcycle Association, DRR provides a variety of CPSC compliant vehicles from youth to adult.
Project_description: DRR USA is proud to reveal the Stealth Electric ATV (E-ATV), a battery powered unit that offers a smooth, silent riding experience. This prototype Electric ATV is the first adult all-terrain vehicle of its kind. Most other electric all-terrain vehicles are small, can only travel short distances, and are made for children. Comparable in size to a 600cc adult utility four wheeler and comparable in power to a 300cc four wheeler, the DRR Stealth was developed to support search and rescue personnel, ecologists, environmentalists, hobbyists, and recreationalists. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a vehicle capable of assisting in the field, all without releasing carbon dioxide into the environment.             SEARCH AND RESCUEÃÂÃÂ    During search and rescue hearing cries for help is difficult over the loud noise of gas-powered units. The DRR Stealth Electric ATV is  completely silent  providing rescue workers with a potential life saving advantage.   ENVIRONMENTAL BENEFITSÃÂÃÂ    The DRR Stealth has significant environmental benefits  eliminating both carbon emissions and noise pollution . A standard ATV can release over 120 pounds of carbon dioxide (CO2) into the atmosphere with a single tank of gas. It can also clock in at approximately 80 on a decibel meter. The Stealth Electric ATV is both clean and silent.ÃÂÃÂ         APPEARANCE                              BATTERY LIFE / REMOVAL   ÃÂÃÂ Replacing the battery takes less than three minutes and requires no heavy lifting.                            To charge the DRR Stealth Electric ATV plug it into any three-prong outlet. It has a quick 6-hour charging period to get back on the trail faster. The 72 volt, 4-kilowatt lithium ion battery is not only lighter, but it charges quicker, supports a charge longer, is less harmful and can tolerate colder temperatures compared to traditional lead acid batteries.ÃÂÃÂ    As technology advances, DRR hopes to improve battery charge as well as develop solar powered charging stations.ÃÂÃÂ      DISTANCEÃÂÃÂ    Traveling up to 35 miles at maximum speed uphill with a single battery pack, an eight-hour day of intermittent work is completely possible without recharging. An optional second battery pack can extend the range up to 65 miles.    DIGITAL DASHÃÂÃÂ                              A full easy to read digital dashboard provides the rider with all essential information at a glance. The dashboard has an odometer, speedometer, and a battery charge indicator.   HANDLING   Steering is easy with the DRR Stealth ATV. The unit requires  no shifting  while the gearless system provides linear and consistent power on most terrains.    SAFETY                             Daytime running lights, light up dark wooded areas. Brake lights inform the rider behind the E-ATV to slow down or stop. When the brakes are applied, the electric motor shuts down. This prevents damage to the motor and saves energy so the battery charge can last longer.ÃÂÃÂ    Turn-Signal development is in progress.ÃÂÃÂ      BRAKES   Four disc-brakes mean twice the stopping power. Decreasing downhill speed is easy with the newer wave rotors that expel dirt, grass, and other debris. This allows the braking system to perform better while doubling the brake pad life.   ÃÂÃÂ  RACKSÃÂÃÂ         The front racks can carry a load of up to 125 pounds while the rear racks can carry up to 240 pounds.    SUSPENSIONÃÂÃÂ AND SHOCKS ÃÂÃÂ        Dual a-arm suspension eliminates bump steer and makes for a smoother ride. The shocks in front and rear will reduce fatigue and provide a more comfortable experience. Adjust the shocks with five adjustable pre-load settings, variable spring rate, and extended travel.    GROUND CLEARANCE   The Stealth Electric ATV has 12 inches of ground clearance. More ground clearance means tackling tougher terrain with ease. The smooth bottom chassis glides over obstacles and debris.    DIMENSIONS         FOOT WELLS AND FOOT PEGSÃÂÃÂ    Completely enclosed footwells keep the rider's feet where they belong while protecting them from sticks and other objects. Nerf bars can be risky and cause the tire to grab the riderÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s foot and jerk them from the ATV, the DRR StealthÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s foot well design eliminates that risk. Included for rescue personnel is a special foot peg that allows a second rider to sit behind the driver without interfering with their foot space.        At DRR, the things we care most about are family, environment, and providing the best product we possibly can for our customers.  The owner of DRR USA originally created the company after experiencing an ATV accident involving her youngest son. At the time, children's ATVs did not always have proper safety features. They were too narrow and often tipped over. To solve the safety issues, she decided to develop an ATV she thought would help protect her family while they enjoyed their favorite hobby. The result was a wider ATV, with slip-resistant seats, a safety tether, brake lights, daytime running lights, and fully enclosed floorboards.ÃÂÃÂ   That vision took off and ultimately created DRR USA, a small business headquartered in Brunswick, Ohio. For nearly twenty years, DRR has provided safe ATVs to kids all over the United States. Our customers have over 99 National Championships under their belts in TT, motocross, flat-track, and cross-country racing. While DRR is proud of its history, we are branching out into new territory with the electric ATV while still offering  family adventure, lifetime memories, and passion for the outdoors. ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ Click the links below to learn more:                                                                 DRR USA's created some rewards to thank you for your support! Our rewards include custom T-Shirts like the one below along with other items designed by the DRR Team. An ATV rear storage bag ties them all together and fits them right on the back of the Stealth Electric ATV.             Warning:  ATVs Can Be Hazardous to Operate, improper use may cause death. For your safety: Never ride on paved surfaces or public roads. Always wear a helmet, eye protection, and other protective clothing. Vehicle specifications are subject to change without notice. Ages 16+      Risks and challenges  Other than the weather, natural disaster...or closing of the Federal Government, we don't anticipate any late shipments of rewards. We will keep all our supporters up to date on any delays or changes.  All photos and videos shown above are of our product prototypes. While we expect everything to be working properly, keep in mind, you are receiving the first ever DRR Stealth Electric ATVs. DRR is proud of its customer service and will be available to answer any questions or concerns you may have about the products.  Depending on customer feedback and technolgy advancement aspects of the DRR Stealth Electric ATV are subject to redesign or change. We will maintain close communication with our community with any questions you may have.

Introducing - a Multi-function AI Lifestyle Management System        Like most people, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re probably wasting too much time searching through Facebook, Eventbrite, Meetup, public websites, etc. to find interesting events. Checking Google, iPhone, Outlook Calendars to match your free time with your friends' is probably zapping the energy and fun out of you.ÃÂÃÂ   You donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need to use the try & luck method to see who is free to join you when you have the iFUN APP. Creator_description: LightSUP Boards was born in a beach shack on The Big Island of Hawaii.  Our passion for Stand Up Paddling and sharing the life of the reefs is the essence of the Evolution of SUP!
Project_description: MADE WITH ALOHA \SUP/   E komo mai, welcome, to becoming a part of THE Evolution of SUP Ohana!! ÃÂÃÂ LightSUP Boards are THE most technologically advanced Stand Up Paddle Board on the planet.ÃÂÃÂ Our expansive viewing window, internal light ports, hydrodynamic design, durable construction, retractable handle and removable fin are the elements that encompass the most advanced Stand Up Paddle Board ever made! ÃÂÃÂ The stoke of SUP with the views of snorkeling, day or nightÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ #theevolutionofsup   LIGHTSUP BOARD MODELS   LightSUP boards come in two models. ÃÂÃÂ The Nightlight* model incorporates three internal light ports. ÃÂÃÂ The Daylight is identical, simply without the lights. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   MODEL SPECIFICATIONS   ÃÂÃÂ  Length:  10'6"  Width:  31.5"  Thickness:  4.5"    ÃÂÃÂ  Volume:  210L  Weight Capacity:  250 lbs    ÃÂÃÂ  Fin:  FCS Connect 8.0    ÃÂÃÂ  Handle:  LiftSUP    ÃÂÃÂ  Leash Plug/Camera Mount:  Connexsup Nose and Tail    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Traction Pad:  Two Piece     ÃÂÃÂ Three Light Ports *     ÃÂÃÂ  Includes:  Board with Traction Pad, Connect 8.0 Fin, Leash & Camera Plug   RETAIL PRICE $2500/$2000       LIGHTSUP ORIGINS  Our labor of love started in a beach shack on the Big Island of Hawaii. ÃÂÃÂ We have been involved in the SUP industry since its infancy. LightSUP Boards was born from the mind of an ingenious girl who was tenacious in her pursuit to make her board a reality! ÃÂÃÂ Mask on, face hanging over the board looking at the fish below year after year was our break time ritual. ÃÂÃÂ On a summer day in the shack while replacing the VU window in a boogie board, this 11 year old watching suddenly asks, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Dad why canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t we put a window in a SUP so I can look at the fish and paddle at the same time?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a very good questionÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦. Maybe we should try.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ A few weeks later, she asked if we could work on a design. ÃÂÃÂ We did, and that was that! ÃÂÃÂ   It wasnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t until after an abysmal summer rental season in 2017 that we realized, if we were going to continue making a living by stoking out guests on the ocean we needed a change. ÃÂÃÂ We needed her board to become a reality. ÃÂÃÂ After a year in development and several prototypes later, we tested our first prototype in February 2018. ÃÂÃÂ In October 2018, we began our Proof of Concept by starting a LightSUP guided tour on the Big Island @lightsuphawaii. ÃÂÃÂ We have been overwhelmed by the response weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve gotten by our Ohana, guests, passer byes, and our Social Media Ohana! ÃÂÃÂ        We realize that a Window SUP is nothing new. ÃÂÃÂ We realize Glow SUP is nothing new. ÃÂÃÂ We realize the brilliance of combing the two. ÃÂÃÂ This is not new either. ÃÂÃÂ What is new, is our version of the two, THE most technologically advanced SUP ever made! ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ELEMENTS OF THE EVOLUTION  THE WINDOW  Our expansive, dual pane window system is symmetrically designed to provide the paddler with maximum peripheral viewing. ÃÂÃÂ The window in intricately positioned to provide the paddler with line of sight viewing from the standing paddling position. The massive viewing area allows for simultaneous viewing by a passenger and paddler. ÃÂÃÂ The Marine Grade, Polycarbonate window panes are UV protected. ÃÂÃÂ A scratch protective film ensures clear viewing paddle after paddle.       THE LIGHTS  Our Nightlight Model has three internal light ports that are strategically positioned to maximize illumination of the area surrounding the board while concentrating the lumens to the line of sight view of the paddler. ÃÂÃÂ The ports are compatible withÃÂÃÂ multiple high power water proof led lights available. ÃÂÃÂ The port system allows for ease of removal for charging andÃÂÃÂ replaceability forÃÂÃÂ extended paddling. ÃÂÃÂ We have a strategic partnership with LumeCube.ÃÂÃÂ        THE CONSTRUCTIONÃÂÃÂ   We employ an entirely unique SUP construction process that creates the lightweight, hard board you would expect from a traditional epoxy construction, but with unparalleled impact resistance and durability. We infuse our thermoplastic resin into fiberglass cloth, through a thermoforming process. Thermal Composite TechnologyÃÂÃÂ is an evolutionary, clean construction process that makes our boards one of the most ecoÃÂÃÂ conscious Stand Up Paddle Boards on the market. ÃÂÃÂ Our boards are made to last season after season after season!       These are the some of elements that encompasses our claim. ÃÂÃÂ Our boards have a retractable handle for ease of transportation and can also be used to lock up. ÃÂÃÂ Our boards have a quick release fin system for ease of storage and transportation. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        LightSUP Boards is far more than a fancy Stand Up Paddle Board.ÃÂÃÂ  On a personal level, it is the culmination of the collective efforts of my Ohana working to make a young woman's dream become a reality.ÃÂÃÂ  The lessons sheÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s learned and the knowledge sheÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s gained by this experience are truly priceless and will pay dividends far beyond this company.ÃÂÃÂ  We truly could not be more proud for getting this far.ÃÂÃÂ  Along our journey, we could not help but focus on this being an opportunity to enhance the experience of the avid Stand Up Paddler, as well as attract those whoÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve never yet been inspired to try SUP.ÃÂÃÂ        As Michael Franti prophetically says "Do it for the love, not for the money." ÃÂÃÂ This is how many live in the Aloha State, loving life while hustling to make ends meet. ÃÂÃÂ Our Ohana is no different, making a living doing things we love, but just getting by. ÃÂÃÂ The truth is, we have put all of our meager savings into this dream and lack the financial where with all to take LightSUP Boards from custom made boards to production boards to meet the potential demand of the future. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Aloha! ÃÂÃÂ We are LightSUP Boards, an evolutionary Stand Up Paddle Board Company from the Big Island of Hawaii.ÃÂÃÂ  We are hoping to raise $25,000 to increase our production capabilities and share our Stand Up Paddle Board with Aloha with our ocean Ohana just like you. ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  When you're a little fish swimming in a big pond, seldom do you get priority in production queues.  There is a potential for delay in delivery, however our highest priority is delivering our evolutionary SUP to our LightSUP Ohana on time.  We have made the choice to offer a small quantity run to ensure we deliver on our pledge!

Simply mount it onto the power bank and enjoy fast, safe charging anywhere, everywhere. It is compatible to every smart devices support Qi wireless charging standard.       Charge your Qi-enabled device at the highest possible speed by simply docking it against the Power Bank: a great position that does not impede with ongoing business being conducted through your phone!                  The iMAG 10000 mAh has a stronger battery life and can fully charge a Samsung Galaxy S10 twice and an iPhone X for about four times.ÃÂÃÂ   Its slim and sturdy/ anti-slip design allows for charging on the move while holding in your hand, or you can simply place your device on the dock to instantly start charging.ÃÂÃÂ                                   Charge two devices simultaneously by utilizing both the wired (USB output port) and wireless options. Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   A collective of senior experts, the iMAG technical team has been deeply involved in wireless power supply, chip development, electronic product design and development, antenna design and other fields, and have thus accumulated rich theoretical experience and practice.  With the continuous breakthrough in the technical bottleneck of the industry, the team has accumulated mature technology and solutions in the field of low-power research and development, especially in the field of long-range, low-frequency magnetic resonance.  Presently, the iMAG team has developed a variety of pioneer wireless charging solutions with different charging distances and different QI standards. In the face of similar products on the market, our products have made new breakthroughs in function and appearance, and the price/performance ratio has further improved.                  Risks and challenges  We have more than 8 years of experience in research and development as well as the production of transformative electronic products since our team is composed of the most knowledgeable technology experts. We also have strong confidence in the production and transportation of our products as we cooperate with the most capable logistics companies. Therefore, we anticipate that the risks of our project will be very small.   So far, we have gone through the most difficult phase, the product prototypes and samples have been finalized. We now need and welcome your support to make this project a reality. If in any case you have any other questions and concerns, our team will be by your side to answer them all. Back us today and we promise you that iMAG will help you back!

Creator_description: We are an Estonian company which designs and produces hybrid smartwatches. We focus on quality and value through the integration of Swiss mechanical timepieces and technological customization.
Project_description: About  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  Leita Teuton Hybrid Smartwatch, A Perfect Combination of Intelligence and Fashion   ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ Teuton combines intelligent auto-time calibration with timeless hybrid technology. Designed with travelers, outdoor enthusiasts and watch collectors in mind, Teuton is a modern, self-sustaining and functional wearable that will keep you connected, informed and on timeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>while also complementing your wrist.ÃÂÃÂ Leita also integrates the highest quality Swiss "Ronda"quartz movement in this smartwatch.  ÃÂÃÂ  About ÃÂÃÂ   Leita Teuton: Hybrid Smartwatch  As seen on       ÃÂÃÂ Powered  By ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  Marketing Partner: ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ In Working Partnership with:       ÃÂÃÂ  Please Share ÃÂÃÂ   Sharing greatly helps our Kickstarter succeed and allows us to spend more time and money into delivering Leita Teuton smartwatches to you instead of marketing.             Introducing the Leita Teuton Hybrid Smartwatch   Teuton combines intelligent auto-time calibration with timeless hybrid technology. Designed with travelers, outdoor enthusiasts and watch collectors in mind, Teuton is a modern, self-sustaining and functional wearable that will keep you connected, informed and on timeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>while also complementing your wrist.ÃÂÃÂ                 Leita Teuton Mechanical Smartwatch FeaturesÃÂÃÂ     A new relationship with time designed by tradition and empowered by the digital age.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  Swiss Ronda Quartz Movement ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>The "mechanicals platinum" is the newest customized Ronda component to be utilized in the Leita smartwatch line, designed specifically for mechanical watch movements. The new automatic movement operates with a winding mechanism on both sides of the watch by means of a specialized ball bearing, designed exclusively for the Leita Teuton smartwatch line.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  Digital Innovation  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> Dual smart modes, activity tracker, phone call alerts, message notifications, custom responses, lost phone, stopwatch, music playback controls, and automatic update digital GMT.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  Engineering Feats  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> Support auto time calibration/Optical Heart Rate Sensors    Spotlight Functions of Leita Teuton     Swiss Ronda Quartz Mechanical Movement      Heart Rate Monitoring      Caller I.D.      Notification Reminders      Prevention Target Reminders      Sports Monitoring      Sleep Monitoring      Wireless Charging      Floating Touch Technology      Auto Sync Time      Sapphire Glass         Functionality Chart        Swiss Ronda Quartz Mechanical Movement    The Leita Teuton required significant engineering to maintain its traditional precision, while implementing today's connectivity .ÃÂÃÂ    The recently launched automatic movement R1000 Swiss Ronda operates with a winding mechanism on both sides by means of a ball bearing, designed and manufactured exclusively for the Leita Teuton Hybrid Smartwatch. ÃÂÃÂ        *Note color here is used solely for the purpose of highlighting feature components of the Ronda mechanical watch movement.            ÃÂÃÂ *Note, these numbers will not be seen on actual Leita Teuton Smartwatch, used in photo to help better illustrate the photo in a more visual manner.  Auto Time Calibration  The  smartwatch time  can correct automatically, allowing to read  time  accurately even without having to make any manual ÃÂÃÂ adjustment.ÃÂÃÂ    Health & Fitness        We understand monitoring is not enough, and insight matters. That is why our R&D team is constantly improving our data accuracy and aspire to develop the best motion detection technology.  Leita Teuton track your heart rate and steps, calculate calories burned, measure nutrition intake and much more. Leita Teuton enable you to enjoy more freedom and mobility. Map your workout route with built-in GPS, listen to your favorite music, and track your performance hands-free.  Teuton's powerful sensors precisely track real-time heart rate data, speed, distance, and GPS location. No need to bring your phone when going out for a run; Teuton will save and share your activity with your phone and Google Fit! Sync with Bluetooth headphones to listen to music or podcasts on the go.ÃÂÃÂ   Your Leita Teuton helps you measure your activities (speed, distance, time, heart rate and calories) for 20  types  of sport. ÃÂÃÂ   Notification Reminders  Keep track of all your notifications straight from your wrist and answer your messages without taking your phone out of your pocket.ÃÂÃÂ        In addition to Caller ID and Calendar Events, Leita Teuton displays your favorite social networks and app notifications from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Linkedin, Gmail, Skype, Uber, and more!ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  Teuton Rest-ÃÂÃÂ Gentle awakening at the right timeÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Wake up feeling refreshed, thanks to Rest waking you within a  30-minute  window during your lightest period of sleep. ÃÂÃÂ Teuton Rest  analyzes your personal sleep patterns , based onÃÂÃÂ your heart rate, heart variability, and your movements while asleep.   Hands Free Assistance   Never put your safety in jeopardy. While driving, simply flip your wrist to answer or hang up a phone call. Play phone calls out loud with TeutonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s built-in speaker. Use flip gesture to activate voice interaction and search for information on the go. ÃÂÃÂ         Floating Touch Technology   With new touch sensor technology known as "floating touch", you will be able to interact with the phone's touchscreen display without having to touch it at all. This special user experience is capable of registering the presence of your finger 20 mm above the display, allowing it to detect the screen coordinates that you are pointing at in addition to your finger's distance from the screen.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    Auto Sync Time   No need to set the time when landing in a different time zone: Leita Teuton will do it automatically in synchronization with your smartphone. Keep an eye on your hometown time zone too, thanks to added technology features to the smartwatch.   Wireless Charging   Not often found in most wireless chargers, is the ease with which you can position your device and still receive a charge. Many wireless chargers have to constantly be adjusted and it's a real pain to have to reposition your phone for it to begin charging. That's not the case with the Leita Teuton Charger Duo, which allows liberal movement around both the pad and stand.ÃÂÃÂ    Apps & Features        Leita Teuton pre-loads a series of useful apps, including "Dialer,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Calendar,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Health,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Fitness,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and many more. These apps were designed specifically for optimal smartwatch functionality. You can even use ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Find my phoneÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ to locate your phone from your watch!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Frequent OTA Updates   The Leita Teuton has been refined over 8 times since March 2017, with the continued devotion of our tester community. We are committed to listening to you, our community, and look forward to improving the Teuton even more with your help.ÃÂÃÂ    Android Wear powers Leita Teuton   ÃÂÃÂ Besides managing calls and messages, Leita Teuton empowers your active lifestyle with the convenience of Google Assistant, fitness apps like Google Fit, and the powerful ecosystem of Google Play. Google Play brings you apps that enable sleep monitoring, music detection, multi-language support, and much more. The possibilities are endless with your Leita Teuton Hybrid Smartwatch.        Designing Leita Teuton Smartwatch   The Leita team has put endless hours and effort into designing Teuton and optimizing its auto-time calibration capabilities. We have made countless prototypes. Tested. Refined. Redesigned. And finally reached a result that satisfied our thirst to redefine the hybrid smartwatch landscape. ÃÂÃÂ   Throughout the design and R&D cycle of the Leita Teuton launch we have made every effort to bring perfection to our loyal Leita family, and ensure people both like our smartwatches and look good at the same time.  ÃÂÃÂ  Ronda Swiss Quartz Movement ÃÂÃÂ                             Fit Movement:  Switzerland;ÃÂÃÂ Ronda GE-20 (2 Hands) ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Module Size:  33.0 mm, Thickness: Ronda 5.65 mm ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Product Size:  38.0 mm, Thickness: 11.5 mm ÃÂÃÂ    Memory:  RAM 32K, ROM 2M (about 2 weeks) ÃÂÃÂ    Display Screen:  OLED 72*40, 0.42 Inch ÃÂÃÂ    Button:  Physical button 3'o clock or Single TouchÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    Standby Time:  60 Days ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Motor:  Yes   System support:  Android 4.3 or iOS 8ÃÂ¯ÃÂ¼<U+008C>Bluetooth 4.0 ÃÂÃÂ    Acceleration sensor:  3 axisÃÂÃÂ    Bluetooth : BLE 4.0   Battery:  200mAh   Time display:  Support (RTC + time synchronization)ÃÂÃÂ    Waterproof degree:  3ATMÃÂ¯ÃÂ¼<U+0088>30m waterproof)  Leita CAD Designs                                                               Ronda Watch Movement Specifications               Leita Teuton CAD Blueprints      Long battery-life and special functionality     ÃÂÃÂ  Battery-life up to 10 years ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  2 hand movements with EOL system and power-saving mechanism ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  Have been assembled in Switzerland ÃÂÃÂ     Teuton Interface In-Action          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              ÃÂÃÂ  Seamless Mobile Application Experience ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ Compatible with both iOS and Android phones, offering a similar set of features and user experiences for both operating systems, Leita Teuton is your perfect companion regardless of your phone preference. It connects seamlessly by Bluetooth to sync activity and sleep data, and push all the notifications that matter to you.  ÃÂÃÂ  Leita Teuton Rewards ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  How Our Hybrid Smartwatches Are Priced So Well? ÃÂÃÂ        You think: How can a  luxury hybrid smartwatch  be so affordable?  Very easily! In the supply chain of each manufacturer, no matter what good, there are several positions such as manufacturing, distribution to wholesalers and the shop in which you finally buy the product. Each of these positions  costs money  and rightly so, salaries, research & development, ect... must be paid of course.  In this Kickstarter campaign, we  exclusively  offer you the opportunity to purchase a luxury hybrid smartwatch directly from us, without the need for a middlemen. That's why we can offer the Leita Teuton at this  unbeatable price .        Team & Manufacturing:   Leita is an international collaboration with team members in: Switzerland, Estonia, and China. Our team has designed and manufactured high-end watches and smartwatches for some of the biggest watch brands in Europe and we know the challenges and requirements for manufacturing and shipping watches at scale.ÃÂÃÂ Leita has already started the first manufacturing batch for quality assurance. The Android and iOS app is 100% complete. Both are ready for your pleasure when the Leita Teuton is delivered in AugustÃÂÃÂ Please do not hesitate to send us a message if you have any questions or comments.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  Watch Design ProcessÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                               Short video clip showing the watch face design phase.           You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                               Video clip showing the watch band design phase.  ÃÂÃÂ   Founder        Todd Johnsen  has spent his career in IT both in technical support as well as development and project management in the United States, Argentina and Estonia. His studies include IT, computer sciences and data science. In 2017 as a co-founder of athome.com.ar, he was invited and admitted as participants in both TechWeek Chicago and Startup Grind 2017 Global Conference in Silicon Valley, California. Since 2018, he has been working full-time as a co-founder of Leita OÃÂ<U+009C>. They are an Estonian company which designs and produces hybrid smartwatches focusing on quality and value. At present Leita OÃÂ<U+009C> is also a member of Startup Estonia.   Recent Testimonials   "The Leita Teuton is the first of its kind watch that contains both an elegant look, while also ÃÂÃÂ having great functionality that people actually use. The mobile app for many smartwatch devices is not user friendly and difficult to navigate, but this mobile app is simple and easy to use for all types of people."   -Tom GilbergÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ   "I love the look of classic analog watches but would find the extra digital capabilities extremely useful without having to charge it every day. Finally the smartwatch that takes care of everything! Everything about the features that excite me. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    -Roberto Weiner  ÃÂÃÂ   "This looks like a much better idea than a "smartwatch" that just duplicates my phone and needs constant recharging. This watch packs both great software and hardware into a seamless design, along with a cool mobile app. Lastly, the Leita Tueton is sleek, but does not have a typical smartwatch look."  - Tom Anderson  ÃÂÃÂ   "I love smart technology and I also love good mobile apps. I've been let down by terrible battery life in the smartwatches I have owned so far. To have a watch with a decent battery life makes all the difference when traveling as I often don't have any ability to charge my devices."   -Carla Samuels  ÃÂÃÂ    Ways to Contact UsÃÂÃÂ    1. Back our campaign andÃÂÃÂ leave a comment on our Kickstarter page.ÃÂÃÂ   2. Send a direct message to us on Kickstarter.ÃÂÃÂ   3. For further support, ÃÂÃÂ  leitatechnology@protonmail.com ÃÂÃÂ   4. Follow us on our Facebook page; ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.facebook.com/leitawatch/ ÃÂÃÂ    Why Kickstarter?   We pay close attention to our Leita customer base and listened to their feedback from previous watch releases and realized that many of these loyal fans were Kickstarter fans also. Your input is vital to us, and we strive to reflect it in the evolution of our products. Kickstarter is the perfect platform to serve as a launching ground to impact all corners of the globe, and enables brands to "pre-sell" a product without having to know exact numbers and amounts in the initially.Our Kickstarter community has encouraged us, challenged us and inspired us to be better. Together with your support we continue our commitment to make great technology accessible to everyone and make people excited about wearing watches again!   People Powered   Leita is all about the power of people coming together to help buildÃÂÃÂ  something meaningful. We want to challenge the smartwatch industry big guns and showÃÂÃÂ  them that independence, community and innovation can play a lead role inÃÂÃÂ  the mobile industry. ÃÂÃÂ Our community is a vital part of the process andÃÂÃÂ  plays a huge role in making something that is people-powered.ÃÂÃÂ    Team Leita   Founded in 2017 by ex-engineers, developers, designers, Leita aspires to define the next generation of technology combined with fashion. 80% of our team are world class engineers, and we strive to make great technology accessible to users all around the world.Thanks to our loyal global partners we now have a small office in Tallinn from which we are extending our global footprint, with a focus on expanding our international presence in all parts of the globe.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  The Impact ÃÂÃÂ   Our Leita Teuton Hybrid Smartwatch has the chance to disrupt the wearable technology market in that it provides both value and quality. The smartwatch market is still in a late infancy stage so there will continue to be new players who have a competitive advantage to offer, but are not yet household names. We are offering a device that is able to perform all necessary daily functions while also being a timepiece that you can show off to your friends.  Leita Teuton Timeline           Risks and challenges  Our vision for Leita Teuton has always been to produce a smartwatch with both classic styling and leading technology. There have been big challenges in bringing Leita Teuton to life and for nearly three years our team has been working long hours to refine and optimize the design, technology, production and logistics for Leita Teuton.  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve worked diligently with our partners for many months to fine tune every aspect of the Leita Teuton and identify and eliminate any areas of weakness which may cause issues with performance, durability and user satisfaction. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve invested an enormous amount of time and our own finances on research, development, sourcing, prototyping and testing. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re in the final stages of this and we need your help to get over the last hump and make Leita Teuton a reality.  Secondly, we have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our shipping timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterward. We also back all our watches with a 1 year warranty and satisfaction guarantee.   Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Kickstarter community!

Cosmos Daisy is small in size and this small footprint makes it easy to take the Cosmos Daisy anywhere you need it.       Cosmos Daisy has all the functions to maintain the perfect temperature anywhere you want. Cosmos Daisy is super quiet (55 db) and equipped with dehumidifier function to maintain the right humidity and provide maximum comfort. No condensate drain is needed for Cosmos Daisy as it uses the recycled condensate technology. It is completely drip and leak proof.       Cosmos Daisy can be run on any voltage available. You can run it on 12V DC directly or 110VAC/240VAC. It has built in power supply to convert 110V/240V AC to 12V DC.       In cooling mode, Cosmos Daisy simply cools the air by using solid state devices and exhaust the hot air out the back. Simply connect the exhaust duct included in the box to exhaust the hot air outside the space you are cooling. Air intake for both cold and hot side are located at the bottom. Make sure that your air intakes are not blocked while running the unit as it could result in overheating of solid state devices due to lack of airflow. Cosmos Daisy doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t use heating coil. It heats the air by reversing the cycle of solid state devices. It reverses the cycle by changing the polarity of voltage. By reversing the cycle, it exhausts the cool air out the back and by using the exhaust duct you can exhaust the cool air to the outside. Creator_description: Originally from the San Francisco Bay Area, I now reside in Charleston, SC, aka Silicon Harbor. I pitched for seven seasons of professional baseball with the Atlanta Braves Organization before giving it up to build TheCause. I graduated from the College of Charleston with a degree in Business and an eye for social entrepreneurship. For fun I love to play outside with my dog Parker, visit my family out West, mimic my girlfriend's British accent, golf, exercise, see live music, listen to podcasts, and read. And of course, root on my old teammates still playing ball.
Project_description: The Nutshell  TheCause is a mobile crowdfunding app designed to help users raise money and awareness for the charities and non-profits committed to changing the world. Users can run, walk, or bike miles that are tracked through the app or synced through a fitness device (e.g. Fitbit/AppleWatch).ÃÂÃÂ        Users gain  Sponsors  by sharing their campaigns through posts via social media.  Sponsors  who are moved to help can donate by simply clinking on the link in the post. They can choose to give a flat donation or sponsor the user by the mile, making the user responsible for earning their support. Posting updates weekly will keep your sponsors in the loop and attract new sponsors to your cause, increasing the value of each mile. As those miles add up, you start raising serious funds for your cause. As if waking up early for that morning jog isn't an accomplishment in itself, imagine seeing you've raised $50 for cancer research by running a few miles before work.ÃÂÃÂ   For example: Jenna just started her cause campaign to raise awareness and funding for mental health to benefit the National Alliance of Mental Health. Her first week she receives 5 sponsorships after posting to Facebook. Each sponsor is willing to give Jenna $1 per mile for 2 weeks. Jenna runs 3 miles every morning before work and averages 2 miles walking about during the course of the day. After the first week, Jenna has moved 35 miles and raised $175! Overcome with excitement she shares her progress and again asks for support through Instagram and receives another 5 sponsors willing to donate $2 a mile for 1 week. By the end of week 2, Jenna has raised $700 for her cause!ÃÂÃÂ        After downloading the app from the App Store, you create a profile or sign in with Facebook and choose your cause and the charity you wish to benefit. From there, users pick their goal amount or timeframe, and share their cause with their social media following. As soon as the first sponsor comes in, you can start running, walking, or cycling to earn those pledges!ÃÂÃÂ         Sponsors  also have options when pledging by the mile. They can either choose to donate by the $/mile and timeframe, 3 weeks for example, for the user to log as many miles as possible. Or, they can pledge a $/mile rate up to a certain amount, with no timeframe. This is to add financial protection to the sponsor avoiding surprise credit card statements after sponsoring an ultra-marathoner. ÃÂÃÂ   Once the campaign reaches their goal or the timeframe is done, the users will be able to extend the campaign or send their earned sponsorships to their chosen non-profit or charity.ÃÂÃÂ        Everyone has a cause. Is it your grandfather's Alzheimers? Your sister's Diabetes? Or maybe your cause is providing clean drinking water or access to education in Third World countries. If you don't think you have a cause, then enjoy your fantasy world but don't clog the sidewalk I run past you. The rest of us live in this world and my cause is cancer. My mom was diagnosed with Leukemia a year ago. ÃÂÃÂ I'm not a doctor or scientist so I can't cure it, but I'm far from hopeless, and she doesn't have to battle alone. TheCause is designed for people like you, people like me, people who aren't okay sitting by and waiting for change or miracles. But you know what? I am Change. If I can't cure cancer myself, I'm going to run my ass off to fund the people who will.  The Story  Less than a year ago I was signing autographs for kids who came to watch me play baseball. Everyone knows that the wand chooses the wizard, and for me, my magic came when I picked up a baseball. Fast forward twenty some years, and I was living out the dream I had my entire life: to play professional baseball. ÃÂÃÂ And at 28 years old, in the peak of my career, ÃÂÃÂ I gave it all up.  I received a call from my Dad one night after a game. "Son, your Mom's cancer has reached her brain. You need to come home now." ÃÂÃÂ Red-eye flight from Atlanta to San Francisco. I found my mother in a hospital room, tubes and machines connecting her to life. I'd never seen her look so small, so broken. I realized I had come home to say good bye.ÃÂÃÂ   I was brought up to believe that I was the master of my own fate and that anything was possible if you didn't give up. As I slept in a hospital chair next to her bed those nights, I was overcome with helplessness. The realization that the virtues that propelled me my whole life were were a lie, turned me into an angry, ungrateful, self-pitying mess. As friends and family sent their best wishes and words of encouragement, I couldn't help but feel hollow.  My Mom never ceases to amaze me. She stabilized. ÃÂÃÂ I was a fool to doubt her strength and inspired by her, I found my own. ÃÂÃÂ The doctor told us, somewhat more elegantly, that she's not about to die, but rather, slowly dying. Progress. Now there was time for me to do something, now there was time for me to save her. I spent days walking around the hospital trying to come up with a plan. Pacing and thinking.  Ok, I'm definitely not a doctor or a scientist.  Pacing. Thinking.  Holy shit. There are a lot of sick people in this place.  ÃÂÃÂ Thinking. Pacing.  Why is everyone sitting around waiting for the enevitable? Do something! ÃÂÃÂ  Pacing. Pacing.  Sorry. That was harsh, all I'm doing is turning oxygen into carbon dioxide and putting one foot in front of the oth--.   Light Bulb.  Once my Mom convinced me she was going to fight this thing, she told me to go back to my team and continue pursuing my dream. I listened to her. What she didn't know is that when I tendered my resignation from the Atlanta Braves, it was the beginning of a new dream.  Since then, I enrolled back in college and graduated with a degree in business, I built a prototype for this very platform, and a plan to make it happen. Recently, after a success bone marrow transplant, my mom has been declared in remission! She won her battle but the war isn't over. Disease, Hunger, Pollution, there are too many causes to name and not enough being done about them. I realized, through my own experience, that it's really hard to know what you can do. Of course we'd all like to writes thousand dollar checks and send them to charities, but for most of us it's not realistic. We can't all become doctors, researchers, freedom fighters, or full time activists. TheCause is built for people who want to do more but maybe don't know how. ÃÂÃÂ By putting one foot in front of the other we can raise money and awareness for the issues we want to help. Doing more allows us to be more.ÃÂÃÂ   The irony of using a crowdfunding platform to raise money for a crowdfunding platform is not lost on me. I wish I could run to earn your pledges. I would run as far as it took to reach this goal. Instead I hope to earn your pledges by trust. Trust that I will build something that will help the millions of people, like you and me, who want to impact the world. We can do this by funding the movements, the research, and organizations who do what we cannot. Their progress depends on our support and our hope for cures and change depends on them.  I am asking for your help to raise $10,000. With it, I can partner with a development team who will help build what's called an MVP or Minimum Viable Product. It is a basic, version 1.0 of TheCause App. It might not have the sophisticated GPS, or sync with all fitness devices, but will be functional with iPhones and Androids using your phones integrated pedometer to track steps and an algorithm to translate your steps to a fairly accurate mile tracker.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Facebook's Birthday Fundraisers raised almost half a billion dollars last year. While that is an enormous amount of money going to good causes it isn't enough. Imagine being able to raise funding year round. And instead of asking for support for turning a year older, you are actively earning it. I promise, there is nothing more fulfilling or inspiring than giving a piece of yourself to better the world. Give your sweat.  If this Kickstarter is even more successful and we can raise more than the $10k, I can integrate some very cool user features that will help you grow your Cause Campaigns. If you have features you'd like to see built in, please share them with me. I want to build the platform you want, not the one I think you want. With additional funding we can add features like:  -Team Campaigns, you and your group team up to raise money together. By utilizing the exponential reach reach of more team members you'll be able to earn more sponsors faster which equals huge donations! -GPS integration, to track your mileage even more accurately. -Fitness Device Compatibility, to track mileage and fitness goals more efficiently without having to have your phone on you. -Access to more charities/nonprofits, there are 75,000 charities and nonprofits in America alone. TheCause Charity database will start with the biggest but will eventually expand to your local organizations. Our challenge will be vetting these smaller charities to make sure they are properly accredited so you know your fundraising money will not be pocketed but used to make a difference. -In-App posting to all major social media outlets. Facebook will be included in Version 1.0 as users will be able to login with their facebook profile or an email address. In the near future, Twitter, Snapchat, Instagram, and Youtube will be integrated as well. Until then you'll still be able to post a link to your Cause Page for you Sponsors to donate from, but the goal is to make your campaign reach as wide and seamless as possible. -TheCause Apparel, customized clothing for your Cause that your Team or Sponsors can purchase with a portion of that money going towards your fundraising goal. I've done charity walks before and it is so great to see a group wearing the colors and names of the people and cause they're honoring.

Blurb: A billiard ball Cleaning and Polishing machine
Creator_description: Mosens LLC is a family run company located in Indiana specializing in development, design and manufacture of innovative products for sports and recreation. Our flagship product is the QMD (www.cue-md.com), a first of its kind training aid for billiards. Clean Gleem is another product we have under development and moving towards commercialization.
Project_description: Informed pool players know that clean pool balls are essential for accurate shots and consistent play. ÃÂÃÂ Smudged balls with finger prints, chalk residue and other dirt just don't react predictably. ÃÂÃÂ With dirty balls shots throw erratically, clusters don't break apart crisply and the dreaded skid is more prevalent. ÃÂÃÂ Regardless of how skilled you are or how much you practice, those tough shots aren't going to drop if you're unsure how the balls will react.  Clean Gleam is a patent pending billiard ball cleaning and polishing machine. ÃÂÃÂ It quickly, conveniently and thoroughly cleans your balls to make your shots more predictable and accurate. ÃÂÃÂ If you demand the highest standards in your equipment or are just a casual player, properly cleaned balls will make your games more enjoyable and in some cases more profitable.        What are the benefits?   If you've ever cleaned a set of pool balls by hand you know it's time consuming, not to mention forearm tiring. ÃÂÃÂ Easily neglected, hand cleaning is not something you look forward to and often the result is balls not as well cleaned as they should be. ÃÂÃÂ In commercial settings daily hand cleaning of multiple sets of balls just isn't practical but clean balls is something players appreciate and expect.   Clean Gleem quickly, conveniently and safely cleans an entire set of sixteen balls in minutes. ÃÂÃÂ Your balls will always have an attractive shine and the consistent play you and your opponents/patrons expect.    Clean Gleem is specially designed to minimize it's size and weight. ÃÂÃÂ With a footprint of about 12" x 28" it's an easy fit on a shelf or counter. ÃÂÃÂ Weighing in at about 45 pounds it's easily portable yet substantial.    With it's solid build and attractive natural wood finish Clean Gleem will complement the decor of your home room. ÃÂÃÂ You'll be proud to display it.    Using full ball bearing construction and a powerful, constant-duty 1/4 HP motor Clean Gleem will stand up to daily commercial use and a lifetime of home use. ÃÂÃÂ     Easily, economically replaceable polishing pads will keep the Clean Gleem working like new over the years.    Clean Gleem uses a totally unique, patent pending spiral roller technology that ensures a quick, complete cleaning of the entire surfaces of the balls and gives them that new ball gleam. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          How to use Clean Gleem   Aramith Billiard Ball Cleaning solution is recommended for cleaning your balls with the Clean Gleem machine. ÃÂÃÂ Aramith is made specifically for cleaning phenolic balls and gives them a nice luster without a slick, oily feel. ÃÂÃÂ Other solutions, particularly automotive products, often contain silicon or waxes that, though real shiny, are excessively slick, play erratically and wear off during the course of a match leading to inconsistent play.ÃÂÃÂ   To clean your pool balls rub just a SMALL dab of cleaner onto the entire surface of each ball with a cloth. ÃÂÃÂ The Aramith cleaner quickly dries to a dull haze. ÃÂÃÂ Place the balls into the Clean Gleem machine and turn on the timer switch, a few minutes is all that's needed. ÃÂÃÂ If your balls don't need a complete cleaning you can quickly 'freshen them up' any time without using cleaning solution, it just takes a minute. ÃÂÃÂ Then remove your balls, wipe off any dust with a clean cloth and you're ready to play.ÃÂÃÂ   How it Works  Under the hood Clean Gleem works with a unique patent pending system of belt-driven, ribbed, spiral wound rollers. ÃÂÃÂ The rollers impart a spin and tumble to the balls so all surfaces contact the cleaning pads, resulting in a complete, quick cleaning. ÃÂÃÂ The cleaning pads are replaceable, just remove the worn pads and press in the new. ÃÂÃÂ The pads are 3/4" Velcro loop self adhesive strips easily obtained at fabric stores or many on-line sources.       Other pool ball cleaning machines you may have seen are large, bulky and use a revolving platter design. ÃÂÃÂ Clean Gleem is unique with it's spiral roller design that allow it to be lighter and more compact while providing a fast, complete cleaning. ÃÂÃÂ   For a good look at the inner workings of Clean Gleem check out this video of our first prototype the the Clean Gleem.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Specifications  Approximate 28" x 12" footprint, weighing about 45 pounds, operates with 115 volts/60 Hz (standard North American) current, using 5.3 amps.ÃÂÃÂ         Why Kickstarter?   As with most small businesses funding is tight and market acceptance of a new product is uncertain. ÃÂÃÂ The Kickstarter platform, with its great community of innovators and early adopters, provides us with a way to address these problems.  Being able to introduce Clean Gleem to market will be possible with the help of Kickstarter supporters. ÃÂÃÂ It will allow us to...   Finalize development.    Source parts and arrange manufacturing in economically viable quantities so we can provide Clean Gleem to our users at an affordable price.    Obtain the visibility and acceptance of Clean Gleem in the pool playing community needed for further growth and refinement.         Where We Stand   We've hand crafted a small number of Clean Gleem machines and are very pleased with how well they work. ÃÂÃÂ We have discussions underway with cabinet shops and parts suppliers to arrange larger volume manufacturing. ÃÂÃÂ We are confident that we'll be able to deliver Clean Gleem machines to our backers in a timely manner.  As soon as we are successful in securing the necessary funding we plan to go into production and begin shipping units as they're completed.           Risks and challenges  We are close to finalizing the Clean Gleem design and have prototypes that work great.  Our largest remaining challenge lies in manufacturing - essentially obtaining parts and assembling.  Thus far we've identified and established relationships with various suppliers to obtain parts in small volumes.  The next step is manufacturing larger volumes in a timely manner to satisfy our pledge commitments.  We don't anticipate problems but unexpected shortages, assembly delays and quality control issues can occur.  If this happens, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Blurb: We are collecting photos to rebuild original Notre Dame in Virtual Reality
Project_Community_top_cities: |Warsaw-Poland:6 backers|Singapore-Singapore:1 backer|Detroit-United States:1 backer|Las Vegas-United States:1 backer|San Francisco-United States:1 backer|Tucson-United States:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |Poland:6 backers|United States:4 backers|Singapore:1 backer
Creator_description: MichaÃÂ<U+0082> ÃÂÃÂ»urawski  A creative soul and pioneer in creating comprehensive methodologies of 3D reconstruction. He gained experience as an author and executor of innovative digitalization projects for top Polish universities. He is a 3D geek with a professional photography background. Applying the newest technologies and taking advantage of cloud computing is a break and bread for Michal
Project_description: Regarder une vidÃÂÃÂ©o avec sous-titres franÃÂÃÂ§ais. La traduction du texte ci-dessous est disponible sur    la page     Wideo dostÃÂ<U+0099>pne jest z polskimi napisami. TÃÂ<U+0082>umaczenie poniÃÂÃÂ¼szego tekstu dostÃÂ<U+0099>pne jest na ÃÂÃÂ    stronie     WHY?   15 April 2019 Notre Dame, the symbol of France and Paris, burned. The discussion about the future of the Cathedral is still in progress. Will it be rebuilt exactly the same as it was? Will it be changed? There is plenty of ideas, including futuristic ones, that assume to change construction completely. Despite our point of view on the future of the Cathedral, I think we can agree: the memory of the original shape of the Cathedral can't be lost. That is why we need a virtual model, that can be used to educate young generations or simply to admire the beauty of the original one.  The value brought by 3D modelÃÂÃÂ     Educational 	  ÃÂÃÂ    The model will serve as a base for virtual tours. All objects will be marked with comprehensive information in writing. We'll also create a virtual tour guide in many languages. The tour will be optimized for different age groups. Rich animations, professional lectors and interactivity will bring the new quality to the learning. Of course, the tour will be free to use worldwide and adapted for the VR headsets, PC and smartphones. Every school in the world will have an amazing opportunity to show the beauty of the Cathedral. ÃÂÃÂ     Cultural 	  ÃÂÃÂ    We will create a model which will last forever. The historical value will be preserved and accessible across the globe.    Accessibility 	  ÃÂÃÂ    The model for the visually impaired. As we have experience in creating 3D printed spatial orientation maps we would like to prepare the model adapted for visually impaired needs. The files will be free to use for everyone who has 3D printer and wants to print it. We also would like to give to the city of Paris the model to be used by visually impaired tourists.    Virtual reality stand ÃÂÃÂ    We want to open a mobile VR exposition that will allow people who don't own VR headsets to experience virtual reality for the first time!   Not only Notre Dame. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s just a start! leveraging gained experience and developed techniques allow to implement solutions to other places and objects of world cultural heritage.    HOW?   We believe that the people, when are united, can do amazing things. We believe in free and open education. We believe in the power of The Cloud. In one sentence: We believe in crowdfunded open source projects. ÃÂÃÂ   With modern technology, we use photos and movies as a source to create 3D shapes. Those can be used to prepare Virtual Reality. So we can create Virtual Notre Damme using your photos and it will be exactly as it was before the catastrophe! Using Cloud Computing power and cloud storage we will be able to calculate the hundreds of billions of the pixels. Those data, after processing, can be used to create complex 3D presentations, models for visually impaired and VR tours.    WHAT DO WE NEED?   The scale is power. We need, hundreds of thousands of photos or movie frames. Basically, we need every photo and movie that you took. Even a selfie from your smartphone! ÃÂÃÂ    Share your photos ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  HOW WE WILL USE YOUR SUPPORT  ÃÂÃÂ   The goal is to raise 10.000 euros. This is an amount that covers only costs of collection, storing, software and computing power. What does it mean? If we have this goal achieved we can create a solid base for future work. It will be a 3D model published online with a detailed description. This model will be open for everyone and can be used in 10 or 50 years by everyone if there will be need. So basically the goal of the collection will be enough to preserve the original shape of the cathedral.  Every extra dollar above the sum will add a possibility to extend features and application of the 3D model. On the top of the solid base, we will develop virtual tours, adaptation for render engines and model for visually impaired.  As those ideas need hundreds of hours of work we won't be able to finish it without extra financing or volunteering. So if you want to help us with this project, go to the  volunteers ' page or sponsor our project.   The future of our past is in The Cloud.       Risks and challenges  The only real risk is that we won't collect enough materials for reconstruction. So tell your friends and share info on social media and it will never happen!

Blurb: the new revolutionary system for self-draining your garden and avoiding stagnant water
Creator_description: Hi I am Francesco Martinelli, the owner of Idroter, I was born in 1963 in Tuscany, graduated in Geology in 1990.Actually live in Padova-Veneto, I have the joy of 3 daughters 20, 18, 13 years old.I believe that this idea can be shared all over Italy, and abroad, who knows?
Project_description: I moduli drenanti IDROSAC sono dei sistemi brevettati per realizzare il drenaggio del terreno, sono realizzati in geotessile non tessuto per filtrare l'acqua dalla terra e riempiti di trucioli in polistirolo espanso che conferiscono al sistema ottima permeabilitÃÂÃÂ  all'acqua.  Questi trucioli di polistirolo espanso sono ricavati da sfridi di produzione che altrimenti verrebbero bruciati negli inceneritori o messi nelle discariche con notevole impatto ambientale.  I fondi vengono raccolti per sostenere una campagna promozionale al fine di incentivare l'uso di questi sistemi al posto della ghiaia e degli inerti in generale, la cui escavazione ÃÂÃÂ¨ causa di danni all'ambiente, e diffondere l'uso di questi prodotti a base di plastica riciclata.      Risks and challenges  Non ci sono particolari rischi nel progetto, dal momento che tali tecnologie sono conosciute per applicazioni diverse; obbiettivo ÃÂÃÂ¨ quello di mettere alla portata di tutti gli utenti questi sistemi per applicazioni domestiche: il drenaggio del proprio giardino.

Blurb: Auto adjustable grip | Touch to release | Ultra silent motor | Owl design w/ eyes as charging indicator | Qi-compatible | Type-C input
