Creator_description: We have been committed to the research, develop and manufacture of telecom products including Qi wireless chargers, Bluetooth earphones, portable speakers, batteries, adapters, cables, etc. certified by CE, FCC and ROHS.
Project_description: Mallper is an auto-clamping, one-touch to release car mount that gives you easy and safe access to your phone and delivers an exclusive high-speed wireless charge of up to 15w while driving the car. It affixes to your carÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s dashboard/windshield with a suction cup or clamps on the air vent with a clip. The mount also features a hinge and a swivel ball that allows rotation and extension of your phone to a comfortable viewing angle in portrait or landscape mode. The cradle design holds and locks your phone securely in place even on bumpy rides while giving a power boost to your phone when using GPS, taking hands-free calls, and more.            Incarnated in the unique form of a cute yet stern owl, Awl adds chicness to your dashboard while reliably holding your phone for you for an easy access to audio controls, directions and messages, etc. while you are driving. It is blessed with a built-in infrared sensor in its tummy that opens the wings as you approach it and automatically embraces and locks your phone securely into place.       Its two feet give stable support to your phone on the bottom. To release, gently touch its feet and it will let go. One hand operation makes everything easier and safer for you road warriors.ÃÂÃÂ             Mallper offers wireless charges to compatible phones @ 5W, 7.5W, 10W and all the way up to 15W, which is 30% faster than other standard ones.ÃÂÃÂ        This will work if you have a Samsung Galaxy S9 Series, Huawei Mate 20 Pro and other Qi Fast Charge-enabled smartphones. It charges your phone without the hassles of wires and just a few minutes of charging will give you more battery life than most chargers. It keeps your phone staying charged while you are on the road all the time.            Mallper features an ultra silent and responsive servo motor that opens and retracts the wings in smooth and quiet motion with barely noticeable noise compared to other loud auto clamping car mounts. And once the phone is placed, the wings will close and stop when they reach the side of your phone and clutches it with the right amount of force that locks it in place without breaking it, regardless of what size it is or whether the case is on.ÃÂÃÂ             The owlÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s eyes light up in blue once the power is plugged in, providing a great feedback on that the device is up and ready and an indication on the location of the device in the darkness. ÃÂÃÂ When your phone is clipped in and charging, the eyes light out. The eyes blink on detection of any foreign object (keys, metal phone case, etc.) placed on it.            Mallper provides a strong clamped hold and suction while being mounted to the air vent, dashboard or the windshield, preventing your phone from being jiggly when you glance at it while you drive.            Mallper features a swivel ball that allows a 360ÃÂÃÂ° rotation that can easily set your phone in different viewing angles.ÃÂÃÂ        Landscape mode is ideal when using navigation apps, while portrait mode makes hands-free calls and listening to music much easier.            Mallper keeps your phone stable and wobble-free even with sharp turns on bumpy roads, giving your phone an uninterrupted charge.             Mallper uses a standard USB-C connection (adapter not included).ÃÂÃÂ        It has built-in safety protection from overcharging, overcurrent, short circuit and temperature control.       And intelligent circuit for real time optimization of wireless charging power.            Mallper is accompanied by a dual port USB car charger exclusively made of aviation level aluminum, delivering 36W MAX super fast power not only to Mallper, but also to almost all models of mobile devices.ÃÂÃÂ                                                          Incarnated in the unique form of a cute yet stern owl, Mallper adds chicness to your dashboard while reliably holding your phone for you for an easy access to audio controls, directions and messages, etc. while you are driving.ÃÂÃÂ        ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s one hand operation makes everything easier and safer for you road warriors.ÃÂÃÂ             Shenzhen Lambon Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008, and is a vendor for professional telecom equipments. We have been committed to the research, develop and manufacture of telecom products including Qi wireless chargers, Bluetooth earphones, portable speakers, batteries, adapters, cables, etc. certified by CE, FCC and ROHS. We have modern dustfree mills and factories with advanced equipments for product testing, sorting and loading. Products out of well-equipped production lines and cutting-edge technologies are extensively applied in various industries such as telecom, security, oil, transportation, etc., and are sold to countries domestically and globally.ÃÂÃÂ        This campaign is initiated by our US branch. We adhere to the aim of achieving top Credence, Quality and Service and relentlessly pursue intact integrity, reliable product quality and good customer service. We look forward to working with businesses all over the world for mutual benefits. ÃÂÃÂ                              You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                      Risks and challenges  With our experience, we can foresee and de-risk most of the difficulties faced in production. However, if anything unexpected happens, you can rest assured that we will never compromise on the design and functionality of this product. If there are any unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide an estimated delivery date.

Blurb: Control all your IoT devices anytime from anywhere. Secure, easy interface, intelligent, compatible. IFTTT timers, email parsing, more.
Creator_description: Experienced in web design since 1995. Interactive web systems since 1999.Awards; big-name clients (The Smithsonian's etc.); long-term projects successfully delivered, maintained on-time and on-budget.
Project_description: A solid controller for your smart home, garage, office. Nothing to install; it just works!   Adds Timers and much more to IFTTT . Unique features like email reminders of payments and meetings to clients, birthday greetings for friends and family, incoming email parsing. Super affordable, stable, easy-to-use.ÃÂÃÂ   "Shut up and take my money": for just $20 add unlimited devices to your account. Includes unlimited On-Off operations via SMRT.casa interface (grandma-easy, teen-cool design.).  Automation: ÃÂÃÂ includes up to 20 processes running on our servers simultaneously . Examples: you set 3 weekly payment reminders to your clients by email, 10 yearly Birthday greetings to friends and family by email, 2 sprinklers and a basement dehumidifier running on auto loops, AC program, bedroom humidifier on a loop, robot vacuum on schedule, electric vehicle or scooter charger timer. Any 20 time/date-based automations at any time are included!  Need more? - upgrade to another reward level and never worry.  Higher reward levels save you more money.  And now the details:  Your Smart Home is actually pretty dumb. Let's fix that!       It's not you, it's the setup. The setup is just too complex.ÃÂÃÂ   Who has the time or inclination to fiddle with tons of different brands, settings, and scenarios? Even if you are a die-hard Smart Home enthusiast, do you really want to come home from work and start writing some more code just to have your light bulb automated? Okay, maybe the die-hards would; but even they need a break now and then.ÃÂÃÂ   Imagine this: your devices somehow started working together intelligently. Not just by the "smart" name on the box, but in reality. Wouldn't that be wonderful!   The ideal Smart Home controllerÃÂÃÂ        Such an ideal system would be quick and simple to set up with a wide range of connected devices while allowing much flexibility. It would have an easy setup wizard in case you needed something done in a jiffy. At the same time, it would allow granular control over every device, should you decide to unleash your inner tinkerer. And it would work absolutely everywhere (not just on rPi server... just saying...). Your home controller would securely work on every smartphone, PC, Mac, tablet, Kindle, anything connected to the Internet. From anywhere in the world. At any time of your choosing. Because nothing is more annoying than leaving for a vacation in Paris and suddenly remembering you didn't turn off that AC in your Arizona house.ÃÂÃÂ   Is this some utopian vision, or can it be achieved with this Kickstarter?   The good news:  It actually can happen, with your support!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        We have designed the easiest-to-use system to help you set up your connected devices. Moreover, it is full-featured with rich functionality and compatibility with virtually every connected device. It is super affordable, too (plus: save even more money with this special Kickstarter-only double bonus offer!)  There's nothing to install or maintain. Smart Casa just works for you.  Make Your Casa Smart Again! (take this tongue-in-cheek reference as a jab or a homage, your call.)   This one is pretty smart, you know  smRt it is. See, we tried many names. For instance, "your-smart-home-controller" sounded technically correct but a bit tedious to type as a web address. So we settled on the name that is short and sweet. Nope, it ain't shawty. Let us introduce you to your intelligent home/garage/office controller:   SMRT.casa ÃÂÃÂ        See what we did there? Smart Casa. Sweet and intelligent. And boy, is it short and easy to type in your web browser. SMRT.casa has a well-designed web interface and it works in any browser.  Remember the specs of an  ideal system ? (flashback:  it should work absolutely everywhere. On every smartphone, PC, Mac, tablet, Kindle, anything connected with the Internet .)ÃÂÃÂ   Done!   What can SMRT.casa do for you  The usual stuff - plus some pretty awesome, exciting, unique stuff!       - easily monitor (is my AC still on?) and  intelligently control your home devices  (turn my lights on/off in a random pattern to ward off the bad guys while you are on vacation or just out of your home/office). Of course, besides intelligent automation, the simple  turn On/Off  operations are always available at a button click as well, from anywhere in the world.  - integrations via IFTTT  and  directly with some API-enabled devices  - set  automation with timers  (start charging my electric scooter at 14:30, then turn off after 2 hours) and logic (if a new client email is received, blink my office desk light twice). Did you know...  neither IFTTT nor Google Assistant has any timers ?  SMRT.casa fixes that  for you.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   - easily see and change any settings at any time;  -  parse emails  sent or forwarded to your unique SMRT.casa address. You set the keyword-based rules in the message's Subject and Body (endless possibilities here; think Zapier built-in at no additional cost);  - send out  email reminders on-schedule  (payment reminders to the clients; birthday greetings to your loved ones, etc. With the email-to-SMS gateway, this may also become SMS as well.)  - all this and more, from anywhere in the world with an Internet connection.  Secure account, private server, NO sharing of your personal information. In fact, only a bare minimum of your info is ever kept - just enough for servicing your account, and it is promptly encrypted... both on the way to our system and on our server.  Religious email support. The meaningful one, you know, not just bouncing you off and blaming you for everything like some others do.  We want you to be happy with SMRT.casa   Oh, and SMRT.casa works on anything - smartphones, tablets, desktops, Kindle, Mac, PC, iOS, Android, Linux... literally on anything with a web browser. There is nothing for you to install or maintain - just log in to your SMRT.casa and voila. Control or monitor your home, garage, office from anywhere in the world, any time.   Log in / Interface Demo as of now:        Why SMRT.casa is better  - It  does work when everything else fails . SMRT.casa keeps working even if your local Internet or your electricity (gasp!) is out. Email parse/send service, as well as all other online services in SMRT.casa will keep functioning as-scheduled. Your clients and important contacts will be notified as if nothing happened, and your cash flow / data flow will continue as normal.  - Unlimited,  secure access anytime, from anywhere . What if you are NOT on the smartphone where your app is installed? What if you are NOT next to your home automation hub's screen? Bummer. On contrast, SMRT.casa is accessible anytime, from any device with Internet access, anywhere in the world. No need to be glued to any particular gizmo.ÃÂÃÂ        -  Easy  to set up, easy to make changes. Feels like you have to be a nuclear scientist to set up your smart home? No more! SMRT.casa lets you set up everything very easily. Making changes, as well as monitoring your things, are equally easy and intelligent with SMRT.casa -  our interface is specifically designed for simplicity of operation .  - Clearly  see what is going  on at any particular time. SMRT.casa gives you both an overview and granular real-time monitoring of your devices' states and what they are programmed to do next.  - Available in  your language . Hi! Bonjour! Hallo! ÃÂ<U+009F>ÃÂ<U+0080>ÃÂÃÂ¸ÃÂÃÂ²ÃÂ<U+0096>ÃÂ<U+0082>! SMRT.casa is available in multiple languages, with ALL of its features/labels localized. (Coming up; English available by default right now.)  -  Unique features: email parsing  - SMRT.casa detects and acts upon any keywords you set up as triggers. Other services charge you an arm and a leg for the email parsing, but with SMRT.casa this feature is built-in!  -  Unique features: email reminders . Shoot out email notifications to your clients with meeting or payment reminders. Friends and family birthday greetings -  never forget the date  as SMRT.casa will send them out automatically on the schedule you have pre-set! Set them up easily, choose the frequency and the message, then pause/restart/delete as you please. ÃÂÃÂ There are other companies that only offer this one task - and charge you for it - while this is a built-in SMRT.casa feature! Awesome!  - And more.  We take care of the tech. You enjoy your smart life.   Fuck the cloud!       Yeah!!  ...um, well, I dunno. Let's talk about this one for a sec. Take something as familiar as email, for instance. An email? Aren't we talking about the smart home? Yup. Stay with me, you'll see the connection momentarily.  I don't know about you but neither of us here have an in-house  email server . All our email needs are covered by the cloud-based service providers. No-one is complaining or getting spooked by this fact - it is just a given. And boy, you should see some private stuff that gets sent by email.ÃÂÃÂ  So then, it's okay to rely on some cloud-based service for such an important thing as email.  And don't get me started on electricity, mobile communications, etc. etc. - none of them are managed as your private in-house system, either. Unless you are a country president or an Amish, that is.  Is this just a question of habit? Email is ubiquitous, therefore we never question why is it cloud-based. We don't feel threatened by the perceived lack of privacy, possible leaks, or an occasional interruption of service. We know from experience that all such events are exceedingly rare, so  we are not  really forced to build and maintain a private email server in-house to mitigate any of those factors. In fact, most would consider such proposition to be utterly ridiculous.  Then why are we so threatened by a cloud-based home control system? You know, it does have all the advantages of, say, a  cloud-based email  that we all successfully utilize for many years already.ÃÂÃÂ (I told you there was a connection, didn't I.)  Surely you can stay local with anything, including building and maintaining your own home automation server - but how local can it really be when the APIs of your devices still go through the servers in China?   Well-behaved cloud is good for you       ÃÂÃÂ We really think that since the Internet-based (cloud) services are good enough for regular folks and big businesses-alike to rely on in their everyday tasks, from email to online software suites, then they also should be perfectly fine in a smart home controller.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Please support SMRT.casa  - it provides you with a fine service without the need to install or maintain anything locally! And that's a good thing. You have better ways to spend your time. Please watch the video to see how it works. Make a pledge.   All I heard was blah blah. I want my privacy!  And we are taking your privacy most seriously. We do care. After all,  we are already running our own homes and offices on SMRT.casa  as we speak, so we do have a vested interest in the privacy of this system!  Firstly: no private, identifiable information is kept by SMRT.casa, ever.ÃÂÃÂ        SMRT.casa has time-proven data protection techniques in place to protect your privacy.   No-one will know your real name . You can use any name you want, for example just your first name or an alias. This has no bearing on SMRT.casa functionality at all. And whatever you enter,  your name will be encrypted  in our records anyway. Both  your email and your account password are also encrypted  in SMRT.casa so if the database leak occurs (which is unlikely), all the data scrambled by our encryption will be totally unreadable. (BTW, your email is considered public information anyway... we are just making sure it does NOT become public by us.)ÃÂÃÂ    We will NOT know where you live.  Moreover, we will NOT know any of the locations where you are using SMART.casa. In fact,  you could not enter your address if you wanted to  since there's  no such field  in your SMRT.casa account.ÃÂÃÂ    We never know or record your full payment information ; just the date and amount go into your account for bookkeeping.ÃÂÃÂ   As you can see. we take great care of your privacy by not knowing who/where you are, and by encrypting the little we do know. All interactions between you and our system are also SSL-protected, so as your data travels in-between, it is getting securely encrypted.ÃÂÃÂ   The evils of  marketing: no worries , either! Your email address is safe with us, as well as your SMRT.casa logs, even as they are anonymized: we will not sell or disclose any of it to anyone, that's our promise. You are not paying us with your data; rather, we just ask you for the very minimum amount that allows us to sustain this system for you. Refreshing to know your data is not being mined, isn't it?  Don't be afraid of the cloud - if it is SMRT.casa cloud!   Compatibility       SMRT.casa smart home monitoring and control system is compatible with virtually any IoT device and cloud service. Certainly with all of them that are IFTTT-enabled. Here's a compatibility shortlist:  ecobee; LIFX; IFTTT; Philips Hue; Lutron CasÃÂÃÂ©ta and RA2 Select; MagicHue; MagicLight WiFi; My Leviton; August Locks; Sonos; eWeLink Smart Home; Sonoff; Life360; Cortana; Google Assistant; Invoxia Triby; Weather; Air by Propeller; AirNow; Ambient Weather; BloomSky Weather; WeatherFlow Smart; Weather Stations  Source: https://ifttt.com/services   Wait, why do we need SMRT.casa if there's a free IFTTT?  You probably already know the answer if you actually tried IFTTT (which we love, by the way!) In IFTTT, there are no timers; there's no email parsing or scheduled reminders; there's no way to make complex automation; and on. On contrast, SMRT.casa provides all that plus we are planning on making our own API bridges to the popular devices and services, making your smart home/business control and monitoring abilities even more flexible and more independent.   Is SMRT.casa easy to use?  SMRT.casa is designed to be easy and clear to anyone, even to the non-technical people. My mom uses it. 'Nuff said.        Release schedule:  - Running this crowdsourcing project and collecting funds: up to Sep 15  - Releasing the fully-working public version of SMRT.casa to you: Sep 30  Unlike other projects,  you get a very little wait with us !   Can we actually deliver?  Yes. A large range of projects very successfully delivered to a number of important clients in the last 25 years. We were trailblazing web design since the dawn of the Internet's mass appeal (the year 1995) and the first interactive Web 1.0 projects since 1999. Never stopped developing ever since. You can say we know what we are doing.ÃÂÃÂ   SMRT.casa is our favorite project, so rest assured you will enjoy the best of the contemporary functionality.  Besides, much of the work is already done - see the demo! Let's make the final push with your help now.   Why Kickstarter?       While the SMRT.casa system is already live and working fine for us and some other early adopters, we still need to put together the parts needed for the public release. Such as, polish the looks of the account creation page, the smart procedures, and other system blocks. Right now they do work in the "hardwired" mode. This Kickstarter will allow us to finalize their development with the nice-looking, convenient interface you will love to use.  Domain transfer from the provisional one (controlfu.com) to SMRT.casa - it takes some money and effort, too.  Paying off the partial costs of up-to-date development (we have already covered 90% of its cost ourselves out-of-pocket) and part of the domain names and server/DNS setup costs.   How much you can save:       With this special Kickstarter, your yearly cost can be  as low as just $1.60/month  ($19/yr) with  double the benefits  offered on our site. Think of it:  just for the email parsing part ,  other providers are charging $240/year  - that's TWELVE TIMES more, yikes! Compare that to what you are getting from SMRT.casa, and the choice is clear.  Suddenly,  your unruly Smart Home devices and services start playing nice  with each other and, most importantly, with you - once you support this SMRT.casa Kickstarter!  Use SMRT.casa for easy, yet intelligent setup and control of your Smart Home, Garage, and Office.   Choose your pledge now  to make this happen ASAP. Thanks! (check out this Kickstarter's special  double benefits , too!)      Risks and challenges  25 years of experience in the interactive web design, with many projects commercially delivered (not on Kickstarter.) There is some risk of certain devices/services changing their settings and not being available at all times. We will work on rectifying the issue if/when this happens. Overall, your risk is low. The prototype system is already in use by us and some early adopters, successfully.

Blurb: A plastic melting machine which uses friction to melt plastics. Give plastics a second chance.
Creator_description: Is an industrial engineer with a passion for nature, technology, mechanic and electronic.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ In 2015, a study showed that the human race has produced over 6.3 billion metric tons of plastic waste. Just 9% of it was recycled, 12% was incinerated and 79% was discarded in landfills or the natural environment.ÃÂÃÂ        The process of recycling reduced the consumption of water, reduced the generation of CO2 and also saved between 700-800kg of petrol/tons of plastic.     Purpose of the project    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ This project was created from a desire to increase recycling, including plastic products that are not recyclable (plastic film, bottle tops, plastic bags, etc ), and to provide a cleaner planet to our future generations.  " Every year we buy around ÃÂÃÂ 3.7 million tonnes of plastic products in the UK. Much of this plastic ÃÂÃÂ is packaging, with only 842,000 tonnes being recycled.    Much ÃÂÃÂ of the plastic we use ends up in landfill. This is either because it is ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ currently not possible to recycle, individuals don't take it to be ÃÂÃÂ recycled or local authorities don't accept it ." ( Source http://www.bbc.co.uk/guides/z9tysg8 ÃÂÃÂ "Why can't I recycle all plastics?")   Let's give plastic another chance          ÃÂÃÂ Description of the projectÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Most of the companies use to melt plastic an external source or chemicals.The machine created by me will use friction.   How is possible?    "When surfaces in contact move relative to each other, the friction between the two surfaces converts kinetic energy into thermal energy"   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ If you don't understand, just rub your palms for one minute.  The melting machine is composed of a fixed cylinder and a rotating core which rotates on with different speeds depending of the temperature.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The distance between the two parts at the top edge will be 20 mm and at the bottom and at the bottom will be 2 mm. The difference in the gap between the top and bottom will force the plastic to create friction which will generate heat.ÃÂÃÂ   In this process, the contaminating materials and different plastics that cannot be recycled will be reduced to small fragments and integrated into the melted plastic.    What is possible to do with this mixed plastic?   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ After the prototype will be completed ( with your help ), we will create samples of objects which the purity of the plastic will not be a requirement. For example, street cones, protection fences, feet for fences and much more.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The biggest challenge for the project is to be funded and if is not funded I will try to find other ways to get funds, because if we don't start to clean the planet now we'll get to a point where we are not going to be able to stop the climate change anymore. THIS IS THE ONLY HOME  WE HAVE.

Blurb: 6-Band Audio Spectrum Analyzer with 6 x IN-9 NOS Nixie Bargraph tubes (Ready-to-Play or as an electronic DIY kit available)
Creator_description: <!DOCTYPE html><html class="users_profile_about fontface no-js" data-request-id="74d36ddb-9590-4efd-8b9c-f7a6b9524c8e" lang="en
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ  ...the successful founded EM800 Magilyzer... ÃÂÃÂ   I was asked from many customers to build a similar kit but with an alternative display.  So Mr. Nixie has taken the EM800 Magilyzer and the former Nixielyzer kit, which is sold out, put them in a pot, added a heftyÃÂÃÂ dose of the legendary Mr. Nixie Magic, and finally a new kit, the  IN-9 Nixielyzer  was created.ÃÂÃÂ                    The  IN-9 Nixielyzer  is an analog audio spectrum analyzer, based around the BA3830S analog analyzer chip. It offers the display of six selective audio bands:  63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz and 10 kHz.  As an extra feature, you can mix the signal of a build-in microphone to the display, to use the IN-9 Nixielyzer as a stand-alone device when no wired audio source is connected.       The  IN-9 Nixielyzer  operates with six vintage NOS (New Old Stock) IN-9 Nixie Bargraph tubes and has two RCA stereo in- and outputs (for easy daisy chaining the device within an existing audio path) and also two 1/8" TRS jacks for simple connecting your MP3 player, mobile phone plus headphone for listening etc.  Both signals (RCA and 1/8" TRS) are only internal mixed via an electronic zero ohms node and do not affect each other.       The  IN-9 Nixielyzer  uses no digital signal processor or FFT (Fast Fourier Transformation); so the display is stepless and fully in realtime.  Furthermore a modified   dbx compandor   ciruity was introduced to enhance the displayed dynamic range.  The topology of the analoge electronics corresponds to that of the proven EM800 Magilyzer circuity.            You surely know a VU meter, which shows the level of an audio signal, on the DIY market often build with LEDs.     Self made LED spectrum analyzer found on Ebay    The  IN-9 Nixielyzer  now separates this audio signal into six selective bands and show their special audio level within this frequency range:   ÃÂÃÂ  63 Hz  = Low Bass (e.g. Bassdrum)    ÃÂÃÂ  150 Hz = Mid Bass (e.g. Bassguitar)    ÃÂÃÂ  330 Hz  = Low Mid (near concert pitch of the most musican instruments)    ÃÂÃÂ  1 kHz  = Mid of voice frequency (e.g. the "beep" sound for indecent words in interviews)    ÃÂÃÂ  3.3 kHz  = Presence (e.g. "sch" in the word  Schedule  or the imitated sound of a steam locomotive)    ÃÂÃÂ  10 kHz  = Heights (e.g. "sssss")   And as an absolute unique feature, the  IN-9 Nixielyzer  displays the level not on "ordinary" LED display or VFD display or on a computer screen or even in an App of your mobile phone but on  six IN-9 Nixie Bargraph tubes  made as surplus in the end of the 80's in USSR.        PCBs with double sided silk screen.    All necessary electronic components.    All necessary mounting hardware.    Complete enclosure with all necessary covers.    15 VDC wall mart power supply with EU mains or 12 VDC with adaptors for EU/US/UK/AU is included.    On request 6 x IN-9 tubes.      Assembled PCB with fitted tube board          DC-Power 12...15VDC 1A max.    Power consumption 1...12 VA depending on volume, normally ~4 VA.    Input impedance 22 kOhms.    Very less generated heat.    Stereo RCA in- and outputs, connected in parallel, for easy daisy chaining in an existing audio path.    Two 1/8 TRS inputs, also connected in parallel, as an alternative for MP3 player, mobile phone, headphone etc.    The signal of both output paths (RCA and 1/8 TRS) do not affect each other.    Selectable audio channel for display (right / both / left).    Build-in microphone signal can be mixed for display.    63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz and 10 kHz audio spectrum level are displayed.    Build-in modified dbx compandor circuity for extended display dynamic range.    Variable blanking time and hight voltage adjustment for minimizing the issues specially with Argon filled tubes.    Easy to remove the small tube board for smooth and secure transport / shipping.      The bare PCBs          4 hour of your evening time with no hurry.    A clear, well-lit area in which to work.    Soldering station with fine tip and fine electronic solder.    Multimeter to check the generated voltages.    Electronic tools.    A loupe may be helpful.    TX10 (Torx) and slotted screwdriver.    Download of the manual.    Enjoyment of your work of course.    6 x IN-9 tubes (offered separately).    A line audio source or simply use the build-in microphone.    Dimensions (W x D x H): 135 x 95 x 160 mm incl. tubes      The assembled main PCB                   The word "Nixie" was formed from the words  N umeric  I ndicator e X erimental No.  1  ÃÂÃÂ and first introduced 1954 by Burroughs Corporation from USA as a brand name for numeric displays. Nixie tubes were used until the mid of the 1970's as displays in measuring devices, calculators, TV sets and the very first computers. The evolution of modern style display types like Numitron, VFD, Light Emitting Diodes and Liquid Crystal Displays, which have a very low supply voltage (battery power supply) eliminated these Nixie tubes from the market, and they are not produced anymore. In the former USSR Nixie tubes were produced as surplus in vast quantities until the beginning of the 90's ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> and from this sources are these tubes. ÃÂÃÂ But even these supplies are now running short. And when they're gone, they're gone. The tubes are taken from "NOS", what means  N ew  O ld  S tock. They were never used before and spent their first thirty or more yearsÃÂÃÂ forgotten in some Russian warehouse. The principle of the Nixie tubes is based on a cold cathode discharge and it is used today a million timesÃÂÃÂ e.g. in small neon bulbs of illuminated mains power switches. ÃÂÃÂ   The IN-9 Bargraph tubes in the IN-9 Nixielyzer are a specialÃÂÃÂ construction of such a neon bulb, it can produce a current depending variable glow hight lenght when a current regulated voltage of around 140 V is applied, and it was used in the USSR for example as a simple device to monitor the mains voltage range.      A vintage Russian mains voltage meter with IN-9 tube, found on Ebay     Often I was asked: "What is the lifespan of a Nixie tube" and than there is a simple answer: "Have a look at your illuminated power switch of the multiple outlet strip. How many years does this small neon bulb lights continously without any aging issues?" ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The new IN-9 Nixielyzer is a further development and improvement of the first DIY version which is now sold out. Many customers have asked me to create a new and cheaper device. The very first prototype PCB are arrived, so that I could build some working prototypes and take photos / videos. Thanks God ;-) there were no bigger issues as the electronics and the circuity are proven by the EM800 magilyzer and the former sold out Nixielyzer. However, as now the prototypes are finished and working reliable, the PCBs / electrical / mechanical parts needs to be ordered for a bigger batch of devices to get an affordable price.   For a "reference" see my finished project here:  https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nt-smd-rgb/nixietherm-rgb-in-13-nixie-tube-thermometer   https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nt-smd-rgb/audio-spectrum-analyzer-with-em800-magic-eye-tubes   https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nt-smd-rgb/nixietherm-nixie-bargraph-tube-indoor-thermometer

Creator_description: SB Components Ltd is a specialist UK manufacturer of protective cases for single board computers and microcontroller boards. Our designers are experts in producing robust, functional and elegant cases that protect and augment technology platforms.Our bestselling Raspberry Pi case (over 1,000,000 worldwide sales) is a market leader in quality affordable design. Our aim is to provide high-quality products at low prices. In addition to the standard product range listed on this site, SB Components Ltd will also undertake bespoke case and electronic component projects. These can range from the addition of logos, or changes to color/materials of existing products to the creation of completely bespoke engineered from scratch products.
Project_description: We all love to play, don't we! No matter the age... :)ÃÂÃÂ   And we are also the techie generation for the  STEM  basics. (Psst... Its alright if you are new to this, you can still read the story ahead).ÃÂÃÂ   So, we at SB Components came out with a concept where we decided to give the pleasure of both programming and playing, together. After all:       We wanted to design and develop something that can help any one (technical or non-technical) explore their vision of creating something cool while on the play! And this was made even better by introducing the popular micro-controller  BBC micro:bit  board.            For those new to the micro:bit community, here is a short summary ofÃÂÃÂ " What micro:bit is all about " and what this tiny board is capable of.ÃÂÃÂ   This time, we wanted to explore our ideas for the micro:bit (unlike our other campaigns).ÃÂÃÂ   The  micro:bit  was the most recent project by the BBC in an effort to bring computer science education and  STEM  topics to every student worldwide. It is now so popular that every maker community has it and there are numerous projects and campaigns designed and developed for the micro:bit exclusively.                            So this video here, by the BBC micro:bit tells us about its popularity. You can code, customize, and control the micro:bit from anywhere! Listed below are few of its in-built features.       The micro:bit can be used for all sorts of unique creations, from robots to musical instruments and more. And this time, it could be more fun because we have integrated the " fun and learn"  concept.       We present to you  the Stem:Bit! ÃÂÃÂ   An easy to assemble and play with  blocks kit  for micro:bit.  Yes, you heard it right, a programmable blocks kit.   As the name suggests, it is compiled using 2 different yet the widely used terms, " Stem " from the  STEM Education  society and " Bit " from the  micro:bit  community.ÃÂÃÂ   It basically focuses on indulging every kid and/or the techie to play and have fun along with learning to program. It gives a boost at learning the programming with micro:bit and playing along.        In other simple words, with Stem:Bit kids can utilize micro:bit to  fully realize their ideas  and  truly unlock their imagination while on the play.        The kit is actually a programmable blocks kit that has more than 260 building blocks! Its  core is the micro:bit and the micro:bit Stem Board .       The Stem board is a specially designed expansion board that is used for programming different movements, structures, sensors etc using the micro:bit.       Stem:Bit is an easy to assemble and design codes about learning how to program the moves of different structures using the micro:bit. Using Stem:Bit you will learn programming, electronics, robotics and many more.       The easy assembling of the blocks to form many structures. and it is made even more easy with the help of an assembly manual that comes with the kit.       We have designed this project manual book (approximately 200-300 pages) especially for the children so that they can learn to make different applications using Stem:Bit giving them the scope to improvise and enhance their vision of programming and learning.                            2 High-Power RGB colorful searchlights    3 SMD RGB programming lights    Drive three 5V servos, easy to play with robotsÃÂÃÂ     Drive two 3V DC motors, easily experiment with small fans/smart carsÃÂÃÂ     Buzzer can be programmed to play various songs and musicÃÂÃÂ     Powered by 500mAh high-capacity lithium batteryÃÂÃÂ     Charging via a USB cableÃÂÃÂ     Multiple protection circuits: over-discharge protection, over-charge protection, and reverse-connection protection    Expansion board integrates an infrared ranging pair tube, a high-precision tracking probe, and an ultrasonic module interface    Transform the entire expansion board into a smart car chassis for a micro:bit smart carÃÂÃÂ     Three kinds of communication interfaces:  IIC, SPI, serial ÃÂÃÂ communication , easy to expand PS2 controller, Bluetooth module and other external devices.ÃÂÃÂ               Gentle warning..! You may end up having endless fun!   After all, there is a lot to do when you have a huge collection of the block to compile together.  To quote a few names, find the examples below about a few structures that you can build with the Stem:Bit.       This will help you to learn Infra-Red sensors and it let you program the very famous ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  Line-Following Robot. Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  The biggest difference with this kit is that we have combined the electronic components with building blocks, and users can control them with micro:bit programming, such as  infrared remote control, obstacle ÃÂÃÂ avoidance, tracking, colorful lights  and other functions. The building blocks are also  compatible with LEGO , that if you are interested in building blocks and want to learn programming, this building block will be a good choice. ÃÂÃÂ        Additionally, you will learn the simple yet practical IoT theory, interfacing of different sensors, make robotic movements with the structures enhancing the robotics concepts.  Learn controlling the robots using the wireless game pad.                 Stem:Bit building blocks kit provides multiple basic models. With a ÃÂÃÂ wealth of circuit components, it can achieve many creative plays, such ÃÂÃÂ as remote control tracked vehicles, magic lights robots, robotic arm towers and so on.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Building blocks and electronic modules are used to form a smart robot car, which can be programmed to avoid obstacles and track automatically.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        With more than 260 building blocks, it ÃÂÃÂ can form more shapes and be controlled by programming circuits.       Stem:Bit programming building block kit can be expanded to other models with LEGOÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ building block. Children can complete their own ÃÂÃÂ work with a rich imagination.  Since it is based on the BBC micro:bit, thus it supports a variety of programming methods, supporting the online graphical programming ofÃÂÃÂ Make Code Editor and Python programming. You can realize your program creativity on computer or mobile app.       Since it is based on the BBC micro:bit, thus it supports a variety of programming methods, supporting the online graphical programming ofÃÂÃÂ MakeCode Editor and Python programming.                      Thank you for reading out our campaign. :)  As a token of thanks, we'd like to stretch our rewards for the backers.       ÃÂÃÂ A cool micro:bit pocket case with each Stem:Bit once we reach ÃÂÃÂ£25,000. Show us your love and get this cool case for free!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        A game pad with each Stem:Bit once we reach ÃÂÃÂ£50,000. Show us your love and get this cool game pad for free!ÃÂÃÂ                                            Risks and challenges  The SBC team, with each of its project campaign, has learned a lot and we have now been able to put our efforts towards the campaign maintenance and operation. The Stem:Bit has been designed, developed, prototyped and tested by our team for several months alongside verifying its design and production specifications. We will start the mass production as soon as the project receives 100 percent of the funding, even before the end of the campaign.  As for the challenge of delivery, we have already established a supply chain and will make sure your rewards arrive on time and in perfect condition. In case of unforeseen circumstances, we will work to overcome any difficulties.

Project_description: The Team and the MagicIR Function Demo                             MagicIR (TrackIR 5 Alternate)  MagicIR is a head tracking input device designed for use with gaming and simulation PC titles. It is an infrared camera that tracks the position and orientation of your head and then sends that data to any of the 100+ TrackIR Enhanced games and simulations.  The IR LED Clip, included with every MagicIR purchase, attaches to the brim of a hat or visor and has three retro-reflective markers that direct infrared light back to the camera. The Track Clip Pro, which attaches to most PC headsets, comes with active LED markers and is useful when you need to track from further away.       How it works?  The camera can only capture IR light from the 3 point led clip, when the led clip move the camera detects and transfer control signal to gaming system result gaming screen looking Up Down Left Right.       PRECISE TRACKING  With the ability to focus on 1/150th of a pixel, MagicIR provides the most precise head tracking solution on the marketÃÂÃÂ        The MagicIR head tracker compares to other PS3eyes, we have more resolution on the led. Our frame rate is 120FPS. Compared with 75FPS of other products, the game's picture is more clear and smooth. The response time of 9MS can bring excellent experience of the game, and it will not be stuck at all.        We are a design company that integrates ideas, development, and production. MagicIR uses the highest quality and gentle production materials and is a high quality, low-cost head tracker for your favorite games. With the ability to focus on 1/150th of a pixel, MagicIR provides the most precise head tracking solution on the market. If everyone should have an excellent head trackerÃÂ¯ÃÂ¼<U+008C>it must is MagicIR. its been tested and work for the PC gaming many years. Great to work on many PC games, you can even output the head tracker as a joystick controller. If you already own a PS3eye tracking camera, its time to upgrade to MagicIR, it will works as fast as the TrackIR 5 camera.       The OpenTrack software allow you to define many tracking detail, in order to fit ÃÂÃÂ you gaming purpose, we will send you a preset profile for quick start to the game.   For backer who worry will their reward be delivered, yes it will, we have create and fulfilled 5 project's reward in past 2 year.           Risks and challenges  We are a creative company with its own production factory, technology research and development, and business operations. In the face of the increase orders, our machines can produce 25 sets a day. In order to guarantee the quality, the function of the products and the interests of supporters, we cannot produce huge quantities in a short period of time. If the quantity is too much, we may delay delivery for several days.

Blurb: An mobile app that connects avid party-goers to the nightlife in their areas by providing up to date reviews, wait times, and more!
Creator_description: I am a Junior at the George Washington University in Washington DC pursing my Bachelors in Business Administration with a dual concentration in International Business and Finance.
Project_description: Ever get excited for Friday night, where you can head out for a night on the town with your friends, but can't decide where to go?ÃÂÃÂ   Whether it be long wait times, cover (entry) fees, poor music, overcrowded bars, or a hundred other issues, that fun Friday night with friends can quickly turn into a hassle. BARS. aims to remove the hassle, by allowing you to view estimated wait times to get in to bars and nightclubs, daily cover fees charged at the door, and user reviews about various aspects of the venues.ÃÂÃÂ   BARS. will be an easy-to-use mobile device that provides all of this information, at the click of a button, for free. Raised funds will be used to further develop the software needed for the app to work seamlessly and simplistically.ÃÂÃÂ   As college students, the founders of BARS. know the struggles many go through every weekend and are striving to make the clubbing experience a more fun, stress-free environment. We hope to be able to make those "fun" Friday nights with friends a truly enjoyable time.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  There is no large upfront costs for the business aside from software development. There are currently no competitors in the Washington D.C. area, nor any of the large markets we eventually hope to penetrate (Boston, New York City, L.A., etc...).

Blurb: A laptop sticker to preserve all other stickers (and add a layer of protection too).
Project_Community_top_cities: |San Francisco-United States:2 backers|Seattle-United States:2 backers|Leicester-United Kingdom:1 backer|Copenhagen-Denmark:1 backer|CouÃÂÃÂ«ron-France:1 backer|Verona-Italy:1 backer|Amsterdam-Netherlands:1 backer|Loures-Portugal:1 backer|Thessaloniki-Greece:1 backer|Perth-Australia:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:13 backers|Australia:2 backers|Denmark:1 backer|France:1 backer|Greece:1 backer|Italy:1 backer|Netherlands:1 backer|Portugal:1 backer|United Kingdom:1 backer|Hong Kong:1 backer
Creator_description: I am Graham Stevens, a Cyber Security Specialist based in the South West of the UK.
Project_description: What is this thing?  It is a full-sized, precision cut sticker for your MacBook Pro which is identical to the original colour of the lid (Silver, Space Grey etc.). The reason this exists is two-fold:   Protection for your pride & joy - This vinyl sticker is built to last thanks to 3M, originally meant for wrapping cars so you know it is tough and durable.    The opportunity to preserve and archive your wonderful stickers that we in the tech business seem to love.   Our laptops travel with us just about everywhere, meaning day after day they are slid in and out of busy rucksacks or bags and run the risk of scratching our pride & joy. There are many opportunities for blemishes to occur to the lid, such as rubbing against something tough or abrasive whilst tightly packed into a carry-on bag for a conference, or you're simply in a rush and pick up your laptop whilst your car keys are in your hard etc.  With this sleek protective vinyl, all of those blemishes are on the vinyl rather than your laptop, helping to preserve it whilst still showing off its unique attributes to the world.  Here I have framed my prototype, showing just how closely the colour matches the Apple Silver, as well as just how great it looks once taken off and framed...       That's great, but why?  I produced a whole blog post as to why and how, which gained a lot more interest than I was expecting. In short, I wanted to put stickers on my laptop but had a couple of reservations at to why:   ÃÂÃÂ  Resale  - Selling the laptop meant I lost the unique stickers I have gained over time from conferences and meetups. Peeling each of them off would ruin them.    ÃÂÃÂ  Damage  - When removing the stickers, each would leave a residue behind and a slight discolouration where some of the aluminium has been covered up and other parts exposed to the sun.    The Idea  I began thinking of ways to combat these issues. I came up with a small list of requirements that would satisfy my needs:   Fairly invisible, without close inspection of the laptop    Easily removable    Leave zero trace even after months or years of application     Bonus Feature:  Something that can be kept, so that those sentimental stickers arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t lost.    The Prototype  Having tried a few different sticker type materials, I eventually found vehicle wrap vinyl worked best for the prototype. The idea of clear/transparent sticker was an option, but the risk of it becoming discoloured & not looking great upon removal meant these were discounted. The other drawback to clear vinyl is that once removed and placed within a frame on a backing card, you lose the silhouette of the lid including the logo etc.  I began hunting & ordering as many samples as I could from ÃÂÃÂ various suppliers, where the colour appeared to very closely resemble ÃÂÃÂ that of the MacBook Pro aluminium Silver.  I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have a Space Grey device to test against, but I did see some samples which may certainly do the job for these too. This is something that will be a priority if this Kickstarter is funded.   Below are all of the samples applied together, to get an idea of which provides the best match.       As the vinyl wrap material intended for vehicles, it comes with some additional properties which are really useful:   Purposely wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t leave any residue behind (and if they do, easy to remove)    Hard wearing, as they are used to battling the elements.    Super easy to apply, thanks to tiny ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>channelsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> carved into the adhesive side, making air bubbles non-existent.    Once applied, you can barely tell the difference:            And so the idea was born, and my MacBook Pro stayed like this for over 6 months to test durability and to see how everything looked once it had been removed.       Everything worked perfectly, which is where I would like your help.   Quality & Price  The vinyl being used here is extremely high quality and is absolutely built to last. Here are some of the specifications from 3M themselves:   Automotive Grade Vinyl    Durability - 5-6 Years    Service Temperature - -60ÃÂÃÂ°C to +107ÃÂÃÂ°CÃÂÃÂ     ComplyÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ feature allows trapped air to escape through micro air channels in the adhesive    ControltacÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ feature keeps the adhesive film repositionable on the application surface up to the final pressure at application    0.11mm Thick   I believe the price reflects the quality and precision of the product, preserving the original quality of your laptop whilst protecting it from scratches and scrapes during the time that you own it. It also provides you the opportunity to personalise your laptop without the worry of damage to the lid and allow you to preserve them as a little piece of history after the hardware as moved on.   What next?  With the prototype completed successfully, and the subsequent blog post getting  over 80,000  hits, and counting! I need your support to get this into production.  Initially, I planned to start really small and utilise hobbyist die cutters like the Silhouette or Cricut, but it quickly became apparent that they just aren't accurate enough for my liking and weren't up to cut (pun fully intended).   With this Kickstarter reaching it's goal, it will allow me to purchase a high quality vinyl cutter, equipment and supplies to be able to accurately produce these & ship them all over the world.    Time has already been spent looking into logistics and costs, to ensure this is all feasible.    Currently I have a perfect vinyl match for Silver, and I will be working with a supplier to correctly identify a perfect match for Space Grey too. In fact I will be purchasing a spare MacBook Pro Space Grey case to take with me to ensure the best possible match.    I will also be looking to create LidLayers for Dell XPS machines too, as well as Lenovo Thinkpads which are both common among our lovely community.     Bulk Orders   I have had a few people ask about bulk orders for various IT departments - if you are genuinely interested, please reach out so that I can gauge interest and get an idea of numbers...   You can find the original details of this prototype and some of my musing at  grh.am.       Risks and challenges  There are a handful of risks associated with this - I only have a 2015 13" MacBook Pro at my disposal, which is only 1 of the 4 machines that I intent to initially cater for. To compensate for that, I will be seeking 'beta testers' for the other machines once I have been able to produce a LidLayer for them to ensure they are accurate, before shipping them out.  I have purposely set quite pessimistic delivery dates for all of the rewards, to compensate for any possible delays in sourcing of equipment or supplies (including discovering a match for Space Grey).

Blurb: iMUPI allows you to share your images and videos in our screens around the world via our app.
Creator_description: Hi, my name is Serhiy and I'm from Spain.  I am fluent in 4 languages and I'm working as project manager in the petrochemical industry. I enjoy developing new projects and products which could change this world to better. Two of my products now are in the stage of being patented. I'm an ex - athlete in rowing, I enjoy traveling around the world and share some beers with my friends.
Project_description: iMupi is a network whichs allows you to  share your images and videos on our screens worldwide . ÃÂÃÂ It can be used for multiple purposes including entertainment, promotion of products or projects, expansion of social media exposure, and simply sharing thoughts with the worldÃÂÃÂ    Our idea is that not only big names are able to share content in public areas, but everyone is able to achieve it with just a few clicks and small budgetÃÂÃÂ    iMUPI is expected to help people to achieve their purposes faster and easier. It will help users to start their own  business , arise brand awareness  internationally  and distribute products overseas. It will also help individuals to show  talents , promote social media pages, or make their  voices  heard against pollution and global warming. And there are a lot more opportunities for users to exploreÃÂÃÂ                                                                          To make this exciting project possible, we need large amount of money. The majority of the fund will be used for the following aspects:  First of all,ÃÂÃÂ  we need to develop a complex APP for Android and iOS . For the development, it is estimated to require 50.000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ -60.000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬.ÃÂÃÂ  ToÃÂÃÂ  accomplish it,we will work with some professional IT companyÃÂÃÂ  who is able to develop the full ecosystem.  And the rest of the fund will be used to manufacture and purchase electronic billboards and screens. It is safe to say that with more fund, we will be able to expand to more cities and countries.ÃÂÃÂ                       If you decide to purchase some of our options,  once we have our system developed, we will send to you a code with which you can share your content whenever you want  and you can reserve your code for the time you want.      Risks and challenges  We are aware that many difficulties will happen in our way to build this project. And this is something normal to happen. We are planning to start our APP working in Spain and then start expanding worldwide. We do not know what cities and countries we will cover. This basically will depend on our funds. During this period we expect different sort of troubles in software and hardware developing, in adoption of standards to fulfill with each city and each country and withstand with pressure to build this global project. Every step costs you a lot of effort, but we are ready for it. This project can not be build just by our self, your support, not just economical, but also emotional, can give a life to this project.

Blurb: Who can protect you better than You?  How about a phone case that gives you control over YOUR life again  AND protects against hacking?
Creator_description: I came up with this idea while I was working in retail getting through college.  That was 5-6 years ago.  I'm not a technician, but I've always been good intermediately when it came to computer hardware & navigating through software.  Since I was little, I was building, inventing and evolving things that already existed; till at some point I stopped for whatever the reason.  I never thought about it again until someone poured her heart out to me because her retirement fund was wiped clean of $37,000.  Ashamed to say it, but I didn't create JustInCase until it happened to me too.  That is where this whole thing began...
Project_description: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                JustInCase: Rouge       Hey Stranger! ÃÂÃÂ I'm Darrin, Creator of JustInCase and for a minute I'm gonna tell you why I've spent 5 years devoted to seeing this through.  THE IMPORTANCE OF THIS IS SO CRUCIAL because it could've helped protect my identity. ÃÂÃÂ It could've helped my friend whose wallet fell out of her bag, or my cousin who got pushed into a pool with his phone, or my girl when her phone died in the city, and even another friend of mine who was charged $220 for games when he doesn't own a system.  The $50,000 is to create a functional prototype. ÃÂÃÂ The company we'd be working with is KICKR DESIGN from Atlanta, GA. ÃÂÃÂ The estimate to complete the device is between $28K-$40K. ÃÂÃÂ This covers the physical device, hardware, software and the App. ÃÂÃÂ The remaining $10K is to cover your pledge rewards and the percentage taken out by KICKSTARTER & AMAZON. ÃÂÃÂ I've spoken to 6 other companies, but their prices all begin at $100K.ÃÂÃÂ   THE PLAN: ÃÂÃÂ   - CREATE THE PROTOTYPE  - TEST JUSTINCASE IN REAL-WORLD SCENARIOS (evaluate efficiency, speed and networking)  - ÃÂÃÂ WHEN ITS PASSES ALL THE NECESSARY REQUIREMENTS, WE'LL MOVE TO MASS PRODUCTION  - THE ULTIMATE PRICING GOAL IS TO BE LESS THAN $100. ÃÂÃÂ IF ITS MEANT TO HELP, IT SHOULD BE AFFORDABLE!   THANK YOU EVERYONE, SINCERELY,  Christian Lane          JustInCase:  Royal Croc          3D Model:  JustInCase        3D Model:  JustInCase (Left To Right:  Lower Housing, Computer Module, Wall, Top Housing)        Risks and challenges  The largest risk is the size.  Getting it to be as thin as possible while fulfilling all the purposes it was made to accomplish.  The first prototype potentially may not have charging capabilities to the phone yet; but besides this, we can do it!

Blurb: Alulu Receipt Camera is an instant film camera that uses thermal paper/receipts as film. A carefree and environmental way to create.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Singapore-Singapore:4 backers|Brisbane-Australia:3 backers|Melbourne-Australia:3 backers|New York-United States:3 backers|San Diego-United States:3 backers|San Francisco-United States:3 backers|Seattle-United States:3 backers|Toronto-Canada:2 backers|Dublin-Ireland:2 backers|Florence-Italy:2 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:68 backers|Australia:12 backers|United Kingdom:7 backers|Japan:5 backers|Singapore:4 backers|Germany:3 backers|Italy:3 backers|Canada:2 backers|Ireland:2 backers|Netherlands:2 backers
Creator_description: Mechanical Engineer & Software Engineer
Project_description: Named after the author of the world's first recorded receipt, the Alulu Camera is a  fun instant film camera  that uses  thermal paper  or  receipts  as film paper, making film photography environmental, affordable, carefree, and open to your creativity.ÃÂÃÂ        ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  The Alulu Receipt Camera...             1. Instantly prints the photos you take on receipt paper and does not require any ink!   The Alulu Camera prints your photos instantly onto your choice of a new blank roll of thermal (receipt) paper OR your old receipts. It'll cost you next to nothing!        2. REUSES all those receipts building up in your wallet and in the landfills!ÃÂÃÂ    All those receipts you receive from retail, restaurants, etc. are NOT recyclable. Now, you can reuse receipts as film in the Alulu Camera! Your receipt + your photo on top = the perfect memorabilia.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  3. Is the perfect little gadget to express your creativity!   Without the pressure to perfect each expensive photograph using traditional film cameras, you are free to create and experiment like never before.ÃÂÃÂ   Rewind the thermal paper after your first print to create a double exposure.ÃÂÃÂ   Annotate your photos with as much facial hair as you can imagine.ÃÂÃÂ   Pull on the photo to create divides.ÃÂÃÂ   The possibilities are endless.             4. Is the perfect "receipt" of your memories!   Remember that trip to the coffee shop with an old friend or that wild concert by printing a photo on your receipt -- create a receipt of your experience.ÃÂÃÂ   Stick the photos in your scrapbook or bullet journal, create collages, share them with friends, display in your wallet, hang a scroll in your room, make a scarf, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s up to you!             5. Is an environmentally conscious way to create photos without animal products   Traditional film is not vegan and contains traces of animal product(s). For our vegans and/or consumption-aware friends, the thermal paper used by the Alulu Camera does not contain animal products! The Alulu Camera does not even require any ink to create your photos!   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------   Features         Creates a lo-fi stippled photograph   A unique algorithm is used to create an optimized grey-scale image created by thousands of little dots. The Alulu Camera does not use ink. Instead, the dots are created as the paper reacts with the heating of the printer head. The result is a lo-fi stippled instant film photograph.        Manual lighting settings to create the best photo in any environment   The Alulu Camera has four lighting settings to take the best photo in any environment: sunny, cloudy, indoor, and flash. The flash option illuminates your surroundings when taking photos in a dark environment.   A self timer for group photos   Get everybody in the photo! A self timer option gives you 10 seconds after you press the button to position and capture a great photograph of everybody -- photographer included!        An acrylic frame viewfinder to help you frame your subject!   The acrylic frame viewfinder swings out from the back to help you frame your photographic subject and scenes.        Recharge with a micro USB cable!   The Alulu Receipt Camera is easy to recharge by the micro USB port on the side of the camera.   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Rewards   $1 or more  - Your name on our Thank You page at alulucamera.com!        $9 or more  - ÃÂÃÂ An 8" x 10" Art Print for download created with Alulu Camera's Image Processing Technology to print yourself    $19 or more  - An 8" x 10" Art Print Created with Alulu Camera's Image Processing Technology  + FREE Shipping in the U.S.        $44 or more  - A Graphic Canvas Tote Bag with Alulu Camera's Image Processing Technology  + FREE Shipping in the U.S.    $54 or more  - The Above 8" x 10" Art Print for Download AND Graphic Tote Bag Created with Alulu Camera's Image Processing Technology  + FREE Shipping in the U.S.    $79 or more  - Early Bird Receipt Camera Deal! The FIRST 100 people will receive an Alulu Camera at this discounted price. The full intended price is $99. Limited to one camera per person. A second (or more) camera can be purchased at the Kickstarter Special Deal of $89.  + FREE Shipping in the U.S.    $89 or more  - Kickstarter Special Alulu Camera Deal! The full intended price is $99.ÃÂÃÂ   + FREE Shipping in the U.S.   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ÃÂÃÂ        Project Timeline   May 2019:  Initial Idea Formation and prototyping   June 2019:  Development and prototyping continues   July 2019:  Kickstarter launch!   August 2019 - ÃÂÃÂ Jan 2020:  Modify camera design for mass manufacturing   Feb 2020:  Finalize camera design for mass manufacturing and begin manufacturing samples   June 2020:  Begin manufacturing first batch   December 2020:  Launch Alulu Camera   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------       Next Steps  We started work on this project in May and have moved very quickly since. The camera you see in the photos above and in the images are actual working prototypes we have developed since then. The $300,000 we raise from this kickstarter will go directly to starting mass manufacturing for the Alulu Camera. Our device is complex, requiring many custom manufacturing lines which is why we need to raise such a large amount. We expect to start shipping cameras in December 2020!   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ÃÂÃÂ   The Team       ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------      Risks and challenges  We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we meet with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.  We have made a backup plan B AND plan C in the unlikely case we reach a circumstance that prevents us from manufacturing the Alulu Receipt Camera.   Plan B: In the case that we are unable to meet our goal of manufacturing our first batch of cameras, those that were promised a camera will be entered in a raffle for a handmade and assembled receipt camera made by our team members ourselves. The cameras seen in the photos and in the video are handmade and hand-assembled  by our team.  Plan C: If handmade cameras are no longer possible, those promised a camera will receive a clearly written DIY set of instructions to build their own simplified version of the Receipt Camera! The instructions will become open source.  Thank you for supporting the creation of Alulu Receipt Camera. We are eternally grateful for you!

Blurb: revolutionizes how to ventilate toilets, making us more comfortable life.
Creator_description: My name is Tompea Petru, I am an engineer and over time I have designed and accomplished several works in the field of modernization, innovation and optimization in technology .I have 2 recorded invetions at WIPO-Geneva https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2014142694A1/en and https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2014142693A1/en  ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> Toilet Ventilation System, in short TVS
Project_description: Tompea ÃÂÃÂ Petru  ÃÂÃÂ Obersontheim, ÃÂÃÂ Germany  My name is Tompea Petru, I am an engineer and over time I have designed and accomplished several works in the field of modernization, innovation and optimization in technology. I have 2 recorded invetions at WIPO-Geneva:  https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2014142694A1/en  and  https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2014142693A1/en  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0086><U+0092> Toilet Ventilation System,  in short TVS .                                     I do not think there is someone who has not been disturbed by the smells that emanate during the use of the toilet, or not to be embarrassed when someone used the toilet immediately after him. How many times did it happened to you ÃÂÃÂ in any hotel, even with many stars, after using the toilet, to have to wait a long time for the complete ventilation of the bathroom? Now the  TVS  removes all of these bothering issues. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     Please support the achievement of this project so together we can make toilets more welcoming, without smells and make the world happier.    ÃÂÃÂ The current systems make ventilation of the toilets with the fans mounted in the ceiling of the room, having the disadvantage that the smells in the first phase are scattered into the room and then being evacuated outside.  ÃÂÃÂ To systems that aspire smells through the toilet flush pipe, when the water is drawn the aspiration of smells is interrupted and the smells spread in the bathroom.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The  TVS  aspire odors directly from the toilet bowl, preventing their spread ÃÂÃÂ into the room and evacuating them to the sewerage network, as follows:  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  - when a person sits on the toilet (considering that the toilet surface is occupied mostly by the person) a proximity sensor commands the opening of the air flap and starts the fan at low power (at some versions it is adjustable), sufficient to prevent the smells from spreading into the room. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ - when the person stands up, the proximity sensor keeps the air flap open and switches the fan to full power, because after the lifting of the person is released the entire surface of the toilet and it is necessary to suck up a larger volume of air, to prevent the smells from coming out in the room. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ - after 10 seconds the air flap closes, the fan stops ÃÂÃÂ and the system stays in standby. At some variants this time can be set between 10 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> 270 s to allow room ventilation, especially at non-ventilated bathrooms.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ·  For mounting you need a flexible or fixed connection provided with an auxiliaryÃÂÃÂ connection with the  diameter of 40 mm   https://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/110709930163 . If you want you can order it from us ( see at auxiliary ).ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   ÃÂÃÂ·  Give a hole in the  top - back  to get into the toilet drain area. Project_description: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   LuBi is an ampoule that harnesses the nutrients in black rice bran to create powerful anti-aging effects for the skin! This is all made possible due to our in-house research and development of the  Solid-State Ion Fermentation Technique  that our team created.ÃÂÃÂ   With this technique,  we were able to reduce the particle size to make it smaller than the average skin pore.  This means that the anti-aging nutrients contained within black rice bran will be able to penetrate into the deepest layers of your skin!                                 Even though black rice bran has many outstanding benefits for our skin, it is difficult to extract all the nutrients from each grain because of its solid structure.ÃÂÃÂ However, our in-house developed solid-state ion fermentation Technology uses acidic ionized water to extract all the key nutrients from the hard outer layers of each grain.ÃÂÃÂ This process makes LuBi ampoule available to provide customers wide range of skin effects such as antioxidation, wrinkle improvement, brightening and moisturizing.                  Our in-house technology extracts only the best skincare components from black rice bran. LuBi ampouleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s antioxidant(anti-aging) and wrinkle improvement components that are rich in black rice help restore firm facial skin. In addition, black riceÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s brightening and moisturizing features help improve uneven skin tone and help the skin stay moisturized for longer.                The apple that turned brown in the apple test above represents aged skin. Made of black rice extracts that are rich in antioxidant(anti-aging) ingredients, LuBi ampoule was able to restore the brown apple back to its original fresh color. This anti-aging property in LuBi ampoule can help prevent skin aging and give your skin a more youthful glow.        Your skin tone becomes uneven and darker as it ages due to the melanin production(pigmentation). This process is similar to the discoloration that occurs with apples that are exposed to oxygen for a prolonged period. As you can see on the image, once LuBi ampoule is applied on the apple slice, the area that was originally discolored is restored to its original form. The brightening effects will help improve your skin tone as well.          Moisturizing components (ceramides) are rich in black rice which helps the skin maintain its moisture, and keeps your skin from becoming dry.                                     Even though black rice bran has many outstanding benefits for our skin, it is difficult to extract all the nutrients from each grain because of its solid structure. However, our in-house developed solid-state ion fermentation Technology uses acidic ionized water to extract all the key nutrients from the hard outer layers of each grain. This process also makes LuBi ampoule's molecular size smaller than an average facial skin pore so that the nutrients can be delivered to the deepest skin layers.                     LuBi ampoule goes all the way into the deeper skin layers with its small molecular size. Other skincare productsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> molecules do not get absorbed completely and therefore, the remaining residue on the surface of the skin can cause blockage in your pores and result in skin troubles.        When we dropped water and LuBi ampoule on each flower petal, the petal with LuBi ampoule was absorbed faster than the petal with water. Like the test above, LuBi ampoule absorbs rapidly into your skin and helps your skin maintain its moisture without any sticky residue leftover.ÃÂÃÂ             LuBi  Also  Works Great For  Men !                                                      LuBi contains no animal-derived ingredients or by-products. Furthermore, no animal testing occured in the creation of LuBi ampoule.                           ÃÂÃÂ We, QB Skin LAB team, is made up of Biochemical Engineering researchers and experts in the South Korean beauty industry. We have in-house developed technology and have extensive experience with material supply and production. This lessens the margin of error. And so, our teamÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s goal is to minimalize the distribution margin and provide a product of the best quality at reasonable prices to our backers.                                                                                 Risks and challenges  Risk and Challenge ÃÂÃÂ  Since we have decided to develop the black rice ion fermentation product ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>LuBiÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> Ampoule, we have worked over the past 6 months to find the best combination rate to provide high quality skin care product to consumers. Our research team, which consists of Seoul National University professors, our manufacturer team, and our overseas sales department have worked under one goal, one vision to build a company with a successful Kickstarter campaign as a strong foundation. We are confident we will keep to our planned schedule, however there may be some events that may occur that are out of our control. Should an unexpected setback arise, we will take the necessary steps to monitor and resolve the issue during each step of the production and delivery process. It goes without saying that we will also update our backers on a regular basis so that they can stay well informed about our progress.  Thank you for your support.
