Creator_description: At Stacam, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve developed the Stacam as a smart photography action camera that aims to explore a more intelligent, stable and better defined way for shooting.
Project_description: The ultimate action camera that brings unique stability, definition and fluency to video and pictures captured when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re out skating, parkouring, biking, skiing, surfing or kayaking. Just turn Stacam on, have fun and amaze yourself with the perfect and spectacular footage and images that Stacam captures.            Recording your outdoors adventures in a way that creates exciting images is now as easy as it should be with the Stacam, an intelligent and highly stable action camera that is made to offer an extremely impressive recording capacity for your extreme sports adventures.       Instead of the old and cumbersome camera platforms and of the underwhelming stabilization systems of GoPro and other similar cameras, the Stacam is built with a tiny triaxial servo stabilization platform that can record videos and photos with higher stability, definition and fluency.ÃÂÃÂ        This means that, when compared with conventional EIS (Electronic Image Stabilization), StacamÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s triaxial servo stabilization platform can offer you a much higher accuracy and broader scope of image stabilization for your videos when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re out skating, parkouring, biking, skiing, surfing or diving.       With 70x60x60mm and weighing only 120 grams, the Stacam is the smallest and lightest mount camera available on the market. After all, we know that the last thing that you want when you go out to have a good time is to carrying around a cumbersome camera, do you?            The Stacam is equipped with an Ambarella A12 Chipset, with a SONY IMX337 image sensor, and with a High-Class 7-Glass lens that lets you record 4K/30 fps panoramic videos.ÃÂÃÂ   ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the kind of high-definition pictures and unforgettable moments that you want to capture, using a technology that is usually available only for high-end sports camerasÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>with the difference that, with the Stacam, you have an outstanding camera that is also affordable.            You can just attach it to your surfboard, and be sure that the really breathtaking moments that you experience are forever recorded on video!            The Stacam offers you different wearing and platform work modes, all eyeing the stellar video and photo performance that you want your ideal action camera to have.  You can wear the Stacam flatwise, in the flashlight mode, or in the upside down mode, for different takes and different perspectives of your on-the-go adventures.            In-built with WIFI function. When the camera is connected to cellphone via APP, the images and videos will be synchronized to cellphone and they can be downloaded or shared to social network.       When it comes to the cameraÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s platform, you can choose the tracking, locked, following or crazy dog mode. The crazy dog is especially suitable for extreme sports, since the platform keeps up with a rising speed and lets the camera respond to every nuanced movement. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s right: you will never again worry about losing any shot when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re taking pictures in a fast speed.                  At Botcam, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve developed the Stacam as a smart photography action camera that aims to explore a more intelligent, stable and better defined way for shooting. Our vision for the future doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t end here, though. We are focused on developing even more intelligent and more automatic shooting modes for the Stacam and for other products that we are researching. In 5 years, it is our goal to have a robot camera and an auto-shooting camera platform that can be used in any type of scenario. With your support, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll start by releasing the Stacam, with its truly remarkable features, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be encouraged to go on creating an even more intelligent photographic future.                                 Risks and challenges  Like all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves. However, the Stacam team brings with it not only our passion but experience in engineering and manufacturing at scale, and we've made every effort to mitigate these risks for our backers.  With the support of our manufacturing and distribution partners, we are well prepared for the challenges ahead. We promise to be transparent and to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may come up and our solutions to such.

Blurb: Convex Wide Angle Mirrors (OEM Fitment)
Creator_description: Suma Performance we are specialized in designing premium convex mirrors for performance cars.
Project_description: Project Description  Suma Performance designs and manufactures Convex Wide Angle side mirrors for performance cars. We have several patents on our mirrors and use proprietary SOGEL to manufacture Suma Mirrors to enhance your driving performance.  Currently, only overlay style is available, which uses adhesive to stick our mirrors on top of the OEM mirrors.ÃÂÃÂ   To improve, people have requested to have the OEM replacement style. Instead of putting on top of the OEM mirrors, the OEM replacement style allows our mirrors to directly replace the OEM mirrors.ÃÂÃÂ   In order to make this improvement, we need to invest and develop a metal mold to make the backplate, placed on the back of our mirrors, that will directly replace the OEM mirrors. Making this metal mold is very expensive, and we cannot do it without your support.ÃÂÃÂ   With your support, we can introduce Suma Mirrors for the Accord 8th Gen Community. To make it happen, we need to raise $12,000 dollars, about 60-80 pre-orders. If we achieve this goal, then we can bring Suma Mirrors to the Accord 8th Gen Community. Wouldn't you make it happen!?  Rewards (pre-orders)  There are 4 rewards (pre-orders) you can select to support the campaign.ÃÂÃÂ    1 .  Basic : a set of two mirrors with the following features  + Wide angle convex ÃÂÃÂ   + Blue Tint ÃÂÃÂ   + Hydrophobic (water repellent)   2. Basic + Defroster : a set of two mirrors with the following features  + Wide angle convex ÃÂÃÂ   + Blue Tint ÃÂÃÂ   + Hydrophobic (water repellent)  + Defroster   3. Basic + Defroster + Turn Signal : a set of two mirrors with the following features  + Wide angle convex ÃÂÃÂ   + Blue Tint ÃÂÃÂ   + Hydrophobic (water repellent)  + Defroster  + Turn signal   4. Rearview Mirror  (overlay adhesive)  + Wide angle convex  + Blue tint  Timeline  Campaign: 20 days  Design and Manufacturing: 2 months  Shipping: 1 week  Features   1. Wide Angle Convex   To enhance your safety and driving performance, Suma Mirrors use premium optic glass that creates the best wide angle convex to effectively reduce blind spot.  Our mirrors are R1000, whereas other mirrors are R1400. (The smaller the R-number, the wider the view).  If you compare Suma Mirrors with other mirrors, our mirrors have wider visibility and can see more objects in Suma Performance mirrors.   2. Hydrophobic (water repellent)   They are HYDROPHOBIC:  It is a fancy word for water repellent. This provides clear visibility in rainy conditions to provide safety and driving performance.  Our water repellent feature is permanent. This feature is coated during our proprietary SOGEL manufacturing process. ÃÂÃÂ Unlike Suma Mirrors, other mirrors typically use spray-on that the water repellent feature eventually erodes. Suma Mirrors are hydrophobic and permanent.ÃÂÃÂ    3. Anti-Glare   Suma Mirrors go through  proprietary  SOGEL process that takes multiple steps/days to produce our signature, blue mirrors such that the mirrors themselves are actually clear and colorless.  The reason Suma Mirrors look blue is because it absorbs all spectrum of the colors except the blue color that's pleasant to the eyes, ÃÂÃÂ effectively reducing glare (the yellow color spectrum, which causes the glare, is absorbed).  Other mirrors, in contrast, use the vacuum coating process such that the blue color is actually coated on the mirror itself (unlike ours, clear/colorless mirrors that only reflect blue color). Based on that, they are not truly anti-glare because the glare is still reflected to human eyes. Over time, the blue coating will eventually fade. Suma Mirrors do no fade and are truly anti-glare.  Video Review  This shows you what our mirrors look like on a different car.ÃÂÃÂ                       Risks and challenges  No risks. If we don't reach the goal,  you are not charged. You are only charged when we reach the goal.

Or do you just hate ugly cables and chargers that clash with your carefully designed interior? We got you.  This is QUBE. The First wireless charger & powerbank. Dual Wireless charging ÃÂÃÂ powered by ZENSÃÂÃÂ®ÃÂÃÂ   The QUBE base element as well as the top provides fast and secure charging for all Qi compatible devices such as:   iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone XR, ÃÂÃÂ     Samsung Galaxy: S10 Plus, S10, S10e, Note 9, S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 EdgeÃÂÃÂ  (Plus more devices)    And all other Qi compatible devices.ÃÂÃÂ         The QUBE top holds a 10w fast charger combined with a powerful battery pack that can charge an iPhone X up to 4 times. While using the QUBEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s top for a quick charge at your favourite spot you can simultaneously charge another device on the QUBEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s base.ÃÂÃÂ   The QUBEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s top ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>powerbankÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> will recharge when the base and top are fused together again. Making it possible to simultaneously charge your device on top as well as the powerbank itself.                 Tired of bending over the couch to only get a glimpse of a charging cable?ÃÂÃÂ   Finding out the adapter was plugged out againÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ but foremost tired of having ugly cables and chargers mess up the interior design plan.ÃÂÃÂ   We reckon, we are not the only ones.ÃÂÃÂ        Say no to cable clutter.ÃÂÃÂ   No matter how you slice it, we still need cables to get devices powered up. ÃÂÃÂ Our frustration brought on by unsightly consumer electronics led us to the design of the QUBE. ÃÂÃÂ        We envisioned an interior design object, and went one step beyond.  We created a product that can charge your tech and be beautiful at the same time. The best of both worlds. Not only can you save your battery and stay clutter-free, you can also save space. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve designed it to be able to charge anywhere within your home, for your smartphone, air pods and even a smart watch.ÃÂÃÂ    That is true design! ÃÂÃÂ              Our QUBE fits all USB power supplies  We ship our QUBE with a long braided USB power cable that can be plugged into any USB power supply like a computer, USB power adapter or wall socket with integrated USB port. Excluding the power supply makes the product truly international and earth-friendly.ÃÂÃÂ        MANU X ZENSÃÂÃÂ®ÃÂÃÂ   Our partnership with A-brand and CE market leader ZENSÃÂÃÂ® ÃÂÃÂ makes the QUBE not only powerful and reliable but also extremely fast. QUBE is officially Qi and Apple licenced and based on over 15 years of experience in wireless charging technology. Qi is the standard for charging smartphones and other peripherals that require wireless power.ÃÂÃÂ   QUBE is a unique collaboration where interior design and technology invigorate.            Tech specs, charge fast, simultaneously and safe  Both QUBE elements uses smart technology that auto-detects your deviceÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s input. So itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s always charging at maximum speed. Over-current, over-voltage, and foreign object detection ensures complete safety for you and your devices.  The QUBE base holds a 5W wireless charger which fully powers an iPhone X within 3.5 hours.  The QUBEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s top 10W fast wireless charger fully chargers the iPhone X within 2 hours and combined with a powerful battery pack can fully charge an iPhone X up to 5 times. ÃÂÃÂ   The QUBE top ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>powerbankÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> will recharge when the base and top are fused together again. Making it possible to simultaneously charge your device on top as well as the powerbank itself.                 The idea to integrate technology into interior objects originates from 2010. The company and brand MANU eventually was founded in 2016.                 Remember the magic of playing with wooden blocks as a child? A cube has an amazing form factor with symmetry depicted from whichever direction you look at it. ÃÂÃÂ You can build amazing structures with a cube and is therefore the base of any foundation.       Most ideas start with a problem. But once we managed to turn that insight into a proposition the sketching started.ÃÂÃÂ        Once we figured out the formfactor of what later became QUBE we started making a lot of basic mock ups. Shaping these from foam block was easier than 3d printing.       In the final phase of the design we upgraded the prototypes to 3d prints. The first came out of our own printer. Later we also outsourced the printing to a more refined model maker.            We now have finished the whole design, engineering phase and finished tooling. We are expecting First out of Tool samples end of July 2019.ÃÂÃÂ   UPDATE August 2019: We received first out of tool samples of all parts. It is amazing to see the QUBE built from actual manufactured parts instead of 3d prototyped parts. Next phase will be adding texture to tooling and getting the right blue color. ÃÂÃÂ        Why order your MANU QUBE?   Become a pioneer of remarkable technology by owning a MANU QUBE, making a statement of tasteful design and functionality. ÃÂÃÂ Usher in the age of a better living environment for you and others with a QUBE wireless fast charger and power bank. The QUBE serves as an attractive centerpiece in your living space, and a conversation piece when out and about. ÃÂÃÂ   Order now and be one of our very first proud QUBE consumers during the introductory phase, which will facilitate our first production run. ÃÂÃÂ Price per product is reflective of the tooling investments that we implemented for the QUBE. On-time shipping for this fantastic product is available to all our backers in the US and EU regions, and many more will be added in the near future.    Will you help us out?  Like any other business we need the support of our customers. We created MANU QUBE for you to enjoy and you can trust us when we say "This will be the best charger you have ever owned". Keep you posted... Hendrik & Edo        For media requests:    info@manu.nl       Risks and challenges  The Outstanding quality of the MANU QUBE is derived from our experience in developing, creating, and manufacturing of new innovative products. Our partners have mastered accountability in the event that the unforeseen happens, to ensure express shipping and delivery.   Forget cables and adapters, plugs or connectors with the QUBEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s versatile de-cluttering and wireless detachment device charging offering. The last phone charger youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll ever need is on its way, bringing seamless wireless connectivity for you to use and enjoy.

Blurb: A lightweight, rugged and affordable camper.
Creator_description: I've been an avid outdoorsman all my life. I enjoy the peace and privacy of being in the woods. I have extensive knowledge of camping and the gear required.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ I'm starting this Kickstarter to support my start up business of designing and buildingÃÂÃÂ  campers for outdoor enthusiasts, and people who get outside and explore nature. My campers are going to be suitable for those who are looking for a decently priced, lightweight, and rugged camper. I have thirty plus years in automotive, welding and fabricating trades and have been a lifelong outdoorsman. These campers can benefit anyone with physical disabilities by being light and easy to set up. They're also for people who are looking for a little place to get away, and people with compact cars, SUV's, or trucks. ÃÂÃÂ   The funds will help supply me with the tools, and building supplies necessary to start building my product.ÃÂÃÂ  I will also use funding for advertising and generating interest. ÃÂÃÂ   I'm hoping to have the money necessary to do so within a few months, if possible, but regardless if the goal is reached, it will be used to help my business get started. I would like to encourage people to get out and enjoy the outdoors as I do. ÃÂÃÂ   After the death of my 19 year old son, it was hard for me to get out, and be around people, and take care of my health. So I started going out into the woods more, to find peace. I would like to see others enjoy the outdoors as well.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   The funds for this would help me build a product I believe can benefit others.ÃÂÃÂ  I'd be very grateful for those who supported me, spread the word, or spread the joy of the outdoors to others.      Risks and challenges  A challenge I will face is designing and building the product by myself. There is a risk of poor initial sales when competitors are more established. I will strive to create a product that meets or exceeds customer expectations. I intend to start with one model and eventually add others as business grows.

Blurb: TeamEDU is a secure and private social network guided by a commitment to education, ethical technology and social responsibility.
Creator_description: Dr. Ryan Starzyk is a proven business and community leader, with a substantial background in management, analysis, research and strategic planning.From 2003-2007, Dr. Starzyk served honorably in the United States Air Force and was decorated for meritorious service while on deployment in Iraq as a part of Operation Iraqi Freedom.Following his military service, Dr. Starzyk transitioned to a successful career in business leadership, serving as a legal analyst, researcher and compliance advisor for large-scale corporations. He currently serves as a research analyst responsible for matters including regulatory and treaty compliance, risk management and import/export adherence framework. He acts as an internal subject matter expert for multiple ongoing projects and maintains responsibility for ensuring that the firmÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s clients are advised effectively on all matters pertaining to compliance at all applicable levels, from industry standards to global regulations. He is an International Association of Privacy Professionals Certified Information Privacy Manager (CIPM) and a Scrum Alliance Certified Scrum Master (CSMÃÂÃÂ®). Dr. StarzykÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s previous experience includes work in the legal profession, as well as professional experience in the hospitality industry. He holds a masterÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s degree in Legal Studies from Arizona State University and doctorate in Business Administration from Georgia State University.As a former military member, RyanÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s passion for public policy and his experience as a combat veteran of the U.S. Armed Forces have led him to a desire to continue his public service supporting Veterans.No stranger to community service, Dr. Starzyk currently serves on the board of directors of Phoenix Pride, and he is a longtime advocate for LGBTQ rights. He has been a vocal supporter of repealing Arizona laws that seek to further stigmatize already marginalized communities, and a proponent of strong policies that seek to ensure that the rights and equity of all individuals are protected at the local, state and Federal level.Dr. Starzyk resides in Central Phoenix with his partner, and is active in his local neighborhood and community.
Project_description: Opportunity    Problem & Solution   Veterans want to achieve higher learning, or they would not be spending an average of 6.3 years trying.  Our Military Veterans deserve better; the completion rate currently stands at 53.6%.  The inability to socially interact with other students has a significant impact on both health and learning outcomes.  Cooperative learning is missing from online learning environments. TeamEDU is very organic; forced student interactions are not. Our platform proposal is a grassroots community-driven technology connecting those of like minds and life experiences.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Veterans struggle to find a community when working towards attaining higher education.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Research shows that not having community results in a longer time to completion and less connection to others.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Low completion rates translate to fewer employment opportunities.               Our Solution   Using the power of technology we will partner to bring students together through our platform, TeamEDU Connect.  Focusing exclusively on education and not a broad focus of any "meetup," obtaining support from libraries, corporations, and other partners will increase our ability to create a team focused learning environment.   We have a prototype of the App that can be viewed here. ÃÂÃÂ It is a seamless user experience!          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   Unique Value Proposition   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Bringing Veterans together on teams they relate too  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Daily, weekly text message updates on subject-specific content to increase engagement          Characteristics   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Graduation rate increase  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ An environment suitable for enhanced learning outcomes   Target Market    Market Size & Segments   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>In 2016, about 5.3 million students were enrolled in private (for-profit) colleges and 14.6 million in public colleges.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  Only 35% are likely to graduate from for-profit universities compared to 65% for the public.  Average tuition at for-profit colleges is $16,000 per year.  Only 1.8 million will finish leaving 3.4 million without a degree representing a loss of opportunity worth $54 billion for those who do not complete.   Key Customers   The primary target audience for TeamEDU is institutional education providers with large Veteran populations attending. The secondary audience is current or upcoming students. Also, the platform will be open to anyone who wants to create a team and learn a new skill. The primary target market size is over 28,000 institutions with the secondary market of 141,686,000 people. We base this on 2017 U.S. Census data for educational attainment. Target groups include; High School Graduates (71,170,000) | Some College, No Degree (46,445,000) | Associate Degree, Occupational (10,081,000) | Associate Degree, Academic (13,990,000).   Customer Relations   TeamEDU will communicate with its customers by:  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Personal Mentorship Assistance  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Weekly Text Messages  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Community events  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Weekly Emails, CRM, Facebook Private Group  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Customer Service, reaching out to members when they come onÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  TeamEDU Connect app plan can be accessed by clicking here. ÃÂÃÂ          Learning shouldn't be done alone, and you should have a place to collaborate, share ideas, and support each other that is not the clogged up, conventional outlets like Facebook. ÃÂÃÂ   TeamEDU is a place to learn, not a place for ad's. ÃÂÃÂ We will not put ad's on our site, in the app or otherwise. ÃÂÃÂ We want people to learn, not be distracted. ÃÂÃÂ          Together we will make a difference, by building a community focused on learning and education. ÃÂÃÂ          TeamEDU is dedicated to giving back to our community. ÃÂÃÂ A significant portion of all proceeds generated once the app launches will be offered out in the form of grants and scholarships.  TeamEDU believes it is vital to be supportive to our community and will strive to give as much in support of the future!            TeamEDU will be part of a new industry in the making! ÃÂÃÂ Education Services Technology (EdTech).           Risks and challenges  Challenges |  Barriers to Entry  We have the first-mover advantage in this niche market focused on Veterans. Other platforms have some similarities but do not focus on the unique needs associated with Veterans. We are emerging as a new industry in a crowded tech startup field, and the service offering is easily adaptable to other markets, especially those located in rural communities.  Recognizing, therefore, we will make philanthropic investments a pivotal attraction to how we conduct business and gain market traction.  Industry Classifications for TeamEDU  SIC Codes Major Group 73: Business Services ÃÂÃÂ§ 7373 Computer Integrated Systems Design, ÃÂÃÂ§ 7374 Computer Processing and Data Preparation and Processing Services, ÃÂÃÂ§ 7375 Information Retrieval Services | Major Group 82: Educational Services  NAICS Codes 54: Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services ÃÂÃÂ§ 541512 Computer Systems Design Services | 51: Information ÃÂÃÂ§ 518210 Data Processing, Hosting, and Related Services, ÃÂÃÂ§ 517919 - All Other Telecommunications | 61: Educational Services ÃÂÃÂ§ 611710 Educational Support Services, ÃÂÃÂ§ 611699 All Other Miscellaneous Schools and Instruction, ÃÂÃÂ§ 611430 Professional and Management Development Training Applicable Laws and Regulations   Regulatory Requirements  Computer Fraud and Abuse Act (CFAA) (18 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ 1030) | Lanham (Trademark) Act (15 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ 1051 et seq.) | Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), 17 U.S.C. 101 | Anti-cybersquatting Consumer Protection Act (ACPA) (15 U.S.C. 1051) | U.S. Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ÃÂÃÂ§ 101 - 810) | Electronic Communications Privacy Act (ECPA) (18 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ 2510 et seq.) | ChildrenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) (15 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ÃÂÃÂ§ 6501-6506) | Privacy Act of 1974 (5 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ 552a) | CANSPAM Act (15 U.S.C ÃÂÃÂ§ 7704) | Federal Trade Commission Act (15 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ÃÂÃÂ§41-58) (FTC Act) | Controlling the Assault of Non-Solicited Pornography and Marketing Act (CAN-SPAM Act) (15 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§ÃÂÃÂ§7701-7713 and 18 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§1037) | Telephone Consumer Protection Act (47 U.S.C. ÃÂÃÂ§227 et seq.)  Risks & Mitigation  We need to succeed in educating the market on the benefits of community, the risks of going at it alone, and the positive impact of being connected to other likeminded Veterans. Since our business is a new take, with mentoring and community components being the key driver to how we differentiate, prospective customers may not immediately understand the full positive benefits of our offering. All our marketing activity will be angled to this end.  Another is overshadowing our second risk, a larger technology company, however, our differentiator from other platforms is their lack of a mentoring and community component. Meetup and Eventbrite are flourishing in U.S. metropolitan markets, and a successful player there could move down market to focus on smaller universities and institutions. It is essential that we take advantage of our first-mover advantage to make a strong name for ourselves.  Another risk is continual advances in technology that could take away our current advantage. We plan to keep close tabs on emerging trends in technology to ensure that we continue our platform on the forefront, taking advantage of new capabilities.  Finally, there is a small chance that poor reviews out of the gate could damage our adoption in its earliest days. Here, we plan to apply our best effort to "wow" customers with our exceptional, world-class service, so that we make sure we start ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> and remain ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> on the right foot.

Blurb: Blawzy
Project_Community_top_cities: |Miami-United States:3 backers|Baltimore-United States:2 backers|Jacksonville-United States:2 backers|New York-United States:2 backers|San Francisco-United States:2 backers|Seattle-United States:2 backers|Asheville-United States:1 backer|Boston-United States:1 backer|Dublin-United States:1 backer|Grand Forks-United States:1 backer

Creator_description: Blawzy
Project_description: Blawzy is a new app and web platform to support survivors of sexual assault, violence, and other traumatic events. The app offers several features to members, including a support community, a secure incident documentation and reporting system, and access to free mental health and legal resources. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        The #MeToo movement is a massive social campaign against sexual assault and harassment that highlights traumatic events experienced both women and men every day. High profile cases showcased the scrutiny that survivors face for sharing their stories and a need for more support avenues for victims of assault.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ             At Blawzy, our goal is to provide a digital safe space and actionable resources for anyone who has experienced traumatic events or wants to support survivors of sexual assault, violence, or traumatic events.ÃÂÃÂ        With all of the high-profile cases of sexual assault in the national media today, we believe itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s time to bring to market an app that makes a big difference. We want to give people a safe environment to get as many perspectives as they need in a safe and secure way, but also give them the tools to take next steps once theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve found the right path.ÃÂÃÂ        Blawzy was created as an answer to that need, offering a safe space for women and men who have faced sexual violence. Members can anonymously share their stories and discuss experiences, self-care techniques, and motivating content in the appÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s forum.ÃÂÃÂ   There are many reasons why a victim of sexual assault may choose to not immediately report an event to the police. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Whether itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s an issue of safety or just needing time to emotionally prepare for legal proceedings, many victims may wait months or years. Blawzy is aiming to provide a safe platform for women and men to document incidents of sexual harassment and assault, even when they are not ready to report.ÃÂÃÂ              Blawzy Serves 3 Primary Functions: ÃÂÃÂ    1. Documenting a traumatic eventÃÂÃÂ     2. Providing a support communityÃÂÃÂ     3. Connecting survivors with legal and mental health experts for free        Several features exist on the platform to protect survivors who are hoping to document their experiences. Saved reports will be dated and time-stamped and saved in an encrypted format to prevent user data from being put into the wrong hands. Users can easily gain access to their document if they choose to file a report and wish to use a dated statement as a reference.ÃÂÃÂ        Blawzy also offers resources for emotional support, including an anonymous online community to discuss coping techniques, share stories, or post motivating content. Users will also have access to free legal and mental health consultations and resources to help them find the experts theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re seeking.ÃÂÃÂ        Whether you are a professional, supporter, or have experienced traumatic events in your own life, Blawzy is worth a download. The app is an amazing collection of resources and community that is meant to help people through tough times.ÃÂÃÂ        The app will be available for download on both Android and iOS. The website and app offer a reporting feature that allows members to document events and archive them. We have cloud technology that will backup all files so you never lose the details of your personal story.ÃÂÃÂ        Each document and event entered into the Blawzy app will be time stamped and dated for reference. This gives our users the option to keep a private record of the incident if they are not yet ready to file an official report.ÃÂÃÂ   Blawzy will also provide resources to connect users to legal counsel and mental health experts with free consultations available. The app also provides resources for other mental health struggles, including anxiety, depression, and bullying.ÃÂÃÂ                        What Is Included In My Investment?ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ Early access to the beta app and websiteÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ MugÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ Personal Thank Yous From The TeamÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ Ability To Write Support Letters To SurvivorsÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ Personalized Thank You Letters From SurvivorsÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ Status logos next to your name in appÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0097>ÃÂ Early Invite Access To Facebook Community and Support GroupÃÂÃÂ        We have taken a sensitive and unorganized system of processes and put them into one, easy to use digital space. Although there have been traditional resources for decades, no one has created a large scale digital app specifically to support survivors that helps connect professionals to those in need.ÃÂÃÂ        It does not matter if you do not have money to pay for a lawyer or therapy sessions. We have you covered. We find the professionals that care and connect you with them to access your personal situation and then gain access to their free consultations and other services.ÃÂÃÂ        We know traumatic events do not end. We help you heal over time with our community of survivors, supporters, and professionals so you can feel safe.            Blawzy is a high tech app that is meant to be tailored to any type of traumatic event, sexual assault, or act of violence. We offer resources that were previously scattered or unavailable to the average person. The interface was built to be easy to use and record your story quickly for personal record. You can tailor the app to your specific needs. We have both filters and real people who will be red flagging anyone trying to abuse the support system and community.ÃÂÃÂ          ***Blawzy is not affiliated with Dr. Christine Blasey Ford, though we were inspired by her story.***ÃÂÃÂ      Product Specific FAQs:ÃÂÃÂ     Q: Is it really anonymous?ÃÂÃÂ     A : Blawzy is completely anonymous and allows users to access these resources without revealing their identities.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: What if I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to be anonymous and I want to share personal details of my story to help others?ÃÂÃÂ     A : You can share personal details of your story, as long as you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t mention the identity of any other individual.   Q: Do I create a user profile with my real name especially if IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m a certified professional?ÃÂÃÂ     A : You do use your real name, but your name with not be visible to other users or anyone else on the app.ÃÂÃÂ    Q: How do you prevent trolls from participating the app especially with anonymity?ÃÂÃÂ     A : We will rely on the community to report abusive users, who will then be banned.       If you have been touched by BlawzyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s mission but canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t financially back us at this time, please take the time to share with your network on your social media pages. It would really help us out. You can reach more people than you think. If you know anyone that would benefit from using Blawzy, please let them know. Our official hashtag is #Blawzy.            Risks and challenges  We have experience in producing consumer products. We are aware of some of the manufacturing challenges. Good design takes time and experience. We only expect small manufacturing delays if any. ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s always a chance of delays through customs or shipping. We are in constant contact with our manufacturers to bring you the latest updates.   Quality control is another issue we have faced in the past. To combat this, we will ask for periodic sampling and test out new colors with caution. We know what to look for and how to get there. However, we know that Plan A doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t always work and we always have a backup plan.

Blurb: An all in one mobile app to to make holding and finding Yard Sales easier!
Creator_description: Hey! My name is Nathanial Tarrant. I'm 30 years old and I am absolutely obsessed with technology. I'm a singer and run my own web design business. Fierce Media.
Project_description: I remember when I was a young boy in the 90's, my dad and I would get up early every Saturday, get in the car and find the newspaper with all of the Yard Sales in our area. Dad would crack out the ol' street directory (kids, that is a physical book, with every road in the area where you have look up the street, find the corresponding page and map coordinates. Oh man, even writing this is a pain to do... anyway) then we'd be on our way to the first house! I loved spending this time with my dad, rummaging through other peoples stuff. But when it came to those moments when you have no cash, we'd have to go find an ATM (and in the early 90's in a beachside town, that wasn't an easy task). ÃÂÃÂ Spending this time with my dad definitely enhanced our relationship growing up.ÃÂÃÂ    Bazaar is here to make these time consumers a thing of the past.ÃÂÃÂ    So what is ÃÂÃÂ Bazaar?  Bazaar will be a FREE all-in-one mobile application that allows you to create an account and post a free classified ad for your Yard Sale, attach photos of what you have to sell, share you address and starting time.ÃÂÃÂ   Bazaar uses tags to make it easier for buyers to find exactly what they're looking for like furniture, clothing and kids toys.  Do you ever get those Early Birds who arrive at your door at 5am when your signs clearly say 7am? Well Bazaar will let you hide your address until the time your Yard Sale starts.  Users will be able to click on the address of the Yard Sales they want to visit and Bazaar will send that information to your preferred navigation app, for easy turn by tun navigation.  In future releases of Bazaar, we want to keep the navigation native within Bazaar. This will allow users to choose multiple Yard Sales and Bazaar will automatically create a route with all of their chosen addresses.ÃÂÃÂ   Speaking of future releases, we will integrate a cashless payment system ridding the need to visit an ATM. The seller will input the total amount into Bazaar's POS system creating a QR Code. The buyer will open their Bazaar app, and scan the QR code. Bazaar will deduct that amount from the users stored credit card. At the end of the sale, the Seller can deposit their earnings directly into their account. This feature will prevent money theft.ÃÂÃÂ          So, What's Next?   Bazaar is ready to start development. At our Funding Goal, we will be able to create the app with the basic features. With more funding comes more features allowing us to move forward faster than expected.ÃÂÃÂ   Every dollar bring Bazaar closer and closer to your hands!  By 2022, I would love to see Bazaar reach 3 millions downloads. This would be such an amazing feat.ÃÂÃÂ    Connect to our social media channels to keep up to date with more Bazaar news.   Website  -  Facbook  -  Twitter ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  At this point in time, our biggest risk is not receiving enough funding to get bazaar off the ground. With an app like this which, at its full potential, is very feature rich, keeping to schedule has the potential to become a hurdle. Our time management skills will be put to the test, but with your trust behind us, we know we can make that leap.

Creator_description: Creoqode is a London-based technology and design company, specialising in innovative products that enhance users' hardware and software skills in an enjoyable, creative and educational way.
Project_description: Creoqode Lyra  is a handheld game console.   Lyra  brings all the history of video gaming in the palm of your hands.ÃÂÃÂ         Lyra  can virtually emulate any game console of the classic era, making it possible for you to carry hundreds of them in your pocket. You can play your all-time favourite video games whenever you want, wherever you want.            Powered by  Raspberry Pi CM3L  (Compute Module 3 Lite),  Lyra  will be your game console, personal computer and entertainment system at the same time.             Technical Specs :  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  SOC : Broadcom BCM2837B0, Cortex-A53 (ARMv8) 64-bit SoC  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  CPU : 1.4GHz 64-bit quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 CPU  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  RAM : 1GB LPDDR2 SDRAM  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  Display : 5" TFT LCD 800 x 480 Resolution  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  Video : DPI Interface & HDMI  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  Audio : Integrated Speaker, 3.5 mm Audio Output & HDMI  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  USB : Micro USB 2.0  ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  Memory : 16 GB Micro SD Card. Upgradable to any memory size.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶ ÃÂÃÂ  Battery : 3000 mAh LiPo        Lyra  comes in two different versions:ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶  RTG  (Ready-To-Go): Lyra comes out of the box completely assembled and tested. You can dive straight into video gaming within minutes!     Creoqode LYRA | RTG Game Console    ÃÂ¢<U+0096>ÃÂ¶  DIY  (Do-It-Yourself): Lyra comes out of the box as an all-inclusive DIY kit. You will receive all the necessary components to build your own game console. Assembly does not require any soldering or special skills, and it will only take you 15 minutes to complete! This is an ideal kit for those who wonder what goes inside a game console.     Creoqode LYRA | DIY Game Console    You can connect  Lyra  to a TV via HDMI and enjoy your favourite video games on a larger screen with friends. Additional controllers can be added via the USB port.             Lyra  is also your personal computer. You can surf on the internet, send emails, watch movies or even learn about coding. Simply connect a mouse and keyboard to  Lyra  and enjoy your portable PC on the go!             Lyra  is a great gadget for makers and tinkerers too. You can access Raspberry Pi CM3L through the exposed GPIO pads and create amazing projects! You can connect up to 8 sensors or electronic gadgets to  Lyra  and add new functionalities.                  Lyra  is provided with a comprehensive tutorial series guiding the user about hardware, software and assembly. These tutorials explain in detail how to assemble  Lyra , how to install your preferred OS, and how to download and run video games.ÃÂÃÂ        Take your entertainment to the next level.   Lyra , by  Creoqode .             Unedited video of Creoqode Lyra:                       Risks and challenges  As Creoqode, Lyra is our fifth Kickstarter campaign. We are in the market for more than two years now and gained a valuable experience about manufacturing, packing, customer service and international shipping. We are already in touch with manufacturers for Lyra and arranged the production. Lyra can get into production straight after the funds are received. As the founder of Creoqode, I strongly believe that risks involved for on time delivery of Lyra will be extremely unlikely.  However, it would be fair to note that we will be shipping the product globally, and the taxation, customs duties and other regulations might be different across some countries which might cause some minor delays. However, Creoqode team has extensively researched global delivery of Lyra and partnered up with DHL in order to preempt any challenges we may face. Additionally, we have set the delivery date as December 2019 leaving us plenty of time to ensure on-time delivery.  Additionally, we will be putting all our effort to prepare detailed and easy to follow guidelines for hardware and software side of the product. However, after the delivery of Lyra, some users might still have questions regarding technical aspects of the product or might require assistance, which Creoqode help desk formed of 3 programmers and 2 electrical engineers will be able to answer immediately. We are all prepared for you to have an exciting and smooth experience with Lyra.  For any enquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us at  info@creoqode.com

Blurb: Bluetooth Engine Shut-off Switch
Creator_description: A Dad that created BESS to try and help kids stay safe
Project_description: patent pending    WHY DID I MAKE BESS    Designed by a parent for a parent; BESS is a remote switch that will turn off whatever it is that your kids are learning to ride.  After weeks of running after my 3 year old on his dirt bike I had enough. I searched the internet for any ideas. All I could find was videos of kids crashing, dads running next to kids, and a few dads that tied a rope to the back of a dirt bike.ÃÂÃÂ   So I created BESS.    WHAT IS BESS   It helps parents stay in control and gives kids the chance to learn how to ride. Simply download the App to your Smartphone, connect to BESS, and you can use the ON/OFF buttons to control your kids ride. Bluetooth has about a 100 foot range. If your child goes out of range, don't worry BESS will automatically turn off your kids ride. BESS has a rechargeable battery so you can install it on anything.ÃÂÃÂ     WHAT WILL BESS WORK ON   Dirt bikes  ATVs  Go Karts  Power Wheels  And More!!                       WHAT STAGE IS THE PROJECT IN? ÃÂÃÂ    What you see in the picture is a real working prototype and the video is BESS in action not something edited    The hardware and software are complete    I have several working prototypes    I have built the App to control BESS    I have been testing BESS for months now (I wanted to make sure it will do its job and keep the kids safe)    WHAT NEXT? ÃÂÃÂ   I could start a website or go on amazon and sell BESS but I have high expectations and do not believe that I will be able to keep up with the demand of hand making every single BESS. If the project is funded with kickstarter I will use the money to have BESS manufactured so I can take this from a good idea to a great product. After that I hope to sell BESS online and have it available at local motorcycle or powersports dealerships.   BACK BESS ON KICKSTARTER SO WE CAN PROTECT WHAT MATTERS!!                                                 Risks and challenges  One of the main challenges I have faced is that my #1 job is DAD.  I worked hard on this project and have completed every step by myself. I took my idea to a group of engineers to see how much it would cost to build. I was surprised to hear $50,000 just to build a prototype and another $50,000 to take to market. So I learned to code, build Apps, 3D print, and much more. Now I have several working prototypes and I am ready for Manufacturing. I truly believe BESS will help parents and children everywhere. By backing this project you will help BESS go from a good idea to a great product.

Project_description: Transforms anything hollow into a speaker, at any time  HumBird Speaker is the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s smallest and most versatile bone conduction speaker that allows you to have a different but always spectacular experience of sound anywhere, in any context. Transforms anything hollow Into a speaker, at any time            Hear Everything Around You  HumBird Speaker allows you to listen to music, follow podcasts, have individual phone conversations or conference calls, and even enjoy an amazing experience of the sound of your games, videos or films played on your device.ÃÂÃÂ         It works like a humBird, small but powerful. It delivers a high sound volume, being 4 to 5 times louder than the average cell phone speakers' volume, reaching up to 115db, and it allows you to personalize the tone quality.       Be Blown Away by True Wireless Stereo  We highly recommend you to use two HumBird Speakers interconnected, you can have a Surround Sound 2.0 experience since this innovative Bluetooth-enabled device is also TWS-enabled.ÃÂÃÂ        Different Surfaces, Different Sounds  HumBird uses bone conduction technology to offer you a DIY customizable experience of sound. You can test and enjoy different soundsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>almost as if different instruments are used. Place It on top of different surfaces such as a guitar, a kraft box, a plastic storage box, photo frames, sports helmet or even dashboards can provide you varying of sound effects.ÃÂÃÂ               In the same way, the following elements generate the following sound effects:        Portable and lightweight  Along with having an extremely beautiful design, HumBird Speaker is extremely compact. In fact, it only has 40 mm of diameter and it weighs as little as 35 grams , being only slightly larger than a coin. You can take it in your wallet, pocket or even hung around your neck in a necklace or in a keychain.        Everything has its own sounds  Adopting bone conduction technology and moving coil acoustic technology, Humbird Speaker turns sound into a mechanic vibration of different frequencies, leveraging the effects of the different materials on top of which it is placed and used. Its vibrations produce a truly original, variable and customizable collection of sounds through self-vibration. Everything has its own sound,  how many sounds did you discover by now?         Enjoy the Radio Tunes, Everywhere  Radio is timeless and itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the kind of company that you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to do without. Whether it is to listen to music selections played by your favorite hosts or to listen to the thoughts and facts shared on your favorite shows, HumBirdÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s wireless FM radio ensures that you can enjoy your favorite radio tunes everywhere.       Made for Tasteful Pioneers  Due to its aesthetically remarkable and compact design as well as to its impressive features, HumBird speaker is the perfect choice for tasteful pioneers who want to come first as early technology adopters with a strong appreciation for smart design. Creator_description: Our mission is to educate, engage, and empower children across the country through hands-on solar energy workshops that will give them the tools they need to lead a more sustainable life.
Project_description: Thanks to you all, we've been funded on Kickstarter!                                                   If you have any questions, check out our FAQ or shoot us an email at empoweredbythesun@gmail.com.       We are on a mission to bring solar energy education across the country and empower people of all ages to envision and start realizing a brighter future!ÃÂÃÂ Pun intended.       We will travel via Sunny, the solar powered van, to demonstrate that solar energy is a viable and readily accessible energy alternative and  we need your support  to get this project rolling, literally! ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             After a thorough research all of our 50 state's educational standards, we were surprised to find a lack of standards relating to renewable energy. The majority of them do not require in-depth renewable energy education and the instruction on the subject of solar energy is mostly limited to students enrolled in Career and Technical Education programs, a.k.a. vocational schools.ÃÂÃÂ      Only 3 states require their teachers to educate about solar energy!    We came to the conclusion that our students are not being prepared to face one of the most pressing issues of the 21st century: how to provide secure, reliable, clean, and affordable energy for future generations. However, we understand that teachers have a lot on their plate and school funding is unavailable sometimes. Teachers, don't fret. We got you!            We strongly believe that solar energy should be taught to children across the country as a means to meet our current and future energy needs. Therefore, we spent the past four years developing and testing a curriculum that bridges the existing educational gap.            Our curriculum includes information about  renewable energy ,  solar power ,  circuits , and how to make a circuit with solar power. The instruction is structured into a workshop that teaches our students how solar energy is harvested and how it can be used in an electrical and heating capacity.ÃÂÃÂ      Our students will have the opportunity to use this knowledge to construct a solar powered car.           The workshops will include videos and verbal information of the versatility of solar power as an energy source. Our students will work in teams to develop communication and critical thinking skills, but most important they will learn how to build electric circuits using solar power. This hands-on experience will enable them to fully grasp and understand the practical use of this renewable energy source!      Click here to apply for a solar energy workop in your school or community!                         July, 2019 Ideaing Article about Empowered by the Sun:  https://ideaing.com/ideas/empowered-by-the-sun-solar-power/ ÃÂÃÂ   July, 2019 Video Coverage by Channel 8 News in Tampa:  https://www.wfla.com/news/hillsborough-county/tampa-couple-touring-country-in-solar-powered-van-to-teach-importance-of-solar-energy/ ÃÂÃÂ        To foster the curiosity of our students to further explore this subject, we will provide them with the opportunity to start their own  Empowered by the Sun Club.  To build-up their newly aquired skills, clubs will be provided with a new fun and exciting project to work on every school year. With the guidance of a teacher or mentor, they can enter and participate in a competition to showcase their project alongside other clubs all over the country and have a chance to win Best of the Year award and prizes!ÃÂÃÂ       Click on this image to start your very own EBS Club!     Not only will this expand their knowledge and capabilities, but it can spark an interest that could lead them to a variety of career opportunities within the growing solar energy industry. According to  James Hamilton , an economist in the Office of Occupational Statistics and Employment Projections of the Bureau of Labor Statistics, the industry employs a wide range of occupations in a number of major industry segments: research and development, manufacturing of solar power materials, construction of solar power plants, operation of solar power plants, and solar power installation and maintenance.     We see a bright future for our students!         Ours is a very clear mission: to spread practical knowledge of solar energy across the country and reach as many students as possible. We will travel coast to coast driven solely by the power of the sun to empower our students to create a brighter future for themselves and their communities.ÃÂÃÂ      Our students love our workshops and we love to brighten their day!    After receiving our workshops, our students will share their experience with their parents, family, and friends. Imagine all the people that we will impact directly and indirectly, and that is without mentioning the impression that Sunny will have on them!       Not only will "Sunny" the Solar Powered Van be a testament of how renewable energy can supply our energy needs, but it will demonstrate that we can do anything we put our minds to. Three years ago we came up with this dream and today we are so close to making it a reality that we can almost feel it!       We quit our jobs to dedicate ourselves to this project and have shed some serious blood, sweat, and tears into it. We have developed the curriculum, went through all the legal work, acquired the van and electric motor vehicle parts, received the solar panels, and put a down payment to convert the van to electric. However, we need your help to finish what we started!     We are only limited by our imagination!     To reach our goal, we are bringing our individual and combined skills to the table to provide rewards that add value to our donors and their community. Will is a professional photographer and videographer, known by the pseudonym DJ Chill Will, and Margarita is a creative spirit and sewing enthusiast; both of whom enjoy the outdoors and are thrilled to share with all of you the fruits of our labor in order to make this project a reality.     Will is honored to share his photography and videography skills with all our donors!    We are only asking for the funds necessary to start our project, however we firmly believe that everybody deserves to understand and be able to use solar energy. Raising additional funds would enable us to offer our workshops to any and all students regardless of their socioeconomic background.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Margarita is a big creative force behind this project and her sewing skills are on [needle] point!    Any supplemental funds raised would enable us to acquire the materials and resources necessary to impact as many students as possible, help fund student clubs and rewards, all while maintaining a fun and exciting curriculum.     Approximately every $250 donated is another school we can reach.    ÃÂÃÂ  EACH SOLAR PANEL IS A SCHOOL SUNNY COULD VISIT THANKS TO YOUR DONATIONS*!   Together we can empower our students to create a brighter future and we truly cannot wait to hit the road on our solar powered van to commence our workshops and start spreading the word of what solar energy education can do for our students, their community, and our country.ÃÂÃÂ Every dollar brings us closer to another school, so what are you waiting for?ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ JOIN US IN OUR EFFORTS AND BECOME EMPOWERED BY THE SUN! ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             We put our minds together and came up with rewards that utilize both our individual and shared skills in order to ÃÂÃÂ show our appreciation for each and every one of your pledges. There is something for everyone and every budget!       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ HERE ARE SOME OF OUR FAVORITES!  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ OUR TOTE HANDCRAFTED BY MARGARITA IS SURE TO BRIGHTEN UP YOUR DAY!       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ DECORATE YOUR SPACE WITH WILL'S BEAUTIFUL LANDSCAPE PHOTOGRAPHY!         ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ LEARN ABOUT ELECTRICITY AND SOLAR ENERGY WITH OUT PERSONAL KITS!                                           See reward details for more information of all of the kit's contents!                                                         We just can't get enough of our student's smiles!    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ADD AN INVALUABLE TOOL FOR YOUR SCHOOL'S SCIENCE CLASSROOM!                                        See reward details for more information on our classroom kit contents!     ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ GO CAMPING WITH US AND HONE YOUR PHOTOGRAPHY SKILLS!ÃÂÃÂ      Hiking, camping, solar cooking, and photography sounds like a recipe for a great time!    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ CAPTURE THE BEAUTY OF THE SPECIAL MOMENTS IN YOUR LIFE                                                    We love making memories that last a lifetime!                   A very special and heartfelt thank you to  ESA Solar  for supplying Sunny's solar panels, to Dale Kortum, David Lehrke, Joe Bisaillon, Jason Kelly, Justin Vandenbroeck, Keith Alexsuk, Kyle Kortum, Michelle Alexsuk, Patrick Sherwin, Ryan Harrigan, Sarah Bauer, Stephanie Valderrama, our loving parents for believing in us, and all of you who have assisted us throughout this process!      Infographic designs created by Simply Steph!      *Empowered by the Sun is a registered nonprofit corporation and you can get a tax deduction for donations. However, we do have to deduct the fair market value in the instance that you select a reward in exchange for your donation.ÃÂÃÂ We willÃÂÃÂ provide a timely receipt confirming the donation amount, reward value, date, and type of donation.ÃÂÃÂ   Empowered by the Sun, Inc.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ PO Box 733  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Lutz, FL 33548ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Some potential challenges with a project of this scale include: building a solar powered van, transportation from location to location, planning the logistics of reaching workshop locations on time, gathering funding for materials and workshops, holding the engagement of the audience, and collecting metrics from these workshops and students that are impacted.   Fortunately, we have been devoting our time and energy into this project for over four years and have spent ample time as a team and with consultants to reduce these risks. Firstly, we already own the van and we have the solar panels that will power it (a big thank you to ESA Solar for those panels). Instead of converting the van ourselves to be solar electric, we are working with a professional (BH Electrics) who has converted over 10 vehicles previously so that it is done correctly and according to our schedule.  This segues into the transportation problem. Unlike most people, we have a vehicle that just needs sun to go. The range is limited to 200 miles on a charge, but we will use this information to plan our routes so that we arrive to each destination on time and ready to have some fun. In addition, our solar powered vehicle (Sunny) allows us to bring the materials to each workshop so that we make sure we have everything we need and it does not need to be shipped (in addition to the environmental benefit of not using fossil fuels to send materials). Our logistics are planned out ahead of time and with plenty of wiggle room to account for cloudy days and other unforseen issues.   Gathering funds is currently our largest obstacle, and is why we made this Kickstarter campaign. We know that most people are unaware of the lack of electricity and solar power education in the United States and are also unfamiliar with us and what we do. This campaign is a great tool to show them what we are all about so that we can seriously fund our nonprofit work.   The audience is always difficult for anyone to engage. Fortunately, Will has been designing this curriculum so that workshop attendees really don't have much choice. They will be building the circuits and working with solar with their own two hands, this is no lecture! We have a great track record of engaging workshops and curriculum and our testimonials attest to that. Plus, over the past four years, Will has been able to actually test these kits and these workshops with real students and refine them so that they engage and educate the most.  Regarding metrics, we have different surveys that are given to each teacher after we leave so that we can get information from them and the students so as to assess our engagement and our results. These surveys also help us improve our workshops. Our online curriculum has digital metrics that are easy to see and display, and we will use those to update our inquisitive supporters.

Blurb: Biodegradable & All-Natural Mosquito Bait Stations
Creator_description: A graduate of Loyola University New Orleans, Dylan has worked to bring ethical management strategies to companies and organizations across the United States.
Project_description: Mosquitoes suck. So does not having any bees to pollenate our food. Traditional mosquito control hurts bees and existing baits target only 1 of 3 types of mosquitoes. On top of that, they're made of plastic that takes over 1000 years to degrade. That's why BugGuys.com BioSafe Mosquito Bait Stations are safe for bees, target all 3 types of mosquitoes, and are 100% biodegradable!  For every bait station ordered, BugGuys.com is giving one to countries in Africa most affected by mosquito-born diseases. Zimbabwe was already devastated by a terrible cyclone this year. But, the season has just begun for disease-spreading mosquitoes that kill more people than any other living creature every year.ÃÂÃÂ   We need your help to get away from harmful, archaic means of mosquito control. Order your BioSafe Mosquito Bait Station and live mosquito-free, guilt-free.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We need your help in overcoming the costs of production. Reaching our campaign goal will allow us to mold more bait stations, ship them to Zimbabwe and Zambia, carry out the necessary research to end this problem, and to lower the cost of manufacturing and distribution to the United States.

Blurb: Safe Containing and Zero waste solution providing maximized satisfaction and making Minimum Impact to Earth.
