Creator_description: Steve Oh studied Electric and Electronic engineering and he is a registered patent attorney in Korea. Steve has deep understanding in various field of technologies such as Mechanical, Material, Chemical industry by involving various IP cases. He founded INNERBOTTLE in 2017.
Project_description: We are INNERBOTTLE, providing a  sustainable zero waste packaging solution . A B2B company.ÃÂÃÂ        Did you know that almost 100% of cosmetic packaging, especially plastic packaging goes to landfill?   This is why .  1. cosmetic products use excessive heavy packaging for design perspective such as coating, printing, deposition.  2. Used bottles are very hard to clean it because content mostly contain oil and it requires a great amount of water for rinsing.    But our current recycling process can't solve these problem, impossible to realize circular economy.                   INNERBOTTLE leaves no residue, nothing but a clean empty bottle after use, and we provide a  recycle and reuse friendly  packaging.        INNERBOTTLE can solve ÃÂÃÂ problems above and it is  beneficial for both us and for Earth .ÃÂÃÂ                   Innerbottle solution leaves less than 2% of residue. This not only provides satisfied user experience but also contributes environment protection.ÃÂÃÂ                The most important function of container is to preserve content safely without any denaturation. With  Dual layer  and  Diffusion Barrier EffectÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ , Innerbottle prevents oxidation and denaturation of content, keeping it safe till the final use.               Innerbottle is made of 100% BPA-free silicone which is specially formulated, which is non-toxic keeping the content safe.ÃÂÃÂ             Innerbottle keeps the outer shell clean thus contributes to environment by reducing water while cleaning the bottle to recycle it .               Innerbottle is made of specially formulated silicone which can be totally incinerated or recycled to silicone oil. So as we recycle every part, it goes circular and keeps the world sustainable.          Let's run a simulation supposing that we bought a product having 100ml (3.38Oz.) for $30 which has medium viscosity.       You can also run a simulation by clicking the image         The result is truly surprising.               Since silicone can be either recycled or incinerated completely leaving nothing but ash, and the outer packaging(empty bottle) requires minimum cleansing, the outer packaging can be used again.  Our  Re-Turn  program is done by cooperating with Cosmetic Brands. After consumers finish using their products, empty bottles are collected by Cosmetic Brands and they are sent to INNERBOTTLE.  At INNERBOTTLE, Innerbottle (Inner-packaging) are separated and recycled and empty outer shells are sent to reusing facilities where they are rinsed with minimum water.  And we are making progress setting the system.       Our sustainable concept was highly encouraged by each organization as below. We would like to share stories with our backers, and we hope you could support us too.   Innerbottle participated in K-Start 2018, the largest Start-up competition in Korea and won the first prize(Presidential award) by achieving recognition of possibilities in reducing resources, recycling materials, to make Circular Economy.        Innerbottle made a presentation at Sustainable Cosmetic Summit 2019, on 8-10th May in New York City this year. We were gathered to talk about the current environmental issues and seek for solution to make our world sustainable. Changing the economy from linear to circular, we need to see the whole industry from a different point of view, focused on 'sustainability'. And we believe our solution can motivate the world to be more responsible helping them to make a better choice.ÃÂÃÂ         Innerbottle also has been awarded as the Startup Of The Year at IN_PACT ASIA 2019 held in Manila, hosted by Asian Development Bank (ADB) and Asia Society for Social Improvement and Social Transformation (ASSIST). This meant a lot to us, and we will try to move further.ÃÂÃÂ         And recently, we've won a Red Dot in Red Dot Award 2019 by the concept of Eco friendly packaging solution.            We have just started our mass manufacture but we are still a small team.        Innerbottle is an innovative containing solution company to make zero waste and sustainable products that encourage people all around the world.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Then what would be the consequence of using a normal bottle compared using INNERBOTTLE?? Check this video we've tested in our team.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             We stored Body lotion of Brand 'K' and we kept pumping until the content stopped coming out. ÃÂÃÂ OMG!! 33%!!! Using normal bottle wastes ÃÂÃÂ a lot money, making a lot water pollution.   Our technology is represented by cutting edge material engineering and chemical engineering with an in-depth research. Our innovative technology can save tremendous resources and change the packaging industry. Our Zero-Waste solution can motivate consumers to support and contribute more to making our environment green.  We strongly believe that each of our small action can make great impact on making the world sustainable.                    We wanted to give out a reward that can provide good experience of our solution on both personal and environmental aspect.  We focused to provide not only the best experience of our solution but also the best formula made with finest ingredients. As our thoughtful gratitude, we have prepared a Hand & Body lotion with EWG Green Grade certified ingredient and Triple Hyaluronic acid which can immediately moisturize and soothe your dry skin anytime, anywhere. We think it will be loved by everybody having a mild and soft texture, even with our backers with sensitive skin.       Our formula is provided by the most reputable cosmetic manufacturing company in South Korea called COSMAX. And with our solution "Innerbottle", content will be kept safe and clean, and you will able to use the whole content to the last single drop.  We made it in a travel size so that you can put it inside your backpack, hand bag, and even your outer jacket. Now you are moisturized 24/7.       And the outer shell is also recycling friendly ,which is super great. As you finish your product, please find how the bottle is still clean after removing the film which is wrapped on the surface. Hope you separate it, and join recycling after finishing our reward.ÃÂÃÂ        Here are the main features of content, safely housed and protected inside Innerbottle.  * ÃÂÃÂ Soothing and Moisturizing Formula with Triple Hyaluronic Acid  * ÃÂÃÂ EWG Green Grade Certified (As of June 2019)  * ÃÂÃÂ Formula made by COSMAX Inc. (Korea's No.1 Cosmetic Manufacturer)  * ÃÂÃÂ Manufactured to meet the highest standards of skin care product.ÃÂÃÂ             We have designed our reward product to meet limitless needs.ÃÂÃÂ    For every place. For every gender.  Please enjoy and share INNERBOTTLE in your daily life with people on social medias.                With a thankful heart for your support, if you back us to succeed our stretched goal (10 times), we will make 5% donation of our achievements to WWF(World Wildlife Fund).  www.worldwildlife.org                   Check out if you want more information about Innerbottle solution on following websites.                                              Risks and challenges  Mass Production: Delays in mass production could be happened if Kickstarter is successful. But we calculated this risk and we have collaborated with large manufacturing partner who are ready to deal with mass production.  Logistics: One challenge we have considered is shipping a large number of products at once. However, we will send our backers survey after our campaign ends and organize orders thoroughly. Also, we will work with logistics partners who have vast crowdfunding experience.  Import Taxes: All rewards will be shipped from South Korea. For US VAT is included in the rewards and US backers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries, taxes and duties may apply.

Blurb: WheelCare2: another well designed caring solution for both carers and those with mobility difficulties/elderlies are always connected.
Creator_description: A new start-up company set up in 2018 based in HK. FTD InnoTech gathers experienced several engineers (in Machinery & Automation designs) to make contributions to the society. Simplicity, Creativity and Excellence are the core values of the company while Innovation for Life is what we are working for.
Project_description: About    WheelCare2: Another Caring Solution for the Disabled/Elderly         WheelCare2 , utilizes wireless technologies providing double protection to the elderly who have mobility difficulties and to the carers who won't be afraid of getting them lost.   Your Care, We Care   Imagine your parents or grandparents suffering from mobility difficulties, you may immediately come up with 2 things: (i) Wheelchair (ii) Carer. To facilitate this situation, we have thought of a fully caring solution to enhance the user experience from hardware to software meanwhile you, as a family member, will also feel comfy to buy for your beloved ones.   WheelCare2 includes:   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ A Power Wheelchair embedded with an  All-In-One Smart tracking system (BLE & GPS Tracking System)    Not an ordinary Power Wheelchair ÃÂÃÂ         The specification of power wheelchair    Hardware specification:  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ The wheelchair is made from durable Lightweight Aircraft Quality Aluminium that allows it to hold up a weight of 300 lbs (~136 kg) yet it is 54 lbs only (~24 kg, with battery).  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ It is foldable with size 95X62X34 cm^3 only, that can easily fit into the compartment of most of the vehicles and much more convenient for travelling.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ Supported by the lithium ion battery, the power wheelchair will be able to travel up to 15km by fully charged up in just 2 hours.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ In the meantime, the handles help the carer pull and push easier and, the breathable seat cushion can be removable for easy cleaning.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ With Electromagnetic Braking System, user can change from the power mode to the manual mode safely.   Foldable WheelCare Demonstration:          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              It is easily handled by different carers with different physical sizes.   Software specification:   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ Using Bluetooth technology, the embedded smart tracking system (i) will alert when the carer is out of the preset distance (between the carer and the elder) and;  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ ÃÂÃÂ GPS tracking system will be the 2nd protection to avoid missing the elder in a longer distance range; (i) will alert when the carer is out of the preset location and, (ii) help the carer to locate the elder through our app. (Further explanation will be provided below)    What makes smart tracking system special to a Power Wheelchair?   For carers the most stressful thing shall be getting the elders lost accidentally. However, with tracking system, you won't have such worry by simply following a few steps: ÃÂÃÂ   (1) Download an app  (2) Set the alert distance between the carer and the elder: ( a) 1-2 m ; (b) 5-7 m; (c) 12-15 m  (3) When you are out of the alert distance range, your mobile will ring loudly  (4) Open the app and you will get the last location of the elder right after s/he is out of the alert distance  For example, one day Victoria goes to the supermarket with her mum with our power wheelchair and she spots that there is a super sale corner. She runs to the corner immediately as usual and when she is about to take a look of the one piece, she hears an alarm quite annoying...Gosh! She leaves mum behind! Thanks to the tracking system.   Smart Tracking system operating demonstration: (BLE & GPS Tracking System)          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                    You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             When the carer is away from the elder more than 15m, what should we do? If the tracking system is the 1st protection, then the GPS tracking system will be the 2nd protection to avoid missing the elder in a longer distance range: ÃÂÃÂ   (1) Same as the BLE tracking system, you have to download an app for the GPS tracking  (2) Select the tracker by IMEI number, you can then define the tracking location and boundary size or area.  (3) Then you can monitor, trace or find the elder successfully   Project Status  ÃÂÃÂ· Prototype for WheelCare2 :  Completed   ÃÂÃÂ· WheelCare Engineering validation  ÃÂÃÂ· ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Wheelchair:  Completed   ÃÂÃÂ· App developement and validation:  Completed   ÃÂÃÂ· Cosmetic enhancement in progress  ETC: 7/25     Why should I need WheelCare2?   We hope the products of FTD can make contributions to the society that more and more people can be beneficial by a more affordable price but with better functionality.  WheelCare2 understands the needs of both the carers and the elders. We aim at providing a more considerate solution to show your care to the elders with our passionate engineering design. The double protection not only helps locate the elder physically but also relieves the stress of the carer mentally. The enhancement of the user experience for both parties in terms of better caring solution enables both sides can be well connected anytime, anywhere regardless of the distance.      Risks and challenges  Developing WheelCare2 involves lots of challenging electromechanical and software designs, such as lightweight with strong structural strength, combine size with foldable mechanism, battery life, ergonomic design and the wireless technologies embedded into the power wheelchair. We can foresee lots of testings from hardware to software to confirm the safety and the functionality.

Blurb: A survey platform with a twist. Connecting UK businesses with the UK student market.
Creator_description: An entrepreneur specialising in market research, digital advertising and data development. Passionate about building healthy, sustainable brand relationships to improve the B2C experience. For more information on the ROMA Surveys platform, please drop me a message.
Project_description: *PRIZE DRAW*        We're hosting a prize draw for our backers! Simply back the project and your name will be entered into our draw for the chance to win a brand new set of the latest Apple AirPods (postage paid for by us). The lucky winner will be announced if the project reaches its funding goal. Don't miss out and stay tuned for the announcement!ÃÂÃÂ     Overview   ROMA Surveys has one aim and one aim only - to improve the way market research is conducted and ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ and ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦..ÃÂÃÂ   Ok, so maybe not just one aimÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦    So what do we ACTUALLY do?   Simply put, ROMA Surveys offers a user-friendly survey platform for local and online businesses to research, engage and connect with the 18-25 year old population.ÃÂÃÂ   Both on a local and national level, not only can our researchers benefit from targeted survey responses, they can also build their online presence to both current and potential consumers - through the use of our targeted user base and promoter websites. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Once signed up, these companies are able to create survey campaigns that are then distributed across a network of promoter websites relevant to the business, to be completed by anyone who has signed up as a user on our platform.ÃÂÃÂ        We believe data usage for marketing purposed isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t always ethical and with many social media platforms using your data without your acknowledgement, we want to show there's a way to transparently collect data for our researchers, in exchange for rewards we give to you!ÃÂÃÂ     SURVEY FUNCTIONALITY   We are not just your standard survey site.ÃÂÃÂ   Have you ever tried to complete a survey online in order to reap the financial rewards? Have you ever got a financial reward that was worth the time and payout received?ÃÂÃÂ   ROMA Surveys only allows companies to create surveys with a maximum of 10 short multiple-choice questions. Each survey typically lasts between 10-120 seconds. ÃÂÃÂ    The best news? Per completed survey, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get paid 50p INSTANTLY into your PayPal account.ÃÂÃÂ       How It Works - A simple and transparent process      PAYOUTS AND FEES     How do our prices come about?ÃÂÃÂ    Believe it or not, we didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just pluck these figures out of thin air. We knew our goal from the start was to ensure we positively impacted the market research industry and anyone involved within it. So of course, that meant beating ALL our competitors prices.  USERS:  Usually, when signing up to other survey sites, payouts vary between ÃÂÃÂ£0.01p and ÃÂÃÂ£0.10p for shorter surveys. For longer surveys payouts can be slightly higher but can also take up to an hourÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s time.ÃÂÃÂ   With ROMA Surveys, we make sure all our surveys take less than 2 minutes to complete and allow users to achieve payouts of ÃÂÃÂ£0.50p per survey.ÃÂÃÂ        PROMOTERS:  Similar to users, payouts for promoters are usually between ÃÂÃÂ£0.01p and ÃÂÃÂ£0.10p for each advert click. With ROMA Surveys, promoters are able to earn ÃÂÃÂ£0.20p.ÃÂÃÂ   WhatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more is that promoters are able to choose which types of websites or blogs they would like to promote. For example, if you have an e-commerce site that sells dog toys, you can choose to promote your adverts to users who are interested in pets, allowing your surveys to match your unique content.ÃÂÃÂ         WEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>RE DIFFERENT    We have four main USPs:   1. Instant payouts - earn up to ÃÂÃÂ£5 per day by using our platformÃÂÃÂ    Not only are our surveys unique to your interests and hobbies, but when you fill out 10 surveys a day, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll earn ÃÂÃÂ£5.00 which will go straight into your PayPal account the same day - itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s that simple. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s your lunch, on us!ÃÂÃÂ    2. We drive exposure for the companies that choose to create surveys on our platform.   It takes less than a few minutes to create a survey on our platform. Once the survey is published, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s automatically featured to a multitude of websites and app owners who can choose to promote the survey in exchange for payouts from us! WhatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more, the promoter is always relevant to the survey creator, allowing for their branding and survey to be exposed to potentially thousands of relevant, potential customers on the promoters website/app.ÃÂÃÂ    3. Our promoters who get paid for featuring our surveys also benefiting from increased traffic and content engagement.ÃÂÃÂ    For every ROMA Surveys user who completes a survey thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s promoted on your website/app, you get paid ÃÂÃÂ£0.20p thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s accessible whenever you want it. Furthermore, because users completing the survey are relevant for your website/app content, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll automatically gain increased engagement and coverage!ÃÂÃÂ    4. Creating a survey on our platform guarantees engagement with your content.ÃÂÃÂ    Companies and individuals who create a survey not only benefit from having their survey and branding advertised on verified and relevant websites/apps but additionally, our users completing surveys are also incentivised to visit the websites of those creating the survey. Through our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>leads toolÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>, for gaining a higher survey reward limit per day, users are given the opportunity to view and engage with content and media created by the company or individual themselves.     ROMA Surveys User Homepage      Our plans for growth with your investmentÃÂÃÂ    If our campaign is successful, we plan to divide the funds with 50% for digital marketing and 50% for platform development. We love our product and we hope you will too which is why with our ÃÂÃÂ£10,000 marketing budget, we plan to boost our outreach, allowing for more students across the United Kingdom to earn and research with ROMA Surveys.ÃÂÃÂ   Our next big step is to build a reputable and active following in the United kingdom so that we may share the value of our platform to those living in Europe, United States of America and Asia.ÃÂÃÂ   In addition to this, 50% of our investment will be carefully spent on platform development, allowing us to create additional features and tools that will further increase the effectiveness and outreach of our researcher targeting, with API access available too. As well as this, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll provide users with capabilities to share their survey activity with friends in exchange for more rewards, integrate more payout options and create the ability to share ÃÂÃÂ payouts with your chosen charities.ÃÂÃÂ All development is facilitated by our trusted external developer team who have been building tailored platforms for over 20 years.ÃÂÃÂ   Finally, through the growing use of QR technology, we aim to create bigger and better incentives for customers to interact and support local businesses where they can earn ROMA credits to spend at their favourite brands.ÃÂÃÂ     Our final words to you   We aim to disrupt the outdated, inconvenient and unrewarding process of paid surveys by providing a rewarding and trustworthy environment where users, promoters and researchers are provided value and growth. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve already got a variety of startups, SMEs and PLCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s strongly interested or already signed up on our platform as well as many users and publishers signed up to use our platform, all we need is your investment to make it happen. Market research and data targeting shouldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be intimidating which is why, with your investment in us, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll not only build a platform thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s easy to use and highly effective, but weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll change the way the world sees boring surveys and ineffective digital marketing.ÃÂÃÂ      Invest in us today and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll reward you tomorrow.ÃÂÃÂ                         Risks and challenges  Businesses are the source of income for websites, users and ROMA which means they are crucial to the process. Not enough businesses mean fewer surveys, fewer people able to earn money and a negative reputation for the platform.   In the event of not enough businesses signing up, we will increase our business-to-business marketing and PR which is largely facilitated through our networks, both offline and online. Businesses can definitely benefit from ROMA more than anywhere else which indicates the issue is not ROMA being of less value but more specifically not having a strong reputation and extensive user base, yet.   With enough backers and an increase in our national coverage through news sites, social media and press, we believe the growth in user numbers will result in a hugely added incentive for even more businesses to sign up.

Creator_description: I have grown up in Aurora or people and around children. My great grandfather started his own buisness to help the people of his community. That is my goal as well. This is the start of my journey.
Project_description: The ÃÂÃÂ amount I ÃÂÃÂ have ÃÂÃÂ requested ÃÂÃÂ will ÃÂÃÂ allow me ÃÂÃÂ to develop ÃÂÃÂ a prototype ÃÂÃÂ and follow through with the marketing and production of the tupperware.The solar powered Tupperware is for the easy storage of leftovers as well as the reheating of them on the go. This product can be used to help the everyday worker who does not have access to a microwave all the way to a recreational hiker to a family on a picnic. Blurb: ergonomic desk lift that promotes wellness for users, giving you the chance to stand and work
Creator_description: Founding director of revonomic 2013 ( revolutionary Ergonomics)Over 10 experience in ergonomic products  for the office place VISION - To provide an effective ergonomic upgrade solution available to everyone, improve the posture and productivity of usersMISSION - Increase happiness and wellness in the workplace
Project_description: clean neat standing desk converter                                        Our Goal is to improve and increase your posture and physical movement while working by providing effective standard solutions which can be tailored to different user requirements.ÃÂÃÂ Giving the opportunity to stand and work to boost health and productivity and increase collaboration points.  Our current core products range will be incorporated to this solution to maximize efficiency.  As well as efficiency and effectiveness we also a design ÃÂÃÂ standard so our products look visually pleasing.      Risks and challenges  Attention to detail is key, we source from China, Taiwan and assemble and manufacturer in Malaysia. Our aim to keep costs down and quality high, ergonomic solutions should become a standard in the workplace. Educating people, on the benefits of standing for that extra hour a day, Lift desk is portable at our target weight 22kg per desk, we plan to arrange workshops and pop up stalls to explain the benefits of standing at work and let users feel, see and test the products in real life.

Blurb: Safety and stabilization device for off road and flat surface production, movement, and transport of trees, boulders, heavy objects.
Creator_description: Working on a farm when I grew up always allowed me to work with trees. After a business degree and a science degree I knew plants would be my life. After leading two companies I decided to start off on my own venture in Landscaping. I now complete Property Maintenance on a high-end level.  Working with plants every day allows me to teach my children the importance of life and sustainability.
Project_description: I have created a product that stabilizes objects in warehousing, shipping/receiving, and all terrain applications. My product was specifically designed for trees. ÃÂÃÂ By attaching to the basket of the tree root balls and allowing the trunk of the tree to be stabilized through a central axis, via fork equipment, this product prevents material damages, increases safety, allows easier maneuverability, reduces labor, and increases efficiency.  Although our product was designed for the Green Industry, we also see more applications being used in the Automotive, Shipping, Receiving, Rescue, and U.S. Military Sectors. Using the stabilization to focus on weight distribution our product further allows focusing loads for increasing equipment capabilities.  For more information please contact me at  kreative.solutions.ksi@gmail.com  or reach out to me at 419-438-2070. Lets help improve the safety and efficiency of our heavy labor industry together.      Risks and challenges  First starting the project my initial stop was the patent attorney. Finding out the project was completely unique was just the initial step. With the confirmed new idea  and every dime I had on a search I attempted to find ways for others to invest or ways I could get funding. Little did I know how much more effort and research I was about to have to put in. With the government allowing a bill for low income individuals to receive help with inventions I immediately jumped at the chance. The patent pro bono process over the last 6 years has been the greatest informational and productive path I have seen. Through the process I was given the opportunity to work hands on with Case Western University of Law making my product a class project. Working with many four-year law students and professors we were able to broaden the abilities of this product through multiple Industries, not just  the Green Industry for trees. Making this product sturdy enough to maintain more weight than expected has been very integral in our research. the product will have the ability to lift more than the apparatus (ex. skidsteer with forks)moving the object. (Ex. Trees) the apparatus will fail and tip off balance before our product fails.  Off-road abilities has been one of our key issues because trees are almost always off road at some point. The ability to be able to distribute the weight allowance of the item you are carrying has been critical in the development of this product to make it safer for everyone. This achieves our goals by our product making it safer, more time and labor efficient, and more reliable then current methods and products.

Blurb: Our goal is to facilitate authentic human connection through shared interests and experiences.
Creator_description: Currently focused on pursuing degrees in Mathematics, Computer Science, and Economics from Bryn Mawr College, and a Master's degree in Computer & Information Science from the University of Pennsylvania, as well as running JoinMe (a unique social media platform).
Project_description: We are enabling a genuine version of human interaction.    JoinMe is focused on reshaping how individuals utilize technology to feel connected with the people around them.  Through our  intricately designed platform that simplifies the traditional social-media connection process, as well as activity discovery,  we have developed a new kind of social media that fully supports genuine, in-person interaction.   Our Guiding Principles        Our core principles are centered around promoting authentic human connection. As such,  we believe that social media should be redesigned to support human connection in an effort to enhance human wellness, not advance its decline.  A few of our main principles:   Authenticity    Respect    Integrity    Transparency    ExplorationÃÂÃÂ     Transparent profiles   In order to ensure a respectful community, your username, as well as your full name will be shown on your profile page. In addition, before you become a registered member, you must pass our internal verification through selfie identification.ÃÂÃÂ    Re-Imagined MetricsÃÂÃÂ     We've removed the external like count (only the publisher of the content can see the count).    Within the JoinMe app, your connections (external total count replaced by 'mutual connections') can only be seen by those who you have decided to friend.    In an effort to make the connection process easier, your interests are also displayed externally within their own screen (accessed through an individual's profile).    Bold Design   The JoinMe app has five main components: Calendar, Notifications, Home (Feed), Messages, and Profile Page.  We will not track, sell, or own your information.    Profile PageÃÂÃÂ    This is where people can view one another's mutual connections, interests, planned/joined activities, location, name, and biography.        Home (Feed)   The home page (feed) is where people can discover activities and potential connections, as well as request to join the planned experiences of their current friends.        Messages & Notifications   The messaging center is where people can go to write private and group messages, while the notification center allows individuals to stay updated on their likes, requests, and invites.        Calendar   The calendar page is where people can go to manage their activities, as well as view the shared plans of their connections.ÃÂÃÂ         Kickstarter Goal: $100,000   In addition to the kickstarter rewards, the funds will go towards operational, IT, marketing, and legal expenses; $100,000 is our baseline (we would like to raise around $300,000). We plan on launching during the summer of 2020.   ÃÂÃÂ  50%:  Software Engineering    ÃÂÃÂ  25%:  Kickstarter Rewards & Marketing    ÃÂÃÂ  20%:  OperationsÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  5%:  Legal       Risks and challenges  Our main challenge will be to generate a significant adoption of JoinMe in a short amount of time; to overcome this, we have designed our marketing plan in a way that will encourage users to acknowledge why they should use our platform to connect with others in a more genuine manner.

Creator_description: Miravac creates state-of-the-art autonomous solutions for cleaning your living space. We offer an entire product line (2 models in production and 2 to follow) with a clean design, attractive price point, and varying features to suit your needs.
Project_description: Introducing the state-of-the-art autonomous solutions for cleaning your living space or office. We offer a product line with varying features and an attractive price point for the peace of mind you need from cleaning.       MIRAVAC robotic vacuum cleaners come in two models: Loop (designed for all surfaces with a mopping option) and Swerve (designed for all surfaces and optimal thick carpet cleaning). The clean design, attractive price point and varying features are there to suit your needs.ÃÂÃÂ                  You can choose your desired cleaning pattern that most suits your space, OR you can put the robot on AUTO cleaning mode and let it do the job for you.                 The Dust Sensor feature detects the dirtiest parts of the floor and guides the robot to spend more time cleaning those parts. Perfect for pet owners who need to clean their space from pet hair on a daily basis.                 With a pressure of 1800 Pa, the HyperClean suction will securely and rigorously collect dust and tiny particles to keep floors immaculately clean. The Turbo Suction mode of MIRAVAC robots are the most powerful in their class.ÃÂÃÂ             The Smart Adaptive Detection System adequately equips MIRAVAC robots for automated cleaning and charging for any home or office floors: hardwood, carpet or tile. With the height of 3.15ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, MIRAVAC robots can also clean under your objects and furniture.            With sensors that detect cliffs, MIRAVAC robots are able to avoid cliffs and unexpected drops.            LOOP is your floorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s new best friend. With the smart adaptive system for any environment, great suction power from 800 Pa to 1800 Pa, and contour following nozzle to ensure accurate cleaning results, LOOP is the most affordable advanced robotic vacuum for thin carpet and hard floors on the market.       1. Dual rotating brushes vigorously sweep dirt and dust into the vacuumÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s patch.ÃÂÃÂ   2. The debris are then securely trapped using its dynamic vacuum motor.ÃÂÃÂ   3. The click-on mopping pad collects even the finest dust particles to leave floors spotless.                 LOOP comes with Dry Mop Pads to be attached to the robot for a shiny cleaning performance.                 The sleek design of the SWERVE model makes a great looking cleaning companion at your home or office.ÃÂÃÂ        SWERVE comes with large wheels and a multi-surface roller brush that will pick up any large debris on the floor. This helps with optimal deep cleaning of thick carpets and rugs.ÃÂÃÂ                        Contains the vacuum within a desired space blocked by an invisible wall, available only for the SWERVE model.ÃÂÃÂ                  Easily schedule cleaning time for 30, 45, or 60 minutes with the button on the device or through the remote control.ÃÂÃÂ        You can also set a cleaning time with the 24H button on the docking station. Simply push the 24H button at a certain time of day and the robot will go out and start cleaning at that set time everyday.            Control your Loop OR Swerve from a distance ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Start and stop, change cleaning patterns, times, and types with a click of a button. OR guide your vacuum along a particular path with manual directional controls. You can also easily direct it back to the charging station with one click.ÃÂÃÂ             With the docking button, the robot can go back to its charging station to recharge the battery on its own.                                           We appreciate the support of the crowdfunding community. To give a bit more background on the people behind this project, Adam and David are the co-founders of MIRAVAC and have been friends since childhood. Their paths crossed several times before they realized they need to make something out of it. Since one lives domestically and the other internationally, they decided to partner on this business when presented with this unique opportunity. The rest is history.                                          Risks and challenges  The Miravac team believes Kickstarter is the right platform to launch and bring our idea to life because this is where innovative ideas are welcomed and where the status quo is challenged. Although this involves risks, we believe these risks are worth it and we believe that our backers will support Miravac as an affordable and innovative technology that makes at-home robots more accessible to everyone. We understand that dirty floors will probably affect most peopleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s lives at some point. Because of this, we believe the Loop and Swerve robots by Miravac are useful to everyone. To offset the risks and challenges involved with creating Miravac, we developed and tested 2 generations of prototypes using our experienced robotics team and quality product materials. We also spent considerable time measuring the many scenarios and preferences of our users to ensure that the product will address their needs. We also have secured patents and manufacturing relationships to make sure that we deliver Loop and Swerve to backers as quickly as possible.  Our goal is to minimize the chances of unforeseen production issues that sometimes can happen. Our brand stands for quality - a promise from our founders to each and every customer who supports us and our mission to make stress-free home cleaning faster, more realistic, and more affordable for all.

Creator_description: <!DOCTYPE html><html class="users_profile_about fontface no-js" data-request-id="3c797f12-69b0-40dd-b195-652666ac64c5" lang="en
Project_description: A Russian Bargraph-Nixie-tube shows similar like in the good old time a mercury thermometer the room-temperature with a variable glow hightÃÂÃÂ lenght; however with NixieTherm RGB you have a wonderful red-orange glow. At the same time six high quality 3528 SMD-LEDs, together with a true RGB controller with selectable colour pattern, give a never ending play of million different colours.ÃÂÃÂ   This is NixieTherm RGB - The Original, first published in 2011        It is the eye-catcher par excellence ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> at your home, your office or as a very specially gift idea for Birthdays or Christmas.   Oh, what are "Nixie-tubes"?  The word "Nixie" was formed from the words  N umeric  I ndicator e X erimental No.  1  ÃÂÃÂ and first introduced 1954 by Burroughs Corporation from USA as a brand name for numeric displays. Nixie tubes were used until the mid of the 1970's as numeric displays in measuring devices, calculators, TV sets and the very first computers. The evolution of modern style display types like Numitron, VFD, Light Emitting Diodes and Liquid Crystal Displays, which have a very low supply voltage (battery power supply) eliminated these Nixie tubes from the market, and they are not produced anymore. In the former USSR Nixie tubes were produced as surplus in vast quantities until the beginning of the 90's ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> and from this sources is this tube. But even these supplies are now running short. And when they're gone, they're gone. The tube is taken from "NOS", what means  N ew  O ld  S tock. They were never used before and spent their first thirty or more years forgotten in some Russian warehouse. The principle of the Nixie tubes is based on cold cathode discharge and it is used today a million times ÃÂÃÂ e.g. in small neon bulbs of illuminated mains power switches.  The Bargraph tube in the NixieTherm RGB is a special Russian construction of such a neon bulb, it can produce a current depending variable glow hight lenght when a current regulated voltage of around 140 VDC is applied.  Often I was asked: "What is the lifespan of a Nixie tube" and than there is a simple answer: "Have a look at your illuminated power switch of the multiple outlet strip. How many years does this small neon bulb lights continously without any aging issues?"       Features   Only analoge technique is used   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The temperature display electronics runs without any processor or other digital circuity.   Power supply via USB   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Power consumption is as less as NixieTherm RGB can powered up from a simple USB port. No driver needs to be installed. NixieTherm RGB only "catches" the supplied voltage. As an alternative, NixieTherm can be powered from a standard Mini-USB charger.   Low power consumption and self heating   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ 25...300 mA @ 5VDC depending on the lenght of the glow coloumn and the RGB LED brightness thanks to the high efficiency voltage converter in the HV supply.   High accuracy with the expensive Texas LM35DZ temperature sensor   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ +/- 0.5ÃÂÃÂ°C (+/- 1ÃÂÃÂ°F)   Displayed temperature range   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ 14...35ÃÂÃÂ°C / 58...95ÃÂÃÂ°F can be easy adjusted with a slotted screwdriver   Fully smoothed display   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Stepless and in realtimeÃÂÃÂ    Build-in true RGB controller   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ with a lot of selectable colour sequences, operates by pushing a simple button   The electronic kit:   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ You get a complete electronic and mechanic DIY kit ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> and complete means complete:ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ All electronic parts + PCB with assembled and soldered SMD parts  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Tested IN-13 Nixie bargraph tube (also available w/o tube)  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ All mechanical hardware and enclosure partsÃÂÃÂ    SMD pre-assembed   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Thanks to the SMD pre-assembly and soldering only a small handful of through hole parts (and a few "big sized" SMD components) needs to be fitted and soldered by hand.   Optional assembed and tested version   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ If you don't have enough soldering or electronic skills, you can also get a fully working NixieTherm RGB together with an USB power supply with EU / UK or US mains.        The SMD preassembled board - please note that this is a fully hand soldered prototype; you'll get a machine assembled and soldered board.        ÃÂÃÂ  The bag with the through hole components for hand soldering and mechanics        What you'll need for the DIY kitÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Around 2 hrs of your evening time with no hurry ÃÂÃÂ     A clear, well-lit area in which to work ÃÂÃÂ     Soldering station with fine tip and fine electronic solder ÃÂÃÂ     Multimeter to check and adjust the generated voltages    Electronic toolsÃÂÃÂ     TX10 (Torx), PH1/2 and small slotted screwdriverÃÂÃÂ     Download of the assembly manual from www.Nixiekits.eu    Enjoyment of your work of course    And last but not least a simple USB port on your PC or a Mini USB charger to power up the NixieTherm RGB.        The programed RGB pattern       Improvements compared to the former NixieTherm SMD   PIC processor based true RGB controller with pre-assembled LEDs. The colour sequences can be stopped at every desired colour by pushing a simple button instead of continuously colour changing LEDs in the former SMD version as many customers from the former version don't want to have a "light organ" but a constant colour for the scale.    More brightness of the RGB LEDs compared to the SMD version.    Fully satuated colours possibe (incl. true yellow).    The calibration potentiometer can be easy accessed without demouting the top cover.    Bigger sized through hole potentiometers instead of very tiny SMT versions.    Higher accuracy because of optimized circuity design and less self heating.    Expanded scale to 35ÃÂÃÂ°C or 95ÃÂÃÂ°F temperature range.    And last but not least we could keep the price at the same value as the SMD version.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ  See here the comparement: Left: NixieTherm RGB ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ right: The former NixieTherm SMD        Photo of the very first NixieTherm version in middle of 2011  and  here  is the PDF for design protection from 13th June 2011   Customizing the NixieTherm RGB  When ordering at least five kits / assembled versions we can make a modification of the scale engraving and / or enclosure colours for free. See here an example:       for availabe colours have  here  a look. Please mail to: Mr.Nixie@Nixiekits.eu      Risks and challenges  The Story behind NixieTherm  The first version of the NixieTherm was introduced in 2011. In the meantime more than 950 devices has been sold.  After launching the NixieTherm SMD in 2018 on Kickstarter with successful crowdfounding, the remaining batch is now nearly sold out. So a new version needs to be created which considers many wished from the customers. This new PCB batch with build-in RGB controller needs to be ordered (and pre-financed for sure) with nearly fully SMD pre-assembled and soldered parts - and of course, a new enclosure design was created and needs also be ordered.  Fully hand made prototypes are working perfect, as you see in the photos / video.  "Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery."  In the meantime there are a lot of cheap copies - specially from Lithuania, Ukraine and - with faked accounts now also from Italy - on the market, but they have never reached the top quality of the German original Mr.Nixie's NixieTherm.

Creator_description: Train better to play better golf
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ The Alignment BallÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is a patented training golf aid that helps you to improve your whole golf game. Whether you want to practice with your putter, your irons or your woods, be certain that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re properly organized before every shot you hit in order to build a solid golf game.            ÃÂÃÂ With the Alignment Ball, putting has never been so easy. It gives you the feedback you need to line up properly your putter face before every putt. It's time to improve accuracy and repeat good putts in order to build confidence.            On the driving range, the alignment ball will help you ÃÂÃÂ check constantly the golf basics and keep things simple. It's time to take good habits and repeat good swings in order to build a solid golf                                                                                                          If you are not properly lined up, or if you are not aiming on your target but think you are, you will have the tendency to compensate, in one way or an other. And that's how to start doing mistakes. The alignment ball is a marker to help you ÃÂÃÂ stick with golf basics and improve your game.                                 Give your next ball a purpose. Set up the Alignment Ball to be sure that your aiming on target. And that's it, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re ready! Free of doubts, you can now focus on your swing to Improve the mechanics and sharpen the feelings!ÃÂÃÂ                         Hi Kickstarters,  My name is Geoffroy Dardenne and today IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m very happy to share with you the Alignment Ball project. ÃÂÃÂ   I have designed the alignment ball because I needed it. When I discovered golf 6 years ago, my golf instructor kept saying: " Hey Geo, if you want to improve your golf, you need to work on your alignment! The secret of a good golf shot is a good alignment"! So that's what I have been trying to do.ÃÂÃÂ I started looking for a cool and functional aid to improve my game, but I couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t find one, so I created one myself!ÃÂÃÂ   ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s been a long way from the first sketch to the final sample...! I needed to add few improvements to my original design ;)ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ When you are prototyping a new idea without being a big company, you're alone in the plane. There is no bank, no suppliers, no manufacturers to support you. You are by yourself and you need to be creative to make the idea grow. Fortunately, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve met some very nice people along the way, who gave me their time, their energy, their passion to help me keep on going. Many thanks to them, my family and friends for all their support and love !  Design, print, test, design again... Meeting golfers from far and wide in order to have their feedback... design again until satisfaction! ÃÂÃÂ Find the best materials! Try to get some competent manufacturers involved to produce a high-quality golf tool! ÃÂÃÂ Invest in a mould! Manufacture the first perfect sample...! Launch a kickstarter campaign to start production! This is where I am, and this is where we meet!  If like me, you love the idea to improve your whole game with a cool and functional tool, support my campaign. Order the Alignment Ball now, enjoy the lowest price ever and receive it just in time for this summer.  Thank you for your support, enjoy your golf and never stop pushing your limits.  Geoffroy                               Risks and challenges  Creating and lauching a new product is a long way with many risks. This is the first time for us and even if sometimes we can't sleep at night, now, we are confident.  We have spend more than 1 year to find manufacturers, suppliers with whom we beleive we could delivery a high end  quality product. We have tested the prototypes in a harsh way  and we know now, we have a great, beautiful and resistant training aid . The feedbacks we have from pro's and amateurs who have try the Alignment Ball are more that exciting....  We know there's always unexpected challenges ! But we are truly passionates about golf and still have many energy to find solutions to rock any obstacle..  Anyway, if there's for some unknown reason some delay in the delivery, we will let you know and make our best for you to receive the Alignment ball as soon as possible.

Estos son solo algunos de los valores que aporta este proyecto a cada uno de sus participantes.     Valores del equipo        Risks and challenges  DiseÃÂÃÂ±ar un coche elÃÂÃÂ©ctrico de competiciÃÂÃÂ³n siempre presenta muchos retos. AdemÃÂÃÂ¡s como comentado antes, este aÃÂÃÂ±o hemos diseÃÂÃÂ±ado y creado el primer prototipo con tracciÃÂÃÂ³n total, un  cambio muy innovador y muy difÃÂÃÂ­cil en la historia del equipo.

Creator_description: With a professional healthcare, science, fine art, and design background, Leisa is constantly looking for easier, better and healthier ways to improve user experiences with products while striving for healthier outcomes for girls and women. As a feminist whose purpose is to assist in seeing the achievement of the SDGs, especially SDG #5, Global Gender Equality, Leisa believes a purpose driven life is what fuels her spirit and ambitions to work in collaboration with others around the globe to see the end of extreme poverty and the empowerment of girls. To her, gender equality will equate to a better world for everyone.
Project_description: "Feminism... is that  notion that  we should each  bfree  to develop our own talents, whatever they may be, and not be held back by artificial barriers."ÃÂÃÂ    Ruth Bader Ginsburg, United States Supreme Court Justice, and the notorious R.B.G.    The ÃÂÃÂ  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© is an antibacterial menstrual cup made of 100% medical grade silicone and developed by Women's Global Health Innovations. It provides menstruators throughout the world with the freedom to live their lives, combining innovations in the design of both product and packaging. WGHI is trying to end period poverty so that we can all  bfree  to live and thrive.                 There are a lot of options out there targeting women and girls who can afford to buy sanitary products every month. For the other menstruators who are experiencing period poverty, the choices are extremely limited, and often those who can stand to benefit the most from reusable products have the hardest time accessing them.  Even most existing reusable options like reusable pads and traditional cups are not flexible enough for most menstruators. Bleeding ebbs as well as flows, with the female anatomy changing drastically for many during different parts of their cycle. Some lighter days on which only spotting occurs, a pad would be more than enough, but things can change in an instant. We want you to be prepared for the unprepared. That's why our signature tin comes with two cups to choose from. So go ahead and pick two!                 The  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© was not developed by men in suits and lab coats, but by a female entrepreneur who has seen first hand the effects of period poverty. After working in communities in the Global South, Leisa Hirtz founded Women's Global Health Innovations in Toronto, Canada to do her part in helping to eradicate period poverty. Through her work with WGHI doing research on the impacts access to sanitation and hygienic products had on school attendance, Leisa realized quickly that not enough actual innovation was being made to address the growing problem. Not only was there not enough investment in providing the existing menstrual hygiene management (MHM) solutions to those who needed it, the products themselves were having a negative impact on the environments of the people using them.  This is why from the beginning, WGHI has strived to improve outcomes for menstruators not only by providing access to a truly groundbreaking menstrual cup, but also by developing a product and business model that attempts to achieve many of the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).       The Sustainable Development Goals provide all UN member states with  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>the blueprints to achieve a better and more sustainable future for all.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  With an emphasis on SDGs 3,4,5 and 12, the  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© brings us one step closer towards achieving the sustainable, equitable future we all aspire towards.            One of the driving forces behind the  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© is the knowledge that providing access to education empowers young girls and boys to reach their full potential.ÃÂÃÂ   Period poverty prevents this.  Improving Sexual and Reproductive Health (SRH) education is one of the pillars of our company. Menstrual cups, and menstrual hygiene in general, require knowledge of the female anatomy, and basic sanitary practices. Predictably, the taboo around the subject of menstruation assures there are no end to the questions menstruators have on the subject. We want to empower girls with knowledge that will keep them healthy and thriving, by provide quality education on SRH.  Our most successful programs to date have been in providing education through local advocates and educators. With a focus on menstruation and proper cup use and care, we have collaborated with local partners to train trainers who can go into rural, urban and peri-urban environments through our Training of Trainers program (ToT). We equip and work with locals who understand the community they are working in, providing them with the crucial information on female health and the highly specific knowledge surrounding menstrual cup and  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ©care. Those who completed our ToT program bring sexual and reproductive health and rights education to classrooms, while we paint school latrines and provide clean water for sanitary conditions for menstrual hygiene management.                 The work we do in Toronto is informed by what we learn in places that couldn't be more different. Countries like Uganda, Kenya, Senegal and Rwanda, are just some of the places we've worked trying to understand the needs of women around the world.  We are always trying to keep up-to-date on cultural sensitivities surrounding menstruation globally, and it helps to build and expand our network of like minded people and organizations.  International collaboration is what has allowed bfree to flourish into the game changing health product that it has become.  With that in mind we are always looking to grow our team to keep bringing the  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© to communities around us, here in Canada, and throughout the world. Because period poverty is not just a problem in low and middle income countries. There are communities in every country that suffer from an unfair lack of access to affordable menstrual hygiene management. It's time to end that.       We work with advocates, educators and policy makers to bring substantive change to women's health and freedoms.   Public Health Ambassadors Uganada - PHAU    Womena    Days for Girls    ZanaAfrica             This is only a snapshot of the epic adventure that has been the development of the  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ©  Through grants, loans and innovation competitions, WGHI has managed to develop truly ground breaking technology - 100% medical grade silicone that is antibacterial, and a cup with a completely unique, nature inspired design.  But these are just the first steps.       We need  your  help bringing the  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© into production. Your support will go towards the very expensive process of manufacturing moulds for menstrual cups here in Canada where we make the  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© Funds from our Kickstarter Campaign will also go towards the shipping and packaging costs for the storage tins and bags, so we can get you the absolute best product without compromising our vision of providing something affordable and of the highest quality. We have built relationships with local and international suppliers, and they are ready to go to production.  We are a for-profit company, and believe true sustainable development for low and middle income communities comes from providing economic opportunity, not financial or material given aid in perpetuity. That said, we work with NGOs and charitable organizations providing menstrual products to girls and women who need them most because period poverty is a crisis happening now. We maximize the social impact of our company by building educational programs.  We understand the importance of giving, and we want to provide you with the opportunity to give to those who need.  That's why we collaborated with The Period Purse, an amazing local organization working here in Toronto, that provides homeless women with essential hygiene products. If you choose the "Buy a cup, give a cup" reward, you won't just receive your very own  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ©, we will also provide one to a menstruator in need.  Because everyone deserves to  bfree.             The  b free cup . ÃÂÃÂ© incorporates user-centered design from the ground up, providing a product that is truly designed for all menstruators, regardless of their anatomy or economic position. This is why we offer the most awesome Kickstarter Rewards for a menstrual product we truly believe in.ÃÂÃÂ   And we plan to keep it that way.ÃÂÃÂ   We are going to be listening to you, the girls, women and other  #badassbleeders  who are looking for the most comfortable period ever. Any new reward or stretch goal will reflect what we hear from you.           Risks and challenges  There are inherent risks in every endeavor, but we have taken our time over the last several years to strategize our risk management at every level: From access to raw materials, where we have been developing strong relationships with the most reputable global suppliers of silicone, to the actual manufacturing of the cups, for which we have already built a production process with a local silicone manufacturer here in Canada. We took our time finding the perfect manufacturers for our packaging elements, and once we were satisfied with the samples, found them eager and ready to fulfill our potential orders. While delays in production are always possible, you can rest easy knowing quality control, and a sterile production floor are completely assured. The hardest challenges we face are in overcoming the taboo around the subject of menstruation. A recent, personal and poignant example of this, while creating our creative content, several freelancers who approached us for work, refused the contract outright when they realized how much of the work would center around detailed female anatomy, and period bleeding. While disappointed, we were not discouraged as it lead us to like minded people who were excited about the opportunity of bringing such an ambitious project to life. So, it is in breaking the stigma around periods that we find our greatest challenges, which is perfect because there is nothing we love more than a challenge. Expect perhaps breaking stigmas around menstruation. And chocolate.
