Creator_description: Founded by Aeronautical engineer and Industrial Designer-the new aspiring vacuum cleaner brand. Have spent the last 3.5 years developing Lupe and it's debut product the Pure Cordless.
Project_description: |   Website   |   Instagram   |   Press kit   |  ÃÂÃÂ   Say hello to the Lupe Pure Cordless. ÃÂÃÂ   The world's best performing cordless vacuum.  Designed and built for long-term ownership.   The cordless, fully realised...finally. ÃÂÃÂ        Despite their conception many years ago all cordless vacuum cleaners still donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t deliver on the purity of the original vacuum cleanerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s design function: to truly clean by delivering powerful suction for a sustained period.  That was, until now.  Introducing the Lupe Pure Cordless vacuum cleaner.ÃÂÃÂ   Designed by industry experts who think differently.  This is the cordless fully realised.ÃÂÃÂ   Finally.       ÃÂÃÂ As seen in:            Before anything else, our product must be an  outstanding vacuum cleaner .ÃÂÃÂ   The Pure Cordless excels at these three major factors where others are compromised.ÃÂÃÂ   Our  patented technology  delivers enduring power that cannot be matched and our unique platform delivers the rest.  The Pure Cordless is a premium machine featuring the latest technology in brushless motors, batteries and dust collection.ÃÂÃÂ   There is no better machine for gathering dust and dirt, and our HEPA filtration captures 99.97% of fine dust and allergens.ÃÂÃÂ              unrivalled suction power through patented technology        Lupe's enduring suction comes from inner  strength .  Our  patented  Suction Intensifier delivers the  strongest  and most  efficient suction  of any cordless out there, with no compromise in picking up any debris type.  See for yourself how we compare to the competition on an exceptional challenge of 20mm (0.8 inches) deep grooves filled with dust :                            How does it work? Unassuming on the outside, you have to look within to find the source of LupeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s enduring power:        Patented Suction Intensifier technology   Optimum pick up across different surfaces and debris types  all  the time, with no settings to change.   1  - Powerful motorised agitator for cleaning hair and deep-down dirt ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  great for carpet. ÃÂÃÂ    2  - Air tight rotating seal conforms to all surfaces and debris, preventing unnecessary leaks and increasing suction -  great for hard floors. ÃÂÃÂ    3  - Velocity vane increases air velocity by reducing the opening on the floor surface.  Increased velocity and eliminated leaks results in up to  x10  the useful suction at the cleaner head compared to some conventional designs. ÃÂÃÂ    Doing more with less. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the power of pure. ÃÂÃÂ         outstanding dust cleaning performance for a full 60 minutes             Power is nothing without  endurance . Unlike other models, the pure cordless offers outstanding dust cleaning performance for a full  60 minutes .ÃÂÃÂ   Put simply, the Pure Cordless cleans significantly more than the competition between charges. ÃÂÃÂ    More cleaning, less charging.ÃÂÃÂ ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the power of pure.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          unique format adapts to every cleaning task             The Lupe Pure Cordless is a true  3-in-1  vacuum that offers the best of all worlds wrapped into one convenient package, and has  outstanding reach  to high places  (2m/6.5ft)      the pure cordless has a 2m reach    Conventional cordless stick vacuums put all the weight in your hand, LupeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s unique format makes cleaning high easy with significantly  less weight to lift :     less weight in hand for high reach cleaning    Taking the cleaning head off to switch between configurations is really quick and easy:        Fully capable but smaller in size   We've aimed to bring the whole-house vacuum up to date with the 21st century. The Pure Cordless is slim and convenient but packed with power.        One cleaning head   Rather than multiple cleaning heads, we focused on one head capable of cleaning all surfaces, one that seamlessly moves from one surface to another.  ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no longer any need to have multiple vacuums (or multiple heads) for different tasks.ÃÂÃÂ   Because sometimes, one head really is better than two.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                   Social and environmental impactÃÂÃÂ    Did you know  50%  of small electrical appliances taken to waste processing in the European Union is from vacuum cleaners? It's pretty shocking.       Especially in cordless vacuums, many companies launch 'new' products year after year which drives perfectly usable, or easily repairable product to waste.  Lupe is different. And the Pure Cordless is different. It is  fully serviceable  and almost every part can be replaced. It has been designed to be as long-lasting as possible: using the  best  components and materials. We are so confident in this we are offering all our Kickstarter backers a special  7 year warranty  (see below for details).  It's been designed to be as  easy to maintain  as possible. We will support  long-term ownership  through open supply of spares and making upgrades available to battery packs and motors as technology moves on.ÃÂÃÂ   You don't throw your whole bicycle away if you want to upgrade a wheel or fit a new tyre - we take that approach to vacuum cleaners. ÃÂÃÂ   We all need great performing products but in an age of huge waste a more conscious effort is required to make essential products last just a little longer.ÃÂÃÂ   Its our founding principle.  See how the Pure Cordless is different:       1- Battery pack removable without tools  2- Brushless motor housed in separate removable housingÃÂÃÂ   3- Washable lifetime filters  4- Single service panel reveals access to motor and control PCB  5- Detachable pickup head has removable components and no PCB electronics on board  6- Dust separation system is self-contained and made from polycarbonate for exceptional durabilityÃÂÃÂ   7- All control electronics centrally housed and re-programmable     the Pure Cordless has been expertly engineered in detail  to ensure the design can stand the test of time    The Pure Cordless will be built in a factory that  pay workers fairly , have high standards of  health  and  safety  and is  ISO14001  certified .  It is committed to conducting business in a manner that delivers continuous improvement in environmental performance and protects the quality of communities where it operates. ÃÂÃÂ   Our chosen factory:   harvests rainwater    collects solar energy    makes use of a ground source system for climate control        We wanted the Pure Cordless to be everything you'd expect of a modern vacuum cleaner, not just a cordless, and we have integrated every feature to the highest possible specification.       ÃÂÃÂ   1- Pickup Head:         The most  energy-efficient  dust pick-up technology available  intensifies  the suction for deep-down cleaning across all surfaces - no settings to change.ÃÂÃÂ   Two motorised agitators deal with any debris type - large, fine and pet hair.ÃÂÃÂ   Easy to remove both brush rollers simply using a coin:         2- Motor:         Our Japanese brushless motor spins at  108,000rpm  (twice as fast as a jet engine) and has exceptional energy efficiency. It's also exceptionally durable.    3- Cyclonic Bagless Separator:         With two stages of cyclonic separation and two stages of filtration the Pure Cordless is at the cutting edge of dust separation technology.  With a genuine  1000cc (1 liter)  capacity the Lupe pure cordless has the one of the largest bin capacities of any cordless. Less bin emptying to get the job done quicker. ÃÂÃÂ   It is also really easy to empty:         4- Battery:         The Pure Cordless 32.4V 81Wh Li-Ion battery delivers  60 minutes  of powerful cleaning from one single charge. The LEDs on the front communicate accurate charge capacity remaining.  The battery can be charged on the machine with no dock, or taken out and charged discretely while the machine is stowed away in a cupboard.  Easy to replace or upgrade in the future:   More cleaning, less charging.ÃÂÃÂ ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the power of pure.ÃÂÃÂ    The Pure Cordless has  9  Murata (formerly Sony)  high drain, high capacity  lithium-ion cells. The battery pack is fitted with a fully featured protection board to monitor health of the battery and communicate with the control system in the Pure Cordless to always ensure optimum performance.         5- HEPA Anti-Allergy Filter:         A genuine HEPA (H13) filter separating  99.97%  of fine dust and allergens down to  0.3 millionths of a meter . Easy to remove and wash for optimum performance.ÃÂÃÂ   Other brands use lower grade filters that allow 100's of times more fine dust through.ÃÂÃÂ    Accept no substitutes. That's the power of pure.     Accessory Tools:         We've focused on giving you the multi-function accessory tools that are  useful , not a drawer-full that clutters your home and never gets used.ÃÂÃÂ   An upholstery tool and a crevice tool both with slide up/down bristles for dusting.ÃÂÃÂ   The Pure Cordless is supplied with a holder to attach them to the product to save you losing them.    Simple Controls:         The Pure Cordless has very simple controls to access the three power modes and to turn-off/override the brush roller for delicate surfaces.ÃÂÃÂ        The Pure Cordless has been designed and built with two principles at heart -  purity  of purpose, and  longevity  of design.ÃÂÃÂ   WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve designed and built the best possible product with the singular purpose of keeping your home clean, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve designed it to last: no built-in obsolescence, no superseding product every year. ÃÂÃÂ                       It's not just us that likes the design- we've won an award!       We have spent the last 3.5 years developing the pure cordless to perfection and we are now ready to start production.     3.5 years of evolution of the Lupe pure cordless    Technical SpecsÃÂÃÂ        How we compare to the competition:ÃÂÃÂ             We are offering the first batch of Lupe Cordless on Kickstarter at  big discounts  off the retail price (Retail price will be ÃÂÃÂ± ÃÂÃÂ£460 / USD 599).            What's in the box?ÃÂÃÂ      elegant packaging       packaging ensures the pure cordless arrives in perfect condition (no internal plastic bags)       what's in the box    1- pure cordless main body  2- universal pick-up head with suction intensifier technology  3- lithium ion battery pack  4- charger  (will be territory specific)   5- detachable wand  6- multi-function crevice and upholstery accessory tools and on-board mount       We are offering a special warranty to Kickstarter backers in this campaign.  7 years against defects in material and workmanship.  2 years on the battery pack- this is limited usage habits and is out of our control.ÃÂÃÂ   We think we have the best warranty on the market for a cordless vacuum cleaner with a  Kickstarter specific  7 year warranty on the product (excluding the battery which is 2 years).ÃÂÃÂ    Only our Kickstarter backers will get this 7 year warranty.   If anything comes up, donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry because we stand behind our product, just get in touch with us. We will assess the specific problem and decide the quickest way to get your machine back in working order  We designed the Pure Cordless with serviceability in mind. Most major parts can be individually removed and replaced. This not only makes it easier to keep your Pure Cordless in perfect functional condition, it also drastically reduces the amount of waste and unnecessary obsolescence.   How it all startedÃÂÃÂ    Lupe Technology is a Tech startup based in Bristol, UK - a city with a rich engineering history.  Lucas Horne and Pablo Montero founded the company in 2015 with the vision to solve the frustrations they saw consumers were having with cordless vacuum cleaners that were becoming ever more popular but failing to deliver on expectations, both on performance and longevity.       Lucas and Pablo met while working together in the Research and Development department at Dyson. Together we were in charge of a major project to make a vacuum cleaner that was many times better than their other products at the time. We learnt a great deal about what a vacuum cleaner needs to do and what makes it last.ÃÂÃÂ   Following our time at Dyson, we went our separate ways but saw that the problem with cordless vacuumsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> poor suction and built in obsolescence continued unaddressed.  With a fresh outlook (and a clean sheet of paper) Lupe was founded and the start of a three and a half year journey began. Through many hundreds of prototypes and testing, our team developed the patented Suction Intensifier technology to pick up dust more efficiently, and the unique Lupe Pure Cordless platform to carry it.ÃÂÃÂ      many years worth of testing has gone into the pure cordless       we made use of advance computational modelling techniques to ensure the product will last       prototyping in our workshop       before tooling we trialled parts with vacuum casting techniques           You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                we also used computational fluid dynamics to optimise our design       a (very) small selection of our notes from the last 3.5 years       making our demonstrator floor       we made many examples of our prototypes so we could test different aspects at the same time       we are in advanced stages of pre-production detailed mould flow analysis - to ensure the highest quality parts        on the PCB production line at Ryder Industries    Developing products is time-consuming and costly and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re very grateful to those who have supported us on this journey - our investors and also the UK Government agency (Innovate UK) that supports the development of innovative British technology. We've reached a critical time when the development is (almost) over and we are ready to launch the product and the brand.ÃÂÃÂ   The Pure Cordless will be rolling off the production line later this year - the end of one part of our journey but an exciting start to the next phase.ÃÂÃÂ              Lucas Horne  (Co-Founder): ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Industrial Designer. Experience of consumer goods development from Bosch and Dyson. Successfully sold IP to Dyson, along with generating multiple Patents on vacuum cleaner technology. Leads day to day technical development of Lupe. A proven innovator with the right balance of pragmatism and creativity.ÃÂÃÂ    Pablo Montero  (Co-Founder):  Aeronautical Engineer. Leadership and Programme Management experience from Dyson, HiETA Technologies (successful startup) & National Composites Centre. Leads day to day operational and financial management of Lupe. The business head. Lateral thinker.ÃÂÃÂ    Oliver Skittery  (Design Engineer):  1st Class graduate mechanical engineer from the University of Bath. Experience from internationally renown agency DCA design.   Hamish Barclay  (Commercial Director):  Former business owner, consultant and start-up expert. Extensive international experience across a range of industries and routes to market spanning two decades.ÃÂÃÂ    Hans Falkenburg  (Advisory Board Chairman):  Ex-CEO of Cotswold Outdoor/Snow and Rock Group. Provides strategic guidance and level-headed sounding board for business decisions   Tony Chen  (NPD Engineer):  Formerly new production manager at GTECH (maker of AirRam product series). Located in Dongguan, China.   Gary Poolman  (Design Engineer):  Former Senior Mechanical Designer at Dyson.   Ryder Industries  (manufacturing partner):  Ryder industries is Swiss owned and has been in operation for over 40 years. Manufactures for brands such as Marshall (amplifiers) and Boa (lace up systems).  Why Kickstarter?  We are very much a true startup company founded by just two people three and a half years ago. As we progress now from our Research and Development stage into getting our product to market, its very important to us to build a following and get our product known about as much as possible. We see Kickstarter as a great way to do this, and a step towards a full mainstream launch later down the line.ÃÂÃÂ   Securing interest in the product now helps us start production of the first batch of our vacuum cleaners with confidence.ÃÂÃÂ   If successful, the funds will go towards tooling, mass manufacturing of the first batch, certification and shipping logistics. ÃÂÃÂ        This is our production timeline from now until you receive your Lupe Pure Cordless.            Thank you for supporting our campaign and a special thank you to everyone else who has helped us on our journey so far. It would not have been possible without the support of everyone involved - friends, family, investors, advisers and our manufacturing partner. We look forward to the next stage of our journey in delivering the ultimate cordless vacuum ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ               This project is promoted by  Jellop , the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.ÃÂÃÂ                          Risks and challenges  Having worked tirelessly on the pure cordless for three and a half years, we have overcome the primary engineering challenges inherent in a product of this sort. Along the way, we've even secured a patent for our Suction Intensifier technology.  After numerous prototypes and more testing than we care to remember, we're now ready to move to production. We have secured reputable suppliers for key parts such as the motor and battery and have been working with our production partner for the past 18 months on the final design in preparation for manufacturing the Pure Cordless.   We are aware of the challenges posed at this stage and having worked on projects at this level previously we are confident we are up to the task and have in place the necessary steps to minimise risks.   Whilst working hard to deliver as promptly as possible, should delays occur we would be totally up front about them with our community and prioritise clear and concise communication until such a time as the product is shipped.

Creator_description: Kazem is an Engineer/Inventor/Entrepreneur. Developer of the Levitating CloudIX, CloudIX ambient lights and Tatsumaki (miniature tornado).
Project_description: The Levitating CloudIX , is a magnetically levitating ambient lamp. The project is merging the innovative levitation technology with the form and function of the Cloud product of CloudIX arts Studio. Embedded into both the base and the Cloud are magnetic components that allow the cloud to float approximately 30mm off the base. While the base itself must remain plugged in a 4000mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery powers (optional) the Cloud and enables a totally wireless and unobstructed levitation while in use. With full rotational movement and slight vertical bobbing of the cloud a more realistic atmospheric experience is possible. The levitating CloudIX also has the sound reactive LED lights as our other Ambient CloudIX products.        Magnetic levitation  or magnetic suspension is a method by which an object is suspended in the air with no support other than invisible magnetic fields. Magnetic force is used to counteract the effects of the gravitational acceleration and any other accelerations.  The two primary issues involved in magnetic levitation are lifting forces: providing an upward force sufficient to counteract gravity, and stability: ensuring that the system does not spontaneously slide or flip into a configuration where the lift is neutralized.              You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. There are some drawbacks are in this technology like power loss and distance limitations but still that's enough for the magic.ÃÂÃÂ                    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ First stage of any project is Designing and prototyping. ÃÂÃÂ  You change from Warm white to any colour with 4 different intensities.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                       When it comes to putting one of our lighting pieces in its new home, there a few things to consider when it comes to the pendant lamp style, pendant being a lamp that hangs from a cord or support cable off the ceiling. There are two main forms of hanging a light fixture: Swag Kit or Hardwire Kit, both available in black or white.        Swag Option.   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The Swag option is easier to install, it involves installing a hook (called a Swag hook)ÃÂÃÂ into the ceiling then running the cord along the ceiling to the nearest outlet or extension cord. Instead of the ceiling, it can also be installed onto a beam,ÃÂÃÂ pipe or rig.ÃÂÃÂ This option typically comes with 10ft (3m) of electrical cord, a EU plug (and appropriate adapter for international orders), a switch near the plug end, two hooks and two cord grips /ÃÂÃÂ rings. Please note the hooks that come with your lamp may need appropriate anchors (not included)ÃÂÃÂ depending on the material of your ceiling.   Hardwire Option.   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ This option involves the necessity of a junction box (also known as an electrical box or octagon box) in the location in which the lamp is going and a local electrician to do the installation. If you are replacing an existing pendant or planning to use our designs in a new building or renovation this option may be prefered as it can give a cleaner look than the Swag option. This option typically comes with 6ft (2m) of electrical cord,ÃÂÃÂ a 5" canopy,ÃÂÃÂ mounting kit, exposed wires, cord grip and wire nuts. Please note that RGB Clouds have external power converters which can be hardwired into or next to your junction box.                                                                     Tatsumaki (tornado in Japanese) is a miniature tornado with flashing LEDs. It is a masterpiece available in limited edition, only for our backers. Thank you again for your support. Blurb: Cthulhu is a good bait for fishing because there are different types of capsules that anglers can use for a fish.

Creator_description: Have you seen a lion chasing the weakest one in a group? We have researched instinct of animals and found out that animals use all five senses to hunt. We finally come up with the first bleeding bait stimulating fishÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> senses. The first B-Bait, Cthulhu.
Project_description: One day we saw a group of fishes that were targeting and attacking an injured fish. That gave us the question of whether animals have the instinct to attack the weakest by nature?       A series of documentary films gave us the answer to our question.       We applied this idea on fishes and started to do some research about their habits and instincts by reading various academic articles and resources. ÃÂÃÂ        If there is such a thing as a bleeding fish under water, it could stimulates the instincts of the fish to attack and seize their prey. When it smells similar of its favorite prey, the fish will get attracted to it which makes fishing more fun.  That is why we called our baits B-Bait (bleeding bait).            B-Bait is a bait that is inspired by the habits of the fish. The smell of pheromone or prey comes from the B-Bait, while it trembles and bleeds as soon as it touches the water            It is well-known fact that sharks can detect the smell of its prey from miles away. We got motives of a shark to create a bait and a capsule.            ÃÂÃÂ How we embody the habit of fish to a bait? There are baits covered by pheromone on their surface that last not long enough. The secret of long lasting performance of B-Bait is the capsule.ÃÂÃÂ             Fizzy effect is applied to B-Bait. We have developed different capsules in different flavours with pheromones. As soon as the capsule hits the water, the fizzy effect with bleeding effect occurs and spreads odors of pheromone and tastes. In this way B-Bait stimulates the instinct of the fish       Fizzy effect takes place differently depending on the temperature. We had an experiment for bass in two different temperatures.ÃÂÃÂ        We compared the speed of fizzy effects in two different temperatures based on the lowest and the highest of the season when bass is active            Between 55F and 73F, the capsules last between 13 and 20 minutes, average 15 minutes. For a better result, we will keep improving the performance of the capsule                We have prepared shrimp and bait fish capsules. We did our best to make it similar to their preys. These are common tastes for the fish from the freshwater and the sea.  For Kick starter, we have prepared shrimp and bait fish capsules. The worm capsules will only be included in a special package. If you want all three capsules, please choose the special package.ÃÂÃÂ        We are going to developing other flavours. Flavors of lobster, shellfish, and pupa have been researched targeting for specific species. Please keep your eyes on us and encourage us even after Kick starter.ÃÂÃÂ                   The main materials of the capsule are Pheromones, which stimulate the instincts of fish and powders of real fish.We used different powders and materials based on target species. For the bleeding performance, we used red-beet for color. We have researched and developed to apply the instinct of fish into bait, but also we have considered environment not to contaminate the nature, but to have an amazing performance.ÃÂÃÂ   The first lure that B-bait capsule system applied, Cthulhu.ÃÂÃÂ                    There have been baits to stimulate the smell of fish, but most of them were covered by smell just on their surface by spraying or putting them in the liquid for a certain time. Unfortunately, there is a limitation that the smell does not last long enough after one or two time tries. We have strived to extend the time of smell. After we apply all the technology to B-bait, we finally made the first model of B-bait, Cthulhu                    When you put B-Bait capsule into Cthulhu lure and put them into the water, it starts to fizzy like a bleeding and dying prey under the water. By doing so, this attracts fish.ÃÂÃÂ        You will see an amazing performance when Cthulhu with B-Bait capsule hits the water. As the image shows, there is an empty space in Cthulhu for B-Bait capsule and a hole where blood comes out.ÃÂÃÂ        On the front of B-Bait, we put salt so that anglers can through further.ÃÂÃÂ   See details below ÃÂÃÂ             When Cthulhu moves under the water, smells and colors spread. This will bring fish around Cthulhu. This looks simple, but there are various scientific technology applied that you have never seen in the market. More improved B-Bait will keep coming out. ÃÂÃÂ        If you cast Cthulhu with B-Bait capsule and then move it under the water, you will see rigorous competition among fish. Imagine a bleeding bait under the water. IsnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t it fun?ÃÂÃÂ                         B-Bait Cthulhu contains salt. The salt plays an important role in increasing the weight of lure. The weight and quantity of salt in Cthulhu is set scientifically. The back side of Cthulhu is relatively lighter due to the less salt compared to the front side. The heavier front side allows anglers to cast further.ÃÂÃÂ        The heavy front side makes anglers to cast further. This also helps for more accurate casting.ÃÂÃÂ        Difference in weights of the front and back side also allows anglers to make a distinct action. Anglers control Cthulhu as dead prey or an octopus fuming ink and running away from its enemy. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             You can use more diverse fishing techniques with B-Bait                      We produce Cthulhu in different colors. It is well-known fact that fish is sensitive to colors. According to different situations for fishing and targeted fish species, you can choose the color that you need. We prepared the most popular colors such as pumpkin green or water melon, but also such as pink and white.           We have considered to find the easiest way for the users to put the capsule in Cthulhu. It needed a number of tests and failures. We ended up creating a stick to put the capsule more easily.ÃÂÃÂ          The end of B-Bait stick is designed easily to put the B-Bait capsule in Cthulhu. You will enjoy it while putting them together manually. The stick is designed not to slip away from your hand, so B-bait sick will always be with you!            ÃÂÃÂ This little and cute B-Bait stick would bring you a joy when you put B-Bait capsule into the Cthulhu. The stick makes it way easier to put the capsule into the Cthulhu. According to the situation, you can insert maximum 7 capsules into the Cthulhu. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ After putting B-Bait capsule into the Cthulhu, you connect a needle to the Cthulhu. We recommend the WIDE GAP HOOK 4/0~5/0 size as an optimized size.              B-Bait stick is designed and manufactured by 3D printing to customize for the B-Bait. ÃÂÃÂ                                         To launch a project on Kickstarter, we need to check the response from the market and do marketing beforehand. We started to get in contact with powerful and creative influencers around the world who loves fishing and sended them handwritten letters and gift boxes.                                People responded more than we expected. Especially, the influencers who actually received and tested B-Bait gave us a comment that B-Bait will be ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>a game changerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>. We received requests from all over the world where they can get B-Bait on a daily basis.ÃÂÃÂ    Now, we are launching B-Bait on Kickstarter. If you are the one who have been looking forward to purchasing B-Bait or something amazing for fishing , please do not hesitate to purchase this. If you hear about B-Bait for the first time, you can also purchase quality guaranteed B-Bait through this page. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ Now, we are fully ready to send the box to your address as soon as we launch the project on Kickstarter. After you have choosen a reward, you will receive an amazing product in a short period of time.         Cthulhu is a god in a fiction called ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>The Call of CthulhuÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> written by Howard Phillips Lovecraft. Its face is shaped like an octopus or a squid.         Howard Phillips LovecraftÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s world view has left a remarkable influence on the culture.  The most famous one is Devi Johns in Pirates of Carribians. If you see Devi Johns again, you would have more understanding why we named our first lure as CthulhuÃÂÃÂ                  Our team has four members and each of them has their own expertise and passion for their work. Please keep your eyes on how we move forward.ÃÂÃÂ                 We have a plan to developing new designs and functions specialized on target species.  If you like to fund this project, it would be a critical financial engine for us to move further. We will do our best to bring you more fun in a scientific and eco-friendly way. ÃÂÃÂ    All the rest is for users to enjoy our product!ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have prepared for mass production that meet the expected quanty for Kickstarter. In case more orders than we epect occours, we are also ready for timely production with manufacturing facilities in good condition. The quick production facility would also be a strength for B-Bait.

Blurb: We are Team Divignite, an F1 in Schools team from Raffles GirlsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> School (Secondary), Singapore, participating in the World Finals 2019
Creator_description: We an F1 in Schools team from Raffles GirlsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> School (Secondary), Singapore. After clinching the title of Overall Champions at the National Finals last year, we are competing in the World Finals 2019.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ Zdravo! We are Team Divignite, an F1 in Schools team representing Singapore at the World Finals 2019, held in Abu Dhabi.ÃÂÃÂ        After clinching the title of  Overall Champions  at the Singapore National Finals 2018, we have worked tirelessly to improve our marketing strategy and our car design. This year, we aim to be the  first Singaporean team  to place  top 3 in the World Finals .  Our name, Divignite, is derived from the Slovenian word ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>dvigniteÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>, which translates to ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>soarÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>. For more information about our team identity, do check out our  Instagram page  and our  website .       F1 in Schools is an international  STEM  (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) competition for students aged 11ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>19, in which groups of 3ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>6 students have to design and manufacture a  miniature car using CAD/CAM design tools , which are powered by CO2 cartridges and race with other cars along a straight track. The programme aims to  inspire students to learn about physics, aerodynamics, branding, graphics, marketing, and teamwork , and apply these skills in a practical way. More information about the programme can be found at  http://www.f1inschools.com/ .  The funding we receive from our sponsors and this kickstarter will go towards obtaining  materials for the manufacturing of our car  (polyurethaneblocks, wheels, ball bearings etc) , services  (3D printing, milling etc) , pit booth display, team uniform and merchandise , as well as the  competition cost for the World Finals  (registration fees etc.).                                         Risks and challenges  There may be delays regarding the manufacturing of the merchandise, but please rest assured that your money is being put to good use as we will release an expenditure report at the end of the year.

Creator_description: Nezar is an accomplished executive who started his career working for Toyota in Japan.  Before embarking on entrepreneurship and start-ups, Nezar spent much of his time working in the automotive industry leading large successful businesses, primarily in Asia.  Nezar has expertise in product design, business development, operations, and was responsible for turning several business around to profitability.  Throughout his life, Nezar has valued fitness as an important element to a balanced, healthy lifestyle, a value he and his wife Tracy imparted on their four children.  Nezar first conceptualized the MaxFit over 15 years ago when he was spending many days on the road, traveling for business, and without a good solution to maintain his workouts.  Thus the inspiration for the MaxFit!  Whether at home or away.. MaxFit was created to provide a challenging full body workout no matter where you are  in the world.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ  Part 2 - Maxfit 3rd Party Review   Part 3 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  Part 4 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Part 5 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  Part 7 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review   Part 8 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  Part 9 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review   Part 10 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review ÃÂÃÂ    Part 11 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review   Part 12 - MAXFIT 3rd Party Review ÃÂÃÂ                                                                                                                                                   At MaxFit we care about creating innovative health and fitness solutions that improve the well-being of all people through a fun fitness experience. ÃÂÃÂ We believe in a holistic fitness experience that encompasses smart fitness, good nutrition, and positive mind health. ÃÂÃÂ The MaxFit is a connected fitness platform that connects to a smartphone or tablet and allows people of all ages and all fitness levels, from the elite athlete to the fitness newbie to assess, plan, motivate, improve and reach their fitness goals through built-in professional training programs, powered by sophisticated algorithms, that customize workout plans for each individuals needs.  As a company it is important to us not only to provide a great product that our customers will love, and will help them live a healthier lifestyle, but also to create a company that our employees love to be a part of, and a company that helps to improve it's local communities, and to be a general force for good in this world.      Risks and challenges  We would like to ship our first production product by Sept 1, 2019.  On our way to do that, we need to:  > Build production tooling. > Certify and validate our electronics and app functionality and connectivity. > Test and Validate the complete assembly under harsh environmental and use conditions. > Obtain use and performance feedback from a select group of Kickstarters. > Modify and tweak where necessary to put out the best performing and highest quality product we can. > Ramp up our direct to consumer marketing campaign  There are risks and challenges associated with all of the above, but we have a plan for every step of the way... We have experienced hardware, software, and electronics engineers on staff, as well as, certification laboratories on stand-by to assure we meet and and exceed all quality and performance standards, so we are sure to meet our customers highest expectations.  We feel one of the biggest risks we have as a company, is that after putting our product on Kickstarter, that we will expose all that we have been working on for years, and that there will be some "fast followers" especially from large established corporations and overseas patent infringers, who will try to beat us to the market.  We however are confident, that not only do we have a head start, but we will have a superior product that will establish our brand name as the leader in the portable fitness market.  In addition, we have a pipeline of follow-on products already in the works, that will allow us to maintain our edge over the competition in the fitness space for years to come.

Creator_description: Several years ago our team was focused on looking at one significant leg condition ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> diabetic neuropathy. When we dug deep into the realms of neuropathy we realized that a method called active compression could be wonderful solution. That took us down the route of looking at active compression and the technologies we could use to achieve this. In our journey, the more we researched the more we realized that active compression could not only offer a solution for diabetic neuropathy but it had far more expansive therapeutic effects. It was something that could benefit tens of millions of people all over the world. Sadly, a lot of the active compression solutions that were out there were either very, very expensive or were used in hospital settings that were inaccessible for many people. We wanted to do it differently. We wanted to bring active compression to everyone out there. Hence, we created Spryng! Through Spryng, we want to bring the benefits of active compression in an easy to use and affordable manifestation to all of you! Our vision is to offer recovery and rejuvenation solutions which will help people all over the world elevate their sense of being!
Project_description: SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is an  affordable, untethered, pneumatic compression wrap  that helps improve circulation, athletic performance, and so much more.       Whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve had a rough leg day, spent hours sitting in a cubicle, or just finished a marathon, SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is the ultimate tool that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll love and use every day.                                               What Is Active Compression?  Active leg compression is a form of compression that  mimics natural muscle contractions  in your calves. It helps  improve circulation, increase cellular oxygen supply, and stimulate tissue repair.         Active Compression helps:        By compressing your legs, you  encourage circulation of blood  where it needs the most support. This, in turn, can help reduce swelling and usher in fresh blood, nutrients, and lymphatic fluid to your legs to help accelerate healing and recovery.       Supporting Circulation In Your Legs            Due to gravity,  your legs usually have the worst circulation in your body -  especially if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re standing or sitting all day . Without active circulation through your calves, blood will pool at your feet - resulting in swelling and pain.  When your muscle pump  remains inactive , you  risk blood pooling,  and  inhibit circulation throughout your body   (the blood in your feet is the same blood that is circulated through your heart and to your brain) .       This is why we  focus on actively compressing your legs  to help  get that blood moving!   The Benefits of Improved Circulation  Active Compression is an effective way to  improve circulation ,  flush lactic acid , and  increase oxygenation  to muscle tissues to get you back on your feet faster.  Get more oxygen  throughout your body and  higher performance .   Improved Circulation can help:        Passive Compression Just DoesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t Cut It  YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve likely encountered other compression tools such as socks, wraps, and sleeves.  The main issue with these passive compression accessories is that  they donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t do much  when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re  in an office, plane, car, kitchen  -  anywhere youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be sitting or standing.        Passive compression only provides support when you are using your muscle pump. In other words, they  only work when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re ALREADY active  - in a workout or on a walk/run.       This is where Active Compression comes in.   Active Compression actively MIMICS the action of the calf muscle pump  without you needing to do anything!   The Beauty of Active Compression        The Problem With Other Devices  Current devices are  ineffective  or  only accessible to professional athletes.  These devices end up being  bulky,  covered in wires and hoses,  not portable , and  extremely expensive.        They can haveÃÂÃÂ  poor compression patterns ÃÂÃÂ that donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t use active compression, donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t match the muscle pump, or, worse,ÃÂÃÂ  do more harm than good  by pushing blood  in the wrong direction.    Bulky - complicated, heavy, not portable    Expensive - reserved for high-paying professional athletes    Poor Compression Pattern - dangerous and harmful        The Power of SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢  Using our  patent-pending WaveTech compression pattern,  SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ effectively mimics your skeletal muscle pump - which means it is  the best way to help enhance your bodyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s natural circulatory flow.        This means you  get safe, powerful, and effective active compression  that compliments your bodyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s natural rhythm.ÃÂÃÂ    No reverse flow  (which can get dangerous) - SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ makes sure your blood goes where it needs to go, the way itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s supposed to go,  faster and more effectively .       Patent-Pending WaveTech Pattern  Our unique  patent-pending compression patterns  actively and gently push your blood in the right direction and  work with the natural flow of your body.          ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ They do this by  mimicking the skeletal muscle pump  that acts as a second heart - aiding the return of blood to your core to help reduce swelling and muscle injury.       YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll  feel your blood circulating  through your calves, up your thighs, and through your body fluidly and powerfully. Relax as your body  enters accelerated flow.   Strategic Pneumatic Pressure  We compartmentalized the compression areas to  three strategic parts of your calf  to make sure we help maximize blood flow and the efficacy of the compression.        Feel the powerful massage  hit just  the right spots.   Targeted Compression Affects Your Whole Leg        Not just for your calves!  Improving circulation at the lower extremities  naturally helps push blood upwards through your thighs towards the heart . As a result, the lower extremities of your legs are one of the best targets to help improve blood circulation.  Synchronized Compression  SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just  synced with your naturally occurring muscle pump and blood circulation , it  syncs with its adjoining pair automatically.        Through the use of Infrared technology, each SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ device connects and syncs with its pair to give you  dual active compression.        The patterns in each leg will be  synced up and matched,  so you have a  cohesive and comfortable  session  in complete harmony.ÃÂÃÂ         3 Levels Of Intensity       Simply press the intensity button to increase or decrease the level of compression intensity you want.       Internal sensors ensure SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ never pushes beyond your comfort, so you know youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re in good hands!        Choose between two powerful compression patterns:        3 Steps To Setup                      Untethered Performance       SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is  completely wireless and tubeless . You can use it in whatever position and any situation. Simply strap it on and let it run! ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s nothing to plug in or connect -  a fully untethered experience.   Compact & Portable  Not only is SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ wireless, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s also  small and compact . You can easily fit it in your bag and even  use it on a plane.        Through its unique design and patent-pending compression pattern, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get  improved circulation throughout your entire leg  with  just a small area of compression . The device only wraps around your ankle and calves, so you can  remain totally mobile  without clunkiness or constraint.  Feels Amazing       Did we mention? SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢  feels absolutely incredible!  We honestly canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t talk about it enough. The pneumatic compression is like a a  deep tissue leg massage  that helps  circulate your blood, pull out pain,  and  relax your entire body.    Check out what users had to say about it!        Long-Lasting Battery  SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ has a powerful battery that can give up to  2.5 hours of active use . That means you can have  up to 10 sessions  before needing a recharge.       The device can be  easily recharged via micro-usb cable .  One Size Fits Most  Whether you have large legs or tiny calves, SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ has you in mind. We used a  one-size-fits-most  model using velcro straps to attach the device.            The straps are  fully adjustable , so you can switch sizes quickly and easily.  Machine-Washable  Sweaty legs? Not a problem! The inner layer of SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ can be removed and is  100% machine washable.         Sustainable & Affordable   Pneumatic active compression used to be  reserved only   for professional athletes , universities, and the uber-rich. Now, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re bringing its  performance enhancing powers  to you  for a tenth of the cost (thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s 90% off)!        YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll not just be getting the same effects, but youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have it  better, faster,  and  much more portable  than the rest.       Throughout this process, we were heavily influenced and inspired by video games. We loved the artwork, design, and mechanics found in these fictional, digital worlds and wanted to  create a regeneration tool like those seen in games.    With SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, we believe we got pretty close.ÃÂÃÂ         Naturally, we felt our outer layer skin designs should reflect this achievement. So we designed our outer skins to have  four unique colorways  that  draw homage to our favorite video game experiences.ÃÂÃÂ    SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is your  real-life power boost  and  looks it too!             SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just for athletes! If you stand or sit a lot, you need to get blood circulating to  stay healthy, relieve tired and achy legs , and help  increase cognitive performance!  This means Spryng is perfect for everyone!       From DJs to Moms to CEOs and gamers,  get higher level performance across all areas of life! ÃÂÃÂ                            We want our backers to have a great experience with SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢. We are doing everything in our power - from sourcing the best quality materials to rigorous quality control processes - to ensure that we would get the best product into the hands of our backers. As we are just starting up and offering SPRYNGÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ at highly discounted prices on Kickstarter, we are only able to accept returns due to manufacturing defect.                                     Several years ago our team was focused on looking at one significant leg condition ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> diabetic neuropathy. That took us down the route of looking at active compression and the technologies we could use to achieve this.ÃÂÃÂ   In our journey, the more we researched, the more we realized that active compression could not only offer a potential solution for diabetic neuropathy, but it had far more expansive potential therapeutic effects. We wanted to do it differently. We wanted to bring active compression to everyone out there. Hence, we created Spryng!ÃÂÃÂ   Through Spryng, we want to bring the benefits of active compression in an easy to use and affordable manifestation to all of you!ÃÂÃÂ          This project is promoted by  Jellop , the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.ÃÂÃÂ                                        Risks and challenges  We have worked extremely hard to prepare this product for Kickstarter and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:  MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production. Creator_description: I am a better engineer than sales man! Sorry if the video quality is not professional, I mainly focused on the product design and quality!I love to make new things and to conceive.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ Hey guys! After sucessfully launching RetroStone on Kickstarter last year, 8BCraft is proud to present you the revised Metal version of RetroStone! (Note that this is not RetroStone2!)            So this is basically a revision of the RetroStone on which all the hardware issues that we encountered on first production have been solved. System is now stable and optimized to reduce defect rate. And of course with a really dashing aluminium CNC case which gives an incredible feel!       ÃÂÃÂ CNC case means that each case is made individually out of a block of aluminium. A machine drills the block until it gives the RetroStone shape! Then the case are ionidized to prevent corrosion. The process is long, making the production cost very high, specially compared to injection molding cases.       More pictures at the end of the campaign!  But first, for those who don't know yet RetroStone, here is some more details !ÃÂÃÂ        RetroStone is a mini computer running an emulation station OS (built on linux).  You can use it to play to over 50 old video game systems : ÃÂÃÂ Gameboy, Gameboy Color, Gameboy Advance, Super Nintendo, Megadrive/Genesis, Atari, MaMe and so on. You can have a look  here  to all the supported systems.ÃÂÃÂ   In more technical terms it is basically a SbC (single board computers) with all the peripheral needed to make a handheld console (screen, speaker, battery...). Making it perfect to run Emulation Station/Retropie.  So yes, all your childhood video games on one handheld console, that you can plug to your TV, and play multiplayer. Yes that's a high five to my-10-years-old-self!       But wait! You are saying that we can play any game of our childhood, what does it mean exactly? Does RetroStone comes with games integrated?ÃÂÃÂ    Software  : Retrostone is compatible with Retrorangepi (Retropie distribution for Armbian). Retropie is anÃÂÃÂ awesome emulation station software (super easy installation, it will be explained step-by-step in the tutorial!).ÃÂÃÂ You can check them on Youtube for demo ! Those softwares come with a wide range of systems supported : Gameboy, Gameboy Color, Gameboy Advance, Super Nintendo, Megadrive/Genesis, Atari, MaMe and so on. You can have a look  here  to all the supported systems.  RetroStone is also compatible with most other H3 SBC OS (Armbian, Android...).   Games  : To install a game you need it's ROM file. A ROM file is a computer file containing all the game's data. You can legally download ROM of unlicensed games on the internet.ÃÂÃÂ   Some homebrew games of which makers agreed to have their games integrated into Retrorangepi :     Retroid, Run to Databay, Rope and Bombs, Into the Blue       The Legend of Owlia, ÃÂÃÂµCity, Nomoles    For licensed games legality of downloading ROM depend on your country. In some you need to have original copy of the game. In some others it may not be legal at all to download ROMs from internet.  Then to install the ROM you can transfer it with a USB stick to RetroStone.   Develop your own game, share them and discover other RetroStone user's games !ÃÂÃÂ    I think there's a lot of potential to develop and share your games! There's a topic on the 8BCraft forum dedicated to this. Let's make it more alive! :)       HDMI output : you can connect RetroStone to your big TV !ÃÂÃÂ        4 USB connectors!       Play up to 5 players !       Take RetroStone everywhere with it's compact form factor! No more boring flights for you!       Audio control       Gamepad controls:                 MicroSD easy access. Standard 5V micro-USB charger.       Inside you have a RetroStone Pi, this SBC (single board computer) runs a  H3 processor  which is  4 cores 1.2GHz .ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             ÃÂÃÂ Note : the energysquare pins are not supported, as case is metal it shortcuts the power. So if you upgrade you will have to remove the pins (remove them manually).       Basic RetroStone will come with 16GB SD card, which can already hold thousands of games.   Upgrade from 16GB to 32GB memory for FREE  by sharing RetroStone kickstarter on facebook!  Copy the URL of your facebook post and save it for later. At the end of the Kickstarter I will send you a survey for shipping details, there you will be able to put your URL to get the free memory card upgrade!            Joining me on kickstarter is not only about getting a nice game console. It's also about the journey of the project! As you can check on my first Kickstarter campaign RaspiboyÃÂÃÂ I made a point to give good updates (check for yourself  HERE ). With interesting facts on production.ÃÂÃÂ   Here are exemples of what people thought of them!            The main advantages of RetroStone compared with Raspiboy are :ÃÂÃÂ   - Easy memory card access  - Assembled and fully tested  - Compact form factor  - More powerful CPU  - Ethernet, more USB connectors and full size HDMI       ÃÂÃÂ Size comparaison of RetroStone and RaspiboyÃÂÃÂ             ÃÂÃÂ By connecting a screen, keyboard and mouse, your console becomes the perfect living room computer. Write a novel, surf YouTube or watch your movies on your big screen while kicking back on your couch.ÃÂÃÂ                       ÃÂÃÂ Makers I have not forgotten you! RetroStone may come assembled but we left room for customization!  RetroStone has 26 GPIO available, with built-in pull up resistors            2 of those GPIO have optional buttons built-in the RetroStone Pi if you want to add C and Z buttons. Also as the cases will be CNC you will be able to choose if you want the case drilled for additional buttons or not.     Note: on picture there are 4 optional buttons, but the 2 on left side have been removed.         That's something I often hear. Lot of kickstarter project are scams and never deliver their promised product. But that is because lot of them are selling ideas that are not ready to industrialize. Sometime you can even see their pictures are just 3D modeling, meaning they don't even have prototypes. Or they can have prototypes that are not ready for industrialized production.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ As my 2 first Kickstarter campaigns can attest I am as transparant as I can be, my prototypes are really ready for production. And I did delivered all my backers!  Please check my website to see to see for yourself :  www.8BCraft.com   ÃÂÃÂ Also on Youtube you can find lot of reviews of  RetroStones  and  Raspiboys , showing you they do exist for real :)       ÃÂÃÂ It can be : ÃÂÃÂ    For yourself to have some good fun with friends. ÃÂÃÂ     To make a gift to a special someone.ÃÂÃÂ     To discover the world of hackerspaces, fablabs and SBC (single board computers).        90ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : RetroStone Aluminium CNC case - EARLY BIRDS  100ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : RetroStone Aluminium CNC case - Kickstarter price  215ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : RetroStone Metal Edition - EARLY BIRDS  230ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : RetroStone Metal Edition - Kickstarter price  430ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : 2 RetroStone Metal Edition  1000ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : 5 RetroStone Metal Edition       PCB of RetroStone pi are already in stock. So it only needs to make the CNC cases, assemble, test and ship the units!  That should take about 2 months.                                                                                                                         Risks and challenges  The aluminium CNC factory have relatively high MOQ and the metal cases are very expensive to manufacture. This is why the metal edition is more expensive than normal RetroStone. For this reason we must reach a reasonable amount of pre-order to be able to order the metal cases!

Creator_description: I'm just a geek having fun with python during the sunday evening to build free open-source projects.I'm currently working on 4 chatbots (RunningChat; TinderChat; TransitionStreetChat; MeditationChat)
Project_description: First opensource collaborative ChatBot for runners   1) Who is John Wayd?  John Wayd is a geeky project for runner and  running lovers . It is  totally free . It's not an app but a chatbot accessible via Facebook, Telegram, Kik, Email, texting, Skype or WeChat.ÃÂÃÂ   You just have to chat with John and get in contact with runners around you. This chatting robot currently organizes runs around your place and find people willing to run with you.ÃÂÃÂ   It's live and free.ÃÂÃÂ   On top, it's collaborative i.e. anyone can edit the very simple open-source script to make it better.  ÃÂÃÂ Give us one dollar or more. It will make a difference.       2) Try Now!  Chat with John now.  Facebook: http://m.me/JohnWaydBot   Telegram:  https://telegram.me/  JohnWaydBot   Kik: https://kik.me/John.Wayd   Line, Skype, Wechat, SMS, iMessage:TBD soon  But also improve the script if you are an authorized contributor here:  https://github.com/regiscop/JohnWayd   3) Why we need you?  There are obviously some server cost (AWS bills) that needs to be paid to make this project a success.ÃÂÃÂ Indeed, we want to keep this project  free, independent and open-source .  We also need a development for the :   Automatic Testing of the code after a change in the script,    Automatic deployment after a change in the script (change that can be done by any backers),ÃÂÃÂ     Improvement of the product (the script of John Wayd).   This is why we need  YOU .  On top of this, the script is DESIGNED TO BE VERY SIMPLE and publicly editable by backers. It's OPEN TO COLLABORATION. Contributors can edit the script and, if the test passes, the new script will  automatically change the chats of all users . Feel free to contribute and/or modify the script.  The code is pushed in production automatically based on the files stored on an open-source GitHub repository.  The current challenges are on the automation of the script testing (after any pull request made on GitHub).  As anyone can edit the script of the chatbot (on GitHub), some part of the code written by contributors will have to be challenged by other contributors like any  Wikipedia  pages for example before it's putted in production. We count on the community to collaborate and improve the skills of the chatbot. Nevertheless, the smooth push of the new version of script cannot be done without any sanity checks. This will be an important challenge.  Note: The scalability of the project is not an issue. More users will just increase the cost of the AWS bills.  4) Who are we?  We are just 2 friends from the University. We have full time jobs during the day. We also like running together and coding. We dreamed about a platform organizing group-runs. So we did a python code that is running a open-sourced script. As simple as this.ÃÂÃÂ   If you think this is a cool story, share this project on Facebook:                                                       Risks and challenges  The current challenges are on the automation of the script testing.
