Creator_description: Dr. Satya Mallick is the CEO of OpenCV.org. He is an entrepreneur who loves Computer Vision and Machine Learning. In 2007, Dr. Mallick was named among the top 30 AI influencers to follow on Twitter by IBM's AI Blog.Right out of school, Dr. Mallick co-founded TAAZ Inc, a computer vision company in the beauty and fashion industry. The technology he and his team built has reached more than 100M users. He has been featured in numerous online articles on sites like TechCrunch, IBM, HuffingtonPost, and WSJ to name a few.Today, Dr. Mallick runs a successful consulting company that helps companies solve complex problems in wide-ranging areas like document analysis, face recognition, surveillance, object detection and classification, medical image processing and vision applications in retail.Dr. Mallick is also the principal author of LearnOpenCV.com -- a popular computer vision and machine learning blog.
Project_description: Update : Stretch Goals & Exclusive Kickstarter Content   May 23, 2019   The support we have received so far is simply incredible. We thank you all for making this campaign such a huge success.ÃÂÃÂ   That got us thinking. What more can we do to reward ÃÂÃÂ our backers who have put so much trust in us?  We are educators and the best gift we can give is additional material in the courses. Here are our stretch goals that will be unlocked when we reach certain thresholds pledged through this campaign.ÃÂÃÂ  Every stretch goal in itself is a mini-course.   Today, the stretch goals look possible. We need your help in spreading the word so they become probable and eventually with extraordinary effort from all of us they will become inevitable. Fingers crossed!ÃÂÃÂ    NOTE : In order to be fair with our backers, we decided to make some stretch goals    available exclusively to our backers    (highlighted blue box)   and    will not be available to others who purchase the courses later.         Here are a few more reasons to buy the courses during this Kickstarter campaign    50% discounts on all the courses and bundles.      12 months for completing the projects and getting the certification. It will be 6 months afterwards.ÃÂÃÂ       Access to both C++ and Python version of the first 2 courses without any additional cost.      An option to buy all future courses at a fixed price [Ultimate Bundle].     Introduction  Every decade or so there is a technological tsunami that transforms multiple industries.ÃÂÃÂ   Artificial Intelligence (AI) is that wave sweeping the technology world today. If you want to join this revolution but do not have the skills yet, this Kickstarter campaign is right for you.ÃÂÃÂ   At OpenCV.org we support the largest computer vision library in the world. We are on a mission to create the most comprehensive online courses in AI to educate a global workforce.ÃÂÃÂ   We are launching this Kickstarter campaign to fund the creation of three AI courses.ÃÂÃÂ     Computer Vision I : Introduction      Computer Vision II : Applications      Deep Learning with PyTorch    As practitioners of this craft, we feel privileged to bring these courses to life, share our knowledge, and help others in their journey.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    This is also an opportunity for you to get these courses at a much discounted price [ 50% OFF ].    Who are these courses for?   Are you a student interested in a career in AI?  Are you a programmer who wants to make a career switch into Computer Vision?  Are you an engineer who wants to use new AI techniques at your current job?ÃÂÃÂ   Are you an entrepreneur who dreams of an AI startup but do not yet know the basics?  Are you a hobbyist who wants to build cool DIY projects?ÃÂÃÂ   Are you a computer vision practitioner and want to broaden your area of expertise?ÃÂÃÂ    If the answer to any of the above questions is a YES, these courses are for you.  ÃÂÃÂ   We have designed these courses for beginners in mind and our goal is to prepare students with practical skills to solve real-world problems and to stand out in the job market.ÃÂÃÂ   These courses are not for shallow learners who simply want to copy-paste code. These courses will require your time and commitment.ÃÂÃÂ    Prerequisites:  The only pre-requisite for these courses is an intermediate level of expertise in Python or C++.ÃÂÃÂ   Why take these courses?ÃÂÃÂ   Let's look at a few factors that will make our courses the best in the field.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        What will you learn?  In all three courses,  our goal is to complete 3-4 practical projects . We want our students to solve real-world problems using the skills learnt in the course.  Thus, we have taken projects from various domains like Healthcare, Autonomous Vehicles, Surveillance, Security and some fun applications too. ÃÂÃÂ   We will also have a few short assignments along with the lectures.  We will start with the absolute basics and move to mastery as we cover all the necessary algorithms and techniques to successfully complete these projects.  For the courses, we will be working primarily with OpenCV, PyTorch, Scikit-learn and Dlib. We will also learn how to create interesting web applications using Flask. In the Deep Learning with PyTorch course, we also cover how to optimize and export models and deploy it in production environment using ONNX and Caffe2 frameworks.ÃÂÃÂ         The first two courses will be available in both C++ and Python.  However, since most of the Deep Learning community is focussed on python, we will use PyTorch for the  Deep Learning course which will be covered only in Python.   Let's go over the material we will cover in the three courses. This list is not exhaustive, and because the courses are in the process of being created, we are open for inputs from you.  Computer Vision 1 : Introduction       This course is designed to build a strong foundation in Computer Vision. You will get a solid understanding of all the tools in OpenCV for Image Processing, Computer Vision, Video Processing and the basics of AI.ÃÂÃÂ Here's what we intend to cover in this course.ÃÂÃÂ        Syllabus OverviewÃÂÃÂ    What will you learn    Basics of OpenCV : Playing with images and videos and perform simple operations like reading, writing, resizing, cropping etc.    Image processing and enhancement techniques like convolution, filtering, edge detection, image annotation, histograms etc.    Image transformation techniques like color spaces, affine and perspective transforms    Video analytics: Motion Detection, Background Subtraction, Optical Flow Estimation, and Object Tracking.    Image Recognition using Feature Extraction, Feature Descriptors and Matching.    How to build BarCode and QR Code scanners    Introduction to modern Deep Learning techniques for image classification.    Introduction to Linear Algebra and Statistics.    Projects    Document Scanner    Instagram Filters    Smart baby monitoring system based on motion Detection and Object Tracking    Deploy an Object Recognition Model as a Web Application using Flask    Assignments    Lane Line Detection for Driver assist    Human Body Measurement using a frontal/side view    ID Card Scanner using BarCode/QRCode    Computer ÃÂÃÂ Vision 2 : Applications       In this course, you will build systems or applications using the techniques learnt in the first course as well as some new ones that we cover as we go along. We also cover substantial amount of Machine Learning and the basics of Deep Learning in this course. We will also build interesting Web Applications as part of the course curriculum.       Syllabus Overview   What will you learn    Face detection, Facial Landmark Detection and its applications    Face recognition using Eigen Faces and LBP HistogramsÃÂÃÂ     Face Recognition using Deep Learning.    Machine Learning techniques such as SVM, Nearest Neighbors, Principal Components Analysis for solving different CV problems.    Learn about data pre-processing, model Evaluation, hyper-parameter tuning and evaluation metrics like precision/recall, ROC Curves, IoU etc.    Learn how to use OpenCVÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Deep Learning Module    Learn how to extract text from images using Optical Character Recognition ( OCR )    Case study: Object Detection using YOLO v3    Projects    Train a 9 point Facial Landmark Detector and use it to build a Drowsiness Detector app    Build SnapChat Filters using image warping techniques    Face Recognition based Home Security / Attendance management system    Create your own dataset using the CVAT tool and use YOLO Object Detector to build a surveillance & monitoring system.    Assignments    Style Transfer using Deep Learning    Implement k-Nearest Neighbors algorithm    How to curate a small dataset using CVAT Tool   Course 3 : Deep Learning with PyTorch       Deep Learning is the most exciting sub-field of machine learning. Many state of the art results in computer vision are obtained using a Deep Neural Network.ÃÂÃÂ   In this course, we will start with a theoretical understanding of simple neural nets and gradually move to Deep Neural Nets and Convolutional Neural Networks.ÃÂÃÂ   Not only will we go over Deep Net architectures used for solving various computer vision problems, we will also go over practical considerations needed to successfully train Deep Neural Networks. These include how to prepare datasets, how to perform sanity checks before embarking on training that can take hours, how to use visualization tools to debug the training process, what workflows to use when the results are not satisfactory, and finally how to deploy your network on the cloud. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   You will accomplish all this while building interesting applications.ÃÂÃÂ        Syllabus Overview   What will you learn    Basics of Neural Networks : Perceptron and Feedforward Neural Networks.    Regression and Classification using Neural Networks    Convolutional Neural Networks and techniques involved in training them such as Stochastic Gradient Descent, Batch Normalization, Back-propagation, data augmentation, regularization, learning rate scheduling, early stopping etc.    Training DNNs from scratch as well as fine-tuning pre-trained models using PyTorch.    Learn how to use visualization tools like Tensorboard and monitor the training process.    Work on state-of-the-art models for scene understanding using Semantic Segmentation and Object Detection.    How to optimize and export trained models for mobile using ONNX and Caffe2.    Case Study: Human Pose Estimation using Neural Networks    Projects    Ship Identification using drones    Intelligent radiologist: Build an application for automatically analyzing X-Rays.    Smart DashCam: Finding and localizing objects in a DashCam video for obstacle avoidance in autonomous driving.    Smart Gym Trainer : Detecting bad posture during exercises like squats and plank    Assignments    Implement algorithms like BackProp, Stochastic Gradient Descent from scratch    Create a data augmentation class   Pricing: Bundles and Discounts  We are offering a  FLAT 50% discount  on all courses and additional discounts if you purchase multiple courses. Please check all the offers given below.   Course Bundles   The prices of all the courses are heavily discounted for this Kickstarter campaign. We have deeper discounts for students planning to buy more than one course. The table below shows the different bundles.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ For most students Bundle 4 is the best option and provides the greatest value for money.         Kickstarter Special Offers   To make it easier for you to compare among the different options  ,   we have created a table for you below. Here are a few important points to keep in mind   ÃÂÃÂ  Retail price : This the price you pay after the courses launch. Needless to say these prices are much higher than the Kickstarter prices.    ÃÂÃÂ  Kickstarter price:  You get  FLAT 50% discount on the retail price  if you buy during the Kickstarter campaign. Our course prices will never be as low as the Kickstarter prices.    ÃÂÃÂ  Bundle price : You get  additional discounts  when you purchase a bundle containing 2 or more courses.   It does not take a genius to figure out you will get the most bang for the buck if you purchase the complete or ultimate bundle.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         Which bundle is right for you?   Here is a short guide that will help you narrow down your best options   Bundle 1 : Computer Vision Enthusiast   This bundle consists ofÃÂÃÂ     Computer Vision I: IntroductionÃÂÃÂ       Computer Vision II: Applications    The courses cover computer vision and machine learning concepts extensively. It also covers some basics and applications of Deep Learning, but does not go into the depth of Deep Learning techniques.  It is a good option if you are not interested in training and deploying Deep Learning models, but want to get your hands on with practical computer vision projects.    Bundle 2 : Computer Vision & Deep Learning Starter   This bundle consists ofÃÂÃÂ     Computer Vision I: Introduction      Deep Learning with PyTorch    You will learn the basics of Computer Vision and Deep Learning and apply them to really interesting projects like Human Pose Estimation, autonomous vehicles and healthcare projects. It is a good option if you are not interested in the details of Machine Learning algorithms (SVM, kNN, etc), and computer vision applications like face recognition, OCR, Snapchat filters etc. I would frankly suggest anyone considering this bundle to opt for the CV Expert Bundle instead.   Bundle 3 : Computer Vision Professional   This bundle consists ofÃÂÃÂ     Computer Vision II: Applications     ÃÂÃÂ  Deep Learning with PyTorch ÃÂÃÂ    This bundle directly starts off with advanced computer vision applications and Deep Learning. You will learn to create cool and impactful applications and also learn how to deploy your applications.ÃÂÃÂ    If you are mostly interested in Deep Learning and have prior experience with OpenCV and just want to boost your portfolio with good projects, then this bundle is perfect for you.    Bundle 4 : Complete   This bundle consists of  all 3 courses. ÃÂÃÂ     Computer Vision I: Introduction      Computer Vision II: Applications      Deep Learning with PyTorch     This bundle will take you from a beginner to a computer vision master . The courses offered will lay a strong foundation in Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Deep Learning with so many practical projects and assignments.ÃÂÃÂ    This bundle is perfect for students who want to develop their skill set and get a job in top Deep Learning and Computer Vision companies or start their own ventures in Computer Vision and Deep Learning.    Bundle 5 : Ultimate   This bundle gives you access ofÃÂÃÂ     Computer Vision I: Introduction      Computer Vision II: Applications      Deep Learning with PyTorch      All future courses in the next 2 years     It is perfect for students who are life-long learners and continuously upgrade their skills.ÃÂÃÂ     Course Logistics    Launch dates   We have made significant progress on the course material even before the start of the Kickstarter campaign. Here are the tentative dates for release of the courses        Course Duration    The  duration of each course will be 3-4 months.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ     Once the courses launch, you will have the  freedom to chose when to start each course.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ     For each course, you will have  lifetime access to all course material . In addition to the course material, students will get access to  online labs  during these 3-4 months. Online labs allow you to try code in hosted Jupyter notebooks while you are going through the study material.ÃÂÃÂ     Certification    To receive a certificate, you need to complete all the requirements of the course within 1 year from the date you start the course .ÃÂÃÂ  This is a sample certificate that you will receive.       How is it different from other Online Courses?  We strive to provide world-class AI education at reasonable prices. To achieve that, we have put in a lot of planning and efforts to provide a rich learning experience for the students. Here are the important factors which make these courses different:   1. The Best Curriculum   The series of courses by OpenCV.org will have the best and the most comprehensive curriculum for learning Computer Vision. Here's why --    Designed by industry experts : These courses are designed by a team of engineers and researchers currently working in the computer vision and machine learning industry. We are bringing all our knowledge and experience to these courses.     Both C++ and Python versions (exclusive Kickstarter offe r): You will get access to both the C++ and Python versions of the first two courses at no additional charge.     Comprehensive & practical:  Computer vision and machine learning is vast. These courses, along with our future courses, will be the most comprehensive study material in computer vision available online.     A balance between theory and practice:  When we surveyed available courses in AI, we found two kinds of courses ---  1)  Academic and theoretically deep courses that are meant for students pursuing a Ph.D. but do not teach you how to use practical tools and libraries.  2)  Theoretically shallow courses that teach you how to use libraries without explaining the underlying algorithms.  In our material, you will develop a solid theoretical foundation that will help you understand algorithms and debug problems. However, we will not indulge in unnecessary mathematical details that are only of academic interest. ÃÂÃÂ     2. Course Forums   Learning anything new is difficult.ÃÂÃÂ   Every once in a while your progress stalls because you are stuck in one little thing --- a library does not install, a piece of code dies without warning, or you cannot figure out the right parameters to make an algorithm work.ÃÂÃÂ   This is where a little help can make a huge difference. At a gym you can safely go beyond your current limits while bench pressing if you have a spotter. Even elite athletes have coaches because a little help goes a long way.ÃÂÃÂ    We will support our students in our course forums. You read it right -- our instructors will help you out if you are stuck. ÃÂÃÂ    You will also get to interact with your peers in the course forums, and who knows you may find a future collaborator to work with.ÃÂÃÂ    3. Projects, Assignments, and Case Studies   Our courses are designed around curated projects where we build real-world applications. The lectures cover all the theory necessary to build the projects.ÃÂÃÂ   Resumes are old fashioned. In today's competitive job market you need to demonstrate skills using a portfolio of projects.ÃÂÃÂ   These projects are great demos to show off your skills in front of an interviewer evaluating your application for a job.ÃÂÃÂ   Every course has coding assignments that test what you have learned.  Online labs  with hosted notebooks ensure you can try out the code while you are going through the material.  Finally, in every course we go over case studies covering a research paper.ÃÂÃÂ    4. Graduate proudly   Our primary goal is to ensure you have a rock solid foundation in computer vision because with knowledge and experience comes the confidence to take on real-world problems.  At the same time it is also our goal to make sure your resume looks great and you are seen favorably by recruiters.ÃÂÃÂ    A strong portfolio with real-world projects  will help you stand out in a competitive job market.  On successful completion of a course, you will receive a  digital certificate from OpenCV.org  that you can proudly display on LinkedIn.  5. Exclusive Kickstarter Offers  There are many benefits that are available  exclusively for our Kickstarter supporters  and will not be available once the campaign ends. These are:    Heavy discounts on all the courses and bundles.      12 months for completing the projects and getting the certification. It will be 6 months afterwards.ÃÂÃÂ       Access to both C++ and Python version of the first 2 courses without any additional cost.      An option to buy all future courses at a fixed price.      Testimonials   The team behind these courses has a track record of excellence in Computer Vision content creation and teaching.ÃÂÃÂ   We have written 150+ computer vision and deep learning articles on  LearnOpenCV.com  and have a computer vision course with 1100+ students enrolled in a span of 2 years. We have successfully mentored many students towards their goals and are proud of what they have achieved.ÃÂÃÂ   Don't just take our word for it. Check out what our previous students from the  Computer Vision for Faces  course have to say about us.        Who's behind this?   These courses are the only certified and  official courses by OpenCV.org .ÃÂÃÂ   The courses are being created in collaboration with  Big Vision LLC  which is a California based computer vision and machine learning consulting company. Big Vision LLC owns the popular computer vision blog  LearnOpenCV.com  and a popular computer vision course titled  Computer Vision for Faces .  The following people form the core course teamÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  We are working hard to complete the deliverables on time. However, large projects like this one are sometimes delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. Should there be any delay in launching the courses, we will keep you updated and we will figure out a way to make things right for you.  Apart from that, we don't see any major risks.

Blurb: GEESAA is an intelligent coffee maker that perfectly replicates the flavor of professional pour-over coffee, any time of day!

Creator_description: We are GEESAA, a team dedicated to bringing coffee lovers all around the world the ultimate personal barista experience. Drawing from our extensive experience in the coffee and technology industries, we have worked hard to create a machine that focuses on delivering exceptional user experience and that perfectly replicates hand pour-over coffee.
Project_description: Just imagine having your very own master barista to make you a delicious cup of pour-over coffee, wherever you want it and whenever you want it.ÃÂÃÂ   Well, now you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to just imagine!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             Meet GEESAA, a smart pour-over coffee maker that brings together the expertise of baristas with the convenience and flexibility of an automatic coffee maker.ÃÂÃÂ   Designed with a spinning arm to replicate the ideal hand-pouring technique, GEESAA delivers an even, precise and consistent brew, letting you enjoy an exceptional cup of coffee whenever you like!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Made for all coffee lovers, GEESAA features a range of fully-customizable parameters and a selection of top-quality, built-in recipes created by baristas. So no matter your skill level, you will be able to enjoy a cup of pour-over coffee that tastes like itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s been made by a professional!                 With an adjustable set-up that is quick and easy to use, you will be enjoying professional-quality coffee in as little as 5 minutes! ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                             No two varieties of coffee have the same brewing requirements; each have their ideal water temperatures, brew styles and water pour-over speeds. With GEESAAÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s custom-built APP, you can adjust these settings and more to extract the most flavor and aroma from your coffee.ÃÂÃÂ                             Without using the APP, you can press the button on the machine, or scan your NFC card to use the classic recipes from baristas. Then, you'll just need to add your favorite beans, put your carafe onto the base, and set your own parameters. Then, you can relax and wait for the most nuanced notes for your ideal cup of coffee. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             Pour-over coffee is easy, isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t it?ÃÂÃÂ   Well, a mediocre cup of coffee might be easy, but hand-crafting a great cup of pour-over coffee is definitely not. This is where GEESAA shines: it creates a fuss-free cup of pour-over coffee for you that is personalized to your tastes and always consistent.ÃÂÃÂ             We are the baristas who developed GEESAA together, we have 40 yearsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> professional experience in total, and have made thousands of cups of pour-over coffee. Over the past 3 years, we have been working hard to develop a better and more efficient automated hand-pour coffee experience for customers. Now, we are ready to bring that to you with GEESAA!ÃÂÃÂ        GEESAAÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s unique spinning arm mimics the arm of a barista. Unlike other coffee machines, GEESAA gently pours water in an Archimedean spiral path, moving from an inner ring to an outer ring, evenly extracting the essence of your chosen coffee beans, resulting in a richer and more authentic taste. ÃÂÃÂ        GEESAA also features a base that rotates as during the brewing process to deliver a more even pour-over, just like a barista pouring water over in a rotating motion.ÃÂÃÂ                                 GEESAA is a great way to kick-start the morning. Even if you only have a few minutes to spare, GEESAA will give you the lift you need to take the day head-on.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             With its impeccable design, GEESAA will take pride of place in any workplace.ÃÂÃÂ It can help you connect with your colleagues during breaks, find inspiration in your day,ÃÂÃÂ and you can always impress your clients with the superior taste!ÃÂÃÂ             After a long day, melt into a delicious cup of pour-over coffee. Savor the evening and unwind with your loved ones.ÃÂÃÂ             ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I've been waiting for something like this for so long. It's exactly what a barista wants!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ        Thank you to everyone who came to see us at our booth at the 2017 Specialty Coffee Expo in Seattle(SCAA) and 2018 Tokyo World Specialty Coffee Conference and Exhibition (SCAJ). It was great to see you enjoy a hands-on experience with GEESAA! ÃÂÃÂ              Your choice of a black or a white machine ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    The exterior of the machine is made from aluminum alloy and plastic    The interior lining is made from quartz; plastic never touches the water    Built-in water chamber (650 ml capacity) ÃÂÃÂ     GEESAA App    Download through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store    Connect it to GEESAA via a QR Code located on the side of the machine        For our stretch goals, the rewards include coffee grounds, a filter cup, a carafe and recipes. With them, you'll have a barista-level coffee tasting experience! Let's hit the goal together!       For more info, Please click  HERE .                                               We are GEESAA, a team dedicated to bringing the ultimate personal barista experience to coffee lovers all around the world. Drawing from our extensive experience in the coffee and technology industries, we have worked hard to create a machine that delivers exceptional hand pour-over coffee and an equally exceptional user experience!ÃÂÃÂ            This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.        Risks and challenges  We are so grateful to you for backing our campaign! We will do our utmost to ensure that you receive your order on or before the deadline. Blurb: 15 min dry time | Vacuum technology | UV sterilization | Auto reverse tumble | Sleek design | Easy installation | Fabric protection

Creator_description: Innovate for pleasure.
Project_description: We give you Morus Zero - the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s first countertop tumble dryer equipped with Vacuum+ÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ dehydration technology which dries clothes in a jiffy whilst consuming less energy. It is designed for any home, and even your boat and RV!  How does it work?ÃÂÃÂ   - Evaporation rate of water is factored by temperature, pressure, surface area and so on...  - To increase the evaporation rate of water, Morus Zero not just uses heat, but also lower the air pressure inside the dryer.ÃÂÃÂ      We found that over 50% of tumble dryer users were not satisfied with the drying performance such as dryness and drying time, while more than 40% complained about high energy consumption.     Standard home tumble dryers just take too long to dry even the smallest of wash loads. They take up too much home space and can rack up a fortune in energy bills and even damage fabrics, but with Morus Zero, all of those are a thing of the past.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                                       ÃÂÃÂ  Dry as well as fresh ÃÂÃÂ    The built-in UV sterilization effectively eliminates 99.9% of bacteria during the ultrafast drying time. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s also environmentally friendly since there are no dangerous or toxic chemicals to handle. So not only does Morus Zero keep your clothes dry, but also keeps them clean from any nasty bacteria!         Drying clothes just got smarter    The moisture sensor system automatically turns off the device when Morus Zero can no longer detect moisture within the clothes and the drying is finished. Just press ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>StartÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, sit back, relax and let Morus Zero do the rest. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s that simple.ÃÂÃÂ          Say goodbye to wrinkles    Unlike the single-motor design of other conventional dryers, Morus Zero has three high-performance motors inside, one of which is used to drive the drum to rotate independently. Our program can precisely control the direction, speed and even acceleration of the tumble. In this way the clothes can be dried evenly and come out with fewer wrinkles.ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ  Plug in and go ÃÂÃÂ    The compact design of the Morus Zero makes it an ideal choice for small living spaces, like starter homes, cramped city apartments and even RVs. Basically, you can place it anywhere. It is convenient to install, and there is no pipe setup, making it easy to get started with the Morus Zero right away. ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ  More emojis are on their way ^_< ÃÂÃÂ    Easily select the drying mode you like. Its clear display will show you all the information you want to know.ÃÂÃÂ          Mold problem? No problem!    Its design effectively prevents mold growth in your home. Instead of disposing all the water into the air by ventilation, the detachable water tank collects and stores most of the moisture evaporating from the clothes, and the built-in water level sensor notifies when the tank needs to be emptied.       Morus combines a sleek minimalist design with patented Vacuum+ÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ dehydration technology changing the way you dry your clothes & giving you more time to enjoy what you do best. Thanks to Vacuum+ÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ dehydration technology, ultraviolet light and infrared heating, Morus Zero takes your drying experience to a new level.ÃÂÃÂ                Morus BLDC motor provides 20% more power with an even smaller size!    Morus Zero uses a custom-built, high-performance Neodymium magnet brushless motor to drive a pump to create a low-pressure environment which allows water to evaporate at a higher speed.     Its 3.3lb capacity is perfect for your daily change outfits.     Just let Morus Zero keep your clothes dry and fresh everyday!ÃÂÃÂ                                  While at CES we met some very friendly faces that stopped in awe and wonder by our stall to see the Morus Zero tumble dryer. During the 4 days at CES in Las Vegas, we were more than happy with the reception and received a lot of great feedback from attendees.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                                                 We made two tests on 4 identical L-size long sleeve shirts (three shirts in the first and one shirt in the other)after spin-dry by washing machine. The remaining moisture content of the shirts is 30%-33%.          Morus Zero has two color options - Chalk White and Lava Gray. You can select the color you like in our post-campaign survey later.      Stretch Goal         A set of premium wool dryer balls and a foldable laundry basket will be sent for FREE with each product to our backers. Let's look forward to our next unlocked stretch goal!                      Founding Team       We are a startup team located in Shenzhen, invested and mentored by Xbotpark and Brizan Capital. With an endless passion for innovation, equipped with years of R&D and production experience in the drone and medical care fields, we are committed to promoting the automation and intelligence of household work, using advanced automation control tools from robotics and related industries to cut steps and reduce the wait time of everyday housework, truly making life happier. ÃÂÃÂ        We regard Kickstarter as the best chance for us to verify our idea at this stage. Crowdfunding Morus Zero is just the first step or our long-term journey of hardware innovation. We are looking forward to receiving not just pre-orders but also your feedback from different aspects to help us perfect our product.  We sincerely believe that vacuum drying technology will be the future of drying clothes.  With all your support we are sure we can bring a better clothes drying experience to everyone.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                     video produced by www.launchlightfilms.com              This project is promoted by  Jellop  , the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.       This project is promoted by  Green Inbox       Risks and challenges  We have spent more than 24 months making Morus Zero become a reality. After 5 generations of engineering prototypes with plenty of development and testing, we are ready to enter the mass production stage. We are dedicated to delivering the product after all our perfections. However, there could possibly be small changes made to the final product that will be shipped out to you.  We are now working very closely with our manufacturers and also looking to optimize our supply chain to keep the delivery time as we promise. Unexpected delays in production can still be a possibility which may push back our estimated delivery date. We promise we'll update all our backers on at least a monthly basis about whatever progress we have achieved.

Blurb: The essential tools for biological research on microorganisms, plants, and more. Come learn, explore, and invent with biology

Creator_description: Feles Inc is here to build and manage a hardware/software ecosystem which enables responsible homebrew biohacking and innovations.
Project_description: As seen on :ÃÂÃÂ           Ahhhhh thank you all!! We are funded on the night of May 16th and it's time to release our first stretch goal: an 'Explorer Kit' containing everything you need to get started with molecular biology!!!      Feles Explorer Kit:  ÃÂÃÂ      Rendering of what the Explorer Kit will look like (contents may change during development).    The Feles Explorer kit will include all the reagents you need to get started with learning and understanding synthetic biology. ÃÂÃÂ What is synthetic biology you ask? Synthetic biology is the field where we combine what we understand about biology with engineering and logic principles to create new things. With your help, we will perform all the internal testing and ensure that the Explorer kit is available online when you receive your Feles One so you can get started exploring right away.  In the explorer kit, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll find everything you need to perform your own PCR (polymerase chain reaction), to stitch DNA together, and to transfer the DNA into cells. The newly ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>transformedÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ cells will then obtain new function, such as produce a new color pigment they werenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t able to produce before!  Each kit will come with all of the reagents you would need to do these experiments several times to ensure understanding. Feles will perform extensive internal testing to ensure that the reagents or biological products used are safe and not harmful to the environment.ÃÂÃÂ        We are in the middle of a global biotech revolution that is only accessible to a very small slice of the public. Not only is hardware for doing bio stuck in the same state as computer mainframes of the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>60s, the software and documentation are either scattered or written in professional jargon.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ At Feles (pronounced ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>fee-lesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>), we believe that the ability to explore biology belongs to everyone, and that together, we can make breakthroughs that will shape the world of tomorrow. To do so, we are redesigning the laboratory tools, the software controls, as well as the learning experience all at once to deliver a modern, integrated experience. From the very beginning, we knew it was going to be a crazy journey. However, by combining our team's diverse expertise, countless sleepless nights, and lots of advice and encouragement from family and friends, here we are with our first product, the Feles Lab. We need your help to take this revolution to the next stage. Together, let's bring affordable biotechnology to the world.ÃÂÃÂ    Professor George Church on Bio Meets Tech ( Hardware, Open Science, etc.)          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  If you have a makerspace, getting a Feles One can give you ability to tinker with biology!ÃÂÃÂ   At iGEM(international genetic engineering machine) 2018 we exhibited our initial progress at Giant Jamboree, where we receive overwhelming feedback on how people would use Feles One. Here's a list of things you can do with existing protocols:   Test of your vegetable is GMO    Check if your taste buds detect bitter flavors    Check if you are built for endurance    Test if you are likely to be lactose intolerant    Explore how blood type genotyping works    Test a hamburger to see if it contains horse meat    Investigate your beer for bacteria    Extract ancient DNA from fossils    Test the gender of birds from a feather or a spot of bloodÃÂÃÂ     Identify species with DNA bar-codingÃÂÃÂ     ........   You can even start your  iGEM  ÃÂÃÂ project!ÃÂÃÂ        The Feles One is a lab-in-box toolkit designed to enable the general public to explore the biology all around them using routine procedures done in professional labs around the world. ÃÂÃÂ To achieve this, we have integrated six key lab tools as independent modules that can all be controlled through a modern touch interface with pre-programed defaults.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The Feles Lab features a modern, minimalist design so that you look great while showing off your bio-chops to your friends, instead of doing experiments by yourself in the garage or basement.ÃÂÃÂ  Equipped with Feles One, you can start learning molecular biology by hands on experiments, do multiple basic home testing like identifying if your vegetable is GMO, create creative use cases like painting with natural pigments, etc. ÃÂÃÂ      All of the awesome features of the Feles One      Some   Demo   GIFs      Centrifuge (left) and our blue-light empowered Gel-dock (right)       Reagents drawer (left) and 4C fridge (right)       General use incubator (left) and Petri dish incubator (right)       You can control modules through the 7 inch touch screen in the center (left); When you select a module, you'll be prompted to enter settings for the experiment, some default values will be available (right)       After setting the parameters and hitting 'start', you'll able to monitor your progress directly on the screen       The power button and the aluminum back-plate in a beautiful silver       A fridge to chill all of your sensitive reagents while you have fun experimenting       The centrifuge can only be powered on when the lid is safely secured in the 'lock' position       Our gel-dock can accommodate both traditional agarose gels as well as new E-gels       Fill the incubator with either beads or water to grow what you need         In addition to equipping you to get your research done, the Feles One opens the doors for everyone to  envision future applications of biotechnology . There are many ways to use the Feles One device in various inventive settings-- For example, experiment with new molecular gastronomy and mixology on your own your kitchen counter-top.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Feles One as a nice addition to your home tap?       Add your personal spin to mixology     BiofabricationÃÂÃÂ    Designing and building products with biology is not only for scifi authors. By harnessing organisms such as bacteria, yeast, algae, mycelium, and more, you can cultivate consumer goods as varied as footwear and furniture to food and even fashion:     Photo from Suzanne Lee of "Biofabricate on Growing a Better Future". Work by Tina Gorjanc     Bio-Painting   You can paint with natural colors from coral or other natural sources (edit: no coral was harmed during this experiment, only their genetic information was used from a database):     Photo Credit to N. Jakimo   Reference: Liljeruhm J, et al. Engineering a palette of eukaryotic chromoproteins. J Biol Eng. 2018;12:8. doi:10.1186/s13036-018-0100-0           ÃÂÃÂ Demo some cool things in your living room      Beautifully designed to fit right in the center of your conversation       ... or to be shown off in your living room. save your closet space for clothes          Dr. Keerthi Shetty on Bio Education ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             We believe best learning experience happens with doing. Learning is about experiencing with our hands and perceptions; learning is not only accepting what it is, but also dreaming about possibilities and inventing alternatives. ÃÂÃÂ However, Not much has changed in how we teach biology in the past 50 years -- the focus has mostly been on delivering facts rather than elements that spark curiosity. In addition, ÃÂÃÂ not all students and schools have access to expensive laboratory equipment, and standard labs take up a lot of space that schools canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t afford. ÃÂÃÂ So the time is ripe for disruption in this space. We want to bring the bio lab access to more students. With the compact Feles One, you can convert a normal classroom or a chemical lab into a bio lab for an engaging learning experience. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Student can go beyond memorizing the basics of DNA to actually visualizing it on a gel and doing their own DNA engineering. Equipped with six essential tools for molecular biology, you can design your own experiments that meets specific curriculum requirements.ÃÂÃÂ             If you are interested in working with us to develop educational curriculum for special topics. Please send contact us at curriculum@felesbio.com       In collaboration with MANTA Product Development, we performed ergonomic and usability testing to come up with an integrated system that is not only easy to use, but also easy to clean and carry. We even found room for a storage compartment for your reagents.ÃÂÃÂ             Safety is always our top priority. ÃÂÃÂ We are doing our best to make sure the product is safe to use. But once they are out, it needs your attention to carefully follow the safety rules. As the community grow, we will keep updating the safety guidelines.   Do :   Wear gloves during experiments and wash your hands thoroughly before and after experiments    Spray the Feles Lab with the provided alcohol cleaner and wipe it down with a paper towel after each experiment    Follow local and national guidelines when disposing of your experimental waste materialsÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ  DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t:    Cultivate known or potentially disease causing bacteria or viruses    Dispose of biological material in the sink or trash without first sterilizing them using bleach or alternative cleansers    Let nutrient rich media and agar set on the Feles Lab or other surfaces sit without cleaning them up    never intentionally create or distribute organisms which can self replicate and spread its genes into the natural population.ÃÂÃÂ               ÃÂÃÂ If you want to get a Feles lab as early as this Christmas, ÃÂÃÂ back us on Kickstarter today. We are offering super early bird $700 (limit 100). ÃÂÃÂ You can also chose to have a customized version with your preferred text on the  thermocycler cover , which is perfect as a holiday gift or for personal collection. You can also back $100 and you will receive a set of stickers and a ÃÂÃÂ Feles hoodie with nice fleece inside. Otherwise, $5 support will also help us move forward. All backers will receive a thank you letter with some Feles Stickers enclosed.                                     Personalized Part  If you are interested in personalizing your Feles One and helping us out in the process:     Our mascot, FiFi's very own Feles One     Stickers -- FiFi's Bio-Imagineering Adventure        Kickstarter Exclusive HoodieÃÂÃÂ (Featuring Feles Friends)  ÃÂÃÂ Introducing our team, advisers, friends and supporters who have joined our cause:         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                                           Have an experiment that you'd like to share with the world? Then the developer's program is for you! Developers who are interested in developing an application kit, please send a cover letter and experimental proposal plan to developer@felesbio.com. Qualified developers will receive a Feles lab for free and work with us to bring their idea to life in the form of an application kit. We welcome biotech professionals to join us as well, especially if you can adapt your published protocols to the Feles Kit. Please help us share the power and joy of biotech to everyone. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        * Feles Inc does not charge any fee for all the assistance. All the profits will go to the creator of the application.ÃÂÃÂ    Application fundamentals:ÃÂÃÂ    While the Feles Lab represent a fairly complete set of laboratory tools, we recognize that it doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t cover everything. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s okay if your application require access to additional equipment, simply let us know and we will evaluate if we can include the additional equipment as a part of the application package as an add-on.  The Feles Lab is limited to a maximum power draw of  280W  by the power supply and software locked to allow no more than two modules to run simultaneously. This can be changed by editing the operating system of the Feles Box, whose control board is accessible by unscrewing the face plate at the four corners, and carefully lifting it up to expose the IO board of the nanoPC mounted to the back of the touchpad.  By default, every module is controlled by its own app in its own linux process  Please follow both local and board biosafety guidelines when thinking about your development plan. As a general rule of thumb, applications should be limited to  biosafety level 1 (BSL1).ÃÂÃÂ            A few snapshots of our prototyping process       Bird's eye view of all of the components       Sometimes it took three people to figure out the wiring :)       Testing how the housing main looks propped up on a floating style base       Making sure everything fit       This was taken right after we finished the 1st assembly. Everyone said "WOW"         Mass production is never easy.ÃÂÃÂ But we have a few advantages. Instead of contacting manufacturers only after we were done prototyping, we started the initial development on the manufacturing floor in Shenzhen and directly sourced our hardware parts from volume vendors. Finally, we designed our hardware and assembly strategy with volume production in mind. ÃÂÃÂ   With established manufacturing partnerships in China, we secured OEM partners and we are familiar with the remaining steps toward the mass production. Finally, to ensure you receive the perfect Feles One biolab, we will put it through the most rigorous quality control and functionality tests.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Our manufacturing partner (top); from sketch to machined aluminum (bottom)          Where we are right now:   Concept done! Electrical Engineer done! ÃÂÃÂ Mechanical Design done! Industrial Design Done! First prototype assembly done! ÃÂÃÂ   The current centrifuge can only spin up to 2,000xg. We would like to continue developing and safety testing the centrifuge up to a speed of 8,000xg. ÃÂÃÂ   Mobile App is still under development. While the UI concept is already done, further development will be a stretch goal of this campaign. The mobile app will serve as a community space for people who are interested in exploring science and experimenting with robust protocols in the field of biology. The main feature is to create and share professional level biology protocols to a broader audience.        Photos   All the photos of this campaign are licensed under  Creative Commons Attribution CC BY license , and may be downloaded and reproduced accordingly.ÃÂÃÂ         Credits   The Feles One incorporated innovations from several excellent open-source projects to speed up development.  We would like to thank early explorers and pioneers such as Bento Lab and Chaibio for their contribution in DIYbio community.ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a small team of young and energetic people with a wide array of expertise from biology, industrial design, UI/UX design, and manufacturing. We are also very fortunate to have a large network of collaborators who we can call upon whenever challenges arise. As complex of a project as building the Feles One prototype was, our team has risen to meet the challenges every step of the way. It is our promise to you that we will meet all future challenges with the same attitude, and do everything in our power to look after you, our very first backers and supporters, by shipping the pledge rewards on-time.  As noted earlier, our current centrifuge is rated for only 2,000xg while the motor is capable of a much higher 8,000xg. This is because we are still in the process of safety testing our centrifuge enclosure to ensure that it can capture any shrapnel produced should anything go wrong at high speeds. In the event that significant resigns are required in order to safely achieve 8,000xg, we will ship the Feles One with a 2,000xg centrifuge. For any experiments requiring a higher centripetal force, a longer spin-time can be used and we will provide a detailed guide should this happen.  While we have already developed relationships with OEMs, depending on the number of backers we may need to find new manufacturing partners in order to meet our timeline. Depending on the method, the final product may be 10 pounds or so heavier.   Finally, with trade tensions around the world riding high and threats of tariffs being thrown around, import taxes may change over the coming months. While we canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t predict the future, we will do our best to find workarounds, and promise that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be honestly informed of any change in our plans or potential delays in a timely manner. Rest assured, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a company with a mission to ship our products.

Blurb: No monthly Subscriptions to bags, chemicals, filters or litter with the Catboxpro.

Creator_description: After fleeing the Bosnian War in the early 1990's and becoming a refugee in Germany, a mother, and her two sons immigrated to Bloomington, Minnesota in the United States in 1998. 20 years later I am a husband and father of a beautiful 2-year-old girl. We find inspiration throughout our entire lives, and although my mother is not with us anymore, I have taken my experiences in life and have brought to you a product that I am proud of.
Project_description: What I am going to do with the Funds:   Purchase the 2nd Machine. This would be a CNC machine with a working bed dimensions of at least 30" x 20" with a Z axis of 3 inches minimum. This would satisfy all the machines requirments and I would be ready to make at least 60 Units in my garage by December 2019.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ The units send in Decmeber would be Beta Version of the Catboxpro. I will not be making any profits on these Beta Versions, they are simply meant to do 2 things:    1) Get the 2nd Machine needed for production of the Catboxpro.      2) Get the Catboxpro out to the people for the very first time. ÃÂÃÂ Receive Feedback.ÃÂÃÂ      All beta testers will get a free production model of the Catboxpro when it comes out.    Hope to get your help so I can get going on this goal and looking forward to shipping the first 60 Catboxpros out in December of 2019.ÃÂÃÂ    This offer is limited to 60 backers, so don't miss out.ÃÂÃÂ   - Vern     Size Comparison    ÃÂÃÂ  It's Faster Than You Think!  ÃÂÃÂ        Catboxpro was engineered to be the most  reliable  litter box on the market. What does a reliable litter box mean? It means that you can be sure the litter will be sifted and  wasteflushed away every time.                              Today your choice is either to clean the litter box by hand with a scoop or a self-scooping litter box that is as big as a boat and stores waste you still need to empty. Other flushing litter boxes are big and bulky and take 30 Minutes to flush not to mention use outdated technology that is very unreliable and require babysitting. ÃÂÃÂ   The Catboxpro  saves the average cat owner 12 hours per year by doing the chore for you. Speaking of savings, with just 50 fl. oz. of water used per cycle, it's the most economical water-saving litter box on the market.                       Catboxpro measures just  5 inches in height . Sifts, resets bed and flushes all in just  30 Seconds!  Best of all, it's truly a reliable,  quality appliance.  This kind of automatic is not just better but  it's quicker.  Your time is very  precious , do literally anything else, but don't waste it cleaning the litter box. ÃÂÃÂ                             With the Catboxpro, you can  use any flushable litter . It does not even have to be clumping litter. It only needs to absorb liquid very similar to sand. The  Rotary Disk Sifter  requires only a minimum amount of clumping action to work.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The best part about the Catboxpro is that you don't need to buy chipped cartridges that stop the litterbox from working unless replacements are regularly purchased. Additionally, there's no need to buy plastic litter, fragrances, trays, chemicals, liners, bags  all you need is flushable litter.          Our Accomplishments   It took  4 years to create  the Catboxpro! Our first task was to create a fully functional prototype.  We did it!  We 3d-printed and laser-cut all parts in our garage, investing a  total of $20,000 to make the prototype.  We worked with a local  engineering firm  on the design. Our old design was bulky and needed 5 motors. With just a simple paper drawing, we reconfigured the Catboxpro to run on  just 1 motor  with the same impact. The new prototype was reprinted using new laser-cut and 3d-printed parts. ÃÂÃÂ        In August 2017 we entered into a Shark Tank-like tv show called the  Fast-Track Challange  sponsored by our county. We were one of the  4 finalists picked to present  at the Savage City Hall. Six months later, we shot the Kickstarter video at home and presented the Catboxpro on Kickstarter.  We work on the Catboxpro nearly every day, polishing our campaign, staying in touch with the people who want to be able to own a Catboxpro and always improving.        Did you know that cat feces (litter boxes) could cause a pregnant women to have a miscarriage, or have a stillborn infant or create birth defects? When Toni got pregnant, her and her husband Vernes couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t imagine having to give up their cat for 9 months. Desperate to avoid  toxoplasmosis , they found a self-cleaning cat box online. However, it did not work as expected. It had design flaws, and needed several modifications to function properly. Frustrated and desperate, Vernes created his own version, and called it ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>CatboxproÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ which allowed them to keep their cat, and have a safe pregnancy.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                   1) Faster speeds equal less smell in your house.  Catboxpro is very fast, in just 30 seconds all cat waste is gone! That's a new  world record  in the litter box industry! That's as fast as using a toilet. ÃÂÃÂ    2) Flush > Store.  Flushing smelly cat waste is safer, reduces smell time, and best of all there is no dealing directly with smelly litter for you later.   3) Reliable.  Engineered to be dependable and do the job right! There should be no need to babysit a litter box. ÃÂÃÂ    4) Size  - Today's litter boxes are huge. Some reach 30 inches high. Catboxpro is only 5 inches tall, some simple litter trays are the same size, yet the Catboxpro is fully automatic. ÃÂÃÂ    5) No clumping agent . Catboxpro litter does not require clumping agents to be added. Fewer chemicals for your cat to spread around the house.             Specs:    Voltage:220V|110V ÃÂÃÂ     Motor: Faulhaber 10RPM ÃÂÃÂ     Dimensions: Height: 5" (12.7cm) Width: 14" (35.5cm) Length: 24" (60.9cm) ÃÂÃÂ     Water Usage: 10fl/Flush (295ml/Flush); ÃÂÃÂ     Flushes per Cycle: 1-10 (User Defined, Default: 5) ÃÂÃÂ     Litter Max Depth: 2.5" (6.3cm)      The Catboxpro Dome (cover) keeps litter in.      Afraid of mess from any litter that your cat(s) may scatter when they leave the Catboxpro? We have the option to purchase a dome for the litter box that will take care of this issue. The  Catboxpro Dome , which can be purchased separately, prevents the cat from scattering any litter, saving you further clean-ups and money.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          Our Market and Industry   The market for the Catboxpro consists of:   First time dads who want their wife and baby to be safe.    Friends and family looking for a perfect baby shower gift.    Early adopters who want the best new gadgets for their pets.    People who HATE scooping stinky cat litter from a filthy cat box.   As parents, Vernes and Toni learned early on about the dangers of toxoplasmosis not only to Toni, but to their child as well. We know that we are not the only parents who want trouble free pregnancies to result in safe and healthy children. That is why we believe pregnant cat lovers and dads everywhere will be will be interested in purchasing this product. Plus, Catboxpro doesn't smell, and once you buy it you do not need to purchase replacement cleaner for it to function. We project that within 2 years of acquiring the necessary funding, we could capture 30-50% of the existing market share from the only other authentically automatic flushing litter box on the market, and here is why:   From 2018-2022, the   global automatic self-cleaning cat litter box market   is expected to grow over  7%  during the forecast period. (Technavio Market Research)    Globally, cat ownership has steadily increased over the years. (Business Wire)    The average household expenditure on pets has increased from 37% in 2014 to 44% in 2015. (U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics)    In 2014 Americans spent $58 Billion on their pets, and $70 Billion in 2017. Of which, $15 Billion was spent on pet supplies ( National Pet Owners Survey )ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  The Center for Disease Control (CDC) has identified toxoplasmosis as one of the most ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ neglected parasitic infections .    More than 60 million people have been chronically infected with toxoplasma gondii. (CDC)    Since 2007 the US fertility rate has declined, but there are still  over 3 Million babies born each year . ( LA Times  and  US Baby Center )    Despite the continuing decline in birth rates, in 2011 the global baby care products market expenditures were $44.7 Billion, and in 2016 that rose to $66.8 Billion. ( Forbes )    Today 68% of all adults own pets and  23% of all adults own cats . Of all men that own pets 21% own cats. Among the demographics  females own more cats than males.  The highest percentage of cat owners are affluent, are between the  ages of 30-39  and live in suburban areas. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     The top 2 countries with the  highest cat ownership  are  Russia and the United States. ÃÂÃÂ     In 2017 the total number of cats owned as a pet in the United States amounted to about  95.6 million.  In the same year, some  68 percent  of all U.S. households owned at least one pet.ÃÂÃÂ     What Makes Our Team Special        The team consists of husband and wife duo: Vernes Velagic and Toni Wheeler. Vernes handles the back-of-the-house aspects of the company and built all prototypes himself, utilizing his degree in architecture. Toni handles all front-of-the-house operations including marketing and accounting with a degree in accounting.ÃÂÃÂ    Vernes Velagic    Vernes earned a dual Bachelor's Degree in Architecture and German from the University of Minnesota, Twin Cities.ÃÂÃÂ     Having lived in Frankfurt Germany, as well as Livno Bosnia/Herzegovina he speaks three languages.    Working as a translator, he has been self-employed for many years and supplemented his ÃÂÃÂ income selling various items online.    Being self-taught in electronics, laser cutters, and 3D printers inspired his work on Catboxpro. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     Toni Wheeler    Toni earned a Bachelor's Degree in Accounting from Missouri Western State University located in St. Joseph, Missouri.    She has had multiple corporate positions within Winfield, its parent company Land O'Lakes, and also Ecolab. During her five years in those positions she managed over 500 accounts, and coordinated multiple international seminars and events.    She is currently a stay-at-home mom to her 2-year-old daughter.   Vernes will be responsible for all of the back-of-the-house operations: inventory, manufacturing, logistics, and design. Toni will manage the front-of-house: accounting, customer interactions, and all marketing. As equal owners, both Toni and Vernes make all final decisions together.      Risks and challenges  At this time, Catboxpro is a working prototype. It has been beta tested, but it is not currently on the market. We have 2 provisional patents on the unique interior parts of the Catboxpro and plan to apply for full patents in the near future. Our goal is to mass produce, so we can decrease the manufacturing price, which will magnify the profit. A complete rollout on the Catboxpro will occur when the right funding partner is acquired. If we do not get the funding acquired, we cannot produce Catboxpro.

Blurb: Save lives, protect the environment, and empower women with every bar. Buy oneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>give one hundred.

Creator_description: Eco-Soap Bank is an international humanitarian nonprofit working to save, sanitize, and supply recycled hotel soap to developing countries. Since 2015, we've recycled more than 250,000 pounds of soap, employed 147 women, and provided more than 1.1 million people with clean, lifesaving soap.
Project_description: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                         Project EcoSoap is soap for the  truly  eco-friendly and socially conscious. It's soap on a mission.  Every bar is made from  100% recycled soap ,  handcrafted by women  in developing countries, scented with  exotic essential oils , and shipped with  zero-waste packaging .  And for every bar we sell, we're able to  donate a    hundred    bars  to children and families in need.            Millions of bars of soap are thrown away from hotels around the world  every day . That's  tons  of soap heading to landfills.  Meanwhile, children suffer from deadly diseases that could've been prevented if they'd simply had access to soap.  Project EcoSoap is a bold new way to enable anyone to help solve both problems  just by washing their hands .     For every bar we sellÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>we're able to donate a hundred bars to children and families in need.         Project EcoSoap is an initiative of   Eco-Soap Bank  , a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. We've been carrying out our mission to save, sanitize, and supply recycled soap from hotels in developing countries to schools, hospitals, and village communities since 2015.                            We  employ economically disadvantaged women  to collect tons of gently used soap from hotels. We run all that soap through a  three-stage, lab-certified sanitization process . All of our production lines regularly undergo  rigorous inspections by government standards boards . The result is ultra-cleanÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>so clean you could eat it, if it weren't soap :)  We've already prevented  hundreds of tons  of soap from heading to landfills, employing  147 women  in  10  countries to provide more than  1.1 million people  with clean, lifesaving soap.  And now we're thinking bigger.ÃÂÃÂ        We'll use 100% of the funds we raise through this campaign to implement brand new production lines devoted to manufacturing our Project EcoSoap prototypes at scale. This includes:   Hiring  45 more economically disadvantaged women  as soapmakers, providing them with steady, fair-wage employment.    Purchasing  specialized soap finishing equipment  to maintain a high standard of quality at a fast rate of production.   We have virtually no net costs associated with soap collection, and we're able to keep other costs low by utilizing much of our existing infrastructure.  After the campaign, we'll provide frequent updates on our progress. We pledge to be as transparent as possible about how your support is getting put to use.  We intend to ship in time for the 2019 holiday season.   Timeline:    ÃÂÃÂ  Campaign run:  May 2019    ÃÂÃÂ  Initial hiring, purchasing, installation, and training:  JuneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>July 2019    ÃÂÃÂ  Product alpha testing:  JulyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>August 2019    ÃÂÃÂ  Product beta testing:  AugustÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>September 2019    ÃÂÃÂ  Product delivery:  November 2019        We've consulted with Fortune 500 companies, soapmakers, and chemists to craft  the perfect bar of recycled soap  with high-quality, culturally significant ingredients.  In fact,  we're naming each Project EcoSoap variety after a country we work in .ÃÂÃÂ                  These are long-lasting bars with long-lasting scentsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>for a clean like no other.ÃÂÃÂ        Support Project EcoSoapÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>and take global hygiene into your own hands.      Risks and challenges  One of the greatest challenges we face is keeping our distribution as environmentally (and financially) sustainable as possible. Eco-Soap Bank has worked abroad since 2015 and has engaged in a fair amount of international shipping. However, since we've never produced a consumer-oriented product, we don't have extensive experience with last-mile distribution. We're currently working to tackle this challenge with a small team of logistics consultantsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>and we'll be sure to provide updates on our progress.  Another challenge we've faced so far is ensuring that the right kinds of soap are available in the right places, in the right quantities, at the right times. Given that our soap collections from hotels can yield variable amounts, this was originally the primary challenge we had to overcome. Since then, we've been able to solve this problem largely thanks to a more mature and established network of steady partnerships with hotels. Our soap supplies still vary, but we now have many options to make our recycling formula work. Nonetheless, we'll have to continue to monitor our supplies to ensure that production remains smoothly on track.

Creator_description: A registered professional engineer and knife enthusiast with a strong dedication to metallurgy and materials science in the service of advancing the state-of-the-art of knife blade performance through application of advanced technology.
Project_description: Tungsten Knight breaks through the limitations of working with a single metal. Using a unique hybrid design, it offers the unparalleled durability of tungsten carbide and increased lateral toughness by laminating with a ductile steel blade. This cutting edge in making knife blades yields the next level of performance in the hand of the user.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  Get the best blade without compromising.   With a single blade material there is always a tradeoff between durability of the edge and toughness of the blade to take a lateral impact. Up until now, a single material that optimizes both has not been invented. If you want a sharp and durable edge, it comes at the expense of reduced toughness and elasticity. Of course, a tough and softer knife requires frequent sharpening. With the TungstenKnight, you get the best of both worlds with fewer compromises.        Tungsten Knight knives are designed to be used every day and out-perform the competition.   Gone are the days of interrupting your work to sharpen your blade. The hybrid Tungsten Knight blade has a sharp edge with a steel blade that is more durable than any other knife on the market.ÃÂÃÂ         The Tungsten Knight knives are offered with both uncoated and DLC coated blades.   DLC (ta-C) knives have a super hard amorphous diamond coating that also forms the cutting edge. Our DLC is 50% actual SP3 diamond. One of the hardest materials ever offered on hunting knives. Ta-C ÃÂÃÂ offers deep lasting beauty combined with lowest friction surface.ÃÂÃÂ          I've had a passion for breakthrough metals for most of my adult life. I had my epiphany while in a laboratory at Caltech and saw an amorphous metal alloy for the first time. The alloy, fabricated at Cal Tech under a contract from NASA, was like nothing else before. It had properties a metal and a glass at the same time. From this beginning, I went on to found and become the CEO of Liquidmetal Technologies. I wanted to develop commercial applications for this novel material. LMT eventually becoming a public company.ÃÂÃÂ   These beginnings have led me to my latest passion--breaking through the performance limitations of single material knife blade designs by using hybrid designs featuring different metals to optimize the performance of each area of a knife blade. Something that can't be done with a single metal.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ - James Kang, Founder of Tungsten Knight         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                              You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                A short testimonial from Nandger Franck who owns the Schmiedeglut knife making company in Germany.ÃÂÃÂ            You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                               James Kang demonstrating the difference in toughness between laminated and native tungsten carbide.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                                           Risks and challenges  Our foremost goal is to honor our backer's faith and trust in both our team and the groundbreaking product that we have developed. Tungsten Knight is geared toward real people who have real needs for the best in knife performance. This performance is made possible by our breakthrough hybrid blade design that is eminently practical for demanding, everyday use.  From our first crowdfunding campaign in 2013, our knife design and production team has delivered on our commitments to our backers in multiple crowdfunding campaigns on both Kickstarter and Indiegogo. These earlier projects were with kitchen knives. However, our ideas for a hybrid blade design are particularly suited for knives used by outdoorsmen (and women).  The development of our knife has been virtually de-risked at this juncture. Our efforts going forward are directed toward achieving manufacturing cost reduction by continuous improvement in our processes, in particular with regard to sharpening protocols for the knifeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s very hard tungsten carbide edge. Our production facility is in place and operating, only awaiting acquisition of some capital equipment that the proceeds from the campaign will allow us to acquire in order to fulfill our rewards to our backers.  Part of honoring our commitment to you is our commitment to maintaining ongoing communication with you of our progress (and challenges) both during and after the campaign until you have the product that you chose to back in your hands. We understand the importance of keeping our backers up-to-date and will be in communication with you as developments arise, giving you visibility into your project.
