Creator_description: KC Creely is president of HoloRealm VR, an immersive, location-based gaming experience that submerges players in an adventure without cords, expensive equipment or standing in place. With a background stemming across corporate training, education and the arts, leading HRVR provides an exciting new challenge.
Project_description: The HoloRealm VR (HRVR) virtual reality gaming attraction immerses players into an interactive adventure.ÃÂÃÂ   We will provide family entertainment centers across the US with HRVR tech, so that players can put on our virtual reality gear and be immediately transported into the game.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        HoloRealm VR is a company founded by a lifelong gamer. Our mission is to provide not only a streamlined VR system for game centers but also a great gaming experience for players.ÃÂÃÂ        Our hardware and software work together to deliver a seamless virtual reality experience.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ Our online platform allows players to create custom handles, avatars, and tracks stats across games sessions, no matter where you play.ÃÂÃÂ   Ditch the couch! Our low-cost game sessions let you experience VR in gaming and family attraction venues.ÃÂÃÂ             HoloRealm VR is a simple yet comprehensive system for adding VR attractions to your gaming center. Our components work together to make VR deployment easy for new-comers and satisfying for experienced businesses.ÃÂÃÂ   Our inside-out tracking system means there is no need for room tracking sensors, cords, or expensive backpacks full of heavy hardware. Our custom-designed equipment is durable, easy-to-handle, and ready to install with minimum requirements.ÃÂÃÂ        Our entire system is cloud-based - no need for an onsite computer. Software updates are pushed to your players without you lifting a finger.ÃÂÃÂ        Our multiplayer games support up to four players in a single gaming area. Unlike current VR hardware, which can cost thousands of dollars for one player, our system lets you make the most of your floor space.ÃÂÃÂ        With our web-based management system, you can control game play sessions from any browser. You can queue sessions, monitor game play, and manage customer accounts - all with one easy to use web app.ÃÂÃÂ         Everything is included in one comprehensive package, no need for licensing additional games or customer management software. Our product is ideal for gaming centers that want a VR attraction without the hassle or overhead of setting up complicated VR systems.ÃÂÃÂ         HRVR has completed the first version of our technology. ÃÂÃÂ We are currently working with potential St. Louis area facilities as launch partners, and will be going live in the coming weeks.    But we need more content to keep players coming back for more. ÃÂÃÂ We are raising $5,000 for the following items:    $1,500 - Additional packaged art assets    $3,500 - External content development              Zombies have mysteriously overrun the tranquil town of Pleasant Hill. You and your squad have been recruited to exterminate them. Your mission? Get in, get it done, and get out alive!ÃÂÃÂ                                                                HoloRealm VR has created the world's first inside-out tracking virtual reality headset built from the ground up exclusively for family entertainment centers and arcades. ÃÂÃÂ Our technology features:    Proprietary, virtual reality headset featuring inside-out trackingÃÂÃÂ     Proprietary virtual reality controller with HRVR Cartridge System    Cloud managed control ÃÂÃÂ from any web browser    Easy to use, over sized physical volume and eye adjustment controls for players    LED state indicators for easy management    Easy to access video display    Rugged, durable plastic for ultimate hardware protection                            Not until you experience HRVR. We've got one of the first gaming experiences to incorporateÃÂÃÂ  inside-out tracking ÃÂÃÂ withÃÂÃÂ  location-based , multiplayer technology. We've eliminated the need for room tracking sensors, cords, and expensive backpacks full of heavy hardware.ÃÂÃÂ        Plus, HRVR lives in theÃÂÃÂ  cloud , meaning you can track your  stats  wherever you play. Share your stats by creating your personalized gamer tag andÃÂÃÂ  avatar.  Check-in at gaming locations directly from your phone.ÃÂÃÂ        Ditch the backpack, grab a friend, because soon you will be able to try it for yourself. HRVR is fully immersive. HRVR is affordable.ÃÂÃÂ  And HRVR is ground-breaking .ÃÂÃÂ             Our cutting-edge technology is affordable, easy to set up, and simple to run. Most importantly, HRVR provides VR customers with a gaming experience they can't find anywhere else.             A one-time setup fee for gaming centers covers:    All VR equipment rentals foreverÃÂÃÂ     iPad to manage players and gamesÃÂÃÂ     Onsite room customization and setupÃÂÃÂ     Room decals and signsÃÂÃÂ     Employee training    Travel and expenses incurred during setupÃÂÃÂ                    HRVR provides all equipment maintenance.ÃÂÃÂ     Replacement for broken items within 1 business day, in most circumstances    FREE automatic software and content updates pushed directly to equipment    FREE onsite normal wear and tear replacement as needed    FREE facility upgrades as we develop newer, more advanced hardwareÃÂÃÂ                   VR is complicated and hard to get right. That's why we've gone to great lengths to make the setup process as simple and quick as possible. The reward? Unparalleled VR immersion. ÃÂÃÂ         You'll be amazed at howÃÂÃÂ  easy ÃÂÃÂ it is to get a game session started! The process is very similar to running common laser tag attractions. Check-in customers and manage games directly from any web browser. And since everything is cloud-based, the VR gear is the only hardware required.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ                  So, if you pledge your cash, what do you get? ÃÂÃÂ For supporting us, we have some fantastic rewards waiting for you.       Depending on pledgeÃÂÃÂ level, players may receive exclusive in-game avatars. ÃÂÃÂ Players can select and customize avatars from the HRVR website. ÃÂÃÂ Once selected, players appear as their customized avatar when in-game at one of our locations.            The exclusive HRVR Founder Badge shows that you truly support our vision and the future of location based virtual reality experiences. ÃÂÃÂ Wear the badge with pride! ÃÂÃÂ This virtual badge appears on your HRVR website profile, as well as above your head when in-game.                  Other loot provided to players includes HRVR stickers, and HRVR t-shirts.            And now for what is arguably the coolest pledge reward: Exclusive HRVR Controller Cartridges! ÃÂÃÂ These are physical controller attachments that are shipped directly to you. When you go to any HRVR location, you can plug your cartridge into the location's HRVR Game Controller. ÃÂÃÂ Once plugged in, you can experience an amazing enhancement that makes the game even more exciting.  The following cartridges (and corresponding in-game weapon attachments) will  NEVER  be offered again. ÃÂÃÂ These exclusive Kickstarter cartridges are not only fun, but someday they'll be a much sought after collector's item.   Exclusive cartridge: Apollo's Firestorm    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ - Unlocks Apollo's Firestorm weapon attachment in-game    Exclusive cartridge: The Obliteration CannonÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ - Unlocks The Obliteration Cannon weapon attachment in-game    Exclusive cartridge: Thunder Stroke of Carnage    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ - Unlocks Thunder Stroke of Carnage weapon attachment in-game    These in-game weapon attachments are specific to our feature launch experience, Zombietown. The cartridges will unlock new and different enhancements in future games!             So, what are the advantages to pledging to be a partner? ÃÂÃÂ        Most importantly, you get on our initial list of launch partners. ÃÂÃÂ We are opening our first location(s) in St. Louis, MO. ÃÂÃÂ After going live with our technology, we will be ready to take it nation-wide to the rest of our pledged partners. ÃÂÃÂ We believe customers and players will love our revolutionary product, and we will need to prioritize where we deploy. Partner pledges get you on the list of future deployments and will help prioritize future locations. How high you are on the list depends on how much you pledge, and how early you pledge. ÃÂÃÂ In addition, you will need to qualify as a partner (see below).ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Depending on pledge level, partners get early access to new experiences, levels, hardware, and features. ÃÂÃÂ In addition, partners get special HRVR website promotional visibility and access to HRVR developers to help prioritize game features.            But we are just getting started! ÃÂÃÂ   We want HRVR rooms in every major metropolitan area in the US, and we are doing everything we can to get there as soon as possible.  We are designing and prototyping experiences for everyone, including: party games, exploration, historical event interactivity, learning, building, and artistic expression.ÃÂÃÂ   For gamers, our roadmap contains features like 2 vs. 2 single room multiplayer, room vs. room competitive league play, and even epic multi-room battlefield bonanzas. But, we aren't stopping at shooters. ÃÂÃÂ We're currently designing content for multiple gaming genres with exciting new controller form factors to match the experience. ÃÂÃÂ Ultimately, we want to release a Software Development Kit (SDK) so that anyone can host their content on our platform.  You ain't seen nothing yet!ÃÂÃÂ         Woman-Owned Small Business    Midwestern USA Technology StartupÃÂÃÂ          HRVR Game Headset and Controller designed and assembled in USAÃÂÃÂ     HRVR game, web, and embedded software designed and developed in USA    Supporting American workers and families    Supporting independent software artists and developers around the world    Sustainability and good corporate citizenship in our community         We will contact patrons in the order of Kickstarter pledge and amount of contribution. All facilities must meet the following requirements:    Located within the continental United States    Good creditÃÂÃÂ     Available and appropriate space    Good lighting    Fast and consistent WiFi       Risks and challenges  Growth and scalability will be our biggest challenges going forward.  We feel confident that we can continue to innovate in hardware and content, but growing to support hundreds of HRVR rooms around the country will take perfect execution of our business plan. To speed up the deployment of the new HRVR rooms, we have heavily focused on the cloud and simplicity.

Creator_description: Always fresh and longer lasting bed linen.Join us creating a new standard of traditional bed linen.
Project_description: Do you know the feeling and fresh smell of newly washed bed linen?ÃÂÃÂ We want to keep that feeling!    Our goal is to re-think and transform traditional bed linen into something that fits modern-day society. We think that it is possible to make bed linen functional without compromising on design. ÃÂÃÂ        Dawn Nights - Always fresh bed linen  We introduce Dawn Nights. Bed linen that stays fresh and you do not have to wash it that often. Our bed linen is  treated with PolygieneÃÂÃÂ®  using a low concentration of recycled silver chloride, which is naturally present in water and soil. The treatment is  BluesignÃÂÃÂ® ÃÂÃÂ approved , which means it meets rigorous independent environmental and product life cycle standards. PolygieneÃÂÃÂ® is applied in the last stages of the production, and is only active on the textile itself and interfere with your natural skin flora.        The PolygieneÃÂÃÂ® reduce odor-causing bacteria  giving you a comfortable and healthy sleep. Our bed linen reduces the bacteria that cause odor and eventually damages your skin and health, making your bed linen stay fresh for longer.ÃÂÃÂ By keeping your bed linen bacteria free you do not have to wash it that often and therefore save the planet, by using less water resources. Research has shown that two-thirds of a products environmental impact happens in the consumer period by washing and drying.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        We made a bed linen that symbolizes our values and personalities - three guys that love quality, simple design and being in nature. Therefore our bed linen is made of  100% organic cotton, Oeko-Tex certified  and with a 200 thread count.ÃÂÃÂ    Our bed linen is stonewashed with a percale weave  that gives the bed linen a crisp and lively look. The fabric becomes soft and makes the bedlinen light and breathable. The design is inspired by Nordic nature and a minimalistic way of thought, to make a bed linen that has a  timeless design and will last longer than most . Initially, Dawn Nights come in two colorways - a broken white and a blue inspired by the coastline around Denmark.  Packaging - Reusable tote bag  To reduce the waste after producing our bed linen we have used the leftovers to create a tote bag. It will function as packaging and you can use it afterward for carrying things while on the move.ÃÂÃÂ        Which size to choose?       Production in Portugal             Our products are produced in Portugal by our supplier that has   over 30 years of experience in manufacturing textile products . They have a sense for traditional handcraft and dedicated quality control, which makes them able to create high standard products.ÃÂÃÂ   We have visited the factory two times to control the quality and conditions for the workers. All the process from spinning the yarn to the finishing details and the PolygieneÃÂÃÂ® ÃÂÃÂ treatment has been centered near the supplier to reduce transportation and the pollution from logistics.ÃÂÃÂ         Our story      Dawn Designs' founding team    We are Dawn Designs. Three guys Rasmus, Thomas and Tjelle from Aarhus in Denmark with an urge to create something functional and sustainable that can help the everyday life. So we sat down, focused andÃÂÃÂ went through our daily schedules and chores to see where problems arose.ÃÂÃÂ What is the first thing we do? We wake up in our bed and... Our creative process stopped right there.ÃÂÃÂ   The bed is actually a big problem, and it gives birth to bacteria and swamps.ÃÂÃÂ Dermatologist advise you to  wash your bedlinen every 14th day , which actually does not sound that difficult. But to be honest, how many of us actually do that? We did not, but now we wanted to change it. We contacted experts to hear about different ways to make the bed a fresh and clean place to sleep. We did not want anything chemical, but a natural way that would not harm our human body or the planet we live on. One day we heard about the ancient way of using silver because of its antibacterial and heat-regulating function, and after some research, we finally found the way to keep bed linen fresh by using recycled silver chloride.ÃÂÃÂ    What is next?   After traveling to Portugal, discussing details with our supplier, we have now received our first samples of the products. Actually, we only need one more thing - your help! Help us creating a fresh and sustainable way of sleeping by funding this project.        Stay tuned. Stay fresh.                            Risks and challenges  We have done a lot of research over the last year and have close cooperation with our experienced supplier. We have been talking to several previous project owners, which have given us a lot of advice, what we need to do to make a successful Kickstarter campaign.    The technology is well documented, and we know that you backers will like our product. But the thing we are mostly sure about is that this project has to be run by us. A passionate and ambitious team of guys, who are willing to work very hard for this project.

Secondly, there are risks associated with the logistics to physically deliver of the TiSTICK to you. Creator_description: Anna Ford is the Co-Founder of Bookclubz.com. An avid reader and book club enthusiast, she joined her first book club in 2005. Since then, sheÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s formed, led, and actively participated in seven book clubs across multiple cities. Anna created Bookclubz to better manage her own club and free it from never ending emails chains. Now, the site serves thousands of book clubs all over the world. Bookclubz is an online organizational tool with a simple mission: help book clubs get organized, so that they can stay together.
Project_description: We recently surveyed the over 2,000 book clubs using Bookclubz' online organizational platform. Over 80% of clubs asked us to build an app.  We hear you!ÃÂÃÂ   We have started to design a Bookclubz app! It will be completely optional to use and an additional resource for the book clubs that make up Bookclubz.ÃÂÃÂ   We need your help to make the app a reality. Your pledge will help us build and launch the app as quickly as possible. Our goal is to launch a simple version of the app in mid 2019. Thank you for your ongoing feedback, support, and usership! Your support will help us achieve our goal in the most timely manner!

Creator_description: HIO is a multifunctional product working as a secure physical password manager, a companion device for Windows Hello and an automatic intelligent PC locker. HIO provides safe and ease-of-use access to a PC, available to businesses or individuals.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ In today's world, people expect to access their online accounts anywhere at any time, using applications or browsers form any device, a shared or personal PC, a Tablet or Smartphone. Hio provides a huge security experience, available to the individuals or businesses, on getting secure and fast access to all the devices. It alleviates the security burden of traditional password-based authentication to protect internet users worldwide.ÃÂÃÂ   Hio relies on hardware to keep all the sensitive data you have, such as passwords and credit cards, physically protected. With Hio, now, sign-in is secure and even much easier on any device simply by a click or double-tap. It ensures your privacy by immediately locking your PC when you walk away, and unlocking your PC when you walk back using a standard password-less authentication solution.                 We would like to keep Hio growing by expanding its functionalities and enhancing its appearance as long as possible. Here are what we would like to add if we manage to exceed our initial Kickstarter goal.                 We've perfected a leather keychain that is handcrafted from high-quality genuine leather. The leather now comes in Gray color with a simple, functional design. Incorporating a very stylish solid ring, Hio keychain can simply be used for your other physical keys for added peace of mind.  Due to the nature of the leather and because each individual item is made by hand, you can expect that each one will be unique.                 Handing data off to a public cloud provider poses many security and privacy concerns. As data is stored distantly and is accessible from anywhere on the internet if a data breach occurs via hacking your data can be compromised. Breaches across almost every public cloud service continue to be regularly reported by the media.  In cloud-based password manager, as user security information is stored on the cloud, passwords, payment information, and much more, your entire password database is vulnerable to a data breach. When a data breach occurs, no amount of protection will keep your usersÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> accounts protected.ÃÂÃÂ   Hio goes completely cloud-less, keeping all your data securely encrypted inside the chip. No data will be stored, exchanged or even computed on the Internet keeping users protected against hacking and data breaches.                      ÃÂÃÂ In today's increasingly interconnected world, a majority of computer users are suffering from ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>security fatigueÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ- a weariness or reluctance to deal with computer security- that exposes online users to risky computing behavior at work and in their personal lives, according to a new study by government scientists. This can cause computer users to feel hopeless and overwhelmed by security.   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I get tired of rememberingÃÂÃÂ my username and passwords.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, was a resentful testimony of one of the participants in a recent US National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) study.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Years ago, you had oneÃÂÃÂ password to keep up with at work,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ added another irked participant in thisÃÂÃÂ study. ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Now people are being asked to remember 25 or 30. We havenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t reallyÃÂÃÂ thought about cybersecurity expanding and what it has done to peopleÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ.    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>It also bothers me when IÃÂÃÂ have to go through more additional security measures to access my things, or get locked out of my own account because I forgot as I accidentally typed in my password incorrectlyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, found among participants comments.                 In this video from NIST, Mary Theofanos explains the idea of security fatigue and how users are bogged down by too many decisions involving their online security.                      Hio emphasizes sophisticated security protocols, ensuring absolute device safety, for keeping all the sensitive information you have physically protected inside the chip. It gives you a simple way to access websites and applications that doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t involve memorizing a long list of unrelated characters. You donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need to spend time filling out fields of information, trying to understand complex instructions, or thinking up a secure password and username for the account. It automatically prompts you to store passwords physically secure when you are logging to a website for the first time. Managing passwords with Hio is super easy; all you need to sign in, is, just a click or double-tap on the Hio key.ÃÂÃÂ             Never worry about locking your PC as you leave your vicinity with it. With Magic Lock, now, Hio simply figures out and immediately locks your PC in your absence. No one else is offering an automatic locking system with such accuracy and effectiveness. We have applied a powerful, movement-based solution which allows you to select your desired distance from the four predefined options: 2-step, 4-step, 6-step, and 8-step.   Constantly collect and analyzeÃÂÃÂ accelerometer data to detect user movement    Check for the availability or strength of the Bluetooth signal to avoid false alarm    If the user walked beyond the determined step threshold and the Bluetooth signal is weak the screen will be locked instantaneously             Hio, as a Windows Hello companion device, enriches user authentication experience forÃÂÃÂ Windows 10.   Wait for user to click or press the spacebar on the keyboard    Check for the availability or strength of the Bluetooth connection    The PC will be unlocked if you are about 2 steps close to your PC             Like the other security keys, Hio key has a specific secure chip by which it performs cryptographic functions triggered by a push button. Obviously, you never see the details, but behind the scenes, it provides a robust secure infrastructure as a way to protect your passwords, credit cards and the login credentials of Windows Hello unlock authentication solution.  The secure chip that is used in Hio key is an ARMÃÂÃÂ® TrustZoneÃÂÃÂ® Cryptocell chip which ensures your credentials of any type are real, untampered, and confidential. It features hardware acceleration for the NIST standard prime curve and supports the complete key life cycle from high quality private key generation to ECDSA signature generation, ECDH key agreement, and ECDSA public key signature verification.ÃÂÃÂ   As the result, we keep the userÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s secrets securely protected inside the chip with the hardware protection. This includes protection for passwords to all websites and applications, credit card and other sensitive data. Hio, a PIN capable device, provides industry leading security so you can be confident that no one can read your data even if your Hio key is lost or stolen. The credentials contained in the Hio key belong to the end-user exclusively and are never transferred, copied or stored by a service provider or any other application provider.       By setting up a device Pin, the user automatically enables enhanced transaction security over sensitive information. This means an attacker in possession of Hio key canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get access to data without the PIN. To further discourage brute-force passcode attacks, there are escalating time delays after 5 consecutive incorrect attempts to enter the Pin. With a six-character alphanumeric code, it would take many years for thieves and computer programs to try all combinations. This is to safeguard your data in case you lose your Hio key and someone tries to use it without your authorization.                                     If you regularly lock your PC when you leave your desk, then I'll say you will be happy with Hio. It can guarantee your privacy by triggering to lock your PC when you forget to lock your PC or tablet when you step away. Perhaps when you leave your desk for a cup of coffee or to have a conversation with your colleague.ÃÂÃÂ   Additionally, Hio key can be used as a companion device instead of a password to sign in faster and more secure to your Windows devices, apps and Microsoft Edge websites.         Logging to a website from anywhere with any platform is easily achievable just by a click or double-tap. Hio saves users from the hassle of entering password on each time getting access to websites and applications. It gives users a simple way to access that doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t involve memorizing a long list of characters.         Hio is a hardware digital wallet that allows you to do away with physical cards. It enriches user experience with online shopping for all e-commerce websites. Thus, when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re checking out online, thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no more need to go find your wallet and painstakingly type in your credit card number.                 We have built an amazing secure key that is ready to go, right out of the box. We have suppliers in place and prototype is already complete. The next step is to move to mass production, to create molds, prepare assemblies, with all the same level of quality. This requires investment, and we hope to earn your support to launch the product and grow the community.       Hio guarantees complex passwords, auto-fills passwords across all well-known browsers and mobile applications. Managing passwords with Hio is super easy; all you need to start, is, just a click or tap on the Hio key.       ÃÂÃÂ Through all platforms, Hio provides the highest level of convenience and functionality the users expect regarding OSs restrictions. It is already available for Windows, iOS, and Android, and is under development for Mac OS. In Windows and Mac OS desktop systems, Hio uses the extensions to manage userÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s passwords across all popular browsers, such as Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and safari. It allows you to control all your account easily through your PC, Laptop, tablet or smartphone.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        A cheerful and intuitive user interface designed in-house, delivering easy management for accounts, quick access to accountsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> data, proximity, security, and device connection settings.ÃÂÃÂ                                       Compatible with various devices and platforms including Windows, Android, iOS and Mac OS, offering a similar set of features to all, Hio is your perfect companion device regardless of your device preference. Completely cloud-less, it connects seamlessly by Bluetooth to your device and ensures information is accessible anytime, anyplace using any device. ÃÂÃÂ                   For IT and Business segment, Hio is going to be a great gadget in the world providing an awesomely secure experience in getting access to your accounts anywhere using any device, a personal laptop, smartphone, or from a shared computer in an office, library, laboratory, and etc.                 The heart of our fast-speed technology, the custom PCB, is assembled with an advanced Bluetooth 5 Nordic SoC (nRF52 Series), security module, accelerometer sensor, LED, and a button. Hio now features a replaceable battery, but depending on how much we raise on this campaign it may be upgraded with a rechargeable technology.            Hio is aesthetically a unique and pleasing device allowing you to carry it with yourself easily as a keychain. Hio features a sensible pushing button and an RGB LED used to show the connection and BLE operation status. As a reward for spending much time on designing and innovating, we proudly receive fantastic feedback from the tech, fashion and design communities. We went through dozens of different designs before finalizing the shape and function of our innovation. We will use your feedback to ensure that the Hio does what you need it to.                                                                                                                  People like you. Thanks to Kickstarter for helping us in broadcasting our idea, solution publicly with all lovers around the world. We're a small company striving to battle some of the largest competitors in the world. We believe that this is the best and most efficient way for us to get our latest product to the people who want it most.                                              Risks and challenges  As with any hardware product, there are always risks and challenges with creating and delivering a new smart device. We already have fully working prototypes that have demonstrated all the key functionality.  Now, we are working hard on all parts of the product, including hardware and software, trying to make it more powerful. Our firmware and the Windows application, including extension support for Edge, Chrome, and Firefox are also almost at the final stage. The other accompanying apps for smartphones and Mac OS are being developed and are on track.  We are confident that we have the right talent and resources in place to meet our deadline and release Hio to you. However, we would still like to inform you of certain risks and challenges. We have spent much time during the last year for building a very capable supply chain team who work trustfully and follow professional processes to ensure that quality is managed throughout the design, development, and manufacturing process. However, component delays and unexpected shortages may occur. If this happens, we will be sure to keep you informed and try our best to quickly solve the problem.

Blurb: The affordable and easy-to-use tool that enables you to create better, more energy efficient products.

Creator_description: Jetperch LLC is the creator of JoulescopeÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, the most affordable and easy-to-use precision DC energy analyzer.  Jetperch is also an engineering services company dedicated to providing exceptional quality and value to our clients. We tackle hardware and software development challenges across industries including Consumer electronics, Telecom and Industrial. We create value by combining our creativity, intellect, rapid learning and skills with good old-fashioned hard work. Jetperch provides experienced talent at any phase of the project ranging from product definition to crisis resolution.
Project_description: Thank you to all our backers & supporters who successfully funded this campaign on March 21, 2019.   If you missed the Kickstarter, place your orders and preorders at    joulescope.com   .   Measuring energy consumption during product development is crucial, especially for battery powered and always-on devices. ÃÂÃÂ However, measuring energy consumption accurately has been expensive, tedious or error-prone.   We've designed something better. ÃÂÃÂ Meet JoulescopeÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢!        Joulescope is the most affordable and easy-to-use precision DC energy analyzer. ÃÂÃÂ It measures current and voltage, then computes power and energy.ÃÂÃÂ        Joulescope displays instantaneous voltage, current, power and energy, like a multimeter:       And Joulescope displays waveforms of voltage, current, and power over time, like an oscilloscope:ÃÂÃÂ      Oscilloscope View    Joulescope enables you to see what your target device is doing in real-time so that you can create better, more energy efficient products.  What people are saying   Joulescope's precision and fast sample rate enabled me to discover unexpected processing, and I reduced my device's energy consumption by removing this unnecessary processing. ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope is now a valuable part of my toolset for debugging and verifying designs.   - Frank Hunleth, VP Hardware Engineering, SmartRent Inc.   Joulescope helped me get my firmware to much lower power states faster. ÃÂÃÂ Having the JoulescopeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s multimeter and oscilloscope view open while developing low-power firmware is now an essential part of my workflow.   - Alvaro Prieto, Firmware/Hardware Engineer   While developing a library to conserve power in embedded devices, I needed a tool to prove its effectiveness. Joulescope was all I needed to easily and accurately record device power consumption and performance. It is now an indispensable part of my embedded projects.   - Chris Freeze, Software Engineer, DockYard Inc.  As seen on       How to use Joulescope       Connect Joulescope's USB port to your host computer. ÃÂÃÂ        Connect the Joulescope IN to your power source.       Connect Joulescope OUT to your device under test. ÃÂÃÂ        Run the open-source Joulescope software on your computer.       Measure, explore, innovate.       Why Joulescope?        Amazing dynamic range : ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope accurately measures electrical current over 9 orders of magnitude from amps down to nanoamps. This wide range allows accurate and precise current measurement for modern devices. ÃÂÃÂ Sleep modes are often just nanoamps (nA) or microamps (ÃÂÃÂµA). ÃÂÃÂ Active modes are often milliamps (mA) or amps (A). ÃÂÃÂ         Low voltage drop : ÃÂÃÂ Most multimeters and current meters have a significant voltage drop (sometimes called burden voltage or insertion loss) which effects the actual voltage delivered to the device under test. Joulescope has a total voltage drop of 25 mV at 1 A, which keeps your target device running correctly. ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope's extremely fast current range switching maintains low voltage drop even under rapidly varying current demands.        Makes the invisible visible : ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope measures current and voltage 2 million times per second with 250 kHz bandwidth. ÃÂÃÂ This high sampling rate makes the power consumption of interrupt service routines, inrush currents and other short events visible.ÃÂÃÂ    Easy to use : ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope reports cumulative energy consumption along with real-time current, voltage, and power. The multimeter view clearly shows the most recent value while the oscilloscope view allows you to explore changes over time. ÃÂÃÂ Much simpler and more accurate than anything in its class!ÃÂÃÂ         Customizable:  ÃÂÃÂ The Joulescope host software is open source on github. ÃÂÃÂ You can also swap the banana jack front panel with front panels that have other connector types! ÃÂÃÂ The front panels are open source on github. ÃÂÃÂ We ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¤ open source.        Portable : Joulescope fits in your backpack and only needs a small part of your desk. ÃÂÃÂ Take Joulescope wherever you want to use it!   Affordable : ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope is affordable and priced so that every developer on the team can have one at their desk. ÃÂÃÂ With such convenient access, Joulescope empowers developers to see the impact of their changes on energy consumption immediately. ÃÂÃÂ Developers can make informed choices to account for battery life during design. Eliminate power consumption surprises during final product testing!ÃÂÃÂ   How does Joulescope work?  Joulescope simultaneously measures current and voltage, and then computes power and energy. ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope combines a voltmeter and a fast auto-range current shunt ammeter.ÃÂÃÂ        Both the voltage and current are sampled 2 million times per second, and the sample data is sent to the computer. ÃÂÃÂ As the current changes, the ammeter selects the optimal shunt resistor value. ÃÂÃÂ The shunt value selection uses the ADC output, dedicated over-range comparators, and a unique algorithm that runs in an FPGA.  The sensor side of Joulescope is electrically isolated from the host computer. ÃÂÃÂ This allows you to insert Joulescope into your test system without worrying about ground issues including ground loops and ground noise. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ You don't need to worry about settings or affecting your target device. ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope just works.ÃÂÃÂ   Specifications   -1V to 15V voltage range    -1A to 3A current range, continuous    Up to 10A pulses (< 10 ms, < 3A average per second)    Down to 1.5 nA resolution, equivalent to 32-bits of dynamic range    Synchronously measures voltage and current at 2 million samples per second    250 kHz bandwidth    Rapid 1 ÃÂÃÂ¼s switching between shunt resistors for seamless dynamic current measurement    Computes power and total energy    Operates with minimal voltage disturbance between IN and OUT ports    Up to ÃÂÃÂ±48V common mode voltage between USB ground and IN-, IN+, OUT+, and OUT-    Two general purpose inputs (GPI) and two general purpose outputs (GPO) for synchronizing Joulescope captures with your target device and other equipment    Programmable operational/off selection for power cycling the target device and measuring inrush currents    USB 2.0 high-speed host connectivity with full-rate data streaming    Host software support for MicrosoftÃÂÃÂ® WindowsÃÂÃÂ®, AppleÃÂÃÂ® MacÃÂÃÂ® OS XÃÂÃÂ® and LinuxÃÂÃÂ®    Host software provides real-time graphs of current, voltage, and power over time    Host software is open source and available on github    Swappable front panel with open source designs on github    Firmware upgradable   You can find the latest specifications in the Joulescope User's Guide which you can download from  joulescope.com .  Why is Joulescope Different?   Compared to a multimeter : The classic low-cost approach to estimating total energy consumption is to use a normal multimeter. ÃÂÃÂ If the voltage is changing, you need two multimeters, but if the voltage is constant, you just need one multimeter to measure current. ÃÂÃÂ Since the device has multiple power states, you need to put the device into each state and measure the current for that state. ÃÂÃÂ You then need a model of how long the device is in each state. ÃÂÃÂ You multiply the state currents times their duration and add them all together to estimate total energy. ÃÂÃÂ This approach is very tedious and error-prone. ÃÂÃÂ What happens if you accidentally change something that drastically effects energy consumption while using this method? ÃÂÃÂ Are you performing this energy test every day? ÃÂÃÂ Hardly. ÃÂÃÂ You usually don't find out for weeks or even months which is really bad for the project.   Compared to an oscilloscope:  Another classic approach is to use an oscilloscope with a shunt resistor. ÃÂÃÂ This approach is limited to the oscilloscope's dynamic range, often just 10 or 12 bits, which is not sufficient for modern devices. ÃÂÃÂ Let's take an example device that has 1 A active current and 1 ÃÂÃÂµA sleep current. ÃÂÃÂ To measure sleep current to 5% accuracy requires 24-bits of dynamic range, way more than any oscilloscope. ÃÂÃÂ Joulescope provides the equivalent of approximately 32-bits of dynamic range! ÃÂÃÂ The oscilloscope approach also requires you to measure the voltage across the shunt resistor, and you often need to float your circuit, float your scope, or use a differential probe. ÃÂÃÂ Each option has disadvantages. ÃÂÃÂ Another option, customized current probes, are expensive and still lack the dynamic range.ÃÂÃÂ    Compared to customized equipment:  The major test vendors have expensive equipment that allow accurate measurement under these conditions. ÃÂÃÂ This equipment is great, but is priced closer to a new car than a multimeter. ÃÂÃÂ Even if it fits into your budget, it is usually shared by the team. ÃÂÃÂ If equipment is not convenient, developers rarely use it. ÃÂÃÂ Developers need quick, accurate and cost-effective energy consumption measurements so that they have immediate feedback on the consequences of their changes.  The Backstory  At multiple times during his career, Matt Liberty, the creator of Joulescope, has been frustrated trying to measure the energy consumption of products. ÃÂÃÂ With the increase in IoT, AIoT and wearables products, accurately measuring energy consumption is even more critical. ÃÂÃÂ Nearly two years ago, Matt got fed up and decided to solve the problem. ÃÂÃÂ Matt set out to democratize energy measurement by developing an instrument with a comparable cost to a multimeter but with the capabilities of the customized high end equipment. ÃÂÃÂ   The initial target was to support up to +12V systems and +3.8V lithium-ion batteries with currents up to 2A and sleep currents down to 1 ÃÂÃÂ¼A. ÃÂÃÂ In order to measuring meaningful changes of 1 ÃÂÃÂ¼A sleep currents, an accuracy of at least 100 nA was needed. ÃÂÃÂ Matt knew that this high dynamic range would be an engineering challenge.  We developed Joulescope using an iterative approach so that we could quickly refine the design. ÃÂÃÂ The conflicting goals of low cost and high precision required careful engineering. ÃÂÃÂ Over the course of development, we built 17 different prototype boards.     Prototypes!  The many iterations that refined Joulescope.    Each prototype allowed us to improve the Joulescope design and to develop a cost-effective yet accurate way to measure this wide range of currents. ÃÂÃÂ Due to the demanding and cutting edge requirements, we built even more test boards to fully characterize Joulescope's performance, especially the 250 kHz bandwidth and transient response. ÃÂÃÂ      Some custom test boards that supported Joulescope development    In January, we completed the Joulescope beta build of 25 units. ÃÂÃÂ This build allowed us to test the manufacturing process and get Joulescope into the hands of reviewers and a few eager engineers.ÃÂÃÂ      Joulescope beta build: 25 units    After nearly two years of work, we now have a product that is easy-to-use, affordable and exceeds our original performance goals. ÃÂÃÂ   Rewards  Joulescope is now ready to help you build more energy efficient products. ÃÂÃÂ We need your support to raise money for the Joulescope manufacturing run.       The "Kickstarter Special" Joulescope reward includes a Joulescope for $499 USD, a $300 discount from the retail price. ÃÂÃÂ Each Joulescope reward includes the Joulescope instrument, a 6' USB cable and a sticker.  Joulescope is designed to empower every member of the development team to improve energy consumption. ÃÂÃÂ We are offering three different team rewards that contain multiple Joulescopes. ÃÂÃÂ The "Team Pack x5" reward includes 5 Joulescopes at a reduced cost. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The "Team Pack x10" reward includes 10 Joulescopes at a reduced cost. ÃÂÃÂ The "Sponsor" reward includes 10 Joulescopes with one day of on-site training by Joulescope's creator, Matt Liberty, so that your team gets maximum benefit from this new tool.  The "Thank You!" reward allows you to join the Joulescope community and the Kickstarter ride! ÃÂÃÂ If you think Joulescope is awesome, but not for you, please back this reward.  All backers of any reward become a member of the Joulescope community. ÃÂÃÂ Although Joulescope is already a capable product, we plan on adding more features before shipment. ÃÂÃÂ As a member of the community, you can help direct the future of Joulescope by recommending and prioritizing features that are most valuable to you!  When do I get my Joulescope?  Your Joulescope will ship the end of June 2019. ÃÂÃÂ We already have our manufacturing partner selected and Joulescope beta units in the field. ÃÂÃÂ After the Kickstarter campaign completes, we will be busy ramping up production so we can ship your Joulescope. ÃÂÃÂ        The Team  We have assembled a great team that has the experience and knowledge to successfully manufacture Joulescopes and get them to you.  Matt Liberty is the creator of Joulescope, and also the project lead and engineering lead. Matt is a hardware and software engineering consultant focused on creating high-quality embedded systems. Matt has over 20 years of experience creating and manufacturing products. ÃÂÃÂ Over the last 8 years as a consultant at Jetperch LLC, Matt has developed a number of successful products for a range of companies. ÃÂÃÂ Before Jetperch, Matt was a Director at Hillcrest Labs. ÃÂÃÂ He is also renown for his earlier work on Hillcrest Lab's Freespace motion sensing where he was granted 27 US patents related to motion sensing technologies. ÃÂÃÂ Matt was a speaker and adviser to the Embedded Systems Conference for several years. ÃÂÃÂ Matt is based in Maryland, USA.  Custom Electronic Co. (CEC) is the Joulescope manufacturing partner. ÃÂÃÂ CEC assembles the circuit boards, performs top-level assembly, programs the units, and calibrates each unit. CEC is conveniently located near Jetperch, and works in close collaboration with Jetperch to ensure manufacturing success.  Allied Component Works provides design for manufacturing reviews, feedback and process improvements to ensure that every Joulescope meets our exacting standards.  Joulescope would not be possible without OSH Park, OSH Stencil, PCBWay, MacroFab, Protolabs, Storey Store Media, McMaster-Carr, Mouser, and Digikey. ÃÂÃÂ StickerMule makes our spiffy stickers.      Risks and challenges  We have a skilled and dedicated team that has successfully brought products to market.  All hardware products, including Joulescope, have risk going into manufacturing.  We have worked diligently to minimize these risks so that we get your Joulescope to you on time.  Development: The Joulescope shipping box and packaging still needs to be developed.  This often neglected step delays many products.  We have identified a partner and have started this process. We plan on keeping packaging simple to reduce risk.  Hardware: Joulescope beta units are already being used by actual people in the field, which drastically reduces the engineering risk.  Although unlikely, an issue discovered during beta testing could require additional time to resolve, likely require a PCB respin, and delay manufacturing.    Compliance: We have not yet performed official CE, FCC or USB certification.  Any unexpected issues raised during certification could require additional engineering which would delay manufacturing.    Software: The firmware & FPGA code in Joulescope is fully upgradable in the field.  The host computer software is easily upgradable.  The only potential software issue that would halt production would be in the custom bootloader on the USB microcontroller.  We have already developed and tested this bootloader, so any critical errors are unlikely, but the possibility still exists.  Production: Products may prove to be too difficult, time-consuming, or costly to manufacture.  To reduce this risk, we have already built the beta units with our selected contract manufacturer.  However unlikely, unanticipated manufacturability challenges could arise during the production build which would delay production.  Supply chain: Component shortages, especially for MLCC capacitors, are a global concern now.  Parts shortages and long lead times are common with components going in and out of stock every day.  We have no control over this.  We have designed Joulescope to accept standard components to allow substitutions.  We will place parts on order immediately (and already have ordered a few critical components!), but delays in component availability could delay manufacturing.  Team: We have a small team.  Everyone needs to stay reasonably healthy to keep shipment on schedule!

Blurb: LoveSync Button lets you realize many more opportunities where you could be having sex!.

Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:283 backers|Canada:21 backers|Germany:15 backers|Netherlands:12 backers|United Kingdom:10 backers|Belgium:7 backers|Brazil:7 backers|Australia:6 backers|France:6 backers|Spain:6 backers
Creator_description: Hi, we're LoveSync.LoveSync was started by my wife Jenn and I (Ryan) in 2017. We had been married over 15 years and created 2 wonderful children . Though still in love, our sex life had slowed and become less and less regular. This reduced romance in the bedroom played out in our daily lives as we became less connected and generally less capable of handling the challenges of life and a family together. As I reflected on our regularity of intimacy I realized that it wasn't one-sided. Some nights I'd be the instigator and she'd not be feeling it, and other nights the opposite would be true. Rejection is never fun, even from your partner of 15 years - so over time we each began trying less often.Finally, one evening as I lay in bed wondering if she'd be the one to make a move I thought "What if there was a way I could secretly and anonymously convey my interest and ONLY if she had the same interest would both our intentions be known?" As a consumer robotics engineer, I knew that technology could likely present a solution. Not long after, we had a basic functioning prototype that allowed us to test my theory.Sure enough, now that we can act on every chance where we're thinking the same thing, our frequency has increased significantly - and with it the quality of our relationship overall. Having shared our experience with others, it's become clear that our situation is not unique. In fact, as we researched the issue further, we found that the majority of couples are affected by some level of "desire disparity" in their sexual relationship. During her work as a manager at a marriage and family counseling practice , Jenn sees families every day who suffer from a decline in romance. In many cases, these declines build to a level beyond repair and families split. It is our belief that this technology has the potential to prevent this decline before it reaches a level of breaking apart families. If there is any chance that others can experience the same improvements in their relationship that we have enjoyed, then we must try and share this invention with the world.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ You're in love, but you don't always know when your partner is in the mood for romance... and sometimes you get shot down. So, you stop trying as often.  Even if occasional rejection doesn't bother you, you may be worried of leaving your partner feeling guilty that their libido isn't always matched up to yours.  Other times, you'd be game, but you let the moment pass because you're not quite motivated enough to be the one who makes the first move.  With LoveSync there's no rejection, no guilt and no missed opportunities. Take the Luck out of Getting Lucky and make your move with confidence!                                   LoveSync allows people to pursue their desires more frequently leading to a significant increase in successful outcomes and therefore, a more fulfilling relationship.    It provides the most benefit for couples who tend to not be as frequently outward about their sexual desires, BUT even those with above average drive have room to improve!         FAQ'S:   ÃÂÃÂ  "Is this just for people who have a problem talking with their partner? and / or won't this hurt communication?"    "why isn't it just an app?"   See the answers to these and other   frequently asked questions here  .                           HOW MUCH COULD YOU BE MISSING OUT??                        ÃÂÃÂ  Our goal in creating the LoveSync Button was to not only deliver a life-changing technology, but to do so in a premium way that echos the same sleek refinement as your smartphone.                          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                       This swirling glow will become one of your new favorite sights...     Why Kickstarter?    We are confident that thousands, if not millions of couples will realize benefit from using LoveSync in their relationships. In order to provide this to them in a high-quality manner and at a reasonable cost we must tool for and purchase a minimum order quantity from our manufacturing partner. Your pledges will allow us to meet these minimums and bring this product to life.          Follow Us!                    Get Your Project Funded Today!         Risks and challenges  Risks and challenges 1) Production - Ryan has over 18 years of experience in engineering and commercializing consumer products. We are working with a global manufacturing partner who RyanÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s done multiple projects with before and they have always exceeded expectations. We have been engaged with them on this project for the past 8 months working through production details and building prototypes. The most significant piece of development remaining is that of designing the final packaging. We will be doing this effort with the same manufacture, who has extensive experience in this area as well.   2) Fulfillment - Though we are based in the USA, we want to be able to offer this product to anyone worldwide. In order to do this in a timely, accurate, and cost effective manner for all our backers, we will be partnering with one of the major fulfillment services recommended by the Kickstarter community and our pledge management partner CrowdOx.  Having said the above, there is always the chance for unforeseen difficulties. Whatever the challenges that may arise, we will remain committed to uphold the duties of a creator on this platform by doing right for the backers who take on financial risk to be part of helping a cause they believe in.

Creator_description: We are enthusiastic motorcyclists and have tested a lot of cleaning agents in recent years. Satisfactory, however, was none. So, we set out to find the perfect solution for quick cleaning - without using water - on the bikes ... after countless trials, formulations and variations, we were able to create the best recipe with outstanding chemical manufacturers that met our needs. The result was the GentleWipes - the all-in-one solution for cleaning your vintage car, your motorcycle or your bike or even your boat.
Project_description: Cleaning, polishing and sealing in one. The all-in-one solution for the perfectly shiny and maintained vehicle. The GentleMonkeysÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> vehicle cleaner. Vehicle cleaning has never been easier or more effective. Whether a quick once over on the road or after a long tour - with the innovative GentleWipes your vehicle will be radiantly clean without needing a single drop of water. Simply wipe over the surfaces with a damp GentleWipe and polish to a shine with the GentleMicro. The specially developed impregnating liquid in the wet wipes cleans and protects all surfaces - including lacquer, chrome, aluminium, metal, stainless steel, plastic, leather and imitation leather, windows, mirrors, rubber and much more.     Size of the big MonkeyBox = 120 x 240 mm       Size of the small MonkeyBox = 80 x 170 mm              WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve developed GentleWipes out of a genuine passion for our vehicles. After more than a year of hard work and development weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re proud to share with you, our fellow vehicle enthusiasts, the solution allowing you to take care of your vehicles and make sure they look their best at all times, wherever you may be.       ÃÂÃÂ   WHAT CAN BE CLEANED WITH THE GENTLEWIPES   All smooth surfaces on a vehicle, both internal and external, can be cleaned with GentleWipes: lacquer, chrome, aluminium, stainless steel, plastic, leather, imitation leather, windows, mirrors, tires, rubber seals and many more.              You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                        How do GentleWipes clean and what else do they do for your vehicle?    By gently applying (without pressure) the emulsion contained in the wet wipes to the surface to be cleaned, dust and dirt particles are first loosened and coated with a protective layer. At the same time, the surface is protected by the special ingredients of the emulsion. A double layer is created between the surface and the dirt. The dirt is then gently removed with a specially designed microfibre cloth. By polishing the surfaces (with the clean side of the microfibre cloth) you leave your vehicle looking perfectly shiny. The exclusively formulated GentleWipes leave behind a wafer-thin wax layer. Oxygen in the air hardens it and protects your vehicleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s lacquer from environmental influences.       ÃÂÃÂ  How it works:      The mode of functioning     The revolutionary GentleSeal (GM18) technology:ÃÂÃÂ              The Gentlewipes' impregnating liquid we have developed contains a novel dirt remover which gets rid of oil, tar, grease, brake dust, insects and other dirt (even the most stubborn) without leaving any residue. Gentlewipes can be used on almost all surfaces in and around the vehicle. Whether lacquer, chrome, aluminum, metal, stainless steel, plastic, leather and imitation leather, windows, mirrors, rubber and much more it will be perfectly, and safely cleaned. The revolutionary Gentleseal (GM18) technology fills existing micro scratches with each application, and the surface is protected with a special high-gloss and sealing effect.                 On average, 160 litres of fresh water are used to clean a vehicle. Per vehicle wash, GentleWipes uses just 100-250 ml of the proprietary impregnating liquid.  The average per capita consumption in Europe is between 120 and 270 litres of fresh water per day. A significant proportion of this water consumption is wasted through vehicle care.   160 litres of water equates to       In addition to saving water by using GentleWipes for vehicle cleaning, we have paid particular attention to sustainability: ÃÂÃÂ   All chemical components of the GentleWipes' impregnating liquid are certified throughout Europe according to   Reach  . The GentleWipes are made of pure viscose, a natural fibre that is 100% biodegradable. DataBoss saves you time.    = your media management (photos, videos, any data) made really easy =    This custom DataBoss edition is capped at just 100 issues.ÃÂÃÂ   Not only that, but it closes in two short weeks from start to finish. That's it.ÃÂÃÂ   Rewards range from $24 to $59, please choose yours. (New level just added: $129 gives you free upgrades up to v3.0 inclusively!)        Save your data, then Find it  - easily! - anytime you need it. Now, that's power.  Simply the smartest data management tool for you, used by both professionals and home users since 2014. With DataBoss, you spend as little time as possible to achieve what you need.  Easily back up (on one or two target drives), and later  instantly find  any piece of your data - like   that    particular photo!  - just when you need it.  Even  years  later. Photos, videos, any files at all. One easy app for all.    Who needs DataBoss:   Photo/video professionals or hobbyists, law firms, government, accountants, anyone working with data. Also for everyday people who take photos of their important ones.  Finally, be able to actually FIND that backup - from yesterday, from the last week, even from years ago. Retrieve your data quickly at any time, with DataBoss.        Reliable software that works everywhere:   This Windows 10/8/7 software runs on tablets, laptops, desktops. Works on-location or in-house. Reliable, battle-tested, production-ready, time-tested since 2014. Never once crashed on us or other users. Never lost any data.ÃÂÃÂ   Easy as pie to use (but tons of intelligence works hard under its hood to make this appear easy for you). Yay!  Works with local cards/disks, or you can port your Cloud Drive/Storage as a Windows drive and use that - your choice.  DataBoss offers a Free Trial, so you don't have to blindly buy it without trying it first. We value your own opinion and decision making, whatever it may be.  Here's how simple it is to use DataBoss:        After that,  your DataBoss will find  photos, videos, or any other files you backed up - easily and instantly... even if you have changed the backup drives they were originally saved on! Yes, really.  (There's a wealth of information on our web site, including Knowledge Base. Please see all the details here:  DataBoss.one  )   NO annual subscription fees or ongoing licensing costs. Unique proposition ( only on this Kickstarter .) Get this software actually customized personally for you, lovingly adorned with your name (or the name of your company, or any name you'd like to dedicate your copy to.)  You just supported an honest small business  4.  Satisfaction . With this version 2.3, "open in Windows Explorer" will also automatically open a universal thumbnail viewer. Why is it important? Creator_description: Eduonix creates and distributes high quality technology training content. Our team of industry professionals have been training manpower for more than a decade. We aim to teach technology the way it is used in industry and professional world. We have professional team of trainers for technologies ranging from Mobility, Web to Enterprise and Database and Server Administration.
Project_description: E-Degree to Master Artificial Intelligence and Machine LearningÃÂÃÂ    We are redefining the way AI and machine learning is taught online and creating a master program which will make a newbie to be a professional AI and Machine Learning expert after completion of the course.The course will be practical in nature with multiple projects and real life test cases. We have gathered together the best Industry practitioners to work on this program and they are creating a rigorous training curriculum which which help you first acquire the relevant programming and math skills and then work with you over the foundational concepts. You will then learn real world application and use cases. After this program you will be able to work on  ÃÂÃÂ  What will you learn   - Foundational programming knowledge for absolute beginnersÃÂÃÂ   - Basic and advanced mathematical concepts required to grasp the content  - Foundational concepts for AI and Machine learning  - Master tools which you will need to solve and create ML solutions  - Application of concepts and real world app development in AI and ML  - Rigorous conceptual understanding of AlgorithmsÃÂÃÂ   - Practical solutions for various topical problems        Data Analysis : Learn to work on different data sets and create novel solutions to problems across multiple domains such as Finance, ÃÂÃÂ Healthcare and E-commerce.ÃÂÃÂ         Regression analysis : Learn to apply algorithms such as Regression analysis for solving machine learning problems.        AI research:  You can continue many of the projects covered in the courses and augment your full time studies        Supervised learning:  Learn how you can use training data to create amazing solutions for many of the difficult business problems.        Unsupervised learning:  Learn exploratory data analysis to find hidden patterns or grouping in data. Implement it in live projects        Neural networks : Learn deep learning concepts and neural networks and master the concepts using wide variety of use cases.                                                                                           Risks and challenges  While we have over 15 successfully funded projects like this, each time we do, we expand our scope and supporter deliverables. This time is no different, and we are challenging ourselves to outdo previous projects with even more incredible results.  We are confident in our ability to fulfil our pledges with this program and find every opportunity to go above and beyond in providing value. At the same time, we will be doing everything possible to complete this project according to our established timeline.
