Creator_description: M.Sc in industrial automation engineer Italian amateur national DH champion 2018Downhill instructor @ Downhill AcademyPassionate about sport and technology.
Project_description: BYB Telemetry is the world's first professional universal telemetry kit for mountain bikes. It detects the motion of the suspension and other dynamic parameters of the MTB while riding. It allows visualizing the movement of the suspension, in order to base the setting on quantitative information instead of feelings.  BYB Telemetry connects wirelessly to an app or an advanced visualization software. It tells you how to turn the knobs of your suspension to provide you with the perfect suspension set-up, according to your needs and the track characteristic.   BYB Telemetry is developed in the racing environment and it's similar to the technology used in the downhill UCI World Cup from the factory teams. Nevertheless, it has a user-friendly and straightforward interface, aiming to make the  best personalized suspension set-up  accessible to everyone!                       Suspension technology has drastically evolved in the last years, reaching an incredibly high standard of quality and performance, but also complication level. We all spent hours and hours chasing the optimal tuning. With more tuning parameter available on every suspension system, finding a proper suspension set-up is not a straightforward operation.ÃÂÃÂ   Every rider would like to have a perfectly balanced and smooth bike on a rough or technical section.ÃÂÃÂ In fact, an optimal set-up can make the difference concerning chronometric feedback and fatigue. This is true for the professional but also for the amateurs riders.  With BYB Telemetry we want to deliver you the best possible setting of your suspension, accordingly to your needs and the features of the track.   These are the benefits that you will get when you  use data instead of feelings:        An optimal suspension set-up will drastically change the way you ride your bike and the approach to different tracks. With BYB Telemetry every rider will be able to get the best out of his/her bike!       BYB Telemetry is composedÃÂÃÂ by a set of professional motorsport sensors, a data acquisition unit and a set of universal fixing mounts.ÃÂÃÂ        The  electronic acquisition unit  is the heart of the system. It's entirely made in Italy. It can be mounted on every handlebar, with diameter of 35 or 31.8mm, thanks to the specifically designed clamps included in the kit.ÃÂÃÂ   Its main features are:       The  top level motorsport sensors  are the same sensors that are used in the UCI World Cup from the factory teams [ link ]. They directly measure the travel of fork and shock absorber with high accuracy.  The  mountings  elements for the sensor are 3D printed. A flexible material and different fixing layouts are provided in order to guarantee the compatibility with your suspension fork and shock.          This is the kit that you will receive at home         Thanks to a set of universal supports, BYB Telemetry can be easily  installed on every bike: ÃÂÃÂ downhill, enduro, cross country and e-bike.     Which bike will you choose today?    You can use BYB Telemetry at a downhill race on the weekend and then install it in five minutes on your e-bike for a lunch ride with your riding mates.ÃÂÃÂ      BYB Telemetry fits on every MTB         The sensors can be installed in two different configurations, using the same supports. BYB Telemetry can be mounted on any fork withÃÂÃÂ  maximum travel of 203 mm (8") .ÃÂÃÂ      Universal fork mounts         The rear sensor can be installed on every type of shock absorber, both air and spring based. Thanks to our universal support it can fit in the 99% of the frames. If it doesn't, we will design a pair of ad-hoc supports for your bike.ÃÂÃÂ The standard sensor has a  maximum travel range of 76mm (3") .ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ On request, we can provide a longer sensor for travel ranges up to 102mm (4").     Universal shock mounts               The weight of the system, below  500 g  ( 1.1 lbs ), and its dimensions allow you to keep the freedom to move on your bicycle unaltered. The sensor does not interfere with the motion of the suspension, neither with the rider movement.          Data analyzed by your smartphone or PC    BYB Telemetry communicates via  Wi-Fi  with your PC and smartphone.ÃÂÃÂ   An  advanced visualization software  for PC is provided for a precise and detailed analysis. It is thought mostly for professional, experienced riders and suspensionists.  Also, an  Android/iOS app  for the  automated setting   of the suspension ÃÂÃÂ is provided. It analyzes your ride and it tells you how to tune the adjustments to find the best set-up.  If you don't want to bring your smartphone on the trails, no worries. BYB Telemetry has an internal storage and you can analyze the runs anytime you want from your PC or smartphone.       BYB Telemetry provides two differents mode of use, in order to satisfy every rider needs:  1)  Basic setting . It allows you to reach a basic and flexible configurationÃÂÃÂ adaptable to the personal characteristics of the rider and most common trails.  2)  Track specific setting . It allows you to specifically tune the suspension in order to obtain the best performance on a specific track.  Both the basic and track specific setting allow you to select the proper  riding-style . It can be aggressive, comfort or basic.            BYB Telemetry has been designed to be  fast to install  and  easy-to-use .ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  Here are the steps to use BYB Telemetry:   1.  Install the universal support on your fork and shock.       ÃÂÃÂ  2.  Install both sensors on the respective mountings. Make sure to have enough travel of the sensors, to be the same (or higher) of the one of your suspension.        3.  Install the acquisition box on the handlebar and connect the cables coming from the sensors.        4.  No calibration is needed. Everything is ready. Press the button and...        ÃÂÃÂ 5.   RIDE!        ÃÂÃÂ  6.ÃÂÃÂ  Check the data on your laptop or smartphone and apply the adjustments to your suspension.        7.  Reiterate the steps from  4. ÃÂÃÂ and enjoy your perfectly balanced bike.  Automated suspension setting:       The automated suspension setting app allows you to find the best suspension set-up for you and your bike. Connect to your BYB Telemetry kit through our application, select the type of bike you are using and the setting mode (basic or track specific).ÃÂÃÂ   By selecting  basic setting, ÃÂÃÂ BYB Telemetry will analyze all the rides and will tell you the adjustment that needs to be made in order to tune the suspension. You can decide if your riding style is comfort, balanced or aggressive.  By selecting  track specific setting, ÃÂÃÂ BYB Telemetry will analyze the rides on a particular track, telling you the adjustments needed for reaching the best performance on that single track.  Visualization software:       The advanced analysis software allows you to visualize all the data acquired by BYB Telemetry, such as front and rear travel, GPS position, speed and the shocks at the handlebar.   By connecting your laptop via Wi-Fi with BYB Telemetry, you will automatically have access to all the saved runs. For example, you can visualize the percentage of travel that you used inside a particular section of the track, compare different runs by superimposing them and analyze how much the bike is "nervous" by looking at the shocks at the handlebar. The access to all these data will allow you to investigate how the bike responds, how stable it is and find a compromise between different set-up. All this will make you able to increase your overall performances.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             Technical aspects  BYB Telemetry analyses the data regarding the motion of the suspension. It detects the critical behaviour related to an incorrect suspension setting, such as:   Bouncing suspension (not enough damping)  Packing down (rebound too slow)ÃÂÃÂ   Bottoming outÃÂÃÂ   Incorrect SAG (static and dynamic)ÃÂÃÂ   Not using the whole travel of the suspensionÃÂÃÂ   Wrong balance between front and rear suspension  Critical peaks of acceleration at the handlebar   All these events are highlighted on the PC software, and the user can investigate them.You will be able to see when the bike bottoms out after that particular jump or when the fork is packing down in the braking-bumps before a corner. You will know precisely where and when it happens. You can decide to use the adjustment proposed from the software or decide to tune your suspension according to your expertise.ÃÂÃÂ   Furthermore, BYB Telemetry provides you with a report of useful statistical information about the ride, such as:   Average use of suspension(%)ÃÂÃÂ   Compression peaks (over 90 %)  Dynamic sagÃÂÃÂ   Static sagÃÂÃÂ   Number of jumpsÃÂÃÂ   Balance between fork and shockÃÂÃÂ   Number of acceleration peaks  Max and average compression/rebound speed   In the track specific mode, BYB Telemetry performs the same analysis of the basic settings, but it doesn't analyze only the single event but every cycle of compression and extension of your suspension. BYB Telemetry algorithm calculates which adjustment must be made to get the maximum performance on a specific track.  This is just the starting point. We will need your feedback for futures improvements and to add other metrics to our software.       If we reach the 35.000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ target we will include the video analysis in our software.With the video analysis you will be able to synchronize the video from your action cam to the data of BYB Telemetry. Such a feature is fundamental when the GPS signal is low and allows the undoubted identification of the obstacles on the track.ÃÂÃÂ   You can see in the video a render of how it will look like. It is a preliminary version that will be improved in terms of graphics when we will include this feature in the software.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             We will release a new version of the software after completing all the deliveries of BYB Telemetry to our backers.ÃÂÃÂ   The video analysis will be available in June/ July 2019.       We have always wanted to solve one of the biggest problems of the mountain bikers: how to find the best suspension set-up.  From the beginning, the clear idea was to create a premium product, entirely made in Italy, with CNC milled components, top-level motorsport sensor and professional visualization software.  We started collaborating with companies and universities. The first prototype was a proof of principle. From the second one, we reached almost the actual configuration. With the pre-series model, we optimized the layout and tested the final design. During the development process, we were able to reduce the size of the acquisition unit by the half from the initial one.       Designing the mounting brackets for the sensors required different version and prototypes. We tested out different layouts and materials to guarantee the possibility of mounting BYB Telemetry on every MTB.    The algorithms for the automated suspension set-up have been extensively developed and also tested on different bikes, tracks and riders.  BYB Telemetry has been  tested  down the legendary track "Black Snake"  in  Val di Sole   during the UCI downhill World Cup, where Enrico was a trailblazer.   We had the best return of our efforts when Enrico used the BYB Telemetry pre-series model in the race that proclaimed him national DH champion (overall amateur).             We are first friends than co-founders, and we share the same passions. We know each other from more than ten years, and we shared riding days not only on MTB but also with motorcycle and surf.   The realization of BYB Telemetry is not only the result of our work. We built a network of extremely expert professionals, and incredibly helpful people, from companies which are leaders in their sectors. Without them, the realization of BYB Telemetry would not have been possible.        That's how we want to bring BYB Telemetry to you. In case of a successful campaign, we will deliver you BYB telemetry for the beginning of the next riding season.ÃÂÃÂ                                Risks and challenges  We have been working on BYB Telemetry for more than two years. We have understood the technical, practical and financial challenges. We performed numerous testings in this time frame, and we overcome all the significant technical problems. We have established relationships with local manufacturers and supplier and the final product will be assembled in-house, thereby eliminating the problems that are common with delocalized production. We donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t only have a business-oriented relationship with our suppliers, but also a personal one.  We need to ultimate the final version of the software and developing the app for which we already have contacts and everything just need to be confirmed,in case of succesfull campaign. The algorithms for the automated suspension setting are ready, exaustively tested. Dealing and collaborating with companies which are the leader in their fields has given us much depth of knowledge in the development, production and financial aspects of this campaign.  Considering all of these aspects, we believe then that we can produce the required quantity in accordance with our timeline.   To ensure the delivery of a premium product, we keep a maximum volume of available kits in our Kickstarter campaign. By doing this, we want to have also a close relationship with our backers, providing a one-to-one support in the early stages of use of BYB Telemetry.  Keeping this small amount also guarantees a more straightforward logistic. We will be able to deal with the expeditions individually for every backer.  This journey to create something exceptional wouldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be possible without all the technical expertise that has been given to us from our collaborators and suppliers. We believe that we can guarantee you a straightforward delivery of a premium product.

Blurb: A new technology for measuring pollution along our coasts using biosensors and drones.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Vancouver-Canada:12 backers|White Rock-Canada:6 backers|Halifax-Canada:4 backers|Surrey-Canada:4 backers|Ottawa-Canada:3 backers|Victoria-Canada:3 backers|Winnipeg-Canada:2 backers|Montreal-Canada:2 backers|Fredericton-Canada:2 backers|Burlington-Canada:2 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |Canada:56 backers|United States:10 backers|United Kingdom:3 backers|Ireland:1 backer|Germany:1 backer|Israel:1 backer|Italy:1 backer|Japan:1 backer|Sweden:1 backer|Switzerland:1 backer
Creator_description: We are a small social enterprise supporting the people that protect our coasts and wetlands with great data and beautiful images.
Project_description: UPDATE: You did it!   Thank you all! Together we made history by becoming recipients of first federal research grant in Canada determined by our communities - through crowdfunding. An additional $37,500 will now be released, quadrupling your donations.ÃÂÃÂ   I'm looking forward to continuing the conservation during the next year as we begin our work on the ground.ÃÂÃÂ   If anyone would like to contribute but hasn't yet we have a (kind of) stretch goal: We will use extra cash to pay for additional tests and push our study area further up the Little Campbell River, helping us gain a clearer picture of where land-based sources of pollution are coming from.ÃÂÃÂ   I'm humbled by the incredible community that has come together around this project. Whether you have made a donation or helped spread the word on social media, we couldn't have done it without you. We'll be setting up a project blog, but until then you can stay up-to-date with this project by following us on Facebook @smartshores and Instagram @smartshores.  What we're doing, and why we need your help.  This project is developing a new tool that will reduce the cost of measuring coastal pollution. It will also help the Semiahmoo First Nation with comprehensive pollution testing of their estuary, moving them closer to reopening their shellfish fishery - closed since the 1970s due to pollution.  Your contribution will be used to pay for lab tests, fieldwork expenses and a small salary for PhD students involved in this project.   Each dollar you give will be quadrupled   by a federally-funded research granting agency,  MEOPAR .ÃÂÃÂ The tool that results from this project will support not-for-profits and NGOs working to protect the Salish Sea coast, and can be scaled up to support organizations anywhere in the world.ÃÂÃÂ   We are offering unique aerial images of the Salish Sea coast as rewards for the people helping make this project a reality. These images can be found in a gallery  here.   Our partners include the Semiahmoo First Nation, Ducks Unlimited, Friends of Semiahmoo Bay, the Shared Waters Society, the Semiahmoo Fish and Game Society, the Pacific Institute for the Mathematical Sciences and the Michael Smith Labs at the University of British Columbia.ÃÂÃÂ   Detailed information on this project is available below.ÃÂÃÂ      An estuary in the Salish Sea       We were featured on Bloomberg BNN and in the Globe and Mail!    Stand up for a healthy coast!ÃÂÃÂ   A healthy coast means less pollution, sustainable land use practices, healthy animals and healthy people. You can help repair and protect our common environment by putting the right tools in the hands of the people working hard to clean up and protect our shores. This is a pilot project in crowdfunded science and   every dollar you give will be quadrupled by a federally-funded research granting agency   (MEOPAR) to support the development of tools that will reduce the cost of pollution testing and mapping - but this project doesn't happen unless we hit our fundraising goal.ÃÂÃÂ If our campaign is successful we will produce a video giving you a look behind-the-scenes of this project and showcasing the stories of the people protecting our coast. We will also make our results public for all to see.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      Estuaries are big, pollution tests are expensive. Connecting tests with maps can save costs by interpolating the concentration of pollutants.    You can help make the coast healthier  This project will develop a low-cost test for fertilizers (organophosphates) and hydrocarbons stored in soil and clay. This tool will empower organizations with restricted budgets, like not-for-profits, to identify common pollutants in the areas they are working to protect and restore.  We will also develop an algorithm for predicting detailed pollution concentrations throughout a site that combines low-cost maps built by drones and soil/substrate test results. This will produce a detailed map of pollution hot spots, helping to identify where pollution is coming from and how it is flowing through a site.  Our goal is for these tools to be used anywhere, but before people use them they need to know they can trust the results. That's why we're also conducting a rigorous case study in Surrey, BC in collaboration with world-class research institutes and testing our approach in a real-world setting with great NGOs.ÃÂÃÂ   We are working with the  Michal Smith Labs at the University of British Columbia , the  Pacific Institute for the Mathematical Sciences  and  pollutiontracker.org  to produce world-class research that we submit for publication in peer-reviewed journals. We will work with the Semiahmoo First Nation,  Ducks Unlimited ,  A Rocha , the  Semiahmoo Fish and Game Club  and  Friends of Semiahmoo Bay  to ensure that the tools we develop are useful, user-friendly, and focused on providing actionable environmental management insights.     Drone-derived maps show elevations, sediments, vegetation, and soon - pollution     Real-World Impact   This project will have a direct impact on the health of the Little Campbell Estuary by providing needed pollution data to support environmental planning in this urban river and coastline that will support healthy salmon, cleaner shellfish, and safer food for Killer Whales and people.ÃÂÃÂ   It will also support the Semiahmoo First Nation in working toward re-opening their shellfish fishery. Shellfish are a source of traditional, local food for the Semiahmoo people and shellfish harvesting is an important way of teaching youth about their culture. The shellfish fishery in Semiahmoo territory has been closed due to pollution since the 1970s. Pollution levels in shellfish may be low enough today for the fishery to be reopened but this has not been tested due to costs. It remains illegal to harvest shellfish due to the potential risk to human health. If pollution levels in shellfish are found to be within acceptable limits the Semiahmoo Nation will have data to support the re-opening of their fishery. If not, they will know how polluted the shellfish are, where the pollution is coming from, and can plan for remediation with the aim of eventually re-opening the fishery.     Many pollutants are invisible, and hiding in the soil    Thank you!ÃÂÃÂ   Thank you for reading this far. Please read our FAQ and get in touch if you have any questions about this project, share this page with friends, and if you are able, make a donation for a healthy coast today.ÃÂÃÂ   More detailed information on the technical aspects of this project is available below. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      A channel flows through an estuary at low tide. At high tide, this sand is 4m under water.     What's happening on-site and in the lab  We will map the lower Little Campbell and estuary using drones, collect soil samples and take tissue samples from shellfish. The location of each soil and shellfish sample will be tagged with an ultra-high precision GPS unit. We'll then send these samples to a lab for comprehensive testing for over one-hundred contaminants (we will follow the sampling protocol used by Ocean Wise here: www.pollutiontracker.org).ÃÂÃÂ   Once we have lab results showing the type and concentration of pollutants at each sample location we will combine these data with our drone-derived map showing elevations, vegetation and substrate types. This will allow us to understand the slope and porosity of the terrain so that we can model how pollution transported in water (either directly or trapped in particles) flows through and accumulates within a site. We will then build a mathematical model that uses a subset of these pollution samples to interpolate the concentration of pollutants throughout the site. By using a selection of GPS tagged lab results we can use this model to predict how much pollution is where. This helps identify pollution hot-spots while reducing the number of tests needed per site to do so and the first step in reducing the cost of pollution testing.ÃÂÃÂ   The second step in reducing the cost of pollution testing is to develop a low-cost test for identifying the presence and amount of key pollutants, like pesticides and hydrocarbons. We will do this by testing and refining a prototype biosensor. A biosensor is an organism (in this case a bacteria) that is modified to fluoresce (glow) when it comes into contact with a certain substance (more on this below, in the last section called  For science nerds like us ). We will field-test prototype tools that are similar to a litmus paper but instead of measuring acidity they will measure pesticides and hydrocarbons. This cheap tool can be brought into the field and used to detect the presence and concentration of pollutants within minutes of sampling. In some cases, this will be enough information to support environmental management planning. In cases where this is not enough it will help practitioners identify where, and how many, samples are needed to be collected and sent to the lab. This will reduce the number of samples taken in the field and reduce testing costs.ÃÂÃÂ    For science nerds like us...   In case you were wondering what's under the hood of a biosensor, we're building what's called a Whole Cell Bioindicator (WCB). A WCB is made from a  Escherichia coli  BL21(DE3) protein expression host strain that is transformed with a plasmid pIDR containing:  - A pollutant-sensitive transcriptional regulator gene ( pstr ) encoded on the coding strand under the control of a constitutive promoter (pC). This gene encodes the PSTR protein, which can bind the pollutant of interest. Upon binding, a conformational change in the PSTR-pollutant complex allows binding to the pPSTR promoter-operator region of the fluorescent reporter gene eliciting the concentration-dependent response (as fluorescence).  - A green fluorescent protein ( gfp ) reporter gene, encoded on the template strand, under the control of the PSTR-regulator promoter operator region (pPSTR). This gene encodes the sfGFP fluorescent protein with excitation and emission maxima of 488nm and 530nm, respectively.  - An antibiotic (ampicillin) resistance marker gene  ApR   - A pMB1 origin of replication  This vector was previously designed and synthesized to respond to certain members of the organophosphate family of pesticides chlorpyrifos, ethyl/methyl paraoxon, ethyl/methyl parathion and diazinon, using the  pstr  gene  ChpR 1. We will be testing a field-kit version of this and synthesizing a new WCB to respond to a key pollutant to be determined following our analysis of lab results during this project.ÃÂÃÂ   For more info on this process, and on the mathematical modelling of pollution throughout a site based on drone maps please donate and follow our progress! :DÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  This project involves the production of a video, scientific research that will identify and map pollutants, and the development of a new technique to make this process more efficient. While we hope to produce final products that can be commercially available, this project budget does not cover industrial design. As a result, the final tools we produce may provide value-added support to people working in the field rather than being stand-alone commercial products.

Project_Community_top_countries: |Germany:30 backers|Switzerland:10 backers|Austria:4 backers|United Kingdom:4 backers|United States:4 backers|South Korea:2 backers|Canada:1 backer|China:1 backer|France:1 backer|Singapore:1 backer
Creator_description: TrickstuffTrickstuff started in 2001 and the first brake of the Company was introduced in the same year. 'The Cleg' stood out as a high end brake ahead of its time. The companies hydraulic gyro the 'Trixer' was famous amongst dirt jumpers around the world and Trickstuff brakepads are known to improve any brake ever since. In 2009 an engineer and cyclist from Freiburg - Klaus Liedler -joined the company and paved the path for new products and ideas. The success of the Direttissima is a turning point in the companies history. As a bunch of bike lovers who just want to make great parts and ride our bikes we suddenly felt like the center of bike enthusiasts attention around the globe. It took some time to adjust but we do love it and want to keep earning this.
Project_description: The company Trickstuff has been making brakes for 17 years now. During all this time Trickstuff has not only built brakes in Germany but has always produced extraordinary and test winning brake pads and other bike parts. 10 years ago, Klaus Liedler joined the company and has pushed the development and evolution of all our products. 3 years ago the Direttissima brake marked the start of a new chapter in the company's history.ÃÂÃÂ    Fromit's introduction, the Direttissima's value has been proven on many occasions. World cup riders are putting it to the test on the highest levels of the sport. Amateurs abuse it on a daily basis. The international bike media praises it as the best brake you can buy for money. Its reputation is growing constantly, and the demand rises just as fast.ÃÂÃÂ   You can read about the Direttissima if you click on the links below:            ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ              The Direttissima -  strong, prooven and beautiful     It has bothered us that the Direttissima is not undisputed when it comes to the title of "Highest Braking Power" even though it is considered the brake that needs the least arm strength. The Sram Code, Magura MT7, and especially Formula Cura4 are strong contenders depending on the measuring method.ÃÂÃÂ   We wanted to push the boundaries and see if we could not only make a brake that is undoubtedly stronger than anything we've known so far but is still reasonably light and does not stop you like a stick between your spokes. Reliable, intuitive modulation is a Must-Have for any brake. This is why we set out to create the MAXIMA.     The MAXIMA!     The MAXIMA - stronger for better riding.ÃÂÃÂ    We've often been asked if stronger brakes are necessary. In the end all real Mountainbike brakes are strong enough to lock your wheels and allow you to skid around. More force will not help with that. That is correct but that is not what this is about.ÃÂÃÂ   We all know how forearms and fingers feel after a great day in the bike park. The arms hurt, you can't stretch your fingers, every bump on the trail tests your strength and your front suspension doesn't feel as sensitiveÃÂÃÂ  as it did at the start of the day.ÃÂÃÂ   The Maxima can help with that.ÃÂÃÂ   The diagram below shows the result of a comparison of the Maxima and other brakes on the market. The Maxima doesn't help you by being able to lock up a wheel even stronger. It helps you by needing way less finger power to get there. The dotted line represents an assumed braking power at which your wheel would lock up under certain conditions. As you can see, you will need different amounts of finger strength with different brakes. Below this dotted line is your "working range" of applied finger strength or used braking power in real life situations. The Maxima allows you to work with a lot less of your own strength.     Dyno test results of the MAXIMA compared to other brakes. These tests were done in our own facility on our own dyno.    This will spare your forearms and fingers. You will have more strength to hold on to your bars and take the hits that your suspension passes on to you. You will be able to ride longer and/or harder. It will be easier to modulate the braking power, and your suspension fork will feel even better.     How does the MAXIMA work? - All features explained       Brake Master Cylinder (BMC)      Lever and piston rod pivoting on 4 ball bearings:ÃÂÃÂ  Pivots are free of wear and friction, perfect modulation, highest reliability   Additional teflon support ring next to secondary seal:  Prevents aluminum piston from rubbing against the cylinder bore for a wear free piston.   Anodized BMC piston bore: Piston bore free from wear:ÃÂÃÂ  no black brake fluid after months of riding   Lever CNCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d from aviation aluminium (7075 T6):ÃÂÃÂ  Solid lever design with high stability against breaking andbending, comfortable lever surface    Moderate toggle lever kinematics:ÃÂÃÂ  Continuously increasing brake power ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> from tenderbraking at low finger force to immense power at increased finger force    Large support of BMC housing towards handle bar:ÃÂÃÂ  Strong but tender clamping of delicate carbonhandle bars    Reservoir volume 3 ml(biggest reservoir):ÃÂÃÂ  Caliper pistons self-adjust until final wear of thepads    Tool free rach adjustment:  On-the-fly brake set up.ÃÂÃÂ Large reach adjustment range ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> fits very small tovery big hands   Pad clearance0.15 mm/side: ÃÂÃÂ Perfect compromise between enough pad clearancefor rub free caliper adjustment and fast acting leverstroke    No dead stroke adjustment: ÃÂÃÂ The common dead stroke adjusters (ÃÂÃÂ»FreestrokeÃÂÃÂ«,ÃÂÃÂ»Pad contact adjustmentÃÂÃÂ«ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦) only control the leverstroke, but never control the pad clearance. Racerswish to have a short lever stroke.Every MAXIMA is tuned to feature a minimalstroke. There is no adjustment needed.    Clearly defined bite point:ÃÂÃÂ  Even when the lever reach is adjusted close to thehandlebar the lever wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t touch the grip    Stable bite point:ÃÂÃÂ  TrickstuffÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s disc rotorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s high thermal capacityabsorbs most of the brake heat and thus protectsthe caliper and the brake fluid (BIONOL) fromoverheating. Precise machining of all componentscauses the bite point to remain at the same place,even under changing loads.ÃÂÃÂ     Brake fluid: Trickstuff/Danico BIONOL: ÃÂÃÂ Best in class in lubrication, fluidity, compressibility.Highest boiling point (420ÃÂÃÂ°C). Not aggressive topaint. Easy bleeding. WorldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s only biodegradablehydraulic brake fluid    Compatible to all triggers and Grip Shift:ÃÂÃÂ  Offers enough space for ergonomic trigger and GripShift mounting.    Interfaces for Shimano and SRAM triggerdirect mount available: ÃÂÃÂ Weight saving, clean cockpit, perfect ergonomics    4 Piston MXA Caliper     Four polished stainless steel pistons(2 x 16 mm, 2 x 17 mm): ÃÂÃÂ Not only for more power but also for good heat insulation, reduces danger of boilingbrake fluid in caliper.   Extremely low tolerances of piston bore: ÃÂÃÂ Pistons do not tilt, reliable and symmetrical pistonself-adjustment and retraction.    Two piece caliper with rock solid CNCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d yoke bolts,7 mm fine thread: ÃÂÃÂ Narrow profile; high pre-tension of yoke bolts formaximum stiffness and hard, clear bite point atlow weightÃÂÃÂ     Material: high modulus aviation aluminum 7075T6,completely CNCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d:ÃÂÃÂ  Stiffness and long term stability, no material fatigue    Inside hose connector:ÃÂÃÂ  Protection against breakaway of hose    Brake Hose     Goodridge Braided Steel Hose:ÃÂÃÂ  Highest quality brake hose, extremely low expansionfor very firm bite point, turn in smallest radius,stands highest mechanical and thermal loads.Available in various colours. Weight 57grams/meter,diameter 5.8mm. max pressure 1050 bar    Design     Entirely CNCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d, anodized finish:ÃÂÃÂ  Perfect look, mat-shiny surface, dirt repelling     Brake Pads     Hope V4 pad shape:  Available worldwide   Large pad surface and long profile: ÃÂÃÂ Even pad pressure and pad wear, no pad tilting, silent and durable operation   Pad compound Trickstuff POWER: ÃÂÃÂ Highest power, low wear, low cost, extremely shortbed in time, organic compound. The best compoundwe have ever made.    DÃÂÃÂ¤chle Disc rotors     Full steel but ultralight rotors in three sizes: 180/203/223 mm: ÃÂÃÂ Brake can be adapted to any intended use by choosingthe appropriate size ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> one brake fits all!ÃÂÃÂ     Size specific rotor thickness:ÃÂÃÂ  As light as possible, as solid as necessary. Highbrake power even under heavy duty conditions. Nowarping of the disc even under high thermal stress    WorldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s only ÃÂÃÂ»DÃÂÃÂ¤chleÃÂÃÂ« chamfer on outer profile: ÃÂÃÂ Eases wheel installation, mainly of the rear wheel.Rounded edges reduce risk of injury (Chamfer not on 223 mm rotor)    Sophisticated hole pattern:ÃÂÃÂ  Pad cleaning throughout the entire surface, highestbrake power even under high load and temperature.     Facts     Made in Germany:  Above 90% of the parts come from south west Germany. Assembly is done completely in the black forest capital Freiburg.ÃÂÃÂ    Weight:  290 grams (bled with Bionol, 80 cm hose length, w/o rotors and mounting hardware)    We are not the only ones who are excited               ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ                                                               Why did we choose Kickstarter?  As we have described above the demand for our Direttissima is still growing. Also, our Piccola - the lightest hydraulic disc brake on the market - has made a name for itself. From an economic point of view, we do not have to make the MAXIMA, we might even be creating competition within our own product range. Is there a demand for a brake like the MAXIMA? It is super strong, exquisite, beautiful and comes with a price tag. Made in Germany, built in small quantities...ÃÂÃÂ   But we really want to realise the MAXIMA. After all, we are just bike lovers who want to create the most fantastic bike parts. This is why we have decided to involve you into our decision-making process and started this Kickstarter campaign. You can be part of it and make it come true.  We do already have working prototypes, that ran through all stages of production as they will be in the future. The brakes have been ridden by  Mick Hannah  and  Nina Hoffmann  in the Downhill World cup and the Downhill World Championships. Our Trail & Trial Rider  Jakob Breitwieser  is proving the incredible modulation of the MAXIMA on a daily basis.ÃÂÃÂ   Nina received her Prototype three day before the world championships finals in Lenzerheide 2018. She had two days of practice with the new brake when we surprised her with this little interview.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             The question now is, if it is economically wise to undertake a full production run. If we reach the goal, we will build a batch of brakes for supporters of this project. They will be built in the beginning of 2019. The exact time frame will be communicated once it is known how many brakes will have to be build. The first batch of MAXIMA is limited only to our professional team riders and the supporters of this campaign. It will only be available to others months after our supporters have received their brakes.        Risks and challenges  There are two challenges during this project:  Our growing company has run into problems regarding workflow when the demand for Direttissima and Piccola skyrocketed. This resulted in long waiting periods for our customers. The limitation of the first batch to this campaign will minimize this problem and allow a smooth integration of the MAXIMA into our product range.  The second problem is the demand for the MAXIMA. High end products with unequalled performance always get a lot of attention. We have had more media requests and more social media interactions regarding the MAXIMA than we have had for any other product ever before. But how many people will buy it? We thought about producing a limited amount, but we would rather have you decide and provide everyone with a MAXIMA who wants to buy one.

Project_description: Blockchain IronÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Crypto Coin Vault is an offline cold storage wallet for cryptocurrencies.            Nearly Indestructible: Fire, Water, and EMP Resistant   Secure  Offline Storage of Cryptocurrency  Made from Highest-Quality Artisanal Materials to Convey Style & Value  Simple & Efficient Near-Instant Deposit of Funds  Customizable Copper Disks for Secure Key Storage via Split Keys  Compatible with All Cryptocurrency Exchanges Such as Coinbase & Kraken       Stainless Steel and Brass Wallet    The Crypto Coin Vault from Blockchain Iron is an impeccably crafted metal coin that never connects to a computer, never needs charging, and is nearly indestructible. ÃÂÃÂ        One of the biggest issues with cryptocurrencies is that they can be lost forever if your private key is not properly protected against cyber vulnerabilities and physical destruction. With the Crypto Coin Vault from Blockchain Iron, your cryptocurrency can be securely stored offline and out of reach of both physical harm and cyber theft. ÃÂÃÂ      Stainless Steel and Brass Wallet    The Crypto Coin Vault is manufactured in the U.S. with patent-pending split key technology which enables you to create your own hand-selected personal key so that access is restricted and inaccessible to others. By splitting your private key across multiple discs that can be engraved or stamped, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve heightened the layers of security to keep your investment secure. The ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>public keyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ QR code is printed on transparent stickers and applied by the user to allow quick deposits and verification of your wallet value. ÃÂÃÂ      Public key 3d barcode sticker    Beyond the ingenious storage and security measures, Crypto Coin Vault from Blockchain Iron has second-to-none craftsmanship that will look right at home among your most prized possessions. Made from top-quality metals, including a version in Damascus Steel, the Crypto Coin Vault has a satisfying weight and shape that immediately communicates value without anyone ever knowing exactly what your personal vault holds.     Available in brass, aluminum and custom damascus     COLD STORAGE METAL WALLET  Blockchain IronÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s physical metal cold storage wallet allows your cryptocurrencies to be stored in a container that is safe from both physical and cyber harm. The clever construction of the coins allows your private key to be physically separated into a split-list, which allows for even more secure storage and transfer of your cryptocurrency.        METAL PRIVATE KEY  The Blockchain Iron wallet has patent-pending split key technology which includes multiple copper private key disks that can be physically engraved or stamped. As an added security measure, you have the option of transporting the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>security keyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ layers in separate parts to further protect your cryptocurrency.     Hand stampable copper private key disks     YOUR TOTAL BACKUP  USB hardware wallets such as Trezor and Ledger Nano are convenient options, however, those devices ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> along with all of your stored cryptocurrencies ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> are easily destroyed by water, fire, malfunction, or other unforeseen disasters. The Crypto Coin Vault from Blockchain Iron protects its stored value by backing up your private key or BIP39 mnemonic in our impeccably crafted cold storage wallet.        SECURITY IS PRIORITY  Unlike traditional currency in a bank, there are no recovery options if your cryptocurrency secret key is lost or stolen. Protect your assets from theft and destruction by securely storing them on a Crypto Coin Vault from Blockchain Iron.ÃÂÃÂ    Store Private Keys Offline  BIP39, PINs, and Passwords  Split Key Technology  Backup your Trezor or Nano BIP39 Keys  Fire, EMP, and Water Proof         A WALLET WORTHY INVESTMENT  Each coin is meticulously crafted to the finest standards. Select from brass, titanium, copper, aluminum, and even custom Damascus steel options to express your personal style and tastefully convey the true value of your crypto investments.     Custom Damascus Steel Cap     PROTECTION FROM HACKING  An offline system is the only way to protect your cryptocurrency from being stolen or lost due to technical failure, hackers, or zombie apocalypse.        THE PERFECT GIFT  Never risk forgetting your PIN while also giving your loved one's peace of mind in the event that they need to access your cryptocurrency with our patent-pending offline storage wallet. The Crypto Coin Vault from Blockchain Iron makes a perfect gift for the tech- and the money-savvy person in your life who already has it all. This physical representation of any cryptocurrency can be given as an empty wallet or pre-loaded in seconds with the cryptocurrency of your choice by using the public wallet QR code to create a modern-day gift card that can be used indefinitely.          NO 3RD PARTY ACCESS TO YOUR PRIVATE KEYS  To keep total private control of your key, use our metal hand stamp kits to emboss your private keys onto the internal spit key crypto disks. This option ensures no 3rd party access to your private key.     Hand stamp kit for private key                 Risks and challenges  In the event of production or delivery delays, we will  keep you well informed at any time until you have received your Blockchain Iron Wallet.  Basic understanding of cryptocurrencies and the generation of wallets is expected.  Please feel free to contact us to get any information you need. At any time.

Creator_description: My name is Michael Kukoff. My partner and I have created a line of best in class cleaning products that we know will disrupt the cleaning product industry. We offer a unique revolutionary proprietary scrubbing sponge that stops the growth of bacteria with anti-microbial agents and the mighty proprietary Invisoshield which stops food particles from entering the sponge. Not only is this sponge significantly healthier than the sponge you are already using, but it is also more sustainable because it will last much longer than your current sponge, putting less waste into the world. And the kit comes with a super concentrated gentle natural soap and reusable bottle that just adds to our importance of reducing the footprint in our world.
Project_description: What the heck is Ares Kit?        We have a confession: We hate washing dishes. Actually, 99% of people hate washing dishes. And that got us thinking: What can we do to improve the dishwashing experience? All along, the answer was right there in front of us, soaking up germs...like a sponge.ÃÂÃÂ   ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s taken years. Many noble sponges were sacrificed, but we kept at it and have now forged a weapon that scrubs the way to victory. This is the Ares Kit. Armed with a concentrated natural soap, a reusable dispenser, and a long-lasting, antimicrobial sponge, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll quickly slay the chore of dishwashing and send fewer sponges and soap bottles to the landfill.  ÃÂÃÂ  Sponges? Really?? ÃÂÃÂ         ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a block party of bacteria on your dishes and you didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t even know you were invited.  ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s not until the scent of darkness creeps in that most people toss their trusty kitchen buddy away. By then, those amorphous blobs of doom have won.ÃÂÃÂ   Your average sponge should really be thrown out after 2 weeks, assuming they can even stand up to the onslaught of grime and grease. Seriously, if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re someone who cooks often, on some days it must look like ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>DishmageddonÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ in your kitchen. ThereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no way a flimsy sponge isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t going to get vanquished.ÃÂÃÂ   But whoÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s thinking about the durability and cleanliness of sponges? The answer might surprise you: no one. No one thinks about sponges. And weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re going to change that. Really, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re going to make this a thing.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  What's in the box? ÃÂÃÂ        Boasting one-of-a-kind dual protection, our sponge stops the growth of bacteria with antimicrobial agents and the mighty  InvisoShieldÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ . The InvisoShieldÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ slashes through the nastiest grime as it blocks the invasion of food particles that feed the enemy. This enhances durability, allowing you to hold on to your sponge for longer, and reduce the number of sponges you send to the landfill.ÃÂÃÂ        Plus, with a concentrated natural soap and a reusable dispenser in your armory, you shrink your carbon footprint and polish off your dishes in no time. We can all agree that itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more fun to spend time with people than pots or pans. Get back to living your life.   Nice!! So how does it work?   With our subscription model, we cater to your needs and make things super convenient and super easy. Your kit of 2 sponges (one for the kitchen, one for around the house), dish soap, and a towel, comes delivered right to your door. You set the frequency, so you get what you want, when you want it. And best of all, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll never have to think about buying sponges or dish soap again.ÃÂÃÂ         Saving the planet while scrubbing the villains into oblivion feels great.  But it feels even better when you know youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re getting best-in-class fire power at the best value.ÃÂÃÂ    Ares Kit: Origins   Being in the cleaning product business, we see 2 major problems with manufacturers and big brands:ÃÂÃÂ     They design products that fall apart too quickly.ÃÂÃÂ       They produce products with little regard to the environment.ÃÂÃÂ     We couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t stand by and watch this continue to happen. No, not on our watch. We have a family and planet to protect. After years of perseverance, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve managed to create an environment-friendly cleaning kit that will help people live cleaner, healthier lives. Once you try our products, particularly our sponge, you wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to use any others.  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re proud to say that most of our products are manufactured in the USA at our facility in Newark, NJ, and we want to keep it that way. We still have a long battle ahead of us, but with your support on Kickstarter and our expertise in manufacturing, we can purchase the components and materials needed to produce our first 1,000 kits at a competitive price.ÃÂÃÂ   WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d love for you to be among the first to revolutionize the cleaning industry. Help Ares Kit make a difference.ÃÂÃÂ         Let me get those sweet, sweet rewards                 Risks and challenges  Our biggest challenge is facing the potential lack of enthusiasm that consumers have towards cleaning products. Most people arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t excited about tackling household chores, especially washing the dishes. But doing the dishes doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to be a pain. Ares Kit was born to conquer dishwashing quickly, leaving your dishes cleaner than ever before. And youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a massive fist bump from the planet for sending fewer sponges and soap bottles to the trash heap. Nothing feels better than protecting your loved ones and the environment they call home. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s something we can all agree on.   So, are you on board? Great! However, we do have one more big favor to ask of you: Please be patient. In order to give you the very best product for the best value, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll need 2-3 months of lead time in production. Remember, most of Ares Kit is manufactured in the US with an adherence to the highest standards of quality. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a herculean effort that takes time, but we wouldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have it any other way. Seeing how much people love the Ares Kit makes it all worthwhile.  Thank you for your understanding and continued support.

Blurb: AquaShield is the most advanced system that helps you to monitor and control your hydroponics or aquaponics setup.

Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:10 backers|Hungary:6 backers|United Kingdom:2 backers|United Arab Emirates:1 backer|Austria:1 backer|Denmark:1 backer|France:1 backer|Ghana:1 backer|Germany:1 backer|South Korea:1 backer
Creator_description: AquaShield founder GÃÂÃÂ¡bor Sulcz is an engineer with an urge to improve and optimize all things around, in particular to projects that could really improve people's quality of life.
Project_description: Hydroponics ÃÂÃÂ and  aquaponics could save the world ! If you are familiar with these growing techniques, you know the benefits, but also quite familiar with the weakness of these gardening techniques.ÃÂÃÂ   These delicately balanced eco-systems are easy to fail, so you have to check all the key-parameters and specifics on a daily basis to keep everything under control.   AquaShield  changes this and  launch your hydroponics or aquaponics garden to the 21st century .ÃÂÃÂ We believe, that  AquaShield is the world's most advanced monitoring and controlling device for hydroponics and aquaponics .            AquaShield  includes various sensors  to keep track vital factors in your garden's environment, such as  temperature ,  pH  or  conductivity . The system also measures  water levels, activates pumps  to circulate the water and controls light intensity to boost Your gardenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s vitality.ÃÂÃÂ        AquaShield can  host up to 15 sensors to monitor  your mini environment:ÃÂÃÂ             For  getting total control  of Your mini environment, AquaShiled is also able to control  8 high voltage relays . Redundant water pumps, controlled grow lights, additional heating are not challenges for AquaShield.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        AquaShield could be  connected to the internet  through LAN or WIFI. Thanks to this feaure, you could get  real time data  about your hydroponic or aquaponic system, no matter where you are. If you don't want to connect your device to the net, you could run AquaShield on it's own.ÃÂÃÂ        But there's much more that AquaShield is capable of: through the  web app , you could  control the 8 relays or create rules ,  according to which your garden is functioning by. ÃÂÃÂ        Since there is a ton of information about your system's health it is easy to get lost in data or even miss an important event just because of the massive data flow.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Therefore we  created alerts  and  notifications . In AquaShield's web app you can set up alerts and create workflows in case such events happen, like your PH spikes. In a traditional hydroponic or aquaponic setup it will take at least a day to recognize this (also it is possible that you only take PH sample in every 2 days).ÃÂÃÂ   With AquaShield you could  get an email  and / or a  notification  to your phone immediately so you will have more time to act.       This function will give you free hand to  create your own cycle setups . Eg. turn on the #1 cycle pump for 15 minutes at every hour, than wait 30 minutes and turn on #2 cycle pump for 15 minutes.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Or turn on the grow lights for 18 hours at every morning but after 4 week (when germination stage is over) drop it to 12 hours per day.ÃÂÃÂ   With  AquaShield  you can  create complex jobs  for your garden in seconds.       AquaShield is the  4th iteration of our original idea , and through the prototypes we realized that different applications would need different setups: Eg. for aquaponics it is necessary to measure PH or dissolved oxygen in the fish tank or check the moisture of the growing media, but for hydroponics your essential data for maintaining a high performance is measure electrical conductivity (EC) and temperature of the circulated liquid.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   For these reasons we decided to  build AquaShield as a modular project . With this concept in mind we divided the whole system to  3 submodules :ÃÂÃÂ        All modules are connected through  CAN BUS communication , and you could  add several same type modules  for your setup if needed (eg. a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Sensor module #1ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ could gather data from max. 4 sensors, so if you would like to have 6 PH sensor you can add another ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Sensor module #1ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and connect the 2 remaining sensors there).ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   For keeping the costs at the minimum, we decided to use DIN RAIL for mounting and connecting the modules. Also you would be able to add cheap power supplies, industrial relays or high voltage sockets. You  won't need any fancy parts  to start up your project.ÃÂÃÂ        This is the brain of the project. Actually itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a container for the  BRAIN . This module  holds a Raspberry Pi  that runs the software for the AquaShield ControlÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s operation (we call this package  AquaShield Connect  because you will be able to reach your device ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> through internet ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> with this).ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Also the MAIN CONTROL MODULE holds all the  controllable relays (8)  for pumps, grow lights, air pumps, heaters, feeders or any type of device you would like to control via your AquaShield.ÃÂÃÂ        In addition, this module would hold connectors to  detect water level switch states ÃÂÃÂ (so if your water level drops below minimum, you could receive a warning to your phone or create a workflow based on this warning).ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        This module is in charge for  checking all the vital parameters  of the water you cycle in your system. The module could hold 4 sensors that could be:ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     PH  sensorÃÂÃÂ    EC  sensor (electrical conductivity)ÃÂÃÂ    DO  sensor (dissolved oxygen)ÃÂÃÂ    ORP  sensor (oxidation reduction potential)   This module is  highly variable . ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s possible to set up the module with 4 different sensors, but you can choose to have only one sensor or even 4 sensor from the same type. It is possible, because the sensor controlling circuits are removable and changeable.ÃÂÃÂ        This module has regular  BNC connectors , so you would easily connect your available  PH ,  EC  (electrical conductivity),  ORP  (oxidation reduction potential) or  DO  (dissolved oxygen) probes. Since these probes work at the same principle you should get the same results but if you ask us, we recommend  Atlas Scientific devices !ÃÂÃÂ   Since we started the AquaShield project, we always used  Atlas Scientific's  products as benchmarks and we could only say the best about them.       We do not have an official reward for this, but please let us know, if you would  need probes (PH, EC, ORP  or  DO) for your setup , so we could work out a partnership with Atlas Scientific (and you could get a discount).ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        This module is responsible to check all other  environmental factors . It is able to  receive data from 4 temperature , a  light - and a  humidity  sensor.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        It connects to the other units through CAN BUS and you could also jumper the module (so you can link together even 16 Sensor module #2 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> if you want to).ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        The SENSOR MODULE #2 comes with it's own  extension , which is a  light intensity  and  humidity sensor . Light measuring could be tricky, so we wanted be sure, that you could place the light/humidity sensor, where ever you like.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Also you could chain up multiple sensors, so you could  map your garden  and optimize your planting.       We  wanted to create a product  for both  hobbyist  and  professional users . For this, the AquaShield has to be a hightech, yet affordable system with outstanding monitoring and controlling features.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   To satisfy every need, we created four different packages:   AQUASHIELD FULL CONTROL   We created this package for hobbyist who struggle controlling their hydroponics or aquaponics setup.ÃÂÃÂ        This package contains:ÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD MAIN CONTROL MODULE    2 X WATER LEVEL SWITCH    With this module's  8 controllable relays  it will be easy to set up the  perfect cycling routine  or program your grow lights, vents etc. Also you will be able to set up 6 water level switches, so you could monitor all your fish and sump tanks easily.   PRICE: ÃÂÃÂ  215 $  (Early Bird from 175 $)   Note:  This package  does NOT come with a Rapsberry , please add  65$ ÃÂÃÂ if you want a preconfigured Raspberry (the AquaShield Connect software will be avaliable as a free download, so if you already have a Raspberry Pi at home, you could just use that).ÃÂÃÂ    Note:  The setup is expandable so if you want to add more modules in the future, it will be easy to connect them to the MAIN CONTROL MODULE.   AQUASHIELD BEGINNER   With this package you will get a module for  checking the PH and EC   for monitoring your system's health, as well as  8 controllable relays  and a couple of  water level switches .ÃÂÃÂ        This package contains:ÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD MAIN CONTROL MODULEÃÂÃÂ     2 X WATER LEVEL SWITCHÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD SENSOR MODULE #1     PH MODULE  (for SENSOR MODULE #1)   ECÃÂÃÂ MODULE  (for SENSOR MODULE #1)    PRICE: 475 $  (early bird from 395 $)   Note:  This package does  NOT come with a Rapsberry , please add  65$ ÃÂÃÂ if you want a preconfigured RaspberryÃÂÃÂ (the AquaShield Connect software will be avaliable as a free download, so if you already have a Raspberry Pi at home, you could just use that).    Note:  The setup is expandable so if you want to add more modules in the future, it will be easy to connect them. Also you could add  2 more probe module  (like ORP or Dissolved Oxygen) to the SENSOR MODULE #1 in the future.   Note:  This package  does NOT contain any PH or EC probes. ÃÂÃÂ Please let us know, if you need probes for your setup.   AQUASHIELD INTERMEDIATEÃÂÃÂ    With this package you will get a module for  checking the PH and EC for monitoring your system's health . You will also be able to  check the temperature, humidity and light intensity  of your environment. There is  8 controllable relays  as well as  2 water level switches .       ÃÂÃÂ This package contains:ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD MAIN CONTROL MODULE  ÃÂÃÂ     2 X WATER LEVEL SWITCH ÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD SENSOR MODULE #1ÃÂÃÂ     PH MODULE (for SENSOR MODULE #1)ÃÂÃÂ     EC MODULE (for SENSOR MODULE #1)ÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD SENSOR MODULE #2    2 X TEMPERATURE PROBE (DS18B20)    LIGHT INTESITY / HUMIDITY EXTENSION (forÃÂÃÂ SENSOR MODULE #2)        PRICE: 710 $  (early bird from 590 $)   Note : This package does  NOT come with a Rapsberry , please add  65$ ÃÂÃÂ if you want a preconfigured Raspberry (the AquaShield Connect software will be avaliable as a free download, so if you already have a Raspberry Pi at home, you could just use that).   Note:  The setup is highly expandable. You can chain up multiple LIGHT INTESITY / HUMIDITY modules, so you could map your garden and optimize your plants' location. Also you could add 2 more probe module (like ORP or Dissolved Oxygen) to the SENSOR MODULE #1 in the future.ÃÂÃÂ    Note:  This package does  NOT contain any probes . Please let us know, if you need probes for your setup.  AQUASHIELD EXPERT ÃÂÃÂ   With this pumped-up package you will get everything that AquaShield could provide. This package includes all modules: It is capable of  checking the PH and EC AND ORP and DO (Dissolved Oxygen) . You will also be able to  check the temperature, humidity and light intensity  of your environment. There is  8 controllable relays  as well as  2 water level switches .        ÃÂÃÂ This package contains:ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ AQUASHIELD MAIN CONTROL MODULEÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ 2 X WATER LEVEL SWITCHÃÂÃÂ     AQUASHIELD SENSOR MODULE #1ÃÂÃÂ     PH MODULE (for SENSOR MODULE #1)ÃÂÃÂ     EC MODULE (for SENSOR MODULE #1)ÃÂÃÂ     ORP MODULE (for SENSOR MODULE #1)     DO MODULE (for SENSOR MODULE #1)     AQUASHIELD SENSOR MODULE #2ÃÂÃÂ     2 X TEMPERATURE PROBE (DS18B20)ÃÂÃÂ     LIGHT INTESITY / HUMIDITY SENSOR (for SENSOR MODULE #2)     PRICE: ÃÂÃÂ  775 $  (early bird from 650 $)   Note:  This package does  NOT come with a Rapsberry , please add  65$ ÃÂÃÂ if you want a preconfigured Raspberry (the AquaShield Connect software will be avaliable as a free download, so if you already have a Raspberry Pi at home, you could just use that).   Note:  The setup is highly expandable. You can chain up multiple LIGHT INTESITY / HUMIDITY modules, so you could map your garden and optimize your plants' location.ÃÂÃÂ    Note:  This package does  not contain any probes ,ÃÂÃÂ Please let us know, if you need probes for your setup.  THE AQUASHIELD BRAIN  AquaShield is a complex project for sure! It's a  controlling  and  monitoring  device with  real time data  and ÃÂÃÂ sophisticated alerting features.ÃÂÃÂ    To keep the costs at the minimum but also be able to handle all these complex tasks, we turned to an old friend: theÃÂÃÂ  Rasperry Pi !ÃÂÃÂ    Raspberry Pi  is a  powerful microcomputer , that provides a wide variety of accesible functions, such as running a local server, video streaming etc. and it comes with a reasonable price!  Our  Raspberry Pi  is located in the  MAIN CONTROL MODULE:        The Raspberry Pi runs our own software, the  AquaShield Connect , thatÃÂÃÂ will be available as a  free download , so if you already have a Raspberry Pi at home, you could just use that device.ÃÂÃÂ   If you don't have a spare Raspberry at home, you can have aÃÂÃÂ  Raspberry Pi  with a  class 10 SD card  (pre-installed  AquaShield Connect ):       You only have to  add 65 $  whichever rewards you choose.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        We believe in  transparency  and  open communicatio n so we created a bunch of  demonstration videos  for showing that AquaShield is really working and not just a concept or a prototype. We hope that these videos will dispel all your doubts (if you have any) and  give you the confidence to back our project !  TESTING THE RELAYSÃÂÃÂ   In this video we wanted to  demonstrate how you could control the 8 relays  on the AquaShield main control module. In this test, we use the 1st and the 2nd relay output, which are connected to high voltage relays (you can use all kind of commercial or industrial relays as well) and electrical sockets. We connected a  600 W grow light  and an  air pump  to the system as well.ÃÂÃÂ   We control the AquaShield through the  AquaShield Connect webapp . At the app we switch to the Controllers tab to operate the relays. In default, all relays are set to  AUTO  status, so you could create programs for operating these (based on a sensorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s parameter or on a time schedule). For testing or manually operating a relay you can always use the  MANUAL  status.ÃÂÃÂ       For controlling the grow light and the air pump, first we switch the relays to MANUAL status, than switch on and later off the 2 relays. Check out how these cool relays work!  TESTING THE SENSOR PROBES AND THE WATER LEVEL SWITCH   In this video we wanted to  demonstrate how you can receive data from your sensors . In default all the sensors are displayed at the main  Dashboard  tab in the  AquaShield Connect webapp . You can check the following sensorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s values:  PH ,  EC  (electrical conductivity),  ORP  (oxidation reduction potential),  DO  (dissolved oxygen),  temperature ,  humidity ,  light intensity  and the status of the  water level switches .      All the  values are created as averages , so you will get more  accurate results . The AquaShield Connect app is refreshed every 10 sec, but you can trigger the refresh manually as well (as you can see at the beginning of the video). ÃÂÃÂ   Also you can see,  how the status of the water level switch changes , as we close and than reopen the level switch. By monitoring the status of the level switches you  can easily create alerts , so you will be the first to know if there is not enough water in the tank, or  overflow is going to happen. You can also create a workflow to start or stop a pump if such event happens. Smart, smart AquaShield.  CHECKING HISTORICAL DATA   Besides the real time sensor parameters, the AquaShield is  capable of storing all the historical data gathered  from the probes.  All  historical data is accessible  from the AquaShield Connect web app. At the appÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s  Dashboard  you can check all the connected sensorsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> real time values and also you can display the sensorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s  stored data for the past 48 hours . With this feature you can easily detect PH or temperature swings or other suboptimal events.      In the video you can see how the  EC and the temperature probeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s historical data  is displayed in the app. Also you are able to display and analyze all stored data and even download it in XLS or CSV format. We are planning to create a public space where  AquaShield users can share their historical data  and other details about their hydroponic or aquaponic setup. Sharing is caring :)  ALERTS AND NOTIFICATIONS   We created  alerts and notifications for AquaShield  that you can receive to your phone or via email. Thanks to this you  wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t miss any important event  and you will have more time to act. You can create alerts and notifications at the  Triggers  tab in the AquaShield web app.  In these demonstration videos you will see how you can  set up a PH and a temperature alert .   For the  PH sensor  we set up the AquaShield to send an alert and a notification if the PH drops below 5,3 or exceeds 8,3.ÃÂÃÂ       For the  temperature probe  we set the alert if the temperature drops below 16C. All set and good to go!           AquaShield is  commercial ready ! We already did all the preparation, needed for production of larger quantities. We have all the stencils for  manufacturing the PCB boards  and the  machine routines  for implanting the parts for creating the AquaShield modules.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Also we did a  number of test runs in the factory , so we are sure, there will be  no trouble ramping up the production .ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The housing parts of the PCB-s are largely commercially available - and the other parts will be produced at small quantities with a reasonable price at a local injection molding shop.  We contracted all partners involved in manufacturing the AquaShield so  there are no blind spots  or unknown factors in the process.ÃÂÃÂ   We think that this Kickstarter campaign is the first step on a long road for AquaShield.  We plan long-term , so our main goal is to deliver the best product for You!       We wanted to  create the best monitoring and controlling device  to secure your fragile ecosystem and we also wanted to  give it such style , you could present proudly next to your magnificent plants and fish.We have a long-standing attraction about the Voronoi diagrams so we decided to incorporate it to our design.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        And it turned out better than we've expected :) The  Voronoi pattern will only be presented  on the top cover, all other parts of the moduleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s case is an industrial grade boxing specially designed for circuits and other electrical devices (although all the modules will operate at low voltage).To have a precise fit we printed several models and we tested all of them.ÃÂÃÂ        We think, this will be far the  best monitoring and controlling device  for your hydroponics or aquaponics setup. You will be able to check all the  vital parameters  of your fragile ecosystem in real time and  control it through the internet  from anywhere.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   You will also be able to create your own workflows and set up alerts for the most diverse emergency.  Sounds like sci-fi? It isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t.  Here is the chance to get your hand on one of the first AquaShield's.  What are you waiting for? Back us now and let's get growing!             ABOUT USÃÂÃÂ   The  AquaShield team  includes electronics professionals, engineers, designers, developers, hydroponics and aquaponics enthusiasts collectively having over  100 years experience bringing complex products to market .  AquaShieldÃÂÃÂ  founder GÃÂÃÂ¡bor Sulcz  is an engineer with an urge  to improve and optimize all things around , in particular to projects that could really improve people's quality of life.  But  there is no great goal, that could be reached alone . So here's the whole crew:           Risks and challenges  AquaShield is ready to start production as soon as we reach the funding goal. We already have a manufacturer in place and have finished all preparations and tests.   As you can see from the video and product demos, AquaShield is pretty much working and completed. Our engineers and developers are very confident in delivering the product on time.  All our products are engineered and manufactured in Europe. We've spent over a 3 years working on the AquaShield. We've had three major versions and with each version we've learned and improved our product.  Prior to AquaShield, our team spent over 15 years developing and engineering close to a hundred new and innovative products such as weather stations, battery managements systems, bluetooth communication based logger, electric bike and electric car controlling boards etc.   Many of these products are significantly more complex (but not as cool) as AquaShield, but thankfully it has put us in to a position to be able to deliver our project on time.  Unfortunately with all projects, unforeseen manufacturing or shipping problems are a possibility. We believe we have taken all reasonable steps to prevent such issues, and believe that we will be able to deliver a high quality, fast charging, and reliable product.  This is not our first project, so we know that no development project is straightforward and should the project experience any delays then we will communicate to our customers to keep them updated and in the loop.

Kilimanjaro - this battery was built to go wherever you roam.ÃÂÃÂ    Stay powered for up to 7 days. In addition to being a beautifully designed charging station that allows you to organize space without having a bulky and cumbersome charger kit, MOXPOWER Charger also comes with a Touch-Controlled LED Breathing Light with three different scales of light that you can choose from to keep a soft light at night to light up your dreams. And, since it is compact and versatile, that means you can take it in your backpack, use it at home or at the office, or, if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re traveling, you can use it at the airport or at the hotelÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>knowing that your family can use it to simultaneously charge each personÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s device.                                ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s our motto. Located in Guangzhou, China, HONG KONG MOXOM ELECTRONIC LIMITED is a leading manufacturer of cellphone accessories, like chargers, car-mounted chargers, data cables, batteries and power banks. Whether your phone charging cables always fall down behind the table or off to the side at night?ÃÂÃÂ   You always need to get up to look around on the floor trying to find the end of the charging cable to plug your phones in at night?ÃÂÃÂ    Easy to fix that! Simply use a cable holder on your nightstand to keep charging cable in place. A good lifesaver keeps your computer cords bundled and untangled at home or office.                  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                     ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Risks and challenges Like all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves.
