Project_description: If you missed our campaign. Please visit  www.legionsolar.com  to get pricing and build your system.ÃÂÃÂ   Revolutionary New Solution      Visit Legion Solar Website     Legion Solar 3 is a simple do-it-yourself solar + battery storage + off grid power system. Installs in minutes, delivers instant results, pays for itself 3x faster than traditional systems.ÃÂÃÂ   No Permission Required       We created SolarRegulatorÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, a technology to enable you to contain generated energy behind your meter where the utility company does not own allowing you to generate your own electricity unrestricted. Legion Solar works with your existing rate program to simply drive consumption down. Utility company only sees less consumption from you, not a grid tied solar system. As a result, it is not necessary to seek interconnection permission pertaining to utility company approved grid-tied solar systems.  Scale your System Anytime in Stages  With Legion Solar, you don't have to commit to large expensive systems up front. You can start as small as 200W and expand your system in stages depending on your budget and needs.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  Stage 1  - Get familiar with Legion Solar and it's components with the Starter Set. Sets up in minutes and experience instant results.ÃÂÃÂ A 300W Starter Set is enough to make a noticeable impact to your electric bill.         ÃÂÃÂ  Stage 2  - Scale your solar output with expansion sets to offset your daytime usage.ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ  Stage 3  - Once your system is large enough to have excess energy to store during daylight, add expansion sets with BatteryCommanderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ for night time consumption.         ÃÂÃÂ  Stage 4 -  Add OffGridControllerÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ and an off grid inverter so that you have emergency power during grid power outages.        ResultsÃÂÃÂ        As you become familiar with Legion Solar, size up your system in stages. The larger the system, the more you'll offset and the more you'll save.       Avoid the higher tiered pricing and eliminate having to pay unfair prices per kW utility companies charge for exceeding consumption limits. With Legion Solar, you'll not only save by consuming less energy, you'll also pay less per kW.  Add Ons     To include Expansion Sets with your Starter/Deluxe Set base pledge, click the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Manage your pledge" button that appears next to your pledge amount and then select "Change your pledge" on the following page and add the above amount to your base pledge.  For example, to add 4 expansion sets, multiple the above amount by 4 and add that to your base pledge.    Free Inverter Upgrade for Legion Solar 1,2 Owners  If you have a Legion Solar 1 or 2 system we're offering an exclusive upgrade package during this Kickstarter campaign only.  This is an ideal time for you to expand your system.   Legion Solar 1,2 inverters and SolarRegualtor must be replaced with new Gen3 Inverters and Gen3 SolarRegulator (included in Legion Solar 3 Starter Set) in order for you to expand your system and use BatteryCommander + OffGrid Controller. For every starter and expansion set that you pledge for, we will include a 2nd Gen3 Inverter free of charge (a $150 value).ÃÂÃÂ        For example: If you already own 1 starter set and 2 expansion sets. Make the base pledge for 1 Legion Solar 3 Starter/Deluxe Set. Then add 2 Legion Solar 3 expansion sets. We'll include 3 Gen3 Inverters when we fulfill your reward to ensure that your setup is 100% compatible. *Number of free inverters is limited to the number of Legion Solar 1/2 set you already own.ÃÂÃÂ   Step by Step Tutorials      Tap to watch videos, download data sheets and manuals     3x Faster ROI       Traditional solar system have built-in costs such as resellers markups, installation labor, permits, sales reps, and other fees. Legion Solar is energy delivered straight to your door without the unnecessary costs giving you up to 3x faster ROI.  Performance and Value       Legion Solar photovoltaic panels are designed specifically for the Legion Solar Micro-Inverter to achieve an ideal system match for high efficiency DC to AC conversion. Our new Gen 3 panels are CSA/UL certified and rated for hurricane force winds, hail, and snow. High efficiency A Grade polycrystalline cells delivers unsurpassed price/watt performance.  High Efficiency       Legion Solar micro-inverters are designed to achieve ideal system match for high efficiency DC to AC conversion. Up to 32 micro-inverters can be connected in a daisy-chain. Our micro-inverters employ maximum power point tracking (MPPT) technology to achieve maximum power output in full sun and partial shade conditions. LegionConnexÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ wiring simplifies connectivity ideally suited for the do-it-yourself installer.  Micro-inverters outperform that of traditional central inverters due to no single point of failure. Each inverter cell works independently of each other to maximize energy production in partial cloud or shady conditions.  Safety features are also included called anti-islanding. A feature to immediately shut down solar power production from back feeding to the grid to protect line workers.  Intelligent Control and Monitoring       Solar Regulator enables you to contain the solar energy that you produce behind your utility meter by regulating energy production of each Micro-Inverter so that energy production is less than or equal to energy consumption. If you turn on an appliance such as a dryer, Solar Regulator detects your increased consumption and automatically signals the Micro-Inverters to produce more energy. When excess production is available Solar Regulator signals to BatteryCommander to charge the batteries. This active learning computer works 24/7 to monitor and regulate your energy production. Since you are containing the energy behind your utility meter  where the utility company does not own  and you are not selling excess energy back, interconnection  permission is not necessary .  SolarRegulatorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s bluetooth interface allows you to monitor your energy production and consumption, check system health, and more via the LegionSolar App for Apple/Android.  BatteryCommanderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ (New)       BatteryCommander connects in between the micro inverter and the solar panel. During daylight solar energy is used to supplement usage from your utility company and charge the batteries. At night, batteries supplement your usage enabling Legion Solar to completely offset all of your daytime and nighttime consumption.  Compatible with standard Sealed Lead Acid Batteries (widely available and safer than Lithium), two deep cycle 12V batteries connected in series with capacity range 40-60Ah is recommended for each BatteryCommander branch.  OffGridControllerÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ (New)       OffGrid Controller is a combiner hub for your batteries to multiply usable capacity. It detects when grid power goes down and automatically turns on power to the backup inverter to supply power to an off grid branch circuit where you can power all of your basic necessities in any emergency.ÃÂÃÂ When power goes out, lights and appliances connected to this branch automatically turn on. When power comes back, the emergency branch circuit automatically turns off.  Legion Solar 3 Improvements   Micro-Inverter optimal output power increased from 200W (Gen2) to 250W (Gen3)    Micro-Inverter efficiency improved by up to 1.7%    Micro-Inverter communication changed from PLC to Wireless 2.4GHz    Solar Regulator communication changed from PLC (Gen2) to Wireless 2.4GHz (Gen3)    Solar Regulator firmware improvements with compatibility with BatteryCommander UnitsÃÂÃÂ     Starter Set Solar Panel wattage increased from 200W (Gen2) to 300W (Gen3)    Maximum Legion Solar total System size increased from 6.4kW to 9.6kW    Legion Solar app to add support for BatteryCommander   Tax Incentives      IRS Form 3468     2018-2019 tax credit is 30%, 2020 tax credit is 26%, 2021 tax credit is 22%, 2022 and onward tax credit is 10% for commercial installations only. For details see  IRS Form 3468.   Licensed Electricians and Contractors Welcome  Legion Solar is gaining popularity worldwide and many home owners are asking how they can add more branch circuit breakers. This is an opportunity for you to educate home owners about the importance of clean energy and provide your local installation knowledge to residence. For more information about becoming a dealer for Legion Solar, please visit our contact us page, tell us a little bit about the area that you serve and we'll be happy to send you more information about our program.         What Big Oil Doesn't Want you to Know                            ÃÂÃÂ (Tap to play video)  Our Kickstarter History      See past projects     We have raised over $2.3 Million on Kickstarter and fulfilled rewards to 25,800+ backers since 2013. Innovation is our passion and we hope that you enjoyed our projects as much as we enjoyed creating them.ÃÂÃÂ   Our MissionÃÂÃÂ       legionsolar.com     The prolific use of fossil fuels has resulted in the rise of our planetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s carbon dioxide levels not seen in over 5 millions years (before the time of humans). This greenhouse gas is the greatest threat to humankind with record high temperatures year after year and sea level rise reeking havoc on our costal cities.  The technology for complete transition to clean energy is possible now. With your support we can take control and choose to offset our dependence from our fossil fuel backed energy provider. It's our responsibility to leave our planet in better condition for our future generations than we found it. Join the fight for clean energy and become a Legion Today!  Misc.  *Due to continuous product improvements, the images on the website may differ slightly from the actual product that you receive.  **LegionSolarÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, SolarHubÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, SolarRegulatorÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, SolarBuilderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, BatteryCommanderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, OffGridControllerÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ are trademarks of PLX Devices Inc.  ***USA shipping rates only applies to USA mainland backers only. Hawaii and Puerto Rico backers will be contacted at the time of fulfillment to cover the additional shipping charges.  ****Legion Solar is Patent Pending.ÃÂÃÂ   Questions? Send us a message or give us a Call.ÃÂÃÂ       Parent company. Silicon Valley, CA     PartnersÃÂÃÂ                     Risks and challenges  PLX Devices has been designing and successfully bringing products to market for 14 years with a focus in automotive and consumer electronics. Legion Solar 3 is our 12th Kickstarter project. We're absolutely confident we can fulfill this project.  BatteryCommander and OffGridController - Designing and manufacturing electronics is our core competency. We will need to manufacture the PCBs, assemble the components and encase them into an industrial design. Our biggest challenge is to refine the algorithms to communicate with the SolarRegulator to regulate energy production so that energy production is as efficient as possible. We have tremendous experience in computer algorithms where we can draw from our automotive background to complete this task.  The prototypes are finished and we're ready to go into production. We need your help and we hope you'll join us "Bring the Future."

Creator_description: VREX Lab was founded in 2016 with the goal to disrupt content creation. The team behind Kydys and the Dyverse universe is a mix of people from all around the world, that aims at creating awesome AR and VR games for everyone
Project_description: Have you ever heard of toys that you can ownÃÂÃÂ  physically and virtually ? Toys you can  bring into games and video apps ? Or toys for which it is truly  one-of-a-kind ?ÃÂÃÂ   These are all the characteristics of Kydys, unique 3D-printed toys that have unmatched extensibility, including mobile apps and video games.ÃÂÃÂ Because you have provable digital ownership, you can print it if you ever lose it!   The Dyverse is the universe where Kydys come from.      Come and play with us!         Much like art, each Kydy is one of a kind. You are  the sole owner  of that particular Kydy in the entire world. Each Kydy has a unique gene code that describes its qualities such as looks and personality. This gene code ensures that each Kydy is unique!ÃÂÃÂ    You can also bring Kydys into games and mobile apps. Using our app    Kydy AR   , you can create fun AR videos with your own Kydy and share with friends.    You can even use Kydys to play games in the Dyverse.ÃÂÃÂ In the Dyverse, you can breed and create new unique Kydys, or play online board games (coming soon!).   For the Dyverse to increase partnerships and offer more games, we need your help to grow the Dyverse community.ÃÂÃÂ                  ÃÂÃÂ  One day, 3 adventurous Kydys (   Purmir   ,    Buri    &    Sonamu   ) discovered a mysterious portal into our world. They are the "First Crossers".ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        More Kydys followed, looking for their first master. It could be  you  !       Kydys are genderless. Any Kydy can provide either Yang  or  Yin  energy to create a new baby Kydy in a  Synthesis !       These curious Kydys will travel around our world and share with you what they discover. You could also take them anywhere!ÃÂÃÂ           Final package design may be subject to change. We will keep you posted!    1) 3D-Printed Kydy Art ToyÃÂÃÂ   2) Custom DIY PaintsÃÂÃÂ   3) BrushesÃÂÃÂ   4) Digital Ownership ID card  5) Illustrated Guidebook  6) Varnish tool     Espresso your support and be rewarded with a new friend!              ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ It is easy for  anyone  to build a Kydy and use it on APPs. Give your Kydy the color of life!                            ÃÂÃÂ *For safety reasons, we  strongly recommend  children under 13 to be supervised by an adult during this process.       By the end of the campaign, we will send a survey to every backer to collect your shipping informations.ÃÂÃÂ   We will be shipping your Kydys via mail along with the rest of your reward. There are additional shipping fees, depending on your home country.ÃÂÃÂ   If you wish to back us from a country that is not listed, feel free to contact us at support@vrexlab.com and we will find a solution to ship your reward.  We estimate delivery to start near the end of the year, but the uniqueness of each Kydy could slow our production process a little bit. We will keep you posted in our progress.     Along with your rewards!                   VREX Lab was founded in 2016 with the goal of bringing people closer to each other by using virtual content. By using the Kydys, we can offer users the chance to develop a virtual companion or persona that inspires them to express themselves more freely and creatively.            We are  NOT ALONE  in our journey! Several leading global investors and corporations have been working with us to deliver the new universe of content and toys that is the Dyverse. By receiving support from leading companies in VR/AR, gaming, we have been able to take the Dyverse this far. However, the power to truly make the Dyverse take off comes from you ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the backers and owners of Kydys in the Dyverse. We are so excited to finally launch this campaign and ask you to join us and our partners in our journey!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             What do you think about our adorable Kydys? Don't keep them a secret! The larger the community, the more exciting stuff we can build for the Dyverse! ÃÂÃÂ   We have worked for a long time to bring our Kydys to life and are excited to share them with you. By backing our project, you will become the first members of the Dyverse, receiving exclusive updates and access to future creations and campaigns.ÃÂÃÂ   For media inquiries or partnership opportunities, please contact us at support@vrexlab.com.  DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t hesitate to talk to us!ÃÂÃÂ Let us know if you have any question through any of the channel below or via comments on Kickstarter.  Thank you for reading and welcome to the Dyverse!ÃÂÃÂ                                 Risks and challenges  As with many projects ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> especially those in tech ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the development timeline can face potential setbacks, although we have been conducting tests and debugging for several months to ensure the Dyverse runs as smoothly as possible.  Since each of our toys are unique and not cookie cutter, the printing process will not be instantaneous. However, it is in the best interests of the Dyverse and you to own your toys as soon as possible, so you can rest assured that we will be working around the clock to ship them to you. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be sending out updates over email and posts on social media but as a backer, your inquiries are always welcome!  In fact, we have a lot of exciting partnerships and new applications or games for Kydys in the pipeline but canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t wait to hear your suggestions! If you have any ideas for Kydy related products or services please let us know. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll also work directly with the top backers to use their ideas for designs in producing custom Kydys.

Creator_description: I have over 30 years of experience working with extruded aluminum in the muscle car industry. My past products have been featured in films such as "2 Fast, 2 Furious" and TV shows such as "Nash Bridges".  In the past few years, we've launched a highly successful longboard brand, "Beercan Boards".  Our custom lasered grip allows the staff to really get their creative energies flowing.
Project_description: "This thing is absolutely fantastic! It legit carves harder than anyone's father on the thanksgiving turkey. Wish i could give them more than 5 stars. Thanks again guys, you have a lifetime customer with me and my family!"   --ÃÂÃÂ Nick B.  ÃÂÃÂ    "My favorite deck. I bought a second one for my girlfriend so I could get mine back!"ÃÂÃÂ  -- Christopher R.    "Most fun I've ever had on a longboard! Smooth, fast, & comfortable - I love this thing. Custom grip, so many color options, awesome aluminum deck, and it's made in the USA. Why aren't they charging like $400 bucks?" -- Mark S.   Beercan Boards are as unique as you are. TheyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re strong but lightweight, made from recycled aluminum right here in the USA. And theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re super customizable: Pick any of our 9 shapes, make it any of our 10 colors. Pick from our 20 different wheel colors - you can even have all your wheels match or pick a mix of different color wheels. Awesome grip designs come standard. Pick deluxe grip designs for a little more, or go all the way with a one of a kind custom grip thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s your design! Make it yours! We make a unique, extra durable long board that provides an awesome ride. Our completely custom grip tape designs let you personalize your board.ÃÂÃÂ    Demand for our custom grip tape is at an all time high.  That's why we're here on Kickstarter.  We need to purchase 2 more laser machines to keep up with demand. Back us now and the first 150 backers in the US will get their boards in time for Christmas!       Beercan Boards offers grip tape customization!ÃÂÃÂ  We apply our art or your custom design to the grip tape on the top of the board. That way the image is visible while you're riding.ÃÂÃÂ  The bottom of the board is a blank canvas for your own creation.        But Beercan Boards aren't just about custom looks. Here's what else separates us from the competition: ÃÂÃÂ      All our boards are constructed of recycled aluminum, then heat treated.  Every board design has been tested to +350 lbs.!ÃÂÃÂ     Aggressive and low stance combine with a beautiful and unique board design.    Wide range of decks starting at 32" all the way to 42" ensures an enjoyable ride for all sizes and ages.    Water will not warp or rust our boards.    Knuckledusters - finger grommets allow for easy carrying when not riding.    Bottle Caps - front and rear bash guard end caps provide protection to the deck from accidental collisions.    All boards come standard with Bear Grizzly 181 mm trucks combined with Abec-9 bearings.ÃÂÃÂ  These aid in ride quality and when combined with our decks it provides one of the smoothest rides you can get on a long board.    Lifetime warranty on the deck...... well sort of.ÃÂÃÂ  We offer a unique board refresh program that basically ensures you will always have a good strong deck.ÃÂÃÂ  If you ever have a problem with the deck, remove the trucks and wheels, send us the deck only, along with $50.00 plus shipping and handling, and we will provide you a new deck of the same type, your pick of color, fresh grip tape, bottle caps, and knuckledusters.ÃÂÃÂ  You wont get that from any wooden long board manufacturer.    And best of all every deck we offer is AMERICAN MADE.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ                                                        How You Can Help:   The high quality, laser cut, custom grip tape has been so popular we need to buy two more laser cutters in order to keep up with all the orders. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re here offering huge discounts on our premium boards.  Back us now and the first 150 backers in the US will get their board in time for Christmas!  ÃÂÃÂ  Rewards Preview :                                                         Stretch Goals: WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got some great stretch goals that will be revealed once we reach our goal. So back us now and help spread the word!  We've been creating awesome boards since 2013 with several utility patents to help keep our customers enjoying our unique product for years to come. Thanks for backing our project and sharing it with your friends!   Early Prototypes, Testing, Manufacturing Photos, and Some of The People Who Bring You Beercan Boards:                         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  Risks and challenges  The long board industry is a tough business no doubt. However, our challenge is keeping up with the demand for customized laser cut grip. We've got years of experience delivering top quality, US made longboards. Beercan Boards is an All-American patented, revolutionary long board. We sell complete builds on our website and are getting our boards in more and more shops. Ron Jon, Asphalt Beach, and Shark Wheels to name a few. And the boards are selling fast. We already have our supply chain in place and have a team hard at work making boards every day.

Blurb: The hand-sized fully functioning electric spinning wheel that spins wool and other fibers into yarn.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Seattle-United States:63 backers|Portland-United States:57 backers|Melbourne-Australia:50 backers|Sydney-Australia:50 backers|Los Angeles-United States:39 backers|Minneapolis-United States:36 backers|Chicago-United States:32 backers|Toronto-Canada:28 backers|London-United Kingdom:28 backers|New York-United States:28 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:3,174 backers|Canada:294 backers|United Kingdom:227 backers|Australia:196 backers|Germany:74 backers|Sweden:51 backers|Netherlands:48 backers|Japan:39 backers|New Zealand:33 backers|Finland:26 backers
Creator_description: Maurice is an inventor and engineer.  He enjoys understanding fragments of the universe and solving problems he encounters.
Project_description: The Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2 is an affordable spinning wheel in a travel-friendly package. ÃÂÃÂ Its smooth operation will help you spin gorgeous yarn.ÃÂÃÂ   Where can you spin?   In your comfy chair at home    At work during your lunch break    While binge watching your favorite show    With your knitting group    At a fiber retreat    In the park        Stretch Goals   (INCLUDED) $150K - Add a spin card    (INCLUDED) $200K - Add second color option for the Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2    (INCLUDED) $250K - Add a spare drive belt and tension band    (INCLUDED) $400K - Add a third color option for just the bobbin   Good for New and Experienced Spinners  This design is great for people learning to spin because it is easy to use and is the least expensive spinning wheel available these days. ÃÂÃÂ This means you can learn to spin quickly without spending a fortune. ÃÂÃÂ Many people find the Mini has everything they need in a spinning wheel.  Mini users have found that it is exceptionally well suited to use during travel or for teaching children to spin. ÃÂÃÂ Many experienced spinners report using the Mini for spinning in places they never could before, and some have completely switched over to the Mini for all their spinning.  Name Change  This project was originally called the "Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2" and towards the end of this Kickstarter the name changed to the "Electric Eel Wheel Nano". ÃÂÃÂ Both of those names refer to this project.  Open DesignÃÂÃÂ        One of the first things you might notice about the Mini 2 is its beautiful and stunning open design which serves an important purpose during spinning. ÃÂÃÂ It allows the spinner to see the yarn being wound onto the bobbin from all angles. This was one of the features the beta testers really loved about the new Mini.  I'd like to give a special thanks Caitlin Youngquist, an industrial designer, who volunteered her time and efforts to make this design possible.  Quieter Design  This new design is much quieter, thanks in large part to the addition of ball bearings which reduce friction and vibration on each end of the flyer. ÃÂÃÂ The much lower sound level of the Mini 2 makes it a joy to use when you're out with friends or spinning in public places.ÃÂÃÂ   Thoughtful Design  ÃÂÃÂ Many useful features have been added to the new design:ÃÂÃÂ    A switch to change the direction of the flyer. There are three positions: clockwise, off, and counterclockwise.    Slotted holes in the flat bottom allow screw or clamp mounting options.    Roving slots hold your roving so your singles don't untwist between spinning sessions.    Magnetic orifice hook holder to help prevent lost orifice hooks.        Included Items   Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2  is the base unit. ÃÂÃÂ This lets you spin the fiber into yarn. ÃÂÃÂ A standard power supply and orifice hook is included with the base unit.   Bobbins  store the yarn you spin. ÃÂÃÂ Each bobbin holds over one ounce (30 grams) of yarn. ÃÂÃÂ The beta testers are fitting 1.4 to 2 ounces on a bobbin, but it could be less if you're spinning bulky yarn.  Optional Items   USB Power Cord  lets you spin from a USB battery pack. ÃÂÃÂ There is a section below that explains this in more detail.ÃÂÃÂ    Orifice Reducer  is plug that goes into the front of the flyer, which helps reduce the wobble when spinning thin singles. ÃÂÃÂ Some spinners really like feature. ÃÂÃÂ However, others don't care to use it, so it's a personal preference as to whether you want to use it or not.       Color Options    This section has been updated.    Initially I was planning to only have a single color. ÃÂÃÂ However, I got a lot of requests from backers for another color option. ÃÂÃÂ Thanks to the overwhelming support for this project I was able to negotiate a fair deal with my manufacturer and now there will be two color options for the base and three color options for bobbins.  The base colors are purple and charcoal.ÃÂÃÂ      Charcoal base with an ivory bobbin    The bobbin colors are purple, ivory, and teal.     Teal bobbin    You will select your color choice when I collect shipping address information from all the backers next year.  Power Options  ÃÂÃÂ The power supply that comes with the standard package plugs into the wall. ÃÂÃÂ It works with voltages around the world, and it has a  Type A plug .ÃÂÃÂ  If you don't have Type A plugs in your country, you would need to provide a physical adapter to convert from Type A to the plug type you have, or you use the USB power cord.ÃÂÃÂ   To make this spinning wheel ultra-portable get the Plus option, which includes a USB power cord. ÃÂÃÂ With this cord you can use a USB battery pack and be independent from your wall outlet. ÃÂÃÂ It is easy to buy USB battery packs  online  or at your local big-box store. ÃÂÃÂ Even the small and inexpensive 10000 mAh USB battery packs will provide well over 20 hours of spinning on the Mini.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        If you are a techie and are interested in making your own power cord or using some other power sources, the Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2 has a 5.5 x 2.1 mm barrel jack and expects 9V at 1A.  Plying  Plying yarn is when you take two or more separate singles you have already spun and twist them together.ÃÂÃÂ  To do this you must twist the singles together in the opposite direction than you have spun them.ÃÂÃÂ  The Mini has a switch on its side that lets you reverse the direction of the flyer, which makes plying on this wheel very easy.  Here is a quote from Tanya one of the beta testers: "  I was very pleased with just how well the Mini 2 handled chain plying. Plenty of take up, even at slow speed, made this task quick and easy.  "       Ease of Use  This spinning wheel is easy to use. ÃÂÃÂ With drop spindles or treadle spinning wheels you can be distracted by the extra movements of your hands and feet. ÃÂÃÂ With the Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2, you can put your focus on drafting and feeding the fiber onto the bobbin. ÃÂÃÂ With the Mini, you can focus on the fun!  Getting it setup to spin is also very easy. ÃÂÃÂ The speed control is a dial, and tension is controlled with an elastic band. ÃÂÃÂ The metal sliding yarn guides are a breeze to use. ÃÂÃÂ Overall the design is simple and intuitive.  Learning to Spin  The best way to learn to spin is to either find someone, perhaps at your local knitting group, or watch some online videos. ÃÂÃÂ Finding someone with spinning experience is great is because you can more quickly learn from their first-hand knowledge. ÃÂÃÂ On the other hand learning from videos is convenient and works for many people. ÃÂÃÂ There are  many free online videos  about this. ÃÂÃÂ I have even made a  spinning tutorial using a previous version of the Electric Eel Wheel , and I hope to make updates in the near future.  Overview of the Controls  The switch on the Mini turns it on and controls direction. ÃÂÃÂ When the switch is forward it spins clockwise. ÃÂÃÂ When the switch is backwards it spins counterclockwise. ÃÂÃÂ When the switch is in the middle the wheel is off.  The speed control dial (Figure 1) controls the speed of the motor from completely stopped to full speed. ÃÂÃÂ The max speed of this spinning wheel is about 600-800 RPMs. ÃÂÃÂ This is similar to a medium speed standard foot driven spinning wheel. ÃÂÃÂ Many experienced spinners will spin near the max speed and new spinners can select a slow speed with the dial until they get more experience.     Figure 1    The tension band fits in a groove on the bobbin. ÃÂÃÂ In general, it is best to spin with a light tension on the Mini. ÃÂÃÂ To increase the tension pull the tension band (Figure 2) down through the groove. ÃÂÃÂ Increased tension will increase ÃÂÃÂ how firmly the wheel pulls the yarn onto the bobbin. ÃÂÃÂ If you let the fiber out of your hand more quickly it will give the yarn less twist. ÃÂÃÂ If you let the fiber out of your hand more slowly it will give you more twist.  The orifice hook is used to help thread the fiber on the flyer. ÃÂÃÂ There are magnets on the base of the Mini that hold the orifice hook securely.ÃÂÃÂ      Figure 2    When there is a buildup of yarn on your bobbin stop the flyer, and slide the yarn guide over (Figure 3). ÃÂÃÂ Then start spinning again. ÃÂÃÂ This is how you can evenly fill the bobbin. ÃÂÃÂ The slide arms on the Mini's flyer have a triangular shape to prevent the yarn guides from rotating.     Figure 3    Changing the bobbin on the Mini is easy (Figure 4.) ÃÂÃÂ Take the drive belt off the front of the flyer and the tension band off the back part of the bobbin. ÃÂÃÂ Then slide the flyer out of the braces and remove the back bearing and the bobbin. ÃÂÃÂ Put the new bobbin back on the flyer,ÃÂÃÂ and then replace the drive belt and tension band.     Figure 4    There are grooves in the case near the front. ÃÂÃÂ This is where you place your fiber there when you're done spinning so it doesn't untwist between spinning sessions.  Compared to Other Spinning Wheels  It is important to realize the Mini is a new category of spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  It is faster and easier to use than a drop spindle, and it is available at an amazing price that no other spinning wheel on the market approaches. Its design makes it great for new spinners and more experienced spinners who want an affordable travel-friendly wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  However, the Mini is not meant to work as a production spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  If you are an experienced spinner who wants a lot of speed and big bobbins don't expect this to replace your primary spinning wheel.  Electric Eel Wheel Community  One of the aspects that makes this a great spinning wheel is the online social community. ÃÂÃÂ Spinners frequently share their latest yarn projects and there are always some helpful and positive reviews. ÃÂÃÂ This community is also the place where people discuss new ideas for spinning wheels and other fiber related tools. ÃÂÃÂ I frequently post ideas long before they go public. ÃÂÃÂ For example, I've been posting information about the Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2 for over 6 months to this community and received valuable feedback that has helped me make it much better than I could have by myself.  If you want to join there are two places people have gathered so feel free to join either one (or both.)    Electric Eel Wheel Group on Facebook      Electric Eel Wheel Group on Ravelry    Quotes and Pictures from Beta Users  I have had several people beta test the Electric Eel Wheel Mini 2. ÃÂÃÂ I'd like to give a huge shout-out to Tanya Cunningham, Sheryl Giles, and Joel Hall who all gave great feedback during the beta testing phase. ÃÂÃÂ Here are some quotes from the beta testers and images from them.   Tanya Cunningham  said:   "I normally spin very thin singles, so I like quite a bit of speed, and a light touch on controlling the tension. The Mini 2 steps right up to that task and makes it a joy to spin lace weight singles. It also handles spinning a much heavier weight of yarn."    "I love how easy it is to change bobbins. The half-open bearing cradles allow you to very quickly and easily lift the entire flyer, remove the smaller bearing and slide one bobbin off and another one on."    "The unique base design has insets with keyholes. You can either clamp the wheel to a table, or easily create a custom base with screws that use the keyholes to secure the wheel to a weighted base."    Sheryl Giles  said:  " Much quieter. ÃÂÃÂ Great for people who like a carry-a-long craft project. ÃÂÃÂ Some spinners carry knitting or a drop-spindle because those travel well - now you can take your spinning wheel along! ÃÂÃÂ This sturdy little wheel is my new take along craft project. ÃÂÃÂ It's light, fits easily into my backpack and sets up in seconds so can spin wherever I go. "   "As current owners know, one of the best selling points for Electric Eel Wheels is the company that makes them. ÃÂÃÂ Maurice is committed to local production, affordable pricing, product development that is responsive to customer feedback, project transparency in the creation process and excellent customer service. ÃÂÃÂ Put another way, Maurice is really great to work with and is a perfect example of the advantages to buying from small businesses. ÃÂÃÂ So I not only love my EEW, I also feel great about supporting Dreaming Robots!"  ÃÂÃÂ      Spinning on the train       The results       Just finished another bobbin       Putting a bobbin worth of yarn onto a ball winder        Risks and challenges  I have done a lot of testing with this version of the Mini and several beta testers have also tested it.  The results have been very positive so I'm happy with the current design, and I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t see a reason to make any significant changes to it for this Kickstarter.  There is always some risk when building hardware.  The major custom parts for this wheel are the plastic case, the motor, the circuit board, and some custom bent wires.  Everything except the plastic has final samples and a manufacturer is ready to make them, and the risks for these are low.  The plastic parts used in all my prototypes are 3d printed parts.  The final plastic parts will be a combination of milled and injection molded plastic.  I have used an injection company for over a dozen parts in the past.  These are the most complex set of parts I've ever done for injection molding, but I have a good relationship with this manufacturer.  They have already suggested several changes to my model which I have already incorporated into my 3d printed parts.  They assure me now that they can make plastic parts from these 3d models and have already given me their estimates.  This is certainly the area of biggest risk for delay, but I feel all my experience with injection molding and having a company I have used before for this kind of work helps mitigate the risk for serious problems or delays.  Final assembly is done by several contractors close to home near Boston, Massachusetts.  There is a risk that this assembly process becomes a bottleneck and causes delays if the orders far exceed my expectations.  However, because assembly of this spinning wheel is faster than any of my previous spinning wheels that means each assembler will be able to make more units per hour.  Still if the number of backers on Kickstarter is very large it could cause delays.  If the number of backers on Kickstarter is extremely large then I might need to look at other assembly options, which would lead to delays.  It is always possible for factors beyond my control to delay shipping, such as one of my suppliers going out of business, but these risks are minimized since I have been working with all my major suppliers for years.  This is not my first product, so I know about a lot of the pitfalls and have worked hard to avoid them. If you look at my previous four Kickstarter campaigns, you'll see three on time and one is still in progress, but itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s also on track.  That said, I will delay shipping if some issue with quality is found. I would rather delay shipping than ship a defective product.  Still it is my goal to get you this product on time.

Project_description: At Atolla, we believe in the power of science to change your skin for the better.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Atolla helps you feel more confident in your skin(care). ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  From Atolla users: ÃÂÃÂ    "As someone who cares about her skin, but wants to put in as minimal effort as possible - Atolla is a great solution...because    they are making it easy to learn about my skin without testing a bunch of different products   "  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>EvÃÂÃÂ    "Started using Atolla after going to their pop up in Boston this year - Getting more specific guidance based on things like my skin's hydration levels was revelatory.    I'm thinking about my skin in whole new ways   . " ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>Liz ÃÂÃÂ    "   I am so excited about Atolla and its potential to simplify skin care   ! As a person with sensitive skin, it is always a challenge to know which products I can use without causing more skin issues than I already have"  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>Jennaca ÃÂÃÂ        WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve all been there: you have a bad skin day with no idea what caused it or what to do about it. Our skin is our largest organ and thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a lot that can affect it. Our team (a designer, a data scientist, and a renowned dermatologist) spent the last year at MIT determining how to measure whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s going on with our skin, and how to improve it.ÃÂÃÂ   After a  successful pop-up  with over 500 pilot users in New York this summer, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re bringing Atolla to your home! Get a monthly subscription kit with skin analysis tools and a customized serum, created uniquely for you. As your skin changes, Atolla's proprietary algorithm adapts the formulation you receive.ÃÂÃÂ   The best skincare is skincare you don't have to think about.ÃÂÃÂ   We think about it for you!  Atolla applies the scientific method to skincare. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve developed a proprietary system to help you quantifiably measure whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s going on with your skin, and we use that knowledge to develop your personal formula. The serum we create combats your specific skin issues and fits your environment, lifestyle, and routine. And thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s just the beginningÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>as your skin changes over time, your serum will adapt over time. Our machine-learning algorithm recognizes patterns in whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s causing your skin to react positively or negatively, and we use this information to provide you the best solution, no matter the situation.   Back us today to start a long-term relationship where, together, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll help you achieve healthier skin.   An easy at-home system, with nothing to send back. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Get the tools to understand your skinÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>comprehensive skin testing in just 10 minutes!ÃÂÃÂ   The Skin Analysis Kit includes:   Instruction guide    Moisture level test    Oil level test    Skin pH test    Profile preference ingredients (in your first kit)   Each of these measurements factor into the development of your custom serum.  ÃÂÃÂ  3 Simple Steps: Analyze - Formulate - Track ÃÂÃÂ         STEP 1: AnalyzeÃÂÃÂ    Assess your skin in just 10 minutes from anywhere with the Atolla Skin Analysis Kit:   Complete a short intake survey to tell us about your environment, lifestyle, and current routine    Take a selfie to start tracking visual progress    Measure the moisture, oil, and pH levels of your skinÃÂÃÂ     Build a personal preference profile - test ingredients to understand what absorbs and feels best        STEP 2: Formulate  New breakout? Dry skin this winter? No matter your specific caseÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>we make the best product to work for your skin  right now.  Your personalized serum's ingredients and their dosage are calibrated to suit your skin.ÃÂÃÂ         STEP 3: Track   Easily track your progress with the Atolla Skin Health app. Measure how well your routine is working by seeing trends in your physical measurements (oil, moisture, and pH) and your selfies!   A COMPLETE SYSTEM FOR SMARTER SKINCARE:    ÃÂÃÂ Comprehensive but easy to use    ÃÂÃÂ Nothing to send back to usÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ Takes 10 minutes or lessÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ Personalized solution for better skin   Data Science Meets Skin Science.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          It's not just one factor that matters, it's the complete picture.   The Atolla system identifies the many factors that affect your skin and helps you look your best.ÃÂÃÂ   Understand your skin across multiple dimensions with your Skin SequenceÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> capturing your specific skin goals, skin measurements, and product preferences. As the Atolla community grows, we will be able to give you recommendations and insights based on people with similar skin to yours.    How do we customize your product?ÃÂÃÂ     Atolla matches you with the most effective ingredients based on your skin analysis, and calibrates the concentration of each ingredient to the severity of your skin issue(s). You'll see exactly what ingredients are in your formulation and why you matched with them.  We use top ingredients as determined by dermatologists (e.g., Vitamin C, AHA/BHAs, Retinols). But more importantly, we use them in just the right formula for you. You don't need to use  every  ingredient; you need to use the right ones at the amount that is safe and effective for your skin.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Together each month, we will monitor your progress. From your results, we adapt your next monthÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s formulation to always give you the most effective product.  ÃÂÃÂ  What's your skin sequence? Atolla Skin Stories ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  There are thousands of possibilities for skin sequences, based on your unique skin                           Often, people discover that their skin is totally different than they think it is. Our customers found that getting knowledge about their skin and a product tailored to them made them feel empowered. HereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s what Atolla users have to say:   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I always thought I had oily skin, but learned I had both dry AND oily skin and had been using the wrong products the entire time. Since using the Atolla system, IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve felt way more balanced.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  -  Maya, Sequence WT-432    "Every week I had new breakouts... I honestly felt like no matter what treatment I tried, I would never be fully satisfied with skin. I began using my Atolla formula and the next morning my skin already felt healthier. I no longer use any prescription creams, none of them come even close to working like your product does. My skin hasn't felt this healthy in years!"  -  Isabella, Sequence CT-254    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Amazing... solved multiple problems with 1 product! I have more glow and better texture."   - Lauren, Sequence IF-248   Knowledge is Power: The Atolla Skin AnalysisÃÂÃÂ        We've all heard that our skin is either dry, oily, normal, or combination .  But skin is much more complicated than that! In reality, most people experience several of those conditions (sometimes simultaneously) over the course of their lifetime. To truly understand whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s going on, Atolla monitors three key measurements: moisture, oil and pH. These levels help us best tackle issues caused by any imbalance. ÃÂÃÂ    Moisture Level Test:  Without proper hydration, skin is more susceptible to redness, irritation, and unwanted hyper-pigmentation. Your moisture levels are used to design a formulation that keeps your skin hydrated.ÃÂÃÂ    Oil Level Test:  Your skinÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s oil protects it from the environment, but excess oil can lead to clogged pores, breakouts, and blackheads. Your oil levels are used to match you with ingredients that balance your skin.   pH Test:  Your skin's pH reflects how susceptible it is to bacteria, allergens, and pollution. By tracking your skin's pH, we make sure your skincare routine helps you stay in the optimal range of 4.5 - 5.5. ÃÂÃÂ   Track progress and get personalized insights.ÃÂÃÂ        The Atolla Skin Health app is your go-to source for skin insights and analysis. ÃÂÃÂ   Use the app to:ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  Track your progress:  Upload selfies to track your progress, rate how the products in your routine are working, and use our monitoring tools for a precise understanding of how your skin improves over time.    ÃÂÃÂ  Spot trends and get tips:  Get lifestyle insights to improve your skin healthÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> measure how changes in your diet or in the weather affects your skin and get tips on how to counteract those effects.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  Connect with fellow skin nerds:  Trade tips and routine suggestions with others in the Atolla community with similar skin to yours (quantified as similarity in Skin Sequence).               An Interdisciplinary Team of ExpertsÃÂÃÂ        We are a founding team of three: a designer and data scientist from MIT and one of the top dermatologists in the country. Meg learned to build products by working on the world's best 3D printer and Kickstarter success story,  Formlabs . Sid knows how to apply data science to the real world, through working with top brands like Ralph Lauren, Patagonia, and Tylenol.   Dr. Ranella Hirsch  is a frequently quoted authority in Cosmetic Dermatology. Called an "Expert Derm" by Allure and a "Beauty Guru" by Marie Claire, Dr. Hirsch is the Past President of the American Society of Cosmetic Dermatology and Aesthetic Surgery. As Dove's Global Partner Dermatologist, she was a co-creator of the Dove DermaSeries premium range and was the Vichy USA Dermatology Partner for their US launch and rollout.   Let's change how skincare works, together!    It shouldn't be a struggle for you to feel amazing in your own skin. As a Kickstarter community member, you know how technology can help you become the best version of yourself.ÃÂÃÂ    Building a machine-learning model for skin requires your help. Joining the Atolla platform helps you achieve better skin, and helps others experiencing similar issues get the answers they're looking for.ÃÂÃÂ   When you back this project, you help us co-create the future of skincare. We want to hear from you about future products and features to build. Here's some ideas we had:   Development of Atolla moisturizer and cleanser    Integration with Diet tracking apps    Integration with Sleep tracking apps    Integration with Apple Health apps    + Whatever helps  you  understand  your  skin   A Predictive Model for SkinÃÂÃÂ   We are building a unique longitudinal dataset that is comprehensive and broad in 1) its coverage of demographics, geographies, skin concerns, lifestyles, products used, and 2) tracking of skin measurement, visual and sentiment changes.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Machine learning is powerful where solving classification or prediction questions are too complicated for manual segmentation or simple regression techniques.ÃÂÃÂ Skin is a complicated organ that cannot be described by just one variable. Thus, we are using machine learning to solve both the classification and recommendation problems. In other words, we use machine learning to create comprehensive skin archetypes based on all the factors that might affect someoneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s skin.ÃÂÃÂ Based on that information, we have another machine learning model to predict how a personÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s skin will change to a particular formulation based on whether it work for people in the same skin archetype. As the Atolla community grows larger and people use the platform for longer, we will go one step further and predict skin outcomes based on the individual's skin, health, lifestyle and environment. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   App Progress To Date  We have an early working version of the app, but want your input to make it the most useful skin tracking tool possible! We're looking to crowdsource ideas for new app features and will keep you updated as we build them.        Atolla Skin Test Scanning        The Atolla Skin Lab Pop-Up  AtollaÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s mission is to empower you to manage your skin health by understanding your unique, changing skin. By leveraging quantifiable and physical data, Atolla makes skin science simple and approachable. This summer, we brought the Atolla Skin Lab to NYC. Through an immersive pop-up experience, hundreds of New Yorkers with a deep diversity of skin types learned about their skin in an unprecedented way. We're excited to bring the Atolla Skin Lab experience to your home!                            Spread the word!ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ    Kickstarter Launch Squad  We're a small team, but we couldn't have done it without the help of our friends.  Video:  Josh Foisey   Photo:  Rob Chron Photography   Copy:  Liz Joyce   Voice Recording:  Ugly Duck   GFX:  Plugin Studios   Homebase:  New Lab  and  MIT       Risks and challenges  We are currently in the development and testing phase for the customized serum formulations. Our top priority is safety and efficacy, which means that we will be making sure these products pass our rigorous safety testing. Given this commitment, there is a chance that the delivery of the serum product will be delayed by one or two months if our testing timeline goes longer than planned.    Current timeline for customized serum development: Oct - Nov 2018: Final serum design tweaks Dec 2018: Serum evaluations Jan - Feb 2019:  Stability, microbiological (patch/allergy), package testing Mar - Apr 2019: Manufacturing and first delivery for SUPER EARLY BIRDS May 2019: Ship for EARLY BIRDS Jun 2019: Fulfillment complete

We like to think itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a revolution that will allow all of us to rethink the way we play classic games, but also board games and role play games ! We need your support to launch the production of DICEESÃÂÃÂ® and to develop a variety of games, possibilities linked to DICEESÃÂÃÂ®, and to launch the community around what can be madeÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ Because the opportunities of games and fun are limitless! LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s explore all the faces of DICEESÃÂÃÂ® together.                           Dice game is, without any doubts, one of the oldest game in the world. We wanted to give this game its own technological revolution! ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we are very excited to introduce DICEESÃÂÃÂ®. DICEESÃÂÃÂ® still have 6 faces, but here,  each face is equipped with a colored LEDs digital display . But as of now, our dice are connected and it changes absolutely everything. Thanks to a mix of technologies contained inside a standard ÃÂÃÂ¾ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ dice, DICEESÃÂÃÂ® can show any patterns on each single face. Then, with any Bluetooth equipped device, the player can associate colors to their opponents, patterns to each faces, interact with anyoneÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ anywhere!  DICEESÃÂÃÂ® will even keep up the score for you!  Far from the eyes? Not far from the dice! Play with your friends all over the world! We know everyone has a creative side ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> yes, even you ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> whether or not they would traditionally consider themselves as a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>creative personÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ. DICEESÃÂÃÂ®  will be the perfect launchpad for you! You can also use the standard faces kits into our app . This list of faces kits will grow up over time. We seriously canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t do this without you . So, if you care for our DICEESÃÂÃÂ® project, please do not hesitate to share with your friends and support our project now! DICEESÃÂÃÂ® connects to your smartphone, tablet or computer , allowing any compatible app to synchronize with your DICEESÃÂÃÂ® and keep up the score, interact or react to the result you just thrown, the player whoÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s up next, the round of the game, the importance of the next thrown, etc.  Your creativity is the only limit here. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re designers and electronics engineer. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re the guys behind projects and companies like iol strategic design, Tole, IoT-D, Habilis Product Design, ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ It is an absolute obsession of ours to see an idea evolve from an intangible state all the way through the launch, and we couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be more excited to be sharing share our latest passion project DICEESÃÂÃÂ® with you here on Kickstarter.        Some pictures of the originÃÂÃÂ                            DICEESÃÂÃÂ® is a patented technology . Be sure to choose DICEESÃÂÃÂ® : a smart, powerful and premium device, the reference of connected dice!   A little bit history of the origin of a classic dice  Dice game is without doubts, one of the oldest games in the world. We were already practicing it in India, during the Vedic period, 2 thousand years before Jesus Christ. Etruscan and roman citizens, Arabic countries and Spanish people loved to play with faith with those six faces. One of them was a flower drawn (ÃÂ<U+008E>z-zÃÂ<U+008E>hr, in ancient Arab) and, in latin, dice, the diceÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s game, and hazard, were designated with the word ÃÂÃÂ« Alea ÃÂÃÂ».As old as the world, the dice game has not much evolved since. But it was used for a lot of goals. We use it ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>nakedÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ for poker, or 421, or for an accessory in games like goose game, parcheesi, or backgammon, or even Monopoly, for making the pawns move forward.         Risks and challenges  All that needed to be done is to make that concept real. Our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>makersÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ team composed of two designers and an electronics developper went quickly to work. Skills and long working hours transformed their dreams into a magical reality. ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>All had to be hosted in a very limited space: LEDs, battery, Bluetooth. It took thousand hours, prototyping, tests/mistakes, to give birth to a viable solution, the one seen in this videoÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ.  Now we need your help to develop the final device in mass production and more In-DICEES-App games. We believe in our project! We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t wait for you to be a part of the DICEESÃÂÃÂ® community.

PHOTO GALLERIES (FREE FOR MEDIA USAGE)      Magnic Microlights in Action     If your web connection is slow, watch the video with additional Eddy Current Explanation + Smart Feature Demonstration with automatic subtitles in 8 languages:            1. WHY MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA ARE GAME CHANGERS  Cyclists can't escape darkness: It returns every evening and sometimes even at daytime when passing tunnels. Battery lights seem comfortable with quick & easy installation but there will be moments when the batteries are empty while you need them most. With Magnic Microlights you don't have to fear these moments because you have neverending light :   Benefits of Magnic Microlights:    Non Contact : You don't feel or hear them  No batteries - Neverending power    Strong enough to enlight the road ahead  Easy To InstallÃÂÃÂ   Cool "invisible" design: Compact size without adapters  Environmentally Friendly    Works with all bicycle models - WEGA for disc brakes    Don't fear the dark! The best time to cycle is whenever you want.   Magnic Microlights are theÃÂÃÂ worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s smallest non-contact dynamos, that are integrated together with electronics and lighting system in the brake shoes. In 2012 we presented our invention   Magnic Light   here on   Kickstarter  . Many "experts" did not believe this principle can work and believed our lights would be a fake but the MAGIC is clever usage of well known eddy current technology. With more than 17.000ÃÂÃÂ Magnic lights on the road via our successful   Magnic Light IC   campaign 2014 and our webshop we have proved that this sustainable, environment-friendly technology has the power to replace battery lights for bicycles.ÃÂÃÂ    The last 18 months we worked hard on the development of the Micro-Technology. With Magnic Microlights you can add non-contact dynamo light to your bicycle without need of extra adapters. If your bicycle has disc brakes choose Wega which has flexibility in four directions and fits to nearly all other bikes (except Vbrake/Canti systems), too.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       3D Printed material, Fully functional contactless generator & PCB Board electronic.        MAGNIC MICROLIGHT compared to WEGA- THE MICROLIGHT for disc brakes.  We named it WEGA because of the similarity with the stellar constellation Lyra and it's brightest star Wega       WEGA might be the most universal bike light on planet earth     HOW CAN THESE TINY LIGHTS BE STRONG?    Beneath generator technology one important aspect is the optimal choice of LED + lens which gives a big advantage compared to normal LED bicycle lights.For the Magnic Microlights we have chosen the newest extreme density - Cree LED (available since summer 2018): The most efficient high power LED with minimum size (1.6 mm x 1.6mm compared to 3.45mm x 3.45mm as used in many LED biycle lights).    What does this mean for Magnic Microlights?   Imagine you have a good bicycle light with 3,45mm x 3,45 mm LED, Lens of size 34,5 mm and 100 Lumen/Watt (These are quite excellent values for biycle lights).ÃÂÃÂ        Magnic Microlights don't have the strongest generators (because cyclists should not feel anything!) but they have the best light efficiency on the market: 200 Lumen/Watt !     With same current and tiny lenses MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA have twice the power of large high quality LED/lens applications.         2. WHICH REWARD FITS YOUR BIKE?  See the specification here and preorder on the top right of this page.                  MAGNIC LIGHT TEAM CLOTHING       See pictures in the gallery     3. LET ANIMATIONS EXPLAIN FUNCTIONSÃÂÃÂ   We have tested the current brakeshoe design from May to October on roadbikes & mountainbikes with more than 3000 test kilometers. Although the stability of the prototype material (3d printed PLA) did not match that of the final product, there was noÃÂÃÂ  difference in braking performance compared to standard brakes that we otherwise use in training and everyday cycling.      See more details in the gallery...       TECHNICAL DATA     Our prototypes are less efficient than the final version because of lower generator power. We have to estimate the power of the final product based on the prototypes and our experience from the current Magnic Light version.          BRAKE LIGHT    Magnic Microlights have an effective brake light function. When you pull the brakes the distance between rim and generator decreases resulting in higher generator power and higher light output. The brake light works precisely and is a clear signal for subsequent traffic.     All Magnic Microlights have an integrated "Brake Light"-function shown here: When you pull the brakes the lights brighten up which warns the driver behind you.      BEAM ADJUSTMENT    The design of front-& rearlight allows to adjust the light beam regardless of the fork angle. Even for extreme bicycle frame geometry you can adjust the light beam towards the road.         BRAKE RUBBER REPLACEMENT    Worn brake pads can be exchanged easily as you would expect from standard brakes.ÃÂÃÂ          SHIFT MECHANISM    After longer usage your brakepads will loose up to 5mm material before you have to exchange them. The generator performance stongly depends on the rim distance so we have integrated an automatic shift mechanism to keep the distance between generator and rim constant small. An exchangeable shift-element moves the generator away from the rim and prevents grinding of the generator part.     After longer usage your brakepads will loose up to 5mm material before you have to exchange them. We have integrated an automatic shift mechanism to keep the distance between generator and rim constant which is important for performance of the system.      WEGA VISIBILITY         Wega is visible from both sides        See more details in the gallery... HOW CAN YOUR BIKE GLOW AT NIGHT?  When we tried to assemble the "perfect" bicycle for this technology we were fascinated by the combination with phosphorescent wheels and decided to offer the Magnic Night Bike as reward, too.     Here you see the "Glow ion the dark" effect of the Magnic Night Bike wheels.    ÃÂÃÂ These are custom made wheels. In addition to the phosphorescent painting these are high quality welded aluminium rims which you only find on upper class roadbikes (like Shimano or Mavic). Even if "normal" rims work good with all Magnic Lights these rims are welded and don't have a magnetic rim joint.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ      PREMIUM       The Magnic Night Bike is unique! You won't find something like this in any bike shop! Click on the image to reach the gallery.   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      See more details in the gallery...     Four Magnic Microlights enlight the welded ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Glow in the dark" rims. To keep your trousers clean when cycling we have replaced the standard chain by a Carbon belt drive from the leading company for bicycle belt drives :  Gates . Magnic Microlights need no cables so this bike follows the no-cables concept (except brake cables) but allows to shift between low and high speed gear with the automatic  Sturmey Archer hub .    CLASSIC    The CLASSIC version comes with a standard chain. You can turn the rear while and either us as free-wheel single speed bike or as FIXE with rigid hub.      See more details in the gallery...     6. FASCINATING TECHNOLOGY & PHYSICS   The main technology of our lights is based on eddy current induction. ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             The core part is the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s smallest contact- and frictionless bicycle dynamo, that is integrated together with the electronic and the lighting system in the brake shoe of a calliper brake. The world-wide patented technic developed by the German company Magnic Innovations is based onÃÂÃÂ  eddy current induction: a magnetic wheel in a generator separated from the bicycle rim by a narrow air gap induces temporary magnetic fields even in non-magnetic aluminium bicycle rims when the bicycle rim is moving. This leads to the magnetic wheel rotating contactlessly as if by magic.   Neither batteries nor external cables, further fittings or spoke-magnets are necessary. Only the brake shoes have to be exchanged for microlight - brake shoes, so that the maintenance only involves the exchange of worn brake pads after thousands of kilometres. The included brake pads are compatible with other standard brake pads of other manufacturers as available in every cycle shop.    Eddy current        Eddy currents (I, red) induced in a conductive metal plate (C) as it moves to right under a magnet (N)     The key is so-called  eddy current  technology : Energy is drawn from the rotating bicycle wheels without any physical contact, and thus without friction. Instead, eddy currents, created by strong magnets, generate electricity to power the lights: When the wheel spins, magnets inside the generator induce eddy currents with corresponding magnetic fields in the wheel, which in turn interact with the magnets in the generator. The resulting electricity will power your lights indefinitely without any environmentally harmful batteries or cumbersome cables.  While the previous larger Magnic Lights were equipped with two LEDs (one for stand light) Magnic Microlights have just one LED which is fed by ultra-high efficient Mosfet rectifiers.       7. HOW THE FUTURE CAN BE SMART  The SMART VERSION presented here can only be realized within the rangeof this project if we reach a very high stretch goal of 500.000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬. We don't expect to reach this goal but present what is possible if we do. (In case this amount is reached the reward for the SMART VERSION will be available in the rewards section and you can switch if you like).ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  Reason for the high stretch goal: High cost for final development of bluetooth control software & electronics. At the moment we have implemented the main features with prototypes based on the electronic boards and microprocessors of the larger  MAGNIC LIGHT IC  version.    Turn SignalsÃÂÃÂ         The Smart version comes with a cool novelty : A blink system for turn signals without any additional switches and even without a smartphone. How does it work? If you tap the brake lever the distance between Microlights and rim changes which can be detected in the lights (even without braking). A double-tap is our signal for the blinker: If you double-tap the right brake lever the rear lights detect the signal and via bluetooth to the front lights- so that lights on the right side are blinking. Correspondingly this works on the left side. ÃÂÃÂ     NavigationÃÂÃÂ     Navigation is similar to the turn signals - but here you are guided and need our Smartphone App for navigation: Lights are controlled by the navigation app and start to blink on the left or right side when you have to turn left/right. Put your smartphone in your bag and let the lights guide your way.ÃÂÃÂ     Speed Data Transmission    ÃÂÃÂ   The smart Magnic Microlights are equipped with a Bluetooth LE microcontroller which easily detects the rotation speed of your wheel from the incoming current. Via smartphone or Bluetooth LE compatible speedometer  you can receive speed data for display or further processing. This feature replaces Bluetooth LE speed sensors which have the same function but need extra mounting and extra batteries.ÃÂÃÂ     Crash detection with emergency call    ÃÂÃÂ   This feature requires some future development and is still theory. In case of a crash generators will stop abruptly. We need some test data but we are confident to be able to detect a crash situation reliably which can be sent to the smartphone in order to make an emergency call. ÃÂÃÂ     Configuraton for Stand light and more    ÃÂÃÂ   We will offer different stand light patterns which can be set via Smartphone App. Additionally it will be possible to switch the internal orientation of the lights (for example for correct turn signals if your left and right brake levers deviate from standard installations).       8.ÃÂÃÂ HOW WE DO POLITICS: GERMAN STVZO ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Nov. 5th 2018, UPDATE    Concering German STVZO approval for our new lighting technology some frustrating years are behind us.But we did not give up and we achieved that the highest responsable committees were invloved in new rules for STVZO approval concerning our technology.Today we were informed that our main ideas could influence the new legislation which shall pass theVerkehrsauschuss (Committee of Transport) of the German Bundestag next month.We believe that the German rules are too complex and old fashioned and hopefully our efforts helpto go in the right direction.For our systems (Magnic Light IC, and Magnic Microlights) this is good news because we finally can adjust our lights concerning to these rules. For our technology here are the three most important new rules concerning Magnic Light:ÃÂÃÂ    For lighting systems consisting of two separate lights (left & right) the total amount of light needs to exceed the minimum of 10 lux (and not each single light).(Otherwise our lights should have been twice as bright as the required minimum value at 15km/hwhile they easily do at >25 km/h)ÃÂÃÂ   For lens systems the "brightest area" can replace brightest point of the light distribution (which is the measurement point for the light distribution with respect to "anti-blinding" characteristics). The highest point within such an the "brightest area" can be taken as measurement point nowwhich previously gave room for ambiguity.-ÃÂÃÂ   The German bicycle light lobby wanted to have a new rule that prohibits dynamos with less than 50% efficiency.Sounds reasonable but measurements for "Micro"-system are very complex (and expensive) because the result can be distorted by air resistance, wheel material, bearings, .. much more than these parametersinfluence large systems (hub dynamos).We could not stop this new rule but at least we could achieve that is is not necessary to proveefficiency charateristics for micro-dynamos below 1,3 Watts. (Background: The rule shall prevent cyclists from exerting too much effort for their dynamo lights-Consequently we should forbid non-aerodynamic clothin for cyclists in future because this costs much more energy ;.) I want to address this to the German Minister for Environment, Svenja Schulze at the Awards Ceromony forthe Bundespreis Ecodesign on Nov. 26th in Berlin.   For a "detailed analysis" of the effort you have to pay for Magnic Microlights see the this video below:           9. WHICH FAMOUS CYCLIST AWARDED MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS?     Magnic Microlights win the German Federal Ecodesign Award 2018     On November 26thÃÂÃÂ  Mmagnic Microlights win the German Federal Ecodesign Award 2018 in Berlin. OUR BACKGROUND  Cycling is an important part of our live- not just as a business. Below you see images from "The Making of" video & photo material for this project. Whenever we are cycling Magnic Lights & Magnic Microlights are with us (Cycling to Calais, in Berlin,ÃÂÃÂ on straw balesÃÂÃÂ ...)      See details in the gallery ...      OUR MISSION      We all just have this one live-  why take the risk and cycle without light?    Without lighting, cyclists risk their lives in the dark - but those on the road with battery lights will soon be left in the dark when the journey takes too long or the batteries are no longer full. For those who do not want to mount heavy dynamos, use batteries or lay cables, we've launched two Kickstarter projects with our non-contact Magnic Lights, which feel like battery lighting without having to exchange or change batteries. Magnic Microlights can't be turned off at daylight and we are convinced this makes sense from a safety point of view: With lights on your visibilty increases significantly which means a great deal of safety. ILLEGAL COPIES & PLAGIARISM  On the web you can find several illegal copies of our patented technology.ÃÂÃÂ      Patent infringing Magnic Light plagiarism     The sellers don't care for patents and they also fool the customers because their produtcs don't work as promised (and will fail completely after ~30 hours usage because the internal batteries will be empty).     Our original Magnic Lights with real functionality. You can buy them directly in our webshop (Shipment within 2 days)    Watch our analysis of two nasty Magnic Light copies:      13. PAYMENT WITHOUT CREDIT CARD / BEZAHLUNG OHNE KREDITKARTE  UnterstÃÂÃÂ¼tzer aus Deutschland kÃÂÃÂ¶nnen auch per Lastschrift bezahlen. FinanzierungsbeitrÃÂÃÂ¤ge werden erst bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung nach Ablauf einer Zwei-Wochen Frist abgebucht.  Besteht ein Risiko, wenn das Projektziel nicht erreicht wird?: Nein- Nach Projektende wird der Betrag nur dann eingezogen, wenn das Projektziel erreicht wurde.  14. FAQ     Do Magnic Microlights fit to my bike?   Yes- if you have "Standard" rim brakes (Caliper, Vbrake, Cantilver brakes). Even for disc brake systems we have a clamp adapter solution- but this is just for light and does not provide brake light.    Do Magnic Microlights work with Carbon rims?   No- we need a metal rim. Aluminum is best. Magnesium works, too .ÃÂÃÂ    I want to add mutiple rewards to my pledge  . Is this possible?   Yes- This is ok for all available rewards except limited rewards (otherwise the limitation fails)ÃÂÃÂ  and complete bicycles (high shipping cost). Just add the amount for additional rewards to your pledge (without additional shipping cost). After project termination you will receive a survey where you can specify your desired combination.ÃÂÃÂ     Do I have to exchange brake pads often?   No- "Normal" cyclists exchange their bicycles more frequently than the brake pads because these usually last for more than 5000 kilometers. Hardcore bikers have to exchange the brake pads from time to time.  ÃÂÃÂ      15. PHOTO GALLERIES (FREE FOR MEDIA USAGE)     Magnic Microlights    Wega    Magnic Night Bike- Premium    Magnic Night Bike - ClassicÃÂÃÂ     Making of    Award Ceremony German Federal Design Award    Action Gallery                 Risks and challenges  With two successful Magnic Light Crowdfunding campaigns we have proven that our technology works as promised and that we are able to handle production and shipment. In the meantime we have received several awards worldwide patent grants for the Magnic Light technology. The last months we worked hard to make the Magnic Microlights ready for production and tested them thoroughly.   The Smart version will only be available, if we pass the high stretch goal. In contrast to the other rewards the smart version is not ready for production and needs some more development. For this reason delivery of the Smart version will take nearly one year (only in case the stretch goal will be reached).  We have analyzed production steps and risks carefully and don't want to promise more than we can deliver. This means that the majority of the rewards can't be shipped before May 2019.  In the project plan we have taken into account delays due to initial mistakes but it is clear that this is an estimation based on our previous experiences. We will communicate all production steps via Kickstarter updates in detail.
