Creator_description: We are a professional team with members from multiple disciplines but with one goal. We have hardware engineers, software developers, algorithm experts and designers working together with a mission to bring smart and innovative products to people's daily life.
Project_description: With all the advances in cloud storage, it can be easy to forget about the humble USB flash drive. Cloud vs. USB, which option do you choose? In fact, you need a safe option for your data and privacy both online and offline. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we created eyeDisk, the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s first USB flash drive that uses iris recognition technology for unbeatable data security. DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t settle for just any USB drive, get eyeDisk.ÃÂÃÂ                             What is Iris RecognitionÃÂÃÂ    Iris recognition is a method of biometric identification that is the most reliable and secure biometric information other than human DNA. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s not only safe, but fast. The advanced identification system authenticates a userÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s iris in only 0.5s.ÃÂÃÂ      More Secure than Fingerprint & Facial Encryption       Safe, Fast, Easy to Use     Enhanced Data Leakage Prevention ÃÂÃÂ   With eyeDisk you never need to worry about losing your USB or the vulnerability of your data stored in it. eyeDisk features AES 256-bit encryption for your iris pattern. We develop our own iris recognition algorithm so that no one can hack your USB drive even they have your iris pattern. Your personal iris data used for identification will never be retrieved or duplicated even if your USB is lost.ÃÂÃÂ             eyeDisk cares about your privacy. With the offline software, all your data is stored in the local disk, which advoids any chance of being hacked. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s super secured and easy to use.     eyeDisk Software     100% Secured without any Internet RequirementÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   eyeDisk can be used offline without any internet connection requirement and the software will not store or transmit your iris patterns, passwords, or any other information to any online location, ever.ÃÂÃÂ      Offline     One Click to Backup ÃÂÃÂ   Easy and simple to create a totally secure backup of your computer system with one click.ÃÂÃÂ      One Click to Backup                   Your Eye is your Password     Fast to Unlock ÃÂÃÂ   Using an integrated camera and advanced identification algorithm, eyeDisk can quickly capture your iris for fast authentication at a glance in 0.5s. No password required.     0.5s to Unlock     Safe to Use   eyeDisk uses the same iris recognition technology as can be found in Samsung Galaxy phones, and Google datacenter security entrance, The IR scanning method meets the safety standard of IEC-62471 for safe use and will not damage your eyes in any way.ÃÂÃÂ      Safe for Your Eyes     Smart & Versatile   eyeDisk was designed for everyone. It can identify irises of any eye color, even when wearing glasses, sunglasses, contact lenses or even in the dark.ÃÂÃÂ      Smart & Versatile                                    eyeDisk can be customized by engraving your name and email on it.     Personal Engraving                      First time backing a Kickstarter project? We figured you could use some help! Try talking to our friendly chatbot, Sebastian:                              We believe in a secure and seamless universe, where you are the key to everything. Technology knows you, so you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to know the technology. eyeDisk is created to take your data protection to a new level.ÃÂÃÂ   eyeDisk team consists of members with different disciplinary backgrounds: hardware engineers, software developers, algorithm experts, and industrial designers. Together we strive to innovate and create products that address unmet needs for critical-yet-routine identity processes, making lives simpler and easier.ÃÂÃÂ              Risks and challenges  With our years of experience in the hardware manufacturing, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for eyeDisk. We will do everything we can to deliver eyeDisk to all of our backers on-time.  However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them.

Blurb: The astronaut-designed, DJI-compatible FT Aviator puts flight control in a single hand, rather than two thumbs, for an intuitive, precise and fun way to fly!

Creator_description: Fluidity Technologies is a technology innovation company focused on redefining movement through 3-dimensonal space. Founded by former NASA astronaut, pilot and physician, Scott Parazynski, our companyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s mission is to simplify and improve motion in an increasingly complex world. Our product, the FT Aviator, is a single-handed drone controller designed to dramatically increase the precision of drone flight, while tremendously simplifying it.We are excited to launch the FT Aviator on Kickstarter and bring a better flying experience to pilots of all levels.
Project_description: Meet the FT Aviator  With the FT Aviator from Fluidity Tech, command the sky with more precision and control than previously possible. Engineered to simplify drone flight, Fluidity pilots can pick up the FT Aviator and fly right out of the box - professionals and hobbyists alike.  Compatible today with almost all DJI drones, this unique controller works collaboratively with the native DJI radio, and Fluidity app for both Android and iOS.       When an astronaut designs a drone controller  Using an astronautÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s perspective on intuitive motion through space, we have patented a unique and intuitive drone controller that anyone, whether theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re eight or eighty, can pick up and begin using immediately. ÃÂÃÂ The FT Aviator is designed to incorporate the relevant 4 degrees of freedom of movement (x, y, z, and yaw) to drone flying, eliminating the awkward interface and steeper learning curve of existing dual thumb-controlled drones. It intuitively unlocks human potential to fly and capture stunning imagery.ÃÂÃÂ    Intuitive flight control in one hand eliminates the complexity of dual thumb controllers    Smooth, controlled flight, virtually eliminating aircraft instability    Advanced camera controls for high quality photo and video capture    Situational display indicators so you always know your drone's location and orientationÃÂÃÂ     Easy to use, right out of the box    5-hour battery life    Compatible with most DJI drones, including the Mavic, Phantom, Inspire and Matrice series*ÃÂÃÂ               Plug and play   The FT Aviator is a durable, premium grade, quick-to-assemble drone flight controller consisting of a joystick, a base and a smartphone holder.   Freedom to move   The FT Aviator precisely enables the four degrees of freedom of flight applicable to drones: forward and backward (X-axis), left and right (Y-axis), up and down (Z-axis) and turning left and right (Yaw). ÃÂÃÂ    Focus on what matters   The FT Aviator reduces the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>cognitive workloadÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ for drone pilots by putting flight control in one hand along with natural and cognitive translation of hand-to-device movement, allowing focus on the image capture, and not the mechanics of how to get there.   Fly like a pro   The FT Aviator is not prone to cross-coupling, or inadvertent movements, enabling precision flight.   Adjust on the fly   Drone flight control can be modified ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>on the fly,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ maximizing a pilotÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s time on the scene while optimizing the drone and camera system for the smoothest video while shooting.ÃÂÃÂ    Control your camera like never before   The controller has dedicated buttons to slow the rates of tilt control to get smoother video sequences, as well as other commonly accessed camera functions, without having to dive into multiple layers of the app.            FT Aviator Product Photography     The FT Aviator will be constructed of high quality, durable injection molded plastics, with low friction materials for moving internal parts, and premium quality over molds for fit and comfort. The products shown on our Kickstarter page and website are 3-D printed parts, thus not fully representative of the high quality finish of the final product.    The Anatomy of the FT Aviator     FT Aviator Schematic Renders    Tips from Scott: How to Fly with the FT Aviator                                 The FT Aviator is compatible with most DJI drones* and leverages the native DJI transmitter-receiver radio, which is considered very secure, with frequency hopping and other security measures.        *Current compatibility includes Mavic Series, Phantom 3 & 4, Inspire 1 & 2, and Matrice Series.  ÃÂÃÂ  We will continue to work on compatibility with other DJI models as our technology and the DJI Air Force grows.   How FT Aviator works with DJI       1.) Bluetooth connection from FT Aviator to the smartphone app, with return telemetry for display, LED status lights, etc.  2.) Wired smartphone app connection to the DJI radio (Micro-USB, Lightning, USB C), with return video and telemetry.  3.) Radio transmission of command and control from DJI radio to drone, with return data telemetry.                            Scott Parazynski ,  Founder & CEO   Dr. Scott Parazynski is a highly-decorated and broadly-experienced U.S. Astronaut Hall of Fame astronaut, physician, pilot, and technology entrepreneur. He founded Fluidity Technologies to focus on the development of revolutionary input devices powered by machine learning to intuitively move through physical and virtual space.        George Guerrero , Co-Founder & CFO  George brings more than 20 years of extensive and diverse experience delivering cost-effective financial, operational, technology, and human resource solutions. He has significant experience leading strategic transformation and integration initiatives in companies ranging from $10 million to $2 billion in annual revenues.ÃÂÃÂ         Carolyn Scott , VP of Marketing  For more than 20 years, Carolyn has led innovative marketing initiatives for a range of companiesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> from established brands to technology start-ups. With a passion for building collaborative and impactful teams, Carolyn has successfully partnered with leadership in the food and beverage, retail, consumer electronics, and technology industries to help transform brands, launch new products and achieve business goals.        Keith Brooks , Director of External Manufacturing  Keith is a proven leader and manager, with more than 20 years of experience in global supply chain engineering and operations, delivering measurable results for multi-billion-dollar hardware and software businesses. Keith has led large cross-functional teams globally, managing budgets of $10 million and more, and has directed management of operations at the top four Tier 1 EMS providers.                      Prototyping is the most fun part of the innovation process, and usually involves cobbling together duct tape, balsa wood and spare parts! In the case of our first pre-FT Aviator models ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> cleverly named ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>v1ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>v2ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> we had a good idea of the general shape and basic mechanical features we wanted, so we churned out dozens of 3-D prints to get to the refined form factor and functionality we have now. We teamed with brilliant engineers at Motivo Engineering, Spark Aerial and Innovate, LLC to apply a lot of human factors know-how, and to dial in all of our advanced features into the product. ÃÂÃÂ                                                                                         https://fluidity.tech/         Risks and challenges  Over the past 2 years and countless prototypes, we've engineered and ironed out bugs, and we now have a functional pre-production FT Aviator. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve completed our design-for-manufacture reviews, and we have locked our mechanical and electrical designs for production. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re about to begin ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>cutting steelÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ for our injection molding tools, and have begun sourcing the myriad electronics components for our circuit boards.  Fluidity Tech will begin production of the first lot of FT Aviators at the conclusion of this campaign. As with the release of any product, there may be unforeseen obstacles that could prevent us from getting certain elements of the product just right.  We are selective in how we choose our partners, conservative in setting our timelines, and intend to spend a large amount of time in person on the factory floor. As we strive to provide you with the ultimate and safe user experience, we would not feel comfortable shipping any product until it is perfect, so there is always the possibility of a delay in product release.  We will do our utmost to keep you updated on any and all FT Aviator-related developments, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll work tirelessly to fix significant product issues before the official release of the FT Aviator.

Creator_description: 37ÃÂ¢<U+0084><U+0083> Smart Home specializes in smart furniture. We provide comprehensive smart home solutions that cover every aspect of your daily home life.
Project_description: Crafted to change the way you work, the 37ÃÂÃÂ°C Smart Home Magic Desk is the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s first gesture-controlled, height-adjustable smart desk.       ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no secret that standing at work is great for upping output. So after researching productivity-boosting practices, we decided to take standing desks to greater heights. ÃÂÃÂ        What resulted is an award-winning* smart desk thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s built with selected materials and advanced technology ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> allowing you to work at your best with ease and convenience.ÃÂÃÂ   Meet the desk that works for you.                        You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  Raise or lower the desk by simply placing your hand over the sensors ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> no buttons necessary. Set it to your ideal height between 25 and 51 inches, and work in a way that suits you.                    But itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the Integrated LED Smart Lamp desktop unit that makes this smart desk so,  well , smart.ÃÂÃÂ        With sensory technology, it flashes a gentle prompt if your posture needs correcting or youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been at your desk too long.ÃÂÃÂ After all, working smarter means working healthier.             And should you leave your desk for ten minutes, the light turns off automatically and turns on again on your return.ÃÂÃÂ             Additional features include both wireless charging and a USB port for your cell phone.     Charging can only be used when the Smart Lamp is plugged into a power source    And to top it off, the Smart Lamp is movable after charging, meaning you can further personalize your work environment.            Where other standing desks are bulky, rigid and user-unfriendly, the Magic Desk is ergonomically designed to bring comfort, style and simplicity to the modern workplace.       With three classic colors (black, white and walnut) and two length sizes (58" and 47) to choose from, all of which are made with dense medium-density fiberboard, the Magic Desk makes a fine addition to any home or work space.ÃÂÃÂ                       Standing while working isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just a fad. Charles Dickens, Virginia Woolf and Ernest Hemingway wrote their best works standing up.       Although we canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t promise youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll write a classic novel on one of our Magic Desks, you can at least improve your productivity and health.  Start with productivity. Standing at work boosts motivation and output in ways that hunching over a desk does not. A recent experiment from Texas A&M University found that employees who used standing desks were  46% more productive than those at traditional desks . ÃÂÃÂ        As for health, even if you regularly exercise, research shows that long periods of inactivity sitting in the office are detrimental to health no matter how much time you spend at the gym after work. ÃÂÃÂ   Moreover, most of us are familiar with the back aches and pains caused by bad posture from sitting at our desks. Standing, on the other hand,  helps maintain good posture and counts as physical activity . ÃÂÃÂ   No wonder Dickens, Woolf and Hemingway all worked this way. ÃÂÃÂ                  Have you ever wanted to move objects with gestures like a wizard?     Wu Junfeng    37ÃÂÃÂ°C Smart Home designer Wu Junfeng certainly did. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s how he came up with the concept for a contactless-controlled standing desk that could be raised and lowered easily.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Actually my first thought was only about designing a desk that its height can be controlled by gestures,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ Mr Wu explained.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Then the idea evolved into a comprehensive workplace solution: how could the desk help maximize your work performance? Could it also play a role in caring for your health, to deliver messages for you actively?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        One idea soon spread to others. Mr Wu decided to include a desktop unit that would gently prompt users to correct their posture and take regular breaks. ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I think the healthcare Magic Desk provides is one of the factors that make it unique,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ he added. ÃÂÃÂ   And by being a standing desk user himself, Mr Wu knew how they raised productivity. Since he started standing while working, he found himself more likely to walk around and talk with colleagues, collaborating and bouncing ideas off them, as he was already standing up. ÃÂÃÂ        The result of his ideas? A complete workplace solution that not only promoted healthy working habits, but also could encourage everyone to work smarter. ÃÂÃÂ   ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the magic of Mr WuÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Magic Desk.  About Us  Founded in July 2017, 37ÃÂÃÂ°C Smart Home is a team of specialists with a shared goal to create the perfect work space in and out of the office.ÃÂÃÂ   We do this by creating products that are as clever as they are stylish, striking a balance between smart technology and aesthetics.  In practice that means fewer buttons and wires for a better design ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> all without compromising on the intelligence of our products.                Risks and challenges  The main challenge of launching a product on Kickstarter is making and fulfilling the product within the specified timeframe. By having our own factory (as opposed to outsourcing), we are able to increase the production capacity within a very short timespan. This also offers us more flexibility production-wise.   Another advantage of having our own factory is that it enables us to offer competitive pricing, as fewer external parties are involved.    Lastly, this full control over the production process allows us to closely monitor our products' quality, as the production process can constantly be monitored and tweaked where required. Because of this, we are able to try out innovative production techniques which would otherwise be impossible.   Where we have to work with third parties, we have always opted for the best partners and logistics teams available for each region in order to meet deadlines.

Instruction sheet - Included with all rewards                                   ÃÂÃÂ #Unboxing                            QC Food Forrest d(ÃÂÃÂ°-ÃÂÃÂ°)b            $22 1 bottle of 22 Gemstones Powder - shipped to the address of your choice.  $25 1 bottle of 22 Gemstones Powder - expedited to the address of your choice. Creator_description: USAMS is a company that prototypes and manufactures smart electronic gadgets. The focus of USAMS is to establish itself as the leading and premier brand for innovative and affordable electronic gadgets.
Project_description: Do More with your Phone  Your smartphone allows you to do so many of the things that are important to you: talk to your clients, chat with your friends, communicate with your family, check your e-mails, share on social media, get some work done, listen to music, and play the games that let you relax your mind and have some fun. So, why isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t your regular phoneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s cable helping you?Introducing the USAMS Holder Functional Charging and Data Cable, a smartly designed multifunctional 4-in-1 iPhone cable that lets you do more with your phoneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>as easily and comfortably as you want to.       Be Featured on       A Cable that you Can Hold on To  Because the safety of your phone is really important to you, we created the USAMS to also work as a phone holder thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s both strong and flexible.       As you use this unique cable for fast charging and data transmitting, you can bend it in the direction you prefer or make it a holder to stabilize your cell phone, keeping it steady and tightly secured.       10000 Times Tested Durability       Adopted the thickened TPE cutout design, the USAMS is extremely durable and strong, having the cables inside safely protected.   Fast Charging and Speed Transferring   As a phone charging and data cable, the USAMS allows for a smart and fast charging experience, as much as it offers you the chance of enjoying a quick and stable data transferring usage.       Made with bolded copper cable core, this cable supports a 2A current with an improved charging efficiency of 30%, when compared with other cables on the market.  Type, Play, Create  Given that your phone is actually a working and gaming station for your busy days and for your times of leisure, we thought that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d like to have an incorporated digital stylus that makes your use of your phone more precise and comfortable when you need it.ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why the USAMS also works as a digital pen: with an Electrically Conductive Silicone Cover on the tip of the cable, you can use it as a digital stylus to write an e-mail, take notes, draw or play games as easy as it should be.       For a Lightning Connector World   If you have an IOS 9/10/11 or other IOS system, or any other device with a lightning connector, then the USAMS Holder Functional Charging and Data Cable is perfect for you.Compatible with IOS systems and lightning connector devices, this amazing and flexible cable quickly upgrades data in synchronization with IOS systems.       Flexible & Convenient  Either side of the cableÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s USB connector can be inserted to charge your phone and transfer data, the USAMS Cable is designed for an easy connection to a charger, computer or a power bank, with better plug in and out experience.       Premium Materials for a PremiumPerformance  The shell is made from aluminum alloy to protects the cableÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s inner structure, and the scrubbing design is oxidation-resistant, stable and endurableÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>for the long life you need it to have.       Smart Chip Ensures SafetyÃÂÃÂ   Also, with a built-in smart chip, the USAMS Cable filters out dangerous current, voltage and data to protect your cell phone.       Matching Your Taste   Your cell phone reflects your style and taste, and so should its accompanying cable. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re making the USAMS to you in three different colors: Black, Silver and Red.       Specifications   Brand:  USAMSÃÂÃÂ    Name:  Holder Functional Charging and Data CableÃÂÃÂ    Model:  US-SJ198ÃÂÃÂ    Texture:  TPEÃÂÃÂ    Current:  2AÃÂÃÂ    Cable length:  12 cmÃÂÃÂ    Accessories:  electric silicone cap/pen holder capÃÂÃÂ    Colors:  Black/Silver/RedÃÂÃÂ    Compatible devices:  Devices with lightning connector  Development of USAMS                         ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Like all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves. However, the USAMS team brings with it not only our passion but experience in engineering and manufacturing at scale, and we've made every effort to mitigate these risks for our backers.  With the support of our manufacturing and distribution partners, we are well prepared for the challenges ahead. Blurb: 6-Band Audio Spectrum Analyzer with 6 x New Old Stock German TELEFUNKEN EM800 Magic Eye tubes as an easy to build electronic DIY kit.

Creator_description: <!DOCTYPE html><html class="users_profile_about fontface no-js" data-request-id="8ea12f06-02ae-4d17-a03a-3f319b374fc8" lang="en
Project_description: Can you remember...       ...on grandma's old tube radio with the "magic shining green thing" in the front panel which showed the quality of the signal reception?       SABA Freiburg 11    If you're looking on the well known selling platforms for "Magic Eye" than you'll find not only a lot of tubes but also offers of VU meter kits. But here as against the most available offers you need not to supply all the voltages (normally 6 V and 250 V), you do not need to build a case, solder adapter wires for the tube's connections, have only a mono display or only one tube type which can be fitted, etc...ÃÂÃÂ      Mr. Nixie has taken all these kits, put them in a pot, added a hefty dose of the legendary Mr. Nixie Magic, and finally the  Magilyzer EM800  was created.  Absolute unique on the (DIY) world market !      Magilyzer EM800 Prototype    The  Magilyzer EM800  is an analog audio spectrum analyzer, based around an analog analyzer chip. It offers the display of six selective audio bands: 63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz and 10 kHz.ÃÂÃÂ   As an extra feature, you can mix the signal of a build in microphone to the display, to use the Magilyzer as a stand-alone device when no audio source is connected (as done in the video, standing in front of Amazon's Echo).      Magilyzer EM800 Prototype    The  Magilyzer EM800  operates with six EM800 Magic Eye tubes and has two RCA stereo in- and outputs (for easy daisy chaining the device within an existing audio path) and also two 1/8" TRS jacks for simple connecting your MP3 player, mobile phone plus headphone for listening etc.ÃÂÃÂ   Both signals (RCA and 1/8" TRS are only internal mixed and do not affect each other.  The  Magilyzer EM800  uses no digital processor or FFT (Fast Fourier Transformation); so the display is stepless and fully in realtime.  What is an audio spectrum analyzer?     DIY LED spectrum analyzer, found on Youtube    You surely know a VU meter, which shows the level of an audio signal, often build with LEDs on the DIY market.ÃÂÃÂ   The  Magilyzer EM800  now separates this audio signal into six selective bands and show their special audio level within this frequency band:    63 Hz  = Low Bass (e.g. Bassdrum)     150 Hz  = Mid Bass (e.g. Bassguitar)    330 Hz  = Low Mid (near concert pitch of the most musican instruments)    1 kHz  = Mid of voice frequency (e.g. the "beep" sound for indecent words in interviews)     3.3 kHz  = Presence (e.g. "sch" in the word  Schedule  or the imitated sound of a steam locomotive)    10 kHz  = Heights (e.g. "ssss")   And as an absolute unique feature, the  Magilyzer EM800  displays the level not on "ordinary" LED display (as seen on the sample picture above) or VFD display or on a computer screen or even in an App of your mobile phone but on  six EM800 Magic Eye tubes  made in the end of the 60's by TELEFUNKEN / Germany.      Prototype, next to Amazon's Echo, running on microphone    You'll get a fully complete DIY kit and complete means complete:ÃÂÃÂ    PCBs with pre-assembled SMD parts  All necessary through hole components  All necessary mounting hardware  Complete enclosure with anodized aluminium and acylic frames  15 VDC wall mart power supply with EU mains and (if necessary) adaptor for US included   6 x EM800 tubes on request (you can order a 2nd set for spare)          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                SMD pre-assembled PCB       Assembled main board but still without heatsink       Assembled tube board       PCBs mounted (but still without heatsink)          Features        15 V DC supply input   Inrush current suppression.  2 x Stereo RCA in- and outputs for easy daisy chaining in an existing audio path.  2 x Stereo 1/8" TRS jacks for easy connecting your MP3 player, mobile phone or headphone.   Selectable audio channel (right / both / left) for display.  Build-in microphone signal can be mixed.  63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz, 10 kHz spectrum level are displayed on 6 x EM800 Magic Eye tubes  Positive grid bias for the tubes adjustable for a kind of "screen saver" when no signal is applied.    Audio compandor for a wider display range.  Engraved frequencies on top cover are red illuminated.  Solid anodized Aluminium profiles.  Anthracite mirrored acrylic top cover with engraving.       Screening PCB for bottom       What you'll need for assembling:   Good electronic and soldering skills.  3 hours of your evening time with no hurry.  A clear, well-lit area in which to work.  Soldering station and fine electronic solder.  Multimeter to check the generated voltages.  Electronic tools.  A loupe may be helpful    TX8/10 (Torx), PH1/2 and mini slotted screwdriver  6 x EM800 Magic Eye tubes      Wouldn't it be the ultimate Christmas present for any tube audio enthusiast?   Now you have the opportunity to "capture" this unique DIY kit for an absolute special Christmas price.     These are the parts what you need to assemble     Here's a part of the schematic for the exact input configuration      only the black coloured parts needs to be assembled manually (through hole components)     Some words about the "unkown" EM800 tubes from TELEFUNKEN           These tubes were the absolutely final development of Magic Eye tubes in 1966. They has been primary designed as a channel-no. display on the upcomming first generation of European colour TV sets.  However, the time was just too late for preamplifier tubes as in the end of the 60's transistors came up to be used in the tuner stages of the TV sets and tubes become extinct (except for the picture tube for sure and their high voltage supply).  This very first production batch of the TELEFUNKEN EM800 tubes were comercial never used in many devices. Radiomuseum.org for example reports only from three GRUNDIG colour TV sets from 1967 and two DYNACHORD power amplifiers which has used this tube (and for sure the Magilyzer first version).     Result for "EM800" tube search on Radiomuseum.org    So the EM800 have never left Germany or Europe, are very unknown in the rest of the world and has spend their last 50 years unused in German warehouses.ÃÂÃÂ   On the other hand,  these tubes has been a big improvement  of the well known EM84 / EM87 (6FG6 / 6HU6) or their clones 6E2 (China) and 6E3-P (Russia)  as the illuminated screen started here from bottom  (like a real VU meter)  and not from the middle.   The EM800 are still available in thousands of pcs. for a resonable price.    Here   you can read the German datasheet of the EM800   How hot will the aparatus run after two weeks of continuous operation (!!!)              You're asking about the lifespan of these EM800 tubes?   Me too, many years before ;-) for sure. So I have created a "NixieCam" on my old homepage:     Screenshot from the NixieCam in 2011    Left and right hand on the screen you'll see four of my "Magic Eye Winkers"; Video  here . I kept all these devices (incl. Nixieclock "Marcel" and the NixieTherm ) powered up for one year ~ 8,800 hrs continuously.   The left hand "Winkers" are equipped with an EM84 and EAM86, the right hand Winkers with EM81 and EM80.But every three month I need to replace the right hand EM's with new tubes as they became really blind and you could see nothing more from the illuminated screen on the webcam. The left hand EM's have not lost any noticable brightness during this one year stress test.   For sure - as you might also see - they are using not such a "fine" green shining phosphor as the older versions on the right hand, but this "more modern bluish green" increases the livespan a lot.   BTW: It looks that this is the same phosphor which is used in the modern VFD displays...      Risks and challenges  The new Magilyzer EM800 is a further development and improvement of the first DIY version (see it on  www.Nixiekits.eu ) which is now nearly sold out. Therefore are new batch needs to be designed and ordered. The SMD pre-assembled PCBs are already arrived. Now I need this crowdfounding project to order for an affordable price the electrical / mechanical parts and the EM800 tubes to have the kits ready for shipping just in time for Christmas; therefore Express shipping for backers outside EU in the 1st December week is recommended to compensate the shipping delay during Christmas business on customs clearence on "ordinary" postal service (up to 21 days incl. shipping time).  For a "reference" see my finished project here:  https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/564166384/nixietherm-nixie-bargraph-tube-indoor-thermometer  The DIY kit rewards has been shipped until 20th October 2018.

Creator_description: Replace all of your cooking devices with this Wi-Fi-connected multi-cooker that can sous vide, deep fry, simmer, sear, saute, boil, steam and slow cookÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ all while autonomously stirring the food.Use the MasterSous mobile app to remotely adjust cook times and control the automatic stirring mechanism that keeps food in constant motion for even cooking.
Project_description: MasterSous allows you to  sous vide, deep fry, simmer, sear, saute, boil, steam and slow cook  food without any extra add-ons, accessories or devices.ÃÂÃÂ        For recipes that require constant or occasional stirring, MasterSous is your hands-free assistant.   Now you can caramelize onions for an hour without standing over the pot.  And if you're making a popular dish like risotto, it's even easier ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> just select the pre-programmed, one-touch setting and go.  MasterSous also allows you to program the stirring speed and stirring interval. For instance, you can set your grandma's pasta sauce to stir slowly every 2 minutes for 4 hours.       The digital controls  allow for precise control of time and temperature , so that your food doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t overcook or burn.  MasterSousÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> cooking temperature can range from 100ÃÂÃÂ°F to 450ÃÂÃÂ°F, and its infrared temperature sensor makes sure itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s precise. It also has  pre-set food settings  for more than eight types of common oils, so you can heat oil right up to its smoking point, without going over, for perfect crispness and moisture retention.ÃÂÃÂ        With the MasterSous mobile app for iOS and Android devices,  all of the settings that are available on the machine are at your fingertips, even when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re out of the house.ÃÂÃÂ    You can increase the cook time or temperature, know exactly when your food is done, keep the food warm or shut it off altogether. MasterSous will also alert you if cooking has been interrupted.       The beauty of MasterSous is that you can get rid of all the other bulky cookers that clutter your counters and replace them one  modern, yet classic,  device. Plus, i t comes in four different colors,  so you can choose what best matches your style.  MasterSous is the perfect accessory to every kitchen!       But, if keeping your cooking tools out isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t your thing, MasterSous is only 16.5 inches tall and 18 inches wide, so  it will easily fit tucked away .ÃÂÃÂ        And donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry, just because itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s sleek doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t mean MasterSous isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t roomy. MasterSous has  plenty of space (6 quarts!)  to cook large amounts of food for the whole familyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦  and still have leftovers  for friends! The MasterSous sensors make it easy to  tell when your food is ready  through the infrared temperature sensor. WhatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more, the cooking  interruption indicator  will send a message straight to your smartphone should something interrupt your cooking. The sensors even enlist  auto-shut off  when your food is done.ÃÂÃÂ        Take away the stigma of cleaning up with MasterSous. MasterSousÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>  non-stick materials make cleanup a cinch , so you can get to the fun stuffÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦eating! He served on this committee from 2013 to 2015.ÃÂÃÂ   As the inventor, Dr. Collins brings vision, motivation, inspiration, and team build in order to help engage and deliver MasterSous.       Started by Steve Casteel, Parallel Design opened its doors for business in 1998 as product development firm. We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make MasterSous a reality.ÃÂÃÂ   We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t give a dollar or purchase a MasterSous, if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a supporter of MasterSous, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!ÃÂÃÂ          --ÃÂÃÂ              Risks and challenges  There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:1,402 backers|United Kingdom:150 backers|Canada:111 backers|Sweden:87 backers|Germany:82 backers|Australia:54 backers|Netherlands:48 backers|Norway:33 backers|Denmark:32 backers|Switzerland:31 backers
Creator_description: Simone Giertz is a Swedish inventor, YouTuber and robotics enthusiast. She is world-renowned for her useless machines and has risen to the very top of the field, mainly because the field is very tiny and not of interest of the general populous.
Project_description: What is one small thing that would improve your life if you just did it every day?  It could be anything, big or small.ÃÂÃÂ Like flossing, reading, writing, doing yoga, eating churros, doing sit ups (while eating churros), practicing an instrument or learning a new word.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        But take it from someone who's never managed to keep a New Year's resolution: making commitments is easy.  Keeping them is what is hard.   The Every Day Calendar has a non-volatile memory, so even if it loses power or if your turn it off, it'll remember what days were lit up I keep my habits, I get to tap that day to light it up. It's like getting a gold star sticker, but way less sticky.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        How to get started with the Every Day Calendar   1.  Read this list. You're doing great so far.   1.5  Get an Every Day Calendar. (Using the ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ .5 ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ somehow makes this feel less pushy)   2.  Set a goal for yourself. "Being healthier" is a great intention but let's make it more tangible than that. I struggle a lot with stress, so my goal was to meditate every day.   3.  Lower the bar. Make it something you can do even on the most chaotic of days. You can always do more on days when you have more time. My goal was at least ten minutes of meditation a day.ÃÂÃÂ    4.  Hang the Every Day Calendar in your home, office, workshop, cavern, laboratory, castle, barn or boat. Just make sure that it's someplace where you see it every day. The Every Day Calendar is 0% internet connected, so no apps, wifi, bluetooth or computer programs are needed to set it up. Just plug it into the wall and you're ready to go.   5-ÃÂ¢<U+0088><U+009E>.  Live your best life with the Every Day Calendar.ÃÂÃÂ        The Every Day Calendar also works for tracking non-daily habits like watering plants, changing your contacts, calling your granddad or for period tracking.  What's insideÃÂÃÂ   You know printed circuit boards, those things that are in every electronic product you've ever used? If you don't, I get it. Printed circuit boards, or PCBs, are mostly tucked away on the inside, and you don't really get to see or interact with them as a consumer.  For the Every Day Calendar, we did it the other way around: we took the regular circuit board that everyone else is trying to hide, and designed it to be the front display.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        What ensued was a really fun design challenge that pushed printed circuit board technology to the limits in terms of size and functionality. The hexagon pattern is made out of gold-immersed copper, a common circuit board feature that's not usually used for aesthetics, but things like solder pads and traces.ÃÂÃÂ         Designing the pattern for the front display   Instead of having costly mechanical components like switches and buttons, the Every Day Calendar uses capacitive touch. And without solder masks, circuit boards themselves are translucent. That is what allows the LEDs to shine through when you light up a day.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The Every Day Calendar has a non-volatile memory, so even if it loses power or if your turn it off, it'll remember what days were lit up.        Testing different color LEDs and translucence  ÃÂÃÂ   Open source (and there's a secret programming port too)  I get that people might want to pick this thing apart. And that you're probably one of those people since you're reading this section. That's why we're open-sourcing the schematics for the Every Day Calendar, and putting a USB programming port on the back.       RewardsÃÂÃÂ        Every Day Calendar schematics  t-shirt , proven to make wearers laugh.ÃÂÃÂ        Get a unique  printed photo  from the making of the Every Day Calendar.       And obviously, the  Every Day Calendar itself . Keyholes in the back to make hanging easy (after a little bit of futzing, let's be honest)ÃÂÃÂ   How is this calendar different from other calendars?ÃÂÃÂ   As for a lot of things, it's all about what you put into it. Without you having a clear intention, the Every Day Calendar is just that: a pretty calendar. But combined with a goal for a daily habit that you want to add your life it's a powerful way to keep yourself on track.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         No, I'm not above using cute dogs to sell this calendar   Thank you  There are so many people who have helped make the dream of the Every Day Calendar a reality. The list is long, but I don't want to sound like a drunk uncle at a wedding so I'll keep it short.   Engineering team ÃÂÃÂ         Cedric Bosch,  Ray Kampmeier, Jake Zimmer,  Ross Huber  and Marcos Ramirez: you made this project feel like a party. But one of those parties where you mostly talk about capacitive touch sensors, product distributors and safety standards. Thank you for joining me on this journey. Much more to come.   Video production ÃÂÃÂ        Brett Sims, of  Alkali Productions,  for helping make this video way prettier than we could do by ourselves. And for wearing shirts with great prints.   Music   Karaoke-ing praises at the top of my lungs to Jon Reichardt for composing music for this video and a huge shout out toÃÂÃÂ  Chymes  for their song  Clouds.  You can check out more of their music  here . My karaoke album is yet to be released - but thank you for asking.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         You. Yes,    you    Mostly I want to thank you. Even if you don't end up buying the Every Day Calendar, just coming over here and checking it out means a lot to me. And it takes a lot of trust to believe that someone who's mostly known for building useless things actually could make a difference. But the Every Day Calendar has made a huge difference for me, and I hope it could make one for you too.  Here's a gold star for getting to the bottom of this page. That one's free for today. Get the calendar if you want more.ÃÂÃÂ    Over and out, ÃÂÃÂ                 Risks and challenges  We are still looking into manufacturing partners and things are fairly open-ended until then. The trickiest part is the two giant circuit boards since it's a bit out of the ordinary, but there are still plenty of manufacturers who have that capability. We'll keep you posted along the way!

Creator_description: World leading industrial design company.
Project_description: Having problems with WiFi?             ÃÂÃÂ  Introducing the new PowerCube |WiFi| ÃÂÃÂ             Tired of WiFi dead zones? PowerCube |WiFi| can connect to your WiFi router as a repeater. It helps strengthen WiFi signals from any existing router to reach those low to no WiFi zones.                 PowerCube |WiFi| is more than a wireless range extender. Simply plug in an Ethernet cable into the port to turn your wired internet connection into a wireless access point. It instantly provides you with consistent and reliable high speed WiFi.                 Share your WiFi with your guests and friends. Also, protect your WiFi connection by creating your own username and password.ÃÂÃÂ             PowerCube |WiFi| comes in two versions, the Original and Extended. You can plug in Powercube Original |WiFi| directly into the wall outlet. PowerCube Extended |WiFi| has a 5ft cable and can be mounted to any flat surface.            The number of connected devices is shown on the PowerCube |WiFi|.            Simply insert Powercube |WiFi| into a power socket. Follow the simple instructions on the pop-up window of your device. Now, you are good to go!                 PowerCube |WiFi| is a compact device that is ideal for use at home or an office. It provides you 4 additional outlets that avoid outlet blockage, keeping things easy and efficient. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s sleek appearance blends into the dÃÂÃÂ©cor of your home or office.                      ÃÂÃÂ Need a better connection: In your backyard? Upstairs? Streaming entertainment? Online gaming?ÃÂÃÂ   Connect your PowerCube |WiFi| anywhere around your home, school, and office. It will give you an instant WiFi boost.ÃÂÃÂ        Choose between two modes: Wireless mode or Ethernet plug in mode. Then just sit back, relax, and enjoy the boosted wireless connectivity all around your home.      Click for available sockets&plugs types and media kit                                                            Risks and challenges  The main challenge of launching a product on Kickstarter is making and fulfilling the product within the specific timeframe. Since we have gained plenty experience in the design and manufacturing of innovative products from the previous projects, Allocacoc is confident that we will be able to fulfill the project within the specified time frame. In addition, Allocacoc has full control over the production process, which allows us to closely monitor our products' quality, as the production process can constantly be monitored and tweaked where required. Ensuring high quality with affordability to our customers is very important to us.

Creator_description: Founded in 2018, crewbands designs and develops security products for sailors and boaters.Both founders are ocean enthusiasts and always looking for ways to improve their sport.
Project_description: You made it happen! 100% funded in only 48 hours!   Select your package on the right and back our project - get your Crewband with up to 50% discount, only on Kickstarter and for the campaign duration.             ÃÂÃÂ Your new smart safety-wearable.       With Crewbands, we developedÃÂÃÂ an  easy-to-use  system that alerts instantly in case of an emergency and shows vital information for the rescue operation on the screens of connected phones ( no cell signal required ).ÃÂÃÂ Our hardware will support the search and rescue operation, even help to prevent it.       Crewbands are  solar powered , improve both the connection quality to the app as well as the working range and are equipped with a  smart water sensor.  The technical design and circuit board have been  optimised  for energy efficiency, connection stability and daily use.       When spending your day on a boat, preferably in the sun, you might not want to constantly be reminded of possible mishaps. This is why we tried to minimise the size of the Crewband and keep it light. You will be agile and free, but always safe - this is our premise.       We also wanted to create a device that can be worn 24/7, without first having to attach it to your safety vest or jacket. The energy efficiency we achieved allows for up to 2 days of complete darkness, after which you might want to charge your Crewbands using any light source available to you - even a lamp will suffice.       Want to try the system first?  Our apps are free of charge, so you can download and try them out any time. If you want to test the system first, simply connect to your fitness tracker or smartwatch. That's right, you can also use them as safety wristband. Of course, the connection stability and range will depend on the hardware you use, and we cannot speak for how good it will be.  There is a solution for this as well, your very own Crewband.              The start of Team Crewbands.  After thorough testing in rivers, lakes and the sea, we decided to talk to professional sailors and fellow developers.ÃÂÃÂ Their feedback encouraged us to proceed and make this product real.  During the Vienna Race of the  Austrian Sailboat Racing Series , we showed the prototype to sailing professionals and enthusiasts. They did not only like our product, but also our presentation - especially the part where they got to throw one of us in the water constantly.       As we are ocean enthusiasts, we had to tip our hat to one of the great oceanographers. We mean this quite literally, which is why we wear red beanies - which you can purchase as well, check out our rewards.       You made our day and helped fund the project!  Help us to grow even bigger and get your Crewband with the special Kickstarter discount!      ÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ Prototypes     The history of our prototypes    TimelineÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  We have been working on Crewbands for over a year and developed the key parts such as the electronic, watertight wristband and Android (available) and iOS app (awaiting approval any day now). The founding team are experts in their field and know the necessary steps to bring Crewbands to the market.  To gain more real life experience with the quality and reliability of a Crewband, the next step is to conduct a big test round with sailing experts over several month in different conditions. This may lead to insights that make changes to the current version necessary.  However, we know that life is not always fully predictable and there might be unforeseen troubles waiting for us on the road to mass production. We have a great network of industry partners and other startups that have manufactured products before. We will further leverage this network to ensure we can bring our Crewbands to life and into your hands.  The main challenges we see are:  Bluetooth Range: To prevent false alarms, a good bluetooth connection reliability is key. We will put a lot of effort into optimising the connection range in specialised laboratories to ensure a good user experience.  Watertightness: Packing so much technology in so little space at this price point challenges our goal to make each Crewband safe to dive with up to 10m. We put a lot of effort into assuring you will anyway be able to wear the Crewbands 24/7, even if you dive for the anchor.  Certifications  To sell Crewbands in Europe, North America and other selected regions, we need to comply, amongst others, with CE and FCC certifications. This process is complex and can potentially require more time than expected.  With your help we can and will make it happen!

Creator_description: Hi!We are aiming to change the way people engage and interact with technology - for the better! We have created an Augmented Reality (AR) head mounted display, the MagiMask, and MagiTrackers that lets you place digital objects in the real world. This lets you explore, create and learn in ways never seen before.
Project_description: Second time Kickstarter-creators presenting MagiMask - An immersive, high resolution Augmented Reality headset for your smartphone. Including physical trackers that lets you interact with the digital world in new ways.                                The world's first, high definition, easy-to-use, immersive Augmented Reality Headset, combined with physical tracker objects, that allows you to easily interact with the digital world in new ways.            Here's a selection of 10 of our favorite AR apps, that works out of the box when you receive your MagiMask and MagiTools. We believe the best way to explore the opportunities that AR presents is to explore, learn and play!.           ÃÂÃÂ We went out in the streets of Oslo and let random people in all ages try the MagiMask - and got some awesome responses!            ÃÂÃÂ We are proud and honored to be featured in so many great tech-outlets. Feel free to look them up and read more about what they have to say.   GadgetFlow:ÃÂÃÂ  https://thegadgetflow.com/blog/magimask-ar-headset/   Wired:  https://www.wired.it/gadget/accessori/2018/11/12/magimas-realta-aumentata-smartphone/    VentureBeat:ÃÂÃÂ  https://venturebeat.com/2018/10/16/startup-ludenso-takes-on-magic-leap-and-hololens-in-augmented-reality/                             Our revolutionary lenses have been developed in cooperation with some of Norways' best opticians, and have a patent pending globally. Take a look through our lenses, and see the super high resolution for yourself.                The short explanation for why we deliver 4X the resolution is all because of the optics.On VR, the content is splitted in two,  one picture for each eye. So, even a smartphone with a resolution of 1920x 1080, will only provide 960x 1080. But then the aspect ratio is completely off. In order to keep the aspect ratio (usually 16:9 for most 2D-content), the image has to be shrunk (as shown below to the left) to ~960x540, which turns into 1/4 of the smartphones original resolution. With MagiMask however, we're able to give you the full resolution (picture to the right).                  The objects are optimized for computer vision, which ensures a stable tracking of your models, and you can also use the MagiDice as a controller for interacting with the digital world.            So the MagiMask also works perfectly as a MovieMask, making it the perfect gadget for all the movie lovers out there. Based on our unique lens technology, it works out-of-the-box forNetflix, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and all your exisiting apps. Just plug and play!       The MagiMask is actually based on our previous product, the MovieMask, which we have sold and delivered over 10.000 units to over 70 countries so far, and that currently sells in retail for $129.                                                                 AR scenes shot with GoPro through MagiMask               README (for Developers/Creators)ÃÂÃÂ          Why   Augmented reality reveals a new world of possibilities and now is the time to join - creating the standards of our new reality. With MagiMask and MagiTools we are giving you the starting point to unleash your creativity and participate in a passionate community. By using this platform, you can be sure that there will be people using your creations in AR, and that we together can shape the future of digital interactions.    How   The MagiTools are specially designed to make the transition between our reality and augmented reality as natural as possible. Reaching out to get to know more about an object is an ultimate path of least resistance, thus letting the user to immerse themselves in your experience. The patterns of MagiTools have been optimised through several iterations to be best understood by the image recognition software. We will also give all the developers access to our code in order to enable easy interactions with the MagiTools, e.g. by using the dice as a controller, and so forth.   Cooperation with Manomotion - control technology with your hands      Testing Manomotion through MagiMask in Stockholm    Thanks to Manomotion, we are now also able to control technology with our hands. It is one step closer to Iron Man studio and a more accessible HoloLens. With ManomotionÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s SDK you can create applications where your hand movements are recognised by the camera on your phone. You can get your SDK (working for iOS, Android and Unity) here: https://www.manomotion.com/getstarted                                                    With the MagiMask, anyone can get an immersive augmented reality experience. Our team also has a lot of ideas for great products in the future that we want to build. But, we canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t do it alone. Right now, YOU can choose which projects and technologies become a reality. Help us bring the high resolution AR experience to the masses by backing us now.        ÃÂÃÂ Yes!  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve made a FAQ section below. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, messages, and via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us - we are always happy to help!      Risks and challenges  The team is fully devoted to making MagiMask a success, but we are of course aware that there are risks connected with creating something completely new. We are a team of second time Kickstarter-creators (first product was called MovieMask, with an older generation version of the same optical principle). We have shipped thousands of products to over 70 countries - where around 98% was delivered on time (and the last 2% was delayed in the mail due to peak Christmas season last year). We feel confident that we can deliver to you on time this campaign as well and understand the frustration that can arise when projects donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t deliver on time.   Even though we have a functional prototype now with close to finished aesthetics, our american Quality Control-partner has not yet finished their report on the MagiMask. If they require different processes in the manufacturing that our production partner offers, this could lead to delay or, worst case scenario, the MagiMask as of today is not fit for mass-production.  The software that we are developing in-house and in collaboration with 3rd party developers are to be considered as demoes until we have an app on the iOS and Play store. Nonetheless, we will work on making a comprehensive list of all existing apps that can be downloaded at the time of receiving the product.  Last time we also got a lot of questions regarding customs. As of October 16th 2018, backers from USA and many other countries pay no customs for our price point, but other countries does. Please check out your local custom rules is this is important to you as we will not pay this.  We have also heard and spoken with Kickstarter-campaigns that were more successful than our funding goal, reached them, but still got troubles due to the logistics. From our interviews, this includes unreliable business partners, miscalculating costs and setting out a distribution system that is not fit for the scale of the demand. We plan to use the same production partners, quality control partners and logistics partners as we have used before and believe this will reduce the risk compared to first-time business relationships.   Please contact  kickstarter@ludenso.com  for any inquiries or tips for improvement!  Best regards The MagiMask-team

Creator_description: Petato is an innovator of pet care technology and products that smarten different aspects of the human-fauna relationship including but not limited to cleaning, feeding, grooming, and sporting. It's our ultimate pursuit to turn people's home into a utopia for pets, or in our way of saying, "Petopia in the making"ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008B>.
Project_description: CAVEAT: We've found SCAMMERS "selling" Footloose. Please be careful about any FAKE websites. Kickstarter and CrowdOx.com (our post-campaign pledge management platform) are the only official channels for backing Footloose.                                     Cleaning litter boxes is certainly an unpleasant routine. But what was your feeling last time when confronted a toilet un-flushed? Gotcha! I mean, felines have a well-earned reputation as immaculate creatures. They need a clean toilet just like we do.  Footloose is invented to keep your cats' treasure-burying ground always clean. Each time after they finish their business, Footloose starts an 8-min countdown and then initiates a cleaning cycle that funnels all wastes into a tightly-sealed receptacle. All you've to do is to discard the waste bag once in a while.       OmniClean Technology  Existing contraptions have failed what they're built for. Most of them break down within a year of purchase. While cleaning, they cause a lot of waste debris or even get themselves polluted. It feels like you would rather just scoop the litter at the outset.  So we developed OmniClean technology that actually works. The meticulous fusion of hive-style sieve, curvy funnel, fine-tuned turning speed and powerful torque is a result of our unwavering engineering pursuit. Then with a little blessing of the gravitational force, it turns the arduous frustration into a hassle-free pleasure.            A Zero-Compromise Solution  Footloose is a real life hack that embodies our zero-compromise ethos. We invented this system so that you can say goodbye to scooping without compromising on other aspects.                 Footloose is the smartest littering robot you can ever imagine. SiftAutonomy algorithms give it the intelligence to recognize each critter in multi-cat households, distinguish litter from cats, detect its perimeter and monitor waste level. To enable that, Footloose includes 3 weight sensors, 4 position gauges, a 360ÃÂÃÂ° millimeter-wave transceiver, 2 infrared sensors and 2 powerful computing cores.       The Wireless Litter Box System  After unboxing, pair up Footloose with your home WiFi via Smart Config. It'll stay connected thus you can control it in the Petato App wherever you're. Tweak settings that suit you better and do update firmware for new features in the future.                                                                                               According to veterinarians, potty behavior is a barometer of health. The advantage of scooping is probably that you can check the waste to see whether your cat is in a good shape. But this is the one thing people always ignore until something bad happens.  With ActiveTrack, we can now proactively monitor cats' physical conditions. Footloose indicates you when there is an anomaly. Some symptoms are difficult to spot by human eyes but can hardly hide from the robots. For example, increased attempts to urinate with small volumes is barely noticeable by human but can be a serious sign of urinary problems.       All data is streamed to your smartphone for reference at any time. We can't generalize a Ph.D thesis topic into several lines here but at the bottom line, these data points are highly helpful for diagnosis when you visit a vet's office.            The debate over open or hooded box is unsettled. Though every pet cat is different, it can be inferred from their outdoor equivalents that the need for fresh air, large space, and relatively sheltered spot is universal. It's this cat-centric philosophy that gives birth to Footloose's form factors.       Good for Small or Old Cats  To facilitate smaller or elder cats with reduced agility, a doorstep is provided. Additionally, the upper surface of the receptacle is engraved with a cascade pattern that serves as a step for in and out.       Sympathy for The Weaker  If you've two or more cats, there may be a hierarchy in their society. Those who are less dominant may often get harassed while toileting. However, in the raised chamber, they look taller hence are less prone to a fight put up by another aggressive cat.       100% Safe & Secure  All the current self-cleaning litter boxes have one common issue: while the mechanical parts are moving, cats can still get inside, unnoticed. In edge cases, this even leads to fatal injuries, especially for petite cats or other small pets such as ferrets.  Footloose is totally safe & secure thanks to three layers of protection. As our signature design, the chamber opening closes while spinning, which prevents cats from entering. More proactively, a millimeter-wave detector picks up any motion of pet or kid within the 30 cm range. It stops the machine right away and resumes after the perimeter is cleared. Lastly, if a tiny critter manages to get in from above, the agile weight sensors can pick up even the slightest change and alert the owner immediately.ÃÂÃÂ                                       Litter box odor is annoying. But Footloose is here to help. Physically, the waste receptacle is concealed as airtight as possible. There won't be any waste exposed in the open air. On the other hand, the stench you smell is mainly ammonia and some sulfide compounds - they get decomposed by a deodorizing unit.       The process is known as photocatalysis, same technology used by  NASA  in space missions. During the process, UV light energizes the catalyst (mainly titanium dioxide, TiO2) rested in the porous zeolite materials, triggering chemical reactions that neutralize the odor at molecular level, and producing primarily carbon dioxide and water as byproducts.       Footloose works with any cat litter that clumps, as well as silica gel crystals. Our ingenious hexagonal sifting holes are designed to allow litter of different sizes and shapes to pass through efficiently. They're optimized such that no litter will be left out or wasted. When litter returns to the chamber, the pliable sieve lets it fall gently, which minimizes dust.  We've experimented all kinds of litter, including the most popular clumping clay. However, we notice that bentonite granules often get stuck within cats' paws. These granules can be swallowed by cats when they are licking the paws. It's very dangerous as clay is non-digestible. As for crystals, they usually have ragged surfaces, which is not ideal for cats because with a large concentration of nerve receptors, their paws are sensitive. Therefore, we use the biodegradable corn litter mostly now. And it works perfectly well with Footloose.            Litter tracking and spillage are minimized with Footloose. Holes on the doorstep helps stretch cats' paws to get rid of the granules. Also, as cats jump out of the box from above, litter is tracked within a small area outside the single opening, better than all the place in your house.            We used almost all self-cleaning litter boxes available on the market. We were confused by those "more advanced" models. The buttons, lights, colors, blinks, etc. were overwhelming. Let alone the glitches that require troubleshooting frequently.  Features, from our perspective, shall not override usability. Footloose is equipped with a crispy LED display and only one button. The display shows machine status that is worth noticing, including Countdown, Cleaning, Emptying, Pairing, Error and Full. The button is mostly used for manually triggering or pausing a cleaning cycle.       Interactions Made Easy  We're committed to deliver you the best possible user experience. The functional details are not only ergonomic, but also proven highly useful in different scenarios.                 Designed to safeguard your furry friends as well as your wallet, Footloose is a one-time investment that saves you both time and money. Paying for custom-made liners, cat litter, waste receptacles, cartridges or other replacements should be an option, not a voluntary-but-mandatory cost to claim the benefits of automation.  Note: Assume 2 cats. Detailed calculations are available in this  shared spreadsheet  .                                                At Petato, it's our innovative minds that set us apart. We're a passionate team of designers, engineers and social entrepreneurs who are true ailurophiles. We bring objects to life through creative designs, robotics and artificial intelligence, allowing people to live smarter with their furry friends and turning people's home into a utopia for pets.  Our Founder Byron always knew he wanted to create disruptive tech to make things easier for pets and pet parents. The idea for Petato began after hearing friends were giving away their pets because of pregnancy or their busy schedules. This led to taking on the challenge of creating an automatic cat toilet that would enable cat owners to take better care of the fur-kids. Prior to founding Petato, Byron spent 3 years and contributed to its skyrocketing growth at DJI where his last role was the project manager for Matrice drones, FlightHub and other commercial application products. He was also the lead DJI rep of the SkyFund through which an ecosystem around drone platforms was developed from the ground up.  Why Kickstarter?  We've completed design for manufacturing & assembly (DFMA) reviews. The next step is to create the tools that are necessary to manufacture different plastic parts of Footloose. Given the size of it, the biggest tool we're talking about will be as long as 4 ft in one direction. In contrast, a tool for your earbuds is just the size of a Coke can. Tooling cost of Footloose is about $300K. Though we're committed to deliver this product whatsoever, it'd be helpful to have a clear visibility of how many units we need to produce in the first batch.        ÃÂÃÂ Video by Launch Light Films         This project is promoted by    Jellop   , the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $235MM raised between them.                   Risks and challenges  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re dedicated to delivering a flawless product, and you can rest assured that we'll do everything to fulfill your expectations. This is not our first Kickstarter campaign, and we've smoothed out many potential problems that may arise with production and fulfillment.  PRODUCT We spent tireless months enjoying the process of bringing Footloose to life. Now Footloose is almost complete. We've painstakingly chosen all the materials and production processes involved in the making of Footloose. However, there may be slight changes made to the finished product that will be shipped out to you. In any case, we promise to update you promptly and explain the nature and rationale behind any change.  PRODUCTION  We've already included holidays in the schedule. We work in very close collaboration with our manufacturer to ensure everything runs smoothly. Nevertheless, unexpected delays in production are still a possibility and may push back our estimated delivery date. We promise to keep you in the loop at all times and be fully transparent with you every step of the way.  TRADE AFFAIRS We'll be shipping you Footloose directly from our contract manufacturer in the Shenzhen area. For US backers, generally there will be no import duty for goods with a value lower than $800. However, we don't know where the "trade war" between US and China is heading or whether any tariff will be imposed. We had no issue shipping previous Kickstarter pledges but we'll keep a close eye on the latest policy.

Creator_description: Wisejet was established in February 2015 by a team of professors and researchers from KAIST University (the Korean equivalent to MIT), in order to develop innovative wireless transmission technology for VR, HDMI, and gaming devices.
Project_description: "The Must Have Gadget for Your Smartphone!"   The V-JET 4K HDMI Wireless Display   Your phone is a revolutionary device with only one critical flawÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s tiny. LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s fix that. We are here to Expand Your View.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  Description: ÃÂÃÂ   The V-JET is simple. Designed to comfortably connect to your phone, laptop, or other USB-C type device allowing for direct (no-wifi needed), wireless display to your television.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                  ÃÂÃÂ  *Phone and Tripod is not included.    Why V-JET 4K?   We made this device with these questions in mind:ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        That is why the V-Jet 4K offers solutions to all these things! WaitÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ 4K? Wireless 4K?ÃÂÃÂ   Yes, it supports 4K. ÃÂÃÂ And it uses 60Ghz wireless technology.  We live and breath by our motto:ÃÂÃÂ     "Expand Your View"    To us, that means we must do more than simply display to your TV.  Everything  must be expanded.        What is V-JET 4K?   The device is composed of two parts. The Transmitter that connects to your phone, laptop, or computer. The Receiver that connects your TV, monitor or projector.ÃÂÃÂ                        Who Likes Us? ÃÂÃÂ        What Do You Get?  If you back this project you will receive the V-JET 4K device (both parts). Included will be a specialized USB-C to USB-C cord to connect the device with your phone, laptop, or other USB-C type device.       How to Use the V-JET 4K?  It's very easy! Simply plug the HDMI to the TV and MicroUSB from your power source into the Receiver. Then connect your phone (or other device) to the transmitter with the USB-C cable!        The Many Ways to Experience V-JET 4K    Gaming: ÃÂÃÂ         Yoga/Instructing:         Cooking/Baking:        V-Jet In Action:                            ÃÂÃÂ  *Actual products will be in black color.ÃÂÃÂ     Compatibility:    Device works with: USB Type-C smartphone and Laptop         So that brings us to nowÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦   This is the second version of the V-JET device. Earlier this year the previous device received a prestigious award at the KITAS 2018 Smart Device Trade Show in Korea for being one of the TOP 5 Best devices. However, we were still not satisfied. That is why we re-invented the V-JET with new technology, portable functions, and 4K display capability. Now we are here on Kickstarter excited to bring this product to a new market.ÃÂÃÂ   We are asking for your support with backing this project. Your pledge is a commitment we one hundred percent honor and acknowledge. The money that we raise will serve two purposes:   To allow us the necessary resources to continue expansion beyond just our Korean supporters    Show us the impact that V-JET has on the International market   Therefore, we are beyond excited to do this together with you all the while enjoying the V-JET ride!ÃÂÃÂ   Production has been already started! We will be able to send you V-JET 4K within November, 2018.  Production will be completed in November, 2018.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ *Phone is not included.    Who are we?   Wisejet Inc. was established in February 2015 by a team of professors and researchers from KAIST University (the Korean University equivalent to MIT). Basically, we are a bunch of nerds that just so happen to have a deep passion for developing innovative wireless transmission technology for wireless virtual reality (VR), HDMI, and game extensions.  Our booth at CES 2018, Japan IT Week 2017, Tokyo Game Show 2018ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  The powerful fact of Wisejet Inc. is that we have captured a significant backing in South Korea already. Given this, we are assured that in the event of a successful campaign we will get your product to you on the time that we promised!  One potential risk that we may encounter are on a functional level. We seek to create powerful, durable products, however, if in any case that the device experience a malfunction we will receive all returns and replace it with a new one.  Additionally, there is a potential risk that your phone or laptop may not be compatible with the device. We are constantly testing more and more devices every week. We will continue to check more products moving forward and if we receive a feedback that the V-JET does not work for a device we will respond accordingly: 1) Immediately do our own research for the device in our labs in Korea. 2) If proven unsuitable for the V-JET, we will either configure it to fit your device or refund you on the product.
