Creator_description: The driving force behind the awful card game, Common Decency.When I'm not designing horrible card games I'm ferret legging, dwile flonking or playing volleyball.Lately I developed the Bottle Popper, a way of opening Champagne and shooting stuff.Next on the horizon is an abuse-filled quiz game about the French (and British) and a novelty toilet unblocker.More on my website: www.common-decency.com
Project_description: The Bottle Popper fits onto any champagne-style bottle. It has a trigger and a sight, letting you easily open your bottle of fizz, and practice your bazooka skills!  It's made in the UK from solid stainless steel to my original design.  My critics will claim this product is a puerile attempt to combine my interests of alcohol and firearms, but the need originally arose when I visited my Grandparents in Northern Ireland to introduce them to my fiance. Delighted I'd finally convinced anyone to marry me, they got the champagne out. They asked me to open it, mentioning that their arthritis made it difficult for them to do so themselves.ÃÂÃÂ   Bottle openers for sparkling wine exist, but none of them let you shoot anything and instead of being fun, the overall experience feels like using a pair of scissors to open a packet of crisps, and is just as exciting.  I set out to make a more exciting product.   How it works       ÃÂÃÂ The Bottle Popper clips onto the cork of any champagne-style bottle where the wide part of the cork meets the bottle.ÃÂÃÂ Once attached, it becomes a simple lever. Pressing down on the back part of the bottle popper pulls the cork out of the bottle until the pressure in the bottle fires the cork with a satisfyingly loud pop.ÃÂÃÂ      The production model will be beautifully etched with a logo    What's the fun in any of this if you can't aim it? For optimum results, place the bottle on your shoulder and aim down the length of it through the sights. I went for iron sights, with different holes for range. Use the top one for targets at close range, aiming through the lower aperturesÃÂÃÂ  will allow you to engage targets at longer range.ÃÂÃÂ   Don't point/fire it at others or yourself, especially when you're attaching the Bottle Popper to the bottle.ÃÂÃÂ   I've tested this thing on as many fizzy, alcoholic drinks as I could, which was awesome. Brut Champagne provides the best range, though Prosecco, Cava, Asti and even pear cider work fine. Anything fizzy with a mushroom shaped cork seems to work. Chilling the bottle reduces the internal pressure (and range) and any recent rough handling increases it.     It also works as a regular bottle opener          Testimonials:    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ "I too struggled to open Champagne because of my arthritis. Thanks to the Bottle Popper I can open them with ease, and I can also engender fear in my enemies in ways I haven't been able to since The Falklands." ÃÂÃÂ   Clive, Tunbridge Wells.   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ "Being alert to the threat of the Red Menace, I'd often wondered if my rusty anti-tank skills would be up to holding off the Red Army. Thanks to the Bottle Popper I have more practice now than I did before I was thrown out of the Girl Guides."   Brenda, Torquay.  ÃÂÃÂ   "My lack of confidence and panache opening champagne was the only thing holding back my rap career. Thanks to the Bottle Popper I won the respect of the local hip hop community and I'm headlining Kieran's Nan's house next Wednesday."   Jimmy, Rathmullan       Do not point the bottle at other people or yourself. Sparkling wine bottles are famous for popping with little or no provocation. Make especially certain you don't point it at your face when you're attaching the Bottle Popper to the bottle.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  This will be my second  Kickstarter campaign - my first being my offensive card game Common Decency. Successfully delivered back in 2016.  I've learnt a few lessons from the last one and I've made my supply chain as simple as possible.  Getting the products manufactured here in the UK, packing them myself and sending them out via Royal Mail will be a lot faster than using factories and fulfilment centres in China.   My estimated delivery date of the second week in December is conservative and also includes buffer time in case there are any hiccups along the way.  I've tested, adjusted and perfected my prototype and found my manufacturer. All I need now is your help in placing a full, commercial order!

Creator_description: A small group of burners who want to take the Swiss regional to the next level.
Project_description: With recent developments to grow more independent of traditional group-accommodations, we need warm and safe communal spaces out in the cold.  Instead of renting large houses year after year, we intend to invest in a more sustainable idea: building our own insulated, heated domes.  A small team of enthusiasts has started to exchange ideas and concepts. After agreeing on a substantiated budget estimate and drafting a first project plan, we split up into subgroups which are dealing with the different parts that make this project come to life:   framework  insulation/cover  flooring  heating   The idea of this pilot-project is to try and build a large communal dome (10-12m) and then publish everything we have learned during the course of that project (including blueprints, methods, bill of materials, sources, ...) in a well-arranged guide that will be accessible to everyone without restriction.  Within our awesome team we have the right spirit, the knowledge and the skills to make this work - all we need now is YOUR help to make this come true, so please consider backing this project with whatever you deem appropriate.      Risks and challenges  Financial limitations lead to downsizing of dome (covering material is rather expensive)

Creator_description: I am an engineer and inventor who loves the outdoors.  My passion is creating things that didn't exist before to help other people.
Project_description: POLE THREADER   The LINE BUDDY multi-tool for fishermen is designed to get you fishing faster by reducing time fussing with your line and threading and tying hooks. ÃÂÃÂ It is the only tool in the world that can mechanically thread your fishing rod with lightning speed. ÃÂÃÂ It makes threading fly rods, bait casting rods and even micro-guide rods with tiny guides of 2.5 mm ID or greater a breeze. Besides being able to thread a pole, having an easily accessible sharp needle on hand is great for picking out the occasional birds nest and clearing fly and hook eyes. This feature combined with a magnetic hook threader, nail knot tying tool, clippers, ÃÂÃÂ 2-way line slicer and other unique features make this a must have tool for any fisherman. ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ              MAGNETIC HOOK THREADERÃÂÃÂ     The magnetic hook threader holds your hooks for threading and is so accurate that you might not even need to pick up your hook! ÃÂÃÂ Check it out!!!         The magnetic hook threader makes threading hooks or small fly's a breeze even for fishermen with poor eyesight. ÃÂÃÂ The channel guides the line right through the eye of the hook.         NAIL KNOT TYING TOOL    The knot tying tool lets you easily tie hooks. ÃÂÃÂ You can also use it to tie lures, swivels and split rings. ÃÂÃÂ It also works great for line splicing or tying leader to fly line! ÃÂÃÂ        CLIPPERS   The Clippers are convenient and easy to use. ÃÂÃÂ Constructed of high quality durable 420 hardened stainless steel.        TWO-WAY LINE SLICER   Make quick line cuts without fumbling through your tools looking for a knife. ÃÂÃÂ Conveniently located at the end of the tool. ÃÂÃÂ It easily cuts braided and monofilament lines.ÃÂÃÂ     Backers get an upgrade! ÃÂÃÂ The 2-way line slicer has been redesigned, and although it looks almost the same as in the image below, It now features a replaceable double blade design that will cut even the most difficult braided lines like butter. ÃÂÃÂ You will be happy to know that the blades that now come with the product are made from very expensive Japanese blade quality stainless steel.        HOOK EYE CLEANER   Use the tip of the pole threading needle to easily clean out glue and muck from the hook eye.        REMOVABLE CLIP   Easily attach and detach your tool from a lanyard or a strap to get quick access to the knot tying feature or to thread your pole.            Risks and challenges  Once the campaign has ended, I will put in the first production order.  All of our injection molds are finished, and all of our manufacturers are ready to begin production of the parts.  As with any new project, there might be unexpected delays with assembly, packaging, quality control, etc.  However, I will do everything possible to make sure that manufacturing and assembly goes quickly and smoothly.  I will try my best to deliver the product to backers earlier than the estimated date I have given, but no guarantees. After the campaign ends, I will keep all backers up to date on the production progress.

Creator_description: The HELLO team is made up of innovators and project leaders with proven track record of delivering HELLO device to all the Kickstarter backers. Their organization and process-driven approach ensure rapid iteration and lean techniques for increased efficiency. Having built the Solaborate Communication platform, each team member is intimately familiar with the methods of communication we all use on a daily basis and have thus created the best possible platform suitable for a device as sophisticated as HELLO and now HELLO 2.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ  HELLO Kickstarters,   After smashing our Kickstarter goal in 2016 with our first HELLO device and getting over 1300% funded, we come back to Kickstarter to present to you 4 new HELLO products to change the way we communicate forever.ÃÂÃÂ         Who are we?ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Who are we? We are Solaborate - an end-to-end encrypted communication and collaboration company. We believe that simplifying communication tools and service represents our greatest opportunity to improve people's lives.ÃÂÃÂ   With the unbelievableÃÂÃÂ support of a community of 900+ people from 60 countries all over the worlds, and shipping 100% of HELLO Communication devices to all our backers last year, we're incredibly excited to present to you HELLO 2 and four new HELLO products:ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      Introducing:ÃÂÃÂ      1.   	HELLO 2 ÃÂÃÂ    2.        HELLO Touch TV + Whiteboarding ÃÂÃÂ    3. HELLO Creator Edition    4. HELLO Controller                      HELLO 2 - The World's Most Powerful Communication DeviceÃÂÃÂ         HELLO 2 is designed together with our community to address some of the most annoying video and audio communication issues we face today.        With significantly improved hardware and software, the second generation HELLO 2 transforms any TV into the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most powerful communication device for video conferencing, digital whiteboarding, wireless screen sharing, Alexa and Google Voice Assistant, TV streaming, gaming, live broadcasting, camera feed with motion and voice detection + infrared night vision, and more.       The HELLO Solaborate Messenger platform has been in the makingfor more than 6 years. With tight integration across our devicesand mobile/PC platforms, we aim to make collaboration seamless. HELLO Messenger can be easily accessed via your Android, iOS, Web and Desktop Clients.ÃÂÃÂ              HELLO 2 will also support the best video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Meet, Zoom, Cisco WebEx, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, BlueJeans, Polycom RealPresence, Fuze, Unify, and more.  HELLO Touch - Real time Video Conferencing & Whiteboarding       ÃÂÃÂ  Powered by HELLO 2, the 65-inch HELLO Touch is the smartest and most affordable 4K Touch TV with 10 multi-touch points for real-time collaboration, digital whiteboarding, video conferencing, wireless sharing, and more.ÃÂÃÂ      The primary function of  HELLO Touch  is to serve as a digital whiteboard with tight video and audio ingratiation so that your virtual teams in other physical locations can collaborate in real-time from any device without limitations.             The possibilities of  HELLO Touch  and  Whiteboarding  are virtually endless.ÃÂÃÂ       HELLO Creator Edition       HELLO Creator Edition comes in a transparent casing, letting you see the inner workings of the device, which reflects our open source ideology in a physical aspect. If you didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get the hint already, we are now opening our platform for developers to build any hardware gadget extensions or software applications on top of our open platform.       This version of HELLO is designed and built specifically with the developer community in mind and we cannot wait to see what developers from all over the world will build on top of our platform.  HELLO Gadget Extensions  HELLO Gadget Extensions are a collection of connected products that enhance communication and interactions with HELLO devices. We built HELLO Button and Controller as an example to show you how easy it is to extend the HELLO capabilities, and we canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t wait to see what kind of gadgets you will create next.         HELLO Controller       The HELLO ControllerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008A> is a new way to play games through your HELLO device from the comfort of your couch anytime you need a break from work, or simply want to enjoy your time with family and friends.          Since you can now install any Android game of your choice on HELLO 2, our slick, super-responsive controller will allow you to play any game. A software version of the HELLO Controller which will make it easier to play games from your mobile phone will also be available on our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app.      The Making of HELLO 2ÃÂÃÂ        Having learned a lot from the HELLO 1 experience and your feedback, making HELLO 2 in a sense was much easier. However weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve spent much more work on ensuring that our passion for beautiful hardware and software is translated into a reliable and manufacturable device.        Hardware and software quality testing, reliability testing and manufacturing setup have been our go to words all along this project and we feel proud and ready to share our work and love with you.       HELLO 2 Features            Secure, sleek and feature-packed, HELLO 2 brings a whole range of new possibilities to life and is the ultimate all-in-one communication device for your home and office.ÃÂÃÂ      It comes with built-in speakers, infrared night vision, Zigbee for home automation, NFC, hardware-based privacy buttons and 152-degree FOV coverage with automatic tilting.ÃÂÃÂ        Video & Audio Calls         Crystal Clear Audio and Video CallsÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       From sharing family moments to business meetings, HELLO 2 aims to make your life easier via communications. Need to make unlimited one on one or group audio and video calls for free whenever you need to stay in touch with your family and friends? With HELLO, theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re just a call away!     Tired of having to spend the first 10-15 minutes of every online meeting trying to properly establish the call or making sure you hear each-other? Creator_description: The idea for RevoWire hatched when our team, a group of college students from North Carolina, recognized the problems we had with standard phone charging cables and so began the idea for RevoWire.
Project_description: Every smartphone owner is all too familiar with the perpetual cycle of buying a standard phone charger then seeing them wear after minimal use and having to replace them just a few weeks later. On top of the problems with durability, charging cables easily become a tangled mess, and keeping up with multiple lengths of cables for various purposes is nothing but a hassle.ÃÂÃÂ        With RevoWire, we aim to solve the three most common issues with phone charging cables:  durability, adjustability,  and  wire management . We made RevoWire to stand up to whatever you put it through, so it will be the last phone charger youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll ever buy.ÃÂÃÂ                              Charging cables often break near the connector from excessive strain. RevoWire has strain-relief technology built right in, so there is zero chance of your wire becoming a frayed mess. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve molded silicone into the connectorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s housing, extending down the cable for maximum durability.ÃÂÃÂ   The strain reliever was designed to protect the weakest points in the cable. The silicone casing allows for the section to remain flexible without losing durability or sacrificing design.ÃÂÃÂ        The perforations along the RevoWire cable make storage and adjustability a breeze. Simply recoil your charging cable and insert the folding pin, located at the USB end of the cable, into one of the holes to ensure your cable wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t come undone. You can also adjust the length of your cable using the same process to help keep all of your wires neat and managed.ÃÂÃÂ        The flat cable design allows for simple wire management and prevents the cable from ÃÂÃÂ unraveling or becoming a tangled mess in your bag. You can easily roll the charging cable into a neat coil and toss it in your bag to take with you.ÃÂÃÂ        The reversible USB means you can plug RevoWire into a USB port quickly without having to check what side fits. Then just pop the charger into your phone- thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no guessing!ÃÂÃÂ        RevoWire achieves faster charging by using larger than average 21 AWG power wires.                                  Every product starts from a great idea, and RevoWire is no different. HereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s our story.  The idea for RevoWire hatched when our team, a group of college students from North Carolina, recognized the problems we had with standard phone charging cables. The wires often frayed and failed, became tangled in backpacks and purses, and were a nightmare to keep track of.ÃÂÃÂ   Our team set out to make charging more convenient and to design a product that would last. Determined to set a higher standard for charging cables, we put in months of hard work to bring you RevoWire. Built by a team that understands the importance of a reliable charge in every situation, RevoWire will make replacing phone charging cables a thing of the past. Thanks again for joining us on this journey!       We turned to Kickstarter because we saw ourselves on the leading edge of a way to help make our phone chargers as durable as possible. We believe RevoWire will stop people from purchasing so many new charging cables through the year-- yes, it will SAVE YOU MONEY!ÃÂÃÂ   The funds raised during this campaign will help us place initial orders with our manufacturer. Every dollar counts towards creating the last charging cable youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll ever need.ÃÂÃÂ                    We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make RevoWire a reality.ÃÂÃÂ   We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t give a dollar or purchase a RevoWire, if you like what we are doing, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!ÃÂÃÂ              Risks and challenges  There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all of the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re completely prepared to bring RevoWire to you, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be the first to know.

Creator_description: The heart of Swiss watchmaking.Schneider&Co is a family business where every member brings his thoughts and opinions to push watchmaking to its highest level. From design to assembly, we pride ourselves on offering artistic watches that are unique yet not exclusive.Our watches are all assembled at our boutique factory in the NeuchÃÂÃÂ¢tel Mountains of Switzerland ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the watchmaking capital of the world ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> where integrity and craftsmanship are unparalleled.Our limited runs of timepieces allow us to focus on detail and precision while also offering competitive prices, and Schneider&Co is honored to be one of the sought after watchmaking brands in which NeuchÃÂÃÂ¢tel is famous.Schneider&Co's family of engineers, including the Watchmaker Master, oversees every mechanical movement, polishing, tracing and crimping, while our equipment allows us to solder to oven, engraved by laser and precisely measure all of our pieces with the help of our advanced computer software.Our pride is what drives us. The luxury, reliability and eye-catching designs from Schneider&Co will inspire you.
Project_description: WHY KICKSTARTER?ÃÂÃÂ   Back in 2016, we have strived to create our own rules and codes. This is true both for design with audacious and unconventional products and the way we envision our business to reach unique people.ÃÂÃÂ   In the Swiss watch industry, the vision hasn't changed over the last 100 years. Time for disruption has come. Be a leader, not a follower.ÃÂÃÂ Sharing this project with you on Kickstarter is the opportunity to create again our own path and rewrite some old established rules.ÃÂÃÂ   Why should unique products always be made available through the same channels to the same people? Kickstarter platform and community will allow us to finally develop, design and validate a watch collection directly from their future owners. You can make this happen as you have the possibility to bring this project to life with your support.ÃÂÃÂ      Schneider&Co is a family business who every member brings his thoughts and opinions to push Schneider&Co to its best level.     AN EXCLUSIVE LAUNCH ON KICKSTARTER  We have designed this new collection of two watches exclusively for the Kickstarter platform. If success hits this project, you would be proudly wearing a unique and limited production watch.ÃÂÃÂ   A successful campaign would definitely lead us to rethink the way we consider ourselves. This could push us to bring more creative and daring products to new and open-minded communities.  THE XTREME COLLECTION  Our new collection is composed of two models, Le Mans and Speedracer. Dedicated to car lovers and designed inspired by the legendary GT40.ÃÂÃÂ The two watches will come in four different executions based on Aluminum, used by all high-end Swiss watch brands, highly non-corrosive and anti-allergic.       The Speedracer and Le Mans are Swiss Made watches with unique and specific design and technical feature. Moreover, the aluminum movement and watch case are manufactured in-house. This gives the watches a unique look and all this below the weight of 50 grams, including strap.  The feeling provided by the product when you have it on your wrist is merely serious and luxurious. You won't be ashamed to compare it with much more expensive watches.   THE SPEEDRACER        ÃÂÃÂ           Speedracer details.  As you can see and perceive in the featured photos, the quality, finish and materials meet the highest expectations of the high-end luxury watch industry.               THE LE MANS        ÃÂÃÂ           Le Mans details.              HIGH-QUALITY LEATHER STRAPS        Our high-quality leather straps come in tasteful orange or deep black with perforations that evoke vintage car racing.ÃÂÃÂ Laser engraved and tinted aluminum buckles.  CLASSIC AND PRESTIGE BOX   The luxurious prestige box comes with an aluminum engraved plate.ÃÂÃÂ On the example below, the Le Mans prestige box in full effect.            ÃÂÃÂ Here is the elegant classic box.       BENEFITS - MORE VALUE, LESS MONEY   Breaking the rules of tradition allows us to offer you a much better product final price. Which you will fully benefit. In this specific case from -50% to -75%! Compared to what retail price would have been. This represents a risk for us but we ready to take it and share the benefits.  In addition, early birds will get an Anchor aluminum Bracelet.  ÃÂÃÂ Aluminum anchor bracelet.       ÃÂÃÂ Aluminum anchor keychain.       Xtreme Stickers.            THE AMAZING PROPERTIES OF ALUMINUM.ÃÂÃÂ    Aluminum has a unique combination of attractive features. Many of them are extremely important for our efforts to create a more sustainable society. What properties are you looking for? ÃÂÃÂ Why use aluminum? More about our favorite material and discover new opportunities.ÃÂÃÂ     Recyclability.ÃÂÃÂ  Aluminum lasts forever and is theÃÂÃÂ environment'sÃÂÃÂ best friend.   SolidÃÂÃÂ and very light  because of its low density. However, extrusions can be made to be both strong and durable. It all depends on the application and the technique that is behind it. For a boat, naval architects can achieve weight savings of 40% compared to steel.ÃÂÃÂ    Weight. ÃÂÃÂ With a density of one-third of steel, 2,700 kg/m3, aluminum is very light. This is why it is continually replacing other materials in all branches of industry.   Resistance.ÃÂÃÂ  Light does not mean fragile. Aluminum alloys have tensile strengths of between 70 and 700 MPa. Unlike most steels, its resistance increases at low temperatures. This makes aluminum a natural choice in many circumstances.ÃÂÃÂ    Machining.ÃÂÃÂ  The machining of this material is incredible versatility. Milling, drilling, cutting, punching, and bending are common machining methods for aluminum. In addition, the energy input during machining is low, resulting in a greener environmental footprint.    Incombustible.ÃÂÃÂ  It has better fire protection characteristics than carbon fiber, which contains flammable resins.ÃÂÃÂ    Assembly.ÃÂÃÂ  Features facilitating assembly are often incorporated from the design stage of the profile. Fusion welding, friction welding, thermocompression, and bonding are other methods used for assembly.   ShieldÃÂÃÂ Against electromagnetic radiation.  Due to their tightness, aluminum housings can effectively exclude or filter electromagnetic radiation (EMC). The higher the conductivity of a material, the better its filtering qualities.   Corrosion resistance.ÃÂÃÂ  Have you ever seen rusty aluminum? Aluminum reacts with oxygen in the air to form an extremely thin layer of oxide. Despite its thickness of only a few hundredths of a micron (1 micron is one-thousandth of a millimeter), this layer is very dense and provides excellent protection against corrosion. If it is damaged, this layer is able to self-restore.   Aluminum Vs Steel. ÃÂÃÂ Aluminum's ability to absorb energy is greater than steel, which is why the material is used for safety purposes such as fire and blast resistance, bullet-proofing and burglary-resistant systems.  In comparison to aluminum, copper is heavy and more expensive. In particular, for fully electric vehicles the switch to the cheaper and lighter aluminum provides an opportunity to save cost and weight.ÃÂÃÂ   Aluminum alloys used in shipbuilding corrode around 100 times slower than steel.  PRODUCTION   We have a humble objective of 50 watches to consider this project a first success and start the production. Under this amount of units, it would cost us too much time and resources to build up a serious production capacity.ÃÂÃÂ   Hopefully, this project will be successful with your support. Should this be the case, we would start production of the first watches few days after the end of the campaign. Once you have chosen and confirmed your model selection.ÃÂÃÂ   WARRANTY & FAQSÃÂÃÂ   Maintaining the high quality we are already known for is one of our prerogatives, and so we want to ensure your Watch lasts as long as it should. Each watch body (straps excluded) comes with a two-year warranty on workmanship, materials and parts, and beyond that, we are always wanting to be in touch to be sure you are satisfied with your watch.  SHARING  We love telling our story, and if you love it too, feel free to share using the pictures, background information and more you will find here. Whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a journalist or a fan, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re just glad to have you here with us as we take off on our journey. Feel free to reach out any time.       DELIVERIES  Normal production capacity increase will allow us to deliver the watches around December 2018.ÃÂÃÂ Components production and watch assembly can take from 2 to 4 months.ÃÂÃÂ   Free watch shipment worldwide is included in every package. However local customs taxes or VAT might be applied to the delivery. You will be personally informed on project status and your personal expected delivery time.ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  A successful campaign would undoubtedly lead us to rethink the way we consider ourselves. This could push us to bring more creative and daring products to new and open-minded communities.  As Schneider&Co we are taking a risk ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> small or big, who knows? ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> But our values tell us to act so: - Try & Succeed or Try & Fail.  - Win or Learn but don't stay home.  Never has a Swiss watch brand created and developed a product especially for a community out of known and traditional distribution channels. Let's walk out of beaten tracks.  We are the first watch brand to do so! Out of the comfort zone. This is in our DNA! Exploring new ways to do things, creating new opportunities and above all getting directly in touch with our community and developing why not a new one. Let's make this happen with your support.  If we succeed with your help, we promise you it won't be the last project on Kickstarter. If we fail, we would at least have tried to break the rules one more time. We might even come back again sooner than expected! No established brand has ever thought and dared to do so. This is who we are. Disrupting conventional rules. Make incredible watches accessible. Above all, let's do not act like the others. They will certainly look at us with a condescending smile and certainly not understand our move.  Is that such a risk in the end? Regarding Speedracer and Le Mans project, we master all technical and production aspects. All products images you have seen in the provides images are already second generation samples. Therefore the major issue we might face if this campaign is successful would be a technical problem during production this spring which could delay deliveries by one or two months. Should such an unexpected problem happen, you would be the first ones to be personally informed by you Schneider&Co Kickstarter team.  Do not hesitate to contact us directly  schneiderandcowatch@gmail.com . Alain is in charge. We will be more than happy to provide you with detailed and further information regarding the project and your watch status. Let's make this happen with your support and get the very best value for your money. Your dedicated Schneider&Co's Kickstarter team.  Alain Schneider

Creator_description: Upsilon Engineering develops schematics and PCBs of your projects, from low to high complexity (like FPGAs, RF).Yann Leidwanger, the founder, has 20 years routing background in electronics hardware design and PCBs design / routing.
Project_description: BioControle V1.0 is a very good prototype, but I need you to launch the next better revision and the final production !        ÃÂÃÂ   BioControle is a powerfull interface connected to a Raspberry-Pi 3, and offers a lot of features to control your aquaponics systems, hydroponics systems, or any other system that need several kinds of IOs.            full protected user IOs and power supply input      full protection between your application and your Raspberry      4 power relays outputs      2 inputs/outputs for temperature and humidity sensors      2 logical inputs and 2 logical outputs      Real Time Clock      EEPROM      12 bits ADC      12 bits DAC      2 power servomotor outputs      enhanced PCB design for CSI and DSI headers       ÃÂÃÂ All inputs and outputs are protected from and to external devices and protect your Raspberry Pi !                     Who are Upsilon Engineering and Yann Leidwanger ?    This project,  BioControle , is supported by  Upsilon Engineering , based in  Luxembourg .   https://www.upsilon-engineering.lu/    ÃÂÃÂ I'm Yann Leidwanger , the founder and manager of Upsilon Engineering. I'm 42 years old, with more 20 years background in electronics hardware design and especially PCBs routing.  ÃÂÃÂ I designed more than 400 boards, for  industry ,  medical ,  automotive ,  defense ,  earth RF stations  and  satellites .     Why a brand-new aquaponic / hydroponic board ?    ÃÂÃÂ The project was initially developed for the  ThiLab , a FabLab based in Thionville, France, where I discover aquaponics systems, and I thought it was so cool !   ÃÂÃÂ https://fr-fr.facebook.com/FabLabThionville/   ÃÂÃÂ The proof of concept prototype drives one servomotor (fishes food dispenser), one warm power lamp and one temperature sensor (water).  ÃÂÃÂ Afterwards,  I wanted to develop a professional board  with a lot of features, with extended features, wich protect the Raspberry Pi,  with a minimal cost, but not a minimal quality !     ÃÂÃÂ Moreover, the interface can be used for other purposes.            Roadmap of the design      ÃÂÃÂ First, I studied the needs of the users :   ONE temperature sensor, ONE humidity sensor, ONE power relay output, ONE servomotor output.    ÃÂÃÂ Secondly, I added more functionalities :   logical inputs and outputs, protected power supply input, power supply supervisors, ADC, DAC, RTC, EEPROM, programmable user led, protections for inputs and outputs...    ÃÂÃÂ Thirdly, I improved these initials specifications :   double all inputs and outputs, double temperature sensors inputs, double humidity sensors inputs, quadruple relays power outputs, use 12 bit ADC and DAC, protect all signals from and to external devices, double servomotor outputs, add a protection for power supply input, add analog filters on power supplies for ADC and DAC.          Components selection    ÃÂÃÂ I've chosen components according to all their electrical characteristics, performance, quality, but not price !   ÃÂÃÂ A "minimal cost" doesn't mean "low cost" (and low quality).      Schematics design    ÃÂÃÂ I drew schematics functions one by one,  constantly keeping in mind all the constraints :     functionalities      performance      quality      availability of IOs on Raspberry Pi      cost      "next-step design" (PCB layout, components placement, routing, PCB production, components assembly)              PCB design    ÃÂÃÂ  The layout and the routing of the board are very important  : it must ensure minimal surface, minimal height, allows acces to CSI and DSI headers, and allow mechanical fixing on Raspberry Pi.  ÃÂÃÂ The PCB is routed according to Class4 rules (0.21mm track width, 0.21mm clearance).  ÃÂÃÂ In order to optimize the costs, I've decided to place components only on TOP layer and standardize components references.          Production    ÃÂÃÂ For PCBs production and components assembly, I use a supplier with whom I have been working for a long time. Quality and quick delivery are always present with this firm.  ÃÂÃÂ  Boards are produced by batches of 100 PCBs , again to minimize costs.     Hardware and software tests     ÃÂÃÂ There is no bug on V1.0 revision, all hardware tests and software tests passed.   ÃÂÃÂ Even if this project is immediately functional, with no mistakes, I was not 100% satisfied :    the second power supply header is not useful      I used an uncommon pinout for servomotors               I need you !     ÃÂÃÂ I need your help to launch the BioControle V2.0 project on Kickstarter, and I'm sure you'll be thrilled after supporting or using it !           Schematics, pinout, example codes, detailed features       Schematics      Board pinout      Examples Codes in Python          Full protected user IOs and power supply input       protection against reverse polarity      protection against undervoltage / overvoltage      +5.0V power supply supervisor (+4.63V threshold) connected on LED and Raspberry Pi input      +3.3V power supply supervisor (+3.08V threshold) connected on LED and Raspberry Pi input      main power supply input provided by standard 230VAC adapter (like official Raspberry Pi power supply adapter)      ÃÂÃÂ Full protection between your application and your Raspberry      use of buffers and level shifters       use of protection diodes      use of serial protection resistance       ÃÂÃÂ 4 power relays outputs       2 separated power circuits, allows you to mix different supplies      drived by protected MOSFET      control LED      each relay can drive 250VAC / 5A load      each relay provide C, NO and NC connections       ÃÂÃÂ 2 IOs for temperature sensors, +3.3V       can be used as inputs, outputs, IOs (like OneWire)       ÃÂÃÂ 2 IOs for humidity sensors, +3.3V       can be used as inputs, outputs, IOs (like OneWire)       ÃÂÃÂ 2 logical inputs, 0V ... +3.3V default       protected inputs      buffered inputs      you can change input resistor divider to adjust voltage input range       ÃÂÃÂ 2 logical outputs, 0V / +3.3V       protected outputs      buffered outputs       ÃÂÃÂ Real Time Clock, I2C       I2C address : 0xD_0_0_0_RW      CR1220 battery       ÃÂÃÂ EEPROM, I2C       I2C address : 0xA_A2_A1_A0_RW (can be changed by resistors)      I2C address : 0xA_1_1_1_RW (default)      32 KB       ÃÂÃÂ 12 bits ADC, 2 channels, I2C, 0V ... +3.3V input range       I2C address : 0x9_0_0_0_RW      ONE differential channel or TWO single ended channels      filtered power supply       ÃÂÃÂ 12 bits DAC, 1 channel, I2C, 0V ... +3.3V output range       I2C address : 0xC_0_0_1_RW      filtered power supply      ÃÂÃÂ 2 power servomotor output      tank and decoupling capacitors      buffered command signals      1A power supply by servomotor       ÃÂÃÂ Programmable user LED       drived by protected MOSFET       ÃÂÃÂ Enhanced PCB design       minimized surface      minimized height      layout with cutouts for CSI and DSI headers      only one layer used for components      powerfull placement and routing             Support and launch the BioControle project !     -    ÃÂÃÂ  For a 5ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ donation , you support the project and your name and country will be specified on the  thanks page .    -    ÃÂÃÂ  For a 20ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ or more donation , you support the project and your name and country will be You'll receive 10 BioControle V2.0 board , fully assembled and tested.  Save 70ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ !    You'll receive a bonus PCB, that you can use as a key ring, or as a "PCB basic rules" reminder, or as an ATmega328 based development board.      Key Ring gift     ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  Thank you for your support !      Links        Upsilon Engineering website         Thanks page !         Follow us on Facebook...         ... and on Instagram...         ... and on Tweeter !            Risks and challenges  Currently, the main risk is the availability of some components, because there is a shortage of some components in the world. However, the design is made to easily found a replacement part. If it must happen, I'll change the reference of concerned components to replace them to minimize production delay.

Creator_description: Ray Greenstreet, co-founder of brÃÂ<U+0093>th, got started in the plant business in high school & worked as a wholesale grower. By 1998, he was able to buy his own nursery and plant farm in Lothian, MD. Today, Greenstreet Gardens has 3 thriving locations where Ray continues to supply 100% organic plants (many of which are grown on his own farm) to the entire DC metropolitan area. In 2013, Ray joined forces with Mark Prescott, a green product inventor and together they developed the patented technology behind brÃÂ<U+0093>th - first in the form of giant indoor green walls that force air toxins in a building through the plants to clean the air.In 2017, they engineered the first table-top version of this active and 100% natural air purifier, and brÃÂ<U+0093>th was born!
Project_description: Did you know?  Americans spend 90% of their time indoors breathing stale air. ÃÂÃÂ We strive to make our homes energy efficient, but in doing so trap all of the toxins inside with no way for them to escape. ÃÂÃÂ Compounding this problem, studies have found that indoor pollutants can be more harmful to our bodies than outdoor pollutants, with some health effects not noticeable until years later.ÃÂÃÂ   That's where brÃÂ<U+0093>th comes in.ÃÂÃÂ                    How does brÃÂ<U+0093>th help?  The technology is pretty straight forward. brÃÂ<U+0093>th actively feeds the plants all of the toxins and carbon dioxide in the air around it. The plants then use this as fertilizer to grow stronger. These health-giving plants only need light from the lamp above, and water to create filtered, fresh, and clean air.        Turbo-charges real plants for 100% natural purification (non-natural air purifiers and ionizers can actually be  more harmful to your airflow  )    Purifies the air in a 10ÃÂ<U+0097>10 ft room more than 4x per day    Removes upwards of 70% of air toxins with a single pass through the unitÃÂÃÂ     Is engineered with a perfect and sleek design - all your friends will wish they had one ÃÂÃÂ     Tells you via app when to water or not, never needs fertilizing - perfect for those who don't have a green thumb!ÃÂÃÂ     Grow light automatically turns on/off every 12 hours or with a custom timer    Water reservoir lasts for 10 days and the sensor tells you exactly when to add more water        Simply download the brÃÂ<U+0093>th app to monitor how much air is being purified at any given time. brÃÂ<U+0093>th measures the plantÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s water level and alerts you when you need to add more. The unit's sensors make sure the water levels are always at an optimal level to keep you from over-watering or under-watering your plants. Zero plant care skills needed.ÃÂÃÂ                                                   WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re especially excited about this product because it also gives parents the chance to provide clean air to their young children. Babies breathe about 40 times per minute, which is 2x as much as an adult, and brÃÂ<U+0093>th is helping us give these little ones the purest air for their healthy development.  What's the science behind brÃÂ<U+0093>th?                            First, we developed the patented technology behind brÃÂ<U+0093>th in 2013 in the form of giant indoor green walls that force air toxins in a building through the plants to clean the air. In 2016, our green wall system successfully passed air purification tests run by Staffordshire University in England.       Then, in 2017, we had the idea to develop a table-top version of our green wall. ÃÂÃÂ The idea of the smaller unit is to bring the same air purification of a green wall to your personal space.  Thus, brÃÂ<U+0093>th was born.        In August, we contracted a 3rd party research team, Ambient Group Inc., to run official air purification tests on the brÃÂ<U+0093>th prototype. After running the initial test, the research team insisted that the results must be wrong - but brÃÂ<U+0093>th produced the same amazing results again and again. Even we were astounded at the breakthrough!ÃÂÃÂ        Here's a chart of the test results from the official study that shows brÃÂ<U+0093>th removes upwards of 70% of air toxins with just 1 pass through the unit!ÃÂÃÂ   You can view the full study release here.         This graph illustrates the culmination of testing experiments where formaldehyde was introduced directly into the air intake of the brÃÂ<U+0093>thÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ Unit. The gas, at the dosing point, was allowed to reach a steady state concentration (blue). Note that the proportional concentrations of formaldehyde within chamber (green) and the outlet from the chamber (red) do not increase appreciably during the dosing experiment. This equates to an approximate seventy percent formaldehyde removal rate from the airstream.ÃÂÃÂ         With brÃÂ<U+0093>thÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology, air is purified naturally using photosynthesis and bacteria cleaning processes in plants. The brÃÂ<U+0093>th unit uses a fan to capture indoor airflow and deliver it back to the plants, who convert toxins into organic compounds that they can use as food. The sugars plants produce in photosynthesis assist in this process by breaking down harmful bacteria into useful compounds. Using this active process versus the passive photosynthesis plants usually undergo, brÃÂ<U+0093>th has the bacteria-cleaning power of approximately 200 houseplants.  This is awesome! Now what?  Help brÃÂ<U+0093>th make a difference in air quality and plant care enjoyment by clicking the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>Back This ProjectÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> button at the top of the page, and by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.                                                      We're also excited to announce that the Bonobo Conservation Initiative has partnered with brÃÂ<U+0093>th in a special campaign because we both love the rainforest and the bonobo! ÃÂÃÂ brÃÂ<U+0093>th is an all natural air purifier that is scientifically proven to clean the air in your home with the power of almost 200 plants (like a mini rainforest). 5% of proceeds go to support the BCI. ÃÂÃÂ   .  .  Stretch Goals Achieved & Surprises Unlocked!  We unlocked this stunning Rainforest Plant Combo once our campaign reached $75,000!       Now on to $100,000! Help us reach this new stretch goal of $100k so we can unlock the next brÃÂ<U+0093>th color option.  Vote for your favorite color by commenting on this video here.  Midnight is in the lead, so if your favorite is Rose Gold, Sunflower, Red or Sky Blue, get your friends involved to help promote your favorite color!!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                             ÃÂÃÂ WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re now over $100,000!!! Thanks to your help and votes, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve unlocked the brÃÂ<U+0093>th Midnight color option!ÃÂÃÂ        Newest Stretch Goal:ÃÂÃÂ   When our campaign hits $125,000 weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be unlocking 3 more $1 units!! (This very limited reward will be released within a 1 hour time frame after we hit $125k, so make sure to keep on the lookout because only 3 lucky backers will receive them!! Note: to show our appreciation to our loyal backers, we'll send out a specific update (visible to only current backers) letting them know the exact 10 minute window when these units will be released, so make sure to pledge before then to get notified!)       More stretch goals and features to unlock will be announced soon.  Stay tuned!         Our Story   Ray Greenstreet,  co-founder of brÃÂ<U+0093>th, got started in the plant business in high school & worked as a wholesale grower. By 2000, he was able to buy his own nursery in Lothian, MD. Today, Greenstreet Gardens has 3 thriving locations where Ray continues to supply 100% organic plants (many of which are grown on his own farm) to the entire DC metropolitan area.ÃÂÃÂ    Mark Prescott , co-founder of brÃÂ<U+0093>th, is an inventor and has been in the green industry for over 35 years. He's developed a number of products in the industrial air cleaning arena using phytoremediation to improve the air quality in buildings.  In 2013, Mark Prescott joined forces with Ray Greenstreet, and together they developed the patented technology behind brÃÂ<U+0093>th - first in the form of giant indoor green walls that force air toxins in a building through the plants to clean the air.  In 2017, they engineered the first table-top version of this active and 100% natural air purifier, and brÃÂ<U+0093>th was born!ÃÂÃÂ   Behind the Scenes ÃÂÃÂ   This demo is meant to showcase how this product works, where we are in the process, and what you can expect from brÃÂ<U+0093>th in the future.                                     Risks and challenges  No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially the inventors. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Kickstarter as well as for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment. But here are what we see as the risks and challenges:  MANUFACTURING: The great news is that weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re already ahead of the game. The mold for brÃÂ<U+0093>th is created. We are now producing and testing brÃÂ<U+0093>th units to ensure that they are ready for our backers. However, unforeseen revisions to the mold can happen. We want to ensure that our supporters are receiving a product that will last and that they will love. To minimize the possibility of unforeseen revisions, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve already begun manufacturing testing before our kickstarter launch. This gives us additional time in case of unforeseen delays. We are also working with experienced and professional manufacturing partners who have a track record for efficiency and quality.   We are also in the process of finalizing the brÃÂ<U+0093>th app. After kickstarter, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be making final touches on the app development as well as fine-tuning the appÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s performance to ensure the best customer experience and the best accuracy of the sensor data. Then the app needs to be approved by Android and Apple, which can take time. In order to minimize any delays concerning the app, we have involved experienced app development partners that know this process forwards and backwards.  PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As brÃÂ<U+0093>th gears up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. We have already made a pre-production prototype to test and refine brÃÂ<U+0093>th and allow us to incorporate our adjustments. This will always be beneficial for you, the consumer, and we will keep you up to speed if any changes are made and why.   FULFILLMENT: Even with greatest foresight and planning, unexpected circumstances can arise: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks, we have already begun the process and partnered with a reliable and efficient manufacturer, and just in case, we will have at least one back-up supplier for each component pre-located. We also have product commercialization experts who will help ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.  Regarding plant shipping, especially international shipping, please take into consideration that there are shipping restrictions on soil and plants from the U.S. to certain countries. To handle this challenge effectively, we will be working with plant suppliers in those specific areas of the world that donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t allow U.S. plant and soil exports.   Also, based on country and availability, actual plant types may vary. We assure you that if plant substitutes are needed, we will personally reach out to each of our customers to notify them of the acceptable plant substitution(s). We will always choose the best plant substitutions that adhere to brÃÂ<U+0093>thÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s air purification standards, so that you still have the best product we can provide.  CONCLUSION: In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until we correct the issue.  THANK YOU: Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help brÃÂ<U+0093>th make a difference in air quality and plant care enjoyment by clicking the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>Back This ProjectÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.  We thank you for your support on our mission to help others grow simply, live healthy & breathe easy!

Creator_description: Fenik is an award-winning start-up dedicated to creating inexpensive and environmentally friendly off-grid refrigeration solutions. We want to help make your next outdoor adventure even better while committing to use our profits to improve access to refrigeration in developing nations.
Project_description: A REFRIGERATOR THAT RUNS ON JUST WATER...."     "Impossible!"  you say.ÃÂÃÂ   Well my friend, let me introduce you to the  future :ÃÂÃÂ         ASSEMBLES EASILY:         RUNS ON WATER:         PERFECT FOR FRUITS OR VEGETABLES:ÃÂÃÂ          WHAT IS IT:   Fenik has spent the last 4 years developing the Yuma 60L, an exciting new way to actively cool food ANYWHERE without the use of electricity! While most refrigerators need electrical components such as fans, air compressors and solar panels to work, the Yuma 60L has no wires or moving parts and can cool down food using only water!   Ever want something to use other than your loud, electricity guzzling refrigerator?    Ever feel the yearning to move off-grid or embrace #vanlife? ÃÂÃÂ     Ever go camping but find that all the places that sell ice are closed? Or get lost on multi-day treks and realize a cooler full of melted ice isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t the answer?   The Yuma 60L could be what you're looking for.  HOW TO USE IT:ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        The Fenik Yuma 60L is incredibly simple to set up and use in seconds, and comes delivered flat-packed for easy mobility and transportation, meaning it can be put together in a pinch.ÃÂÃÂ   At 22.4 x 17.7 x 4.6 inches (or roughly the size of a standard pillow-case), you can grab the Yuma 60L and throw it into your bag for that camping trip, beach party or even keep stored in your home for earthquake preparedness.ÃÂÃÂ   Assemble the Yuma 60L by popping in the 4 fiberglass stays, fill it with food and water, and watch the magic work as the inside of the device begins to cool down!  HOW DOES IT WORK?ÃÂÃÂ        The real secret to the Yuma 60L is actually that it's not even that fancy or high-tech. If youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve ever wrapped a towel around a bottle of beer for the end of a hike, or run through a sprinkler or mister on a hot summerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s day, you know how refreshing the feeling can be.ÃÂÃÂ   Our Yuma 60L works just like that, but comes in the form of a handy box.ÃÂÃÂ Like the above examples, it uses something called ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>evaporative cooling.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ The Yuma 60L stores water within the actual walls of the device. These walls are made of a special material called PhaseTekÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, which allows water vapor to evaporate from the sides of the box without allowing any of the liquid water to leak out. Evaporating water pulls heat energy from the inside of the box decreasing the temperature an average of 10 to 20 degrees Fahrenheit from ambient conditions, and even more in dry, arid environments!ÃÂÃÂ   All of the cooling power of the Yuma 60L comes from the PhaseTekÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ material, so you'll never have to worry about finding an outlet - being self-reliant in nature never felt so easy.  SPECIFICATIONS:       REWARDS:ÃÂÃÂ   Along with our Yuma 60L, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got some exciting items and rewards as a big thank you for supporting us.           Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!     OUR STORYÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Fenik, originally known as Evaptainers, started out as a student project at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. The purpose of the project was to develop a low-cost method of preserving fruits and vegetables in remote areas. The research culminated in the invention of the Yuma 60L, which achieves refrigeration through the use of smart materials and the phenomenon of evaporative cooling.ÃÂÃÂ   4 years of R&D have brought us through countless prototypes, product iterations, thermal tests, CAD designs and factory visits. Our engineering team has truly invented something novel and innovative, and after rigorous field and lab testing, we are confident our device is ready for mainstream audiences.  OUR SOCIAL MISSIONÃÂÃÂ        If you thought we spent the last 4 years developing a low-cost refrigerator for glampers, you're sorely mistaken! Over 1.2 billion people still lack access to electricity, and without electricity, any type of refrigeration. Our core mission is to help these families out of a tough spot by providing products that can improve their lives.ÃÂÃÂ   We've already been working in throughout Morocco for the last 3 years, and are collaborating with USAID to conduct a large scale development project next summer.ÃÂÃÂ   In the future, we plan to continue designing products for use emerging markets and remote areas, and your support will definitely help us on our mission.  ÃÂÃÂ To learn more about our work in North Africa watch our 2016 explainer videoÃÂÃÂ                             FAQs   HOW COLD DOES THIS ACTUALLY GET? ÃÂÃÂ   As an evaporative cooler, the Yuma 60L is dependent on ambient temperature and humidity. Our device will never get as cold as a standard compression refrigerator, so if you are looking for something that can serve you a chilly ice-cold brew, unfortunately this product is not for you. However, our device can take your beverage from "lukewarm and gross" to "nice and refreshing" (and your beer will thank you for it).  ÃÂÃÂ  Expected Temperature Decrease   ÃÂÃÂ (In Fahrenheit)       ÃÂÃÂ (In Celsius)       ÃÂÃÂ  Expected Temperature Inside   ÃÂÃÂ (In Fahrenheit)ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ (In Celsius)        CAN I STORE MEAT IN THIS? ÃÂÃÂ   No. The Yuma 60L is designed for use with fruits, vegetables, beverages, dairy products, and snacks that might melt (chocolates, etc).ÃÂÃÂ    HOW LONG WILL THIS COOL FOR?   The Yuma 60L will stay cool as long as the walls are filled with water. Each device has a holding capacity of about 4 liters of water and uses 0.5 liters of water per day. We recommend topping off the Yuma 60L with water every morning.   HOW IS THIS DIFFERENT FROM ZEER POTS OR COOLGARDIE SAFES?   Please see the answer to this in the FAQ.   CAN I USE THIS INSIDE?   Absolutely! Most of our users in Morocco actually use this inside their homes. Just store it in a cool or dry part of the house and the device will continue to work normally. Consult the charts above for an estimate of how cold it will be inside the device.   HOW EASY IS IT TO SET UP?   The Yuma 60L can go from flat to ready-to-use in under 20 seconds! Simply open the door, remove the fiberglass rods, and lift the top up to its full height, then click the 4 rods into the corners. It's really that simple!     Easy Assembly!      HOW DO I FILL IT?   Filling is designed to be easy! Once the unit is setup, pull the fill flap Velcro away from the door and separate the two sides, then pour water in between them. With a new Yuma 60L you may need to tilt it as you are filling to make sure the water fills all of the sides during the first use. ÃÂÃÂ      Runs on Water!     WHERE DOES THE FOOD GO?   To use the Yuma 60L once it is deployed and walls are full of water, simply open the door and put your food inside. The Fill flap doubles as a handy hinge.     Super Simple To Use!     HOW DO I COLLAPSE THE YUMA 60L?   To return the Yuma 60L to its flat state for transport, open the fill flap and turn it over to remove the residual water. Don't try to collapse it while there is water inside as this may damage the PhaseTekÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ walls. Once the water is gone, you can pull the fiberglass rods out of the corners and flatten it. We recommend giving it some time while it is empty to dry our before packing it up to go.ÃÂÃÂ    WHAT SHOULD I PUT IN MY YUMA 60L?   Your new Fenik cooler is ideal for fruits and vegetables as well as other things that should be kept at a stable room temperature. It's great for chocolate - no one likes a melted chocolate bar - as well as cheese. Some food, like bananas last longer in a Yuma than a traditional ice cooler because they are susceptible to frost.ÃÂÃÂ      (left) Bananas kept on ice (right) Bananas kept in a Yuma 60L     HOW LONG WILL FOOD LAST IN MY YUMA 60L?   Depending on environmental conditions (heat and humidity) food inside of a Yuma 60L can last 3-5x longer than food left outside.ÃÂÃÂ    WHAT STAGE OF DEVELOPMENT IS THE FENIK YUMA 60L COOLER IN?   We are already in production! As part of our field trials with USAID and Siemens Stiftung, the industrial tooling has already has already been built and the first 500 units are currently in production. Unlike with many other crowdfunding campaigns, it was important to us that we work out many of the production issues BEFORE offing the Yuma 60L for sale to you. We still very much need your help to fulfill our mission in the developing world - without your participation we won't have the resources necessary to support our work in emerging markets.ÃÂÃÂ      Industrial Vacuform Machine        Get Your Project Funded Today!         Risks and challenges  The Fenik team has spent the last 2 years building the supply chain and creating the manufacturing/tooling needed to produce the Yuma cooler. We waited longer than is typical in a product's life cycle to pursue crowdfunding because we wanted to work through many of the problems that normally plague campaigns in advance and give you the best customer experience possible. With that said, crowdfunding isn't e-commerce and there are inherent risks which we we want to be upfront about.   1) Fenik is a labor of love. The co-founders have spent years working on the project without compensation because we believe refrigeration is a fundamental right and want to make it more accessible to everyone. Our business model is unusual in that we are trying to sell products to low-income families living off-grid for as close to cost as we can. This is made possible because of initiatives like this Kickstarter campaign, which help us cover the company's ongoing overhead. We believe that this arrangement is incredibly powerful and will allow us to impact the lives of exponentially more people than a traditional donation model. What this means is: while we have plenty determination and heart, we don't have endless financial resources. We are proud of what we have accomplished so far, but if manufacturing problems arise, things MAY take a little extra time than anticipated. Have faith that we will do everything in our power to resolve any obstacle which presents itself as quickly as we can.     2) Another potential risk is our choice in offering the Yuma Cooler to anyone in the world. This is a risk simply because shipping logistics can get really complicated (and very expensive), especially with a larger item like the Fenik Yuma 60L. Because of the incredible responses we've gotten on our website from people all around the world, we wanted to give everyone a chance to purchase one of these units and we are doing everything we can to be very upfront about what it takes to get you your Yuma Cooler. All international fees include the total cost of freight (meaning you will NOT receive any extra charges upon arrival). We can assure you that we are not making any money on our international shipping fees, only covering a portion of the full charges. If you are interested in purchasing a Yuma 60L and don't live in one of the countries that we have quoted shipping for, please reach out so that we can calculate what it will cost to get one to you.  We know how important communication is and we pledge to be open and transparent with you to the best of our abilities. We commit to resolving issues as rapidly as is feasible given the circumstances and resources available. We need your help to grow the project and fulfill our mission of helping rural families and we are incredibly appreciative and humbled by your support.

Creator_description: A-Champs is here to help kids set the foundations for an active and healthy lifestyle. Our main goal is to make physical activity fun!
Project_description: Twenty years ago, children may have preferred riding bikes, building forts and enjoying the outdoors, but so much has changed since then.ÃÂÃÂ   The growing popularity of smartphones, tablets, video games and services, like Netflix, all contribute to the alarming amount of time that children spend in front of a screen.ÃÂÃÂ                  Incorporate your Nerf gun to hit targets, or even throw balls at them. With ROXs, there are absolutely no limitations!       ROXs even has the ability to grow with your child through the frequent introduction of new games and PEBBs.                                                     We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make ROXs a reality.ÃÂÃÂ   We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t give a dollar or purchase ROXs, if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a supporter of getting kids moving, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!ÃÂÃÂ          --ÃÂÃÂ              Risks and challenges  There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re confident in our ability to produce (especially since A-Champs has developed and produced products for the biggest global retailers over the last 10 years, executing and bringing product to market is our core competency), and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re completely prepared to bring the ROXs gaming system to your homes, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be the first to know.

Creator_description: Mechanical engineer, Olympic hopeful and avid cyclist. Charles sold his beloved Miata to make Crown Rollers a reality.
Project_description: Crown Rollers are the most stable rollers you will ever ride.  Crown Rollers are designed to be your first and last set of rollers.    We have combined physics, engineering, and design to create a cycling roller that is naturally stable and maintains your true bike fit.  ÃÂÃÂ   Update:2018-09-18  Shane Miller tried our rollers at Interbike 2018 and pretty much sums up the amazement people are having when riding Crown Rollers, Here is an unbiased opinion of what he calls "Magic Rollers". Thanks Shane!       How it works:ÃÂÃÂ   Stability                 Crown Rollers are stable because your tire will seek the path of least resistance.  The larger diameter section at the center of the roller is the easiest to ride, so that is where your wheel wants to go.   Technical Note: When buying rollers, larger rollers have less rolling resistance (easier.)ÃÂÃÂ  Smaller rollers have more rolling resistance (harder.) This is due to the deformation of the tire on the roller. See why Crown Roller is so clever?ÃÂÃÂ   Why isn't the rear roller crowned?ÃÂÃÂ  Testing.ÃÂÃÂ  We experimented with every conceivable roller shape and positional combination to optimize stability for both new and experienced riders.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    How it works:   Level-Fit Frame            On rollers, the front wheel sits on TOP of the front roller, while the rear wheel sits BETWEEN the rear rollers.  This causes the rear wheel to sag relative to the front, impacting your bike fit.ÃÂÃÂ   Crown RollerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Level-Fit Frame raises the rear rollers so that you ride flat, just like on the road. ÃÂÃÂ   Technical Note: Crown Rollers come shipped with rear rollers in the Level-Fit position.ÃÂÃÂ  These rear rollers can also be lowered to the traditional position based on rider preference.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ As Featured On:      GP Lama         Bike Rumor        Gear Mashers       CyclingTips        Global Cycling Network: GCN Tech   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      KOLO 8 News Now: Reno        BikeRoar     Why rollers?   Cyclists don't just pedal along on rollers. They engage with the rollers, steering and balancing to control the bicycle.ÃÂÃÂ  By requiring the rider to control the bike and constantly engage and balance, rollers create the most realistic indoor riding experience possible.ÃÂÃÂ   Since you dynamically interact with rollers, you recruit more stabilizing and core muscles than you would on a stationary trainer or spin bike.  In addition, prolonged workouts in a fixed position will train certain muscle groups while ignoring other groups that are critical to effectively riding on the road.  This improved muscular engagement and the conscious interaction that you as a rider have with rollers result in improved fitness for the coming season as well as improved bike handling skills.ÃÂÃÂ   Rollers are also the most effective way to identify and correct inefficiencies in your pedal stroke.  Feedback from the rollers will result in a type of vertical bounceÃÂÃÂ  if a rider's pedal stroke is rough.ÃÂÃÂ  Riders intuitively smooth those sections of the pedal stroke when they consistently train on rollers.  ÃÂÃÂ   Rollers have always had these advantages, but the lack of stability kept them out of reach of the average rider.  Crown Rollers make these advantages available to almost any rider.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Background ÃÂÃÂ   When we first started riding trainers, we had a hard time. As engineers, we wanted to make our riding experience better. Logically, the first roller shape we went to was a deep V shape. How wrong we were. When using this troughed roller, it was almost impossible for the rider to stay centered. Additionally, the rider was easily thrown off of the trainer. Thinking creatively, we tested the inverse of the troughed shape; a crowned roller. The result was the smooth ride of the most stable cycling roller in the world, Crown Rollers.  Crown Rollers have amazed everyone who has tested them with their stability, smoothness, and bike fit. From Ph.D. engineers to seasoned professional riders, they start with skepticism and end with astonishment.      Risks and challenges  We are ready to bring Crown Rollers to market. Our first 5 units have already arrived and were at interbike 2018 for demo and display. Current production units are in process. Your pledge will provide the capital to pay our manufactures and ship the product.  Delivery is estimated for the end of November. The Biggest risk of this campaign is that the boat could sink. But insurance would handle that.  We are excited to make Crown Rollers available for everyone. We know you will love them as much as we do.
