Project_description: Introducing NATEDE by Clairy   Following the incredible success of our 2016 Kickstarter Campaign, we are proud to present you: NATEDE by Clairy.  NATEDE is your brand new incredible  Smart and Natural Air Purifier.  It will also be the most beautiful design object you will ever have for your home or office, so please help us make it happen.                  NATEDE is a beautiful Natural Air Purifier for any home or office , and behind its simple design it features a complex and innovative technology.  NATEDE has the most  advanced sensors  and it leverages a new  photocatalytic filter , which does not need to be replaced, eliminating waste and extra expenses. Thanks to the combination of the plant with this innovative filter,  this air purifier successfully eliminates 93% of VOCs, 99% of bacteria, viruses, fine-particulate and odors.   NATEDE works with its  dedicated app  that allows users to monitor air pollutants and control the air flow in their space in real time. NATEDE can even connect to other  smart home devices.              Why Stephen Croncota, former Chief Marketing Officer at VERSACE is now Advisor for Clairy   Take control of your environment, care about the people you love.ÃÂÃÂ           New Stretch Goal!   When we hit 650k euro in funding you will have the opportunity to choose between 2 new wonderful colors!ÃÂÃÂ                   A big thanks to everyone who helped us hit our first stretch goal of ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬400,000!   All NATEDE backers will now be able to add one or more NATEDE Luxury Wooden Stand to their NATEDE pre-orders. And everyone will now be able to get access to a new Super Early Bird offer that includes both a NATEDE air purifier and a NATEDE stand.       Made with the finest wood, the NATEDE Luxury Wooden Stand is specifically designed for the NATEDE Air Purifier to add an extra touch of design to your home or office. It does not require glue or screws, it requires only two steps to assemble it.                                                     ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        The monitors and sensors inside  NATEDE can accurately measure  the temperature and humidity of a room, as well as detect pollutants (VOCs), fine-particulates (PM2.5), and carbon monoxide (CO).   NATEDE Premium  will also include an additional sensor for carbon dioxide (COÃÂ¢<U+0082><U+0082>).            The new NATEDE mobile app (available for iOS and Android) allows users to  monitor the air quality  in their space. NATEDE connects to your  home or office Wi-Fi , so you can manage NATEDE from everywhere. It features also  Bluetooth , which makes the first connection and setup much easier.       NATEDEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s mobile app dashboard shows  real-time monitoring of the IAQ (Internal Air Quality) . The wave frequency changes depending on the IAQ levels.       From the mobile app itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s possible to manage NATEDEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s  fan speed  and select one of the four available operating modes.  It's also possible to see a  detailed breakdown  of the pollutants in your environment.       NATEDEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s app features a  Statistics section  where you can monitor the levels of the measured elements such as humidity, temperature, VOCs, PM2.5 and CO. Premium users will also be able to monitor COÃÂ¢<U+0082><U+0082> levels.       When NATEDE detects high levels of pollutants in the air,  its app will send a notification  and it will ask for information on your activity to better understand  your habits  and tailor the experience to  your needs.         The core technology of NATEDE is phytoremediation , which means that it uses the natural power of common plants to clean toxins in the air. This was studied by NASA in the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>80s and implemented by Clairy with almost 3 years of research at  PNAT and LINV, two of the most important laboratories on plants neurobiology in the world.ÃÂÃÂ                   Plants placed in NATEDE metabolize a significantly higher amount of pollutants as opposed to plants potted in regular vases given that the  air purification process  happens throughout the whole plant, including its roots.  NATEDE also features a  new and improved technology unit  that supercharges this effect.       NATEDE combines  phytoremediation  with a new incredible filtration process:  photocatalysis. ÃÂÃÂ        NATEDE's superpowers come from the so-called  photocatalysis : light energy kick-starts a process that zaps all kinds of nasty air pollutants and turns them into harmless substances instead.   For people who suffer from asthma and allergies , the NATEDE light-powered air purifier is a great ally to breathe clean air and improve your health.  The photocatalytic filter inside NATEDE can capture and eliminate VOCs, viruses and bacteria, and it can significantly alleviate odors from pets, cigarettes and cigars, cooking, mildew, etc.  And the best part of photocatalysis is that  this filter does not need any replacement!                              NATEDEÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology has been scientifically tested    PLANTS   ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s now more than 3 years that we have been testing our products and our technology.  Our main partners are PNAT and LINV , the most prestigious research labs on plants neurobiology in Europe, both spin-offs of the University of Florence, Italy. PNAT and LINV proved the effectiveness of our system and work closely with us to improve our products.   Results from 2016 PNAT/LINV analysis    Additional 2017/2018 PNAT/LINV analysis    FLUID DYNAMICS   After the success of our first Kickstarter campaign back in 2016, we started working with  fluid dynamics engineers  to perfect the airflow and to improve the purification range. NATEDE has an incredible purification range and guarantees a perfect and silent air flow.   See results    PHOTOCATALYSIS   Photocatalysis is a natural process by which the light strikes a mineral (titanium dioxide - TiOÃÂ¢<U+0082><U+0082> - a common mineral) and activates a chemical process that securely and instantaneously oxidizes and decomposes the organic matter at the molecular level to form water vapor and small parts of carbon dioxide. The  combination of photocatalysis with the plant  is just perfect and guarantees a great improvement in performance.   Center of Industrial Microbiology Test Report 2018     Comparing NATEDE to other air filtering              ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   ClairyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology has 3 worldwide patent pending applications. Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  Having a NATEDE means you can lay back and relax: the NATEDE app lets you  take control of the air you breathe,  hassle-free.  Whether you are cooking, working, relaxing or sleeping, you can select the right functioning mode of your NATEDE.       You will be able to save energy while you are not at home with its night mode, or boost its fan while you are preparing those yummy recipes with performance mode.  And if you need a  good sleep  to be ready for an intense day tomorrow, just make sure you breathe good air during the night.            The Internet of Things (IoT) is a scenario in which objects, devices, and sensors are given the ability to transfer data over a network without requiring human-to-human or human-to-computer interaction.   NATEDE can connect to other smart home devices , such as Amazon Alexa and Google Home, who will directly report the quality of the air you breathe and will be able to manage it with voice commands.            NATEDE features a  proximity sensor that lets you turn it ON an OFF  by simply moving your hand close to it. NATEDE is science, but you can do your little magic here.            NATEDE features an intuitive LED guide that lets you see the quality of your air without checking the app.                           NATEDE features a self-watering system, which helps to further  reduce water consumption  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> in addition to keeping plants alive while we are on the move or on long holidays - its water tank can  bring water to plants for about a month.                  NATEDE's new photocatalytic filter, combined with the increased efficiency of the air flow, will also reduceÃÂÃÂ  smoke, cooking, and bathroom odors.             NATEDE has a green soul: it is Made in Italy with sustainable materials often derived from natural waste.ÃÂÃÂ    At Clairy, we are committed to a green lifestyle,  we respect our planet, and while NATEDE purifies your air from harmful elements that can affect your health  we are keen on avoiding an impact on our planet.ÃÂÃÂ    This is why we spent 2 years looking for the best combination of these materials.       We have created NATEDE starting from the concept of  "Circular Design Economy" , which refers to a sustainable design that thinks about our future.ÃÂÃÂ   NATEDE is respectful to the environment in multiple ways: in its use of  natural materials , in the  lack of added harmful glues , and in its  sustainable dismantling  at the end of its lifecycle.ÃÂÃÂ   As a  Nature-loving company , we leverage nature and we aim to preserve it as best as we can.  As a  Technology-enabled company,  we deliver the best in class of today's most advanced research in a sustainable future where Economy is based on Circular Design.  As a  Design company , we are keen on thinking about  your health  and  your future , while delivering a beautiful design object that will enrich your home, office, and your well-being.       NATEDE Premium is  made of ceramic and handcrafted  by the best Venetian artisans.            For Kickstarter only, we are creating a  Special Limited Edition . Every single NATEDE will be numbered and you will have a unique piece of Italian design. A series number will be put at the bottom of each NATEDE.       NATEDE comes in 2 versions, regular and Premium, each one in 2 available colors, all able to adapt to any home or office style.  Pick your favorite color to enhance your own home or office style. Project_description: Eduonix is once again revolutionising the way we learn! Forget everything you knew about traditional learning and get ready to experience a training program that is so immersive and cutting edge that it will ensure that you master everything required to take on any DevOps task imaginable.  We are very excited to start working on our next project ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> DevOps E-Learning Degree. This isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just a simple course, but rather it is a complete degree that compiles 6 different courses to bring you everything you would ever need to know about DevOps under one roof.  No more confusion about where to start, how to get started, what comes next or what can you do with what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve learned. This isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just a degree, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a guide. Starting at the very beginning with the essentials and fundamentals, you will go through step-by-step to actually understand and learn DevOps.  This isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t just a simple course, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a complete degree experience that has a curriculum built with industry leaders and taught by expert instructors. This unique degree will ensure that you are completely prepared for a career in DevOps.    What is DevOps?         DevOps is a set of practices that aim to automate the process by combining practices and tools between software development and the testing teams release applications and services at a faster rate. It breaks the traditional form of development set ups that result in ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>siloingÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> development and operations teams and instead creates a new method where there is a continuous conversation.ÃÂÃÂ   Under this method, engineers work across the entire application lifestyle from the start including development, deployment, testing and are not limited to only a single task, instead develop a range of skills. This ensures that quality assurance and security teams also become more integrated with the development and operations teams to ensure a top-notch product!  DevOps comes with a number of different benefits that can be across the entire organization:   Speed:  A major chunk of the time when it comes to app development and deployment is wasted in waiting. The periods of waiting where the app is shipped from one department to another add a considerable amount of time in the app development process. With DevOps, the process is streamlined which means less time is wasted and things move much faster and more efficiently.ÃÂÃÂ    Faster Delivery:  A more streamlined and automated process ensures that your app is delivered faster. Each release can be worked on and deployed more rapidly.ÃÂÃÂ    Quality:  Since continuous integration and continuous deployment are primary processes in DevOps, it ensures a complete transparent working environment. This creates a better management system between the teams which results in more quality work across all streams.ÃÂÃÂ    Improved Collaboration:  The DevOps model results in more team activities, which means that you require building strong teams that work exceptionally well along with one other. This strategy requires a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>systems thinkingÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> approach that results in employees becoming aware of how your actions not only affect the individual person but also the entire team and the product.ÃÂÃÂ    Increased Security:  While you sacrifice some security benefits when automating, but a more hands-off approach and collaborative environment ensures that your apps are built to offer the best security you can offer.  This 3-month dedicated program will include numerous labs, quizzes, projects and exams at the end of each course. Once completed, you will be awarded an e-degree which will reflect your performance and your score from each course.  ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s not all, there will also be webinars, moderated forums, reviews and instructor support that enhance your learning experience!   DevOps as a Career        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   DevOps is growing today at a fast pace as more companies are turning towards this method to streamline their development and deployment process. The collaboration between the teams not only results in apps being built faster, but also ensures apps are bigger and better.  DevOps has shown great promise in 2017, and is expected to grow even more in this year. According to Research Company, Forester, DevOps is expected to reach $7.72 billion by 2021, a growth of 33% annually.  Their research also revealed the number of companies that have already implemented DevOps in 2018 and also the ones that are interested in implementing and expanding this process. This shows that 50% of the business reviewed were actually interested using DevOps within their organisation.  This makes right now the best time to become a master DevOps and its technologies to get an edge in the market!    ÃÂÃÂ What This Degree Offers         This Degree will offer you a complete immersive experience with cutting edge learning techniques taught to you by industry experts. This training program will ensure that you master everything required to take on any DevOps task imaginable.ÃÂÃÂ   This Degree will be for a duration of 3-6 months and will be divided into 6 Different courses to help you break down and systematically understand DevOps Technologies:   Course 1 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> DevOps Essentials        This course will start at the very beginning with the fundamentals and basics. In this course, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be introduced to the essential concepts of DevOps, along with Continuous Integration and Continuous Development. This course will have a special focus on build automation.ÃÂÃÂ    Course 2 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Scripting Essentials        This course will focus on the most important part of DevOps ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the programming language. YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll learn how to write basic and more advanced scripts that will help you master DevOps Tools such as Bash, Python, and Ruby. Bash is the native programming language for Linux, Python is a very popular scripting language and Ruby is an important programming language that is used in popular DevOps tools such as Vagrant, Chef, and Puppet. This course will prepare you everything you need to know to work on DevOps and LinuxÃÂÃÂ    Course 3 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> DevOps Tools        This course will cover the important DevOps tools in detail. These tools youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll come across very commonly when working with DevOps and will help orchestrate your DevOps projects. These include tools such as Git, Github, Vagrant, Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes and others.ÃÂÃÂ    Course 4 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Cloud Essentials        Since Cloud plays an important role in DevOps, these are a must for any DevOps engineer. This course will cover the major Cloud essentials that DevOps developers are expected to know. Here youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll dive into the world of cloud provisioning and how the giant cloud providers offer their services. YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll also go in detail to understand the concept of microservices. This course will cover important and popular Cloud services such as Amazon AWS, Google Containers, and Microsoft Azure.ÃÂÃÂ    Course 5 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Jenkins ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> The Complete Course        Automation is an important aspect of DevOps, we will definitely cover one of the most crucial CI/CD tools that are used in major DevOps projects ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Jenkins. This course will focus solely on helping you master Jenkins and its major tools.ÃÂÃÂ    Course 6 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Scaling and Monitoring Techniques        This final course will focus on helping you learn exactly how to scale and monitor your project. Now that your DevOps Projects are live and running, you will need to monitor them and learn how to amplify itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s reach. This is where youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll learn about monitoring tools such as Nagios, Cloud Watch, Cloud Formation and OpsWatch.ÃÂÃÂ                                                     ÃÂÃÂ  Devops Convention and Workshop Details                                       Why This Course? ÃÂÃÂ   Do not mistake this for any ordinary course, but rather this degree will compete with university degrees. Discarding the outdated methods that universities sometimes focus on, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve designed a comprehensive hands-on syllabus that will start at the very beginning and help you reach the finish line. Creator_description: Osmosis System Group Limited has provided a variety of wellness beverage appliances for 7 years. Project_description: The Beverage Bar eliminates the need to have multiple appliances in your kitchen by consolidating your coffee machine, tea kettle, and water filter into one convenient and stylish appliance. The Beverage bar is paired with the latests Nanoceram 3-stage filtration technology to remove all harmful substances that are often found in water coming from your homeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s water supply. Because it does not require a hot/cold water tank, you are safe from contaminants because you do not need to clean a water tank.ÃÂÃÂ   The Beverage Bar also allows you to monitor the lifetime of your filters, track your water consumption, and receive notifications if you have a water leak.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ           Post  by  214462182311823 .           Osmosis:  The spontaneous net movement of solvent molecules through a semipermeable membrane into a region of higher solute concentration, in the direction that tends to equalize the solute concentrations on the two sides.ÃÂÃÂ   Just like the scientific definition of Osmosis, our company represents a natural movement of supplying the best wellness products to our valuable customers. With over 7 years of producing water purification machines and appliances, we have established ourselves as a reputable producer of products scientifically efficient and paired with todayÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology. with buying the same brand of pods for each appliance.ÃÂÃÂ         With the Osmosis Beverage Bar, you can enjoy some of your favorite capsule brands including  Nescafe, Nespresso, Lavazza and Caffitaly  capsules with purified contaminant-free water.ÃÂÃÂ         For those who want to be more environmentally friendly, feel free to use your biodegradable pods or use your coffee powder with recyclable pods and enjoy the same great taste of some of your favorite cafe style drinks such as coffee, green tea, milk tea and also herbal teas from the comfort of your home or office.ÃÂÃÂ                  ÃÂÃÂ Osmosis Beverage Bar adapts to your beverage needs by making it easy to quickly switch between hot, cold, or room temperature purified water with a press of a button from the beverage bar or dedicated mobile app.ÃÂÃÂ         Osmosis also releases used capsules into a dedicated cartridge dust box with a press of a button after every use.ÃÂÃÂ              Designed by award-winning Japanese product designer Fumie Shibata, Osmosis Beverage Bar represents the essence of marrying high design with high-tech functionality for the consumer appliance industry.ÃÂÃÂ    SOME OF SHIBATA'S DESIGNS BELOW         Shibata is a highly respected product designer with experience designing products for small and big brand names such as Toshiba, Panasonic, Procter & Gamble, Acure (JREWB), and Sakai Sangyo to name a few.ÃÂÃÂ   Her work spans across multiple product categories including Home, Kitchen, Healthcare, Stationary, Baby Products, Mobile, etc. Now she has applied her expertise to bring to you the Osmosis Beverage Bar; a sleek and stylish kitchen appliance that is sure to compliment your kitchen decor.             ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                  Osmosis Beverage Bar is equipped to help you consolidate appliances and adapt your home to societyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s transition into smart technology for your home.ÃÂÃÂ                  Osmosis Beverage Bar comes equipped with the latest NanoCeram nanofiltration filters that work for low water pressure and has the highest removal rate.ÃÂÃÂ         Using a 0.5 micro high-quality sediment filter, this stage removes small particles including dirt, other minute impurities, and particles that are 15 times smaller than a grain of sand. And removes chlorine and organic substances, as well as trihalomethane and other harmful substances. Filter media are certified to NSF/ANSI Standard 42ÃÂÃÂ    Drinking Water treatment Units - Aesthetic Effects (class l Particulate Reduction)          NanoCeram ÃÂÃÂ® is a unique system possessing removal capabilities well beyond the scope of conventional filtration technologies. Utilizing the principle of electro-adhesion NanoCeram ÃÂÃÂ® is capable of removing a wide range of waterborne contaminants including bacteria, cysts, viruses and colloidal particles.ÃÂÃÂ    Filter media are certified to NSF/ANSI Standard 53ÃÂÃÂ   Drinking Water Treatment Units-Health Effects (Cyst Reduction)         Enhances the fresh taste of water, providing a natural taste by removing dissolved gases and odors through a high quality granular activated bituminous filter. Also, the filter improves the qualities of clean water by adding necessary for proper human development and healthy minerals, such as Calcium, Magnesium, Sodium, Potassium, and others readily found in natural mineral water.ÃÂÃÂ    Filter media are certified to NSF/ANSI Standard 42              The Beverage Bar by Osmosis comes paired with a proprietary mobile app that allows you to adjust water pressure and adjust the temperature to hot, cold, or room temperature based on your unique drink preferences.ÃÂÃÂ        If you find it to be difficult to remember to check the Beverage Bar filters, you can actively monitor the lifespan of the filters from your smartphone. The Beverage Bar will also notify you if you have a water leak.ÃÂÃÂ                  The Beverage Bar is equipped with an instant heater and cooling device to provide hot water at 150ÃÂÃÂ°, 185ÃÂÃÂ°, 203ÃÂÃÂ° (70c, 85c, 95c) temperature.ÃÂÃÂ   For those who prefer cold beverages, you can enjoy instantly chilled drinks from 39ÃÂÃÂ° to 46ÃÂÃÂ° (4c to 8c) temperature.  Not to mention, you can always enjoy crisp and clean room temperature water directly from your Beverage Bar anytime.                 How many times have you gone to make tea with multi-functional beverage machine and experienced mixing coffee flavor into our tea?ÃÂÃÂ   The Beverage BarÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s self-cleaning system uses high-pressure steam to clean the head and capsule room of the Beverage Bar to ensure that the head and capsule room remains tasteless and hygienic for your next use.             ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                  If you are thinking about re-decorating or tidying up your kitchen this spring, Osmosis Beverage Bar can help you add a new look and also free up some countertop space in your kitchen this year!ÃÂÃÂ             One of the downsides of making an important appliance purchase is the installation process. Many require professional installation which takes time to schedule appointments to have a someone come to install and set up your appliance.ÃÂÃÂ   With that understanding in mind, we designed Osmosis Beverage Bar the focus of eliminating the dreaded installation process by making it compatible to easily connect to the saddle valve of the home water supply.                      The Beverage BarÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>no tank designÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ allows you to be conservative with your power usage while simultaneously providing instant access to hot or cold water when you need it.ÃÂÃÂ   Because cold/hot tanks are not needed you can be certain that you are free from the secondary contamination that many purifiers with tanks release into the water that you drink due to lack of maintenance and the tanks themselves.  Without the use of water tanks, we were able to condense the size of the Beverage Bar to 320 x 330 x 361 making it one of the smallest water purifiers on the market with a multi-function beverage system.                 Osmosis is on a mission to help you lead a healthier lifestyle starting from within.ÃÂÃÂ   Water, Coffee, and Tea all have their own unique benefits for our bodies but these benefits are often compromised by the water we use as the base for our beverages.  This is why we are on a mission to bring you an appliance like the Osmosis Beverage Bar to eliminate the harmful pollutants at the source, your home or office water supply.                                                                            ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                      ÃÂÃÂ           Risks and challenges  The idea came from finding there are limited coffee machines with integrated water purification. We understand that the quality of water directly affects the taste of the beverage.  We have also noticed that many homeowners adopting smart home devices, we sought out to create 3-in1- beverage bar with integrated tech features for all your home beverage needs.  With over 7 years of producing water purification machines and appliances, we have established ourselves as a reputable producer of products scientifically efficient and paired with todayÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s technology.

Blurb: Snoozle - The Snooze Proof Alarm Clock

Creator_description: I built Snoozle for myself. A few friends liked the idea and I built a few for their kids. After positive feedback and encouragement I decided to turn this into a business.
Project_description: 9 golden benefits of waking up early:  ÃÂÃÂ  -More time to plan your day and execute it effectively  ÃÂÃÂ   -Perfect for quiet time  ÃÂÃÂ   -Higher-quality sleep and more consistent sleep patterns  ÃÂÃÂ   -More energy, optimism, and better focus  ÃÂÃÂ   -Improved mental clarity and creativity  ÃÂÃÂ   -Consistent increase in daily productivity  ÃÂÃÂ   -More likely to accomplish your grandest goals  ÃÂÃÂ   -You will join an exclusive club of high achievers  ÃÂÃÂ   -Healthier body  ÃÂÃÂ         Snoozle  is the perfect alarm clock that will get you out of bed on time. Also, it is great for parents that need to get the children up in the morning. Let Snoozle do the work for you, while you use your time in other ways like preparing breakfast for the family.  ÃÂÃÂ         Snoozle  makes your day easier by giving you more time in the morning. Have time for a healthy breakfast, plan your day, hit the gym, or anything else you might be missing out on.  ÃÂÃÂ         Where do you start your morning routine?   Whether you are the type of person that likes to go running in the morning, play the guitar, open the refrigerator, drink a cup of water, or just play with your pet duck... Snoozle will make your morning easier and will get your started.  ÃÂÃÂ         How does Snoozle work?   ÃÂÃÂ   Snoozle is made out of 2 components:  ÃÂÃÂ   1-The Snoozle alarm clock.  ÃÂÃÂ   2-The Snoozle base.  ÃÂÃÂ   Place the alarm next to your bed, but the Snoozle base should be placed wherever you start your morning routine. This might be in the bathroom, kitchen, closet, gym, refrigerator etc.  ÃÂÃÂ   Snoozle works like a regular alarm clock, but the only difference is that the alarm only stops when you place it on top of the Snoozle base. This will make your morning easier and get up and start your day.  ÃÂÃÂ   Easy as that.   ÃÂÃÂ         Why choose Snoozle?   ÃÂÃÂ   -Add precious time to your everyday life  ÃÂÃÂ   -Full of energy throughout the day  ÃÂÃÂ   -Feel more optimistic  ÃÂÃÂ   -Get out of bed on time  ÃÂÃÂ         LED display   ÃÂÃÂ   Snoozle has a bright LED light that lights up the screen. This works great for seeing what time it is at night, and also as a night light.  ÃÂÃÂ         Here are a few reviews from people that have tried waking up with the prototypes:   ÃÂÃÂ        Contribute to Snoozle for yourself, or get it as the perfect gift for someone that is always late to meetings.           Risks and challenges  During this project (while building the prototypes and Kickstarter campaign) we have already encountered many challenges and problems that we had to find solutions to. While building the prototype we were sent the wrong components from manufacturers on multiple accounts, but we have solved them all and now have a functioning prototype.  Now we see a few risks that might come up during the project that might make it more challenging for us.  1. Marketing and not raising the goal we set in order to mass manufactor Snoozle.  - We have found outside investors from Italy that will invest in our product if we raise half the money on Kickstarter which will show that this product is something that people want. We also ask for your help in sharing the campaign on social media with friends if you think Snoozle is a cool product.  2. Manufacturing delays.  - We minimized this risk by lining up 3 manufacturers, so in case one doesn't come through, we have 2 more lined up. There is always a risk that the components we need might not be available in the quantity that we need. This all depends on how many backers we will have and how many Snoozle alarm clocks we will have to manufacture.  We commit to giving you frequent updates on the progress of the manufacturing process, packaging, and delivery of Snoozle. We want to make you part of the process and feedback is always welcome.

Blurb: Building multiple small-scale energy generators, even from recycled materials, for use in rural areas in Sierra Leone
Project_Community_top_cities: |London-United Kingdom:4 backers|Milan-Italy:3 backers|Bath-United Kingdom:1 backer|Beverley-United Kingdom:1 backer|Bridgwater-United Kingdom:1 backer|Calne-United Kingdom:1 backer|Belfast-United Kingdom:1 backer|Dortmund-Germany:1 backer|Wadersloh-Germany:1 backer|Wuppertal-Germany:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United Kingdom:9 backers|United States:9 backers|Germany:4 backers|Italy:3 backers|United Arab Emirates:1 backer|Australia:1 backer|Israel:1 backer|Spain:1 backer
Creator_description: My name is Mohamed A Kamara (MAK), I am an Innovator, I live in a small and beautiful west African country called Sierra Leone. We are seven in my family, due to the Cholera outbreak in 2013 and the Ebola outbreak in 2015 I lost my sister in 2013 and her three daughters as well as my father in 2015. Since then I have been committed in making sure I wipe out these traumas my family have gone through by making them realise there is hope for them by helping develop my country.I work with a team of 10 people in Light Salone, to bring electricity to remote rural areas in Sierra Leone.
Project_description: For years, I have been dreaming of contributing to Sierra Leone to help re-build this beautiful country. There is so much to be done. The last few years I started a project called 'Light Salone', with the aim of providing small-scale renewable energy to rural areas in Sierra Leone. We are a team of 10 people working passionately to innovate, with low-cost engineering solutions  In 2017 I was awarded Innovator of the year in Sierra Leone by the UNDP for my work on electricity. Over the years I have being working on providing electricity for my community through innovative ways of recycling waste material to valuable energy machines that can generate electricity for homes and small businesses. My work includes the following: hydro generator built from spoons with an output of 220Volts; fuel free generator with an output of 300watts; a solar book for students living in remote environments to study and access electricity using our solar book; a Wind mill built from scraps; Energy saving stove for home uses; Power banks for charging Laptops, phones etc; generating electricity from vegetables like,tomatoes, potatoes, orange, lemons with an output of 5Volts to charge your phone and light up LED bulbs. All these are built from recycling materials which makes them cheap to build and more accessible in our scarce rural environment.  My project through Kickstarter is to expand these pilot projects through my newly created social enterprise, Light Salone, developing multiple prototypes that can be sold or purchased through grants to provide electricity to rural communities. I hope to develop this work further for large scale electricity production so that I increase the output of the generators, make them more efficient and replicate it to many more communities across Africa,My Dream is to light up the African continent from being called the darkest continent to be called the lantern continent, I hope to contribute in making the Sierra Leonean economy grow, and electricity is invaluable for communities as well as for attracting investors and other developmental programmes. Africa needs our energy solutions to be able to move further with development programmes because electricity contribute in all aspect of development ranging from education, health, communication, businesses etc.  In Achieving this ambition, I need people like you to help me achieve this dream for Sierra Leone, you can help by support my crowdfunding page and donate the amount you are willing to help.Your Donation Will Help thousands of people in Africa especially school going students to study at night, hospitals to light at night, promoting our culture of storytelling at night, provide electricity for market women to sell at night etc. Help me make this happen!  If you have experience and ideas of how to scale this type of technology, do get in touch - it's always great to speak and learn from other entrepreneurs!  Please see my Youtube channel for examples of past projects that we hope to professionalise and scale, like we did with the So Wind (solar + wind turbine).  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCazdJtVHinsh03yqzjHQW5g/videos      Risks and challenges  The main risk and challenge of the project is to make it financially successful. It is always challenging to turn a prototype into a model that pays for itself sustainably. I currently have a strong network of mentors and supporters who are helping me both with the technical aspects of the project as well as the business and financial planning. I will work hard with them to develop a sustainable model for the future that will allow me to scale beyond the individual projects, to a self-funding business that provides electricity.

Most of the electrical parts and mechanical parts almost done.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  No project is easy to come to mass production,  without any risk or  challenges, however, we are trying to do our absolute best to minimize them and get those solved.   The MousePad+ product that you seen above video/photos are actual working prototypes. With your support, we can bring MousePad+ product to live and delivery to users worldwide. We will start mass production and your contribution will help us achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low.  Here is the problems we are encountered at this phase, if you have some suggestions or questions, please feel free to contact us. Issue 1. Stick the cable on the mainboard or use the Micro-USB way? Issue 2. Bottom mechanical part use  Aluminium  or Die-cast ? Issue 3. Shall we add the apple watch support and how?

Creator_description: Hi, my name is Nadine Warga and I'm 27 years old. I'm from Manching (Germany, Bavaria) and I was born there as well. After graduating from junior high school with a successful degree, I began training as a toolmaker in 2007 at the employer AUDI. Since 2010 I have been working as a tool mechanic at Audi Ingolstadt. Project_description: Key-Flex magnetic keychain  Most of us have a lot of keys on their key-rings.  There is a key for the apartment door, a key for the garage, one for the mailbox and perhaps some others (e.g. cellar compartment). And there can be a many more. There is your car key, a key for the Motorcycle, another one to lock theÃÂÃÂ  bike, maybe one for your boat, etc.  Now think of your daily life. In most daily life situations we only need few of them.  But on the opposite, there is (almost) no reason to have them all with you.  So, why should you carry all of them around with you and  risk to lose them all together  in the blink of an eye?  With our patented   Key-Flex   magnetic keychain we offer an   easy to use, sophisticated and very stylish  ÃÂÃÂ way to organize your keys.        As a passionate motorcyclist you know the problem. You put the ignition key in the lock and the other keys dangle in the curves from the left to the right and back again, possibly damaging the ignition lock mechanics and leaving ugly scratches on the paint of your bike.       But with   Key-Flex   you can easily separate the ignition key and put theÃÂÃÂ  other keys into your pocket.       ÃÂÃÂ Of course, you can also protect your car's ignition lock in the same way.       Imagine you are on your boat and enjoy a beautiful day on the sea. But at the next moment your boat turns over and not only your boat disappears in the water. Also the keys for for your home, your car, etcÃÂÃÂ  are gone in this moment. Too far fetched? But what, if your key-ring falls out of your hand at an unfavorable moment and disappears the water?ÃÂÃÂ      keyflex    Most of us have a lot of keys on their key-rings.  There is a key for the apartment door, a key for the garage, one for the mailbox and perhaps some others (e.g. cellar compartment). And there can be a many more.There is your car key, a key for the Motorcycle, another one to lock the  bike, maybe one for your boat, etc.  Now think of your daily life.In most daily life situations we only need few of them.  But on the opposite, there is (almost) no reason to have them all with you.  So, why should you carry all of them around with you and risk to lose them all together in the blink of an eye?  With our patented Key-Flex magnetic keychain we offer an easy to use, sophisticated and very stylish way to organize your keys.    Key-Flex  ÃÂÃÂ protects your from great inconvenience and high costs.   Key-Flex  is made of stainless steel and comes with  lifetime warranty    Key-Flex is also available in the following colors:  (other materials and colors available on request)    green    red    blue    gold    black         ÃÂÃÂ About the Key-Flex Team  We are a young, high motivated and new founded start-up from Germany. We would like to introduce a new "Motor sports & Life Style" product to the market and hope for your support.   Our Team    Pero        Pero is the inventor of Key-Flex and managing the whole project. He is also a passionate motorcyclist.   Nadine      nadine warga    ÃÂÃÂ Nadine is responsible for sales and distribution.   Iwan        Iwan is our technical engineer. His responsibilities are the CAD processing and the manufacturing and assembly processes.  For more information, please visit our websiteÃÂÃÂ  www.key-flex.de       Risks and challenges  Our invention was immediately filed to the patent office and during the  patent check, the first prototypes were manufactured.  After successful prototype tests and an enforced patent, nothing is in our way to start production. But these steps were very expensive and we had to invest almost the complete budget into the project.  So, not much money is left to be invested in ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008B>ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+008B>Marketing & Logistics by now.

Creator_description: We are a passionate team of innovators who want to make the world a better place by improving people's oral health! Our goal is to bring the latest advances in medical science and engineering to allow everyone to have the best oral healthcare possible in the comfort of their homes. We are aware that as much as 90% of all diseases come through the mouth, which means that oral health has a huge impact on people's overall health.While we want to grow our business, we want to do it responsibly - and make sure we take care of people in our communities. In that effort, we have partnered with leading nonprofit organizations like America's tooth fairy which are dedicated to bringing dental care to the underserved children around the country.
Project_description: Most toothbrushes (yes.. even the fancy ones) are primitive and ineffective. We just move plaque and bacteria around hoping to spit it out after. If you look at innovation of other industries, thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s drastic progress; for example in facial care, light therapy is commonly used to promote healing and kill bacteria. It is time to break lose from conventional toothbrushing and enter a new era of at-home oral care!ÃÂÃÂ             Bristl is simplistic on the outside, but packed with tech on the inside:        Still not sure? No worries. The Journal of Periodontology reported a study where patients undergoing gum treatment used Bristl. They found that compared to brushing with a conventional electric toothbrush,  brushing with Bristl using light therapy was more effective by :ÃÂÃÂ             ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             Light therapy was discovered by a scientist by the name Niels Finsen almost a hundred years ago for which he won the Nobel Prize in Medicine.Light therapy is nothing new to healthcare - similar red and blue lights are often used in facial care to kill bacteria and heal/tighten skin. Bristl is bringing effective light therapy to the normal toothbrushing routine.                                                                       ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ            ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ            Get Your Project Funded Today!         Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      Risks and challenges  Although every project has its risks, the Bristl team is confident that we have minimized all possible risks. We are working with an industry leading custom manufacturer that has impressive experience and is extremely reliable. In short, we can confidently say that you will receive the best product we can deliver in a timely manner.  A large amount of resources have been dedicated to development, prototyping, and manufacturability. We cannot wait to get this product in our backers' hands! We have surpassed the prototype phase and have had samples manufactured in a "mass-produced" fashion to ensure high quality at scale. On top of this, our supply chain has been tested and has a 100% success rate of on time delivery.  All our ducks are in a row (..a very straight and well tested row), and now we just need support from backers to push this business into reality.  The risks we face are those that every business faces. For example, there is always a risk of hazardous shipping conditions from overseas. There also may be a risk of domestic shipping damage. Don't worry! If that happens, we'll replace any products that have been damaged during shipping. While we feel it is very minimal, there is always a risk of faulty electrical wiring. Again, if this is the manufacturer's error, we will certainly replace damaged products.  We're excited and will keep backers informed every step of the way.

Creator_description: Our team is made up of entrepreneurs that share a passion for quality sleep and want to change the way we approach sleeping troubles. With today's technology and a lot of research, we were able to produce a product that will help improve the way we sleep.  After 2 years of non-stop hard work, we were able to bring to life, LUUNA, the first of its kind eye mask that tunes into your brainÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s natural way of sleeping to help you get the rest you deserve.
Project_description: As a THANK YOU to all our backers  In ancient China,ÃÂÃÂ sachets have been used as gifts for centuries. They are usually wrapped in a silk cloth and sometimes embroidered with exquisite patterns. Multicolor silk threads are attached as tassels, making the sachet more appealing. This June 18th, 2018 will be the Dragon Boat Festival, where grandparents and parents prepare scented sachets to keep insects away and ward off evil spirits. We have prepared customized sachets filled with herbs for all our backers in appreciation for all your support.       GET THE BEST SLEEP OF YOUR LIFE!ÃÂÃÂ   Hi, I'm Haoxiang Yi, creator of LUUNA, the first intelligent sleep mask that tailors its soothing capabilities to your sleep schedule. In todayÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s fast pace world, true relaxation is hard to achieve. My project will give you the rest you need in order to be more fully awake for the things that matter most to you. See for yourself...             ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                            ÃÂÃÂ FALL ASLEEP FASTER & BETTER!  Whether it be to lull you into a nap or caress you into a full night sleep, Luuna intelligently learns from your brain waves to produce music and sounds that are in harmony with your bodyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s rhythm, helping you fall asleep better and faster. What does this mean? The music is pretty much composed by your brainwaves. The music will reflect how you're feeling. If you're happy, the music composition will be fast-paced. If you're relaxed, the music composition will be calm. Incredible isn't it?!                           ÃÂÃÂ ENJOY 3 DIFFERENT SLEEP MODESÃÂÃÂ   Let LUUNA help you fall into a deep sleep or simply recharge your mind and body with a quick nap. Whichever sleep mode you choose, Luuna is there for you.   SLEEP Choose the sleep mode on your app to get you ready for a full night of restful sleep. Let Luuna's artificial intelligence soothe you with calming music as you doze off into a peaceful slumber.    POWER NAP Luuna's app features a power nap mode just in case you only need a few short minutes to recharge your mind, energy, and help you boost your brain's learning capacity.    CONCENTRATION Concentration training is much like weightlifting for your brain. This mode helps you master the ability to focus for longer periods of time.        EEG IS MORE ACCURATEÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ An electroencephalogram (EEG) is a test that detects electrical activity in your brain using small, flat metal discs (electrodes). Your brain cells communicate via electrical impulses and are active all the time, even when you're asleep.ÃÂÃÂ   EEG monitoring is the most accurate and effective way to track brain activity sleep stages. Entertech has one of the most accurate EEG dry acquisition technology in the world and the most accurate algorithms for automatic sleep tracking and analysis. But for users suffering from sleep issues, they need more than monitoring. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we developed brainwave-AI music. Luuna generate music which is created based on usersÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> real-time brainwaves. People love beautiful music, and when it's in harmony with our body, it is much more delightful than binaural beats sound.            ÃÂÃÂ REWARDSÃÂÃÂ   Help us bring this project to life by choosing a reward that best works for you! If you want to double your choice reward, simply pledge twice the amount relating to that specific reward. After the campaign, we will send you an email to verify your purchase. Is your currency different than ours? Not to worry, Kickstarter will do the conversion for you! Did we mention shipping is FREE?!             ÃÂÃÂ               You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                       ÃÂÃÂ FALL ASLEEP WITH MUSICÃÂÃÂ   With LUUNA you can choose between your personal music that displays your taste and style or LUUNAÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s optional set of specialized "Brainwave" tunes and natureÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s tranquil sounds (aka "Pink Noise") to ease you into sleep.   BRAINWAVE SOUNDS:  Soft yet powerful music, enlightening your imagination as you venture off into the dream world.    PINK NOISE: Balanced sounds of nature to help you get a deeper sleep and maintain your robust memory.    PERSONALIZED MUSIC: Relax and drift into a restful sleep with your own playlist.ÃÂÃÂ            ÃÂÃÂ AUTO-FADING VOLUMEÃÂÃÂ   Luuna uses your brains own melody and intelligent AI to create a song to fit your mood. And when you do fall asleep Luuna adaptively lowers the volume and fades out the music replacing it with the gentle sounds of nature.            ÃÂÃÂ SMART WAKE-UPÃÂÃÂ   By monitoring EEG signals, LUUNA is aware of when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re in your deepest sleep and waits to wake you in your light sleep keeping that post-nap fog from clouding the rest of your day.            ÃÂÃÂ GET PERSONALIZED REPORTSÃÂÃÂ   The Luuna app offers daily, weekly and monthly reports to show your sleep cycles and other data to understand your sleep patterns better and help you reach your sleep goals. This app is absolutely free and is available for IOS and Android devices.                  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  BLUETOOTH CONNECTION & DURABLE BATTERYÃÂÃÂ   LuunaÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s high-tech design gives you up to 80 hours of battery life which makes it perfect to enjoy the many options that Luuna has to offer. Listen to your preferred music style with your earbuds, or connect your own speaker directly to your smartphone to relax the night away with soothing sounds.                 ÃÂÃÂ COMFORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHTÃÂÃÂ   LUUNA is only 50g in weight and provides you with a sense of security with special pinholes that you can peep through at any time. LUUNA gives you the perfect light-shade because the 3D mask was specially designed to fit the contour of your face with skin-friendly fabric, making it extremely comfortable. Did we mention that LUUNA can be washed? Just don't forget to detach the EEG sensor beforehand.ÃÂÃÂ             ÃÂÃÂ RECORD WHAT YOU SAY IN YOUR SLEEP!ÃÂÃÂ   Always wondered what you say in your sleep? Now you can record yourself and share with all your friends for a laugh or two.            2 ALARM MODESÃÂÃÂ   Luuna comes with 2 different alarm modes to choose from. Have an important meeting and don't want to miss it? Choose the exact time you want to wake up. Or sleep in on the weekends and choose a time range to wake, such as 9:30am to 10:30am.            SEE IT IN ACTION!  Luuna is intuitive, user-friendly, and very useful to anyone wanting a good night's sleep or a quick power nap. We have created a short video below to give you an idea of how Luuna works. See for yourself!         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ OUR JOURNEY            THE TEAM  We are the Entertech team, and we focus on developing high-tech wearables for health, leading the way with dry EEG acquisition and ECG acquisition technology. Our R & D team consists of bioelectric data collection specialists from Zhejiang University, Hangzhou Dianzi University, University of York, and others.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Up to now, EEG technology has entered into different application fields, such as healthcare, education, toys and games and so on. We are glad to cooperate with other companies and popularize the EEG technology with teams in relevant industries. Meanwhile, we will focus on mental health applications and launch a series of products around spiritual health like sleep, meditation, and relaxation etc. , which we believe will be more and more important. ÃÂÃÂ                        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                                                              ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Entertech has researched and developed EEG acquisition technology for the last four years and cooperated with many well-known Chinese university laboratories, science museums, and hospitals ever since the team was set up. The Forehead Three-electrode EEG acquisition Program is our new development proposed because of Luuna. People who know EEG would know that most EEG acquisitions need a reference electrode on the ear, which will greatly limit product design. The fulfillment and effectiveness of this new program highly boost our confidence in Luuna. We have also integrated the EEG acquisition module. In Luuna, there is the smallest EEG acquisition module in the world, as small as your thumbnail with a Bluetooth module in it. The power consumption can be at least 1 milliamp.  Designs and working prototypes have been developed. Small-batch production went smoothly. We are ready to begin manufacturing. Based on our experience of production and distribution worldwide with our last crowdfunding campaign, we are confident that we will be able to produce the final product with exceptional quality and to also complete it on time. By the end of this Kickstarter campaign, we should already have some product in stock. Our delivery times are expected to meet all set deadlines.  Thank you for having trust Entertech. We really appreciate your decision to back us.

Creator_description: I'm Ayesha, a junior in Universty studying public policy with the intent to go to law school. Outside of academics I'm an artist and own a stationery company, The Gold Ink Press and an art subscription box company Art Tarte (check them out!). People often can't believe that I'm so young and yet do so much- they don't understand how I balance everything. My life motto is that "time is made, not found". I am a full-time student, own two businesses, am studying for my law entrance exam, and have been working on the Slights campaign for over a year. I believe my success lies in my ability to value time and hard work. I ask that you put faith in me and my ideas and view me as capable. I would highly appreciate it if you would check out and support the Slights campaign!
Project_description: Before    Introducing the Slights, flexible LED, motion controlled lights that contour to the shape of your stairs and light up your path. This simple, easy to install, yet innovative product that will change your life.ÃÂÃÂ      After       The slights can mold to any Staircase    ÃÂÃÂ The Slights use super flexible LEDs that allow them to mold to almost any staircase!ÃÂÃÂ   The Design     Proof Of Concept    ÃÂÃÂ The LED light strip has an adhesive on the back that stays until removed, without damaging your walls. The design is virtually unnoticeable when not in use,ÃÂÃÂ yet is an immediate show-stopper when activated.       The infrared motion sensor is preset to stay on for 30 seconds (we found that to be the perfect time to ascend or descend the stairs at a casual pace) but can be changed by the user to meet your personal needs.  Installation       ÃÂÃÂ Slights are easy to install- simply peel off to reveal the adhesive and attach the motion sensor, light strip and 2nd motion sensor to the wall. Walk past and watch as your stairs transform!  Why you need the Slights  The stairs are the MOST dangerous place in your house, especially at night. Slights are not only geared towards the older generation- from people in their prime to small children who can barely walk, having motion controlled lights are an instant reminder to watch your step. ÃÂÃÂ   Here are a few statistics we found really interesting: ÃÂÃÂ    There are over 1 million accidents involving stairs every year and it results in over 12,00 deaths annually. - Courtesy of Attorney W.D. Kickham ÃÂÃÂ   Your home is the second most common area for fatalities -US NewsÃÂÃÂ   Almost 100,000 kids are treated annually for falling down the stairs -CBS NewsÃÂÃÂ   Most stair accidents actually occur when an object is left on the stairs, and it simply isn't seen. -CBS News ÃÂÃÂ    Slights serve three main purposes: As aÃÂÃÂ safety precaution, a functional and easy way to go up and down the stairs at night without turning on all the lights, and as an attractive piece to make your house a little cooler and tech friendly!ÃÂÃÂ      Perfect for Anyone!    ÃÂÃÂ Slights are also a great gift idea (wait till you see our packaging)!   The retail price for the Slights will be $50, But are only $30 on Kickstarter!    Why Do We NeedÃÂÃÂ Funding?    Meet with manufacturers and come up with a finalized product ÃÂÃÂ   Mass produce the Slights and be ready for future orders (this includes all the costs for the custom packing supplies) ÃÂÃÂ   Have a support team and analytics behind us as we go to the big box stores with confidence ÃÂÃÂ   Build a brand name so other, larger companies can't copy our idea easily   My brother and I have always been fans of Kickstarter- it's a normal ritual for us to come and browse the site and discuss the projects. When it was our turn, it was only natural for us to come here, where we know we can count on the community for support.  Feel free to contact us if you have any ideas for improvement, criticisms, or the like!ÃÂÃÂ      You without Slights        Risks and challenges  We have spent the last year getting our patent in order and developing the product.  Both of us being full-time students, we do run into some time constraints, but in the end, we made this product because we love helping people and we love the grind (we live by the "time is made, not found" motto).  We assure you that your Slights will be delivered to you in the allotted time, and if our backers want, we can have stretch goals such as color changing LEDs or something else that is feasible in our given time frame.
