Creator_description: Volcano seismologist by training, geophysicist by trade. I have a passion for bringing together talented minds to create IoT home science devices like the [http:/raspberryshake.org]Raspberry Shake that empower citizen scientists like you. World traveler, salsa dancer, aspiring triathlete and a very proud uncle of two beautiful nieces.
Project_description: AS SEEN ON       Kickstarter veterans, the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Raspberry ShakeÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ team is back with our third successful and perhaps most awesome campaign yetÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ the Raspberry Boom!ÃÂÃÂ   The Raspberry Boom is brought to you by Raspberry Shake, a collection of affordable  home science  Earth monitoring devices.   ÃÂÃÂ      Raspberry Boom    At some point growing up, most of you will have heard of Superman and his superhero abilities- The X-Ray vision, super strength and super hearing. Now, although we arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t quite there yet on the super strength or X-Ray vision, we have cracked open super hearingÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ well technically  infrasonic  hearing!       The Raspberry Boom home monitor detects ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>infraÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ sounds, or extremely low frequencies of sound, that are completely imperceivable to your ears. These sounds are less than ~20 Hz, or the lower limit of what is audible to humans, and Raspberry Boom can detect them from great distances all around your local region.               ÃÂÃÂ     Imagine   what you could detect at home with your very own Raspberry Boom ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦                         SO WHAT CAN YOU DISCOVER/ DETECT?  The easy answer is ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>More than you would think!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ. You will be surprised just how many things actually generate infrasonic signals:       Yes you read correctly  IF  an alien ship enters our atmosphere or Superman decided to pop in for a visit, your Raspberry Boom would likely detect it!... Hmmm anyone near Area 51 ?!ÃÂÃÂ   Infrasound sensors detect so many intriguing things happening all around you. Independently they can uncover some pretty cool mysteries, but together, using our Raspberry Shake connected network, they create an array that can potentially track and locate events. From incoming harsh weather, planes flying overhead, gun fire and nuclear testing, to volcanoes erupting on remote islands in the Pacific Ocean and meteors exploding overheadÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ Detect all these and more- DISCOVER the untold secrets that are out there with the Raspberry Boom!    RASPBERRY BOOM DEMONSTRATION       Depending on your geographical location and proximity, you will measure infrasound from different sources. Remember with the Raspberry Shake ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C> Station View ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ array, you will be able to see activity from all over the world from all the different Raspberry Booms interconnected to our online map! So even if you don't live in tornado country or on the flanks of an active volcano, you will be able to access data from other users who do.   MEET THE RASPBERRY BOOM    A must have for makers and enthusiasts of all stripes!    Watch this techy video to meet the Raspberry Boom prototypes:      VIGOROUS TESTING AND MAYBE EVEN A WORLD RECORD!  Testing of the Raspberry Boom, which began last year, has brought us to some very cool places. At Raspberry Shake we are all huge SpaceX fans and we couldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t resist putting a Raspberry Boom through its paces with the recent launch of the Falcon Heavy rocket. And it was well worth it. We successfully captured clear recordings of the launch sequence and the 3 sonic booms that accompanied each rocket as they made their way back to Earth and into the history books. Who said the sky was the limit?       And with the help of Daniel Bowman we are taking the Raspberry Boom into Space alsoÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ well the stratosphere at least, and hopefully setting a  New World Record  while we are at it. Danny is an expert solar balloon builder, having launched his first balloon when he was fifteen years old and continuing with flights that have reached over 80,000 ft (24,000 m) high.  Danny has built and testing a 42 ft (12.8 m) diameter solar balloon with the hopes of reaching heights around 100,000 ft - ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s over 30 kmÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s/ 18 miles high!  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Our goal is to get the most outrageous altitude possible. I want to go up at least 80,000 ft but my dream is 100,000 ft. We may make it with your flight!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  The balloon will have a payload of a Raspberry Boom, and other monitoring equipment to document and record the mission. What better way to test the Boom under extreme conditions?! The launch is programmed to take place during this campaign, so make sure to follow our social networks @raspishake and campaign hashtags #BoomBalloon & #RaspberryBoom to ensure you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t miss it!  At stratospheric heights wind noise is negligible and infrasound energy is concentrated, so we canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t wait to see what the Raspberry Boom detects and of course the black-sky imagery we will get up there will be spectacular!        According to Danny, ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>In order to set a world record we must break the altitude reached by Malaterre, 1993: the author reports a 30 km altitude for his solar/infrared balloon. I believe that, by beating this, we could claim both the highest solar powered flight and highest hot air balloon flight. I will not guarantee success but I think we have a good chance of hitting it.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ To add to the suspense of the flight, we will be launching in New Mexico where it is quite windy this time of year. These types of balloons can be fairly fragile and rip apart, due to their lightweight nature. For a successful flight and to ensure the safety of the balloon we will have to carefully monitor the weather.   Wish us GOOD LUCK!!!        HOW DOES IT WORK?  For those of you who have heard about the Raspberry Shake, our flagship personal earthquake monitoring device (or seismograph), you will know that it is built on the most popular single board computer in the tech world- the "Raspberry Pi" computer.  The Raspberry Boom is no different, giving existing Raspberry Pi and Raspberry Shake owners the flexibility to start detecting infrasound just by adding the Boom board and sensor! And if you don't already have one, you can pick up a plug & play version at a great price in our rewards section. The infrasound sensor will unlock the Raspberry Pi's ability to detect those sound waves from ~0.05 Hz to 20 Hz that are completely inaudible to the human ear.      The circuit board incorporates a powerful 24 bit digitizer, sampling infrasound at 100 samples per second with data transmission rates of four packets per second. This makes the Raspberry Boom extremely accurate and a force to be reckoned with for other professional sensors out there that cost thousands.  Just like the rest of our product range, the Raspberry Boom comes with  many DIY options:  Grab the STL/DXF files from diy.raspberryshake.org and build your own enclosure, or grab the microSD card image and start writing your own software routines in order to integrate the data into your personal website. Turnkey plug and play solutions are also available.ÃÂÃÂ   For those of you looking for an all in one solution to combine our Earth motion seismograph and infrasound sensors in a single unit, check out the Shake & Boom rewards. If you already have a Raspberry Shake, there is a reward available so that you can easily swap out your Raspberry Shake board with the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>Shake and BoomÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>. This gives you the best of both worlds, allowing you to detect what is happening right beneath your feet and the atmosphere all around you.  FEATURES       Technical specifications here:  https://manual.raspberryshake.org/specifications.html#techspecs   ATTENTION DO IT YOURSELFERS!  Build your own Raspberry Boom sensor and become a kind of detective to explore the unheard symphony of infrasound happening all around you.       The Raspberry Boom Do It Yourself resources are already available! This means that you can already start laser cutting or 3D printing your enclosures or just start learning about the ins and outs of the new Raspberry Boom.  Some DIY resources:  -   Do It Yourself website   - links to the SD card image and DXF/ STL files for laser cutting and 3D printing can be found here  -   The ManualÃÂÃÂ     WORLDWIDE DETECTION NETWORK  Thanks to YOUR help we have developed the largest independent citizen science network of interconnected Earth and atmospheric monitoring devices worldwide! Everyday new devices are coming online from all over the planet. Reserve your Boom today and join the largest citizen science powered community in the world.       Your Raspberry Boom, once online, will strengthen this network. Any Raspberry Boom user in the network can access the infrasound signals from any other user in the network. So someone in California can connect to a Raspberry Boom installed beside Etna Volcano in Italy and watch the volcanic explosions happening-   in real-time!    The Raspberry Boom on its own is an incredibly powerful device, but when they link together across the community's network, they create an array that can potentially track and triangulate interesting events (We still donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t know how much of this is possible, because quite simply, it has never been tried before! But we have proven the potential already with our  earthquake monitoring network  where Raspberry Shakers all over the world are detecting their own earthquakes all the time independently of big government organizations.). This could quickly become the largest worldwide network (citizen science-powered or otherwise) of interconnected infrasound devices that are continuously monitoring our planet.   We are incredibly excited by this!  - Can you imagine what we'll discover together???   MOBILE APPÃÂÃÂ   Receive real time streaming information from your Raspberry Boom and connected devices, direct to your phone with the EQ info app for your android phone, in the    Google Play store   .       The app will be updated to stream live infrasound data from around the globe, in addition to the earthquake notifications it alreadyÃÂÃÂ shows on the interactive map.  REWARDS   To thank all of you for your support weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll add you to the Movers and Shakers section of our website!                 License Fee: The Raspberry Boom license is ALWAYS free to the following:  (1) Private users for personal or home use (e.g., Hobbyists / Citizen Scientists);  (2) School teachers and University professors for educational use.     For commercial, research or official use a license fee normally applies.      HOWEVER   We have decided to offer the license fee  COMPLETELY FREE  for a period of  ONE YEAR  for anyone who purchases during the campaign.  So take advantage of the incredible prices while you can!  To view our normal license details please go to: http://raspberryshake.org/license.  ÃÂÃÂ Raspberry Shake Product Comparison            ÃÂÃÂ         MEET THE RASPBERRY BOOM TEAM!        But also Anatoli, Thomas, Wesley and many others...      PARTNERS & COLLABORATORS       For the Raspberry Boom project we are very proud that some great minds have come together to ensure that the Raspberry Boom is an incredible product that you are going to love.  OSOP - Founder and creator of the Raspberry Boom  Boaz Consultancy - Software Lead, bringing you Raspberry Boom and SQLX  gempa GmbH - stationView, EQInfo Mobile App and much more!   OSOP would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to Boaz Consultancy and gempa GmbH for their contributions to the Raspberry Boom Community.   ÃÂÃÂ       FOLLOW THE BOOM ON SOCIAL MEDIA!: @raspishake          PRESS KIT  If you are a member of the press looking for information or media assets, please find our press information   here   and product photos   here  , or contact us at info@raspberryshake.org.              Risks and challenges  The biggest challenge for us was bringing the cost of the unit down to an affordable price for the consumer. Infrasound sensors are extremely expensive and in fact the sensor alone is roughly 3 times the price of the sensor we used in our previous Earth Motion devices.   Getting a fully functional home science infrasound monitor into your hands is not a risk. This is now proven tech which benefits from everything we learned from our first two successful Kickstarter campaigns and the creation of the 'Raspberry Shake' earthquake monitor. We have built various prototypes of the 'Boom' and 'Shake and Boom' which are installed in the field and working incredibly well, so the only thing left is to tidy up the software, go into mass production and get you your very own infrasonic monitor!  During the campaign itself, however, there are a few risksÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ We aim to launch a Raspberry Boom into the stratosphere on a Solar Balloon. The balloon is HUGE and March/April has some of the windiest weather at our launch site, so there are a number of risks for a successful balloon launch.   Risks of the balloon launch include:  - Good balloon launching weather - Possibility of the balloon ripping prior to launch - Possibility of the balloon bursting as it ascends - Technical failures due to extreme temperatures/weather - The balloon catching thermals and staying in the stratosphere for days (this would be cool though!) - Losing the balloon completely (very unlikely as we will have a tracker on board)  Wish us luck and stay up to date of the balloon launch on social media @raspishake by following the hashtags #BoomBalloon #RaspberryBoom

Blurb: WiTech aims to inspire young girls to IT, create a platform for women in IT to network, share knowledge, and build female role models.
Project_Community_top_cities: |VÃÂÃÂ¤xjÃÂÃÂ¶-Sweden:16 backers|MalmÃÂÃÂ¶-Sweden:4 backers|Stockholm-Sweden:2 backers|JÃÂÃÂ¶nkÃÂÃÂ¶ping-Sweden:1 backer|Karlskrona-Sweden:1 backer|SÃÂÃÂ¶dertÃÂÃÂ¤lje-Sweden:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |Sweden:25 backers
Creator_description: The idea for the network comes from the increasing demand and interest in connecting women working with IT and to create a platform that enables this. The women need a platform that enables new contacts, knowledge sharing and new business opportunities. The network will also bring women together to share and develop their comeptence and skills.The women engaged in the network so far have a strong will to inspire the next generation of women to choose an IT related education program or profession. We want to show the next generation of girls the variety of roles within the field and present female role models to look up to.
Project_description: What do we want?  We want to create a network for women in IT that arranges regular inspirational events and raises the awareness of the possibilities, attractiveness and diversity of the IT-industry.ÃÂÃÂ WiTech willÃÂÃÂ be a natural place for women to develop their competenceÃÂÃÂ and skills,ÃÂÃÂ and also be ableÃÂÃÂ to share their competence and skillsÃÂÃÂ with other women.   We also have a strong commitment to inspire the next generation of girls to join the IT-industry or choose an IT-education. WiTech also aims to create female role models who can show the diversity of IT and inspire young girls.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    How did it begin?   Due to an over representation of men within the IT-industry and a lack of female role models, a lot of women often feel alone in the industry. There are still a lot of stereotypical thoughts and prejudices about what kind of people that works with IT. Usually, this stereotypical person is a male developer.ÃÂÃÂ   The number of IT related education programs are increasing as well as the number of applicants, but the number of female applicants are still relatively low. Sweden, compared to other parts of the world, has a much lower share of women in IT related programs and professions.ÃÂÃÂ   The idea for the network comes from the increasing demand and interest in connecting women working with IT and to create a platform that enables this. The women engaged in the network so far have a strong will to inspire the next generation of women to choose an IT related education program or profession. We want to show the next generation of girls the variety of roles within the field and present female role models to look up to.     Women networking at our first event     Why should you support us?   To this date there are 128 registered women in the network from VÃÂÃÂ¤xjÃÂÃÂ¶ and Kalmar in Sweden. The women in the network represent different higher education establishments, students, municipality's and over 30 businesses in the region. The large number of women that are engaged in the network so far shows that there is a need to meet and share a common platform. We want to make this network work long term and in a sustainable way. Here are some examples of what your contribution could support:ÃÂÃÂ    Build a solid platform for the network to grow from  Arrange meetings for networking and knowledge exchange  Create inspirational events and conferences  Seminars and worskhops at local schools  Participate as exhibitor at eventsÃÂÃÂ   Marketing material  Eventually maybe get a project manager for the networkÃÂÃÂ   Support the expansion of WiTech into other cities    WiTech has four main goals   At WiTech's kick-off, 24th of November, approximenty 60 women joined and participated in a workshop in which they got to express what the network should work with. We got 58 answers and from these we could easy see a pattern leading us to our four goals.ÃÂÃÂ    Meeting place to network    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Create a chance for women from different orientations within IT to meet and expand their networks, both socially and to create new work related possibilities   Knowledge exchange and development of competence    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Share knowledge, competence and updates between researchers, students and professionals within the network.ÃÂÃÂ    InspirationÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Inspirational events and conferences for the women in the network. Inspire industry, parents, teachers and guidance counselors.   Inspire next generation of girls to IT   - Show young girls the diversity and attractiveness in IT.ÃÂÃÂ      Talking to young girls about IT at local school    What makes us different from other networks?ÃÂÃÂ   There are networks in Sweden that aims to inspire women within IT, for example #addher (created by Sogeti) and Sigma Smart Women Society (created by Sigma). Unlike these networks, WiTech is not bound to any company which makes this network open for everyone and takes away boundaries that some might feel towards other companies.ÃÂÃÂ   WiTech brings women from higher education establishments together with companies and public sector. This reduces the gap between the public and private sector in VÃÂÃÂ¤xjÃÂÃÂ¶/Kalmar. It also gives female students a great opportunity to meet and get inspired by women in the IT-industry, but also future work opportunities.ÃÂÃÂ   The agenda and the goals are created by the women in the network. The women in WiTech are building this network together because they see a need for it. This network is created with the leading words:   By us for us.       Work group of students from different higher educations studies        Risks and challenges  One risk is that when the hype about the network settles in the region, there will be less involvement from the women within the activities and the network will die out. The most important thing to prevent this is to get as many of the women in the network as possibly to be actively involved in planning and implementing activities. By working strongly with social media, we are showing all the good things we do and how we are making changes, this creates motivation for the need of the network. We also want to keep having events for the women to attend. We have been asked to expand the network into other regions in Sweden, we really want this for the future but first we need to build a strong platform in VÃÂÃÂ¤xjÃÂÃÂ¶/Kalmar. Over time we can grow and expand and this will hopefully create a strong brand to connect with.   Another risk is to not get through to the girls at schools and that one of our target groups does not attend our events for them due to prejudices. We have been working hard to start cooperation with the different schools in VÃÂÃÂ¤xjÃÂÃÂ¶/Kalmar. Many schools have been positive to our network and what we do. We have been invited to lecture at some of the schools. But it has still been difficulties to reach the girls to attend event created for them that are not a part of their regular education or mandatory. We have now decided to invite the girls who have shown interest to become student ambassadors at the schools. This will help us with marketing of the events and to reach out to the social channels the girls are using. This will also be a great opportunity for the student ambassador to get to know and get mentors from a lot of business women and researchers in the region.  Since the work being done now is based on volunteering, there is a risk the same people doing everything and that the work load becoming overwhelming to handle after normal working hours. Plans of a steering group have been made and this will help dividing the work among a larger group of women. One task is to decide how the network can move forward and who will work with what. The steering group will decided if there is a need to get a project manager and how that would be financed.

Project_description: Simply the best tool to handle your data.ÃÂÃÂ  Easily and instantly FIND all your photos, videos, any files at all - even years later.  Data Boss intelligently organizes any data you throw at it, then lets you find it anytime, from anywhere.ÃÂÃÂ   Backup as portable as your tablet can be. Search as portable as your smartphone.ÃÂÃÂ   This software runs on tablets, laptops, desktops. Works on-location or in-house. Used internally since 2014. Reliable, battle-tested.ÃÂÃÂ   New and improved v2.5 is here!  All organizing is done automatically for you, yet you are always in control. Complete backup of the  entire folder/subfolder and file structure . Best  search  feature gets the data you are looking for instantly. Saves your time and sanity!ÃÂÃÂ   Choose total privacy (ONE) or worldwide access and multi-computer operation (ANY). Switch at will from ANY to ONE.ÃÂÃÂ   New in v2.5:  Encryption; Dates Shift; Database Backup daily/weekly/monthly (ANY); Network Drives Switch. For photo & video: All Cameras auto-Detected  The Data Boss' secret is in its special system of data handling that automates as much as possible, making YOUR life easier.  Whoop whoop, we are now in the Stretch Goal territory! Keep pledging and get even a BETTER software!  Please scroll down for the Stretch Goal details.       Our data overwhelms us  (but this project will help you!)       Can you easily find your photos or any other documents from years ago?ÃÂÃÂ   Or even from the last week?ÃÂÃÂ   There's just no time to meticulously tag every file and also learn how to use some complex management software that - cough cough - cost an arm and a leg, too...ÃÂÃÂ                 ÃÂÃÂ Then what do we do?ÃÂÃÂ   Be a Data Boss! This project is for the further improved version 2.5  If you:ÃÂÃÂ    wish you could save, thenÃÂÃÂ  easily find all your data - from anywhere in the world, at any time  of your choosing as needed  take photos or videos, be it professionally or as a hobbyÃÂÃÂ   want your files and descriptions to stay  private  (Data Boss uses its own fast search engine - NO exposure to any third-party service!)  want to choose where to store your files - locally or in the Cloud  work with  any kind of digital files  - as a doctor, a lawyer, government, any business ...ÃÂÃÂ    ...then this project is for you!ÃÂÃÂ   Support this unique software, and get an amazing relief for very little money.ÃÂÃÂ   The Problem: we just can't find our data easilyÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             Data Boss delivers.ÃÂÃÂ   Now you can easily back up your media and then actually  find that important file anytime later on - even years later - easily and instantly !ÃÂÃÂ   How liberating and efficient it is.ÃÂÃÂ   Only with Data Boss.ÃÂÃÂ   This campaign is for the Upgraded version 2.5ÃÂÃÂ         Data Boss :ÃÂÃÂ    protects your data on-location, in your office, at home, in the hotelÃÂÃÂ   then  lets you instantly FIND it anytime, anywhere from anything with Internet access, like your smartphone (yet your data is safe!) - even if its storage has been disconnectedÃÂÃÂ    makes your life so much easierÃÂÃÂ   SAFE: your actual files never hit the cloud, unless you choose to!  when properly mapped as a PC drive letter, your Cloud Storage can be used with Data Boss as either source or target! Checked with Dropbox.  if your PC can see your data source with a drive letter (card, drive, smartphone, network drive...) then you can tell Data Boss to process itÃÂÃÂ   perfect for both professional and home use - never lose your data again. Easily find it anytime, anywhere.ÃÂÃÂ   tried and true system since '2014, now engineering the upgraded version 2.5 with the help of crowdfundingÃÂÃÂ   save BIG by supporting us here on Kickstarter - it's a win-win!ÃÂÃÂ         What will this project deliver: awesome new features!ÃÂÃÂ   It's time to upgrade our tried-and-true Data Boss to v2.5 by adding these new and awesome features:ÃÂÃÂ    Your data  secured by encryption . It will be visible only to YOU now. Anyone without your decryption key will just see some scrambled view that looks like strange symbols. Just one benefit of this: say, you uninstalled your Data Boss v2.5 from some PC but left its database on it. No longer a problem! No-one can actually view your information anymore, as it can only be decoded by your Data Boss v2.5.ÃÂÃÂ   Database  backup: daily, weekly, monthly (ANY only) ÃÂÃÂ Recover easily from any PC crash or data corruption!ÃÂÃÂ   Media  date/time shift  on the imported media. Ever forgotten to set the correct time in your camera, and then all or some files are stamped with the wrong date/time? This, in turn, would screw up your search by date since the dates are wrong... No longer a problem: Data Boss v2.5 will correct this problem with just a click! It will also automatically alert you if such condition seems to exist. Easy peasy.ÃÂÃÂ   More than one camera used on the card/drive you are backing up? That's fine: Data Boss v2.5  now lists ALL the cameras  used, so you can find your media by entering the camera make/model it was recorded with!ÃÂÃÂ   Connected too many network drives? Version 2.5 adds  Allow/Disallow Network Drives switch . Control what is listed in the drive backup view, and what is excluded. Saves your time!ÃÂÃÂ    Support this project to make Data Boss v2.5 a reality, and get this awesome software for the unbelievable low price right now while you can!ÃÂÃÂ        I wanted to find my photo of Secretary of State John Kerry by the Rodgers Theatre in NYC. All I remembered was that I took it a couple years ago.  And yet, see the result. Above is a screen capture of me finding that photo super fast.ÃÂÃÂ   The only way I could achieve that is because I used Data Boss.  And you can do the same with the further improved, easy-to-use Data Boss version v2.5 - just pledge for this project now!       We've made Data Boss (alpha) back in the Year 2014 for use in our own company because  nothing else like that existed  - yet we needed a  simple yet effective  data management solution for our photo/video business. Badly needed it. And Data Boss did solve our problem, that's why we are confident  you'll love it too !ÃÂÃÂ   WORKS ON ANY PC  Tablet (even cheap ones, $70 or so), laptop, a desktop running Windows (version 7, 8, 10). Any computer will do, even the old one with a weak video card and a low-resolution display is fine. Unlike other software, we are not picky! ÃÂÃÂ   This is a Windows-native software. Works great on either 32-bit or 64-bit systems. ÃÂÃÂ   Very fast, easy installation/uninstallation. Confident, error-free operation - remove human errors by using this specialized software, and get perfect results every time. ÃÂÃÂ   If you have a Mac, then you'll need to run Windows under the emulator (like VMware Fusion or similar) for Data Boss to work.  Data Boss works in-studio or on-location. We know because that's how we use it! (Full specifications below.)ÃÂÃÂ   Being in the photography and videography business for over 17 years, we were always searching for a workable solution. Having tried - unsuccessfully - some other data management systems, we finally were forced to create Data Boss for ourselves.ÃÂÃÂ   We have successfully raised funds for Data Boss v2 here on Kickstarter! Now it's time for even more sophisticated version 2.5, which is this project.ÃÂÃÂ   Pledge now -  save money  and help to advance the  technology you will benefit from !       We'd like to release the  upgraded and further improved Data Boss v2.5  to you. Please support this project - you will benefit immensely!ÃÂÃÂ   This isn't the first time we wrote our own custom software to fulfill a specific need. As far back as the year 1999, we've received a $1,000  Microsoft Award for excellence in programming . Our previous hit software, RAW 4 PRO (also funded here on Kickstarter!) has been enjoying  FIVE STAR user rating  on Amazon and other sites for a couple years now. It is a go-to tool for people in the need of the RAW DNG or JPG sequences to HD Video conversion. So  we have pretty solid credentials delivering software  to many users and supporting our customers religiously.ÃÂÃÂ             Click and pledge now!ÃÂÃÂ   SpecificationsÃÂÃÂ    Runs on Windows 7, 8, 10; x32 or x64 bit architecture.ÃÂÃÂ   Desktops, laptops or tablets (our test copy uses a cheap $70 tablet) are OK.ÃÂÃÂ   Can see and work with all internal or external drives that have a letter assigned (including mapped network drives!)ÃÂÃÂ   Backs up your media to one or two targets (fantastic for data safety, for example on the photo or video shoot, in-house or out in the field.)ÃÂÃÂ   Allows you to quickly describe your media in human terms (ex. "New York - Times Square at night, people sitting on the red stairs") while the backup is still running. Saves time by multitasking. Allows you to easily and instantly find your data later - even years later - by both your description and media data.ÃÂÃÂ   No need to tag every file manually! Finds your data even if the original drive it was backed up to is currently disconnected!ÃÂÃÂ   Synchronizes your data between all your devices where Data Boss is installedÃÂÃÂ   Smartphone, tablet, desktop, laptop: quickly and easily find your data anywhere, anytimeÃÂÃÂ    Plus, all the NEW features - see What Will This Project Deliver section above!ÃÂÃÂ   Schedule:ÃÂÃÂ   When will you get this software: very quickly!  You will get Data Boss v 2.0 (the previous version) immediately after the pledges are collected in April '2018. The Data Boss v 2.5 (this version) should be ready and delivered to you in May '2018 or earlier as released.ÃÂÃÂ        Why support us now:ÃÂÃÂ   Being a backer of this project, you get huge savings and the earliest access to Data Boss. In other words,  you get absolutely the best deal possible here !ÃÂÃÂ   We are still happy with this arrangement because the project usually gets funded easier with smaller contributions, and then we will be selling this upgraded v2.5 software at the regular price on our website DataBoss.meÃÂÃÂ   Or, you can be generous and be rewarded with the unique opportunity of having the software named after you/your business or your loved one with the $999 reward level.ÃÂÃÂ   Whether you choose to just pledge $1 or $1,000, we are hugely grateful for your time and support!ÃÂÃÂ    Thank you!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        $ 1,000+  (so close!) will get you SKINS! Never get bored - make your own, or use one of the skins we supply. Customize Data Boss for your mood or application - business, fun, quirky. Color it  YOU  !  ÃÂÃÂ   $ 2,000+  will get you an API integration with the best Artificial Intelligence system that does much work on every single photo by tagging it with its content. Amazingly accurate, pretty fast, works in the background on thousands or millions of photos you have! Superb for finding the exact sets of photos you want. Will save you days of your life doing your work automatically and perfectly!  We need to actually collect those amounts for the stretch goals to kick in.  Please:  - pledge! ÃÂÃÂ   - spread the word - tell your friends about this software and give this link:   http://bit.ly/DataBoss25         ÃÂÃÂ Be the boss of your data - pledge now!      Risks and challenges  We are mainly adding some features to the already-existing software Data Boss, which has been in use for some years now, with great results.  Our experience with delivering programs spans many years, so far with good results always.  Frankly, your risk of backing this project may be described as very low. Thanks for reading, please choose your pledge on the right - thank you!

Blurb: This one of a kind 50W Liquid Cooled Flashlight produces an incredible 2000 lumens of light while looking awesome at the same time!
Creator_description: Hi!My name is Alex and IÃÂÃÂ´m a high school student in Sweden.I have been interested in Electronics and Engineering my entire life and have built everything from 3D printed electric motors to audio amplifiers and energy harvesting circuits. Electronics is something IÃÂÃÂ´m truly passionate about which is why I want to share some of my projects with you.
Project_description: The idÃÂÃÂ©a!  I have built many different flashlights over the years but this has to be the ultimate. The plan was to build a really bright flashlight that also looked cool. After playing around with the high power LED:s I was planning on using, I quickly realized that air cooling just wasnÃÂÃÂ´t enough, so this is what I came up with! This Liquid Cooled 50W Flashlight produces enough light for all of your lighting needs while looking awesome at the same time.   Features    Liquid Cooled  No problems with overheating  Wide beam angle (around 160 degrees)  Around 2000 lumens of cool light  Unique design   Finished Product     View from the side of the finished product. Here you can see the fan that is connected to the radiator.       View from the other side. Battery is mounted with velcro for easy removal.       View from the front. The two 30W LED:s with the liquid tank in the middle.       A view of the whole flashlight.    Specifications       Tests  The images below show what this flashlight is capable of. These were all shot with the battery fully charged but with no reflectors or focusing lenses on the LED:s.     A test lighting up a radio tower.       A test lighting up a completely dark tunnel.       Lighting up another tunnel.    Improvements  All the money from this campaign will go directly to improving the design and functionality of this flashlight. This includes buying reflectors and focusing lenses for the LED:s in order to get a more uniformed and focused light beam as well as investing in higher capacity batteries for longer battery life.ÃÂÃÂ   I am also planning on buying materials in order to 3D print a nicely designed snap-on handle for a more comfortable grip. If all goes well, I will hopefully be able to make these improvements and bring this flashlight to market in the near future.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  I have done all i can in order to minimize the risks of this project. I already have a good collection of the needed components in order to fulfill the rewards. The design has been finalized and there has been no problems or needed improvements during testing, the last few weeks.  The biggest risk that, unfortunately, is out of my control is shipping delays of the materials. Therefore, I have taken these delays into consideration when planning my production and delivery schedule. However, I guarantee to keep you updated if any drawbacks would occur.

Creator_description: Tony Pearce:Born in Utah, Tony grew up in Japan as a young boy, then went though high school in Layton, Utah. For thirteen years, in various states in the western USA, his employment included rocket material scientist, satellite materials engineer, sales, and marketing management.  Tony earned an MBA in 1986.Tony has been married for 37 years, has 10 children (some adopted from Russia), and 15 grandchildren.  He serves in a charitable organization as a teacher and leader of young people who in turn will be going to do charitable work in southeast Asia.In partnership with his brother Terry Pearce, Tony has over the span of 26 years been the co-founder and co-manager of a number of technology companies focused on advances in cushioning materials.  Receiving over 30 patents in the area of cushioning, Tony has helped numerous large and small clients around the world to make products that avoided and even healed pressure sores, that allowed people to sit at desks or in vehicles for hours without pain, and helped people stand and walk in comfort.  Currently, Tony is the co-CEO of Purple, and continues to realize his goal of making millions of people more comfortable and have less pain.------------------------------------------------------------------------------Terry PearceTerry was a young boy in a high mountain valley in Paradise, Utah (thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s really the name!). At the University of Utah, Terry earned a bachelor degree in Civil Engineering.  He proceeded to work for a number of consulting firms, including as a partner or owner, and for a large corporation as a logistics manager of $300 million of construction projects.Terry has been married for 45 years and has three children and seven grandchildren. Barking up the review tree  TheÃÂÃÂ  PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Pet Bed was tested by animals. Here's what they had to say (Biscuit let us borrow his translator).       ÃÂÃÂ PurpleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s place in the animal kingdom  The PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Pet Bed is an amazing fit for any land-lubbing vertebrate who craves a comfy place to rest their haunches. Early birds and night owls, spring chickens and old souls, all-day loungers and active adventurers ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Purple is perfect for every critter.       ÃÂÃÂ Why Kickstarter...again?  Kickstarter is where Purple got off to an incredible start and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re so excited to honor those roots. Our mission is to bring comfort to all, whether two-legged or four, and we owe a great deal of our success so far to the help of our incredible backers.  Our relationship with Kickstarter began late 2015 when we launched the PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Mattress, and grew even stronger in 2016 with the launch of our  PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Pillow . The camaraderie of the Kickstarter community and the shared excitement of the new and the creative is simply astounding. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s what inspires us to continuously innovate, so itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s only fitting that we give you all the first opportunity to experience PurpleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s new pet project.       To our loyal backers, whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been with us from the very beginning, you hopped on board with the pillows, or youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve found on Kickstarter for the first time here, thank you. A million times, thank you!ÃÂÃÂ   History of Purple  In 1989, two brothers, engineers Tony and Terry Pearce, partnered to change the world. TonyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s 13 years of experience in advanced aerospace materials, and TerryÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s 20 years of experience in manufacturing, design, and project management led to a partnership creating high-tech carbon fiber sporting goods and wheelchairs.       The Pearce brothers created technology that was used in products by Nike, Johnson & Johnson, and Hill-Rom. Eventually, the Pearces set out to create a technology that could revolutionize cushioning at a much lower cost. Purple began to evolve through a series of discoveries and product developments. The first breakthrough came in 1996 when the Pearces invented Hyper-Elastic PolymerÃÂÃÂ®.  This amazingly soft, yet strong material could stretch 15 times its resting size, was uber-durable, and never took a body impression. The key discovery came when Hyper-Elastic PolymerÃÂÃÂ® was molded into the Smart Comfort GridÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, a structure that could ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>relaxÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ under pressure points, redistributing the pressure to other areas. The same feature turned out to give amazing back support in mattresses.  Three years ago, the Pearces set out to combine all their knowledge of cushioning into the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s best mattress. The Pearce brothers custom designed and built machinery to make Hyper-Elastic PolymerÃÂÃÂ® in the USA at production rates that allowed them to significantly cut the cost of this miracle material to consumers.  Finally, in 2015, The PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Bed was born! Just as the Pearce brothers dreamed it would be ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> better than any $5000 mattress and costs significantly less. That was the goal, and Purple achieved it!  Why Purple? Well, why not? It is an awesome color, and it signifies treating everyone like royalty. The Pearces have spent most of their high-tech careers advancing the world of cushioning. With the PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Bed, pillow, Platform and adjustable foundations, sheets, mattress protector, and now theÃÂÃÂ PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Pet Bed, they have put all theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve learned into the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s greatest sleep products for both you and your fur baby, and they figured out how to do it so everyone can afford it.ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  Every Kickstarter endeavor has its risks and challengesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>you just donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have many with us! Production has already started. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve built the molds and machinery for our initial launch, and a portion of the money we raise here will go to fund the production of more molds and machinery so we can continue making Purple in the USA at two Utah factories.   Production time will be our biggest challenge, as we make all of the Purple for all of our products at our factory. Another portion of our funding will be used to grow our Purple team to meet production demands.   Another challenge might be working with our product partners to get certain international components to the factory in time to hit delivery deadlines. However, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve worked hard over the last several months to build up these relationships and plan accordingly. We expect to hit all of our delivery promises with the launch of the PurpleÃÂÃÂ® Pet Bed.

Creator_description: Hoverstar Flight Technology Inc began with its inventor and his vision for innovative recreation and rescue technologies. Since 2015, Hoverstar and its team of committed developers have secured over 20 patented designs with applications for land, sea and air. With our extensive line of exclusive products ranging from the single user recreation H2, to our all new Hoverstar 9-1-1 rescue series we are paving the way to a new era. At Hoverstar we are confident you will find something for everyone!  As flight technology has proven itself time and time again over the years, our founders dream collided with creativity and a new machine was born. The development of Hoverstar H1 was and still is the bedrock spring board of our newer more innovative H series products! The Hoverstar H1 is defined as an individual miniature hovercraft and its primary application, amphibious land vehicle.
Project_description: With flying in mind and water at hand, the Aquajet Dive H2 gives its users the independence in the water you desire with balance, stability and operability.ÃÂÃÂ          Multiple ways to use: both on surface and underwater.        Aquajet Dive H2 combines modern technology with intelligent design to create a diving experience unheard of before in the world of DPVÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s. The Aquajet Dive H2  features revolutionary wings modeled after the wings found on the most hydrodynamic planes to allow the Aquajet Dive H2  to fly through the water with ease.  We also developed a smart internal motor to drive the Aquajet Dive H2ÃÂÃÂ with variable speeds and advanced safety controls.   All of these unique features were developed by an experienced team with precision and careful attention to detail to ensure that the Aquajet Dive H2  provides not only a fun diving experience, but is incredibly safe for everyone with a minimal learning curve.                       Exhibitions & Awards                  ÃÂÃÂ  The King of The Speed ÃÂÃÂ   The Aquajet Dive H2 's smart motor has three variable speeds for users to control via the right wing with the top speed maxing out at 9km/h (5.6 mph).ÃÂÃÂ With high speed, you can freely enjoy flying on the surface and at depth.        ÃÂÃÂ Explore The Impossibility   The Aquajet Dive H2 's components are all waterproof. Science has shown that the vast majority of marine species live at depths less than 60 feet (18 m).ÃÂÃÂ The Aquajet Dive H2  is excellent for free diving applications with a measured depth of 18 meters. Explore the magical world underneath the surface with greater flexibility and a higher range of travel.ÃÂÃÂ         Surf Freely Like A Dolphin ÃÂÃÂ   The Aquajet Dive H2 's motorÃÂÃÂ is more powerful than any other underwater scooter,ÃÂÃÂ making it strong enough to carry four people at once. ÃÂÃÂ The motor is powerful enough to ride along the ocean (something other DPVÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t do).        Free Diving With More Possibilities ÃÂÃÂ   Aquajet Dive H2 is a new agile way to explore the underwater world for beginners and advanced divers alike with easy controls and high-performance features.ÃÂÃÂ Aircraft-style wings give the Aquajet Dive H2  a sleek appearance while reducing water resistance to fly through currents and waves.             Fly Beyond Limits   The worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s first underwater scooter with wings. ÃÂÃÂ Human and machine are in perfect balance with the wing design. The Aquajet Dive H2 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s wings were based on the wings on the most powerful planes in the world for a streamlined diving experience with reduced resistance and minimal fatigue for divers.To offset the torque generated from the rotation of the motor and propeller, the tailÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s bottom grille board features an arch shape design which provides maximum horizontal stability and a smooth control experience for the diver.ÃÂÃÂ         An Underwater Scooter for Everyone   Not aÃÂÃÂ professional diver?ÃÂÃÂ Not aÃÂÃÂ problem. You can easily learn to use the Aquajet Dive H2  in 10 minutes.ÃÂÃÂ The wings make controlling the Aquajet Dive H2 effortless and users can control the ride via the two magnetic buttons on either wing. Simply slip your arms through the straps, grab a hold of the wings, outstretch your arms and power on the device.       The left-hand powers the device, the right-hand controls the speed. Once you have control of the speed, subtle tilts of the wings are all that's necessary to adjust the direction of the Aquajet Dive H2. Tilt the device downwards to enter diving mode and point it up to jet to the surface.       Designed to mimic the dynamic control of the wings on an airplane, the Aquajet Dive H2'sÃÂÃÂ wingsÃÂÃÂ give you precise control over the vehicle as you quickly glide through the water. All of the motor controls are installed in the wings with straps to lock the riders in, so you will never lose track of the Aquajet Dive H2  or stray from your chosen path.        Five Safety Protections   We always put your safetyÃÂÃÂ first.ÃÂÃÂ The Intelligent-controlled motor provides five safety protections.ÃÂÃÂ With anÃÂÃÂ alarm light, it willÃÂÃÂ keep you informed of any system alerts including low battery or motor problems.        Use it as a rescue tool   The Aquajet Dive H2 has been used to rescue someone in conjunction with a stranded victim. It is a perfect tool for rescue. By trained rescuers,ÃÂÃÂ  Aquajet Dive H2 can be used in a professional capacity.   What's More   The Aquajet Dive H2  features many built-in safety and comfort features to make the dive seamless and enjoyable for all swimmers, regardless of skill level. These extra safety precautions protect not only the diver, but also the Aquajet Dive H2 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s essential components to provide a safe, reliableÃÂÃÂ and enjoyable diving experience.ÃÂÃÂ              Extra-long Battery Life   Aquajet Dive H2 delivers with extra-long battery life. The built-in battery has a long charge life of over 100 minutes between charges allowing for more underwater and ocean surfing fun without the need to find a power source.ÃÂÃÂ         GoPro Mount Compatible   Aquajet Dive H2  allows you to capture various angles above and under the ocean. With Aquajet Dive H2 's GoPro mount, you can not only film the marine life underwater, but also capture your surfing experience and your fun time with friends when kayaking.        Extremely Quiet   Since the propeller is directly driven by the H2 motor, it avoids gear noise. Aquajet Dive H2 is powerful with low noise, providing a peaceful and serene underwater experience that doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t disrupt any surrounding ocean life.             Bring the Aquajet Dive H2 on your next adventure anywhere with the carry-on bag for easy transport .  We include all the tools you need to make some minor adjustments, such as Allen wrenches, chargers and extra seal rings, and we even added a better dive experience with a weight and swim cap to adjust the buoyancy so that you walk under the surface.             Include:ÃÂÃÂ  Aquajet Dive H2 ÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ Portable BagÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ Inflator PumpÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ BatteryÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ ChargerÃÂ<U+0097>(1) Extra Sealing RingÃÂ<U+0097>(2) Allen WrenchÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ Swimming CapÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ Clump WeightÃÂ<U+0097>(1)ÃÂÃÂ        Made with highly durable materials, Aquajet Dive H2 can be dropped, thrown into the water and more without having to worry about impacting its performance. No matter the difference in temperature from 5 to 60ÃÂÃÂ°C (41-140ÃÂÃÂ°F), corrosive offshore environment, or long-term sunlight, Aquajet Dive H2  will always be kept in perfect condition.   Long maintenance periods of 12 months  , so you can keep the diving fun going!                           We did a lot of research on 20 underwater propellers and found out that the products which are under $1,000 are not suitable for recreational use in the ocean. The products that are over $1,000 are designed for professionals, which are too difficult for normal users. So, we designed H2, the only affordable, easy-to-operate, safe and powerful sea scooter for your recreational use.        Most importantly, flying in the ocean is incredibly irresistible.             The wing design provides an easy experience The biggest challenge faced by flat wings is the fact that they are affected by water pressure. In view of this, we not only used strong and powerful ABS materials on this product, but also spent nearly two years on designing and developing this product and finally solved this difficult problem, allowing flat thrusts to dive 20 meters deep.ÃÂÃÂ         Aquajet Dive H2  has been all over the world , from Bohol island in the Philippines to Bali in Indonesia. After over ten test sessions in swimming pool and the ocean internationally,  we got valuable feedback from 70 professional divers and 200 normal users.        Professional test drive team with Julia Mouse Dominguez       Luckily, we receive many positive comments from our testers and most of them expressed their desire to see that the Aquajet Dive H2 could be manufactured as soon as possible.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Because we have already finished a small batch of production! Our team has an experienced manager who used to work in the supply chain industry for 17 years at Philips, PowerOne, T-Mobile and Whirlpool. Our team also has professional divers, employees from international IT/ICT firms and an aerospace lab and institution. We are confident that our team will make sure every single H2 will be strictly tested and produced successfully.                            ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                  The soul of the company is innovation. We have obtained more than 30 patents, including seven invention patents. Our team has created products, and in the future we will create more innovative products.                  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                                                ÃÂÃÂ  1. Which age group is the Aquajet Dive H2 for?   Suggested age range: 16-60.   2.ÃÂÃÂ How to ensure the safety of shipping?   We use multiple layers of card stock and premium pearl cotton to protect the internals of the Aquajet Dive H2 , making the scooter shock-proof and drop-proof so it is robust enough to be handled even on your toughest adventures.   3. What is the shipping policy?   Delivery: July 2018  The weight including battery is 14kg. The gross weight including accessories is 20kg.   Free shipping to USA, Canada, EUÃÂÃÂ and UK.    $100 to rest of the world.   Since the battery is included, the cost of shipping is very high to rest of the world. That is the reason why we charge $100 for countries other than USA, Canada, EU and UK. We are trying our best to save our backers money. Starting up with this new product, we are offering highly discounted price on Kickstarter. So we are not able to cover the extra shipping fee.   4. What is the maintenance policy?   We provide 1 year maintenance for Aquajet Dive H2. Aquajet Dive H2  is an international company based in USA and China. If you have any questions related to the maintenance and products, you can always contact service@hoverstar.net      Risks and challenges  There are always risks to every kickstarter project, but we are confident to ensure our backers to receive H2 Aqua Jet Dive on time.  The material and technology itself have already been created and tested. Currently we are done with molding and mass production will start upon the success of the campaign.  We are confident to foresee and de-risk most of the difficulties faced in production. However, if anything beyond expectation happens, we will still make sure that the design and functionality of this product will never be compromised. If there is any unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide an estimate delivery date.

Weight    The magped pedal is a modern high quality flat pedal made from light CNC cut aluminium with a CrMo spindle. Risks and challenges  We built a lot of prototypes in the last 2 years to come to a final working design. But donÃÂÃÂ´t waste time and effort building fiddly cases, drilling holes or other time consuming hardware, reduce time and effort and apply Peguino bricks to your next level of masterpieces. Take some bricks and start building.       Make your prototypes with toy bricks and integrate unique Peguino devices with crazy functions: Microphones, infrared data transfer, OLED displays, humidity sensors or why not or a real webserver? Connect your self built project to the Internet and override all limitations.  Go and build your personal toy brick and ArduinoÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ (or Raspberry Pi) Internet of Things solution! Our Peguino parts deliver the bridge.       By integrating the Peguino Visuino visual development environment you can create endless complex solutions without writing one single line of code! DonÃÂÃÂ´t waste time to learn programming first.       But Visuino and Peguino is also your invitation to learn coding: Based on RockboticÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ concept - there we collected experience to learn, to play and invent with over 4000 students right now! This rich experience is included in each Peguino solution.              You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              More about Rockbotic at  www.rockbotic.com    The Peguino bricks inside Visuino represent their hardware components and you will easily be able to create and design your programs using drag and drop. Once you have completed your design, connect the (main) Peguino Brick inside your project, upload and run your new invention.            For those people who are not skilled in writing software, developing programs has never been easier! Instead of wasting time on writing hundreds of lines of programming code ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Visuino does all the hard work for you. Just focus on what you will build with bricks, wire them together and see it running in minutes!       The powerful program core behind Visuino is also utilized by companies where "inventive genius" is written in their DNA:        More about Visuino at  www.visuino.com              This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers the core control processing unit for your projects. It contains the most robust Arduino Uno Type microcomputer board to control your project. With the 14 Digital I/O Pins (of which 6 provide PWM output) and its 6 Analog Input Pins is enough external connection possible for complex projects. It contains a 16 MHz ATmega328 CPU and 32KB Flash memory. You can connect it to your computer directly via a USB connection and install your own programs. It is the optimal core Peguino brick to get started.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers the micro version of the core control processing unit for your projects. It contains a mini Mini-B USB cable plug. The specs are mainly similar and compatible to the Peguino Uno Brick, but it has no separate power jack. It contains 22 Digital I/O Pins of which are 8 Analog Input Pins. It is the sub sized board for enhanced projects.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a Raspberry Pi version of the core control processing unit for your projects. It contains a mini Mini-B USB cable plug. The technical specs are similar and compatible to the Raspberry Pi Zero W (WIFI).       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a text display into the center of your project. With its unique designed brick case it can be used standing upright or lying down to allow a broad range of toy brick project integration variations e.g. as a text display on your Peguino weather station.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers your graphical display for more enhanced projects. Beside of text output it allows you to show scientific pie-charts or a smiling face on this display e.g. provide feedback to a reaction tester project.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers precise servo mechanical movement into your project. With its unique designed case it can be used standing upright or lying down to allow a broad range of project integration variations. It contains a LegoÃÂÃÂ® type axle adaptor to integrate it into all rotating and moving parts e.g. to move the arm of your robot project.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a seamless motor to drive the wheels on any project. It integrates a gear to provide strong low rotation force. It contains a LegoÃÂÃÂ® type axle adaptor to integrate it into all rotating bits, wheels and gears e.g. to spin the wheels on your car project.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a switch to create a on/off control e.g. to turn on power.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a push-button switch to kick off user input e.g. to build a doorbell project.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a variable (resistor) control unit to deliver specific adjustable input to your project, eg. a light dimmer.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a light sensor to detect environmental light and input it to your central unit. You can automatically light up your toy brick castle as darkness falls.       This toy brick compatible Peguino units houses and delivers a set of two LEDs to send / receive infrared light to control your system e.g. invisible infrared Wiretap Alarm or use a remote device to turn on your project.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers one of six different coloured lights to enhance and light up your project eg. traffic lights, x-mas tree or the lights on your toy brick car.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a passive infrared sensor to detect body movement to enable your project e.g. to greet you when you arrive.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a temperature and humidity sensor e.g. use in a weather station or a mini green house.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a proximity brick which measures distance with ultrasonic Doppler Effect waves enabling your self driving robot to avoid walls.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a speaker type unit to deliver acoustic signals eg. door bell alarm or a ringtone.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a microphone to enable your project to listen and respond to acoustic signals eg. hand clap interaction.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a discrete integrated case for batteries that powers your project.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a reusable array of 170 connection points to build your own electrical circuit to interconnect all your Peguino bricks without soldering.       This toy brick compatible Peguino unit houses and delivers a Remote Control Receiver to build your own toy brick based race car. It is compatible to the universal Fly Sky standard transmitters and compatibles.                      The following Peguino Sets and Kits allows you to build your unique projects. All Peguino bricks are compatible with industry standard bricks like LEGOÃÂÃÂ® and that enables you to expand each of the Sets and Kits below with your own toy brick collection. Each Set and Kit contains Peguino Visuino and Stickers.       Tell the rest of the family whatÃÂÃÂ´s up. Create your own funny solution and start building it. May the sticker force be with you!       Time to have a decent coffee! But donÃÂÃÂ´t use anymore the boring usual mug: You are a creator! Stick on some Peguino Bricks and show people around you who is the boss! (or super nerd like us)...       This Set is the low barrier entry level into the word of frictionless tinkering. It contains all the fundamental Peguino parts for a moving or (inter-) acting project. You can display written informations, make physical movements with the Microservo Brick or switch lights on, all controlled from the powerful heart of the system: the Peguino Uno Brick.       This Set contains 25 Peguino Bricks. It allows to build medium complex projects. The Peguino Core Set contains everything you need to build powerful computerized toy brick projects. You can drive and steer autonomous vehicles and they can react on their environment. Build your own robot which has the intelligence of a real robot. You can react on acoustic signals and communicate wireless with the Peguino Infrared LED Bricks. Display Text or let your project make noise with the Peguino Buzzer Brick. Everything is controlled by the powerful brain of the system: the Peguino Uno Brick.       With the Peguino senior set you have the tools for scientific grade projects. Your project can even respond to temperature or air humidity. Measure and control your projects with this Set and show the results on a text display or interact with animated graphical smilies on the Peguino OLED Display Brick. The possibilities are nearly endless. ItÃÂÃÂ´s core computer is the Peguino Uno Brick.       Hold your breath: This Peguino Power set is the key to construct the most powerful toy brick projects. It contains two computers: The Peguino Uno Brick and his smaller brother, the Peguino Nano Brick. You can let both communicate with each other to control two (or even more) projects simultaneously. This Set contains the full range of Peguino Bricks. It contains the unique Peguino Body Sensor Brick to detect people (by emitting body temperature) in close proximity. It challenges the scientist in you.       This powerful Set is comparable with the Peguino Power Set. Instead of two Peguino main units it contains one Raspberry Pi compatible computer. You can run the Linux operating system and communicate to the internet via WIFI. It is your secret weapon to build unexpected masterpieces. It empowers you to build breathtaking toy brick projects.       This Set is the result of working with over 4000 students in over 100 schools until now. Here we have all the knowledge and experience collected to learn young students how to invent. We call it the RockboticÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ concept. It has special wiring and reduced mechanical complexity to give students and teachers the most frictionless experience while inventing.       This Kit enables you to build the unique Peguino Thermometer. It contains 7 different Peguino Bricks and displays the temperature via a pointing arrow on a scale. It allows individual variations to build e.g. it lets you adjust the temperature range to your environment. The Peguino Nano Brick is already pre programmed. You need no programming skills to build.            This Kit allows you to build a unique Plot Clock which draws the time with a pen. It contains 9 Peguino Bricks and it is a fascinating base for a pen drawing builder project. The Time Module fits into the Peguino Breadboard Brick and is a unique part of this Kit. The Peguino Uno Brick is already pre programmed. You need no programming skills to build.            With the Peguino RC Model Kit you can build your own brick based RC Model. It contains a FLY SKY FS-R6B 2.4 Ghz 6 Channel Receiver which works with all kind of Flysky compatible RC Transmitters (eg. Flysky FS-i6 2.4 Ghz 6ch Transmitter). Get control over your projects wireless.            The Peguino Vision started with a very straight forward approach: Merging simple tools together to empower people to overcome obstacles while inventing. The Peguino belief is that by lowering barriers more and more people can develop their dream projects and follow their own ideas and inspirations. OnesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098> age or manual skills may not restrict anymore.                 The Peguino concept allows the compatibility to industry standard bricks like LEGOÃÂÃÂ® and merges them to allow the pursuit of endless joy: ArduinoÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, RaspberryÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ or Fly Sky RC-Modelling. It allows your projects to expand endlessly with your own toy brick collection.        Peguino is is a independent company. The following copyrights or trademarks are owned by: ARDUINOÃÂÃÂ® is a trademark of Arduino AG, LEGOÃÂÃÂ® is a trademarks of the LEGO Group , Raspberry Pi is a trademark of the Raspberry Pi Foundation, Flysky by ShenZhen Flysky Technology Co.,Ltd. and Peguino is a trademark of Peguino Ltd.                           Risks and challenges  Every great project has its challenges. The Peguino founder Urs Markus Ernst Streidl has a demonstrated track record for successfully founding companys over 25 years. He has a degree in computer sciences and economics and has (co-)founded 8 tech companys. He is the winner of the German nation-wide Start-Up competition in 2006. He lives in Belfast, Northern Ireland where he cofounded one of his last ventures, BrainWaveBank LTD (one of the hottest Startups in Ireland). This venture has secured in excess of $1.5M in seed capital and R&D funding to date. Peguino is the first project which integrates the knowledge of his own children (ages 7 and 10). They are the pros and enthusiasts at Peguino.  There are some real challenges:  One is the production of highly precise parts of plastic which have to fit neatly into the industrial standard brick world. Plus house all the additional hardware parts from the ArduinoÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ world. These parts are made usually from many different suppliers and they vary in size, shape and in the wide range of different electronic components ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> often fail to fit precisely in the size as they are specified in the data sheets. As a result, some hidden challenges may appear and it could take some days to override them. The manufacturing pathway from prototypes to final parts is often long and complex. All prototypes are in a usable stage and carefully crafted. They are mainly made on high precision industry grade 3D printers ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> which guarantee the best results. The straight pathway from prototype to the final product is possible in nearly one production step. Depending on the success of the campaign and the amount of backers and orders to deliver, this production process could run into a bottleneck, if orders exceed initial expectations.  For delivery the shipment we trust and rely again on Amazon ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> as our professional fulfillment provider to guarantee a smooth and frictionless delivery straight to your door.

With 6 hours to go, we are almost at the 22K Gold Plated Stretch Goal!  Update 4th of April:ÃÂÃÂ    Just got off the phone with the manufacturer and things are looking good. They are working on the coin dies as we speak and we can expect the first ever physical coin at the end of the next week! :)   Once the test coin looks good, then we can place our order and start production! :)  DeepOnion members can now back this project, using Onions (DeepOnion cryptocurrency) via a simple website I made. These pledges will be added   on top   of the Kickstarter goal at the end of the Kickstarter campaign.  DeepOnion Physical Coins  Welcome everyone to my first Kickstarter campaign! Back in October 2017, I came across a rather unique and awesome cryptocurrency project called; DeepOnion. This 8 month old, but very fast growing cryptocurrency project, isÃÂÃÂ an anonymous cryptocurrency that is natively integrated with the TOR network. Thousands of new members are joining their official forums every month!  You will find more information via their official website:ÃÂÃÂ  https://deeponion.org   A couple weeks ago I shared my idea with the community for the physical DeepOnion Coins, to see whether there were more enthusiasts just like me that thought it would be a good idea as well! The feedback was amazing and in the following weeks, the community made designs and voted for the best one.ÃÂÃÂ   Coin Details  In order to make every coin 100% unique and a true collectors item, all coins will be numbered (laser engraved), the date and "Batch 1 #" will be minted on the coin and there will be a cap of 2500 coins to be minted. The one hundred 22K Gold plated stretch goal coins will have the numbers 1-100.   Size & WeightÃÂÃÂ  Each coin will be 3cm (1.18 Inches) in diameter, and 2mm (.08 Inches) thick. The weight of each coin is roughly 11 Grams (0.39 oz). They have roughly the same size and weight of half a dollar coin.   Material  Heavyweight alloy comprised of 63%ÃÂÃÂ Copper and 37% Zinc with a nickel coating, giving it a gold color, making itÃÂÃÂ scratch resistant, non-tarnishing and very durable.  The limited edition "Golden" stretch goal Coins are made of the same materials, but with 22 karat Gold plating.  Each coin will have ridged edges, and a glossy finish.   Shipping  All orders will be shipped with priority shipping from The Netherlands, using extra protective bubble envelopes/mailers. Track and Trace is provided for pledges of 25 coins or more. Depending on where you live, shipping roughly takesÃÂÃÂ between 2-14-working days, and does not include any delays with customs.  Stretch Goals     Free One Hundred 22K Gold Plated Coins     ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 7,500 - UNLOCKED!! ÃÂÃÂ - All coins will be delivered in  plastic coin capsules ÃÂÃÂ preventing coins from becoming damaged by protecting it from outside contaminants while allowing the coin to be viewed through transparent plastic.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 10,000 - UNLOCKED!! ÃÂÃÂ -ÃÂÃÂ The first 100 backers of this campaign (that pledge for at least 10 coins) receive  1 FREE  Limited Edition 2018 " 22 Karat Gold plated " Coin. These coins will have the numbers 1-100, and they will never be minted again, making them highly collectible!   ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 15,000 - Locked  - All 5 & 10 Coin Backers receive  1 FREE additional  coin to their order. All 25 Coins and more Backers receive  2 FREE additional ÃÂÃÂ coins to their order.   ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 25,000 - Locked  - Free Mystery Gift Included with every pledge!  ÃÂÃÂ  Timeline       This is a rough estimation on how long everything will take. I will make sure that the coin die will be made as soon as we hit the main funding goal, in order to start production as soon as possible. It is more likely production will take roughly 3 weeks when the manufacturers planning allows this. I will do my best to speed up the process.  *All orders will be send with priority shipping from The Netherlands. Depending on where you live, it takes roughly between two and fourteen working days to get delivered to you. This can take longer when hold by customs.ÃÂÃÂ   Share This Project  I could use any help I can get in spreading the word about this campaign, plus chances get higher that we will meet a stretch goal and additional rewards get unlocked, so please click on the share button on the top of this page to tell your friends all about these awesome coins or share this link:ÃÂÃÂ https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/327018978/mint-deeponion-physical-coins   Disclaimer   The final design and production of the coin may be different to the illustration photo presented on this page. Based on manufacturing capabilities, the fine details such as the anonymous mask may be larger/different. This DeepOnion coin is a novelty item which is not made out of gold. Pledges of 10 coins or less will be send with priority, but without track and trace. I am not responsible for lost or delayed shipments.  This DeepOnion Coin is a novelty item and does not have any monetary value. There is no QR code, wallet address and/or chip on the coin.      Risks and challenges  This is my first Kickstarter Campaign, so over the past few weeks I have been working hard to think of everything to make sure that this project will succeed and that the risks or challenges are brought to a minimum.   I am working directly with the manufacturer that will produce the coin. I visited them earlier to discuss the possibilities in regards to the design, production time and materials being used.  That being said, the biggest risk we face is not getting funded, so don't let that happen! After you make your pledge to get some of these awesome coins, help spread the word! Share the link to this campaign with friends and on your social media accounts.
