Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ        Did you ever hear of something long before it exploded into everyday lifeÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ but didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t do anything about it?ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Maybe it was 20 years ago, when you saw the internet revolution coming.ÃÂÃÂ Maybe you kicked yourself for not paying attention to Google or Amazon.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Or maybe it was more recently, when disruptive technologies like mobile apps or streaming video transformed our lives forever? ÃÂÃÂ   Most people will soon be adding another thing to this ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>what ifÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ list ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  one that could be just as transformative as any of those. ÃÂÃÂ    That thing? Blockchain. ÃÂÃÂ   Right now, the closest many get to knowing this technology is through Bitcoin. But in industries, economies and technologies, the focus is on Blockchain - and how those organizations position, adapt or evolve themselves to take advantage of this revolutionary break-through.  The majority of people donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t know about Blockchain yet. But soon, everything will change...       You may not realize it yet, but weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re at the beginning of another frontier era. ÃÂÃÂ   Just like the Internet did at the start of this century, Blockchain is creating a new ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Wild WestÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s an untamed land, where opportunity and success wait for those brave enough to discover it. ÃÂÃÂ   Right now, pioneers are moving to stake their claim in this barely discovered territory.ÃÂÃÂ And as they push towards that rich country, their carts (and minds) are filled with the one thing needed to make the journey a success.    Education. ÃÂÃÂ    With education, these Blockchain pioneers will shape society and leave their mark. For those who learn, harness and use this new technology, the opportunities are endless: ÃÂÃÂ    Joining companies like IBM or Microsoft, desperately looking for the skills you possess to drive the next generation of innovative ideas  Utilizing the technology for yourself as a digital entrepreneur, creating disruptors that cut out middlemen and topple outdated business models  Learning the secrets of cryptocurrencies and Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs) to help frame your investment decisions  Taking action to understand a technology thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s driving the world deep into the 21st century   As one of the rare pioneers who truly understands and can use Blockchain, you hold the map to all of these opportunities - and more.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        So how do you become a Blockchain pioneer?  Most importantly, you have to be interested, if not fascinated, with Blockchain. Technologies come and go, but only a few really revolutionize the world. ÃÂÃÂ   If youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re reading this, you already possess this crucial trait. ÃÂÃÂ   But you also need practical skills. And theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not as simple to gain as reading up on Bitcoin or watching a few YouTube videos. To make your way into the world of Blockchain, you need to build the ENTIRE skillset. ÃÂÃÂ         ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s what our course will help you achieve. ÃÂÃÂ    WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re passionate about shining a light onto leading technologies. Blockchain is a perfect example. ÃÂÃÂ   But weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve chosen it as our next ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>deep diveÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ for another big reason: YOU. The demand to learn this technology has been overwhelming! Thousands of tech-savvy people already realize the mind-blowing potential of Blockchain.  TheyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re determined to be amongst the pioneers of this exciting, uncharted field. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s what weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re planning to help them become.  We've already helped thousands gain skills in other cutting-edge technology: our Deep Learning A-Z and Artificial Intelligence A-Z courses both ranked in the top 10 on Kickstarter.  To date, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve launched three mega-successful campaigns with over 4,000 backers, all hungry for the knowledge and opportunity these skills supplied them.  Now weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re ready to take on the awesome challenge of uncovering the secrets to mastering Blockchain.       ÃÂÃÂ         A Blockchain ÃÂÃÂ is a continuously growing list of records, called blocks, which are linked and secured using cryptography. Each block typically contains a cryptographic hash of the previous block, a timestamp and transaction data.ÃÂÃÂ    Bitcoin  is the most famous application of Blockchain, it is the first decentralized digital currency and aÃÂÃÂ peer-to-peer payment system, meaning that its transactions take place between users directly, without an intermediary.  Those definitions are a great start. But that's all they are - a start. It took us over 2 months of continuous research on Blockchain technology to truly understand how it works. And only after that we were ready to create.  And now we want to put all our knowledge together, optimize it into easy-to-digest tutorials and share it with you. We want to help you avoid all the pitfalls and obstacles that we encountered in our paths.  Blockchain is going to disrupt the World. We're all going to be part of it and our mission is to guide you along the best path to success with this technology.       This course will have two pillars: intuition and practice.ÃÂÃÂ   With the intuition tutorials (which we expect to comprise hours of content) you will be able to develop a holistic understanding Blockchain technology regardless of your starting level. If you're an tech veteran, beginner or have never heard of blockchain before (which is unlikely) - you  will  be successful with this course.  And for those of you who want to dive into the World of coding, there's the second pillar: Practice. Everyone loves practice. And that's exactly why in this course we will build not one, not two - but  three  applications: a  Blockchain , a  Cryptocurrency , and a  Smart Contract .ÃÂÃÂ   We will create everything absolutely from scratch, step-by-step which will give you the opportunity of getting into the right mindset of creation.ÃÂÃÂ   We will build our Blockchain and Cryptocurrency in  Python  and the Smart Contract on  Ethereum  using  Solidity . We will show you how to get the right logic of coding and how to get into the right mindset.ÃÂÃÂ   And on top of all of that, we're even going to launch our own simulated  Initial Coin Offering (ICO).        And if you want to tackle the 2nd Pillar of this Course (Practice), you will also learn and get to use many of the most powerful tools which are part of the Blockchain World:   JSON -ÃÂÃÂ  stands for JavaScript Object Notation and itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a data format;ÃÂÃÂ    Ganache - ÃÂÃÂ allows to fire up a personal Ethereum blockchain which you can use to run tests, execute commands, and inspect state while controlling how the chain operates;   Postman - ÃÂÃÂ the most complete toolchain for API development;   MyEtherWallet -  an open source tool for generating Ethererum Wallets & sending transactions;   Remix -  the most popular and user-friendly Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for Solidity;   Anaconda -  an open source distribution of the Python and R programming languages for large-scale data processing, predictive analytics, and scientific computing, that aims to simplify package management and deployment;   Flask -ÃÂÃÂ  a micro web development framework for Python;   Spyder -  a powerful Python IDE with advanced editing and features;  Once you know how to use these tools, you can construct Blockchains and the supporting infrastructure for anything. ÃÂÃÂ   Like what, you ask? ÃÂÃÂ   Well, try ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ ÃÂÃÂ    A trusted mechanism that tracks and protects hard valuables like diamonds  A way for neighbors to sell excess solar energy to each other - with no intermediary taking a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>cutÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  The means to manage swarms of decentralized, autonomous robotic workers in the near-future  Your passport, birth certificate, ID ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> any document thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s part of your identity ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> kept safely and securely in the digital world  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>LinkedIn on the BlockchainÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> a way to store  verified  career and academic achievements that both professionals and employers can trustÃÂÃÂ     When you hold the power, your choices are limitless.        When we say youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a comprehensive course that provides everything you need to build a blockchain, we mean it.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Can you get all of these topics on YouTube or elsewhere online? Sure you can... But what you won't get is the weeks and months of work we're putting into this course to link these topics up into a  holistic understanding  of Blockchain.ÃÂÃÂ   The structure of Blockchain A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ will include three modules. And each module will be so detailed and thorough, that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll practically be getting three COURSES which extend your knowledge and skills far beyond just building a Blockchain.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   To create your Blockchain, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be leveraging the power of Python and its rich libraries. But donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not familiar with it. Python is an easy, expressive language that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll pick up quickly, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be there to guide you every step of the way.        Module 1: Create a Blockchain - We will start at the very beginning .ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Intuition:   What is a Blockchain?  Understanding SHA256 Hash  Immutable Ledger  Distributed P2P NetworkÃÂÃÂ   How Mining Works: The Nonce  How Mining Works: The Cryptographic Puzzle  Byzantine Fault ToleranceÃÂÃÂ   Consensus Protocol: Defense Against Attackers  Consensus Protocol: Proof-of-Work (PoW)  Blockchain Demo   Practice:ÃÂÃÂ    Initializing the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>genesis blockÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  Understanding the difference between CREATING a block and MINING a block  The essential keys that each block needs, like the index and proof  How to get the last block of the current chain youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re dealing with  Proof of work: creating problems that are challenging to solve but easy to verify for your software  The mechanism that checks your entire Blockchain stays validÃÂÃÂ   Creating a web application to allow us to interact with our Blockchain  Where the rubber hits the road: mining a new block ourselves and adding it to the chain  Using JSON to return informative messages and data about your chain         Module 2: Create a Cryptocurrency - The next step of our Journey.   Intuition:   What is Bitcoin?ÃÂÃÂ   Bitcoin's Monetary PolicyÃÂÃÂ   Understanding Mining DifficultyÃÂÃÂ   Virtual tour of a Bitcoin MineÃÂÃÂ   Mining PoolsÃÂÃÂ   Nonce Range  How Miners Pick TransactionsÃÂÃÂ   CPUs vs GPUs vs ASICsÃÂÃÂ   Exploring Real-World Stats on Blockchain.info  How do Mempools work?ÃÂÃÂ   Orphaned BlocksÃÂÃÂ   The 51% Attack  Transactions & UTXOs  Where do transaction fees come from?  How Wallets Work  Signatures: Private & Public Keys  Signatures & Keys Demo  What is Segregated Witness? (SegWit)  Public Key vs Bitcoin Address  Hierarchically Deterministic (HD) Wallets   Practice:   Setting up the specific libraries to build your cryptocurrency  Learning the key differences between a general Blockchain and a cryptocurrency  Transforming your Blockchain into a cryptocurrency that works just like Bitcoin  Tackling transactions: be able to send and receive Hadcoin transactions in just a few minutes  Putting the building blocks into place for decentralizing your Blockchain with nodes  Why you need ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>consensusÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, and how to make sure nodes are up-to-date at any time (and fix them if they arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t)  Handling the network side of cryptocurrency transactions  Mining your new cryptocurrency using the two ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>pillarsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve just developed  Making your transactions super-secure when theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re mined  Developing every request your blockchain needs to handle a decentralized infrastructureÃÂÃÂ          Module 3: Create a Smart Contract - Let's cross the finish line.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Intuition:   What is Ethereum?ÃÂÃÂ   What is a Smart Contract?  Decentralized Applications (Dapps)  Ethereum Virtual Machine & Gas  Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs)ÃÂÃÂ   The DAO Attack  Soft and Hard Forks (Part 1)  Soft and Hard Forks (Part 2)  Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs)ÃÂÃÂ   ICO Case Study  Limitations of blockchainsÃÂÃÂ   ShardingÃÂÃÂ   Proof-of-stake (PoS) vs Proof-of-work (PoW)  Web 3.0 & Blockchain 3.0   Practice:   Adding the extra tools youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll need to launch your ICO  How to set the conversion value of your new cryptocurrency into a real dollar rate  Creating the mapping to keep track of an investorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s equity in Hadcoins and dollars  Making sure an investor can only buy Hadcoins if there are any available  Checking the balance of an ICO investor in both Hadcoins and dollars  Building the buy functionality: allowing your investors to get in on the ICO  Selling up: allowing investors to sell the coins and get their dollars back  Doing the deal: launching your Hadcoin ICO (and testing every part of the functionality)        As a special bonus for all our Kickstarter backers, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll receive an additional module to elevate your understanding of Blockchain to new heights. ÃÂÃÂ    Module 4: Create ANOTHER Blockchain application ÃÂÃÂ    SPECIAL BONUS for Kickstarter backers ONLY. Not available anywhere else.       YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve built a Blockchain and a Cryptocurrency, but youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll now develop another Blockchain for an entirely new purpose. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s at least 20% extra course material!        With this course, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have everything you need to venture into the ultra-exciting world of Blockchain. But we want to give you even more. These bonuses will open your mind to whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s possible with the power of new technology:  1. From novice to blockchain expert:ÃÂÃÂ  The #1 criteria for success in anything is to be fascinated. If you combine your interest in Blockchain with this training, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got everything you need to become an expert in the field - even if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re unsure where to begin.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    2. Through this intuition you will feel where and how to apply Blockchain in the real world.   4. Real-world applications:ÃÂÃÂ  The projects youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll develop provide the perfect starting point to rapidly gain expertise. Everything you build and practice will be an exciting journey with real-world impact. When finished, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be 100% ready to apply your skills to anything Blockchain-related.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    5. Our commitment to you:ÃÂÃÂ  When you back our Kickstarter, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re making a commitment. And we want to make a commitment in return. If you need help getting through the course, have a question or are just plain stuck, our dedicated team of teaching assistants will be in touch within 24 hours to assist with any problem youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re facing.       ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>What if I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have any need for Blockchain right now?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s quite possible you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need Blockchain for what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re working on right now. While itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s exploding, the technology hasnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t become a mainstream part of lifeÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ yet. But thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s exactly why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re offering this course. Blockchain may not be for today, but for a tomorrow where this technology is the backbone of international commerce, healthcare, energy, data exchange and more. ÃÂÃÂ    ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s great you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need complex math or programming, but isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t this just too simple? ÃÂÃÂ    Blockchain, at its lowest level, is just code. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s what weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re guiding you on how to develop (along with the mindset behind that). Math and sophisticated encryption are handled by Python libraries, which allows you to purely focus on the critical ideas behind Blockchain itself. ÃÂÃÂ    Wait. Hold on. Are we going to be creating a real, proper Blockchain?  ÃÂÃÂ   Yes, thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s exactly what weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing. In this course you  will ÃÂÃÂ create a Blockchain exactly like the ones used in the real world. ÃÂÃÂ    IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve seen other courses charge for a certificate, is this the same? ÃÂÃÂ    Others might do this, but we believe if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve learned the skills, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve earned the right to a certificate that says so. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why you pay nothing more for your certificate of completion when you finish. Use it to prove yourself to potential employers, build on your business credentials or simply show it off to friends. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be on hand to support you along your entire journey!       See what other students just like you are saying about our recent best-selling courses:       ÃÂÃÂ        Upon completion of this course youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a verifiable electronic certificate which you can use to boost business credentials, increase the chances of landing that dream job in tech or simply show off to your connections on Linkedin (the actual design will differ):       ÃÂÃÂ        Blockchain wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be a revolutionary technology forever. Pioneers, already educated in utilizing it, are making territorial claims in this opportunity-rich technology at this very moment. ÃÂÃÂ   We canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t wait to make this course a reality, and help you harness the power of blockchain. Are you ready to join those exclusive ranks and leverage this technology for your own goals?  To Blockchain!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   -Kirill and Hadelin       ÃÂÃÂ      Get Your Project Funded Today!    ÃÂÃÂ       Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!    ÃÂÃÂ         Risks and challenges  There are numerous risks associated with creating an online course. Some of the major ones include: sourcing the right equipment, learning to produce clear and engaging tutorials, finding what exactly interests our students, having the appropriate level of subject matter expertise.  Having built up a substantial level of expertise in the space of online education we are confident that we are well-equipped to face any challenges: we have tried and tested equipment including backup hardware and software; between the two of us we have already produced over 30 courses with hundreds of hours of content and over a thousand tutorials enabling us to develop our unique engaging teaching styles; we constantly interact with our existing 400,000+ students including Q&A, webinars and surveys - this allows us to know exactly what common painpoints we need to address in the course content; and finally, we do have extensive backgrounds in Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence but we are constantly doing research and deepening our own knowledge to make sure we can deliver the best of the best to our students in Blockchain A-Z.

Project_description: Meet MORROR, the smart lighted mirror that functions as your personal beauty tutor. MORROR provides appropriate lighting and is pre-installed with makeup and skincare tutorials that will level up your daily beauty routine.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        MORROR is a makeup mirror redefined. Press the button to wake up the display and watch the tutorials. Press again to turn it off so it wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be disturbing when you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need it.  Traditional mirrors with built-in screens still show the black shade of the screen even when itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s off. MORROR is not one of them. The smart display in MORROR only appears when you wake it up. MORROR is the real magic mirror on your vanity.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Looking back and forth from your vanity mirror to your smartphone/tablet for makeup tutorial? No anymore! With MORROR, you can easily follow the step-by-step makeup instructions right from your mirror.  Having a facial massage every day is an easy thing to do with MORROR. Simply follow the massage tutorials to get rid of your dark circles, lift your face, treat your forehead wrinkles and etc.  New tutorials will be released regularly.       ÃÂÃÂ        Select the days you want to do the massage and MORROR will remind you when it's time for it.       ÃÂÃÂ        Wondering why you always donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get the perfect makeup? You might want to check your makeup lighting. Light is very important for makeup application. Good makeup light illuminates your face just right to help you make the right choice of the color for your foundation, eyeshadow, blush, lipstick and so on.  While natural sunlight is the best light to apply makeup, we are not able to make the best use of it because of bad weathers, short days, tall buildings, and etc.  To solve this problem, we created the Pro-lux light system to simulate natural sunlight.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   Pro-lux light system closely simulates natural sunlightÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s full-color spectrum. It is made of 38 LED lights and a smart chip. With a color rendering index (CRI) of 98 and brightness of 1100 lux, MORROR shows every single detail of your face clearly.  ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        MORROR shows you the most useful information on the home screen: weather, time and humidity. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Plus, you will also get beauty tips from MORROR.  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ MORROR is equipped with a timer up to 60 minutes. Set up a timer before you start doing your makeup so you wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be late for work/school.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s super easy to use MORROR:   Double tap the control panel to turn on the light.ÃÂÃÂ   Slide to adjust the brightness.        MORROR memorizes your brightness preference. It automatically resets to the previous brightness setting even if you turn the light off.       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Get a MORRPR with the attachable 5X magnification mirror when you select certain reward levels. (See details on right).       ÃÂÃÂ        MORROR is rechargeable so you can take it from bathroom to bedroom without cords!       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   MORROR is equipped with blast-resistant glass applying silk-screen printing technology. It prevents you from getting hurt when it's knocked to the floor.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        The MORROR team is made up of a group of young people from all corners of the globe who are full of vitality, imagination and creativity from a common set of values. Having craftsmanÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s spirit, MORROR pays great attention to the details of the product experience while paying attention to the software practicability and user experience. Most of The MORROR team are designers and engineers serving innovative Xiaomi technology.  ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  At the moment, we are doing a pilot production on MORROR.  We plan to place the manufacturing order by the end of March 2018. We'll iterate, review samples and do quality control in April 2018. We estimate we'll begin shipping in May, accounting both for manufacturing and any necessary revisions.  We don't anticipate any issues with this timeline. However, if anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during and after the campaign.

Project_description: WELCOME!  Purpose and goals of the Ottawa Sparks Street Streetcar Project:  (Also check our Facebook Page!)  To plan, build and operate a heritage style streetcar system in Downtown Ottawa.  Modern Replica Streetcars that have the appearance of heritage streetcars would be used for the system. These streetcars would have modern components and be handicapped accessible via wheelchair lifts.  The system would be a single track system with passing tracks in several sections.   PhaseÃÂÃÂ One  would run from Sparks and Elgin to the area of the War Museum.   PhaseÃÂÃÂ Two  would cross the Ottawa River and run through Gatineau and then cross back into Ottawa to connect back to Sparks Street to form a cross-river loop system.  The initial system would comprise two operating streetcars with one spare streetcar. They would be stored in a garage large enough for several additional streetcars and there would be several maintenance bays included in the design.  Our website is atÃÂÃÂ  www.ottawastreetcar.com   Here is a YouTube video showing a real time video of one of our proposed routes:ÃÂÃÂ  https://youtu.be/zrgGASaitEM       Risks and challenges  Risks are not being able to use Prince of Wales Railway Bridge although we could use a road bridge instead. The advantage of using the railway bridge is that it is vacant and there are still tracks in place.

Project_description: Hey guys! After sucessfully launching Raspiboy on Kickstarter last year, 8BCraft is proud to present you            ÃÂÃÂ RetroGaming is constantly gaining in popularity, especially with the developments of single boards computer (raspberry pi, orange pi...) that enabled us to make homemad retrogaming consoles. However those required lot of knowhow on electronics and DIY. You may have seen "Gameboyzero" projects on internet and understand how difficult assembling one can be!  First with Raspiboy I wanted to simplify things for you guys by making an easy kit with no soldering. But now I want to go even further by making RetroStone whichÃÂÃÂ come  fully assembled !       HDMI output : you can connect RetroStone to your big TV !ÃÂÃÂ        4 USB connectorsÃÂÃÂ        Play up to 5 players !ÃÂÃÂ        Take RetroStone everywhere with it's compact form factor! No more boring flights for you!       Audio control       ÃÂÃÂ Gamepad controls       Back button configuration has been voted to change (lot of people just complained about it!) I posted new design on "Update 1" of the Kickstarter to ask backers to vote and lot of people vote for new design. New design is this one :ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ Prototype has been received and confirmed!       Also back buttons color will be voted by the backers after campaign!ÃÂÃÂ                  Inside you have a RetroStone Pi, this SBC (single board computer) runs a  H3 processor  which is  4 cores 1.2GHz .ÃÂÃÂ                  Basic RetroStone will come with 8GB SD card, which can already hold hundred of games.   Upgrade from 8GB to 16GB memory for FREE  by sharing RetroStone kickstarter on facebook!  Copy the URL of your facebook post and save it for later.At the end of the Kickstarter I will send you a survey for shipping details, there you will be able to put your URL to get the free memory card upgrade!             But wait! You are saying that we can play any game of our childhood, what does it mean exactly? Does the kit comes with games integrated?ÃÂÃÂ    Software  : Retrostone Pi is compatible with Retrorangepi (Retropie distribution for H3 boards). Retropie is anÃÂÃÂ awesome emulation station software (super easy installation, it will be explained step-by-step in the tutorial!).ÃÂÃÂ You can check them on Youtube for demo !Those softwares come with a wide range of systems supported : Gameboy, Gameboy Color, Gameboy Advance, Super Nintendo, Megadrive/Genesis, Atari, MaMe and so on. You can have a look  here  to all the supported systems.  RetroStone Pi is also compatible with most other H3 SBC OS (armbian, android...).  Please note that the software will not be pre-installed because these are open-source softwares and their license forbide it.   Games  : To install a game you need it's ROM file. A ROM file is a computer file containing all the game's data. You can legally download ROM of unlicensed games on the internet. For licensed games legality of downloading ROM depend on your country. In some you need to have original copy of the game. In some others it may not be legal at all to download ROMs from internet.  Then to install the ROM you can transfer it with USB stick to RetroStone.   Develop your own game, share them and discover other RetroStone user's games !ÃÂÃÂ    I think there's a lot of potential to develop and share your games! A topic will be opened on the forum about game idea, development and sharing.            Joining me on kickstarter is not only about getting a nice game console. It's also about the journey of the project! As you can check on my first Kickstarter campaign RaspiboyÃÂÃÂ I made a point to give good updates (check for yourself  HERE ). With interesting facts on production.ÃÂÃÂ   Here are exemples of what people thought of them!            The main advantages of RetroStone compared with Raspiboy are :ÃÂÃÂ   - Easy memory card access  - Assembled and fully tested  - Compact form factor  - More powerful CPU  - Ethernet, more USB connectors and full size HDMI       ÃÂÃÂ Size comparaison of RetroStone and Raspiboy            By connecting a screen, keyboard and mouse, your console becomes the perfect living room computer. Write a novel, surf YouTube or watch your movies on your big screen while kicking back on your couch.                      ÃÂÃÂ If you really like the project don't hesitate to get the Kickstarter Limited Edition!ÃÂÃÂ   Limited edition will come with  32GB  instead of 8GB (or 16GB if you do the free upgrade)  Limited edition will be  CLEAR BLUE color . I can't have picture of RetroStone with clear case because we need the injection mold for that!!ÃÂÃÂ   So to illustrate here's a picture of the Raspiboy casing with such a clear case.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ But it will be blue rather than purple. Bit like this :ÃÂÃÂ        This limited edition will be available only on Kickstarter, so don't miss it ;)       Makers I have not forgotten you! RetroStone may come assembled but we left room for customization!  RetroStone has 26 GPIO available, with built-in pull up resistors            4 of those GPIO have optional buttons built-in the RetroStone Pi       And casing has layout for those optional buttons! So you just have to drill the buttons holes to add those buttons.            ÃÂÃÂ EnergySquare is an innovative wireless charger. RetroStone embedded their charging system! (You can still charge with micro-USB of course!)       ÃÂÃÂ With the two contact pins it charges by contact directly, so it's faster than induction charging.                 That's something I often hear. Lot of kickstarter project are scams and never deliver their promised product. But that is because lot of them are selling ideas that are not ready to industrialize. Sometime you can even see their pictures are just 3D modeling, meaning they don't even have prototypes. Or they can have prototypes that are not ready for industrialized production.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ As my first Kickstarter campaign can attest I am as transparant as I can be, my prototypes are really ready for production. And I did delivered all my backers!Ok for this first project I had little bit of delays. Now with experience of the first Kickstarter I have a better estimate of deadlines and I am confident to be on timing!       It can be :  ÃÂÃÂ    For yourself to have some good fun with friends. ÃÂÃÂ   To make a gift to a special someone.ÃÂÃÂ   To discover the world of hackerspaces, fablabs and SBC (single board computers). Hand assembled by myself! You will also receive a regular RetroStone when they are ready! Only 5 available.   7350ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬  : Special retailer pack : 70 RetroStones  !   69ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ : Get the RetroStone Pi (the electronic board alone).       Help us unlock the stretched goals by sharing the project!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   100 000ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ - Customization kit             Next strech goal : 150 000ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬  - We'll add a GPIO button (similar to LCD controls) on the side, you'll be able to run any python script when pressed, such as a softshutdown script. Or you can use it as additional gamepad control!       In order to accelerate development, as soon as we reach our goal we'll start the mold manufacture.  End of March 2018 : End of crowdfundingÃÂÃÂ     April-May 2018 : Production  June 2018 : Product certifications (CE and FCC certifications)   End of June 2018 : Shipping to you guys!    Additional video to see the LCD closerÃÂÃÂ    Lot of people expressed concerns about LCD quality. So here's a little review on LCD.  H3 has 2 video outputs : HDMI and CVBS (= composite/AV) In order to be able to use RetroStone on a TV we need the HDMI out unused, so I use the AV signal for the 3.5" LCD.  Some people asked if picture looked better than on Raspiboy. Answer is yes, because on Raspiboy we used overscan to resize the resolution to fit the LCD size, and this resizing makes it flickers quite a bit in emulationstation (also the AV signal goes through pogo pins in Raspiboy, which does not help).  I had trouble making video showing the LCD from close because everytime I tried to shoot a video I ended up with lot of artifacts. Strange lines/patterns appearing. (try to film your computer screen with your smartphone and you'll see it's not easy !). Also when LCD picture goes from clear to dark the camera has trouble adapting luminosity. Anyhow I made a shot that is not so bad.  Please note that there are still some artifacts on the videoÃÂÃÂ such as camera autofocusing. In order to make this kit so affordable we must reach our fundraising goal because:    1- The casing require injection molding. And injection molds are really expensive.    2- PCB : we have to order more than 1000 units if we want to have workable prices. Indeed most of the electronic components of the PCB have minimum order quantities of 1000-5000 pieces!    Therefor we must reach about 1000 orders to make this price possible!  Development is done, everything is ready: 3Dmodels are done, PCB design is done, and manufacturers are ready to get started. The only thing that is missing is a 1000 pieces order! All the project needs now is you guys!  Back us now and help us reach our fundraising goal so that it will become reality !  Remarks :   RetroStone does not come with any software or games pre-installed. You can flash the memory card with the OS of your choice.  RetroStones will ship from ShenZhen in China, to avoid any delivery problems we will declare full value of the products. Please note that there might be taxes applied by your country customs.   Please provide phone number for delivery, failure to do so might prevent delivery to be successful. ÃÂÃÂ   No matter who you areÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> parent or grandparent, world traveler, student, whoeverÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>Yours.co is perfect for todayÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s busy lifestyles.ÃÂÃÂ   DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t forget, copies of your DVD will make an excellent gift for friends and family. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re well on our way, but we need your help to make the Yours.co service available to millions of people like you. With your pledge weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be able to complete development of our streaming apps and refine the video editing and fulfillment process. As part of the Yours.co community, backers will be the first users who are able to transform their videos into something magical. Creator_description: We are three students that founded our own self-funded NGO to fix the employment gap in various refugee camps globally. We hope to create an educational network facilitated through technology to improve educational possibilities for refugees worldwide, consequently improving their employment possibilities.
Project_description: Over the summer, we, three university students, funded our own NGO, Source - Network for Humanitarian Action, and completed our first project.  This project consisted of building a computer centre within one of the largest refugee camps in the world, Kakuma Refugee Camp in Kenya. This centre now runs a refugee advanced computer skills nanodegree program while enabled 60 Kiron University students to continue their online studies each semester and helping KYF freelancing group to find freelancing jobs for refugees.  These courses help refugees find employment opportunities and further their life goals. This centre was built entirely on renewable energy, and self funded through university charitable contributions. Furthermore, all courses are taught by refugees.  We collaborated with the New Media Africa Youth Group, KYF freelancers, Kiron University. and the UNHCR (the UN refugee agency) to complete this project.  More info can be found at: https://www.source-network.org/ about the projects specifics.  WHAT WE ARE STILL MISSING: We are now looking for additional funds to expand Solar CenterÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s solar system for power sustainability as suggested by a Consulted Power engineer and local Technician. Buy learning facilities such as Headphones, Projector, stationaries and furniture. Moreover, we need to cover the increased costs of running the centre on a daily basis due to the current economic crisis in the camp, for example, paying a teacher for future semesters.      Risks and challenges  There is currently an economic crisis in the camp which has led to increase daily running costs for the centre. Students have been missing payments to keep our centre alive due to many organisations closing their business and therefore leading to many refugees losing their main employment source. Additionally, our solar system needs expanding to accomodate the increased power requirements of the centre as more students start to use it. Teachers have also been hard to keep in the long-term, with little pay incentives, we need funds to pay teachers for future semesters.

Creator_description: We're a team of abacus instructors, game developers and early childhood education experts with a passion for reinventing the ancient abacus in a way that appeals to our generation's digital natives, creating a strong foundation for them to grow upon.
Project_description: THE DIGITAL ABACUS   iBrain has engineered a state of the art Digital Abacus that connects to a tablet via Bluetooth wireless technology. We took the Abacus, an ancient Chinese calculator, and digitized it to appeal to the modern world.       ÃÂÃÂ  iBrain BASICS   Everybody loves tech gadgets, but ours is different. Here is how it works. It's easy to install, and simple to use!        THE BENEFITS   The benefits are just about endless, but here's a few to think about.        iBrain BASICS   The left brain deals with facts and figures and is very logical while the right brain deals with creativity and works with images. Neuroscience has proven that when both sides of the brain are functioning simultaneously it processes and retains information more efficiently. The net result is improved cognitive skills in areas including Memory, Focus and Creativity.        HOW IT WORKS          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             With regular practice, the children are taught to visualize and move the imaginary beads to perform Mental Math at lightning speed. Watch their confidence soar as they challenge their fear of math!           ÃÂÃÂ  Math is Everywhere   Helping your child gain math skills early in development will make vast improvements in your child's overall lifestyle. From cooking to coding, math is everywhere! Give your kid a head start in preparing to take on the future challenges of our technology-driven world.        Personalized for Every Student    iBrain has different curriculum for all ages, meaning your child will continue to feel comfortably challenged as they grow with the app. Take advantage of a platform that is perfectly catered towards their education, giving them what they need to be great regardless of their age.        THOUGHTS FROM THE PARENTS   We let a few lucky kids try out our prototype for a day. Check out what their parents had to say.        QUESTIONS?   Got questions? We've got answers. If you have some other questions, feel free to send us an email to info@ibrainforkids.com       ÃÂÃÂ  TEAM   We're a team of abacus instructors, game developers and early childhood education experts with a passion for reinventing the ancient abacus in a way that appeals to our generation's digital natives, creating a strong foundation for them to grow upon.        TIMELINE   Here's how iBrain came about: from ideas on a Starbucks napkin to future mass production with your support.           Risks and challenges  When our founder first sketched a rough prototype of the digital abacus on a Starbucks napkin (over a year ago), we had no idea that we would be kicking 2018 off with a Kickstarter campaign.  In the last year, our team has developed the first digital abacus and an extensive brain-training app, to boot. Our hardware design has been upgraded and improved upon twice over, and has been tested with hundreds of abacus students. If you've ever tried to engage a group of elementary schoolers for more than five minutes, you'll understand why we are so sure of our product.  The iBrain team is committed to three things: Delivering an unbeatable product Delivering in a timely manner Keeping backers informed every step of the way  Though manufacturing issues are not uncommon, we already have strong ties with our manufacturer and have gone through several hardware upgrades with them.  Our delivery timeline is conservative, and we will keep you up to date along the way. We value your time and resources, and we are so excited to have your support as we endeavor to equip kids across the globe with the tools they need for lifelong success, making their brains ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Brains that count.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ

Blurb: The ScienceBuzz Symposium is the first conference exclusively for MS/HS students. It includes speakers, exhibitions, & scholarships.

Creator_description: ScienceBuzz.com, a nonprofit organization, is an academic-networking platform. Our mission is to publicize and promote young scientists and their work. They can create profiles, publish research, and connect with scientists, industry professionals, and the global community.
Project_description: Check out our nonprofit at  sciencebuzz.com    Visit the Symposium SiteÃÂÃÂ  Here    Our National Speakers Include:   Dr. Martin Chalfie  (tentative)  - 2008 Nobel Prize Laureate in Chemistry Dr. Francis Collins  (tentative) ÃÂÃÂ - Director of the National Institutes of Health & Leader of Human Genome Project Rene Islas  (confirmed) ÃÂÃÂ - President of NAGC & former assistant to US Secretary of Education Binodh DeSilva  (confirmed) ÃÂÃÂ - former President of AAPS & VP at Bristol-Myers Squibb   2018 ScienceBuzz Symposium      ScienceBuzz Booth at the National NAGC Convention in Charlotte, NC    ScienceBuzz FoundationÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s goal is to get more students to become scientists, engineers, doctors, or leaders and enter STEM. With this mission in mind, we are excited to announce our first annual symposium.  The 2018 ScienceBuzz Symposium is the first, completely free conference exclusively for middle and high school students. It will be hosted at Parkland High School in Allentown, Pennsylvania, but will include students from around the state and nearby regions. The event will include national guest speakers, student workshop sessions, student poster presentations, at least five research scholarship awards, organizational and company exhibits, and unique networking opportunities.  We hope to provide young students an opportunity to find their passions in science and tech. It is crucial that we continue to support and grow this movement of motivating and promoting students. With more people joining this movement, our vision can move forward.  The Symposium is an all-day event, with activities and sessions planned from 9 am to 5 pm. ScienceBuzz Symposium can help thousands of students in their future career plans, exposing them to the multitude of potential opportunities that they never wouldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve discovered until after college.  Why do we need funds?  In order to make this event a success, ScienceBuzz needs at least $5,000. As a nonprofit organization, the majority of funding will be coming from you. We will be needing funds to promote this event across the tri-state area and reach out to more students. Furthermore, several speakers are traveling from across the nation, and we need to provide them with transportation.ÃÂÃÂ    Help Us Reach Our Goal   To fund the planned, one-day conference, we will need at least $5,000. With more funds, we can improve and expand our mission:     Stage 1: Initial Goal [$5,000]    Stage 2: Ten Scholarship Awards will be provided [$10,000]  Stage 3: Multiple Day Conference [$15,000]   Rewards  We accept contributions from individuals, corporations, and businesses. Below is an outline of the types of contributions and corresponding rewards:   Pledge $25 or more  -  Receive ScienceBuzz Symposium Postcard   Pledge $50 or more -  Receive above and have access to Quarterly ScienceBuzz Newsletter   Pledge $100 or more -ÃÂÃÂ  Receive above, be listed under "Contributors" on ScienceBuzz.com, and get a free ScienceBuzz sling bag   Pledge $250 or more -ÃÂÃÂ  Receive above and get a free Conference Pin/Sticker   Pledge $500 or more -ÃÂÃÂ  Receive above, be listed as Bronze Sponsor of the 2018 Symposium, and have corporation logo or individual name on ScienceBuzz Home Page   Pledge $750 or more   -ÃÂÃÂ  Receive above, be listed as Silver Sponsor of the 2018 Symposium, and have access to member/attendee email list (of consenting attendees)   Pledge $1,000 or more -ÃÂÃÂ  Receive above, be listed as Gold Sponsor of the 2018 Symposium, have a logo & free advertisement in the next 4 quarterly newsletters, and name one of the scholarship awards at the symposium  Your Support  Your support will allow us to make this event be an extreme success. It will set the foundation for future symposiums, across the world, solely dedicated to any and all middle/high school students. Your support will allow us to reach more students and aspiring scientists. It will rapidly expand this community of motivated students and professionals willing to help. Your support can get more scientists, companies, engineers, and institutions to help and inspire youth in STEM.  We need more budding, imaginative students pursuing STEM-related fields in this world - those who will be the next generation of fighting cancer, treating heart attacks, and preventing fatalities. The first ScienceBuzz Symposium is a step closer toward the right solution.  What is ScienceBuzz Foundation?  ScienceBuzz Foundation, founded and run by high school senior student Roy Ghosh in 2017, revolves around the website ScienceBuzz.com. As a registered nonprofit organization, our mission is to publicize and promote young scientists and their work.     Homepage of ScienceBuzz.com    ScienceBuzz.com is a free academic-networking platform for all middle and high school students interested in science. We connect these students to one another and showcase their original work to scientists, institutions, and industry professionals around the globe. We are uniquely positioned with our partners to provide an outlet for students to build personal, academic profiles, publish their research, discuss new ideas and technologies, interact with peers, and get acknowledged.  Check us out at:  www.sciencebuzz.com       Poster/Pamphlet    Where are we today?  As of today, we have over six hundred published, reviewed articles with more than 6,000 registered users, coming from 22 countries and 48 states. We are supported by the United States' National Institutes of Health, Janssen Biotech, Genentech, Amgen, American Association for Pharmaceutical Scientists, and the National Association for Gifted Children, among others.   About theÃÂÃÂ  Founder  Roy Ghosh is a current senior at Parkland High School and has participated in science fairs and research internships for the past six years. He has been an intern at the National Institutes of Health for the past two years, performing research on metastatic cancers and chemotherapeutics. Before then, during middle school and as a freshman, Roy had been an independent researcher at Lehigh UniversityÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Bionanomechanics Lab. Roy had been personally affected by the lack of a platform to showcase and communicate his work, and thus founded ScienceBuzz to help thousands of other students like him.  He has won several research awards and has been honored at multiple conferences for his work on ScienceBuzz.ÃÂÃÂ He has received the support from several biotech companies and institutions across the nation for ScienceBuzz.ÃÂÃÂ In under a year, he has been an exhibitor and invited speaker at three national conferences.  To Learn More about Roy, visit:ÃÂÃÂ  www.sciencebuzz.com/about-us/   Thank You and Please Share to Get the Word Out!      Risks and challenges  The main purpose of the symposium is to have "One Day of Powerful Talks." Therefore, getting internationally-renowned speakers and icons from the scientific world to inspire the students is essential to the success of the event. We have been gathering a series of speakers to overcome this challenge, including a Nobel Prize Laureate, the head of a leading scientific institution, college admissions officers, university professors, leaders in gifted education, and top biopharma executives.  Additionally, our exhibitors and workshop sessions will provide the tools necessary for students to be exposed to all options and career pathways in STEM. We plan to have biopharma companies, national scientific organizations, and gifted programs as the primary exhibitors during the symposium.

Blurb: With features backed by studies proven to help you wake up in a better mood, Tick Tock Turtle is the all in one alarm clock that helps children meet the schedules of daily life.

Creator_description: Hi, I'm Dan and I'm the founder of emagine A. I have a background in engineering and grew up in the sunny town of Palo Alto, CA before Facebook and Google put them on the map! I have two kids Abbie and Andrew and they are the inspiration behind emagine A and our products. Good sleep is something the general population is getting less and less of, but I especially relate to the parents. As a Dad of two working in electronics manufacturing, sleep is something that doesn't come by easy. After our second child Andrew was born, I started trying many different sleep products and at the end found that the most simple and effective ended up being a sleep cycle alarm clock app on my phone. It wasn't until then that I realized how big sleep affected my entire well-being. Effective sleep really changed my mood and state of mind not only in the morning, but throughout the day.Fast forward two years, our two kids just started transitioning to a regular schedule of going to pre-school and every morning was a struggle. Either they were up way too early or after trying everything to get them up they needed to be literally dragged from their beds out of the house. As children, their bodies are much more susceptible to outside factors compared to us adults. Think about how you feel in the morning after a bad nights sleep and now think how much worse your children may feel when you get them out of bed. I thought, "If there is so much technology to enhance the lives of the average adult, why not for those who need it more?". And thus was born emagine A and Tick Tock Turtle.
Project_description: Do you hate waking up to your alarm clock every morning? Put yourself in your toddlers shoes and you'll understand why every morning is a battle with your kids. For our toddlers and young kids, sleep isone of the most important activities for their growth and development, yet whether they are ready or not, we wake them up every morning according to our scheduled activities of daily life.ÃÂÃÂ   Meet Tick Tock Turtle     Hi I'm Makani    Tick Tock Turtle is your child's all in one sleep companion that will enhance their sleep and wake routines so that all family members can have a great start to the day!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ All of Tick Tock Turtles features have been designed to leave your child feeling great in the morning and are backed by scientific studies.ÃÂÃÂ   In the PressÃÂÃÂ   Check out our unboxing and product review!                  Smart Alarm  You know that dazed, groggy and irritable feeling in the morning when you just don't feel yourself? Its called sleep inertia and its real! We can minimize this effect when we wake up naturally uninterrupted. Tick Tock Turtle will begin to monitor your child's sleep thirty minutes before your set alarm time and wake them gently at their lightest stage of sleep. This is as close to natural waking as you can get and we promise your kids will feel better despite getting up a few minutes earlier!  Sunrise LightsÃÂÃÂ      Brightest Setting in a Dark Room    Did you know that our bodies can sense light before our eyes are open? Tick Tock Turtle's sunrise lights begin to light up one hour before your set alarm time. This helps to gradually prepare your child to wake.  Sleep Lights  Common night lights, bedside toys or LED bulbs in your room are all affecting your child's ability to sleep! Tick Tock Turtle's long wavelength red night time lights help to promote sleep and give your child security. At the brightest setting, it provides approximately 5 foot visibility.  Portability  Tick Tock Turtle is powered by a 2600maH 18650 lithium battery so your child may bring Tick Tock Turtle with them if they need to leave the bed for any reason. When using batteries with kids, we have been careful only to use the most reliable battery sources with protection circuits. Typical run time is 4 days on a full charge.  Learn with Tick Tock Turtle       Tick Tock Turtle is also a sleep trainer! If your child can recognize colors, they can use the sleep trainer, but the fun begins when they can start to count the dots!ÃÂÃÂ   The standard alarm mode can be used as an activity timer! Do you ever wonder what your kids think when you say "10 minutes left"? Now, they can see!     Tick Tock Turtle is also an Activity Timer!       Tick Tock Turtle Countdown Lighting Sequence    Settings for Parents       SettingsÃÂÃÂ for parents are hidden away under the shell. Out of the box, buttons are intuitive and only takes a minute to setup!  Child Safety Certifications        Materials and Colors      Removable Food Grade Silicone Skin is Dishwasher Safe       Kid Tested Durable Construction       Tick Tock Turtle Comes in Three Fun Colors         Watch Us Put Tick Tock Turtle to the Test!      Rewards       Our Journey       Our Team       We are a small but fiercely dedicated team. We have devoted the past year to bringing Tick Tock Turtle to life and are excited to finally have the chance to get it into your hands!     Our two big bosses who have given Tick Tock Turtle the green light    Shipping  We are proud to have our fulfillment plan certified by Floship, a leading crowdfunding fulfillment provider. We have calculated the optimal means of shipping Tick Tock Turtle to all markets in a fast and cost effective manner.For proof of certification into the fulfillment plan please click  here .           Risks and challenges  IT'S ALL ON US, but we need your help! This is our first project and after this campaign we still have a long road ahead so we need your help! We have already put everything that we can in to this project to ensure that our project is completed! YES, that includes, tooling, testing, certifications and all material preparation so we are certain that we can deliver all our backers their rewards. Despite this, we absolutely need your help for us to continue to produce Tick Tock Turtle as well as future products for your families. We value your support and promise to keep you updated throughout our journey.

An EEG can be used to help detect potential problems associated with this activity. An EEG tracks and records brain wave patterns.  Read about Mr.ESP here.                                     The Open Source project is about making plans and software forÃÂÃÂ DIYÃÂÃÂ EEG peripheral products. It is aimed toward amateurs who would like to experiment with Mr.ESP 1. Combined with Mr.ESP 1 and software APP, we can watch the state of mind during meditation and relaxation. We could use the app to record and guide to meditation.ÃÂÃÂ   Using some compatible software APP (co-op) is also possible learning meditation and tea ceremony, playing plant growing games, checking fatigue, yoga status, VR Games and more. Mr. ESP also compatible with many software of Nuerosky. Mr. ESP also provides a number of other hardware and software solutions to help the developer with themselvesÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> projects.  We believe firmly that a focus on research and development is key to remaining on the cusp of technological development. BioBlue would offers customized scientific and R&D solutions for corporate, academic, medical, government, and pharmaceutical sectors.ÃÂÃÂ             In the making process, our team researched how to simplify the complex BCI instruments and applications, and encountered many difficulties, especially in the research for market, simplified device, structural design, industrial design, a large number of electromagnetic Interference produced by the "EEG ball", the distortion of the signal circuit, the characteristics of EEG algorithm analysis, relaxation guide APP software, the choice of the ball and car material, etc.ÃÂÃÂ        ItÃÂÃÂ took usÃÂÃÂ longÃÂÃÂ time to achieve the goal.       The main goal of us is to push the brain science ahead and to improve the understanding of brain health and cognition.ÃÂÃÂ         This picture showsÃÂÃÂ Mind typing.   One goal is to allow non-scientists to rapidly build on neurotechnology, such as this, through easy-to-use graphical interfaces and web APIs. Bioblue's vision is to embed advanced neurotechnology into everyday life.  We are developing more powerful mulit-channels EEG brain wear, Mr.ESP 2.ÃÂÃÂ        Mind typing, mind uploading and even Matrix will not be dream. Some SDK and hardware could help you to develop peripheral products in future. Your support means a lot to us. Thank u!                                          Our team is devoted to biosensing, artificial intelligence and wireless connection.The dream of our team is to civilize the brain-computer interface and to make the sensing and monitoring more mobile, convenient, ubiquitous  and anytime, anywhere. After five years of technology accumulation, we already have a number of independent intellectual property and patented technologies.ÃÂÃÂ   Team was born in biomedical engineering, especially good at brain-computer interface, brain networking, with sufficient technical reserves and many partners. The team is open, collaborative, sharing, energetic.ÃÂÃÂ   We also welcome equity investments.             EEG Headsets Application   The new generation of EEG headsets Up until recently, most electroencephalography (EEG) was confined to hospitals and doctorÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s offices, where dedicated technicians controlled above $10,000 devices. The technology, which records the brainÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s electrical activity via electrodes on the scalp, can be used to diagnose epilepsy, sleep disorders, diseases like AlzheimerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s, and other brain-related conditions. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s also used in neurofeedback sessions with ADHD patients, who are trained to increase their beta waves (these signify an attentive state) through audio and video feedback linked to EEG activity.       We will continue to work hard, and of course, whether positive news or not, we will update you early and often. Our entire team is passionate, and want to make a difference in your life through our product.ÃÂÃÂ   Our team is committed to continuously improve the quality of the product, optimize the experience, upgrading the product, so the actual product features, specifications or design may be slightly different, these changes may not be notified, please forgive us! Creator_description: .Seasoned Hardware Design Engineer with over 15 years of experience specializing in 1. High Speed Board Design2. Signal Integrity3. Power Integrity4. Board Bring up
Project_description: ArduinoPixed combines two of the world's most popular and least cost enthusiast Electronic products - Raspberry Pi Zero and Arduino.ÃÂÃÂ   It provides three USB ports and Arduino Nano Functionality on a single board.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ All you have to do is attach ArduinoPixed with Raspberry Pi Zero using 4 provided screws and you getÃÂÃÂ   1. Three USB Hubs  2. An onboard Arduino ( ATMEGA328)  3. An board Thermistor for temperature sensing.  4. On board LED and a Push Button Switch  5. Extension for A/DÃÂÃÂ  Pins of Arduino.ÃÂÃÂ   ArduinoPixed is modular, so you can add your own A/D board on the top of this board. Possibilites are limitless, and some examples are, thermometer, Smoke Detector, Carbon MonoOxide detecter, Propane Gas Leak Detector, Moisture sensitivity.ÃÂÃÂ    Arduino HeaderÃÂÃÂ    The two 10 Pin Headers are of 2 mm pitch. We have 5V, 3.3V Supplies and most pins of the ATMEGA328 chip are coming to these two headers.ÃÂÃÂ      Arduino Extension Header    This is the Part of the ATMEGA328 Circuit.     ATMEGA328     ProgrammingÃÂÃÂ  from Raspberry Pi ZeroÃÂÃÂ    Programming and playing with the Arduino using AduinoPixed is easy.  Add a USB Key board and a USB Mouse to the Arduinopixed and attache and HDTV using HDMI Cable.ÃÂÃÂ   4. Arduino NanoInstall Arduino usingÃÂÃÂ   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgradeÃÂÃÂ   sudo apt-get install arduinoÃÂÃÂ   You can now run the Arduino from Arduino IDE under Menu > Programming. Open the Arduino IDE to start programming your Arduino board.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   You will need to select Arduino Nano 328 from the list of the boards - this is what this System is closely matches.ÃÂÃÂ    PricingÃÂÃÂ    At $23, we have priced it competitively. If you add an Integrated Hub and a separate Arduino Nano, a cable and shipping at two placed you will end up paying more. But more importantly, you are getting everything is a small form factor integrating everything.ÃÂÃÂ        Block Diagram     Arduinopixed Block Diagram    More details and pictures can also be found on my blog  here       Risks and challenges  We have successfully delivered 7 projects on Kickstarter, most of them in time. Our manufacturing process is streamlined and as such we see little risk in the whole process. The design itself has been verified with two prototypes.   As such we do not see any risk in this project.

Creator_description: We launched AVIOX in January 2017 and have delivered over 5000 units of our previous models across the Globe. We have plenty of experience manufacturing bluetooth speakers and currently have two other products readily available on Amazon. As you will see from the reviews our customers are extremely satisfied with our products . We felt that it was time to try something different , as we are a startup we have very limited financial resources, this is why we have turned to Kickstarter. We would love you to join us on our journey and we hope there are many more great products to come. If you have any questions about the campaign or our products feel free to contact me via facebook or email (allan@aviox.uk).
Project_description: We are a London based start-up that launched in January 2017 and are currently members of Google Campus; a Google community specifically for start-ups. We currently have two products readily available on the market and the Cylinder 2.0 will be our next product, we expect to deliver the Cylinder 2.0 in March 2018.   ÃÂÃÂ   During our research we found that most loud bluetooth speakers were heavy and unattractive. Whilst most smaller portable speakers available on the market lacked volume and style. The few decent speakers we found cost in excess of $140, we feel that customers are being massively overcharged for good quality audio products. So we set out to make a stylish alternative for customers by going direct to consumer and deliberately not using wholesalers and distributors.   ÃÂÃÂ   The AVIOX Cylinder 2.0 is our solution to this problem. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s an innovative, slick, aluminium portable, bluetooth speaker that will fit seamlessly into any apartment or house. The specification is on par with the very best portable speakers currently on the market. Continue reading to learn more about what makes the cylinder 2.0 different and why we need your support.               Use the cylinder to stream your favourite music.                 Silver    CUSTOMIZATIONÃÂÃÂ   Simply send us your artwork, name or initials. We will etch this onto the aluminium part of the speaker or print on the side latex cone. We can even remove our logo if you wish and replace it with your own artwork/symbol.  ÃÂÃÂ   The etching area available on the aluminium is 1 cm X 20 cm (at the bottom of the speaker were our current logo is). Your artwork will be compressed to fit this area. ÃÂÃÂ   If you choose to print on the side latex cone the area available is a 2 cm radius (from the center of the circle to the edge). You can choose any color you wish using this print method.  Select the ÃÂÃÂ£59 pledge and we will contact you immediately after the campaign to get your exact requirements.ÃÂÃÂ    All customized units will be delivered in March 2018.     So portable       Dual pairing technology allows you to upgrade to 40 watts at a touch of a button           You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                Me and Afy (PR assistant) at a pre launch event        Get Your Project Funded Today!            You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                Google Campus in London has been our base over the last year. It is a community full of start ups and early stage businesses    TIMELINE  January 2017 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  Launched first two speakers on Amazon UK after nearly a year of product development and testing.   February 2017- AVIOX name trademarked after impressive first month of sales and a good public response to our branding.  March 2017 -  AVIOX speakers stocked by GAME PLC - a large UK based consumer electronics retailer.  June 2017 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Idea for Cylinder 2.0 born.  August 2017 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  First ever Cylinder 2.0ÃÂÃÂ prototype received - was not dual pairing at this point, we were also not satisfied with the voice prompts and felt the buttons were not user friendly enough, so we changed this.  October 2017 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Second Cylinder 2.0 prototype received , better than the first one, now dual pairing allowing a maximum output of 40 watts when two speakers were paired together. Buttons and voice prompts had also been improved.  November/December 2017 - We attended numerous start-up/tech events to raise awareness about our new product release/ kickstarter campaign.  January 2018 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Kickstarter launch.  Late February 2018 -ÃÂÃÂ  Manufacture Kickstarter Rewards.  March 2018 ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> Deliver the Cylinder 2.0 to Kickstarter backers worldwide.  April 2018 - Mass manufacture Cylinder 2.0ÃÂÃÂ  + Public release.  WHY KICKSTARTER?  We believe Kickstarter will help get our product in front of thousands of potential backers and help fund our first few production runs. Without Kickstarter it is going to be very difficult for us to produce this product at the scale required to turn this into a feasible, long term sustainable business.   Kickstarter has far more organic traffic than other crowdfunding sites and has an extremely loyal base of backers who love supporting campaigns such as ours.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have nearly 1 year experience in delivering speakers across the globe so we have given ourselves plenty of time to ensure backers receive their rewards in a timely fashion. In the unlikely event that we fall behind schedule, we will keep backers updated.  We want our backers to enjoy their speakers for years to come so we are giving a 2 year manufacturers warranty. Our manufacturing factory has a very meticulous quality control team but if your speaker stops working for whatever reason please get in touch and we will find a prompt solution.

Creator_description: I'm currently at a UK University studying Electronics Engineering, working alongside Rey Ye of ReyLight to bring new ideas to Kickstarter.
Project_description: Who are ReyLight?ÃÂÃÂ   My name is Rey Ye and I'm from China. After a lifetime of being interested in flashlights as a hobby, I wanted something more. After joining and participating in flashlight forums in 2012, it became apparent that many of the budget friendly flashlights left a lot to be desired.ÃÂÃÂ   After speaking to many flashlight users and experts on the forums, I began a discussion with the aim of improving the function of an existing product. After contacting the original manufacturer here in China, we were able to produce a special Reylight edition of their light with our preferred emitter and user interface.ÃÂÃÂ   Two years later in 2014, I designed and produced my very own flashlight - the  Reylight Titanium Tripple . This light was designed to use the ever-popular 18350 cell, or an 18650 by using an extension tube. I followed the release of the Ti Tripple with a second design. I produced a limited edition run of the  Ti II , an 18650 powered triple. In 2016, ReyLight was officially created as its own company, at this time two new models were produced - the  Brass Pineapple , and the first version of the  Ti Lan , both were a huge hit across the world.               Version 1 of the Ti Lan    At the time, most AA flashlights were around 100 lumens. I designed my lights to be able to use either the common AA cell, or a 14500 Li-ion battery which gave the option to triple the output to 470 lumens! I also solved another common issue people had, which was most available lights use a cool white LED. I opted for a Nichia 219C, at a much warmer tint of 4000k. These emitters have a colour similar to that of sunlight, due to a much higher CRI (Colour Rendering Index) than most commercially used LED's. The Nichia emitters are a favourite amongst the hobby for this reason. Once again, we listened to the feedback given by users from all over the world, and went on to produce the second version of the Lan - another success story!       This brings us to where we are today...  We are here to produce our third version of the Ti Lan. It brings with it the biggest update so far, while still maintaining the key features which set it apart from the competition in the first place. More modes, active-temperature control, milled slots for up to 10 tritium vials, a new pocket clip and much more! Due to the high costs of ordering the Titanium rods required for a production run, along with deposits and other costs for the manufacturer, we decided to call for the help of you. In return, you will receive your very own Ti Lan!                       ÃÂÃÂ Why choose the Ti Lan?    With a body made of titanium weighing only 65g (2.3oz), you get the benefits and strength of Titanium while keeping the weight low.   You can customise your Lan to your liking by installing 1.5x6mm Tritium vials into the 10 slots around the light.   We used a 4000k Nichea LED, allowing 4 different levels, between 0.2 lumens and 470 lumens (by using a 14500 cell).ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ  The Ti Lan has been proven to work well with:   Eneloop Rechargable's  Duracell Alkaline's  Energiser Lithium Primary'sÃÂÃÂ   Sanyo 14500 Li-Ion's  Reylight 800mAh 14500 Li-Ion's        ÃÂÃÂ  Detailed Specs:    Material: Solid Titanium (Ti-6Al-4V, Grade 5)  LED: 4000k Nichia 219C High CRI  Compatible cells: AA or 14500  Finish: Bead blast  Dimensions: 97x21mm (3.8x0.8in)  Weight (without battery): 65g (2.3oz)   Maximum output: 470 lumens  Minimum output: 0.2 lumens  Reverse polarity protection  Low Voltage Protection to prevent damage to Li-Ion cell's  Active temperature control, to prevent damage to the LED/Driver  Anti-Reflective (AR) coated lens  Aluminium Orange Peel reflector  Reverse-clicky switch   Ability to tablestand  Improved pocket clip  Spare O-Rings  10 tritium slots (installed tritium vials are an additional option)   The optional charging kit includes an 800mAh ReyLight 1400 Li-Ion cell, a Liitokala Lii-100 charger and a Micro USB charging cable.        ÃÂÃÂ Operation:    Fully click to turn on, followed by half-press (tap) to change modes. Fully click again to turn off.  Starts at moonlight (0.2 lumens) by default  Memory can be switched on or off by giving the button 8 quick taps.          ÃÂÃÂ Delivery:   Our goal is to ship the first batch of lights at the beginning of March 2018.ÃÂÃÂ We are ready to purchase the materials and begin production immediately after the project is successfully funded. (We are aware the rewards state delivery in Feb 2018 - this is a small error due to a delay in Kickstarters approval process).  Upon successfulÃÂÃÂ backing, you may receive a survey to confirm details such as tritium colours and such. We look forward to hearing from you!      Risks and challenges  As with any project, there are some risks.   ReyLight is an established small brand with a supply chain in place and we are experienced working with high quality manufactures, therefore there are minimal risks. Delayed shipping is a possibility as this is an international project. Unfortunately, if we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t meet our goals the project wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be possible due to Kickstarter's All-or-Nothing model - hopefully this is not the case, and we will be able to bring more ReyLight Ti LAN's to the world, at a more affordable price.

One thing that always bothered Greg was the amount of Chemical waste and pollution running down the drains of dealerships and carwashes. As a result, the creation of Hooptie was centered on being environmentally friendly. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s it! It really is that simple. Hooptie washes, shines and protects all in one. Cut cost, save space and go with Hooptie. Hooptie reduces all of your cleaning supplies into one, not only for your car but it also has cleaning properties that work well in the home. Many soaps contain chemicals that harm fish and degrade water quality. When you wash your car in the driveway, the soap together with the dirt, grime, grease, and oil washes from your car and flows into nearby storm drains.
