Project_description: Pour la version en franÃÂÃÂ§ais, cliquez ici.         Ever wondered what is hiding into your day-to-day devices? Papier Machine Vol.0 is  the first interactive electronic paper toy that unveils the mysteries of electronic black boxes.   Play with Papier Machine and apprehend the world of electronics!       Papier Machine is an expedition into the invisible aesthetics of circuits  where paper, electricity, graphics and play meet.   Circuits hide a surprising narrative potential whose stories Papier Machine chose to tell extending the possibilities of paper from colours and shapes with conductive ink.   Papier Machine Vol.0 is the first volume of a collection of thematic books. The theme of this volume is  the sound .   Awarded :        Featured in: ÃÂÃÂ         Papier Machine is a beautiful book...         ... of 6 electronic paper toys ready to be assembled.          ÃÂÃÂ  NÃÂÃÂ°1 - Resistance -  Like any music instrument, this piano needs to be tuned. The pitches are determined by hand-drawn graphite zones. Graphite being conductive, these zones complete the circuit. Closing the doors finishes to close the circuit producing for each of them a unique sound. Hence offering infinite possibilities to create a unique piano.       ÃÂÃÂ  NÃÂÃÂ°2 - Gyroscope -  Steel conducts electricity. The marble inserted in the slit connects the two parts of the circuit. By tilting the sheet, the marble rolls towards the battery and the sound intensifies.       ÃÂÃÂ  NÃÂÃÂ°3 - Playing track -  Gravity makes the metallic marble roll down. Every time the marble crosses a hand-drawn graphite zones, it closes the circuit and a sound is played. The track becomes a music sheet played as it is read by the rolling marble.        NÃÂÃÂ°4 - Wind sensor -  Wind, breath and air agitation get the silver fringes to touch, hence closing the circuit. Depending on the quantity of air blown and its location, the contact zone evolves and so does the sound.        NÃÂÃÂ°5 - Writing track -  Shaking the game sheet creates a centrifugal force that keeps the marble against the sides. Higher -or lower- pitched notes are played when the marble crosses thinner or wider hand-drawn graphite zones.         NÃÂÃÂ°6 - Tilt switch -  The marble is set at the bottom of an unstable base, on which shapes are gradually piled up. If balance is lost, the marble starts rolling and then crosses silver zones, setting off the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>loserÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ sound.    All brought to life with key components!        Each toy comes with its own user manual.            ÃÂÃÂ  Manipulate paper   Papier Machine is more than a regular book. You can cut it, fold it, assemble it, color it, build out of it a whole family of paper toys.   Build electronic circuits   Printed with silver ink, the potential of paper is infinite.  This special ink conducts electricity allowing to show real printed circuits.    Play   Understanding the basics of electronics through play is more fun!  With Papier Machine, you will be able to play music or mini-golf, to feel like a ghost, to challenge your agility or better, gravity!ÃÂÃÂ         * Format:  B4  * Paper weight:  200 gsm  * Number of pages:  24  * Pantone colours:  2 spot colours + 1 neon  * The components:  all includedÃÂÃÂ        Details  Every part, every detail has thoroughly been thought out!       ÃÂÃÂ Travel through the 24 pages of Papier Machine Vol.0!       ÃÂÃÂ Details of the printing process : Each toy fit in one page.       The pages are printed using offset in 3 plain colours including one neon colour. All of them was carefully chosen.        PaperÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s quality was picked to be both flexible and strong enough. Flexible to allow manipulation, strong to overcome its fragility.        Each toy is pre-cut and pre-folded to make assembling easy.        ÃÂÃÂ Papier Machine is silkscreened with conductive silver ink.        Papier Machine tells you stories where graphics and silver circuits are the means.       All the details were given special attention, even the packaging of the components, right in the middle of the book.       No need to be polyglot to understand our user manual, all the explanations are illustrated in colours.ÃÂÃÂ        No glue needed, the toys are cleverly designed to be assembled with strips.                  ÃÂÃÂ Gifts add-on       The  Notebook  that will come out of a collaboration between Papier Machine and  Papier Tigre ! We're working on it along with Papier Tigre to get you the perfect visual! The  Poster  is a 50 x 70 cm Posters based on the Papier Machine design, printed with the same 3 colors.ÃÂÃÂ   Offered for 35ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ contributions and above.       We are Papier Machine!       Raphael (left) and Marion (center) are both designers inÃÂÃÂ  their studioÃÂÃÂ Pinaffo Pluvinage ÃÂÃÂ in Paris while Agnes (right) comes from the music and charity areas.      Mock-up in the studio, 2016.    WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve come a long way! We have been working on Papier Machine for three years now.The project already aroused interest and was honored by the  Red Dot Design Award  (2016),  the Audi Talent Award  (2016) and the Oe-a (2016).      Printing prototypes at Lezard Graphique in Strasbourg, France. 2017.       First printing of the silver ink at Lezard Graphique. 2016    It had several opportunities to be tested by the public. In May 2017, it was exhibited at the MusÃÂÃÂ©e des Arts DÃÂÃÂ©coratifs in Paris. In September 2017, at the Maison&Objet faire in Paris as well.     Exhibition in MusÃÂÃÂ©es des Arts dÃÂÃÂ©coratifs. 2017    Papier MachineÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s effect is real! This is why we decided to go from project to productÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ and launch Papier Machine on Kickstarter this January!     3 years of work, and a lot of iterations :)         It took 3 years to come to this final version of Papier Machine and lots of electronic testing to make sure you could play with it. We are now ready to produce it on a large scale. The quotes we have received are ready to be signed. All that is missing now are the funds to do the final tests and start the production. And finally be able to put Papier Machine in your hands.   This will be the first milestone for Papier Machine as a toy creator. As mentioned above, Papier Machine Vol.0, a series of 6 sonorous paper toys, is only the first volume of a collection of beautiful thematic books. And we have plenty more interactive and singular experiences "in store" that we can't wait to show you...   We are ready to create a whole world of experiences to stimulate your creativity and curiosity or that of your friends, children, lovers, families, students, bosses...   Help us bring Papier Machine to life!                                 Ensci-Les Ateliers  &  Colab AUT  for the time and space to develop the first prototypes,  Audi Talents  for giving Papier Machine the opportunity to exhibit at the  MusÃÂÃÂ©e des Arts dÃÂÃÂ©coratifs  de Paris, Pauline & Sophie from the  MusÃÂÃÂ©e de Poche  for supporting our Kickstarter launch offering time, space, energy and great music tastes,  Smiirl  for its space and advice,  Novacentrix  for their trust at the whole beginning,  Lezard Graphique  for their beautiful prints,  Gilles Belley  & Licia Bottura for exhibiting us at  Maison&Objet ,  David BenquÃÂÃÂ©  for believing in the project first, Juliette Pollet for her great text on Papier Machine, JÃÂÃÂ©rÃÂÃÂ´me Delormas & ClÃÂÃÂ©mence Seurat from  369 editions  for helping us understand the publishing world, Vincent Tuset-Anres for his help with printers,  Fotokino  for their invitation to exhibitÃÂÃÂ  Papier Machine, Arcade Poster & Tamtam in February,ÃÂÃÂ  Electroninks  and  Papier Tigre  for their support on our KickstarterÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s campaign, Gauthier Nadaud for being one of the first to believe in Papier Machine,  ClÃÂÃÂ©ment Brandely  for his talent making our videos,  Flavien Berger  for the soundtrack,  Coline Fontaine , Denise Desrosiers and Bobby PrÃÂÃÂ©vost for the translations.        Interested about the project? Willing to write about it? ÃÂÃÂ  Have a look at  the full press pack here !  Email us at this address if you still have questions:  press@papiermachine.io  We will be quick! Promise :)        INSTAGRAM -   FACEBOOK  -  TWITTER -   WEBSITE   Wondering about Papier Machine? Any doubt? Anything?  Click here  to start Facebook chatting with us :)      Risks and challenges  Risks and challenges are inevitable when launching a new product. Especially when your product has never been produced before. We guarantee you that we have minimized both : the entire process, from production to delivery, has already been pre-arranged.   From the first prototypes we produced last year to be exhibited at the MusÃÂÃÂ©e des Arts DÃÂÃÂ©coratifs in Paris, we have learned a lot about the production process and its mistakes. And we know now how to do better.   As for this final version, we have made prototypes testing. We only need time to test a first series of what will soon be in your hands to make sure you hold the best possible quality.   We come from different worlds and have complementary skills. Our two designers, Marion and RaphaÃÂÃÂ«l, are used to managing projects from creation to production with partners. Raphael even co-founded a first start-up 5 years ago which is now living "la belle vie". Agnes comes from a more businessy world where she developed the skills needed to make Papier Machine live longer. The three of us have the technical expertise to do this and do it well. Luckily, we're surrounded   by many people motivated to support Papier Machine willing to help bringing their expertise. And if needed, we will not hesitate to call on them.  We will do our best to meet the deadlines. Still, in case of unplanned events, count on us to keep you up to date.

Creator_description: Scentee is a technology design lab that presents new communication and culture originating from Japan founded in 2011, with a theme of fragrance. Currently in the city based in Tokyo, where staff offices are located in San Francisco, New York, Shenzhen with a new sensibility going around and creating diverse creatives and trends, cultures, 4D digital communication that will straighten to the world 's first sensation! We are proposing platform for "4D digital communication". Scentee will send out a fusion of fragrant culture, which was popular since the Heian period, and digital fusion of possibilities from Japan.History of ScenteeScentee is a techlogy company founded in 2011 for fragrance tech starting withScentee Balloon a mobile attachment scent gadget. Scentee Machina" a new product is from Scentee, which has been manufacturing the device "Scentee Balloon" that was a big bang topic in the world that could smell with your smartphone. Selling more than 10,000 units to 20 coutries worldwide and this company started the business. Connect with smartphones and internet, realize an interactive next generation scent experience that allows you to select and control multiple scents, such as timers and on/off, which could not be realized with conventional mechanical diffusers or stick type diffusers so far. In addition AI (artificial intelligence) installed in the cloud learns the fragrance of your preference and gives you suggestions.The device fragrance of "Scentee Machina" developed by interior design using device design made with black alumite and developed by the skilled puffmers committed to you, will change your life to a fine upscale everyday I will.Director of Scentee Founder Masaru Tange CEO Koki TsubouchiRecord of Scentee  Engadget Award 2013 Canne Lion Mobile Technology 2015 Silver AwardPast Products or Scentee Scentee Balloon 2013 Scentee ÃÂ©ÃÂ¼ÃÂ»ÃÂ§<U+0084>ÃÂ¼ÃÂ¨<U+0082><U+0089> 2014 Scentee Bacon 2015 ÃÂ£<U+0083><U+009E>ÃÂ£<U+0083><U+009E>ÃÂ£<U+0083><U+0087>ÃÂ£<U+0082>ÃÂ¸ 2016 Sleep 2017 Flower 2017 Book 2017 Scentee Machina Quattro 2018 Scentee Machina Uno 2018
Project_description: Scentee Machina is the diffuser reinvented to a more simpler, sexier and technologically mature design. At last, you can now control when the smell goes off, which smell to go off and much more, all from your phone.            We have been featured in       We were live at CESÃÂÃÂ®ÃÂ¯ÃÂ¸<U+008E> 2018 from January 9~12.           CESÃÂÃÂ®ÃÂ¯ÃÂ¸<U+008E> 2018          Diffusers have always been this not very beautiful misconception of smell stored in a jar that you have no control over whatsoever. You only get to choose 1 smell, you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t control when it goes off, you have to manually refill it, and it is embarrassing to have it in public.       We at Scentee are all about the smell experience. Back in 2013 we launched a successful campaign at a  Japanese crowd funding site , and got our first smart gadget " Scentee Balloon " off. It hit the world by a storm, successfully selling over 20,000 units.   For our next step, we wanted to try a "product" that can be used in every house. We looked at the objects around us, and found something that was hidden in plain site. The diffuserÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ. We created over 100 prototypes, and each time, our focus was on how to make the simplest, yet sexy design, that people will like whatever point in time they were in.     Some sketches of older prototypes    Our goal was clear, we wanted the simplest functional design. It had to be sexy and timeless. Some of the designs were very amazing on paper, but when we made prototypes of them, they weren't functional. Together with our manufacturing partner, we produced prototype over prototype, every time taking inspiration from a different life scene, until we reached what we thought was the ultimate design.  This design, the Scentee Machina, is a base that can be put on any flat surface, and detachable perfume parts. The base is connected with the internet, meaning you can program it the way you like. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the beginning of the smell revolution.            Bedroom     Machina Uno beside the bed    The living room     Machina Quattro in the living room    In your relaxation space     Machina Quattro in the tea room    ÃÂÃÂ In the bathroom     Machina Uno in the bathroom                             Unlock the full potential of you Scentee Machina with our easy to use app. Switch the device on/off from any place, even away from home. With the timer feature, choose when the smells are triggered, choose amount, choose which smell goes when (for Quattro), integrate with your calendar to prepare the house before you come back home. Also, Scentee Machina's AI will learn fromÃÂÃÂ your usage history, and will suggest your favorite fragrance.                           Add the amount of the add-on you want to the pledge, and after the campaign ends, we will send you a survey to confirm it.                                Why are we in KickstarterÃÂÃÂ   Ever since our first product, we are big believers in the crowd funding community, and huge fans of kickstarter. Since our last product, kickstarter has launched in Japan recently, and we have sought this as a great opportunity to showcase our product to the international market. Hence, here we are!  Press KIT             Risks and challenges  We have been working with our manufacturing partner for over 5 years, and have delivered B2C products (Scentee Balloon), and B2B products to world renown brands at as much as 10,000 unit/month. So in this sense, we have extreme confidence in delivering on a mass scale.   Our concern is keeping the quality level where we want, and making sure the app integration works well with most of the phones out there. We will be flying in to the manufacturer's factory every week to check on progress. We also have partnered with a big software testing firm in Japan to make sure the app will be up to standard.

Creator_description: We are a group of fly fisherman + one mechanical engineer who saw a need for the sport that we so dearly love. We set out to create an original fly fishing vise for our possible customers. The vice was made in Pueblo, CO, USA. Colorado Proud!Colorado Fly Works also started as a need to get products to fly shops which could not get high-quality brands at an economic price and those shops who cannot get dealerships due to regional competition holding the dealership of the products wanted or needed.
Project_description: Colorado Fly Works is located in Pueblo, Colorado.  We are very motivated in provide reasonable and high quality products to the fly fisherman.  We use Vets from Healing Waters as much as possible provide work and service for our heroes. Vet's work on their own terms here at Colorado Fly Works.  We enjoy training Vet's for making our products on their terms.  Many healing water Vet's suffer from many problems including P.T.S.D. and are not normally employable.  We give these Vet's an opportunity to earn some money and learn new skills. Please help CFW supports the Vet's of Pueblo and Colorado Springs.  Please patronize any products made by Vet's here or anywhere in the United States.    We will be offering Basic Net with a standard resin cast core, A carbon fiber and/or kevlar composite net with a 3D printed core and a completely new product type with a completely 3D Printed Net.  All Nets will have a lifetime warranty. We will be offering standard, mid length, and boat nets in several CFW and Fisknat Styles.ÃÂÃÂ  After the end of the Kickstarter, Fisknat Composite Nets will only be sold by Fisknat. Retail Prices will vary from CFW and Fisknat.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   The bags for the nets will be several stand choices already offered by Fisknat, and New series of 3D printed bags will also be available by both Fisknat and CFW.  All Fisknat Composite Nets warranty will be honored by CFW.ÃÂÃÂ  Any custom Fisknat Net will need to be placed with Fisknat and Dropship by CFW.  Both Fisknat and CFW are honor to present a new style of Composite Net. The basic net will have a base 1K fabric wrap with 4 layers in the yoke area in alternating direction for strength.ÃÂÃÂ  Depending on desire style and make of the net, 1K and 3K finish fabric wraps in carbon fiber or kevlar will be added.ÃÂÃÂ  Trim finish of 3K bilaterial weave carbon fiber or kevlar cloth may be available on the hoop and handle.  We hope to be of service and hope to offer the most reasonable value of net on the market.ÃÂÃÂ  We believe that we will offer the best price to quality value now and in the future.      Risks and challenges  Colorado Fly Works is deeply committed to providing great new products to our patrons. CFW will be producing a series net and custom orders as well. We hope to provide the best product and service for the Fly Fisherman. Established brands can be very pricey and establishing your own brand has not been easy. We hope we can be of service and help us become an established Fly Fishing Brand.

Creator_description: The father & son team Dave and Drew Gatian began development of the Raised Desk in 2014. Their vision was to develop not only an ergonomically correct desktop accessory, but to make a truly portable stand up desk.After playing as a football lineman on a state championship high school team, Drew suffered from back pain. Sitting all day aggravated his discomfort. His dad, Dave, suggested a standing desk. However, standing desks were pricey and most couldn't be moved to various locations as needed for Drew's job.  And the desktop model on the market either weren't portable or weren't ergonomically correct.So, priding himself as a "redneck engineer" capable of using unorthodox methods for elegant solutions, Dave began planning and experimenting. Initial efforts started in their garage, with crude cardboard cutouts, advancing to simple plywood models. As the design advanced, CAD drawings were developed, various material tested, and prototypes developed. As the Raised Desk evolved, so too did Dave and Drew's understanding of anthropometrics (basically the study of the human body and movement - we learned this word too while working on this project) and ergonomic design.Dave is a field advisor in the construction industry and sidelines as an MMA judge. Drew is a sales strategy manager for a national services organization after working for a Big Four consulting firm and is a whiskey connoisseur.  After using the Raised Desk, Drew's back feels much better now.
Project_description: With the Raised Desk you can work standing or sitting, in the correct position, anytime, anywhere. It is affordable, portable, and designed to help you feel relaxed while avoiding common health issues from the traditional desk. Unlike many products on the market, the patent pending Raised Desk is ergonomically designed to ensure that your neck and arms are in the correct position to avoid pain and ensure proper posture.  And, it folds down to fit into a laptop bag or backpack.ÃÂÃÂ           The Raised Desk shelves adjust to almost any user's height.       The patent pending Raised Desk design allows for the shelves to pack into itself so it can be folded into a compact, portable unit.       The entire Raised Desk folds into a compact 11" x 15" unit which will fit in most laptop bags.     The Raised Desk is:ÃÂÃÂ      Portable.  Suitable for almost every laptop bag and backpack and ideal for the modern worker who travels to different locations (11 in. x 15 in.)ÃÂÃÂ    Height Adjustable.  Made for anyone from 5'0" to 6'3" with 12 different shelf adjusting slots.ÃÂÃÂ    Lightweight.  At only 9.0 pounds, easy to carry on your commute or travels.  TSA approved carry-on design.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Easy to Assemble.  Sets up in just seconds. No tools required.ÃÂÃÂ    Sleek and Stylish.  Made from 100% recyclable aluminum.ÃÂÃÂ    Sturdy.  Holds over 30 pounds on each shelf without any problem. The typical laptop weighs about 5 pounds.  Strong, smooth, and stylish and made for rugged support.ÃÂÃÂ    Optimally designed.  Offers a shelf area for mouse and the holes in shelves to allow for cooling air flow to laptops or monitors.ÃÂÃÂ    Earth-friendly.  Made from 85% recycled content and 100% recyclable.Anodized Aluminum. A high quality, durable finish which will stand up to the harshest use.ÃÂÃÂ    Economical.  At a special Kickstarter pricing up to 25% off, everyone can now enjoy the benefits of a portable stand-up desk.    Plus an incredible bonus for the first 45 supporters.  We have branded an ultra-slim wireless keyboard with the Raised Desk logo, and you'll get a brand new one similar to the one shown below if you act quickly enough.      Ultra-Slim Bluetooth Keyboard Slim Portable Bluetooth Wireless Keyboard (appx. 5" x 11")    The entire Raised Desk folds into a compactÃÂÃÂ 11" x 15" unit which will fit in most laptop bags.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Ergonomically Correct    The Ergonomic Correctness of the Raised Desk -ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    To be ergonomically correct, when using your computer your forearms should be level to the ground, and your neck should be in a neutral position. Some stand-up desks on the market are little more than a table to place on your desktop, possibly aligning your arms in the correct position, but forcing you to bend your neck significantly downward to an ergonomically incorrect position. Other products allow for the shelves to be moved, but often not independently. With these other products, your neck might be correct, but your arms are not.  The Raised Desk allows users to make sure both their arms and neck are in the correct positions.ÃÂÃÂ       To be ergonomically correct when standing, users' arms should be parallel to the floor, and their neck in an upright, neutral position.    Anthropometric studies show for users to be comfortable and in an ergonomically correct position, their forearms should be at a 90-degree angle to their elbow.  Users' necks should be vertical, to a slight tilt forward of up to 15 degrees downward, sometimes referred to as the resting sight line. Keyboard heights that vary from this can cause wrist and hand issues.  Tilting one's neck to view a screen that is too low can cause neck issues and vision fatigue.  The Raised Desk is designed to meet these constraints using a standard 30" high desk for users from 5'0" to 6'4" tall, about 99% of the population.ÃÂÃÂ   Set-Up is a Breeze - No Tools RequiredÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             Sitting is the New Smoking  ÃÂÃÂ Sitting is the new smoking according to the latest medical research over the last five years. Despite expert advice to stand at least two hours per day, the average office worker sits ten hours per day. Sitting at a computer for extended periods of time at work, school, and home is both uncomfortable and unhealthy.  However, leading a typical American lifestyle doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to be an automatic sentence to higher risks of heart disease, diabetes, obesity, cancer, muscle and joint pain, or early death. Exercise can counteract the effects of sitting all day, but it is not easy to get in time at the gym each day after ten hours of time is spent working and commuting. A more efficient way to reduce the impacts of sitting all day long is to work while standing.ÃÂÃÂ   The Health Benefits of the Raised DeskÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ A 2012 study found that if the average American reduced his or her sitting time to three hours per day, life expectancy would climb by two years. Each 2-hour increase in sitting time per day, their risk of colon cancer increased by 8 percent, and women's risk of endometrial cancer increased by 10 percent.ÃÂÃÂ   A good roundup of standing desk benefits follows:ÃÂÃÂ   Calories Burned Standing vs. Sitting    https://www.livestrong.com/article/73916-calories-burned-standing-vs.-sitting   "The simple act of standing instead of sitting may help you burn 20 to 50 more calories per hour, depending on your size. Although that may not seem like a lot in a 2,000-calorie day, making the standing adjustment for four hours each day can burn an extra 80 to 200 calories -- helping you lose 8 to 20 pounds over the course of a year. Standing more often also contributes to an overall better sense of well-being and health."ÃÂÃÂ    Five Health Benefits of Standing DesksÃÂÃÂ     Spending more of your day standing could reduce the risk of obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease and cancer.     https://www.smithsonianmag.com/science-nature/five-health-benefits-standing-desks-180950259/   "The solution, they say, isn't to sit for six hours at work and then head to the gym afterward, because evidence suggests that the negative effects of extended sitting can't be countered by brief bouts of strenuous exercise. The answer is incorporating standing, pacing and other forms of activity into your normal dayÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>and standing at your desk for part of it is the easiest way of doing so."ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Sitting Too Much: How Bad Is It?ÃÂÃÂ     Excess Sitting Has Been Linked to a Host of Health Problems. Here's How to Reduce Your Sitting Time.ÃÂÃÂ     http://www.webmd.com/fitness-exercise/news/20140407/sitting-disease-faqÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Sitting our life away, it seems, may be very bad for our health and even our life expectancy."ÃÂÃÂ    How Much Does Sitting Negate Your Workout Benefits?ÃÂÃÂ     Study: Each hour of sitting erases 8% from the health benefit of an hour of running.ÃÂÃÂ     http://www.runnersworld.com/health/how-much-does-sitting-negate-your-workout-benefitsÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ "According to a research team from the University of Texas Southwest Medical Center, each time unit of sitting cancels out 8 percent of your gain from the same amount of running. In other words, if you run for an hour in the morning, and then sit for 10 hours during the day, you lose roughly 80 percent of the health benefit from your morning workout."ÃÂÃÂ    Here's Just How Bad Sitting Around Is For You    https://www.nbcnews.com/health/cancer/heres-just-how-bad-sitting-around-you-n132471   ÃÂÃÂ "For every two hours spent sitting in front of the computer or television, the average person raises his or her risk of colon cancer by 8 percent, of endometrial cancer by 10 percent and of lung cancer by 6 percent."     Assembles in seconds without the need for tools.       Real portability means you can throw it in a laptop bag or backpack.       Easily holds a 30 pound dumbbell on each shelf with no flexing. The typical laptop weighs less than 5 pounds.       Made in America, by Americans, in our Northeast Ohio fabrication facility.     Quality manufacturing is assured with the automated CNC MAP 1000 Turret Punch which can punch up to 180 times per minute.          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                 Risks and challenges  Our Raised Desk local manufacturing team is experienced in metal design, fabrication and manufacturing and have developed the product prototype together with trusted suppliers from day one. There is no issue with making the product as all of the shown prototypes have already been manufactured and function correctly. The Raised Desk fabricator is a trusted vendor to the United States military, which requires the highest technical and performance standards.   The Raised Desk is Patent Pending and the design is protected.   Our support goal can be easily delivered within the identified time frames. Should supporter response be overwhelming, delays may occur as some retooling may be required to meet demand.   We know you won't settle for a mediocre product and neither will we. We refuse to compromise on quality in order to save time. Should any issues arise, we promise to keep you updated every step of the way.

Creator_description: 12oClockLabs products are designed, built, and tested right here in the USA. We are extremely meticulous about product quality, functionality, and reliability.  We stand behind our products. With USA based email and phone support, if you buy a 12oClockLabs product, we will be here to support you for as long as you own the product. We take care of our all our customers questions, concerns, or problems as if they were our own. We believe in providing superior customer support as well as superior quality products.
Project_description: The 12oClockLabs "Advanced Animated Turn Signals" for motorcycles is a programmable animated turn signal with a lot of advanced features packed into a compact aftermarket turn signal. Feature list...   Built In USA  24 total modes of operation  Running Lights (can be enabled or disabled)  Boot Pattern (can be enabled or disabled)  Ability to Self Regulate Blink Rate  Animated Turn Signal Patterns  SynchronousÃÂÃÂ Animated Turn Signal Patterns  Standard Turn Signal Patterns  Programmable with a simple magnet (or without a magnet)  Water and weather proof.  Available with optional Honda, Yamaha, Suzuki, or Kawasaki Factory Connectors. Universal connection options available as well.  Works on 12v DC Electrical Systems Only (Does NOT work on AC)  Flexible flasher stays to reduce risk of damage upon impact  For Front or Rear of motorcycle  Replaceable Lenses (Orange, Gray, Clear available)  Comes in pairs (one LEFT and one RIGHT turn signal per package)   Not to be confused with our Animated Turn Signal (ATS) Product. This product is a more advanced successor to the ATS product model. This product offers 16 more operation modes, boot pattern disable capability, as well as newÃÂÃÂ SynchronousÃÂÃÂ AnimatedÃÂÃÂ Chase patterns and Synchronous Sequential Blink patterns.  Funds raised will go toward the immediate production of the new Advanced Animated Turn Signals, our production run timeline is estimated to be 6 to 8 weeks after the campaign has ended.   Safety   The more eye catching visibility the better, as many motorcycles know, for safety reasons it is important to catch the eyes of that car or truck driver around you. These turn signals offer the extra eye catching visibility that other aftermarket turn signals lack.   Patterns and Programming   Programming can be done with a simple magnet from your refrigerator, or using the signal wire before install. We have several eye catching patterns slated for this product (and we might add more before the production run). Current patterns are...   Animated Chase (blink rate self regulated)  Synchronous Animated Chase (blink rate regulated by flasher relay)  Synchronous Sequential (blink rate regulated by flasher relay)  Fixed Normal FlashÃÂÃÂ (blink rate self regulated)  Normal Flash (blink rate regulated by flasher relay)  Inverted FlashÃÂÃÂ (blink rate regulated by flasher relay)   All patterns have the ability to operate with or without running lights enabled. All patterns have the ability to operate with or without the boot pattern enabled.   Simple To Setup   Holding the magnet to the tip of the turn signal before turning on the ignition key will enter the turn signal into programming mode, release the magnet when desired signal mode is selected.   Water and Weatherproof   In addition to the housings being weather and waterproof, the circuit boards of this product have an additional waterproof coating process which completely seals the circuit board, preventing water or weather from damaging it. Serious off-road riders will appreciate this feature, since bikes often get dropped in creeks or ponds during rough off-road riding.   USA Quality   12oClockLabs electronic parts and designed, tested, and built right here in the USA. We are veryÃÂÃÂ meticulous about product quality, functionality, and reliability. We also stand behind our products with USA based email and phone support.           Risks and challenges  The 12oClockLabs team is very proficient at motorcycle product manufacturing, we have been around since 2008 and our electronic parts are designed, tested, and built here in the USA. We are confident in our production timeline schedule and if any production delays arise will be sure to notify our backers quickly.

Project_description: IOTA Minted Coin   Welcome everyone to this project. My name is Rafael Rohden and I live in the United States. I recently have discovered an amazing project called IOTA and the IOTA tangle. IOTA is a cryptocurrency that is decentralizedÃÂÃÂ and is focused on the future of IoT payments.   To learn more about IOTA please visit:   http://www.iota.org   As a cryptocurrency enthusiastÃÂÃÂ I have decided to design and render a 3D Coin for IOTA fans like myself. Since I published this 3D render on the IOTA community I have received tons of great feedback for the design and the idea. As requested by many, this project is the start to bring this 3D render to life!     IOTA "Coin" and What it is   This IOTA Coin once minted and distributed will be a solid metal piece and will have  no  monetary value as it is meant for display purposes only. There is no bar code or any chip/hardware inside and does not emitÃÂÃÂ any signal to any type of receiver. It is only a display metal coin.  The coin will be produced in one size, 2"(inches) diameter, and will have two tones of gold and silver (plated).ÃÂÃÂ   Final design of the coin:     Final Design (Revised)    ÃÂÃÂ See it in more detail here:ÃÂÃÂ  https://imgur.com/a/yjzrf    Update:   To all backers and community members, thank you! For anyone visiting this project now and would like to purchase a coin in the future, please make sure to follow our new website at  www.tanglefy.com  to order as soon as the website launches. There will be limited quantities, no reserves.   Disclaimer   The final design and production of the coin will vary and may be different to the illustration photo presented in this page. Based on manufacturing capabilities, the fine details of the circuit board on the face of the coin may be larger/different. This IOTA Coin will be  plated  with gold and silver materials.  Official Reddit Thread:ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.reddit.com/r/Iota/comments/7l3cqu/kickstarter_mint_iota_physical_coin_launch/         Risks and challenges  I am working directly with the manufacturer that will produce the coin. ÃÂÃÂ The FLOW Single Handle Pull-Down faucet with hands-free motion sensing technology is the next essential upgrade in kitchen technology. The simple and easy installation does not require any hard wiring, but features a quick insertion method installation. Since it is not hardwired, it will be able to function normally even during a power outage. The FLOW faucet features a 2-function spray head, durable ceramic cartridge, metallic waterway, and an easy wipe clean finish. Available in Brushed Nickel, Chrome, or Oil Rubbed Bronze. Easily swap between hands-free motion sensing mode or the option to use it as a traditional manual faucet. Pull down the faucet head to automatically spray, and release to instantly turn the water off as the head retracts back into place.                 The A3 Bidet Attachment features a sleek body as well as a compact control panel with simple and intuitive controls. This fresh water bidet does not require any extra setup or complicated hose system to install.ÃÂÃÂ  Choose between a cleansing spray or nozzle cleaning feature.                 ÃÂÃÂ Our representatives are standing by to answer any and all questions you may have. Give us a call at 847-458-2334 and see why we pride ourselves on quality customer service.                Risks and challenges  People come across the word ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>bidetÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and tend to roll their eyes like theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re for wealthy people too privileged to wipe their own butts.  But, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s time to take a look at bidets under a different light.    While bidets are more popular outside of North America, we are a US company looking to overcome the national stigma.  With this kickstarter, we'd like to prove that the world is ready to move forward with alternative cleaning solutions.  If we can overcome these initial production costs, we will be able to add the Slim Two to our full product lineup.

Blurb: Project Favela is a free school in Rocinha, Brazil. It is in danger of being closed due to a cartel war. We are going to keep it open.
Project_Community_top_cities: |San Francisco-United States:4 backers|Los Angeles-United States:3 backers|Chicago-United States:2 backers|San Bruno-United States:2 backers|San Jose-United States:2 backers|Rio de Janeiro-Brazil:1 backer|Kastrup-Denmark:1 backer|Singapore-Singapore:1 backer|Benoni-South Africa:1 backer|Arlington-United States:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:40 backers|Brazil:1 backer|Denmark:1 backer|South Africa:1 backer|Singapore:1 backer
Creator_description: I'm a musician, friend, son, father and world citizen. I've been lucky enough to travel the globe and see so many opportunities to help. This is an chance to make a positive change in a real and immediate way. I hope you'll join me in keeping this school open for the kids of Brazil.
Project_description: While travling with my family in Brazil years ago, we were introduced to a very special school in Rocinha,ÃÂÃÂ which is the largest favela (slum) in Latin America. The school is called  Project Favela ; itÃÂÃÂ is managed and operated by a team of international volunteers and has been in operation since 2009.  Project Favela has almost 60 children per day pass through their doors, and they offer drama, music, civics and a STEAM Academy (science, technology, engineering, art, mathematics) program free of charge. They also offer a girl empowerment program and adult English classes in the evenings.  Until now, Project Favela has never had to solicit help directly. On September 19th a fragile peace was broken by a cartel war. The school is riddled with bullet holes and the violence has turned the volunteer recruiting upside down and dried up their revenue streams.   In spite of the violence, Project Favela has not closed its doors. It is quite literally one of the only places the children have to feel safe. Donations will be used to keep the school operating through 2018 and enable Project Favela to offer a place that every child deserves: where they feel safe, can play, learn, grow and thrive.      Risks and challenges  The main challenge to keeping Project Favela operating is the ongoing violence in the region. While we cannot control that, our commitment to handling the operating costs of the school will give much needed relief to the volunteers working to keep it open.

Blurb: SheHacks Boston is a 36-hour, student-run hackathon open to all female & non-binary people on Jan 26-28th, 2018 at Boston University.

Creator_description: I am a female, highschool hacker.
Project_description: SheHacks Boston is a 36-hour, student-run hackathon open to all female and non-binary individuals. Led by women from across Boston's universities, SheHacks is set to be the largest all-female and non-binary hackathon in the world!  The mission of SheHacks Boston is to empower women and femme non-binary individuals in computer science to achieve and provide them with opportunities to explore the tech industry in an inspiring, encouraging, and energizing environment.  Despite the fact that they can be daunting at first, it is vital for high schoolers to partake in hackathons. Through this environment, you are not only able to bring an idea to life through code and technology, but you make so many connections, learn an incomparable amount, and have tons of fun! I would not replace my hackathon experiences for anything, and this is what I want to share with my peers.  Please donate to this cause that will help fund a two-way bus from New Jersey to Boston University for SheHacks which is on January 26-28th, 2018.      Risks and challenges  With the $2,000 for our two way bus from New Jersey to Boston we will get high schoolers and females coding! Despite the stereotypes, stigma, and setbacks that us women face in the STEAM field, we will come together to learn, connect, and innovate at SheHacks 2018!

Blurb: Crappy Internet Cramping your Style?  Self contained internet module with high speed unlimited data that can be used almost anywhere.
Creator_description: George is married to Tanya and they are very driven to support their family of 7 children.  Our major goal in life is to be able to balance our family life with our business life.  This was motivation behind the Konnected Wifi Module.George is the president and owner of Konnected Technology Inc. He started the company in 2012 as asoftware and hardware company focused on Marina Security which has evolved into Internet Service and Digital Media Advertising. They currently operate in locations in the U.S.  and Canada.  He is an avid entrepreneur having owned and operated two other successfulcompanies prior to Konnected. These two companies, Action Security and Malibu Boats were bothsold in 2015 to focus (and finance) on this project. George has been in the Automotive Engineering industry for 10+ years,  being with the Chrysler corporation for over 9 of those years.  He also has over 15 years experience in boat design, manufacturing and sales.George received his BAS degree in Mechanical Engineering, Honors at the University of BritishColumbia (1993). He received his MS degree in Mechanical Engineering, Honors at University ofMichigan (1995). He received the graduate of excellence award upon graduation. George isregistered as a Professional Engineer in both the United States and Canada.
Project_description: Crappy Internet Cramping your Lifestyle?ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ We are   boaters, campers   and have a   lot of kids   (7 to be exact).  We like to operate our business from where we want and on our own terms.  Who wouldn't want that?ÃÂÃÂ   But we ran into a problem.  We couldn't run our business, keep our kids entertained, or our sanity in check with the constant griping.  All because of slow, unreliable, or non-existent internet.  Something needed to change.  ÃÂÃÂ Being an engineer, serial entrepreneur, and hardwired to solve problems I knew that there must be a better way.   Konnected Technology was born with a mission to help people achieve the lifestyle that they dream of through the use of technology.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ   Why not create a portable, weatherproof self contained internet module that has reliable, high speed data with no limits?  Use it in your boat, at the campsite, in the car, at the cottage.  Anywhere.  Sounds like a good idea to me.ÃÂÃÂ     We've teamed with Kickstarter to give you the opportunity to be an early adopter of our Konnected Wifi Module, lock in great internet rates and get on with living the lifestyle that you dream of.  By crowdsourcing we are able to use the power of the crowd to get the word out and help fund our accelerating growth.ÃÂÃÂ         What We Need & What You GetÃÂÃÂ    We need your help to get the word out  and to help fund the growth that we are experiencing.  The old adage that it takes money to make money has never rung more true.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ The rewards that we are offering give you a chance to join the revolution and becomeÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  The Service    ÃÂÃÂ Reduced Rate Internet Subscriptions that allow you to keep the preferential rate for up to 3 yrs - maybe beyond.  ÃÂÃÂ Cellular based high speed internet with speeds of 10Mb/s to 40Mb/s with bursts to 80 Mb/s.  Unlimited Video Streaming always at the Highest Data Speeds.ÃÂÃÂ   Unlimited Non-Streaming Data.  Speed Prioritization (not to be confused with Throttling) could possibly occur after 100GB but only during periods of extreme network traffic and only for the minimum amount of time required.ÃÂÃÂ   The most reliable internet available with greater than 99% uptime.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     The ModuleÃÂÃÂ     Weatherproof.  Want to mount it outside?  No problem.ÃÂÃÂ   Portable.  Works anywhere and while on the move.ÃÂÃÂ   Plug and Play.  Just needs either 110VAC or 12VDC power.ÃÂÃÂ   Fully remote managed for service or firmware upgrades.ÃÂÃÂ   Ships pre-configured and live.  You are up and running in less than 2 minutes.ÃÂÃÂ   Purchase outright (no contracts) or finance for 1, 2, or 3 years at 0%.ÃÂÃÂ   Equipment purchased outright qualifies for seasonal suspensions of up to 6 months.ÃÂÃÂ    Where will the Money Go?  The good news is that the  Konnected Wifi Module is developed, tested and is currently shipping.  We need the money to help fund our marketing and equipment financing strategies.  Our friends in the cell phone world have us all trained to want equipment with no upfront cost.  I love it as a consumer but, as a business owner, it is very expensive.ÃÂÃÂ      Module Configuration Station       Shipping Station    ÃÂÃÂ Why not choose a perk and give it a try. I guarantee that you will be glad that you did.  Need more detail on what the module is capable of?ÃÂÃÂ  Here is the techno speak:   Device Summary:ÃÂÃÂ    The Konnected-SIM4 is a high performance mission critical enterprise grade rugged router with a cellular embedded LTE Advanced (LTE 2) modem that supports LTE bands B1, B2, B3, B4, B5, B7, B8, B12, B13, B17, B20, B25, B26, B29, B30 & B41.  It is made for customers that want the best signal reception and speed. Since this router has band 12, customers using the new 700Mhz frequency will get the best performance.  This module also supports Carrier Aggregation.  Carrier Aggregation is like having 2 modems in 1 device as it bonds and connects multiple times to the provider to get the fastest and most stable connection possible with the lowest latency.ÃÂÃÂ   Made to work for M2M applications, the Konnected router packs a powerful punch with its 2 x 5dBi wifi external antennas that are able to push the wifi signal as far as possible while maintaining the fastest speeds. Also includes 2 x 5dBi 3G/4G/LTE external antennas for the cellular signal that are able to get the strongest signal reception possible.ÃÂÃÂ   The Konnected SIM-4 is a completely remotely managed network device. 99% of the time we package the device with T-mobile but do have options for AT&T and  Verizon.ÃÂÃÂ   Want to actually earn money with your internet service?  We have software that creates a captive portal with the ability to monetize the service that you provide to others.  We handle all of the technical details, money collection and revenue share with you.  You are able to control access times, bandwidth and data limits for each user. ÃÂÃÂ    Advanced Wireless SecurityÃÂÃÂ    The Konnected-SIM4 creates a secure Wi-FiÃÂÃÂ® network by supporting the latest wireless security features to prevent unauthorized access.  It supports many security options including 64/128-bit WEP, WPA, and WPA2 + more commercial grade security options to ensure that you will be able to secure your Wi-Fi network, regardless of your client devices.  In addition, the 3G/4G/LTE mobile router utilizes dual active firewalls (SPI and NAT) to prevent potential attacks from across the Internet.ÃÂÃÂ    Easy to install and UseÃÂÃÂ    Simply receive the device and plug it into power (12VDC and 110VAC versions available).  The system comes ready with a data account and preset to the SSID and Password of your choosing.  For those that use the router in a critical situation, enable the  Watchdog system that will reboot the router automatically if there is a loss of an internet connection.ÃÂÃÂ    Feature Details :ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Built in 3G/4G/LTE Cellular Embedded Modem with multiple LTE bands that supports LTE, xLTE and LTE2 (LTE Advanced)ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Carrier Aggregation support to get the fastest speeds possible (up to 300Mbps download and 50 Mb/s upload using latest cat 6 module)  ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Band 12 support for T-Mobile customers looking to get the best coverage possible using the new 700MHz bandÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Wireless Bridge/Repeater mode to extend your wireless range and/or have the ability to use an Ethernet connection with any wifi signal including those from a hotspot deviceÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Konnected to Konnected VPN mode to allow a secure encrypted connection between officesÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Super Fast (wireless speeds up to 300Mb/s full N speeds) up to 1000 ft rangeÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Virtual Private Network (VPN) + OPENSWAN IPSec and OpenVPN SupportÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Multi-Wan with fail safe (if one connection fails, can set to auto connect to another)ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	WiFi Fail Over (great for boater or anyone that gets free wifi and only use 4G/LTE when not in range)ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Detachable 7 inch 5dBi antennas allowing flexible gain performance antennas both wifi and 4G/LTEÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Dynamic DNS full support including customized optionÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢	Available Ethernet out cable to attach to wired network      Risks and challenges  Most of the risk is gone away as the product development component of the project is complete.   We have successfully designed, developed, tested this product and have real customers in the marketplace.  Our biggest challenge is getting the word out and keeping up with the equipment financing options that we offer.  The more successful the indiegogo campaign, the faster we can ramp up production.  This is not our first rodeo.  We have been entrepreneurs for the last 25+ yrs and have brought many successful products and companies to the marketplace including Malibu Boats and Action Security.  The Konnected Wifi module is one of several products in the Konnected Ecosystem that we have designed and brought to market.  Please visit Konnectedtechnology.com for more information.

Creator_description: I'm the founder of Sunlight Inside, and am blessed to work with an experienced team dedicated to bringing the benefits of natural light back into peopleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s lives. I am passionate about the intersection of science, technology and humanity - and am motivated by my desire to make the world a better place. When i'm not working, I love spending time in nature and I am known for sharing intense outdoor experiences with my family, unsuspecting friends and acquaintances.  Sunlight Inside leverages my science and engineering background and experience building companies and markets, along with my passion for good design and sustainable products.  Most of all i'd like to thank my partners and the wonderful support of our early adopters who have made this project possible!
Project_description: beautiful, healthy natural light = mySun desk lamp         mySun is aÃÂÃÂ revolutionary new desk lamp that delivers beautiful, healthy natural light!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      experience the beauty of natural light   ÃÂÃÂ   mySun is the closest you can get to sitting next to a sun-filled window.ÃÂÃÂ  Look your best and see colors and details at their finest with true full-spectrum natural light.ÃÂÃÂ   ENHANCE VISION, AESTHETICS, COMFORT     experience   the health benefits of natural lightÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  mySun automatically delivers the daily and seasonal cycles of natural light.ÃÂÃÂ  Boost your productivity and lift your mood with extra sunlight during the day, work safely with candlelight in the evenings, and signal your body to recover and sleep with fire light at night.ÃÂÃÂ   IMPROVE ENERGY, MOOD, SLEEP    mySunÃÂÃÂ is light the way nature intended !       ÃÂÃÂ         We look and see our best with natural light.   Sunlight, candlelight and firelight contain all the colors of the rainbow.ÃÂÃÂ  Skin tones, colors and details look their best when illuminated with natural full spectrum light.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ If a light source has too much of one color, and/or lacks certain colors, then people, places and things don't look right.ÃÂÃÂ  Fluorescent light makes everything look unnaturally green, and LED's give everything a bluish hue.ÃÂÃÂ  Check out ourÃÂÃÂ  blog post ÃÂÃÂ on artists exploring how light impacts aesthetics, or ask any designer about color theory. mySun uses a new light engine technology which actively mixes together all the colors of the rainbow to deliver the perfect balance of natural full spectrum light.ÃÂÃÂ  Look and see your best with mySun!        We are programmed to respond to the daily and seasonal variations of natural light . Until 100 years ago our days were filled with bright sunlight, and our evenings were lit with the soft warm glow of a flame.  We feel bright and energized on a sunny day, and down on rainy days, during dark winter months or when weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been stuck inside for too long.  Exposure to light is what drives our hormone cycles and synchronizes our circadian rhythms ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> profoundly impacting how we feel, work, play and rest. For more on how light impacts our health and wellness check out our  science page .ÃÂÃÂ  Unfortunately, most of us donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get enough natural light during the day and get too much artificial light at night.  The science linking light and health is clear, and the technology to recreate natural light is now available. Feel better, be more productive, and rest easier with mySun!       ÃÂÃÂ   Testimonials from bottled sunshine users:  natural light enhances vision and aesthetics       natural light improves sleep       ÃÂÃÂ natural light boosts mood and energy       natural light is ideal for new parents       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         Natural light changes with the time of day , ranging from bright and cool during the day to soft and warm in the evenings.  These daily cycles of sunlight (rich with bio-active blue) and candle or fire light at night (reddish light with no bio-active blue) are a cornerstone of our health and wellness.  For the first time, a new class of LED light engines makes it possible to deliver the daily and seasonal cycles of natural light by actively mixing together the different colors of the rainbow!ÃÂÃÂ  These next-generation light sources are now being adopted in high-end design projects around the world ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> unfortunately you canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get this technology without talking to an architect or lighting designer and hiring contractors.   We founded Sunlight Inside to make natural light available in simple, easy to use products which you can buy direct!          Sunlight Inside's products harness a new class of LED light engines  which actively mix together all the different colors of the rainbow to create beautiful, healthy natural light.ÃÂÃÂ  This year we need your help to bring beautiful, healthy natural light to your desk, work space, or favorite reading chair with mySun!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ We believe that natural light is the smartest light - so we have designed a custom controller which we preset to your address before it ships.ÃÂÃÂ  You get beautiful, healthy natural light right out of the box ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> just plug it in, there is nothing to install and nothing to set-up!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Our products come with a simple dimmer control, you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t ever need to connect to a smartphone or wifi router!    ÃÂÃÂ Now if you want more control than Mother Nature provides, our products are Bluetooth enabled.ÃÂÃÂ  OurÃÂÃÂ Apps provide unlimited control, but remember they are entirely optional - our products deliver natural light right out of the box - just plug them in and enjoy the perfect light at every time of day!ÃÂÃÂ          Today's lighting products are optimized solely for energy efficiency at the expense of light quality and health benefits.   Fluorescent lights don't contain all the colors of the rainbow, it's no accident that we look green and feel off under fluorescent lighting.  Most LED light sources emit too much blue light, delivering a cold and unnatural light.  Today's artificial light sources do not provide enough light during the day to make us feel 'awake and alert' and provide too much light at night for us to naturally relax and sleep.  Check out this  blog post  for more on the difference between natural and artificial light.  The good news is that we no longer need to settle for artificial light, we can have energy efficiency without sacrificing the beauty or health benefits of natural light!        We've been shipping natural lighting solutions around the world since December 2016. ÃÂÃÂ  Do you know someone who works in a windowless cubicle, or spends their day under fluorescent lights?ÃÂÃÂ  Is there someone in your life who struggles with sleep, or has the winter blues?ÃÂÃÂ  Is your family blessed with a new baby or a moody teenager?ÃÂÃÂ  Is it difficult for you to get outside regularly, or do you live in a climate with limited sun?ÃÂÃÂ  To read more about how light can help support your mood, productivity and sleep check out our  blog . Our mySun and bottled sunshine lamps automatically produce sunlight during the day (to boost your mood/energy) and then switch to candle light at night to make it easier to unwind and sleep.  Our lamps are hand-made in California from locally sourced materials, order now so you don't miss our limited 2017 vintage production!        Meet Sunlight Inside's passionate and experienced TEAM!        ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We're a small company doing our best to build a business the old-fashioned (honest) way.  We are dedicated to delivering quality products made of natural materials (glass, wood and metal) which are energy efficient and built to last 10-20 years.  We hand build all of our products, and source sustainable materials and labor - all right here in California.  We're a small and experienced team, and we have done this before!   Last year we launched bottled sunshine, a simple and elegant table lamp which automatically delivers the daily and seasonal cycles natural light right out of the box.  We now have hundreds of users enjoying beautiful, healthy natural light around the world.  We learned a lot building and shipping our first products last year, extra special thanks to our early adopters who were very patient and provided great feedback.  Check out the user testimonials on our website and the reviews on our Facebook page.  We've incorporated our 'lessons learned', optimized our supply chain and tweaked the design of our custom controller.  Our experience building and shipping bottled sunshine has prepared us for the launch of mySun.  Please help us bring beautiful, healthy natural light indoors!  For the launch of mySun we're limiting our pre-holiday deliveries to 50 mySun desk lamps and 50 bottled sunshine table lamps to ensure our shipments go out on time.  Parts are arriving now and we have high confidence we'll be able to deliver these initial pre-holiday units.  We're offering discounts for those of you who don't mind waiting for a January delivery.  Our custom electronics have been in customers hands for over a year now with excellent reliability, our biggest 'issue' has been breakage of the glass shades.  We took some pain last year, ironing out last minute production issues which delayed our shipments, but we've learned our lessons and are proactively managing this risks, while also limiting the size of the first production batch.  We are offering lower prices for those that don't have-to-have a lamp before the holidays, and the second batch of shipments is scheduled for January - so you won't have to wait long.  We approach this differently than other kickstarter campaigns in that we will start shipping product BEFORE our campaign ends.  Please help us deliver light the way nature intended!

Blurb: Introducing interchangeable ports, power-sockets and tech gizmos in one modular form factor. Powerstrip focuses on modular technology.

Creator_description: Leading crowdfunding support company DesignNest is supporting the creator behind the next-gen PowerStrip Modular. Co-developed by a Dutch tech startup, the product is a revolutionary powerstrip which is reinvented to extend modular add-on solutions to eliminate tech plug-in incompatibilities. PowerStrip Modular assures relief from numerous adaptors with its multiple attachable plug-in modules for one single base adaptor. DesignNest has worked with many other creators to ensure a successful delivery of products once funded through Kickstarter
Project_description: PowerStrip Modular  is a revolutionary powerstrip that comes with modular add-on solutions which can be removed from or added to one base adapter as per the connection needs of the users.ÃÂÃÂ   Check out below which modules will be available!       Featured By              You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                           Unbox Therapy featuring the PowerStrip Modular!           You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                           iLuvTrading reviewing the PowerStrip Modular!                   PowerStrips Modular for all countries!       PowerStrip Modular in action!     Wifi Module in action!       Need extra juice? There's a Powerbank module!    Super easy to click on and off again!     Click on and off!                             What makes us tick, is helping others, and PowerStrip is just one of many examples of the products and projects we became passionate about. As a small but dedicated team located in the US, Netherlands and China we look for designers who have an aspiration for something but lack the knowhow to make their dream come true.  We came a cross the PowerStrip Modular idea when meeting with a Chinese designer called Dominic. He was keen on doing something about the piles of thrown away adaptors, chargers and other e-tech waste that was lying around in some cities in China.   He came up with the idea of creating a PowerStrip that would include modules that provide universal solutions for day to day necessities.        By making them modular, he could at least contribute partially to the reduction of the piles of e-waste since with this solution, people wouldn't have to throw away the parts they didn't need anymore since they could easily resell them or give them away to people who could still have use for them. After creating his first designs, he needed help getting his product to market...       So we have the idea, the goal, the design, the technical know-how and a team of people that will help bring Dominic's idea to life. Now all that rests is you! The people who will make this dream a reality by supporting us. Not only will you make your life more convenient and future-proof by introducing modular tech into your home, but you will also be a part of a movement that will reduce e-waste throughout the world!       By supporting PowerStrip Modular you will contribute to a community of people that is keen on reducing e-waste. On top of that, by spreading the PowerStrip Modular into the world, we ensure an end to outdated tech as you can always give, sell or send back modules you don't need anymore and we will make sure they find a second home!            That which we have in our hands, we can control. Though with every project, there are always things that are out of your control. Here's what we think could face some bumps in the road:    Timing . Even with the best of estimates, there are always unforseen circumstances that can occur that delay certain processes in manufacturing, distribution, quality control, ... which cause delays.   What we can do about it ? Provide a buffer that allows for some delays without you noticing it. All that can come from it is that in the best case scenario, we can deliver things earlier than reported!     Communication . Even though we are hard at work communicating with everyone and answering everyones concern, when a project gets really big, we found that there's a hard time answering every message or mail since a lot of the requests are very time consuming and we have limited resources to deal with those painpoints.   What can we do about it?  We are thinking of a solution to provide better support to everyone by better working with the FAQ section and with automated email responses but we still need to figure out the best and most natural way to make sure everyone gets helped in a timely fashion. We know that with the Heng Balance Lamp this is a real challenge for us since we have more than 5000 people reaching out to us but we are working on improving this!      Technical challenges . Creating tech is hard, creating modular tech is even harder. There are many bits and pieces, new functions and modular solutions that have to harmoniously work together in order to ensure a successful PowerStrip Modular.    What can we do about it?  Work with the best in the field of PowerStrips. For us that meant working with Allocacoc, their designer experience and know-how of how each and every individual function works for the modules we need, will help us achieve our technologic goals.         Sometimes you happen to be in a situation where you really like the project, would love the product, but there's still something that prevents you from supporting financially. If that's the case, you can still do a whole lot of things to support us! Here are a few examples:    Share our project  on any social media, and when we say any, we mean any! Because PowerStrip is for everyone, everywhere in the world. Language barriers restrict us from posting on social medias in Russia, the middle east or South America, but if you know the language and want to support, please do so!      Follow us on  facebook   and share our posts.                             Risks and challenges  We noticed that the main challenge of the PowerStrip is making it modular and making it available worldwide.   To overcome this challenge, we partnered up with Allocacoc, a brand known for it's amazing PowerCube and other power supplying products. They believe in our ideas and have given us the necessary resources in know-how to ensure that our ideas are feasible.
