Creator_description: Midnight Sun went back to the drawing board, designing and building their twelfth vehicle. It is designed to look similar to a practical, consumer-friendly vehicle. Our goal is to race in the American Solar Challenge in 2018 and World Solar Challenge in 2019.
Project_description: Your contribution will go directly to funding our state-of-the-art solar array. Help support a team of students to build this futuristic car.ÃÂÃÂ   What is Midnight Sun XII?  MSXII is a sleek, consumer-focused, solar vehicle that runs off the power of the sun. Combining efficiency with practicality, MSXII will blur the line between concept and reality.ÃÂÃÂ      MSXII a dual occupant, sports coupe inspired solar car    ÃÂÃÂ        The CompetitionÃÂÃÂ   We will compete in the 2018 American Solar Challenge, which attracts solar car teams from all over the world.ÃÂÃÂ        The CarÃÂÃÂ        Who is Midnight Sun?ÃÂÃÂ   We are a team of over 50 students from the University of Waterloo proudly representing engineering and computer science.ÃÂÃÂ        Your Contribution - Adopt a CellÃÂÃÂ   MSXII's high performance solar cells capture sunlight and create electrical energy. Proceeds from this campaign will go directly to funding the cost of our array.ÃÂÃÂ   Adopt 1 of the 326 solar cells on MSXII  to support our team.ÃÂÃÂ        Rewards     MSXII 3D Model Keychain - Pledge $25 or more    ÃÂÃÂ      MSXII  Sunglasses - Pledge $50 or more    ÃÂÃÂ      MSXII T-shirt - Pledge $75 or more    ÃÂÃÂ      MSXII 3D Model Car (1:30 scale) - Pledge $250 or more    ÃÂÃÂ        2018 marks the 30th anniversary for Midnight Sun. Since 1988, we have built 11 vehicles and driven over 50,000 km powered by the sun.ÃÂÃÂ   Thank You to Our SponsorsÃÂÃÂ   Midnight Sun is fortunate to have the support of many industry sponsors. We would like show our gratitude and thank them for their support thus far.       ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Designing and manufacturing a car from scratch has its challenges. Our diverse team of students bring skills from both inside and outside of the classroom to solve real-world problems. Join us as we work to turn our dreams into reality.

Blurb: The GamePRo is a robotic device that attaches to a 3DS console and can be programmed to carry out in game tasks.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Singapore-Singapore:3 backers|Melbourne-Australia:3 backers|London-United Kingdom:2 backers|Los Angeles-United States:2 backers|Pensacola-United States:2 backers|Montreal-Canada:1 backer|Hamilton-Canada:1 backer|Zabbar-Malta:1 backer|Aix-en-Provence-France:1 backer|Perth-Australia:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:35 backers|Australia:5 backers|Canada:3 backers|Singapore:3 backers|United Kingdom:2 backers|France:1 backer|Greece:1 backer|India:1 backer|Malta:1 backer|Qatar:1 backer
Creator_description: I am an engineer based in New Zealand. I have a BE(hons) in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Auckland. I work as a projects engineer in the energy management sector.
Project_description: The GamePRo is a robotic device that attaches to a 3DS console and can be programmed to carry out in game tasks. It uses servo motors to press buttons on the console and has a webcam mounted to detect changes on the console's top screen and a light sensor mounted on the bottom. A number of programs have already been written for the Pokemon series games including automatic breeding and soft resetting for shiny Pokemon. Note, existing programs are for windows only, not mac. For more information on the device itself please visit the official Facebook page or Youtube Channel.  www.facebook.com/noobysgamepro  www.youtube.com/channel/UCzXJBiQ81WSeNGn89OUyY1Q  The GamePRo product has been on the market as a fabricated plastic or aluminium unit produced by CNC machining or 3D printing. These were expensive to manufacture and were making the cost of the unit too pricey for most customers. By Injection molding these parts the cost will reduce substantially, however this requires a significant investment for the tooling of the mold. This Kickstarter is all about raising the funds to cover the tooling costs which will make the GamePRo accessible to many more people.      Risks and challenges  The GamePRo has been out for several years now so the software is working smoothly and users aren't finding it difficult to use.  So we feel there is little risk in this area of the project.  Our aim for this campaign is to significantly reduce costs by changing the tooling used to manufacture the GamePRo.  So the biggest risk would be if there were an issue with the new tooling, such as the design being slightly out.  We do not feel that a problem here will stop the work from happening as significant work has gone into the design stage including 3D printed prototype versions.  At worst it may cause delays in getting rewards out to people.  Regardless we will still have our old method of producing GamePRos as an option if this method fails.  So we will do our best to ensure funders get their rewards.  Another risk for purchasers of the GamePro would be if significant changes were made to the console that made the GamePro model obsolete.  This however, would not be in the near future, and obviously wouldn't affect people with the games there currently have.  So not a major problem really.  But it is worth noting that if the consoles change in the future then the GamePRo will have to be upgraded to suit. Currently the original 3DS versions (Standard and XL) and the new 3DS versions (Standard and XL) are supported.

Blurb: After months in the lab and countless hours on forums together with you guys we are finally ready to launch the GHOST S1 MkII
Project_Community_top_cities: |Stockholm-Sweden:85 backers|Seoul-South Korea:32 backers|London-United Kingdom:30 backers|Los Angeles-United States:16 backers|San Francisco-United States:16 backers|LinkÃÂÃÂ¶ping-Sweden:13 backers|MalmÃÂÃÂ¶-Sweden:12 backers|Gothenburg-Sweden:11 backers|Melbourne-Australia:11 backers|Chicago-United States:10 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:414 backers|Sweden:271 backers|United Kingdom:79 backers|Germany:70 backers|Canada:43 backers|South Korea:40 backers|Australia:38 backers|France:26 backers|Denmark:23 backers|Netherlands:19 backers
Creator_description: LOUQE is an entrepreneurial design and engineering collective founded in Stockholm, Sweden with a firm belief that the PC hardware industry deserved a different angle to design, innovation, and customer experience. Our ambition is to challenge the expectations of the PC hardware industry - forever.
Project_description: EXTERNAL MEDIA      ÃÂÃÂ External Ghost S1 promo movie (rendered)      ÃÂÃÂ JayzTwoCents review of Ghost S1 (external)      First review Sweclockers.com (Subtitled external)  GHOST S1  With the fundamental idea of a computer case designed to hold uncompromised performance in a Scandinavian, minimalistic and stunningly small form factor - GHOST S1 was born.   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ Strategy is about making choices, trade-offs, it's about deliberately doing something different. We believe we are driving a Generation shift, the Ghost S1 changes a lot, it is like nothing we have ever seen before. It will likely have a significant impact on the market ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> a new normal ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> and we hope to see other manufacturers start replicating it. The PC community deserves more refined products that are designed do last! With the Ghost S1 base XS platform we have focused on the essentials and thrown everything that is not critical out the window to prioritize what really matters ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> some of which are: Cooling performance, ease of build, noise reduction and build quality.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ            ÃÂÃÂ        The minimalistic design of GHOST S1 is not just looks ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> despite its modest dimensions, it carries countless unique features never seen in a computer case before.   Read about its  size ,  performance ,  flexibility ,  quality ,  compatibility  and  innovative architecture  below.  IMMACULATE ATTENTION TO DETAILS   Milled from solid blocks of aluminum, this case offers a level of quality not seen other PC computer case out there. Glass blasted anodized aluminum exterior, Red heli-coils, pressed stainless steel stand-offs and polished neodymium magnets are just a couple of details that make this case stand out above all others. Nothing has been left untouched, every millimeter of this case has been carefully considered and purposely designed to maintain this level of quality in every single detail.       NO MORE DELIDDING OR DOWNVOLTING  Forget throttling, overheating, noise and performance loss. With the Ghost S1 you will never have to worry about those things anymore. The Ghost is likely to perform significantly better than your full-size system you are rockn' today. Compare it with any other sub 20-liter case and you will be blown away. At the bottom of this page you will find links to our test documents, please read through the CPU AIR cooler report carefully, if you have the possibility to run the same test on your own system, please do to get an idea of what this little ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>badboyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ is capable of!      Link to CPU AIR cooler test document      THE CONCEPT  The GHOST S1 is easiest described in detail by looking at four different structural stages: (1) The Spine, (2) the Core, (3) the side panels and (4) the TopHats.    1. THE SPINEÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ This is where most of the engineering hours have been spent. Maximizing functionality while simplifying the layout has been the primary guiding principle throughout the design process. The hardware of your choice is mounted directly to the Spine making it the single most vital component of the case. The voids have been carefully calculated to allow multiple points of entry during build without compromising the structural integrity of the case - so convenient that we have a patent pending.   2. THE CORE        ÃÂÃÂ Without using any tools, the case is quickly ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>undressedÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ, leaving you with the Core where alterations to your config easily can be made. Simply pull the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>GrillÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ up, slide the side panels out and you are in.  ÃÂÃÂ  3. THE SIDE PANELS        ÃÂÃÂ   Just like the gables, the side panels are made from extruded magnesium reinforced aluminum that is later CNC milled with 1.320 3 mm holes, the milling creates a gorgeous chamfer on every single hole, making the side panels ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>come aliveÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ.   4. TOPHATSÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   We don't believe a computer case should be bigger than necessary. However, being a performance junkie sometimes means you need to fit more stuff than the Average Joe. The TopHat modules are designed to expand the volume of your GHOST S1 XS, making it a S, M, or L. The TopHats are interchangeable between the top and the bottom position.      Build (air cooled)      Build (liquid cooled)   What about custom loops, will you be able to fit a custom made liquid cooling closed loop?   We have put a Ghost S1 in the hands of professional case modders to figure this one out. The system is equipped with some of the latest hardware such as an intel i7 8700K and EVGA 1080ti GPU. Follow the development of this exciting ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>balls-to-the-walls-buildÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ here:         Link to custom loop build logg (in Swedish)   Credits to Daniel FagerstrÃÂÃÂ¶m who is leading this custom loop project!  FORMATS & COLORS       GHOST S1 comes in three colors and endless form factors - What's your combo? GHOST S1 could be configured in different sizes by adding TopHat(s) of your choice. What you choose to use the extra space for is up to you, but we made it ready to fit the most common 120 mm accessories like fans and radiators right out-of-the-box. The architecture and configurability remove the traditional limits of SFF cases and letÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s your imagination set the boundaries.        COLORS        ÃÂÃÂ   The Ghost comes in 3 colors, Ash, Limestone and Arctic. They two first are glass blasted to create a deep matt finish before anodized, the Arctic uses far more complex methods to achieve that gorgeous white finish:    Ash.  A dark (almost completely black) color that will disappear like a Ghost   Limestone.  This finish has no dye, instead the aluminum's natural color is used as a base and the glass blasting gives it a light mat finish   Arctic . A very special anodize method allows us to offer this unique white version, glossier than the other two and more expensive to produce, that's why we need to charge you another  250 SEK  for this option and no additional cost for TopHats in with this finish   Colors are selected after the campaign andÃÂÃÂ            YOUR COMBO    There are at least 75 permutations of this case, selecting the right one for you is understandably difficult. To give you more time to make up your minds, TopHats and colors will be selected through a survey after the campaign is over. Only one TopHat is possible to acquire through this platform. However, all backers that opt for a pledge including a TopHat will get the chance to acquire more TopHats before the delivery of the Ghost S1 through other channels.  SPECIFICATION GHOST MKII       ADD-ONS and STRETCH GOALS  Nonstop progression, the Ghost will not stop evolving. We have a list of add-ons that we need your help prioritizing! Naturally it is a win-win-situation to get these out, but at the same time we have limited resources at this point and our number one priority is to deliver the Ghost S1 platform on time ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> addons projects come second (TopHats aside). An over funded campaign will give us more financial maneuverability and allow us to jumpstart one or two add-on projects depending on their ease of implementation. As stretch goals we will get on a number of these projects right away and do everything in our power to have them ready before your Ghost is delivered.    150% funding level will result in 1 project being executed right away  200% funding level will result in 2 projects being executed right awayÃÂÃÂ   250% funding level will result in 3 projects being executed right away     Before the campaign is over we will present these add-ons to you in more detail and ask for your help to prioritize among them. The current list of add-ons is found below, please send us your ideas to hello@louqe.com if you wish to add anything:     Add-ons    ÃÂÃÂ        Ghost S1 add-ons    ÃÂÃÂ    COMMUNITY AND "OPEN SOURCE"  We have a vision of shaping a strong community, banding together and tap into each otherÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s brain-power with the common purpose of creating the ultimate SFF PC platform. The most vital component for creating an efficient cooperative environment is information. When everyone has the same perfect information and ALL the information, communication becomes more direct, a common nomenclature is developed, misunderstandings are minimized etc. This is why we have committed to the promise of sharing the 3D model with the community, for everyone to have absolute information. Feel free to do with it what you want for yourself. The files will be released to backer when everything is 100% set and no more changes are expected.      SPECIFICATIONS:    DIMENSIONS (H x W x D):  188 x 140 x 322 mmÃÂÃÂ    TOPHATS (ACCESSORY):  S: 16 mm, M: 26 mm, L: 57 mmÃÂÃÂ    VOLUME & WEIGHT:  8,2 L & 2,5 kgÃÂÃÂ    COLORS:  Ash & Limesone   MATERIAL:  Extruded and milled heat-treated aluminum alloy and oxidized steel   PCI RISER:  Included Armored and shielded Twin Axial 300 mm PCIe 16x Gen3+ riserÃÂÃÂ    COMPATIBILITY:    MOTHERBOARD:  Mini-ITX   POWER SUPPLY:  SFX, SFX-LGPU: 2.1-slot up to 305 mm long   STORAGE:  1 x 2.5" HDD/SSD, 3 x 2.5ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ with tray + M.2ÃÂÃÂ    WATER COOLING:  240 mm AIO radiator thickness 31.5 mm, 2 x 25 mm high fans w. L TopHatÃÂÃÂ    CPU HEATSINK:  Up to 66 mm   ÃÂÃÂ DOCUMENTATION AND TESTS    GPU COMPATIBILITY DOCUMENT    AIR COOLING TEST REPORT    LIQUID COOLING TEST REPORT    TOPHAT CONFIGURATION TEST REPORT    DUAL AIO AND ELEVATION TEST REPORT    RISER CABLE SELECTION CRITERIA    OPTIONAL ADD-ONS DOCUMENT       GHOST S1 vs GHOST S1 MkII  The Ghost S1 MKII has become something considerably different and drastically better than what we initially had in mind. It is a much more refined product today and at the same time the fundamental idea and values have remained. The result should speak for itself, now more than ever! The updated Ghost has received several important improvements, some of the most important ones are listed below:ÃÂÃÂ      The entire shell is CNC milled instead of stampedÃÂÃÂ   Outer shell is glass blasted before anodized for a deep matt finish  The CPU cooler clearance has been increased from 63 mm to 66 mm for better compatibility  USB-ports have been removed from the XS model for an ultra-clean look  Slide-in side panels  TopHats are interchangeable between top and bottom position      SHIPPING  We aim for global distribution, however unfortunately some locations will be harder for our delivery penguins to reach. If your country is not highlighted on the map below and you still want to back us, do so and contact us after the campaign to figure out the best way of receiving your delivery.       THE PLAN & TIMELINE  This campaign is a major milestone in our journey. Even if we have designed tons of stuff in our professional careers and are all born PC builders and gamers it wasn't until September 2016 we took on the challenge of building and designing the PC case of our dreams. After 180 days in the lab, one cancelled KS campaign, another 180 days in the lab we can finally present GHOST S1 MKII.         LIVESTREAMING DURING THE CAMPAIGN  We would love to show the Ghost hands on in a livestream later during the campaign, this will also give you the opportunity to ask all the questions you might have regarding the product, the process and the time-line ahead     WHO WE ARE AND WHERE WE ARE COMING FROM  The expectations on PC hardware performance has reached an all-time high. It feels like last Monday some of us wowed to the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>magicÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ of the Duck Hunt gun ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> today we take the 233 million pixels per second in our VR-glasses for granted. Meanwhile, PC hardware design and esthetics seem to be stuck in the early 2000ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s with what looks like Fast & the Furious cars as design inspiration.    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Being born PC builders and gamers now in our thirties, we had outgrown techy spaceships and dust collecting monsters. We wanted a Small Form Factor PC Case that did not only fit all the latest technology but also looked good enough to deserve a place in front of the sofa next to the TV Speakers. As we couldn't find anything matching our demands we decided to design our own..."         We are a team of entrepreneurial designers and engineers. We founded LOUQE with the ambition of changing the expectations of the PC entertainment and gaming hardware industry - forever.   Even if we sometimes believe we are good enough on our own to meet that promise, we are not! The success of our projects all rest in the hands of our beloved partners, network and the community. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve learned the lesson that you need great people to create great stuff. That's why we spent a lot of time, effort, and persuasion in finding and partnering up with some of the best engineers, designers, suppliers, innovators, gurus, fans and end-users the market has to offer - together we can create better products, more efficiently in shorter time than the old fashion way  BUT WAIT... THERE IS MORE  We love the GHOST S1 and have so much to say. more than fits and makes sense to put on this page. Visit us on our homepage or on social media.ÃÂÃÂ Tell your friends about us  - together we can make this happen!   www.louqe.com   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  Unlike many other Kickstarter projects, we've been working on Ghost S1 for some time now and are ready to push the production button. We are in close contact with manufacturers who have made us our prototypes in near-live production environments. However, with crowd funded projects there are always risks involved. We consider the biggest risks to be exact shipment dates and the specifications (slight adjustments to colors, millimeters here and there etc.) however - we promise to report any differences from what has been specified on this site so that we can have an open and transparent dialogue - if needed.  We will post updates on the process and keep an open line of communication with the community and our backers. If you ever have any questions, concerns, or advice, do not hesitate to reach out here on Kickstarter, on our website, or any of our social media channels.

Blurb: An 8x8 bio-pixel display allows you to visualise fluorescent proteins.
Project_Community_top_cities: |London-United Kingdom:8 backers|Dublin-Ireland:5 backers|Cork-Ireland:4 backers|Vancouver-Canada:2 backers|PÃÂÃÂ¶lten-Austria:2 backers|Vienna-Austria:2 backers|Los Angeles-United States:2 backers|Madison-United States:2 backers|New York-United States:2 backers|Quebec-Canada:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:23 backers|Ireland:11 backers|United Kingdom:9 backers|Austria:6 backers|Canada:6 backers|France:2 backers|Germany:2 backers|Italy:2 backers|Denmark:1 backer|Dominican Republic:1 backer
Creator_description: We program products with DNA. We are using cell-free manufactured proteins as displays, fragrances and textiles. Building a powerful testbed for prototyping, designing and building with biology.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Bixels is a STEAM education product playing with the intersection between computation, physics, biology and design. It teaches how to produce, integrate and interact with different fluorescent proteins. Bixels makes biological tools and materials accessible and affordable to a wider audience.       The Bixel Bio-Display     BackgroundÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    We are increasingly seeing the hybridization of biology with technology. Such hybrid products and services have begun to enter our everyday lives. Examples include, the bio-fabrication of human tissue for surgical repair and personalized medicine emerging from the rise of computational biology. The intentional blend of the natural and digital worlds will permeate our society and disrupt our traditional notions of technology.  This hybridization has demanded a new kind of cross disciplinary design-thinking which includes common fields of science and engineering, while also being more inclusive of the arts. We now have the ability to manufacture biological components that can act as interfaces (inputs and outputs) with our environments. These advancements offer new experiences that will fundamentally change the way we interface with our world, our bodies and each other.  However skills, tools and knowledge in this area are often not accessible to the general public. We are here to change that, with education and public engagement as our goals. This is how the idea of Bixels was born.       Bixels allows you to design, create and interact with your personal 8x8 bio-pixel display, such as making pictures, gifs and a variation of simple games - while learning about the basics of how to program with DNA and to build a biological circuit in comparison to traditional code and electronic circuits. In addition it demonstrates the possibilities of interacting with biological materials through physics and material explorations.  We decided to use gamification to allow a wi(l)der range of applications and explorations of biological interfaces. Therefore, Bixels -a biological pixel- is built in form of an 8x8 cartridge that works as a digital display. Each fluorescent pixel is programmed using DNA.  For example, we use a DNA circuit to produce green fluorescent protein (GFP), the same material that give jellyfish their colour ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>  this protein is already used in lab experimentsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦. but we thought that it can be used for more.  The underlying LED matrix allows you to excite different fluorescent proteins (make them glow) through different light wavelengths in combination with filters. We designed it in a way that you can turn on/off bio-pixel through a simple app.       ÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        It is built with  cell-free technology . Our cell-free technology pulls the molecular machinery (or transcriptional/translation TXTL machinery) outside of a cell meaning there is no regulation or restrictions to use outside a lab.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ This extracted billion year old processor is responsible for reading DNA and writing proteins. While games consoles use code to program, cell-free uses DNA.    DNA  >>Transcription>>    RNA  >>Translation >>     Protein        ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      Variety of fluorescent proteins which can be used with Bixels    ÃÂÃÂ         Bixels  believes in the potential and need for STEAM education products and curriculums. Bixels is therefore integrated in a STEAM curriculum using gamification as base. Bixels is a primitive DNA programmed bio-display that enables you to play tetris and other retro classics while teaching physics, computation, biology and digital fabrication. The curriculum around Bixels uses the example of Pixels, which have their origin in photography and are enabled by combining chemistry, physics and art. Today Pixels are defined as the basic unit of programmable color. Bixels builds on this and teaches about    Biology  through teaching about fluorescent proteins, their origin and how to produce themÃÂÃÂ    Physics  through teaching how to visualize fluorescent proteins with light waves and optical filters   Computation  and electronics through teaching how to interact and control them through programming LED arrays and their color   Digital Fabrication and Design  through teaching how to integrate the proteins into and with different materials for future products and manufacturing methods   For us the open ended and  do-it-yourself nature of the project  was important. Some kits can be very restrictive and limiting but we wanted that everyone can add their skills to the project and evolve it further. Nevertheless Bixels doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to address just makers and hackers and positions itself between a product and an educational tool to enable people to get started without particular skills.  We will reveil and add son a  full curriculum  how to use Bixels in class or workshops.   Stay tuned!      Workshop at CRI, Paris    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ      Different cover same inside... our GameGirl Bio-Display    ÃÂÃÂ        Bixels is inspired by common lab equipment and activities within biological laboratories and designed as product to allow a wider audience take place in those explorations.  Nevertheless, we love its roots and its community. Bixels can be as well used as a transilluminator and simple plate reader in a lab environment. Those are lab equipments which allow scientists to visualize if their experiments worked.     No expensive plates! Just easily replaced PCR tubes!    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ      Bixels used as transilluminator    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        We built our prototypes from the start with support from our community and our story all started with a biodesign challenge with Genspace NYC at the Royal College of Art, in April 2017. The purpose was to create  a curriculum which makes biology more accessible . Our first tests were just made of an old transilluminator -sponsored by the Plant Science Department in Cambridge- some lasercut, and 3D printed parts. This encouraged us to make Bixels into a truly accessible and affordable way to become a bio-hacker and start the learning journey!     First Prototype at the Royal College of Art    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Our vision is to take biology out of the test tube. We can create sensors and tools using DNA circuits that compliment or replace electronics. Cells contain the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s oldest processors with DNA as its assembly code... Our product breaks these processors out of the cell and puts it in the grasp of makers, creatives, hackers, and designers. We want diverse people creating diverse projects and expanding the community of biomakers.       ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ      For 5EUR - A custom made Bixels GIF    ÃÂÃÂ      For 19EUR - Our surprise mug reactive to your favorite hot beverage    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ      For 49EUR - Get your own costumized pipette for yourself, a friend or lab.    ÃÂÃÂ      For EUR99 - The Bixels Solo    ÃÂÃÂ      For EUR250 - The full kit    ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         We are a small band of enthusiasts who want to re-build the perceptionÃÂÃÂ  of what biology can do, and for who. Our team is assembled from specialists in  design ,  biochemistry ,  computer science ,  robotics  andÃÂÃÂ  physics ÃÂÃÂ with the goal of using biology to create products for consumers, designers and creatives.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         We are building Bixels from the beginning with our community.     Royal College of Art :  First Bixels Workshop, March 2017   Before starting at Bio I have always felt lost in what more core is as a designer always looking for the future but never being sure as to how to translate my vision....it made me see my sense of place and given me an opportunity to push my work in boundaries I could never have imagined! Bio captures the here and now and shows this alternative future allowing to loo beyond what a handbag is but what it could be.  -ÃÂÃÂ Alice Potts, Fashion Design Student  _    Global Community Biosummit :  Bixels Workshop   Bixels is a hands on cross functional STEM educational experience combining Hardware and Electronics and Bio-Tech. Previewing the device was great  I would recommend for teens interested in any of the three disciplines. Simple design, and clear instructions help you put together the Bixel device.  The biological components are robust and easy to mix. I would also recommend this to remake as a resource constrained lab for a gel illumination device. ÃÂÃÂ - Eric Harness, BioCurious.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  _    Ars Electronica :ÃÂÃÂ  Bixels ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> BioÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093>Displays with Cell Free Technologies    Cambridge SyntheticÃÂÃÂ BiologyÃÂÃÂ meetup:  ÃÂÃÂ Science Makers: Programming with DNA  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ      ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ           Risks and challenges  We are constantly improving our bio and electronic parts. And our products are first examples for using biology as a tool. Biology in combination with electronics are challenging. At the moment we have slight differences in performance from product to product.

Creator_description: Makeblock is an open source construction platform to turn ideas into success. No matter what your ideas are,  Makeblock provides various mechanical parts and electronic modules to make them possible, such as beams, plates, connectors, motors, brackets, sensors, drivers and controllers, etc.  Makeblock is an integrated platform, mechanical parts of Makeblock are convenient to connect to each other, while the electronic modules works very well together with the mechanical parts.
Project_description: Meet Codey Rocky, your new coding companion  Codey Rocky is an entry-level coding robot for STEM education, suitable for children ages 6 and up. The combination of easy-to-use robotics hardware with graphical programming gives all children the opportunity to take their first steps into the world of code and compose their first ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Hello World!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ statement at the same time as they explore their creativity.        Two robots in one   Codey is the detachable controller that holds all the magic. It includes more than 10 electronic modules that can be controlled via code. Rocky is the car that lets you take Codey anywhere you want, so that your clever programs can be run everywhere.        Make your games interactive  Codey comes with a built-in 6-axis gyroscope so that you can control the games you code by moving or tilting your controller, and see the game respond to your actions.                 Included with Codey Rocky is more than 20 learning guides for getting started with graphical programming and Python code. Seamlessly progress from one challenge to another, until you are ready to take on the advanced Python language - and simply convert your code in one click.                  Beginner & Advanced Coding  Create your first program by dragging and dropping code blocks and gradually gain more advanced skills, and transition into Python programming.    Logical Thinking  Logic is the foundation of coding. Learn how to go from idea to working program by writing code that makes sense in practice.    Creative Expression  Code is the easiest way to make something, and Codey Rocky makes it even more fun and creative. Make your ideas real in mBlock 5 and see your coding companion run your code.    AI and IoT Principles  From voice recognition to infrared TV controls, Codey Rocky users gain first familiarity with Artificial Intelligence and Internet of Things.             Easy to StartÃÂÃÂ   MakeblockÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s mBlock 5 programming software is based on MITÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s graphical programming language Scratch 3.0 to guarantee that beginners can get started coding within minutes. All you need to do is drag and drop!        Available on various platform  Regardless if you prefer to program on MacBook, Chromebook or desktop PC, mBlock 5 is ready for you to get started with code.        Switch to Python ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   With just one click you can turn your graphical code into Python code and continue learning an advanced and practical language.        Connect to the Internet of Things  Use mBlock 5 to add Internet of Things-functionality to Codey Rocky. Control home appliances, get weather reports, and much more!        Get to know AI  mBlock 5 software supports AI-functionality including voice and face recognition, and mood sensing etc. With Codey Rocky, children have the most fun and easiest way of getting familiar with one of the fundamental technologies of the 21st century.                  10+ advanced electronic modules   With more than 10 programmable electronic modules, Codey Rocky can be programmed to perform a wide range of fun effects and functions.        Rich sounds and lights effects  Code to customize expression, to see time, weather, and personal messages shown on Codey's large LED display, bring your coding companion to life.        Hardware compatibility   Codey Rocky is designed to be compatible with Makeblock Neuron and LEGOÃÂÃÂ® bricks, to let you realize any idea you can come up with. Pogo Pin on both Codey and Rocky for connection with Makeblock Neuron.        Wireless upload      The optional Bluetooth dongle lets you upload code to your robot companion wirelessly to computer so that you can rapidly try out your code ideas. Please mind that must use our bluetooth dongle for wireless upload to computer, without it you can also use USB cable for wired upload, and for connection with tablets you can use tablet's bluetooth directly.               You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Code your music  Write code to assign functions to CodeyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s three buttons and gear knob to make your companion into a powerful musical instrument.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              Weather reports  Connect Codey Rocky to the internet and receive weather information, which can be displayed through CodeyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s expressive LED display. Code to make Codey Rocky recognize the ages of people by observing their faces.       Since there are different packages, the contents in the box will vary according to the package you back. Please note the  Rewards  part below.                                      Why we created Codey RockyÃÂÃÂ    Makeblock makes education better with robots and drones that kids can build and code. Codey Rocky is our latest and most accessible coding companion. This two-part robot comes with advanced functionality including AI and IoT, and a range of sensors, so that beginners can gradually progress into advanced programming.ÃÂÃÂ    How does Codey Rocky help turn ideas into reality?ÃÂÃÂ    Codey Rocky comes with more than 10 integrated and programmable modules and mBlock 5, the latest version of our graphical programming platform that also supports advanced Python programming. The seamless integration of software with robotics hardware means that kids of all ages can start coding in minutes and instantly see the results of their code by interacting with Codey Rocky.                                       Risks and challenges  Makeblock values our user's feedback, we hope to constantly improve on our products to create a better user experience. We will keep extending the contents of Codey Rocky for enriching ways of learning coding. If necessary, Makeblock will improve the final appearances of Codey Rocky.

Blurb: Low cost remote starter add-on that enables you to start your car from you smart phone. No Monthly Fees. Patent Pending
Creator_description: BA Technologies LLC, is a startup focused on innovative low cost technology. Startup or as others would call it a mom & pop shop!
Project_description: Start-X :  (Patent Pending) ÃÂÃÂ   Always wished your remote starter would allow you to start your car from your phone? CouldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t stand the high expense, and the monthly fees? Well, now you can have it. BA Technologies LLC, a startup focused on innovative low cost technology, has produced Start-X . A low cost add-on module to your remote starter that will enable you to start your car from your phone.  ÃÂÃÂ   Start-X works, by using patent pending technology toÃÂÃÂ  harness your smart-phones Wi-Fi chip to emit a wireless signal, which the add-on module receives. No internet is required. No monthly subscription. Low cost upfront investment. Retail price we are hoping for is $49.99. The range is about the same the clicker the comes with the avital system.  ÃÂÃÂ   The Start-X system consists of a module thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s installed in your car and an app for your phone. Compatible with most major remote start systems. Requires a negative input activation on your remote starter. Not sure what that is? Email us at tech@start-x.org, glad to answer any questions.  Installation is simple for any DIYer. There are just 3 wires. Positive, Negative, and the trigger wire. The trigger wire is connected to the activation input wire on your remote starter module. For the avital system itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the white/blue wire in the 9 wire harness. For the bulldog system, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the blue wire.  ÃÂÃÂ    Status of the Project:   ÃÂÃÂ   We have already manufactured many fully functional units. We have developed the android app. Check out our android  app . Let us know what you think. We are at the stage of beta testing.  ÃÂÃÂ    We need your help:     ÃÂÃÂ   We need your support to bring Start-X to the market. With your support we can develop the iphone app, develop the website, and finish up the many technicalities in bringing Start-X to the market.ÃÂÃÂ    Testers wanted:   ÃÂÃÂ We need your help testing the product in various real life scenarios. We would greatly appreciate all feedback.Risks and challengesStatus of the Project:We have already manufactured many fully functional units. Blurb: A $50 spinning wheel that makes spinning fiber into yarn easy. It is great for beginners or people who want a small spinning wheel.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Melbourne-Australia:14 backers|Seattle-United States:14 backers|Chicago-United States:12 backers|Denver-United States:10 backers|Portland-United States:10 backers|Sydney-Australia:9 backers|Washington-United States:9 backers|Los Angeles-United States:8 backers|Colorado Springs-United States:7 backers|Fort Worth-United States:7 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:828 backers|Canada:64 backers|Australia:44 backers|United Kingdom:29 backers|Sweden:18 backers|Netherlands:16 backers|Germany:12 backers|Finland:4 backers|Poland:3 backers|Spain:3 backers
Creator_description: Maurice is an inventor and engineer.  He enjoys understanding fragments of the universe and solving problems he encounters.
Project_description: After this campaign closes you can read more about the  EEW here .  The Electric Eel Wheel MiniÃÂÃÂ is an affordable electric spinning wheel that makes yarn out of fiber.  The guy talking in the video is me, Maurice.ÃÂÃÂ  Also in the video were my wife, Emily, and my daughter.ÃÂÃÂ  The whole spinning wheel project started about eight years ago as a request from my girlfriend (now wife) to make her a travel friendly spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  Then her friends wanted one, and I eventually started selling them online.ÃÂÃÂ  There is a great community around the Electric Eel Wheel spinning wheels at  Ravelry ÃÂÃÂ (it is like the Facebook for knitters and spinners and requires a login).ÃÂÃÂ  The community has been giving me great ideas on what kinds of features they would like to see in electric spinning wheels, and being an engineer I do my best to implement those great ideas.ÃÂÃÂ  I'm currently on version 5 of the EEW, but this is my first version of this miniaturized EEW.  Here are some of the best EEW Mini features:   Small and lightweight design makes it very portable  The metal sliding hooks are easy to use  No foot treadle means you can use is in more places like in your recliner or at a table  The motor handles the spinning which lets you focus on feeding the fiber to the wheel making this much faster and easier to use than drop spindles  Cost optimized design enables a much lower price than other spinning wheels   The Mini is on Kickstarter to help fund our first batch of manufacturing.ÃÂÃÂ  The retail price will be higher so you're getting a deal and you are getting one sooner.  One important note to backers outside the USA: the power supply that ships with the Mini works with voltages around the world, but it has a  Type A plug .ÃÂÃÂ  If you don't have Type A plugs, you would need to provide a physical adapter to convert from Type A to whatever plug type you have.     EEW Mini Views    Stretch Goals  Stretch goals reward backers with extra features if this project is funded beyond our initial goal.  Let me know what you would like to see as a stretch goal!ÃÂÃÂ    $25K (GOAL REACHED!) - Every Mini comes with a plastic spin card to help improve twist consistency of your yarn.ÃÂÃÂ   $50KÃÂÃÂ (GOAL REACHED!) - Every Mini comes with an extra belt sized for plying yarn.ÃÂÃÂ   $75K (GOAL REACHED!) - Every Mini comes with an orifice hook.   The more of your friends you tell about the EEW Mini, the more likely we are to hit the stretch goals and I will add more.  So spread the word on your favorite social websites.  Plying  Plying yarn is when you take two separate strands of yarn you've already spun and twist them together.ÃÂÃÂ  To do this you must twist the strands of yarn together in the opposite direction you've spun them.ÃÂÃÂ  The Mini can support this in two different ways.ÃÂÃÂ  The first is to swap the position of the black and red wires on the circuit board.ÃÂÃÂ  To do this you need a small flat head screwdriver to swap the wires according to the photo below.       ÃÂÃÂ The second option is to add a twist to the drive belt, but you will need a different sized one than the one included.ÃÂÃÂ  If you twist the one included it will be too tight and the wheel won't spin.ÃÂÃÂ   Here is the belt you'd need  if you want to do the twisted method of plying.       While the Mini can do plying, it isn't the ideal wheel for this.ÃÂÃÂ  When plying it's often nice to go at very high speeds with lots of tension.ÃÂÃÂ  The smaller motor on the Mini means you can only go at a moderate speed with light tension.ÃÂÃÂ  Also, the small bobbin means you'll have to change bobbins frequently since plying fills up bobbins much faster than spinning.  Bobbin Size  The bobbins on the Mini hold about 1.1 ounce.       Manufacturing  I source parts from around the world, but assembly and testing is done near my home in rural Massachusetts, USA.ÃÂÃÂ  I've used knowledge from the other spinning wheels I've designed and optimized the Mini for cost.  The major custom parts I've designed for this spinning wheel are:   Circuit board  Wooden case laser cut pieces  Injection molded spindle and slider bars  Triangle wire clamps for the slide bars   All of these parts are either ready for manufacturing or very close to ready.  Comparison to other Spinning Wheels  It is important to realize the Mini is a new category of spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  It is much faster and easier to use than a drop spindle, and available at an amazing price that no other spinning wheel on the market approaches. It's design makes it great for new spinners and or more experienced spinners when they have a special niche that needs filling (like traveling, teaching younger children, or just experimenting with an electric spinning wheel without breaking the bank).ÃÂÃÂ  However, the Mini is not meant to work as a production spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  So if you are an experienced spinner don't expect this to replace your primary spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ   The EEW5 is a high-end electric wheel I've made and sold, so I'll be using that as the basis for comparison.ÃÂÃÂ  The EEW5 is similar toÃÂÃÂ other good quality spinning wheel thus making this a good source of comparison for people familiar with other spinning wheels even if they aren't electric.ÃÂÃÂ  The reason for these differences is the Mini is five times less expensive than the EEW5.ÃÂÃÂ  To meet that price I made many design changes.ÃÂÃÂ  I have listed some of the major ones below:   The Mini uses a much smaller motor.ÃÂÃÂ  This also allows a smaller power supply.ÃÂÃÂ  It also means the max speed is slower on the EEW Mini, and the torque is lower.  The Mini's smaller size reduces the cost of the wooden pieces used in the case.ÃÂÃÂ  This also results in a very lightweight spinning wheel.ÃÂÃÂ  You see the Mini is attached to a book with a rubber band in the video to give it some weight.ÃÂÃÂ  The lightweight design is important because it reduces shipping costs.  The Mini's new flyer design uses sliding wire hooks instead of the stainless hooks used on the EEW5.ÃÂÃÂ  While I like the hook system on the EEW5 better, the hooks on the Mini are still better than a lot of other much more expensive spinning wheels out there.  The circuit board on the Mini uses a much simpler design that can only go in a single direction instead of both directions.ÃÂÃÂ  Also since the motor is smaller, the circuit board can use less expensive parts.  The Mini's flyer is plastic instead of metal like the one on the EEW5.ÃÂÃÂ  Where the yarn rubs on the plastic flyer will eventually start to wear.ÃÂÃÂ  If you use the Mini a lot you'll need to add something like aluminum tape to where the groove might form in the flyer, but that would take a substantial amount of spinning.        Press Kit  Please spread the word!ÃÂÃÂ  If you want to post to your news site, blog, Facebook page, forums, email your friends, or tell people about the EEW Mini, then I put high resolution of many photos of the EEW Mini  on this page ÃÂÃÂ for your use. Feel free to use anything from this Kickstarter page as well to tell others about the EEW Mini.      Risks and challenges  I have done a lot of testing with the current version of the EEW Mini. This includes sending out EEW Mini kits to seven other spinners for them to test.  The testing results have been positive, so I'm happy with the current design.  I have even had the injection molds for the plastic parts made already because I wanted to verify those parts before starting this Kickstarter.  One significant risk is production scale if this Kickstarter gets many more backers than the goal. While selling a lot of extra EEW Minis would be a blessing in some ways, it could also be a problem because might cause me to adjust manufacturing plans which could lead to delays.  As long as the number of EEW5 Minis I need to ship to backers stays under 500 this won't be a problem.  After that I should be able to handle 1000-2000 with only minor delays and hiring a few extra local assemblers.  Beyond that delays will probably increase.  It is always possible for factors beyond my control to delay shipping, such as one of my suppliers going out of business, but these risks are minimized since I have been working with most of my major suppliers for years. If this happens, the parts for the EEW Mini are not so specialized that I couldn't find alternative sources, so this rare scenario should only delay release.  This is not my first product so I know about a lot of the pitfalls and have worked hard to avoid them. If you look at my previous two Kickstarter campaigns you'll see one shipped on time and the other actually shipped early.  That said, I will delay shipping if some issue with quality is found.  I would rather delay shipping than ship a defective product.

Blurb: Catolet - is a unique automatic litter box for cats and small dogs.

Creator_description: On a cold autumn evening in October 2015, the author of the CATOLET project, Tatyana Bayramova returned home, where her beloved cat Mr.Bro was waiting for her. Tatyana has decided to make the caring conditions for her pet more comfortable. So, there was the idea of creating CATOLET.Chief engineer, Artem Volkov who later became a co-author, has helped to bring the project to life. Artem is an expert in automation and robotics. He has a lot of experience in modernizing the household robot - vacuum cleaner, automated robot consultant and many other projects.Also, in the design and development of the automatic tray are participating production experts - engineers, designers, IT specialists from India and Belarus. The production part will be implemented in China, where as management and business development in the US.
Project_description: Love your pet but hate the litter box cleaning routine? Scooping at least once a day, washing thoroughly with detergent when refilling, replacing plastic litter box itself once a year, etc. Other common problems include cleaning up the mess of litter spread all over the floor (especially carpet) and odor. A team of young engineers have solved this problem for you!   CATOLET - no more troubles! Now your pet will greet you with a joyful purr, because its tray will always be clean!                            CATOLET - the world's newest and unique automatic litter box for cats and small dogs that does not require any filler nor cleaning. It is based on a conveyor system for waste disposal with automatic washing of the conveyor belt and flushing to the sewer. Whenever the pet is placed inside the automatic tray, the sensor detects its presence and monitors when it leaves the CATOLET device. After a period of time, which is set individually, flushing is carried out. Waste is not collected in any container, filler is not required, whereas, the waste is crushed and washed down the sewer. After flushing, the device is ready for the use again.       The conveyor system lets all the liquid through without leaving a single drop. Paws of your pet will always be dry.            ÃÂÃÂ Solid wastes are removed with the help of conveyor system and a shredder. Further removal of waste to the sewage system is carried out by the means of a pump.                 We have conducted a lot of test runs, which proved the effectiveness of the device.ÃÂÃÂ                  To train/teach your cat to a new tray, there is an adaptation system in place. The time of training to a new tray is about 2-21 days. You can also use the decomposing filler in small quantities, pouring a little on the conveyor in order for your cat to get used to a new tray.                   connection CATOLET        The device is connected simply, in TWO ways:ÃÂÃÂ   1. To the water supply and sewage systemThe kit includes 2.0 m hoses for connection.            ÃÂÃÂ 2. You can also connect to the nearest faucet and toilet bowl The kit includes 2.0 m hoses for connection.       Everything is simple!             ÃÂÃÂ  connection CATOLET basics                  ÃÂÃÂ In the CATOLET automatic box, a sensor is installed which detects leakage and malfunction of the water supply system, whenever it is activated, the system shuts the water supply and informs the owner of the malfunction. Thus, CATOLET is an autonomous system for protection against water leaks.This option is available in all versions of the device.       The device can be controlled and configured via mobile application. In the setup mode, you can set the binding time (this is very convenient, since all animals have their own character). The application runs on different mobile operating systems. In the mobile application, you can track the intervals and the number of trips of your pet, violation of cycles, water flow and other parameters. The tray is equipped with a leakage sensor, and in case of a sudden situation, the system will send a message to your smartphone.                 The case is made of sanitary acrylics; the conveyor belt is made out of composite materials that are resistant to claws and aggressive environment. Whereas, the conveyor tape is made with through holes, so that the pet does not wet its paws.       Designers will give a choice of five single-colored body colors-from pink to blue, as well as prints in the form of cat's paws or cute cat faces.                 We all know how cats like all sorts of dark and secluded places. For cat's comfort, we have developed a removable shelter in which your pet will feel wonderful! Thanks to special grooves, the shelter is easily attached to the automatic tray. In addition, the shelter has its own design and can serve as a shelf for various accessories, which is very convenient and saves space.            ÃÂÃÂ Our beloved pets have another problem ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> closed doors. In order for your pet to freely enter the room, where stands its tray, you will find door limiters in each configuration of the device!                                     CATOLET is the most compact automatic litter Box, which is designed for cats of any breed and age. For adult Maine Coons or very large fattened cats a special line of the device is presented. Also it can be used for mini dogs - York Terriers, Pomeranians, Chihuahua and others, according to the similar size.                                               Dear Backers! Due to the limitations on edit of the pledge amounts and 3 versions of our device we offer to you, we ended up with many different options of pledge amounts. But donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t worry! Preorder your desired version of our device and be sure you will receive the correct product for the price you pledged!     ÃÂÃÂ Please choose the rewards in the right column of our page!         ÃÂÃÂ                                       ÃÂÃÂ Want to write about CATOLET? Download our press KIT! Questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at press catoletpr@gmail.com                     Risks and challenges  We are a start-up with a growing team, offering a new high-tech device. Any project could encounter unexpected obstacles, and this possibility is even more likely in the case of a technology project that requires device manufacturing. We have finalized designs of our product and a working prototype and already signed agreements with key components manufacturers and suppliers.  We have thoroughly studied successful crowdfunding campaigns ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> including those that delivered on-time and those that delayed delivery ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> in order to learn and improve upon our own process. All products shown in connection with this campaign are prototypes that demonstrate the intended function of the final device. The final product will require certain product certifications, which introduces third party variables to the production schedule. To mitigate this risk, we will design the products to be compliant with all requirements and pursue these certifications.  It is safe to say that we have reduced many of the risks typical of a hardware startup!  However, as with any newly manufactured product, it is possible that some unexpected events could impact the actual production time frame.   Warranty  We provide a warranty on all of our products  sold in the USA and other regions.  We are working hard to find appropriate regional distributors who will bear the responsibility for service and support. Our commitment is to deliver an exceptional product on-time, and communicate with you regularly along our journey of getting Catolet delivered to you!

Project_description: HubSerialixed is an extension of our earlier highly successful product - Hubpixed.   Hubserialixed has 3 USB Hub Ports - which are same as the ones in Hubpixed. We knocked off the 4th USB Port and added a USB to UART chip, that provides the ability to connect any UART device on that port.   This UART device could be anything you can think of - including a thermal sensor, ADC, Relay control, RF Module etc. Since this UART port works off the USB, you are not concerned about the inbuilt UART ports available on the 40 Pin Connector. In fact, none of the Pins of the 40 Pin connector are required to be used.   We have kept the 40 Pin Connector area vacant - so that these pins are still available to be used if you wish to.   The UART Pins are provided as 4 Pin JumperÃÂÃÂ  with following Pins  1. 3.3V  2. UART TX  3. GND  4. UART RX  There are two mounting holes in the design and you could possibly design a small add on board that will fit on the 4 Pin Header and the two mounting holes. This gives the design extreme flexibility.        In the initial prototype we had only 3 Pin. We had earlier assumed that the power supply was not required, which could have restricted the possibility of having an active add on board.    Background   The hubpixed was first announced on January 24, 2016 in a  referencedesigner blog  and was subsequently  posted on kickstarter . Hubpixed was first of its kind product and was subsequently updated to include a wifi ( in HubPiWi ) and a Wifi and a Bluetooth ( in HubPiWi Blue). The launch of the Raspberry Pi Zero W made the later two product redundant as Pi Zero W included in built Wifi and Bluetooth.   Similar products were launched later on, however, our product still beats them in terms of design ( we have empty space in the 40 Pin Connector area) and price - Even with the USB UART functionality included our price is $10 in single quantity.    Our Earlier Similar Projects on Kickstarter    1. Pi Serialixed    PiSerialixed  is a UART to USB board that seamlessly connects to RPi allowing you to see the console messages and the login through the console to control the Raspberry Pi 3. This avoids the need to use an HDMI TV and Keyboard.   2. Notixed   Notixed is very similar to the PiSerialized project. It turns Pi Zero into a USB devices - without the need of a cable or connector. Just hook notixed with Pi Zero with the 4 provided screws.  It was successfully backed by 291 backers and  raised $3,711 on kickstarter .     3. Hubpixed   Hubpixed is a 4 Port USB 2.0 Hub that will seamlessly connect to Raspberry Pi Zero without any connector. The novel idea uses the pogo pins. The hubpixed has been updated to support the latest Pi Zero 1.3 and Pi Zero W. It raised   $3194 from 125 backers on kickstarter .   4. HubPiWi and HubPiWi Blue   The HubPiWi extends the functionality of Hubpixed to include a Wifi on Hubpixed. The HubPiWi Blue extends a WIfi and a Bluetooth. HubPiWi had 149 backers and HubPiWi Blue had 553 backers.      Risks and challenges  With the successful history of product delivery we have mastered the art of production stages and gained confidence over it.   The risk therefore is a question of "when the product will be delivered" and not "if the product will be delivered".

Creator_description: Radiance Co.Ltd, started with the vision of providing a revolutionary solution to the issue of energy conservation. Towards that end, we engineered a patented heat-generating composite material, SFIM (SUHO Far-Infrared Heating Wire) that can creates heat with incredibly low energy use. This technology is a future technology which hopefully can aid in solving the energy crises. Using this innovation, we have developed a line of thermal blankets that offer unparalleled heat efficiency. In the future, our hope is that this cutting-edge composite material can be used in more applications to aid in long-term energy conservation.

ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The benefits of far-infrared radiationÃÂÃÂ   The typical effect of far-infrared radiation generating a heat reaction after being absorbed into our bodies is enlarging our capillaries, encouraging blood circulation and cellular tissue growth. Efficient performance of this wavelength is called the degree of activation in far-infrared. The wavelength with the greatest degree of far-infrared activation is the far-infrared ray emitted from the sun. The suns' far-infrared is presumed to contain an energy (tentatively named 'universe energy') that cannot be explained by any physics theory or law that mankind has developed. During a comfortable and deep sleep with Radishine, the human bodyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s natural healing (recovery) power and immunity will be strengthened, resulting in a natural improvement of health.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        What is SFIM?   SFIM(SUHO Far-Infrared heating wire composite material), the core technology of Radiance, is a heat-generating new material and releases a special far-infrared ray. Far-infared ray is a new type of infrared radiation that NASA discovered. The typical effect of far-infrared ray generating a heat reaction after being absorbed into our bodies, is enlarging our capillaries, encouraging blood circulation and cellular tissue growth. Also, when the heat reaches the moisture and protein molecules that make up the cells, it shakes the cells 2,000 times per minute. Other benefits include pain reduction, removal of heavy metal particles, deodorization, mold-repelling, dehumidification, and air cleaning, making it useful as medical equipment, kitchen equipment, housing and building materials, textiles, bedding, etc. SFIM is the world's first far-infrared ray containing energy of universe.       ÃÂÃÂ Key technologyÃÂÃÂ    Resistance suppression technology targeting the electricity skin effect  Kinetic energy controlling technology on inner parts of atoms forming hot wire (resistance) moleculesÃÂÃÂ   Electric dipole moment controlling technology targeting atoms when we conduct electricity through hot wire (resistance)    Content of technology and effectivenessÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     With the repetition of nuclear spin conversion, it increases the speed and the number of times collisions occur between nuclear and a free electrons even higher than the JouleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Law caloric value. Moreover, even with a tiny bit of electric flow, the hot wire reacts sensitively, which allows high-speed and high-temperature heating to happen. This technology increases energy efficiency by using ewer resources and getting a great outcome.   Through changing an electric dipole momentÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s size and position, one can release great quantity of far-infrared radiation. At the same time, it holds nuclear spin energyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s movement back, which can let far-infrared radiation include intensive dark energy that flies off to a great distance.   Due to all the above principles, a movement that reacts sensitively toward electric flow creates strong heating under voltage electricity (1V~24V). In particular, this technology activates strong heating reaction on DC current even at the photovoltaic modules (DC 1V~24V). These technologies can be merged with a photovoltaic system and open the way to a new generation of technology by fulfilling zero energy consumption goals associated with any field that needs heat.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Extra fine heat wire ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> No wire felt through the fabric and no jab-in-the-rib  The bedding a person lies on or covers him or herself with when sleeping should be soft, give a feeling of coziness, and induce better sleep. In this context, bed manufacturers are developing beds and mattress cushions in a process they call ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>bed science,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ which incorporates state-of-art technologies. In this way, they compete in the field of high-performance cushion technology.ÃÂÃÂ        However, conventional electric heated bedding have technological constraints that only result in the manufacturing of products with low flexibility. This is because conventional electric heated bedding apply inferior (in terms of tensile strength and durability, etc.) electric heat wire element technology, making electrical heated bedding difficult to bend, stiff, and thick(to prevent a short-circuit caused by bending and folding of internal electrical heat wire). Furthermore, non-bending, stiff, and thick conventional electric heated bedding with low flexibility also pose a problem in the fact that the unique, high-performance, cushiony feel of high-end and high-performance beds is lost when they are placed on beds made with cutting-edge technology. As a result, conventional electric heated bedding has very low flexibility and cannot be called genuine heating bedding synonymous with softness and coziness. Radishine has resolved these problems by adopting SFIM heating composite material, which causes no safety problems even when the blanket/comforter is rolled or folded completely.        RadishineÃÂÃÂ          Conventional heated blanket          Wireless + Compatibility (any type of 5V USB batteries) ex) power bank, battery pack, etc.   No need for an outlet, an external battery pack keeps Radishine wireless and portable.There is no risk of electric shock, fire or harmful electromagnetic wave exposure. Capable of being powered by any 5V external battery (power bank), Radishine comforter offers unparalleled heating efficiency. To ensure that consumers can use heat bedding more conveniently, compatibility should be assured with various products that are commercially marketed and very easily available. In this smart phone era, compatibility is important for products standardized with DC 5V (2.1A output), which are available anywhere. Radishine is a convenient and safe product compatible with any components such as a DC 5V(2.1A output) battery, auxiliary battery, power bank, power bank auxiliary battery, battery pack, energy storage devices(ESS), and portable DC power supplies, etc., which differs from device that work by plugging a power cord into an AC 110-220V in combination with bedding such as ordinary electric blanket/pad, etc.ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   Queen Size ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> 5V, 2.1A output, 2 USB ports (2.1A each)ÃÂÃÂ   Twin Size ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> 5V, 2.1A output, 1 USB port  *Battery not included  3-Safe TECHNOLOGY  Fire/Electric Shock/Electromagnetic Wave  The International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC), under the umbrella of the World Health Organization (WHO), classified the extremely low frequencies generated from high-voltage transmission lines and household electrical appliances as Group 2B carcinogens in 1999. In addition, the IARC also classified microwave emissions from mobile phones and mobile communication facilities as Group B2 carcinogens in 2011. Electric blankets operating at AC 110V/220V and the household electrical appliances that use an alternating current as mentioned above are all categorized as Group B2 carcinogens using an extremely low frequency (50-60Hz). In particular, electromagnetic waves from electric blankets are in close proximity to the human body for 8 hours while sleeping, which is pretty scary.         The electromagnetic waves from extremely low frequency products are reduced to 1/100 even when the distance is more than 30cm. Electric blankets that use DC low-voltage electric power without harmful electromagnetic waves are good. However, not many DC mats have been put on the market for the following reasons. Based on AC 220V (alternating current), products operating at voltages below DC 24V (direct current) should generate heat with about 1/10 of the voltage. To generate heat with a voltage below DC 24V, the heat wire must, theoretically, be thick, or the current must be amplified to provide sufficient heat output. Higher currents make it very difficult to control. When a high electrical current is used, local overheating, or a blow phenomenon, will result from even a slightly insufficient capacity of heat wire or from any change in the resistance of the resistor due to folding or breaking of the heat wire. Consequently, local overheating will cause problems in the part concerned, which is very likely to lead to a fire. Various products containing carbon heat wire or charcoal heat wire, etc., are typical examples of hazards. Heat wire materials are coated with carbon, not metal. Therefore, prolonged use or folding or bending will result in cracked coating and local overheating, increasing the risk of fire constantly.        Therefore, local overheating cannot be resolved unless the heat wires are made from highly durable metal. Therefore, the currently marketed blanket products operating at voltages below DC 24V, which are unable to control a high current easily, have two major problems, as below: a) Poor heating performance - As it is difficult to control a high current, only a low current is applied without embedding many wires that make the power necessary for heating. b) Fire hazard - With a high current, heat can be generated well. However, folding or bending the mat or using it without care is very likely to increase the risk of fire over the long-term due to the high current. To overcome the problems of products operating at voltages below DC 24V, it is necessary to combine technologies, such as precisely thermally adjustable metal heat wire technology, heat technology enabling instantaneous heating and maintenance of constant temperature, and algorithm technology capable of precisely controlling the current. Only then will it be possible to make an electric blanket operating at voltages below DC 24V without harmful electromagnetic waves.    Electromagnetic Wave Test #1 Radishine tests negative for electromagnetic wave emission even when heating. The reading shows the same numerical value both before and after Radishine is in use.        Electromagnetic wave test #2  The left one is Radishine the right one is a conventional heated blanket.       Radishine is operated by DC 5V battery pack and has no harmful electromagnetic waves. The conventional one shows high numerical values.     Advantages of Radishine     Radishine, by adopting a new advanced heating element alloy, has achieved precision, durability, ultra-fast heat generation, and the self-regulating ability to maintain temperature uniformly by the heat wire itself. Moreover, Radishine divides a large area to be heated into several circuits and controls them based on a circular heat generation algorithm to prevent any flow of excessive current to each part with high precision. Regarding these non-simple heating products and heat wires, Radishine developed by Radiance, represents the culmination of decades of scientific research and experiments. It removes concerns about harmful electromagnetic waves and fire/electric shock hazards. More importantly, Radishine which emits true far-infrared radiation (verified by various reports and agricultural and architectural fields, etc.) is expected to have beneficial effects on health, unlike existing products. Due to its convenience, a Radishine is a perfect choice for people who enjoy traveling or camping.ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Smart Phone ApplicationÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Download from i-Phone App Store or Google play store. (no Bluetooth control)       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ             Risks and challenges  We at Radiance International are confident, given the current stage of development, that we will be able to deliver on all rewards without significant delays. Having already produced a line of thermal products, we have the experience and understand the process of bringing a product to market. However, we also do understand that every product is different and poses a unique set of challenges. Creator_description: Rubbee is a Kickstarter-born company. We've been creating friction drives for bicycles for the last 5 years and now we unveil our latest flagship product - Rubbee X. It marks a new page in our quest to improve urban mobility. Our goal is to establish bicycles as daily means of transport by making them electric.
Project_description: Rubbee X ÃÂÃÂ makes every bike electric. It has batteries, electronics and a motor that touches the rear tire of the bike. It also has a wireless cadence sensor that tracks Your pedaling pattern and adapts the electric assist automatically.ÃÂÃÂ Itspatented quick-release lock technology enables Rubbee to be installed and detached with one hand,in just one second. Make  Your bike  electric.                                                    We've prepared these rewards to our Kickstarter backers with heavy discounts from future retail price. These prices are only valid for our Kickstarter supporters.                        We have a long history of making electric drives for bicycles. All the way since our first Kickstarter campaign to today. We commit to deliver the Rubbee X in time for the next riding season.            Combined, our team has over 40 years of experience in development and manufacturing of electric vehicles. We've worked on multiple hybrid electric trucks, charging stations, electric cars and, of course - Rubbee itself. So when it comes to engineering - we've got what it takes.       We used to manufacture all the previous generation Rubbee units in our own assembly line in Lithuania. Now we're gearing up for a much larger scale of manufacturing. So from the very beginning we've developed Rubbee X in close partnership with a solid manufacturing partner. Hint - they employ over 2500 people. They are huge ! This ensures quality, smooth certification process and great after sales support.       For the past year we've been working on our next-gen electronics, new motor, batteries and other new components of the Rubbee X. It's a product we've developed from the ground up with all our knowledge from the previous generations of it. We've built multiple prototypes along the way, here are some moments of our journey and a short video about how the earlier prototypes of Rubbee X works:ÃÂÃÂ               You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             We've also introduced the Rubbee X at the largest bicycle industry fair Eurobike 2017 this September:ÃÂÃÂ                                  Made in collaboration with:                                Risks and challenges  For most hardware products R&D and final product quality are the main bottle necks. We tackle this with our multiple years of experience in the field. This is not our first rodeo. We managed a full on  manufacturing, assembly, certification process before with previous versions of the product. Talking about manufacturing  - we have created Rubbee X in partnership with top-notch engineering companies. Rubbee x is designed for durability, simple manufacturing and easy service.

Blurb: We harness unused computing power and dedicate it to researchers working towards a cure for cancer.
