Creator_description: We harness unused computing power and dedicate it to researchers working towards a cure for cancer.Much of the current research views cancer treatment as an engineering problem.  But there are two major barriers to this work: The first, of course, is finding a potential cure that can be boiled down into numbers. This problem is currently being addressed in research labs around the world, and there are already some promising results. The second barrier is the lack of basic computing power available to carry out the mathematical calculations needed to convert the numbers into real world treatments or even cures.Our organization is working to solve the second problem. We plan to use the vast amount of unused computing power harnessed from data centers, tablets, phones, PCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s, IoT, and Cloud servers to carry out this task, using Berkeley Open Infrastructure for Network Computing to  access this idle power.There are approximately 2 billion active global Android devices. With only 1 million active users, BOINCÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s available computing power will increase tenfold & provide equal the power of the fastest conventional supercomputer.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  A mobile app with one purpose: Accelerate cancer research.    Leveraging state-of-the-art distributed mesh computing practices, smartphones can be linked together to build scientists a powerful supercomputer for expediting cancer research.       By combining our smartphones together, we can provide scientists a powerful, crowdsourced supercomputer. This can enable scientific research normally not possible or too costly to do effectively.  The more smartphones added to the network, the more computational power for cancer research.     This process can potentially expedite cancer research.    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Your platform has the potential to dramatically accelerate the pace of computational biology by crowdsourcing massive and complex calculations. I believe Compute for Cancer can increase the chances of finding a needle in the haystack of cancer data.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ  -Russell C. Rockne, Ph.D. (Assistant Professor, Director of Mathematical Oncology)        Compute for Cancer is powered by the Berkeley Open Infrastructure Network Computing (BOINC) platform. Developed at UC Berkeley, BOINC is an open-source software platform to allow for "volunteer computing", or the ability to leverage idle consumer computing power for high-power, scientific research. https://boinc.berkeley.edu/  Several prominent universities already have fully-functional, high-impact projects running including: UC Berkeley, Oxford University, and University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. To see a full list, please visit:  http://boinc.berkeley.edu/projects.php       We are striving to have a fully-optimized app developed and publicly available by April 2018. The Kickstarter funding will be used for:  1. App/future feature developments  2. Website development  3. Staffing  4. Marketing/Advertising                  Eric R. Weinstein, PhD   Eric R. Weinstein is a Managing Director of Thiel Capital. Mathematician, physicist, author, musician, and a true polymath, Weinstein has Ph.D. in mathematics from Harvard University, has been affiliated with MIT, Oxford University, and Institute for New Economic Thinking, and has to his credit a number of groundbreaking ideas in such diverse areas as quantum field theory, differential geometry, economics, and finance.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Katrina Garnett    With her three kids in college, Katrina Garnett has inspired a third generation of technology. As a result of being raised in the mini-computer era and having worked in Development at Oracle and Sybase for 10 years, along with being Founder, President & CEO of Crossworlds Software for 6 years, Katrina feels very fortunate. Crossworlds Software had an IPO (initial public offering) in June of 2000, which led to being acquired by IBM in January of 2001, Katrina feels very fortunate. Post Crossworlds, Garnett created Garnett Ventures, which enables her to work with talented young entrepreneurs from SRI, Stanford, Berkeley and USC. Helping others realize their dreams is why she works in Silicon Valley. A cure for Cancer is also one of her dreams.  Ms Garnett believes the greatest opportunity will come from the intersection of technology and healthcare. When her father-in-law died of lung cancer, she worked for years with the Ronald McDonald House. Garnett believes Compute for Cancer is an ideal opportunity where everyone can participate regardless of his or her means. By merging a consumer application that donates idle CPU to the supercomputer mesh network, it immediately increases badly needed compute power for cancer researchers. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s an egalitarian and ubiquitous approach where everyone can help beat cancer.   Edward Frenkel, PhD    Edward Frenkel is a professor of mathematics at University of California, Berkeley, member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, and winner of the Hermann Weyl Prize in mathematical physics. His latest book ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Love and MathÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ was a New York Times bestseller, won the Euler Book Prize, and has been translated into 17 languages.  ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>As someone whose family has been affected by cancer, I know that we have to pool all our resources to cure this disease. I am happy to do all I can toward that goal.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Jaron Lanier   Jaron Lanier is a scientist, musician, and writer best known for his work in virtual reality and his advocacy of humanism and sustainable economics in a digital context. He introduced the terms ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>virtual realityÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>mixed reality.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ His 1980s startup VPL Research created the first commercial VR products, and introduced avatars, multi-person virtual world experiences, and prototypes of major VR applications such as surgical simulation. His books ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Who Owns the Future?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>You Are Not a GadgetÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ have been international bestsellers. He has been awarded a lifetime achievement award by the IEEE as well as the Peace Prize of the German Book Trade, one of the highest cultural honors in Europe.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Mike North, PhD    Exploring the intersection of nature, humanity, and technology, Dr. North is a thought leader on technology at the fringe and where itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s leading us. As Founder of ReAllocate, heÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s interested in how we can use our expertise for the betterment of humanity. By utilizing our emerging technological resource to address cancer, he feels Compute for Cancer is leveraging our collective technological power to help solve our most pressing health issue.  On a personal level, Mike lost his grandmother at a young age to Pancreatic Cancer. He experienced her pain and how traumatic losing her was to him and his family. Curing cancer is more than just saving lives, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s about ending the trauma and pain felt by countless patients and families every year. By us each contributing every day through our excess computational power we can help reduce the pain the world and feel good about our individual role in doing good.      Risks and challenges  The risk associated with Compute for Cancer is primarily related to scale and technology. We have global support on both the business and technology fronts. We have backing from leading technologists in the San Francisco, Bay Area, to top cancer researchers, and we are in close communication and directly engaged with Biden Cancer Moonshot.  We have extended our network to address potential issues, and are always looking more people to join our team.

Project_description: ONE POWERFUL LIGHT. ALWAYS READY. FIT FOR EVERY NEED.       We are proud to introduce PAL, or Portable Adaptive Lighting - a powerful and rugged light that pairs with accessories to deliver illumination wherever its needed. Whether you use it on its own or you pair it with an accessory, PAL is designed to perform among the best in class.ÃÂÃÂ   HERE IS HOW IT WORKS.       Our modular connection allows for easy one-handed operation - creating the ability to customize your lighting based on your active lifestyle.  The basis for the modular connection is rooted in reliability and utility. We needed to find a way to securely attach the light to an accessory while still maintaining smooth and easy operation.       STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED - LIMITED EDITION COLORED PAL       FEATURED IN.       HERE ARE THE FEATURES.       ÃÂÃÂ         SMALL BUT POWERFUL.       ÃÂÃÂ TECHNICAL SPECS.       ACCESSORIES FOR UNLIMITED UTILITY.  By pairing with a suite of compatible accessories, PAL can transform into the perfect light for all of your needs. With accessories that provide access to ambient lighting, task lighting and mobile lighting, we have a solution that will enable you to maximize your time spent outdoors at night.       ÃÂÃÂ PAL IN ACTION.       Our patented attachment system uses opposing magnetic poles to seamlessly rotate PAL into a secure mechanical and electrical* connection with its accessories.ÃÂÃÂ        DESIGNED WITH YOU IN MIND.  All personal lighting products are different - different brands, different battery sizes, different applications...and since we all have different needs, we found ourselves with an unnecessary number of personal lighting products.   We were frustrated - and we couldn't find a solution that would provide us with reliable access to light in all conditions...so we set out to develop the perfect light for every application.  After countless hours of design, several prototype iterations, and long debates about user interaction, we developed a simple and intuitive solution - a modular light with the functional utility that allows precise access to light for a limitless number of activities.        PERFECTING A MODULAR LIGHTING SYSTEM AS VERSATILE AS OUR LIVES.   We teamed with the best and brightest designers and engineers to develop a lighting system that could match our needs. We spent countless hours exploring various form factors, connection methods, and user interactions. After relentless iteration and prototyping, we developed a one-handed modular system that is just as relevant in the home as it is in the outdoors.        A CLOSER LOOK.       No more fumbling with a single button - we simplified the interaction with tactile buttons that each serve a purpose.ÃÂÃÂ      use PAL with the flashlight handle for a range of activities, and to recharge PAL.    ÃÂÃÂ      use PAL as a headlamp for hands free illumination    ÃÂÃÂ      take PAL on a ride by pairing it with the bike mount.    ÃÂÃÂ      use PAL with the lantern accessory for ambient lighting.    ÃÂÃÂ      use PAL with the task arm accessory to access focused light.    ÃÂÃÂ      use the flashlight handle accessory to recharge PAL and other devices on the go.    THE TEAM BEHIND THE DREAM.  We believe that everyone has a duality to their lives - an urban side where we live and work, and a wild side that longs to be outdoors. We strive to help people bridge this gap between urban and wild by enabling them to get out and explore, even after the sun goes down.ÃÂÃÂ        Chris and Derek are brothers-in-law with a common passion for travel and adventure, always lookingfor new experiences and challenges. Though they share numerous interests (including the need for betterpersonal lighting), their backgrounds could not be more different. While Chris was growing up insouthern New Mexico, hunting, fishing, and exploring the high desert, Derek was living abroad inSingapore, traveling extensively throughout Asia.ÃÂÃÂ   Their varied backgrounds and experiences became thegenesis of Thirty Third ParallelÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s products and led to the urban / wild brand that they embody. They canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>twait to see how PAL will help you get the most out of the night!       Daylight is an award winning product design consultancy based in San Francisco. With backgrounds at some of the largest andmost respected design firms in the world, Daylight applied an innovative, human-centered approach tobring PAL to life.       Having held senior electrical engineering positions at IDEO, Apple, Tesla and more, Scott B. has brought anextensive product-development background to bear on the design of the our products.  Scott W. is a mechanical engineer with 25 years of experience in product design. With a background atIDEO, and a consulting career that involves work with other Bay Area design firms on projects with Intel,Universal Studios, Fiat Motors and more, Scott has led the mechanical development of our products.  WE HAVE A SOLID PLAN TO DELIVER.       SUPPORTER GEAR.       WE CAN'T WAIT TO SEE WHERE PAL TAKES YOU!       ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s important for us to mention that anytime a product is manufactured there are risks involved. From factory delays to delays at the port - unexpected challenges can present themselves and potentially alter our projected timeline.   We have teamed with a high-caliber manufacturing partner that specializes in working with entrepreneurs and start-ups. From manufacturing & quality control to packaging & logistics, our partner will help efficiently and effectively deliver our products to you. Our #1 priority is to deliver a product that is of the highest standard of quality.    We believe there is global demand for our products and love the idea of PAL adopters around the world. We have optimized shipping rates within the continental US to ensure free domestic shipping. We have estimated our international shipping costs to the best of our ability, and we believe that our international shipping rates are competitive and fair.

Creator_description: I am an inventor, builder, dreamer and two-time Guinness World Record holder. Search up my name on Google and you'll see some of my designs. Many are focussed around bicycles because I believe cycling makes this world a better place for us all. `As well as the Kickstarter projects listed on my account, I also launched the world's first flying bicycle, the Paravelo, in partnership with John Foden.
Project_description: thingumy : A universal bicycle mount for lights, locks, bottles of rumÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦you name it, thingumy can carry it.     thingumy: (unofficially the world's most useful bicycle accessory)     thingumy  is a clever strap that allows you to safely and securely carry 101 things.ÃÂÃÂ And all without the clutter of brackets.ÃÂÃÂ   Have an old bike light or torch, but no bracket? No problem - use  thingumy  to strap it to the back of your hand.ÃÂÃÂ      thingumy is adjustable for any size of bike light or small torch    Want to stand out in traffic? No problem - Use  thingumy  to strap a light to your ankle.     thingumy carries a rear light and provides a socially acceptable way of wearing trouser clips    Did we mention  thingumy  is made from upcycled inner tubes?  How thingumy came to life  I'm always dreaming up ways to make life on two wheels as easy as possible.ÃÂÃÂ    thingumy  is adjustable so you can strap pretty much any bike light or small torch to the back of your hand...or ankle. This allows you to focus the light exactly where you wantÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦on the road it might be a distracted driver waiting to make a turnÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦on a trail it might be overhanging branches or another obstruction beyond your field of view.ÃÂÃÂ      Put light exactly where you need it    Another benefit of the  thingumy  is that with a slight change of hand position, you can get a dipped or full-beam effectÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦I find this useful if IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m riding a trail at night and there are people on foot that I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to dazzle.ÃÂÃÂ   Here's the really good bit. As well as being a universal mount for bicycle lights, you can use  thingumy  to carry a jacket, pump, lock, bottle of wine, a bunch of bananasÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦   From bottles...      Arrive at your Christmas party in style     ÃÂÃÂ ...to bananas      Also carry an umbrella, a D-lock, clothing...you decide    ÃÂÃÂ If I reach my funding target, I plan to ship DECEMBER 2017.  ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  There is no need for any further development work as the design works well so no delays on that front. With regards to the production, thingumy is made by hand by me here in London and using upcycled material where possible (no third party supplier or factory to delay things). Thank you for your support.

Blurb: Double the power... Double the capacity... Use two 18650 Li-Ion batteries to power you Raspberry Pi

Creator_description: Worked in electrical and electronics engineering industry for over 20+ years. Brought products from Proof-of-Concept to full production. Entrepreneur and innovator. Specializing in Raspberry Pi and Linux based consumer and commercial product development. Energy and RFID systems design and integration.
Project_description: Pi18650 DUAL HAT Link  If you have missed the campaign, check the following link to see when more will be available.   pi18650-dual-hat.enutil-energy.com   Pi18650 DUAL HAT Stacking  The Pi18650 DUAL Battery HAT can be stacked if you are powering multiple devices and want separate power supplies for each circuit. The power to the Raspberry Pi is supplied by the Pi On/Off jumper which can be left in the off position and power used from the USB Out and Terminal Block. The second Pi18650 DUAL Battery HAT can have the Pi On/Off jumper in the On position powering the Pi and also powering devices from the USB Out and Terminal Block.  NEW!!! Arduno UNO Adapter Board  We have made a quick design of an adapter board for the Arduino UNO so that Arduino users can take advantage of the Pi18650 DUAL HAT and interface to their projects and applications. Prototypes PCB's will be ordered shortly and new perks coming soon. In the layout below the Pi18650 DUAL HAT will piggyback on top of this board which will plug into the Arduino UNO headers. Power is provided to the Vin pin on the UNO board.     Pi18650 Arduino Adapter Board    Pi18650 History  Recently in our latest Kickstarter campaign we brought you the Pi18650 HAT which provided battery power and UPS capabilities for your Raspberry Pi and we thank all of our supporters for bringing it to life. There are millions of Raspberry Pi's out there used in all kinds of applications from camera security systems, robotics to automation and control. We have helped power Pi's in remote applications integrated with PLC's along with maker projects and upcoming products. The Raspberry Pi is an exceptional product which has penetrated various markets and helped many people and customers learn new skills in programming and hardware. The Raspberry Pi Os is imaged on an SD card which are known to be very volatile when not properly shutdown like any ordinary computer and can be corrupted in a short period of time due to power spikes and brownouts in the electrical grid. The Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT provides a battery backup system (UPS) when tethered to a USB power source. When power is lost or interrupted, the batteries kick-in allowing the Pi to run seamlessly. A battery monitoring script written in Python provides a proper shutdown procedures when the batteries are running low on power. The Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HATÃÂÃÂ also allows the Pi to run for extended periods of time when not connected to a USB power supply. Great for those remote and outdoor applications or where no power outlets are available. ÃÂÃÂ   What is the Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT  The Pi18650 is an add on HAT which plugs into the 26/40 pin connector on the Raspberry Pi. This HAT allows you to operate your Raspberry Pi without a power cable and can use various capacity 18650 Lithium Ion batteries. On board are two 1A battery charging circuits for charging the batteries individually. The Pi18650 development board also includes a 4x2 100mil header for use with a ESP8266 (ESP-01) wifi module for remote monitoring and CLOUD integration or a custom designed board. Included is one additional stacking header for extra clearance when stacking other HAT's on top of the Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT.How Long Can The Pi Last?As an example the Raspberry Pi Zero uses approximately 87mA without and 103mA with a USB dongle plugged in. With a fully charged single 3000mAh battery, the Pi would last 34.5 Hrs with nothing attached. Using two batteries would double the run time.ÃÂÃÂ   The Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT has additional features added to the single battery version. As with two batteries the design becomes more complex and we have added an LED indicator to show the battery has power and connected to the load. A comparator circuit monitors the battery voltage level and when it gets too low it will be automatically cut off from the load with a small current drain on the battery giving it longer standby time before being recharged or replaced. The batteries can be swapped on the fly by the user.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   How it works?  The Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT holds two single cell lithium Ion 18650 form factor batteries which should have integrated battery protection circuits. The boost circuit maintains the voltage to the Pi at 5.1V for battery voltages of 3.7V to 4.2V. The jumper allows you to disable power to the Pi and Isolate the battery circuit or start the Pi. This jumper can be used with an external relay providing automatic control from circuit or system. It also includes two charging IC's which can charge up to 1A from the USB Micro connector and has two battery monitoring IC's which communicates to the Pi via I2C. We have coded a Python script using I2C SMBUS for you to read the battery status along with a shutdown script for low battery voltage. Charging LEDs show the status of the charging process. The Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT can also be used with other development and SBC boards. Any DC power supply, adaptor or solar panel up to 18V max can be used with the charger. Use a good quality USB Micro cable as we found the flat style thinner cables did not work well with the charger and current was limited. The thicker round USB Micro cables work well.ÃÂÃÂ   STAT1 (ON)ÃÂÃÂ   STAT2 (OFF) - Pre-Conditioning or Fast Charge ModeÃÂÃÂ   STAT2 (ON) STAT1 (OFF) - Charge CompleteÃÂÃÂ   PWRGD (ON) - Power Is Good For ChargeÃÂÃÂ   Technical Specifications   1A Charge Current Max for each battery  Up to 6A for Raspberry Pi via Li-Ion Batteries  Up to 18V DC Input for UPS and Charging  I2C Battery Monitoring (Python Script)  DUAL 18650 Single Cell Lithium Ion Holder  26/40 Pin Connector for Raspberry PiÃÂÃÂ   USB Micro Connector for ChargingÃÂÃÂ   Jumper for Pi On/Off/ChargeÃÂÃÂ   Voltage Regulation 5.1VÃÂÃÂ   Use as a UPS or with Solar PanelÃÂÃÂ   Wifi Header for ESP8266 (8 Pin) or Custom Board  Additional Micro USB connector for powering other devices  Screw Terminal for powering external boardsÃÂÃÂ   A 3-Pin Jumper to Switch USB Micro and Terminal Connection  Individual Load Cutoff Circuits for Low Battery  Standoffs Providing Support (with charger perk)  Reverse Battery Protection  Battery To Load ON LED's  Power Robots, Motors and More   Features       Rewards       (batteries not included)  Add Ons (Pi18650 DUAL HAT CHARGER)  A USB Type C Fast charger with USB C to  USB C cable and Custom USB C to Micro cable. A good quality charger and cable to quickly charge your batteries and power your Pi18650 DUAL HAT. Two standoffs for additional support when mounted to the Raspberry Pi. Below North American style model plug.   M2.5 x 16mm Standoffs and Screws  USB Type C ChargerÃÂÃÂ       USB C Charger    *Shipping charges will be incurred if not ordered with one of the Pi18650 HAT perks.  Assembling Your Pi18650 DUAL HAT      ÃÂÃÂ Assembling your Pi18650 DUAL HAT is very simple. Just place the jumpers on the battery headers and also on the Pi On/Off whether your Pi is ready to boot up or not. Install the standoffs and screws for extra support when inserting the batteries.  Pi18650 DUAL HAT DemoÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have minimised the risks and challenges at this point as the Pi18650 DUAL BATTERY HAT prototype is finished and tested. Firm supplier quotes have been received for assembly and production.

Creator_description: Hydration advocate.  Triathlete. Swimmer. Cal Bears.  Former President FOREO.  Former LVMH.   Helped to launch and deliver 4 successful crowfunding campaigns.
Project_description: The LARQ bottle is a reusable, rechargeable, insulated water bottle that cleans itself and the water you put inside it. With digital purification from UVC light, your water and bottle is purified at the touch of a button. ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        We all want to drink more water and use less plastic, but existing reusable bottles do not make it easy. We surveyed 200+ people and found these common issues:ÃÂÃÂ   The results are appalling with more than a million bottles every minute being added to landfills around the world. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s over 480 billion annually and climbing - enough plastic to wrap around the earthÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s equator more than twice. Every. Year.       ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a statistic you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to be a part of. Bottom line is that the existing reusable bottles are failing to curb the use of plastic bottles.   ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we started LARQ with a simple idea:  Pure water from a self-cleaning bottle.    The LARQ Bottle is designed to solve the biggest consumer pain points so there are no more excuses to reach for that one-use plastic bottle.                 ÃÂÃÂ             Whether youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re on the trail, at the gym, or in the office, you know that staying hydrated helps you feel and perform your best. So donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t think twice about whether you want to grab a refill.       Explore new trails and new countries with confidence. Even when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not sure about your water source, you can count on LARQ to eliminate bacterial and viral contaminants.  When your body needs water the most, make sure itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s getting the best. The inside of your water bottle should be a whole lot cleaner than the inside of your gym bag.       Clean water isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t a privilege, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a right. The LARQ Bottle gives you the power to take pure water with you everywhere you go, sanitizing enough water for your whole family with a single charge.       LARQ combines the power of the sun with the advances of the digital age. The UVC LED chips in LARQ are smaller, more energy efficient, less toxic (mercury free), and more economical compared to traditional Mercury based UV technology.                                    663 million people in the world live without safe drinking water. We believe technology and design has the ability to transform lives. That is why we are continually exploring innovative ways of working with nonprofit organizations to bring our core technology to the millions in need of access to clean water.    When you support the LARQ Bottle - we will donate 1% of all proceeds to our charity partner  charity: water  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        We are LARQ. LARQ was started with a simple vision where innovative technology can be combined with inspirational design to help people access pristine drinking water easily and sustainably. We harness the power of the sun to bring that stinky water bottle to the digital age.   No chemicals, no scrubbing, no compromises.   Our products look as good as they make you feel. We are confident that these are the most beautiful hydration products in the world that make it easy to make the healthier and sustainable choice, anytime and anywhere.   You are what you drink. So drink brilliantly.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  The core UV-C LED technology has been tested and commercialized. Our supply chain is also ready and proven for this key portion of the product.  We will begin the manufacturing and production process based on the current design of the bottle as soon as we meet our target. With your support, we can quickly scale and expedite the manufacturing and production process so that we can get the LARQ Bottle into hands of thousands, and you can be proud to know that you made it happen.  While we have budgeted sufficient resources and time, we know that there might be things outside of our control and current visibility:  Shipping in Spring 2018 - We plan to place the manufacturing order by the Dec. 2017 / Jan. 2018. We'll iterate, review samples and do quality control in January and February. March 2018 / April 2018 is our shipping estimate when we account for both making revisions and getting the first shipment in from the factory.  Just in time for summer!  We don't anticipate any issues currently with this timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterward.  Battery Life - our initial testing shows our battery life will last around 2-3 months in a combination of normal usage (2-3 fills a day) and in Self Cleaning mode. We are doing further testing to validate this but will ensure battery life will not be something our consumers will ever worry about.

Creator_description: Located less than 10 minutes from Acadia National ParkÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Schoodic Woods, Pocket ParksÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> Campground at Acadia offers quiet, primitive tent camping sites for the true outdoor experience.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ          With the tap of a finger youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve just secured an unforgettable camping experience.ÃÂÃÂ     Gone are the days of being crammed into tiny campsites surrounded by noisy neighbors, only to be charged a luxury hotel price for a parking lot view.  At Acadia East Campground by Pocket Parks, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll have peace of mind in knowing that there is a quiet, spacious, nature-the-way-it-should-be campsite waiting for you.       We're opening a new kind of campground at Acadia National Park on June 1st, 2018.ÃÂÃÂ  Designed for tent camping, we're creating an experience that brings peace & quiet, and   nature   back to camping. No noisy distractions, just the great outdoors. And only 5 minutes from the entrance to Acadia National Park.       Good part: Our regular price is half the average price to tent near Acadia.  Best part: Our Kickstarter Backers can get camping passes for Rewards for $9, $11, or $15 a night, a season pass for $250, or a LIFETIME pass for $2,500. And they never expire until you use them.        Why are we running a Kickstarter Campaign?   To complete the following:   Parking area  Wheelchair accessible camp sites  Digital check-in and camper security system        From the moment a guest books a reservation to the moment they pack up camp to head home, the Pocket Parks camping experience is different. It puts the camper's needs first.ÃÂÃÂ   How? By providing 24-hour customer service by phone, chat, or text. By developing a digital reservation & check-in system that takes you from A-to-Booked-to-Camping all from your smartphone or mobile device.  Want a shaded campsite? Or maybe you like full sun? How about neighbors? Would you prefer a private site, or are you a social butterfly?ÃÂÃÂ   We allow guests to handpick their campsite based on the experience they want, NOT whatever site some automated system chooses.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ 5 minutes north of the Schoodic Entrance to Acadia National Park in Maine.       WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re building  more than a campground .ÃÂÃÂ   At our core, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re lovers of the great outdoors and everyone that takes action to protect our great wild spaces, promote outdoor activity to under-reached populations, and support the greater outdoor community. We believe that in addition to   creating a memorable and affordable camping experience   for our guests, we can also help to   improve each community weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re a part of  ; with our time, resources, financial support, and hard work.   We do this by:ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Since 2004 we have worked to strengthen the connection that others have had with the outdoors. Now, it is our goal to create an outdoor experience that will inspire the next generation of outdoor enthusiasts.  Our company profile is available below for a closer look who we are.        ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         What Facilities/Amenities Will Be Offered?   Facilities will include a main parking lot, an information booth with maps, WiFi credentials, local businesses, and rules for the campground. Paths to each campsite begin at the main entrance. No-potable water on premises.   What Will We Use for Restrooms?   We are hiring a local portable toilet service to provide regularly cleaned facilities throughout the entire season. These are easier on the environment and guarantee regular maintenance.   How Will We Monitor Camper Safety?   Like campgrounds found in the national parks and national forests, Pocket Parks are camp-at-your-own-risk campgrounds. We provide tools to assist campers in their experience including water for campfires, WiFi for connectivity, and information on local emergency services. Additionally, solar/battery powered cellular security cameras provide constant visual surveillance on key locations throughout the campground.   Can I Bring My Dog?   Yes, we love dogs! Please bring food and drinkable water for your pup. We have food and water bowls at each campsite and paw-friendly paths. Dog owners are asked to keep furry friends on a 6 foot leash and respect quiet hours for other guests.   Can I Bring My RV?   The layout, amenities, and lack of through roads make Pocket Parks a tent camping only campground.   Do We Have Group Camping Sites? ÃÂÃÂ   We do have a select number of ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>group camping sitesÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ for up to 6 campers. However, our camp sites are arranged in clusters making it possible to reserve multiple sites near each other.ÃÂÃÂ    How Close is the Campground to Acadia National Park? We are located 7 miles (5-10 minutes) from the entrance to the Schoodic section of Acadia National Park, and 24 miles (34 minutes from the Mount Desert Island section of Acadia.)   Can Guests Have Campfires?   Yes, guests must buy local firewood outside of the campground. Remember to ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>burn where you buy.ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ Invasive species can travel on firewood not harvested locally.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have presented to, and gained approval from, the Planning Board to open the campground; and are currently securing the property that we've selected.  One possible challenge that we may face is the timing of early or late season winter weather in Maine and our efforts to complete the on-premise earthwork for campsite and parking area establishment for May 1st. However, we are confident that we chosen the right additional resources to accomplish all of this work well before this date.

Creator_description: Founded in 2005, with the partnership of professional skier and ski designer Stephan Drake and leading ski engineer Peter Turner, both were inspired by a vision to make perfect skis worthy of those who live and breathe the sport.DPS introduced the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s first and only Pure prepreg carbon fiber sandwich ski, the first 120mm powder pintail, transferred the word ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>rockerÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ from surfing to skiingÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>then built the first rockered ski with sidecutÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>and unleashed the Spoon and Spoon Technology. The fusion of space-age carbon technology and groundbreaking shaping has resulted in the worldÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s most advanced quiver of skis.DPS fosters a tight-knit community between its designers, reps, photographers, partners, and skiersÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>while also supporting environmental initiatives and innovative multimedia projects worldwide.DPS is located at the base of the Wasatch Mountains in Salt Lake City, where it operates and owns a state-of-the-art ski factory, and maintains its global headquarters.DPS is a trusted brand of serious skiers worldwide. They are sold and shipped worldwide via dpsskis.com, and on five continents in the world's best ski shops.
Project_description: Ski wax has been around since the 1850s and has always been assumed to be a necessary piece of the snow sliding puzzle. Its development over time has been dominated by the one-run world of ski racing and less by the needs of the everyday skier or snowboarder.  In the 1980s, again driven by racingÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s desire for speed in small doses, dangerous perfluorocarbons and other toxic chemical additives were included in wax recipes to broaden performance and increase operational temperature ranges. Wax still depends on the need for the inconvenient and constant reapplication of chemical functional groups that cause widespread damage to the environment and those applying it.            Phantom is a permanent, one-time application base-coating that forever eliminates the need for waxing skis and snowboards.   ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a disruptive, truly innovative solution that ushers in a new era in snowsports.ÃÂÃÂ     PhantomÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s patent-pending polymer technology offers ultimate convenience combined with great glide performance that never wanes across all snow temperatures, and for the life of a ski or boardÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s use.ÃÂÃÂ   Phantom eliminates the damage traditional wax does to watersheds, along with the health risks for people applying it.ÃÂÃÂ   Phantom can be applied to any new or used ski or snowboard at any point in a boardÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s life cycle, at a price that quickly delivers strong value.            With a single and permanent application, you get ultimate convenience (no waxing required), elite-level performance, substantial cost savings (no regular waxings), increased base durability, while saying no to the harmful chemical waste found in traditional ski and snowboard waxes.            When you wax a ski or snowboard, enhanced glide is evident for a few hours (soybased waxes) or a few days at best (hot-boxed temperature specific waxes). Wax is an inherently soft topical layer that quickly wears off of base material due to ongoing friction with the snow surface. If regular waxing routines are missed, performance and glide drops drastically. Because waxing is time consuming, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s rarely done with regularity.ÃÂÃÂ   PhantomÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s sophisticated, timed polymerization process permanently penetrates the entire thickness of the base material with powerful go-fast fluoro compositions designed to operate across all snow temperatures. When the ski or snowboard goes into a shop for stone grinding, the next fresh layer of Phantom is exposed ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> ready to glide.ÃÂÃÂ             Unless you are constantly waxing with the correct temperature specific waxes, Phantom is faster across all conditions over time because its performance is consistent: you never suffer the glide degradation that happens when wax starts to quickly wear away.       As skiers and snowboarders who regularly ride at the resort or in the backcountry, we arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t looking to win races. We desire reliable and predictable glide in all snow conditions and terrain.ÃÂÃÂ   Tested in different snow climates around the globe, and backed by extensive lab data, Phantom is noticeably faster than all-temperature wax in warm snow temperatures, and provides similar levels of glide in colder snow temperature ranges.ÃÂÃÂ        Phantom has a characteristic feel: when initially pushing off, or in a lift line, there is nothing distinctive or special. A Phantomed base doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have the slippery feel of fresh wax when moving very slowly. However, after gaining just a little bit of speed, Phantom delivers significant acceleration and achieves strong top-end glide, run after run.ÃÂÃÂ   Phantom also permanently alters the shore hardness of the base material itself; durability and resilience against rock impact increase ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> permanently.                 The innovation centers around the inclusion of glide friendly fluorocarbon functional groups, but in a superior, new delivery method that renders them inert and harmless to life. Phantom doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t cause biological damage, and doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t present any long term environmental risks.ÃÂÃÂ   Traditional hydrocarbon wax can contain environmentally dangerous, cancer causing chemicals such as: acetone, benzene, 2-butanone (methyl ethyl ketone), carbon disulfide, carbon tetrachloride, cresol, chlorobenzene, carbon monoxide, cyclopentene, ethyl benzene, mercury, styrene, tetrachloroethene, toluene, and xylene.ÃÂÃÂ        The dangers of wax begin during factory production where chemicals can seep into the surrounding watershed.ÃÂÃÂ   It then extends to those who apply wax in a shop or home environment. If you have ever seen images of world cup tuners applying fluorinated waxes with masks straight out of a nuclear fallout, you now may have an idea why. Even with non-flourinated waxes, toxin-laden fumes are inhaled into the lungs during the application process. Studies in Norway and Sweden have shown that technicians carry extremely high levels of perfluorochemicals (PFCs) and other chemicals found in ski wax in their bloodstreams. PFOA, for example, has been shown to be 45 times that of the general population, and is a direct catalyst to cancers, cardiovascular diseases, and hormone irregularities. Phantom eliminates the nasty chemical risk for shop technicians.  Wax damage then spreads globally when a ski or snowboard is ridden down the mountain. Because wax is inherently softer than base material, friction from snow causes it to shed into the ecosystem during the use/degradation process (the reason you have to constantly reapply wax). You can see this effect on a warm day when the snow beneath your boards turns the color of your wax. When springtime arrives, wax flows into streams, rivers, and soil. Toxic chemicals then react with organic systems: fish, land animals, plants, and human drinking water are all subject to reactions that create permanent free radical damage. Worse yet, PFCs are indestructible and proliferate indefinitely throughout the ecosystem, causing ongoing damage to life.ÃÂÃÂ        Some manufacturers with an interest in sustainability have developed soy-based wax alternatives, but these waxes only last for a few runs and do not have the effective operating temperature range performance that can be achieved with the inclusion of harmful chemicals. The performance is simply not there.ÃÂÃÂ   Phantom upends this whole narrative, and presents a clean future for snowsports while delivering both performance and convenience.            PhantomÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s approach is a truly innovative, advanced scientific advancement. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a recipe that works day after day, tune after tune, and forever fundamentally changes our conception and approach to fast running boards designed for daily use.  DPS examined a history of alternative approaches that attempted to solve the wax problem, but nothing was deemed competitive. The Company then began a developmental relationship with a group of leading material scientists to research and attack the problem via a novel polymerization approach.ÃÂÃÂ   Initial Phantom research and development went through over forty different compound variations and extensive validation in both the lab and the mountains of Utah, Chile, and New Zealand to come to the formula.ÃÂÃÂ        Lab results that have correlated the hydrophobicity, coefficient of friction, shore hardness and full base penetration sit in harmony with test ski days in every condition: from manmade snow, warm spring snow, to fresh powder.ÃÂÃÂ                           Risks and challenges  DPS has been designing and launching snowsports products for over a decade. We are confident in our ability to produce and deliver this product. The remaining risk is validating performance in extreme cold weather scenarios, which we hope to finish by late November 2017ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>prior to production.

Blurb: Recycle your food scraps in a completely safe and convenient way AND make renewable energy

Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:204 backers|Israel:83 backers|Australia:59 backers|United Kingdom:27 backers|Canada:20 backers|France:17 backers|Germany:16 backers|Chile:15 backers|Mexico:13 backers|Spain:10 backers
Creator_description: HomeBiogas produces household biogas appliances which turn your food leftovers and animal waste into gas for cooking and fertilizer for your plants. The HomeBiogas appliance enables people access to clean, affordable and renewable energy while providing a viable solution for organic waste management.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ The Kickstarter sale ended, but you haven't missed out.  HomeBiogas 2.0 is still available for purchase!    We're so happy to see a passionate community of hundreds of biogas pioneer from all over the world! Thank you to our Kickstarter backers!        ÃÂÃÂ        Following the success of HomeBiogas1.0, we have developed a new biogas appliance that will enable families around the world to cook on renewable energy. The HomeBiogas 2.0 is the most efficient, affordable and rewarding way to transform food waste and animal manure into energy in your own backyard!     Got 30 seconds? Here's how the HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance can benefit you:         ÃÂÃÂ        New to Biogas? Great! Learning how to make your own renewable energy from food waste is a fascinating and truly rewarding journey. We designed HomeBiogas 2.0 to be super simple and easy to use.ÃÂÃÂ  Just toss in your organic waste, and the bacteria will do the rest. Here are the basics of how it works:       ÃÂÃÂ Leftover food or food scraps may not be suitable for eating, but they still have calories that can be used to create energy. So don't throw them out! Put food waste or animal manure into the appliance. The bacteria in the digester will break down the organic matter and convert it into biogas and fertilizer.ÃÂÃÂ The gas bag holds 700 liters of biogas at all times, ready for all your cooking needs. It is a 100% off-the-grid and natural process, similar to what happens in your own stomach.   WATCH: The fascinating process in 10 seconds!        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ          COOKING WITH YOUR FOOD WASTE   Feed your food waste to HomeBiogas 2.0 and get up to 3 hours of cooking gas daily. It looks, smells, and burns just like any traditional gas would, the only difference is that this gas is made from recycling in your own backyard!       ÃÂÃÂ    HIGH-QUALITY LIQUID FERTILIZER   The other outcome is all high-quality liquid fertilizer. No mess or work needed. The fertilizer flows from the user-friendly pouring sleeve straight into your fertilizer can. You will be proud to nourish your plants and food garden with a  natural  product, free from harmful chemicals and additives!ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ    TEACH THE YOUNG GENERATION TO RECYCLE   HomeBiogas 2.0 enables households to embrace recycling and teach sustainable practices to the young generation. Education and leading by example are the most effective ways of creating new and positive habits. Imagine children growing up knowing that food scraps are not waste, they are valuable!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Choose a location in your backyard for HomeBiogas 2.0. It can be up to 20 meters from the kitchen. Then assemble it by connecting a few parts and filling up the digester with water. Assembly is super easy and should only take an hour! After assembly, activate the appliance the old-fashioned way, using animal manure, or using a bacteria kit. Activation only needs to be done  one time , and once activation is done, you will be able to feed HomeBiogas 2.0 with your food scraps and produce free, renewable energy on a daily basis!       ÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ Composting is certainly a good step in the right direction, but with HomeBiogas, you can get more out of your waste. Unsure about why HomeBiogas is the future of waste composting? Let us show you:       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  Appliance Features:        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ       HomeBiogas 2.0 is a powerful tool that can help mitigate climate change! It is an off-the-grid appliance, meaning that it does not depend on the use of any non-renewable power source. There are several ways in which HomeBiogas 2.0 reduces greenhouse gas emissions.    DIVERTS WASTE FROM LANDFILLS   Local waste management with HomeBiogas 2.0 diverts food scraps from becoming landfill waste. When food goes to the landfill, the nutrients in the food never return to the soil. Rather, the wasted food rots and produces methane gas which is released into the atmosphere and contributes to global warming. When you use HomeBiogas 2.0 you will be recycling your food scraps in your own backyard and recycling the methane your food produces.       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    REDUCES DEPENDENCE ON FOSSIL FUELS   When you choose to cook on biogas that was made from your food waste, you are reducing the demand for fossil fuels, which are non-renewable resources. Mining, processing and transporting fossil fuels take a lot of energy and resources, which is harmful to the environment and is a leading contributor to climate change.        ÃÂÃÂ    SLOWS DOWN DEFORESTATION   Nearly 3 billion people around the world burn wood for daily cooking and heating. Burning wood releases emissions that are contributors to global climate change: carbon dioxide, methane and black carbon. Wood harvesting also contributes to loss of biodiversity and forest degradation. The use of biogas slows down this detrimental deforestation and gives an alternative to cooking on wood or charcoal.        ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ HomeBiogas 2.0 is our second model, the first one, HomeBiogas 1.0, was a huge success! Since its retail sales began in 2016, HomeBiogas 1.0 is used in 76 countries worldwide! Although our customers come from diverse cultures,  they share similar goals of wanting to reduce food waste and generate renewable energy.       ÃÂÃÂ        HomeBiogas is a socially oriented company that cares about spreading biogas technology to all. During the campaign, you can get involved too! WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve partnered with local organizations in Puerto Rico and in Kenya so that we can provide clean energy to the families who need it. Your donation will go straight to the purchase of a HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance for either of these causes. In return, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll match your donation through funding shipment of the system, leading local training, and providing continued maintenance. YouÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll receive periodic updates about the impact the HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance is making. You can select the $50 Donation Pledge, or to donate moreÃÂÃÂ  click here , and make a pledge without a reward.        ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        HomeBiogas convierte tus desechos de comida en gas y fertilizante lÃÂÃÂ­quido diariamente.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ¿CÃÂÃÂ³mo funciona?ÃÂÃÂ Es un sistema muy fÃÂÃÂ¡cil de armar, activar y mantener.ÃÂÃÂ Se introducen los desechos orgÃÂÃÂ¡nicos al sistema, las bacterias  en el tanque biodigestor comerÃÂÃÂ¡n los desechos, con eso crearÃÂÃÂ¡n 3 horas de gas para cocinar y lo que sobra se convertirÃÂÃÂ¡ en un fertlizante limpio, verde y sano.   Otros Beneficios:         ÃÂÃÂ Precios y envÃÂÃÂ­o   El precio final del sistema, luego de la campaÃÂÃÂ±a de Kickstarter, serÃÂÃÂ¡ US$790  (no incluye la cocina de biogÃÂÃÂ¡s).ÃÂÃÂ Aprovecha la oportunidad de la campaÃÂÃÂ±a para llevarte el sistema a a US$460 (40% de descuento) e incluye una cocina de biogÃÂÃÂ¡sÃÂÃÂ El envÃÂÃÂ­o aproximado: marzo 2018. Contacto: nicole@homebiogas.com  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ The Bio Toilet connects to the existing HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance to create cooking gas and fertilizer from human waste. The Bio Toilet is a low flush toilet (uses only 1.2 liters of water per flush), that does not require running water and can utilize grey water. The Bio Toilet is perfect for those wishing to live off-the-grid, and is a solution for underserved communities that do not have access to latrines. Just like HomeBiogas 2.0, the toilet will arrive in a small box, and has a simple do-it-yourself assembly. Multiple toilets have already been put into use, being tested both at the HomeBiogas headquarters and in the field. In 2018 it will be available as an accessory to HomeBiogas 2.0. Contact info@homebiogas.com to get more information.         ÃÂÃÂ Some pictures from the field:        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        We are 16 environmental enthusiasts who share core values and dream of make a meaningful change for the planet. We are passionate that backyard biogas production is the way of the future and an answer to so many global issues.  In the years to come, we will continue educating and pushing for our vision to enable biogas for all!ÃÂÃÂ  Thank you for supporting us and helping our dream become a reality!       ÃÂÃÂ  The Creation Process   In January 2017, we set out to improve the HomeBiogas appliance. We took all the feedback we got from existing customers using HomeBiogas 1.0 and worked to sharpen features and improve user experience. It was also very important for us to lower the production cost, so that we could get biogas technology to the people who need it the very most- those who still don't have a readily available, safe or affordable cooking source. We married theÃÂÃÂ science of biodigestion with a new and improved design, and in May 2017, we arrived at HomeBiogas 2.0.ÃÂÃÂ Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver this renewable energy generator to your door!       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ     Pledge Tiers    $29.00- HomeBiogas T-shirt, including shippingÃÂÃÂ   $50.00- Donate towards sending a HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance to the cause of your choice   (Click to learn more)   $100.00-ÃÂÃÂ Donate towards sending a HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance to the cause of your choice  (Click to learn more)ÃÂÃÂ    $460.00 - Super Early Bird: HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance, biogas stove, production boosting beads  $490.00- Early Bird: HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance, biogas stove  $540.00- HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance, biogas stove  $3,600- Re-Seller Offer: A pallet of 10 HomeBiogas 2.0 appliances, free 3-day re-sellers workshop at the company headquarters  (Click to learn more)    The full retail price for HomeBiogas 2.0 will be $790 (not including the biogas stove), so you're getting a great deal by supporting us on Kickstarter. We will not be selling HomeBiogas 2.0 in retail until all Kickstarter rewards have been shipped.    International Backers & Shipping   We will ship HomeBiogas 2.0 worldwide, however, we are unable to ship to the following countries: India, China, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Pakistan, Sudan, Syria, Jordan, Egypt, Oman Yemen Algeria, Bahrain, Comoros, Djibouti, Morocco, Qatar, Tunisia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.ÃÂÃÂ   Shipping Costs:   USA & Europe- $99.00  Australia- $149.00  Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, Chile- $149.00  Israel- $70.00  All other countries- $189.00   HomeBiogas is proud to subsidize a percentage of shipping cost to give you, the consumer, the lowest possible shipping price. The estimated delivery is March 2018.   Warranty   We stand firmly behind our product. Each HomeBiogas 2.0 includes a 24-month warranty.  Click here for more information .       ÃÂÃÂ        If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@homebiogas.com or  chat with us here !ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  This is our second crowdfunding campaign and we have learned a lot from our previous project and the challenges that came with it. It's important to know that HomeBiogas 2.0 is nearly a finalized prototype. Currently, we have 10 systems working in the field in Beta testing. Our main challenge is to raise enough funds to jump-start our production line and deliver straight to your door.   We know that there are some unexpected hurdles when going to production. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we have been working closely with suppliers and manufacturers to address those challenges head-on. We hope to stick to our timeline and so that we will not have shipping delays.

Blurb: SPARTAN Faraday Boxers - High-Tech Boxers for your Manhood: new colors and collection

Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:63 backers|Germany:21 backers|France:14 backers|Switzerland:14 backers|United Kingdom:13 backers|Canada:9 backers|Austria:5 backers|Belgium:4 backers|Italy:4 backers|Netherlands:4 backers
Creator_description: We are a young startup based in Paris & New York City, and we are passionate about health and technology.Deeply concerned by the harmful effect of wireless radiations, we wanted to create a stylish high-tech boxer to keep using all of the technology available while not endangering our health. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been working day and night for months to bring you the best and safest undergarment to protect your health and fertility. Our ambition: raise the standard of men underwear and make radiation-blocking underwear mainstream!
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Try picturing life without Uber, Google and Amazon (who said Tinder?). Kind of hard: wireless technology is amazing, and it has truly changed the way we lived over the past few years.       However, youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve probably heard how a number of major scientific institutions around the world have raised alarms over the harmful effects of wireless radiation on our health. Over the last years, male fertility has been on the decline, and testicle cancer is one of the most frequent cancers of young men. If the debate on radiation is still opened, the Cleveland Clinic - the countryÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s leading center for clinical research in male fertility - found that men who keep their phones in their pocket for more than 4 hours per day experience a 50% reduction in sperm count!Here at SPARTAN, we didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to this to threaten our modern life. We want to keep using technology without changing any of our habits. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we have created the SPARTAN Boxers.       The SPARTAN Boxer is the boxer of the future. For the first time, we are bringing together design with innovation to create underwear that shields your family jewels from wireless radiation.       With SPARTAN, you just have to put on your comfy underwear in the morning to happily use your smartphone, tablet and computer with all the peace of mind of knowing your manhood and most important assets are safe.       WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re bringing to underwear the same advanced technology used in space suits (no kidding!). We developed a unique technology, WaveTech, a high-tech fabric incorporating pure silver fibers within the cotton of the boxer.WaveTech acts as a faraday cage (or electromagnetic shielding), which prevents radiation from reaching your cherries. Our SPARTAN Boxers have been tested by the MET Laboratory, Baltimore, USA and they block over 99% of all cellphone and Wi-Fi radiation.       The hard part when creating WaveTech was to manage to integrate the Silver Fiber in the cotton of the boxer without losing elasticity or creating a rigid fabric. We wanted to shield our little soldiers, but definitely not to wear armor. It took us months of work and hundreds of prototypes and different fabrics to get it just right, but we finally manage to create a fabric that is just as comfortable as your regular pair of undies.       The good news is that the silver it contains also makes SPARTAN boxers naturally anti-bacterial, so you and your downstairs area stay fresh at the end of the day. Stinky undies are already part of the past.       We know you want the best for your crown jewels. We sure do. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we chose to design SPARTAN boxers in the Fashion Capital of the world: Paris, France.       Our stylists have been working with one clear goal in mind: surpass the level of comfort and style of the best undergarment already out there.With SPARTAN, we are truly raising the standard of male undergarment with high-quality French design for optimal comfort and an exceptional fit.       ÃÂÃÂ        Thousands of people in the world are already wearing SPARTAN but we are always hard at work to make SPARTAN even better.  We are now introducing new models with improved band and labels for more comfort, as well as new colors.  Going from Black and Blue, we are now introducing the very demanded Red, as well as Green and Grey.       Your favorite color is not in there? We would love to produce more, and have you vote for the colors YOU prefer. Keep an eye out for our stretched goals!       ÃÂÃÂ We have our final prototypes, and our manufacturers in Portugal are ready to get started. Everything is set and we can get started.  But in order to do this, we need to produce upfront an important quantity of fabric for each color. We cannot do this without you.We already have a good amount of our blue and black fabric, so we only need $2,000 to start the new collection. Each of our stretch goal will enable us to add a new color to the collection!  Here is what we need for each new color:       You will be asked for the colors and sizes you want at the end of the campaign, so that you can get the broadest choices possible depending on the goals we reach.  For the next few days, you have the opportunity to take part in the SPARTAN project and help us save humanity with boxers. For the occasion, we have created a Kickstarter-only price to help you get SPARTAN for yourself or your loved ones.       We are not a new company that will struggle to deliver, and we have got thousands of customers in the US and in over 20 countries. Here is our timeline:       ÃÂÃÂ              ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ We also share our newest actualities and create giveaway contests from time to time on Facebook and Twitter, so be sure to keep an eye out!ÃÂÃÂ       We are a young startup based in Paris & New York City, and we are passionate about health and technology.ÃÂÃÂ Concerned by the impact of cellphone and wifi radiation, we wanted to create a stylish high-tech boxer to keep using all of the technology available and stay safe. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been working day and night for months to bring you the best and safest undergarment to protect your health and fertility. Our ambition: raise the standard of men underwear and make those "super-boxers" mainstream!ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  We have been working for months with the best manufacturing and fulfillment companies and we made sure to mitigate as many risks as possible, but we know that there will be hurdles along the way. Here are the main challenges we face:  Ship Date: We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and we are confident we can deliver on time, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned.  Product changes:  As we refine our design based on additional community feedback, slight changes might be made such as a color change or more designs available.  Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us create the healthiest good looking boxer by clicking the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>Back This ProjectÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> button at the top of the page, and by spreading the word by sharing our page.  From all of us at Spartan, THANK YOU so much for your help!

Project_description: We are currently developing a cable which does not have the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>front and backÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> barrier, it will be able to be used in IPHONE and MICRO USB.       Both sides can be plugged into IPHONEBoth sides can also be MICRO USBA cable the can be plugged in both sides        ÃÂÃÂ Currently all cables cannot be plugged into a device if the cable is not plugged in the mandatory fashion            ÃÂÃÂ Nylon weave,with sturdy and durable surface, Can withstand 50KG of tension                       ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  The Cable is 1m Length                           Risks and challenges  When we first being research and development, the most difficult problem we had to solve was precision of the head of our cable. We have made several 3D PRINTER samples in order to ensure size standard, because even witha 0.1mmmiscalculation of the cableÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s plug size will not fit into the socket of a device. In the beginning, it was very difficult to find any factories to make our prototype cable because it was not cost effective for them. But with a friendÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s help we finally were able to successfully produce our first prototype with a factory.  Due to the technical difficulties of our new product, we had to make many changes to improve the quality of our cable, finding a willing factory to produce a prototype was extremely difficult.   Despite the challenges we had we finally completed of product, which was meticulously tested to ensure our product is running smoothly, our tests were aimed at: durability, external durability (such as skin tension, wear resistance, etc.), including the compatibility to the iPhone in the future. Our current challenge is that we can complete the fundraising, and how we can complete the mass production of our product and delivery them to our supporters at the exact time. If we complete the fund raising, we will make unscheduled visits to the factory and random quality checks to ensure the quality of our cables.

Blurb: This system is ideal for any traveler, adventurer, or person who wants the freedom to sleep easily and luxuriously in their own vehicle!
Project_Community_top_cities: |Blue Ridge-United States:2 backers|Thompson-Canada:1 backer|Barry-United States:1 backer|Belmont-United States:1 backer|Boulder-United States:1 backer|Cedar Rapids-United States:1 backer|Jacksonville-United States:1 backer|Loveland-United States:1 backer|San Diego-United States:1 backer|Santa Barbara-United States:1 backer

Creator_description: A Colorado based company trying to change mobile sleeping and travel as we know it.
Project_description: Introducing Notel: The first and foremost technology of its kind that allows you to sleep comfortably in your own vehicle anywhere, anytime.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Are you the type of person that loves adventure? Do you pride yourself on being prepared for whatever lies ahead in the future? Do you love to travel and spend countless hours on the road or mountains, seeing where your vehicle can take you? Or are you even just someone who travels for work, often finding themselves tired while driving deep in the hours of the night? NOTEL IS FOR YOU       FAST and convenient sleep is now available with Notel. Notel systems provide quick and easy access to safe sleep, free from the hassles and time needed for tents and Hotels. Thanks to its patented design and lightweight yet durable build, Notel allows you to easily and COMFORTABLY sleep in your vehicle. In minutes, you can go from commuting to comfortable sleep - with NOTEL.     Designed to operate easily in your vehicle    Our founder experienced the need for this product first hand while driving through the depths of Yellowstone National Park. He lost track of time as he ventured around the park enjoying the endless possibilities of exploration. Soon enough, he realized it was much too late to continue his drive past the park so he went on a wild search for a hotel room, with absolutely no luck. Not only could he not find a room, he also hadnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t thought to bring along a tent. That night he barely slept in the discomfort of his own car. In the midst of this sleepless night he came up with the idea for Notel.        Strap suspended system is fully adjustable, allowing for a completely flat surface, no matter the angle of the vehicleÃÂÃÂ   High density polyethylene sleeping surface is hydrophobic, protecting the system from the effects of moisture, spills, and damage from outdoor storageÃÂÃÂ   Comfortably sleeps any person in virtually any truck or SUVÃÂÃÂ   Lightweight telescoping aluminum frame supports flat sleeping surface and highly compatible storageÃÂÃÂ   Adaptability allows easy transfer between vehiclesÃÂÃÂ   Designed to securely install without any modifications to the vehicleÃÂÃÂ   Bonuses include: reduced camp set-up and take-down time, instant mobility, and protection from bugs, animals, and weather.ÃÂÃÂ   450 pound weight limit. Total weight of 32 pounds             This unique mobile sleeping system is great for many situations. The all-American outdoor experience was the idea of visionaries like President Theodore Roosevelt.  This campaign is an opportunity to promote and strengthen America's tradition of outdoor recreation on public lands. We hope to motivate more Americans to leave their homes for the wonders of nature, knowing they will remain comfortable and safe no matter the conditions. This 100% Made in America product is as much about the promise in the quality of our product as it is about the shared experiences being created when adventuring and enjoying the outdoors.  It is about making memories by taking the kids on a fishing trip, traveling, hiking, fishing, skiing, snowboarding, camping, beach excursions. Gaining independence, enjoying the freedom of nature without the risk and uncomforted insecurity and cost of hotel rooms. Taking the bugs, scary noises, and uncomfortable surfaces out of camping. Changing the way camping and traveling is experienced as we know it is what the Notel team is all about.            1. The passenger seat is reclined as far as possible with the headrest removed.  2. The aluminum frame is suspended and positioned above the passenger seat.  3. The polyethylene sleeping surface is attached to the aluminum frame.  4. Enjoy a comfortable sleeping space anywhere on demand!     System Assembly       Expanded Form       System Disassembly       Compressed Form       Compacts In Place During Travel         Introducing the Notel 2.0: Compressible Z-Tech SystemÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   The Notel 2.0 Compressible Z-Tech System is able to compress into a fourth of its original size and store easily. The telescoping aluminum frame and hinged High Density Polyethylene allows the Notel system to fold and slide into an easy to carry and easy to store form.ÃÂÃÂ   Through constant development and hard work by the Notel development team, we are now able to introduce the awesomely versatile and official, "Notel Compressible Vehicle Sleeping System."          Durability Tested For Quality Assurance    We are hard at work in Loveland Colorado to assure a highly functional and adaptable system, able to take the forces of life and adapt to the many unforeseen changes experienced while adventuring.ÃÂÃÂ Rule the nights.  With Notel, you never have to stop exploring.     The possibilities are endless!        Risks and challenges  .

Blurb: Animated LED coffee table. Create your own animations, play arcade games, wireless music-reactive, and smartphone controlled!
