Project_Community_top_countries: |France:6 backers|Germany:4 backers|Austria:2 backers|Italy:1 backer|Latvia:1 backer|Sweden:1 backer|United Kingdom:1 backer|United States:1 backer
Creator_description: Aerospace mechanical engineer during daytime, DIY guru overnight! :)
Project_description: A great way to enhance your place vibes and impress your friends!   The LED Table is an interactive coffee table displaying cool effects and animations synced with your music, as well as games and is fully controllable using your smart phone. Customize your effects to impress friends and family, light up your parties and get a smooth  ambient light in your living room.            ÃÂÃÂ Whether you would like to get this turnkey LED table in the available colors ( Black, White, Oak, Birch ) or if you prefer to go DIY style and to build you own table by integrating our DIY KIT, you will be able to enjoy all these vibrant lighting effects and you will be part of the LED Table community!         One of many animations         With real-time sound analysis, beat-and-frequency-based animations will bring your parties to a new level! The LED table comes with 4 already built-in music-enhancing visual effects, just enough to get your first party started!         Real-time animation with YOUR music!         ÃÂÃÂ The table also comes with multiple games, includingÃÂÃÂ  Pong, Block stacker, Snake, Jumper  and something that many requested and enjoyed for years:  Drinking games!  I canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t even count the number of awesome parties we had with this table! You never get bored! Use your smartphone to interact with the games.ÃÂÃÂ          Jumper game          Create your own  set of animations using the   online editor  . You can share your creations at  TheLEDTable.com ÃÂÃÂ and  explore all the community animations . If you fall in love with one of the many animations available, then just grab it and upload it to your table!ÃÂÃÂ            ÃÂÃÂ Switch it on and off, change the light intensity, play games and select animations to play. Connect your table via Bluetooth and control everything through the Android App. Available on Android devices only at the moment.                 ÃÂÃÂ For you, DIY-addicts and custom-build fans out here, the electronics is available as a kit. You can create your own table with your own grid to make it BIGGER.... or smaller! I mean you could even do you own LED BAR!  This includes all the features of the LED Table with Bluetooth module / SD card module / Microphone amplifier / Power supply ÃÂÃÂ / LED Strip...  Put these LEDs in your own creation, plug the box and voila!            ÃÂÃÂ You will receive off the shelf more than 30 animations including procedural effects (real-time generated eye-candy) , 5 awesome retro games andÃÂÃÂ 4 music-generated effects to have fun with your friends.  And donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t forget ! You can explore the community gallery at  TheLEDTable.com                                                     ÃÂÃÂ  I created my first LED Table back in 2013, when I was an engineering student in France. It worked nicely and we had many unforgettable parties around it! Since then my friend have been relentlessly asking me for their own table!  However, the table was very experimental and I spent a lot of money developing it with a lot of complex custom made printed circuit boards. While it was a lot of fun for me, people were surprised and not attracted by the overall cost of this project which was sad! While hardware was expensive, on the other hand I developed quite a bit of software to control the table creating a strong software core.       ÃÂÃÂ  I created the second prototype in 2015 when I moved to England. Well new house means new furniture =) This one was twice as big as the prototype, faster and cheaper, with more visual effects. I implemented the smartphone control and drastically decreased the building time.My new friends were amazed, and the requests to build more table were rushing once againÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦Seeing so much enthusiasm for my project drove me to go the extra mile and make my LED Table affordable.       This brings us to 2017. I decided to combine my willingness to bring this design to a larger audience, my drive for entrepreneurship and the appeal and interactivity of crowdfunding. My goal is to share the project around a community and see how far we can go together. This is why I focus so much on the sharing aspect of the effects/animation creation with  TheLEDTable.com .ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ We look forward to hearing your feedback! Thank you!      Risks and challenges  This is a very low risk project since the design is based on 2 mature prototypes that were tested for 4 years. The software is finished as well, with endurance testing. We know the table can run for months with no interruption.  The table was designed for fast and easy assembly, and I will be responsible for assembly so this part of the project is secure. All the electrical components are readily available with short lead time and multiple suppliers so this is not an issue as well.  Packaging and delivery are planned ahead. The table was designed to fit best packaging and the cost of delivery for all our target countries have been calculated. So no financial surprise here that could compromise the project.

Blurb: This model of truck is a popular light duty truck. 3D print your own 1/64 scale model by supporting this project.
Creator_description: I have been building world class 1/64 scale truck replicas since 2012 as Rockin H Farm Toys. Check out Rockin Farm Toys on Facebook and Instagram as well as www.rockinhfarmtoys.com. My goal has been not only to create life long memories in model trucks, but also to teach enthusiasts and novices how to make their own memories via videos showing step by step how to do it. 3D printing has been a great way to expand what I do by offering a variety of products not currently manufactured.
Project_description: I have been producing 3D printed projects since 2012 paying designers around the world to produce the designs. Once the designs are completed Shapeways has been the source for printing these files in a variety materials.ÃÂÃÂ   This design will offer backers an opportunity to support and receive a variety of designs that will print in Frosted Ultra Detail at Shapeways. In addition, the source files will be included if depending on the level backers support this project.ÃÂÃÂ   My goal is to produce a model not produced commercially and give backers an opportunity to print their own models for their own purposes. Whether it is producing models for your own customs or creating a store and selling prints these files will jump start your collection and or business.ÃÂÃÂ   The best thing is supports will not have to go through the trouble of finding a designer or all the hassle of collecting drawings and dimensions to get the designs perfect. I will be doing all that for supporters making it easier to get quality designs.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The challenges to 3D printing is finding a designer, agreeing on a budget, ordering test prints for quality control and changing the designs as needed to get the best prints possible. In addition, meeting  all design specifications per Shapeways print guidelines.   This is where costs can add up quickly as additional fees can occur when redesigns and modifications are needed after test prints. Not to mention, when a test print is ordered and requires the digital file to be modified, the test print is generally unusable which is a sunk cost in the process.   This is the advantage to supporters as I will pay all those costs with your help to ensure the designs are right from the start.   As part of this process, this project will be updated and designs are received so backers can watch the process unfold.

Blurb: Technology and art meet to form a spherical display, featuring over 491,000 full colour pixels
Project_Community_top_cities: |London-United Kingdom:2 backers|Melbourne-Australia:2 backers|New York-United States:2 backers|Montreal-Canada:1 backer|Canterbury-United Kingdom:1 backer|Lytham-United Kingdom:1 backer|Richmond-United Kingdom:1 backer|Katowice-Poland:1 backer|Vienna-Austria:1 backer|Plan-d'Orgon-France:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:18 backers|United Kingdom:6 backers|Germany:4 backers|Australia:3 backers|South Korea:2 backers|Spain:2 backers|Switzerland:2 backers|United Arab Emirates:1 backer|Austria:1 backer|Belgium:1 backer
Creator_description: After graduating from the University of Kent with a degree in computer systems engineering in 2013 I began a PhD in electronic engineering, again at Kent. My main field of research is the fusion of multi-spectral image data and its accelerated processing in hardware.
Project_description: What is Globe?  Formed from a single ring of LEDs rotating 15 times a second, Globe is a spherical display of over 491,000 pixels that can be viewed from all angles.  With a resolution of 1920x256 true colour pixel, a frame rate of 15Hz and a Raspberry Pi at its heart, Globe is capable of displaying images, video, games or anything else you could put on a traditional monitor.     Daytime over America    As a piece that draws the eye, Globe is perfect for artistic displays, as a platform for advertising or simply as a cool gadget.  ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ How it works (simple version)  Because of the persistence of vision effect, anything which comes into our vision remains there for about 1/10th to 1/15th of a second. It is this effect that allows us to write words with sparklers in the air, perform the "bendy pencil" trick and allowed CRT TVs and monitors to function.         Globe uses a circular disk with 256 RGB LEDs around the edge which is then spun about the Z axis. By changing the colour of each LED 1920 times every rotation, and rotating 15 times a second we can create a spherical display of 491,520 pixels.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ      Exploded view    By doing a bit of processing with the electronics in the middle we are able to display any content of our choosing. An HDMI source generates the image data, an FPGA then buffers each image and distributes it to the appropriate LED driver.  For the in depth explanation as to how Globe works head on over to the  blog .       How can it be controlled and what can it be used for?  Globe will come with an Android and IOS app along with a straightforward web interface. You can then upload your own media or select from a range of prebuilt content to display; simply select the desired content and add it to the sequence.  GlobeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s pre-built content will allow you to display solar bodies such as Mars, Jupiter or even Ganymede, with their real time day & night cycles.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   It will also be possible to overlay a range of meteorological and environmental data onto the earth, such as cloud cover, wind speed, air pressure, temperature, lightning strikes and earthquakes, as well as human influences like air and marine traffic, national borders, rocket launches and satellite positions.     Day/night sequence    As a particularly eye catching display coupled with the fact that it can be seen from all angles, Globe is perfect for advertising and artistic displays; by placing it in the center of a room you can be sure it will draw everyoneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s gaze.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ      Kerbin    ÃÂÃÂ      Earth, day/night and cloud    Rewards & shipping    The exact specification of Globe may change slightly over the course of the project but its approximate specifications are:   Display diameter: 310mm   Overall housing dimensions: 400x400x700mm  Resolution: 1920x256  Weight: 15kg   Housing material: Anodised aluminium, wood veneer (multiple options)  Display case: Perspex  Power: 100 - 240V AC 50/60 Hz (cable provided)   The power supply will be set to correct voltage for the shipping destination. If you would like it to be set otherwise please add a note to your order.  ÃÂÃÂ Progress so far and work remaining  So far a proof of concept prototype has been built, clearing a large number of the hurdles in bringing Globe to life. This includes the vast bulk of the firmware coding, the majority of the PCB design and general mechanical design.   The next revision of the PCB design has been completed and is ready to be submitted for manufacture.    October - November:  Kickstarter Campaign    November - March:  Contract software development. Hardware development.    March - April:  Build pre-production prototype and finalise designs   April:  Order all components     May:  Assemble all Globes   June:  Quality control and safety testing   July:  Ship!       Risks and challenges  As with any startup venture there are associated risks which will need to be managed. The three key areas of risk are identified below along with the appropriate mitigating measures. 1.	Production times may slip: Each Globe is a fairly complex device consisting of multiple customised parts from different suppliers. Manufacturing delays for any of these parts may lead to delays in the assembly of the final units. To mitigate this potential risk I have selected reliable manufacturers for these bespoke components and have evaluated their reliability, turnaround and customer service during the creation of the prototype.  2. Demand could exceed my expectations: Although the first Kickstarter campaign has given me a pretty good idea of the demand, things may be different the second time around. If demand exceeds this then I am prepared. Quotes and delivery estimates for significantly more than the minimum funding target have been obtained from our chosen suppliers to allow us to maintain our shipping target dates even if demand is much higher than expected.  3. There may be unforeseen delays in the development process: So far I have built a working prototype, identified the future development work that needs to be conducted and devised an appropriate work plan with a reasonable margin in the timeline to accommodate the delays that traditionally crop up.

Project_description: uFunbrush  is the world's first  patented  U-shape sonic toothbrush for kids. Designed by parents to help make the experience of brushing their kids' teeth easy.       ÃÂÃÂ   Why uFunbrush?ÃÂÃÂ   One of the biggest issues for parentsÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦is getting their kids to brush their teeth!. When kids finally do brush, it may not be effective and certainly not fun. uFunbrush was developed to put the FUN into brushing teeth. uFunbrush is the Fun solution for kids! It takes away the headache of a daily ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>choreÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and makes brushing FUN! And guess whatÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦parents like it too!        The Fun Solution!   uFunbrush brushes all your children's teeth at once for a complete clean in just ten seconds.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ         BRUSHING THAT'S EASIER   uFunbrush is a revolutionary U-shaped sonic toothbrush that cleans allÃÂÃÂ  teeth at one time. All your kids need to do is simply bite down, press a single button, have fun for 10 seconds, and have perfectly clean teeth!        BRUSHING THAT'S SAFE   Made with heat-resistant, non-toxic, non-sticky, odorless, food grade liquid silicon. uFunbrush is Nitrosamine free and complies with FDA standards.        BRUSHING THAT'S BETTER ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   uFunbrush offers a perfect clean without the struggle. Most young children do not have the manual dexterity to brush properly, leaving behind germs and bacteria that can cause bad breath, tooth decay and gingivitis.       ÃÂÃÂ  BRUSHING THAT'S FUN   Get the kids excited about oral hygiene and make teeth brushing a fun experience! uFunbrush comes with a variety of fun stickers for the front of the base.             ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ    It's time for kids to have FUN brushing their teeth!        The soft silicone bristles clean teeth in a completely nonabrasive way, and deliver a soothing gum massage. uFunbrush encourages your children to form healthy oral-care habits.        ÃÂÃÂ       ÃÂÃÂ           FILL:  Fill the uFunbrush head with your child's favorite toothpaste.   PRESS:  Put the uFunbrush head into their mouth and hit the power button.ÃÂÃÂ    CLEAN: ÃÂÃÂ uFunbrush will clean their teeth and automatically turn off in TEN seconds!ÃÂÃÂ    RINSE:  Thoroughly rinse the uFunbrush head after every use.   Avoid messy mornings with the uFunbrush! The special uFunbrush head design keeps the toothpaste inside the mouth!       Save valuable time in the morning with the 10 second automatic timer!       ÃÂÃÂ The food grade liquid silicone cleans up fast and easy. Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ   uFunbrush Head  Made from high quality food grade liquid silicone with six sides of soft bristles. The bristles include top, bottom, front, back, left, and right. The soft bristles cover all the childrenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s teeth (top, bottom, front, back, left and right).       The sonic vibrations make the toothpaste and water become an infinitude of small particles which could go through the space of teeth. It will clean all teeth at the same time.ÃÂÃÂ    Sonic Base   Creates sonic vibrations and transfers them to the uFunbrush head. The 10,000 rpm sonic motor is specialized for kids electric toothbrush. The gentle sonic pulsations, make it a safe, effective and fun way to brush their teeth.  10 Second Timer  uFunbrush can clean children teeth in just 10 seconds, because of the patented design of 6 side bristles in the U channel + sonic clean.ÃÂÃÂ   The six side bristles will cover and clean all of your teeth at the same time. In only 10 seconds, every tooth surface is cleaned longer compared with common toothbrushes, with only one sided bristles.   The uFunbrush will last   600 Sessions on just ONE AAA battery!  If you use uFunbrush twice a day it will last up to 10 months!       ÃÂÃÂ   What about replacements?ÃÂÃÂ   All toothbrushes should be replaced every  6 months , including conventional, electric and the uFunbrush.  To replace the uFunbrush head, just rotate the uFunbrush head 90 degrees with the Sonic base, then you can pull it off.ÃÂÃÂ   Simply put the new uFunbrush head into the base, and rotate it flush with the sonic base.ÃÂÃÂ        Over the past three years our team has analyzed many jaws from different children & adults (male & female) to determine the best dimensions for our uFunbrush sizes.       Keeping it simple, we have selected four popular colors for both girls and boys for this first production run.   It works great for adults too!   We also offer an adult version for those busy bees! Save time in the mornings with the fast acting uFunbrush.       With uFunbrush, you can enjoy brushing your teeth with your kids or use by yourself.ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ          Our Team consists of two Fathers and a Mom.  Simon is the creator. He is a manufacturer and top project engineer with a Masters of Science in Engineering. He is the Father of a boy and a girl. Simon Loves his children and has the same problem as every parent when it comes time to ask their kids to brush their teeth. He developed the idea for uFunbrush and has been working on it day and night for years. With his background in brainstorming ideas and bringing them to life, he knew what needed to be done to bring his concept to reality. The reality is uFunbrush is a great product and will bring the Fun factor back Oral Hygiene!  Robert is the Dentist and the Father of two girls. A great consultant in the group. Robert is responsible for overseeing the testing requirements and quality control methods that will assure all backers of a great product that has thoroughly met our very stringent requirements. Robert will inspect, approve and make sure every uFunbrush is 100% what our backers expect it to be!ÃÂÃÂ   Sarah, is the Mother of two young children, a boy and girl. She brings the Mom factor to our team and is a critical factor in working with our test group and kids, in order to make sure uFunbrush is the best product it can possibly be. Creator_description: Nikolay Advolodkin is a self-driven Test Automation and QA Engineer on a lifelong mission to create profound change in the IT world and ultimately leave a legacy for his loved ones, community, and the world at large. Today, he serves as the CEO and Test Automation Instructor at UltimateQA and contributes informative articles to leading test automaton websites like SimpleProgrammer.com and TechBeacon.com.
Project_description: The World's Most Advanced Selenium Course on Framework Development  Are you confused and frustrated with your test automation?ÃÂÃÂ Do your tests break often, for no apparent reason?ÃÂÃÂ Can you run 500 tests per day with the click of a single button?ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   If you are struggling with these issues, then you are not alone. In fact, over 80% of Automation Engineers can't run 100 automated functional tests per day!  It doesn't have to be so hard:  By building the correct test automation framework, you can increase your test coverage by over 1000%. That is why I am here to help.  I will re-design The Complete Selenium WebDriver course to provide you all of the skills required to create an amazing test automation framework. Using the feedback and knowledge that I gained from teaching over 50,000 students, I will provide the best Selenium video tutorial in the world.  You will experience amazing techniques to code your test automation like never before. You will be proud of your test automation!ÃÂÃÂ          "first of all thank you for your teaching and your course, it's fantastic, has helped me a lot and I got a good job because of it. :) " -Student   WHAT WILL YOU LEARN?   What is automation testing?    Learn a bit about test automation and how to do it well, regardless of tools.    What is Selenium WebDriver?    Understand what Selenium WebDriver is and why use it    How to install the correct tools for the course?    Learn proper installation of tools for the course    Element Identification with Selenium    Master critical skills required to identify elements on any web page    Mouse and Keyboard Interactions    Understand the importance of using mouse and keyboard interactions to do things like drag and drop    Implicit and Explicit Waits    Learn when to use one over the other    Automation Testing Best Practices   Regardless of the tool that you use, you need to know automation best practices that will make any of your tests extremely stable. Master four critical rules and principles:    Single Responsibility Principle    Don't Repeat Yourself    Page Object Pattern    Acceptance Test Driven Automation     Automation Frameworks for Two Web Apps     Use one app to practice automation framework evolution -ÃÂÃÂ  Practice on one web application that will teach you how to maintain your test automation code over time as things change. Your code will remain rock solid.   Use second app to practice automation framework organization   -ÃÂÃÂ  Perform test automation on a second web application where you will learn how to create different features and tests for your framework. Your test architecture and organization will be flawless.    Creating logs and reports     Just plug and play  - Take your framework to the next level as you learn how to easily and quickly create beautiful HTML reports and logs.ÃÂÃÂ     C#    The only C# tutorial on the web designed specifically for test automation engineers. Master everything that you need for phenomenal test automation. Learn nothing that you don't need.    Other course features    Utilizing Selenium WebDriver 3.0+  Utilizing the latest automation testing frameworks   WHAT ARE PEOPLE SAYING ABOUT MY COURSES?       SAMPLE VIDEO CONTENT  Here is a sample of some of my videos.ÃÂÃÂ   This video below conveys how hard it is for us, Automation Engineers, to execute functional tests daily.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             This video will help you to learn how to avoid giant, unmaintainable, painful Page Object classes.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             STRETCH GOALS  If we surpass our goal of $1500, I will create extra video tutorials to cover even more automation topics. See the stretch goals below.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        EXPECTED DELIVERY   The Complete Selenium WebDriver v 2.0 course will be released at the  end of November 2017   If the last 2 stretch goals are met, they will  not  impact final delivery date. They will be released 30 - 45 days after the full course, as additional sections.       Risks and challenges  There are relatively few risks here. I will not be spending your money up front, so in the very unlikely circumstances that I am unable to complete the course, I will refund everyone.  I also promise to refund anyone their pledge if they do not think the course is fully awesome.  I have created courses like this before and have been massively successful. Therefore, with your help, I will do it again.

Blurb: Tubeless tire inflator and drinking system in one. milKit booster replaces a compressor, is inexpensive, lightweight and easy to use.

Project_Community_top_countries: |Switzerland:138 backers|United States:96 backers|Germany:54 backers|United Kingdom:51 backers|Australia:16 backers|France:12 backers|Italy:11 backers|Netherlands:10 backers|Austria:9 backers|Spain:8 backers
Creator_description: Curiosity-driven product developer and startup entrepreneur.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ        Two years ago, with the  milKit valve system , we started our mission to make tubeless easy, and our mission has not changed. The successful launch of the milKit valve system ( see campaign ) and the many motivating compliments we received for our first product and its design encouraged us to keep developing the products that improve and simplify the tubeless experience for cyclists.Talking to mechanics and tubeless riders we often heard: "This milKit system is awesome but can't you also find an easy solution to the one problem remaining with tubeless tires: inflating them without having to use a compressor?" ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Inflating tubeless tires can be difficult to impossible without having a compressor at home. With milKit booster we want to bring you a simple, effective and inexpensive solution to get tubeless tires inflated. Let's make tubeless easy!ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        There are solutions on the market already to replace a compressor but they are expensive, heavy and more complicated to use than the milKit booster.ÃÂÃÂ   The main advantages of the milKit booster are:       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        The Aluminum bottles we use are standard drinking and fuel bottles like SIGG, Laken, MSR and many more. So once we'll ship you a robust drinking bottle ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> why shouldn't you be able to use it as a drinking bottle?! We add an adapter, tube and bite valve to the booster package so you have a complete drinking system ready.   Having the drinking system with you on the trail now means having the booster with you as well. The booster without the bottle is very small and lightweight and fits into any backpack. Flat tubeless tire on the trail? Use a tubeless repair kit (like this for example), inflate your tire with the milKit booster, keep on riding.       ÃÂÃÂ        The milKit booster is a simple and inexpensive solution but the tools needed for the injection molding parts to produce the booster are still very expensive. The goal of this campaign is to get these tools pre-financed while delivering early access to quality tubeless installation tools to our supporters.   We will deliver to you a product that makes tubeless performance easily and cleanly available to more users. Please support us and help spread the word among your cycling friends by clicking the image below. LetÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s make tubeless easy - again!  ÃÂÃÂ          ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ        The core technology of the milKit booster is the valve-actuated slider that releases the air directly into the valve stem. No hose. No additional valve. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   While the milKit booster is compatible with any tubeless tire valve, it works best with milKit tubeless valves. Because you remove the valve core before inflating tubeless tires (to achieve the highest possible air flow), a conventional tubeless valve does not act as a one-way valve anymore. The patented milKit valves have an additional rubber flap at the bottom that works as an additional one-way valve. Inflate the booster, press it on the valve, remove it, and your tires is installed. No hassle and no stress.  We have improved the milKit valves since our launch and they now include even more smart features.        ÃÂÃÂ        Smooth design and practical solutions are our mission ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> milKit was born out of a team of industrial designers and product developing engineers. Users loved the design of the milKit valve system and we are sure you will also like the design of the booster.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        When we faced the problem of having to inflate a tubeless tire during our holidays in a remote area we started to improvise and came up with a solution to replace the compressor temporarily. We inflated a PET drinking bottle and used the accumulated air to inflate our tire. Many people have built similar makeshift versions of tubeless inflators, like these:       While these are all creative masterpieces, we were looking for a safe and ready to use system out of the box. That's why we decided to build upon and refine this concept and turn it into a durable, professional quality product with additional features.ÃÂÃÂ        The milKit valve system solves a problem that we have experienced for years and wanted to find a solution for: you never really know how much sealant is left in your tubeless tire. We were surprised how fast the quantity and the quality of sealants can decrease in your tire.ÃÂÃÂ   Before milKit you had to take the tire off the rim to see how much sealant is left ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> which always ends in a mess. With milKit you can measure and refill the sealant in a tubeless tire without having to release the air from the tire.ÃÂÃÂ   Additionally, milKit valves make the installation of tubeless tires easier (especially in combination with the milKit booster) and prevent the valves from getting clogged by the sealant. Have a look at our video to see more about milKit.ÃÂÃÂ        The way to bringing the milKit system to the market has been a challenge and an amazing time for the milKit team. We are proud of the result and the feedback from you encourages us to keep working in the same direction. New team members have since added valuable inputs to our mission and we are looking forward to solving another problem with a beautiful solution.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        Risks and challenges  While we have taken proactive measures to prevent manufacturing and shipment delays, there still might be some things we cannot control. We have gained a lot of experience through our last crowdfunding campaign from which we delivered a high quality product on time ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> so we are fully confident that we will achieve these goals again.  We provide a reinforced Aluminum bottle to guarantee maximum security for our customers. We do not recommend using other bottles than the ones we provide.  Working with pressurized devices always requires the use of safety glasses.

Blurb: We are looking to improve our signal and coverage area by moving our transmitter site to the City of Waupaca water tower on Mount Tom.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Waupaca-United States:5 backers|Iola-United States:3 backers|New London-United States:3 backers|Appleton-United States:2 backers|Amherst-United States:1 backer|Cedar Rapids-United States:1 backer|Chicago-United States:1 backer|Cincinnati-United States:1 backer|Cuba City-United States:1 backer|Custer-United States:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:29 backers
Creator_description: Well, I could only fit half of both of our faces here. But we want you to know that we do exist and we signed on with WAUP in July of 2015 from our family home in Town of Farmington near the City of Waupaca. Marsha and I along with our brilliant engineer and IT guy Josh have been running it together ever since. Marsha has been a fast learner and has turned into a great programmer. We have a Friday afternoon show of banter about the arts, music and fun things to do in this area.  It has been great fun for both of us and we enjoy programming the music on the station. We are so happy that we've had such a positive reaction from our listeners as we share our musical tastes with them. Mark has had a life long fascination with radio, especially community radio. We are working to share and enrich our listening area with locally produced community radio from volunteer listeners at some point in the future. We are an evolving community station that will change as we continue to grow. We hope you will join us.
Project_description: The Need and the GoalÃÂÃÂ   Since 1994 Waupaca Area Community Radio has been engaged in the pursuit of a construction permit for a nonprofit, Non-Commercial Educational FM Broadcast Facility to provide public access to the people of the Waupaca and Chain OÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> Lakes area. On January 15th, 2014 the group received a Low Power FM construction permit to broadcast on 99.1 FM with the call sign WAUP-LP. On July 8th, 2015 the station signed on the air for the first time and has received an FCC Low Power FM Station License.ÃÂÃÂ   Waupaca Area Community radio seeks to connect community members to one another and the world by exploring cultural diversity through arts and public affairs programming and cultural events. The Waupaca area, with a doubling of population every summer, has been a vacation destination to those seeking refuge in camps and cabins for over one hundred years. Relevant and thoughtful program content will reflect, enhance and preserve this unique geographical identity through open discussion and musical programming, providing a real alternative to traditional radio available in this area.ÃÂÃÂ   Waupaca Area Community RadioÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s objective is to increase the level of community involvement in radio broadcasting by providing a resource that is operated and driven by the community and to engage local nonprofit organizations through mutual mission support.  To continue our mission, it is our urgent need and goal to provide a more robust signal to better serve our listeners by moving our transmission system to the water tower on Mt. Tom in the City of Waupaca. This would be an ideal location to provide a good signal and better coverage of the Waupaca and Chain OÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> Lakes area.  We have IT and Broadcast Engineering expertise in place as well as 2 tower climbers and 4 support personnel available for the move. We are ready to move this project forward.  We will be leasing tower space from the City of Waupaca's water tower on Mt. Tom. Expenses for the lease will be paid by a listener supporter of the station. We also have a challenge donation from another listener supporter. Any donation you make to this campaign will be matched dollar for dollar up to $3000 for a total of $6000!! This will double the impact of your donation so please don't let this opportunity pass by. Help us build a community of voices!!      Risks and challenges  This will be a relatively small challenge as the station is a low power FM broadcast facility. As was stated above, we have great people in place to make this an easy one to two day project. The logistics are straightforward and our crew has plenty of experience moving larger facilities than this one.   We do have one risk factor going into this project.  There is also another low power FM (WILW) on the new tower. We will be co-locating with WILW on this particular tower. There is the slight risk of interference between the two facilities. We have discussed this with WILW and in fact we will be working with them on this project. It has been agreed to by both parties that in the event of interference from WAUP broadcast transmissions, WAUP will cover the expense of purchasing and installing special filters to eliminate the interference. This is not an uncommon experience in broadcasting and WAUP is fully prepared to comply with a remedy should that need arise.

Blurb: The PiSerialixed is a simple UART > USB board for console control during boot up on your computer. Can also use for UART communication

Creator_description: .Seasoned Hardware Design Engineer with over 15 years of experience specializing in 1. High Speed Board Design2. Signal Integrity3. Power Integrity4. Board Bring up
Project_description: If you want to use a Raspberry Pi 3 ( or for that matter, a Pi Zero) , a typical initial set up requires a Television, an HDMI Cable and a keyboard.   The Raspberry Pi 3 also has a console boot up more where the console boot messages can appear on its serial port ( UART is a more technical term for it). These UART Pins are available on the 3 pins of the 40 Pin Connector.        We can possible control the Raspberry Pi 3, using the console port. This is where the PiSerialixed comes in picture. It acts as an interface between the Raspberry Pi 3 and the USB Port.        Hooking the Raspberry Pi3 with the PiSerialixed, you can see the console messages and the login through the console to control the Raspberry Pi 3. This avoids the need to use an HDMI TV and Keyboard.  The PiSerialixed can also be used to test the Serial Port or any UART / Serial Port Communication between Raspberry Pi and Laptop. In that case you will be using SSH or the HDTV as the console.   Using PiSerialixed   We have listed the steps to use Pi Serialixed  in our blog here.     Our Earlier Similar Projects on Kickstarter    1. Notixed   Notixed is very similar to the PiSerialized project. It turns Pi Zero into a USB devices - without the need of a cable or connector. Just hook notixed with Pi Zero with the 4 provided screws.ÃÂÃÂ  It was successfully backed by 291 backers and  raised $3,711 on kickstarter .    ÃÂÃÂ  2. Hubpixed    Hubpixed is a 4 Port USB 2.0 Hub that will seamlessly connect to Raspberry Pi Zero without any connector. The novel idea uses the pogo pins. The hubpixed has been updated to support the latest Pi Zero 1.3 and Pi Zero W. It raisedÃÂÃÂ   $3194 from 125 backers on kickstarter .      3. HubPiWi and HubPiWi Blue   The HubPiWi extends the functionality of Hubpixed to include a Wifi on Hubpixed. The HubPiWi Blue extends a WIfi and a Bluetooth. HubPiWi had  149 backers  and HubPiWi Blue had  553 backers .      Risks and challenges  The Prototype has been tested and as such we do not see any Risk.   We have experience with earlier projects with manufacturing and the worst case scenario is slight delay in the delivery ( at the most by 2 weeks). We do not see any other risk with this project.

Creator_description: STEGO BOARD was invented to let makers and computer nerds build custom creations and be able to mount them on desks TV's, monitors and walls. We believe in making something awesome, and making it your way.Invented by Aaron Briscall, who works as a 3D designer in the engineering industry, STEGO BOARD was the result of over a year of hard work and meticulous attention to detail. It was revised over forty times and has gone through three physical generations of prototypes until it was perfect.Other people contributed, because they wanted to help see this useful and awesome product come into existence. Their efforts will be remembered forever.

ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Risks identified. Fabrication is always the main risk and factor for our product. We have a fabricator lined up for this product. Blurb: A smokeless wood-burning FirePit that can cook your meals and give you a front-row seat to everything going on inside your fire.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Toronto-Canada:172 backers|Seattle-United States:166 backers|Sydney-Australia:157 backers|Melbourne-Australia:148 backers|Los Angeles-United States:136 backers|New York-United States:135 backers|San Francisco-United States:132 backers|Portland-United States:116 backers|Chicago-United States:106 backers|London-United Kingdom:100 backers
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:7,196 backers|Canada:1,091 backers|Australia:529 backers|United Kingdom:273 backers|Germany:130 backers|Japan:100 backers|Netherlands:88 backers|New Zealand:63 backers|France:34 backers|Sweden:28 backers
Creator_description: BioLite is a social enterprise that develops advanced personal scale energy solutions for off-grid communities around the world. Our company serves two distinct markets: 1) developing world families living in energy poverty, and 2) outdoor enthusiasts seeking to cook, charge, and light their lives away from an outlet. We address these markets simultaneously through Parallel Innovation: by incubating core technologies that can serve users in both markets, we are able to re-invest near-term revenue to solve long-term, high-impact problems.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ   Fire is one of our oldest tools. The glow, the warmth, the smell, it hits on something inside all of us. We love to be around it, yet it always seems to come with this annoying sidekick ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> smoke.ÃÂÃÂ    At BioLite, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve been cleaning up wood fires all over the world for over five years. This time around, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got our sights set on the fire in your backyard with the BioLite FirePit, a smokeless wood-burning device that cooks your meals and gives you a front-row seat to everything going on inside your fire.        Got 60 seconds? Here's why the BioLite FirePit is different:ÃÂÃÂ          #1:  Get an efficient burn with way less smoke than a conventional fire pit   #2:  Enjoy the feeling of a 360-degree floating fire with the FirePit's X-Ray Mesh   #3 :ÃÂÃÂ Burn charcoal or wood embers for a hibachi-style grilling experience   Bonus: ÃÂÃÂ Our Kickstarter backers receive a free Solar Carry Cover ($60 value). Carry to your favorite outdoor spot and seamlessly charge when not in use.       We know that playing with fire is a touchy subject: why would you want to go and mess with something as classic and lovable as a campfire? Well, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not messing with it; weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re making it burn the same stuff, just better. This isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t a weird chemical fuel or a gas flame ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s wood, being the best it can be. All it needs is some air in the right places.ÃÂÃÂ      Typical fire pit vs BioLite FirePit    When you see smoke coming off of a typical campfire or firepit, thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s unburnt fuel; particulate matter that could have been combusted inside of the fire, but instead itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s getting on your clothes, in your hair, and more importantly, in your lungs (thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why so many of us get a headache about an hour or two after sitting around a campfire). Think about it this way: if you saw a car driving down the street with a bunch of smoke coming out of its tailpipe youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d think thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a badly tuned car. Well guess what, smoky fires are badly tuned fires.ÃÂÃÂ    The BioLite FirePit is a major tune-up. HereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s how we do it:        ÃÂÃÂ        Across the body of the FirePit weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got 51 airjets that inject the fire with oxygen along key locations thanks to the fan located inside the USB-rechargeable orange power pack. This creates a more uniform temperature and mixing of gases inside the fire which dramatically improves combustion.  This means two important things: 1) You get the crackling, the smell, and the feel of a robust wood fire but WITHOUT the smoke and 2) You can actually achieve a warm, roaring fire with LESS wood because youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re burning your original fuel more efficiently.  The airflow system has 4 fan speeds to control the intensity of your flames. If you want a mellow campfire feel, you tune it to LOW. If you want a powerful fire that radiates a lot of heat outward, crank it up to HIGH.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ    WATCH - FIREPIT UNCUT: Spark-To-Smokeless in under 30 seconds       You can control that fan intensity right from the FirePit's powerpack or from the palm of your hand with the free BioLite Energy App for Android and iOS.       ÃÂÃÂ        Want to see our combustion in action? Tune in on  Wednesday, September 27 @ 1 EST/10 PST ÃÂÃÂ to meet our lead engineers Ryan and Tim as they start a fire from scratch and discuss all things combustion science.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   One of the best things about an outdoor fire is watching the hypnotic, relaxing flames.       With BioLiteÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s X-Ray Mesh Body you see it all: glowing embers at the bottom, the gasifying wood in the middle, and the vortex of flames coming out at the top. Rather than staring at a metal can or a cylinder of bricks, you get a full fire that shows you every step of the combustion process.       ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Cooking and campfires both require thermal energy so we combined them into a single device with the FirePit: the inner fuel rack can accommodate both charcoal and wood so you can start your day on a hibachi-style grill and end it with the perfect bonfire. ÃÂÃÂ    Hot Tip : when you start with charcoal, the leftover embers double as the perfect Firestarter for your campfire ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> just toss in a piece of firewood when youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re done cooking and watch it catch, no additional firestarting needed.       ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ        Your FirePit becomes a fully self-reliant ecosystem of energy with our FREE Solar Carry Case, a waterproof cover that uses the power of the sun to recharge the FirePit when not in use so your airflow system is always ready for your next burn. (A $60 value, FREE to all Kickstarter Backers)       ÃÂÃÂ      Effortlessly charge from the sun with the integrated solar panel and micro USB connector    The FirePit's folding legs make transporting a snap. And combined with the Solar Cover's durable carry straps, you're ready to go from the backyard to the beach in no time.       ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Along with our FirePit, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got some favorites from the BioLite family and some special collaborations for one-of-a-kind items youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d love to have around the fire.       ÃÂÃÂ        We donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t take fire lightly. It's the reason that the FirePit has been development for over two years.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ    WATCH: Burn testing the FirePitÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ        Fire is also the reason our organization began and itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s at the core of our mission to bring safe, reliable energy everywhere. Half the planet still cooks over smoky open indoor fires everyday, leading to over 4 million deaths annually. BioLite addresses this head on with the BioLite HomeStove, a wood-burning cookstove that uses similar technology found inside the FirePit to create a safer cooking fire for households across India and sub-Saharan Africa.      ÃÂÃÂ        By backing this project, you help us continue this important work (and the challenges that come with it). To date, over 25,000 homes are cooking with cleaner fires using our technology and with your support, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll grow that exponentially that in the years ahead.        ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        In addition to our lead team above, we'd like to extend a deep thank you to everyone at BioLite who helped us to develop FirePit over the past two years. From prototype testing on remote islands to sourcing our new partners to designing the emails in your inbox, every team member has played a part in bringing this campaign to life. Sales, Operations, Customer Service, we're lookin' at you.        ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  This is our third Kickstarter and we have learned a lot from our previous projects and the challenges that came with it. With that in mind, this project has the longest runway for fulfillment weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve ever scheduled so that we can create realistic expectations around nailing our timelines. Nobody likes delays, and weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing everything we can to deliver on an achievable and responsible schedule. That said, with a new production partner, we may still have some learning curves ahead of us but our team will be here to communicate along the way.     Another risk we are taking on is offering our campaign to anyone in the world ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> why is that a risk? Because shipping logistics can get really, really complicated, and very very expensive, especially with a larger and heavier item like the FirePit. We want anyone who wants to have the opportunity to be a backer, and we are doing everything we can to be very upfront about what it takes to get you your FirePit. All international fees include Delivered Duties Paid (meaning you will NOT receive any extra charges upon arrival).  We can assure you that we are not making any money on our international shipping fees, only covering a portion of the full charges.

Creator_description: Born in the UK.Engineer
Project_description: These Tesla coils are powered via 5 volts so most phone chargers will allow the Tesla coil to generate arcs.We have designed uni-polar and bi-polar Tesla coils in different sizes, the arcs are safe to touch and perfect for educational purposes such as wireless energy transfer.   Using Tesla's designs the voltage is stepped up and connected to the primary coil. The primary coil is coupled with the secondary coil which then outputs a high voltage with a low current arc.   For the future    The Tesla coil will have a internal power source which can be recharged for 30 - 60 minutes of operation with out have to be plugged in.  Instead of having the USB cable hard wired, we want to use a micro USB connector, micro USB cable will be provide with the final product.   We want to improve the high voltage insulation which will require unique shaped polymers which could be 3D printed.  To lower the costs we would need to buy the components in bulk which will be possible with your support.   Current sizes   There are two output modes, low power and and full power.  Uni-polar Tesla Coil - Max arc length 40mm   Bi-polar Tesla Coil - Max arc length 45mm  75cm Uni-polar Tesla Coil - Max arc length 49mm  100cm Uni-polar Tesla Coil - Max arc length 51mm  130cm Uni-polar Tesla Coil - Max arc length 54mm      Risks and challenges  To design and build these Tesla coils a lot of precautions are taken due to the high voltages but having the corrected equipment make this possible but is labor intensive.   The components and materials can expensive and hard to come by, but by purchasing in bulk it would lower production and selling costs

Creator_description: I am a mechanical engineer by education but it took me about ten years to get that piece of paper. Before I earned my degree I learned from the ground floor up machining, welding, and fabricating parts from raw materials. This taught me more about engineering than most of what I learned in school. I did learn some things in school that have helped me along the way including the understanding of what it takes to complete something important. Since receiving my degree I have moved forward in my career and now I manage and mentor engineers and try my best to teach them from my own experiences. More importantly than my education though I have a 20 month old daughter that is constantly teaching me, and directly from her actions I started the concept of this project trying to do what engineers doÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ solve a problem.
Project_description: See video clip below and in the prototype gallery for details on how TOPshelf works!        The development of this project came from my 1 year old playing with cables on a Fire TV box sitting on a cabinet in the open. Of course we did not want her to play with this for obvious safety reasons so I needed to figure out somewhere to put the device out of the little ones reach.ÃÂÃÂ        After multiple design concepts using cardboard, tape, and various bits of sheet metal the design was finally realized.Several prototype parts were hand made for testing of the concept and tweaking some dimensions. Next a pilot production run of 300 parts was made using less than optimal production processes.ÃÂÃÂ        The cost of these processes for real production intent to make this product is not realistic though so.....ÃÂÃÂ        In order to manufacture this product at a reasonable cost a  stamping tool  will be needed to get the costs down to a point where this could be a reality. The tooling has been quoted and is ready to begin at the successful completion of this campaign. Considering the $20 or more donation and a reward of 2 of these mounting systems for that donation I think everyone wins.ÃÂÃÂ        TOPshelf is planned to retail at about $30 plus shipping for a 2 pack so this is your opportunity to get in on the early-bird deal... and it really is a good deal for 2!   Here is the first videos of how TOPshelf should be installed. Additional clips can be found in the prototype gallery :)       Here is part 2 - Velcro:  https://youtu.be/VUI8JGfQCXU  And part 3 - install-it:  https://youtu.be/Se7H0VGHPq4  And to keep it going part 3.5 - install-it extra:  https://youtu.be/eITs2t42noM  And finally part 4 - finishing move  https://youtu.be/2P3JywBmLzs  Thank you for taking the time to read through this and feel free to ask any questions you may have either through here or the website listed. ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The risks or challenges with this project are mainly getting the tooling funds needed to make this product cost effective and sustainable. The product has a real need and the design is sound. The patent has been submitted and the trademark has been applied for so that is all set.   The prototypes have been tested. The design has been fine tuned. The pilot production run has been completed. Next is successfully completing this Kickstarter project so I can move forward with this.    Once the stamping tool is a reality there will be about four weeks lead time for completion and after that parts can be made in real quantity to support whatever sales are realized.   This means realistically that from completion of this campaign and then the tooling kickoff date the rewards should be going out before Christmas! Just an idea for your list or for someone you think could use this product!

Durch die in unserem Buch ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Angewandte Biomechanik: Gehtraining fÃÂÃÂ¼r HemiparesepatientenÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ beschriebenen Trainingseinheiten erlernt der Patient das Gehen mit Hilfe unseres kÃÂÃÂ¼nstlichen Gleichgewichtsorgans. Das Buch richtet sich an Hemiparesepatienten, deren AngehÃÂÃÂ¶rigen und an Therapeuten.ÃÂÃÂ   Mit dieser Crowdfunding Kampagne mÃÂÃÂ¶chten wir  1. den Druck der ersten Auflage unseres Trainingsprogramms finanzieren (ca. ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬ 2000) und 2. darÃÂÃÂ¼berhinaus eingenommene Mittel fÃÂÃÂ¼r die Produktion der TestgerÃÂÃÂ¤te und die Finanzierung der medizinischen Zulassung unseres Biofeedback-GerÃÂÃÂ¤tes verwenden.ÃÂÃÂ     Introduction ÃÂÃÂ     20% of all people experience a stroke at some point in their lives. Half of them will be left paralyzed.ÃÂÃÂ     For these people, we have developed ReMoD: a portable, artificial balance organ. ReMoD uses biofeedback to mimic the motion control process of walking. Through this we seek to help people with a half-sided paralysis to relearn a normal gait.ÃÂÃÂ     This procedure is supported by special walking training, based on the principles of biomechanic. Using the training units described in our book "Applied Biomechanics: Gait training for Patients with hemiparesis" and  supported by our artificial balance organ, ReMoD, the patient can manage to relearn to walk. The book focuses on patients with hemiparesis, as wes as their relatives and therapists.ÃÂÃÂ     With this Crowdfunding campaign we plan to: 1. Print the first edition of our training book. 2. Unsere GeschichteÃÂÃÂ   Wir, Anna Vonnemann und Dindia Gutmann, sind nicht nur Mutter und Tochter, sondern auch ein Team mit einer Mission. Zusammen haben wir eine innovative Rehabilitationsmethode fÃÂÃÂ¼r halbseitig gelÃÂÃÂ¤hmte Menschen auf der Basis eines kÃÂÃÂ¼nstlichen Gleichgewichtsorgans entwickelt. Diese Entwicklung kann fÃÂÃÂ¼r viele Menschen mit einer halbseitigen LÃÂÃÂ¤hmung mehr LebensqualitÃÂÃÂ¤t und SelbststÃÂÃÂ¤ndigkeit bedeuten.ÃÂÃÂ   Dabei begann alles mit einem Schock: Noch vor der Geburt hatte Dindia einen Schlaganfall. Trotz mehrerer Therapien konnten die ÃÂ<U+0084>rzte nicht verhindern, dass Dindia das Laufen immer schwerer fiel. Mit elf Jahren war sie immer ÃÂÃÂ¶fter im Krankenhaus, wurde depressiv. Die spastischen KrÃÂÃÂ¤mpfe verschlimmerten sich, ein Leben im Rollstuhl schien unausweichlich.ÃÂÃÂ    Our StoryÃÂÃÂ     We, Anna Vonnemann and Dindia Gutmann, are not only mother and daughter, but also an entrepreneurial team with a mission. Together, we have developed an innovative product and a novel therapy that can increase the quality of life and offer independence for countless others.ÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ It all started with a shock. Just three months before birth, Dindia had a stroke. Since then, she has suffered from hemiparesis. This has led to joint problems, severe pain and spasticity. Despite several therapies, doctors could not help. At age eleven, she was spending most of her time in hospital or alone on the sofa and she gradually became depressed. The spastic convulsions were getting worse; life in a wheelchair seemed inevitable.ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ   Ein GerÃÂÃÂ¤t bringt die Welt ins Lot  Obwohl die ÃÂ<U+0084>rzte wenig Hoffnung hatten, wollte ich, Anna Vonnemann, meine Tochter nicht dem Schicksal und dem Rollstuhl ÃÂÃÂ¼berlassen. Ich stellte mich der Herausforderung. ZunÃÂÃÂ¤chst entwickelte ich eigene KÃÂÃÂ¶rperÃÂÃÂ¼bungen fÃÂÃÂ¼r Dindia, trainierte mit ihr jeden Tag das Laufen. Creator_description: PLX Devices Inc. is located in the heart of Silicon Valley California where technology and innovation has been the driving force since the personal computer boom, Internet boom, smartphone boom and social media boom. The spirit and passion for creating amazing products is shared by all of the members of the PLX team. Our continuing mission is to deliver cutting edge and innovative products.
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ Starter Set      Whether you're experimenting with solar or looking to eventually grow your system, the Starter Set is the first piece of hardware you'll need to start producing your own energy. We're confident that once you experience how easy it is to generate your own energy, you'll want to expand your system.ÃÂÃÂ    100 Watt (Basic pledge) -  Energy to offset small devices and "phantom energy." This is static energy your home uses to keep your TV, DVR, Internet Modem, Router, Game Console, and appliances on standby.   200 Watt (Recommended to start) -ÃÂÃÂ  Energy to offset most popular electronic devices, smartphone, laptop and your flat screen TV.     To upgrade your basic pledge from 100W to 200W, click the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Manage your pledge" button that appears next to your pledge amount and then select "Change your pledge" on the following page then add the above amounts to your pledge.    Add Ons  Take advantage of our exclusive Kickstarter pricing to expand your system with expansion sets to generate more power and decrease your return on investment time.     Add the above amounts to your pledge to include expansion sets.    Tax Rebate       PLX Devices Inc., a California Corporation, will provide you with a bill of sale copy of your pledge for you to claim your tax credit with your local government authority. In the United States, a 30%  federal solar tax incentive  is available when filing your income tax return.ÃÂÃÂ   Rapid ROI  We've designed Legion Solar to be lean and mean, where you're paying only for the necessary items to get the job done. Legion Solar is 3x more affordable than tradition systems.ÃÂÃÂ        Do-It-Yourself  Out of the box you'll be able to generate your own energy in minutes. Experience how easy it is for you to make your own energy. Legion Solar is Energy Made Simple!       Instant Results  Offset your daytime energy and avoid the higher tiered pricing and eliminate having to pay unfair prices per kW.       Scale Anytime  Connect Expansion Sets in a daisy-chain to scale your production 200 watts at a time.        Tech Specs      Tap to view details     Manuals      Tap to learn     Milestones  With the successful proof of concept for DIY solar of Legion Solar 1, we're now finding Legion Solar 2 with three new innovations.   SolarBuilderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ - Once you have your Starter Set, use this interactive tool to plan and grow your system with expansion sets and racking hardware.  RafterFinderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ - Unlocks the secret to doing a professional roof installation by yourself.  SolarRegulatorÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ - Enables solar for single direction meters, prevent energy going back to the grid to overcome regulation in some regions and to use the value of energy more optimally.        Legion Solar Monitoring Setup      Our Team       Inventor of Legion Solar and founder of PLX Devices Inc., Paul Lowchareonkul holds a number of patents and has manufactured more than 40 products in just the last 14 years. PLX is proud to be located in the heart of Silicon Valley California where technology and innovation has been the driving force since the digital boom.The spirit and passion for creating amazing products is shared by all of the members of the PLX team.  Thanks to Kickstarter and over 23,000 backers, PLX has raised over $1.8 Million and brought 9 projects to life.ÃÂÃÂ   Our Kickstarter History         Timeline       ÃÂÃÂ About PLX         Located in Silicon Valley, California, for more than 14 years, PLX Devices has designed and developed award winning products in the automotive and consumer electronics industries. Our mission is to continue to design amazing products our backers enjoy. Please feel free to browse our entire catalog at  www.plxdevices.com .ÃÂÃÂ   *Due to continuous product improvements, the images on the website may differ slightly from the actual product that you receive.  **LegionSolarÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, SolarHubÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, SolarRegulatorÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢, SolarBuilderÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ are trademarks of PLX Devices Inc.  ***Free USA shipping only applies to USA mainland backers only. Hawaii and Puerto Rico backers will be contacted at the time of fulfillment to cover the additional shipping charges.ÃÂÃÂ   Questions? Give us a Call.      M-F 8am - 5pm PST         Risks and challenges  PLX Devices has been designing and successfully bringing products to market for 14 years with a focus in automotive and consumer electronics. Legion Solar 2 is our 10th Kickstarter project. We're absolutely confident we can fulfill this project.  Solar Builder - Our biggest challenge is simplify the solar system building process and code that up into an easy to use website. Then integrate that into our back end inventory system for fulfillment to your door. Based in the Silicon Valley, the heart of the internet revolution, we have many resources we can tap to complete the project.   RafterFinder and SolarRegulator - Designing and manufacturing electronics is our core competency. We will need to manufacture the PCBs, assemble the components and encase them into an industrial design. Our biggest challenge is to refine the algorithms to communicate with the inverters to regulate energy production so that energy production is as efficient as possible. We have tremendous experience in computer algorithms where we can draw from our automotive background to complete this task.   The prototypes are finished and we're ready to go into production. We need your help and we hope you'll join us 'Bring the Future.'

Creator_description: My name is Kirill Eremenko and I am super-psyched that you are reading this. I teach online courses in the spaces of Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence and I'm passionate about democratizing Data skills.https://www.udemy.com/u/kirilleremenko/
Project_description: Update: Even More Course Features to Boost Your Computer Vision Skills!             You've definitely heard of AI and Deep Learning. But when you ask yourself, what is my position with respect to this new industrial revolution, that might lead you to another fundamental question: am I a consumer or a creator? For most people nowadays, the answer would be, a consumer.  But what if you could also become a creator?  What if there was a way for you to easily break into the World of Artificial Intelligence and build amazing applications which leverage the latest technology to make the World a better place?  Sounds too good to be true, doesn't it?  But there actually is a way..  Computer Vision is by far the easiest way of becoming a creator.  And it's not only the easiest way, it's also the branch of AI where there is the most to create.  Why? You'll ask.  That's because Computer Vision is applied everywhere. From health to retail to entertainment - the list goes on. Computer Vision is already a $18 Billion market and is growing exponentially.  Just think of tumor detection in patient MRI brain scans. How many more lives are saved every day simply because a computer can analyze 10,000x more images than a human?  And what if you find an industry where Computer Vision is not yet applied? Then all the better! That means there's a business opportunity which you can take advantage of.            So now that raises the question: how do you break into the World of Computer Vision?  Up until now, computer vision has for the most part been a maze. A growing maze.  As the number of codes, libraries and tools in CV grows, it becomes harder and harder to not get lost.  On top of that, not only do you need to know how to use it - you also need to know how it works to maximise the advantage of using Computer Vision.  To this problem we want to bring...ÃÂÃÂ        First, Computer Vision A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ includes a course, which will explain how Computer Vision works, through intuition lectures and practical applications. With this you will get a clear understanding of all the concepts, and the right intuition to approach Computer Vision.  Great, that solves one problem. But the maze is still here.  As the number of codes, libraries and tools grows it becomes harder and harder not to get lost.  How can we get out of this maze? We need more than a courseÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦  Computer Vision A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is not only a course. It is also:ÃÂÃÂ        And thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s how Computer Vision A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ will be so much more powerful than everything you have seen previously!  This Virtual Platform will be your wizard box. It will contain all the most useful Computer Vision tools, in the form of programs and pre-coded templates so that you can adapt them to your own problems.ÃÂÃÂ   All these tools will be well structured in different categories, transforming the previous maze into a crystal clear environment.ÃÂÃÂ   And last but not least, all the packages will be pre-installed and all the models will be pre-trained. Therefore, at no time will you ever have installation issues.       Both the course and the platform follow a common structure:   Module 1: Object Detection  -ÃÂÃÂ This first category will include all the most useful and powerful tools for Object Detection. Here we will be mastering OpenCV, an incredible Computer Vision library. Hence in the end you will become experts in OpenCV. You will learn how to detect any object, either on pictures or videos.     Object Detection     Module 2: Face Recognition -  Here we will create efficient tools for Face Recognition. These tools will be based on OpenCV and even more advanced models such as Deep Neural Networks. They will allow you to detect different features in the face like eyebrows, noses and even smiles. A modern application of this technique is to recognize expressions of customers in marketing and cinema.     Face Recognition     Module 3: Style Transfer -ÃÂÃÂ  A must-do in Computer Vision! In this category we will implement the very popular GANs, Generative Adversarial Networks. We will apply them for Style Transfer, a technique that takes as input two pictures or images, and transfers the style of one into the other.     Style Transfer     Image Source:ÃÂÃÂ https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.10593.pdf   Keep in mind that all the codes/tools of this virtual platform will be explained in details, both on the theory side as on the practical side.       SPECIAL BONUS for Kickstarter backers ONLY. Not available anywhere else:   Bonus Module 4: Computer Vision for Self Driving Cars  - Included with your Kickstarter pledge. Learn how to create Computer Vision tools to detect cars and other vehicles on roads. This is an important component of any Self-Driving Car application.  ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s 33% extra course material!        And whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s more ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> these examples will trigger your creative mind to spark unique ideas for your own intuitive solutions. Either in the physical world or in digital products such as high-potential apps, rather than copying a typical ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>recipe bookÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> course.       Plus! We really want you to succeed in creating and changing the World with Computer Vision and that's why we are going to add the following three Bonuses to any pledge level you choose (starting from Super Early Bird and above):   A Computer Vision cheat sheet to enhance your toolbox  Computer Vision one-pager LaTeX with relevant formulas for you to have handy whenever you need itÃÂÃÂ   Bonus video where weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll talk exclusively about real-life applications of Computer Vision. We dive into impactful case studies which will inspire you with new ideas         1. Real-Life Applications -  Learn how to apply Computer Vision for object detection, face recognition and style transfer. Every module is based on real-world challenges which you will get to solve inside the training part of the package while using the tools of the virtual platform.   2. Virtual Platform -  Escape the maze of computer vision with our pre-installed packages and pre-trained models. This is our innovative solution to the problem so many people face - it's very hard to assemble the right tools, and that's why we've done it for you. All models saved, just load them and start creating!   3. From Zero To Hero -  Code real-world Computer Vision models using your new skills and imagination. No experience required, the course will give you all you need to get started and more.ÃÂÃÂ    4. Full Q&A Support -  WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re fully committed to making this the most accessible and results-driven Computer Vision course on the planet. This requires us to be there when you need our help. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve put together a team of professional Data Scientists to support you in your journey, meaning youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a response from us within 48 hours maximum.   5. Intuition Tutorials -ÃÂÃÂ  Where most courses simply bombard you with dense theory and set you on your way, we believe in developing a deep understanding for not only what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing, but why youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing it. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t throw complex mathematics at you, but focus on building up your intuition in creating with Computer Vision making for infinitely better results down the line.        ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>What if I donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have any need for Computer Vision right now?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Computer Vision is everywhere. We use it every day in our lives, even if we don't recognize it: from Facebook's face recognition, to Tesla self-driving cars, to Amazon retail stores. And every industry and every business can considerably be improved thanks to Computer Vision. You may not see right now, but with this course & platform you will be empowered to open up your Creativity and see the potential to create amazing solutions with Computer Vision.ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>I like that thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s no complex maths, but this isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t TOO simple, right?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Not at all. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll take you to the same level as if youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d learned Computer Vision the long, hard way - we just choose to teach in ways that are a lot more fun (and less headache-inducing). By the end of this course youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be able to implement complex Computer Vision in your personal life, business or career and achieve amazing results.   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve seen other courses charge for a certificate, is this course the same?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   We donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t believe in charging $300 just for a certificate of completion. If you pass this course you deserve the right to show your new skills by default - thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why our certificate of completion comes free for you to show to future employers, further your business credentials or simply to show off to friends.   ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve already done the Deep Learning and/or AI course, will this course still benefit me?ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ   Deep Learning and AI are great tools in your toolkit. However, Computer Vision is a very practical technology. The beauty of Computer Vision is that you can apply it to any images, videos and even streaming data - so it's very easy to spot applications in real life. And besides, we will be mastering a whole range of new and very powerful tools like OpenCV.            WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be on hand to support you along your entire journey!ÃÂÃÂ        See what other students just like you are saying about our recent best-selling courses:            Upon completion of this course youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll get a verifiable electronic certificate which you can use to boost business credentials, increase the chances of landing that dream job in tech or simply show off to your connections on Linkedin (the actual design will differ):            We hope youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re as excited as we are. Computer Vision is a huge part of all our lives so itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s only fair that you have an equal opportunity to get involved and create. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re passionate about bringing AI and Computer Vision to the world, and today we need your help to ensure this groundbreaking package becomes a reality.   Thank you,  Kirill and Hadelin           Risks and challenges  There are numerous risks associated with creating an online course. Some of the major ones include: sourcing the right equipment, learning to produce clear and engaging tutorials, finding what exactly interests our students, having the appropriate level of subject matter expertise and timely delivery of the materials.  Having built up a substantial level of expertise in the space of online education we are confident that we are well-equipped to face any challenges: we have tried and tested equipment including backup hardware and software; between the two of us we have already produced over 20 courses with hundreds of hours of content and almost a thousand tutorials enabling us to develop our unique engaging teaching styles; we constantly interact with our existing 200,000+ students including Q&A, webinars and surveys - this allows us to know exactly what common painpoints we need to address in the course content; and finally, we do have extensive backgrounds in Data Science, Machine Learning and Deep Learning / AI but we are constantly doing research and deepening our own knowledge to make sure we can deliver the best of the best to our students in Computer Vision A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢.   Regardless of our expertise, hard work and the love we put into our campaigns, delays may happen. For instance, we are currently experiencing some delay in the delivery of the last material from our previous Kickstarter Campaign: Artificial Intelligence A-ZÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢. Even though we will deliver our promises as soon as possible and plan to avoid this as much as we can from happening again, we wanted to make everybody aware that delays in content delivery could happen again in the future.
