Creator_description: <!DOCTYPE html><html class="users_profile_about fontface no-js" data-request-id="84fd13cb-aa60-4d4c-9607-6787a8266574" lang="en
Project_description: ÃÂÃÂ GET READY TO DIVEÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ Turn the valve to 120psi and just breath, an on demand flow of air is then released form the regulator allowing you to dive hands free 15-20 minutesÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ A special collapsible high pressure hand pump very simply to use (just like a bicycle pump) can fill the entire tank anywhere you are a Carrying case for pump is included!ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢Cross-body bag ensures tight universal comfortable wear just clip on and dive.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¢ I designed this to be simple and ready to go! just take it along with you and dive.        ÃÂÃÂ Included in your Dive Portable Lungs Kit : Dive Portable Lungs tank,  cross-body bag,  4 stage regulator,  3-Stage 3000psi hand pump with carrying case &  a safety and instruction manual. Read FULLY to limit and avoid risks of diving with compressed air.    FAQ overview    Untrained Scuba Diving    Compressed Air Risks    these cover risks and how to avoidÃÂÃÂ     How to Below          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             ÃÂÃÂ    ----Release & Liability Purchasing Terms----ÃÂÃÂ      Safety Concerns!   Read the included safety ÃÂÃÂ  instruction manual before diving.  ÃÂÃÂ Maintain good mental and physical fitness for diving.Avoid being under the influence of alcohol or dangerous drugs when diving.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ Avoid overexertion while in and underwater.Limit your maximum dive depth to 9 meters/30 feet.  ÃÂÃÂ Breathe properly while diving - never hold in the air you breathe.Diving compressed air can be very dangerous and always a good idea to be certified for your own safety.   Never  ascendÃÂÃÂ to the surface without releasing air from your lungs to avoid Over Lung ExpansionÃÂÃÂ    Pulmonary Barotrauma:  During rapid ascent  the air in the lungs expand, causing lung over expansion and rupture releasing bubbles into the bloodstream.   If you are not a certified diver:  Practice in a pool until you get comfortable with breathing underwater "it is a mental training" to avoid underwater panick   Never Dive Alone:ÃÂÃÂ  safety procedures that are intended to improve divers' chances of avoiding or surviving accidents in or under water by diving in a group of two   Water Pressure Compresses Air: Air in a diver's body air spaces and dive gear will compress as pressure increases (and expand as pressure decreases).  PRESSURE AFFECTS MANY ASPECTS OF DIVING ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  EqualizationAs a diver descends , the pressure increase causes the air in their body's air spaces to compress. The air spaces in their ears, mask, and lungs become like vacuums as the compressing air creates a negative pressure. Delicate membranes, like the ear drum, can get sucked into theses air spaces, causing pain and injury. This is one of the reasons that a diver must equalize their ears for scuba diving.On ascent, the reverse happens.ÃÂÃÂ    Decreasing pressure  causes the air in a diver's air spaces to expand. The air spaces in their ears and lungs experience a positive pressure as they become overfull of air, leading to a pulmonary barotrauma or a reverse block. In a worst case scenario this could burst a diver's lungs or eardrums.To  avoid a pressure-related injury  (such as an ear barotrauma) a diver must equalize the pressure in their body's air spaces with the pressure around them.To equalize their air spaces on descent a diver adds air to their body airspaces to counteract the "vacuum" effect by breathing normally , this adds air to their lungs every time they inhaleadding air to their mask by breathing out their noseadding air to their ears and sinuses by using one of several ear equalization techniquesTo equalize their air spaces on ascent a diver releases air from their body air spaces so that they do not become overfull bybreathing normally, this releases extra air from their lungs every time they exhaleascending slowly and allowing the extra air in their ears, sinuses and mask to bubble out on its ownManuel will be included how to use properlyÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ When purchasing the Dive Portable Lungs Kit you understand that you are  using it at your own risk. fully understand the risks and challenges of diving READ over FAQ and Manuel 'Included with package'        ÃÂÃÂ    https://www.instagram.com/diveportablelungs/ https://www.facebook.com/diveportablelungs/        Risks and challenges  I have spent so much time working on this product. It took me a lot of trial and error to get everything working perfectly - and I'm now so confident in Portable Lungs that I feel comfortable launching it to the public.  Concerns - Please make sure you have read  "safety" Above to enjoy safely and responsibly   unexpected delivery or production - Every backer will be notified immediately.   Backer Satisfaction is my number one concern I am always here for you or a potential backer

Creator_description: Livesey Workshop is operated by a group of young indviduals from a bredth of backgrounds and practical skills in common. Practicing Engineers, Designers, Metal and Wood workers and Architects provide progressive and inclusive workshops for the surrounding community. We continue to develop products, projects and processes that engage and motivate. Putting pride, power and ability back in the hands of residents.
Project_description: The Livesey Workshop  is a practical community space in South London ÃÂÃÂ which provides educational programmes that teach the local community fundamental industrial fabrication methods and DIY making skills to empower people through making.ÃÂÃÂ   In support of this, Livesey has acquired a impressive range of cutting edge machinary from metal bending to timber processing.ÃÂÃÂ   Acquiring a 50 Tonne press will allow us to provide, demonstrate and experiment with lamination techniques, casting, bearing pressing and complex sheet metal principles.ÃÂÃÂ   The press will support current workshop events, provide new workshop events and enable prototyping with a view to produce projects for local manufacture.ÃÂÃÂ   The members of the workshop are all trained professionals consisting of designers, engineers and fabricators. Each have their own unique skillset and therefore each machine is selected to have transferable traits between the professions, giving our workshops a greater base of knowledge to share.      Risks and challenges  Livesey Workshop is a developing space situated within The Livesey Exchange, once a derelict car park and now a soon-to be vocational arts centre on The Old Kent Road, Peckham. The project is a recent initiative of PemPeople, aiming to bring more skills and opportunity to the area.   Our events thus far attract excellent attendance however as our project grows it will be a challenge to sustain a desirable making program for the general public and local residents. The 50 Tonne Press will help maintain creativity and diverse making approaches.

Project_description: Goals of Prairie Skateboards  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The goal of prairie skateboards is to provide high quality skateboards using new technology.ÃÂÃÂ The goal for our board qaulity is to make them last 5x as long as a traditional board.  What will set our boards apart?   We will use matierials such as  Ipe wood, kevlar, bamboo, carbon fiber, epoxy resin, and graphite. The hydraulic press alone costs $20,000 and along with other equipment that will add up to about $40,000. Blurb: Make enjoying a cold beverage a guarantee, not a luxury with a straw that freezes and stays frozen for up to 24 hours.
Project_Community_top_cities: |Richmond-United States:6 backers|Copenhagen-Denmark:1 backer|Wadersloh-Germany:1 backer|San Francisco-United States:1 backer|Silver Spring-United States:1 backer
Project_Community_top_countries: |United States:8 backers|Denmark:1 backer|Germany:1 backer
Creator_description: I'm an up and coming professional illustrator currently finishing up college at VCU that lives to dream big and find ways to make them come true.
Project_description: So there you are, just about to kick back and enjoy a cool and refreshing beverage you bought only an hour earlier, and after taking your first sip you quickly find that all your expectations are completely dashed, discovering that this once-icy beverage now sits at a woeful 70ÃÂÃÂ°F. Practically undrinkable. Unprepared for such an eventuality, you believe that your only options now are to either find a fridge to put the drink in and wait, seek out an ever-elusive handful of ice cubes, or simply throw it out...right? Well, no longer!    Our Idea  Our vision is to create a straw that is freezable, reusable, and portable so that no one has to go without a cold beverage, regardless of where they are or where they're going. Currently, there are products on the market which can keep drink cold for long periods of time(such as insulated tumblers) and separately, products for making a drink cold (like reusable icepacks) but no options for a product which does both and is small enough to travel with ÃÂÃÂ you anywhere. By combining the already well-established technology used in insulated tumblers and that which is used in re-freezable icepacks, we can create a prototype for a travel and Eco-friendly straw capable of not only making drinks cold but keeping them cold for up to 24 hours.ÃÂÃÂ   Materials and Technology  Our design for the North Pole straw prototype consists of an inner straw tube made of cold-conducting stainless steel, fused at the top and bottom with an outer straw tube made of non-conductive acrylic, with a layer of liquid freezing agent contained in the space between. The type of freezing gel we will use in our final prototype will be decided only after some experimentation and the materials in this early design are subject to change as we flush out what works and what doesn't.  The Dream Team  Michelle Clarke, Robin Bouweiri, and Kim Kelly are three alumni to be from VCU's School of the Arts in Richmond, VA, the birthplace of the North Pole Straw project. As a team, our strengths lie in our innovative ability, collaborative effort, and ambition when it comes to bringing our product off the drawing board and into the real world.  Expenditures for Prototype Construction   Ordering materials for current prototype design from pre-selected manufacturers    Funds for extra materials to test for possible future iterations    Equipment and materials required for prototype assembly    Possible outside consultation on engineering principles for construction    Research/testing for product safety, environmental impact, and product life       Risks and challenges  While the North Pole straw's theoretical design rest comfortably on what we already know about cold-retention technology, there is always a reasonable chance for early set backs in production so we ask our supporters to be prepared for a slight bit of flexibility in our schedule should that happen.  Funding: Because we are hoping to create something that will involve freezing chemicals and a proper container for them, making it as safe as we intend for it to be could mean underestimating our budget in the long run.

Blurb: An online educational platform that teaches technology and business skills through on-demand courses and instructors.
Creator_description: I am the owner of a successful software development company and the founder of Black Tech Academy. I am located in Atlanta, Georgia.
Project_description: Q: WHAT IS THE BLACK TECH ACADEMY?ÃÂÃÂ                             Q: WHY PLEDGE TO THE BLACK TECH ACADEMY?  Our guiding principle is to make a positive impact against the systemic problems that surround minorities in technology.  We do this by equipping you with today's knowledge and resources that will help shape tomorrow's professional careers and businesses.  By joining our platform our educators, coaches and mentors will teach these lessons through structured online courses.  Q: WHAT DOES A COURSE PREVIEW LOOK LIKE?                            Q: DO YOU HAVE A WEBSITE?  YES! Please go to  BlackTechAcademy.com  to learn more about our platform.  Q: DO YOU HAVE A MOBILE APP?  Not yet. But with your pledge you'll be helping us design, build and launch it for Android and iOS!  Q. HOW ARE THE COURSES STRUCTURED?  Each course is designed to be 8 weeks long. Courses will be offered through online video content and contain supplementary downloadable workbooks as well as audio and text transcripts.  Each instructor specializes in the course discipline and the course has gone through a rigorous process to ensure first-class quality.  Q. HOW MANY COURSES CAN STUDENTS ENROLL IN?  Students can enroll in up to 5 courses per term and is recommended to get the most value out of the program.  We chose 5 because we want to ensure that the courses provide real results through active engagement from instructors and others students.  Q. WHAT TYPES OF COURSES WILL YOU OFFER?  The Black Tech Academy will provide educational content that shows students how to leverage technology to promote growth in business and professional careers.  We will offer courses on sales, networking, programming, social change and design.  Q. WHO IS ELIGIBLE TO JOIN THE BLACK TECH ACADEMY?  Our academy provides content designed to share knowledge and inspire communities of color; however,  anyone  who has a passion for learning is eligible to join the academy.  Our platform is meant to empower our community and is taught  by  our community.  We do not restrict anyone from joining for any reason.  Q. DO STUDENTS NEED TO BE TECH-SAVVY TO JOIN?  Not at all! Students donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t have to have any background in tech. They donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t even have a degree, certification or a business. They just have to have a passion for reimagining themselves and learning.  Q: ARE THE COURSES LIVE?  Courses are offered through a hybrid-learning model. Most courses will provide live interaction with students and instructors.  Q. WHEN IS THE FIRST DAY OF CLASS?  First day of class is in July of 2019.  Q: WHAT'S IN IT FOR THE STUDENTS?     STUDENTS CAN EARN KICKBACK REWARDS     ADDITIONAL ENROLLMENT BENEFITS     Access Black Tech Academy Anywhere      Comprehensive eLibrary      Instructor Office Hours      Goal Tracker Dashboard      Lifetime Access      Private Messaging      Course Certifications      Tech Discounts      Unlimited Courses* (enroll in up to 5 courses every 2 months)      Discussion Boards      Online Quizzes & Tests      Exclusive Workshops & Events        Risks and challenges  Our biggest challenge is finding the best instructors and creating the best online course content. We want to make sure that we vet the instructors and ensure that they feel confident in building their reputation on our platform.  Developing course content can take several weeks and we do not have the ability to influence other people's schedules. As such, it is important that we create and follow an effective process for creating online courses and recording instructors.

Blurb: An online version of the television program Big Brother, In your home, in your car and on your person all live online 24 hours a day.
Project_description: My BackgroundÃÂÃÂ   My name is Mathew McConnell, I'm a 32 year old entrepreneur living in Australia. I have a business studies and finances certificate acquired through Tafe, a requirement for a builders licence. I have a background in laboring work, from the manufacture and installation of garden sheds, tubular and steel picket fencing and sheet fencing to carports and verandah's. I began working for my farther when I was 8 years old, welding door frames for garden sheds. In my late teens and early 20's I worked as a laborer at my father's retail steel outlet at which time I also gained a considerable amount of experience in sale's and customer relations. Most recently over the past 10 years I have worked as a laborer, loading chilled pig carcasses onto trucks ( night shift ), where I also gained experience in record keeping for product standards and liaising with truck operators.  About The Product  I'm currently raising capital in order to bring into development a website where participants use camera and microphone kit's they have purchased from my company to stream their life from their home, car and their person live 24 hours a day. The site will utilize Adsense so that content up loaders are paid in the same way YouTube pay's it's up loader's, giving the up loader incentive to come aboard beside's the novelty effect of the idea and the social network feature. As I mentioned above "on your person", refer's to wearing a small microphone and the smallest possible camera typically attached to the top of the arm with a Velcro strap, similar to the body cameras the police use.  Done right the potential is there to build something as used as Facebook, YouTube, Twitter or Amazon and it's only a matter of time until someone build's this particular service.ÃÂÃÂ This Kickstarter campaign is very basic in appearance as this is the first attempt at raising capital and I have very little of my own funds to invest. For this reason I have also used the provided video to pitch my work ethic rather than pitch the product description. I haven't gone into a large amount of detail about the user interface and associated options, I will start by building the best possible service through a developer and overtime as most websites do, I will perfect the service.  Website Interface  The website will contain 6 main pages and a number of other required pages for various abilities and settings. Ease of use with a large amount options is a positive the site will attribute.   ÃÂÃÂ 1) Footage page will have a number of video boxes containing whats currently being up loaded by the up loader. Plus video boxes of the uploaded content by the up loaders selected favorite up loaders. All video boxes sizes will be able to be changed, so that for example if your operating with a large screen you can set multiple video boxes to a large size or on a small screen 1 or 2 large video boxes. On this page their will also be a chat function and the option to have a social network news feed displayed. Up loaders will have the ability to talk to each other using their camera's and microphone on this page.    2) Design options for the up loader as to what viewers will see when their on the up loaders page.    Users who don't upload content will be able to have similar pages to the above.    3) Search page for finding up loaders    4) Main social network    5) Store, for the purchase of cameras and microphones etc.    6) Online shopping center. Once the site is complete with a designated number of users my intention is to provide the worlds largest shopping center / complex online, in conjunction with real world business's, utilizing virtual reality technology and the ability to go shopping with an avatar of yourself and your friends or family with or without using virtual reality technology. ÃÂÃÂ    Social Network Abilities  There will be a built in social network called EL with a news feed and the best possible associated option's, I will include the ability for the audience to have the opportunity to communicate with up loaders in real time with moderated Twitter feeds, live Q&A and chat.  EL will allow the poster of content to have their post's shared to everyone's news feed world wide or just with their friends, users will also be able to control what they see on their timeline from the posts of public around the world to just their friends. Their will also be options from both perspectives allowing to only share or see posts from particular countries, or to only share or see posts from males or females. There will be an option to have yourself rated by users on scale of 1 to 10 in appearance, personality and other traits, allowing for another option of who see's your posts or who's posts you see in your news feed which will be a handy / fun option having a world wide news feed ability.  I want to push the boundaries when it comes to socializing, for example I will incorporate a service that will recognize a fellow user of the website when they are nearby and allow you to add that person to your friend list or follow their activity on the website, either whilst using the product in your home, car or when you are using the body cam in a public area.  When your out in public, using the interface on your phone, your phone would allow for for example if you come in the vicinity of an individual that also uses the product, the option of having a notification sent to your phone that say's that the other person is there and you'll have the option of adding the person to your friend list or simply following their activities within the website.ÃÂÃÂ   Anyone you are in a near vicinity with will also be saved in the website for you to look up at a later time. A advertising avenue I will utilize is incorporating facial recognition software for the purpose of allowing my websites users to suggest to other people through Facebook to connect with my product, for example if a user from my website likes the look of someone they pass in public whom doesn't use my website but uses Facebook, than my websites user can send a suggestion to the Facebook user through Facebook asking the person to follow my user on my website. ÃÂÃÂ   Public Benefit  I expect the service at time's will prove to be an exceptional tool in crime prevention and crime recording. The public instinctively wants to assist in the prevention of crimes when they can, being able to assist in this area is a selling point I will utilize to a degree in advertisement of my product.  Advertising Benefits  Over time I want to push the boundaries when it comes to advertising from the perspective of offering a endorsement service, where by up loaders can apply to companies through the web site for an endorsement arrangement. But at the present time, I will push the boundaries from the perspective of targeted advertising through recognition technology, for example using recorded conversation and video enabling the delivery of related advertisements to the up loader and to the viewer item's related to the up loaders content. Which will work in well with the online shopping center / complex when it's implemented.  Funding  I have set the funding goal to $30,000 in order to provide funding for website development, app development and a small amount of advertising. Advertising which I will be seeking further funding for at a later stage is going to be a key part to a successful progression of the development process. I will also be seeking further funding in order to cover the initial cost's associated with developing camera and microphone kit's which will include a receiver / system that connect's to your TV and PC / laptop. As the kit's will be paid for by the up loader there will only be development cost's involved. I have set the funding goal to a low level of $30,000 yet I am hoping to surpass that substantially and eliminate the need to run another campaign. ÃÂÃÂ   The service provided will always be free of charge, I will make a profit by running advertisements and through commission in the shopping center / complex. If you have any questions or comments I can be contacted by email at mccmat863@yahoo.com      Risks and challenges  Being limited initially by capital is a challenge that has the potential to effect successful progression, as a strong advertising campaign will be heavily relied upon. The success of the website all comes down to people knowing about it, the websites usability, interface design and abilities rely on my common sense and along with other leading website owners like Jeff Bezos (Amazon) and Mark Zuckerberg (Facebook) I want to push my website to it's full potential. There is no other service like what I'm building and filling the gap in the online market is something that assists with making websites very successful. I have used YouTube documentaries to gain an understanding of how large companies such as Facebook and Apple have progressed from their starting point's, which has provided me with the knowledge that Facebook may have only succeeded because of the way it was rolled out.   Another challenge that has to be taken into consideration is the initial cost's involved for up loaders to purchase my camera and microphone kit's. I don't intend on making a profit from these sales in order to keep the prices as low as possible and the camera and microphone kit store within the website will be offering the ability for up loaders to build their kits / setup larger over time.

Blurb: CREDITs is an interconnection of services that surrounds your movie watching experience. Take the nightmare out of going to the movies.
Creator_description: I'm a current member of the armed services with a desire to become an entrepreneur. I want to help revolutionize the way we plan events such as date night,  family outings,  guys/girls night,  and many others. I believe my 15 years of military service makes me a great candidate to lead my first business idea through to its fullest potential.
Project_description: My name is Johnathan Vigil and I was born and raised in San Jose, Ca (Silicon Valley). During my time as a high school student, I fell in love with theater, which grew into a passion for film. The ability to feel raw emotion through cinema became a focal point for me and developed a desire within me to create film. However, in 2004 (Prior to graduating high school) I made the selfless decision to enlist into the United States Army. During my military service, I served in a variety of major commands as a human resources specialist. This occupation allowed me to understand large organizational structures. In addition, I was able to analyze, interpret, and apply regulatory guidance within the organization. My 15-year military career has developed key traits within me for managing projects and working in diverse settings. It is at this stage of my life that I begin to slowly transition out of my military career. I am soon preparing to enter a new chapter in my life and that is entrepreneurship. I believe that by combining my passion for cinema and my organizational professionalism I can help fix a major problem that affects the cinema industry today. That issue is the movie ticket subscription service plans. Movie ticket subscription plans have become increasingly popular over the past year; however, they have had many setbacks. This issue along with increasing ticket prices have led to a decline in theater attendance.  I am a husband; parent, friend, and coworker and I have always enjoyed watching the newest blockbuster films with others. There is a level of excitement when you have waited months to get the crew back together for a night out at the movies. I remember the "good old days" when I would call up my girlfriend (Now wife) and say, "Let's go to the movies". When we would go, we would be disappointed that the film we wanted to see was sold out. How about now? I mean in this fast pace life how easy is it NOT to have the ability to plan date night, family night, guys night out, or girls night out? What if we could take the hassle of planning a night out at the movies and replace it with convenience and safety? What if you could not only plan your movie night, but plan safe transportation to/from your locations? What about planning what to eat either before or after your movie? What if you could take those shareable moments at the movies and relive them as you watch your film again when it is released for digital download? Perhaps you are so into your film you want to read the book, listen to the soundtrack, or even collect the movie memorabilia. Matter of fact you are that movie junkie that enjoys films so much you want to rate, blog, and review upcoming films so that others can share in that emotional moment you yourself experienced. So what if we could stop hassling with multiple mobile applications and just plan our movie night through one central application? No need for multiple charges or multiple profile builds, or even multiple back and forth questions about the movies. No longer do you have to be frustrated because CREDITs will soon to be available for limited users.  Introducing CREDITs, which is an interconnected subscription, based service that connects six services through one central application feature. The six supported services are Cinema, Ride Share, Eatery (Dining), Digital Download, Item (Memorabilia), and Trailer services. This model surrounds its core feature, which is event oriented (such as going to a movie, but later we will be expanding to concerts and other social events) and will allow a user to build an event itinerary around such an event. Users can plan transportation and dining experiences around their core event using this one service while expanding that experience using complimentary services. By adding a scheduled ride share service and dining locations near their assigned theater, a user can take the hassle out of event planning and replace it with convenience and safety. Users subscription tier will provide them with the core feature while also providing discount credits, which can be used to enhance their experience.  My goal is to raise funding which will allow me to finance the first round of building this idea into a company. Your seed money is of the upmost importance to me and because I know what working hard for your money means. I also know what it is like when you see it dissolve with nothing to show for it. All donors can expect a monthly situation report on the project along with a quarterly report of how funds are being utilized so that there is full transparency. Once funding has been fully secured in the first round the first step will to be legally file our trademark and file for patent pending status. This will occur within the first 30 days of securing funds. I will complete this step by hiring a professional trademark and patent attorney. Once the provisional patent has been issued, by the USPTO funding will then be released to design the first mobile application prototype. This will be done using a professional third party application designer and developer. Once the prototype has been completed we will release funding to start our first round focus group which will consist of a sample size of four groups each with 250 people (varying ages). There will be one sample group in each of the four major cities we plan to launch CREDITs in which are: Los Angeles, CA; Huston, TX; Chicago, IL; and New York City, NY. This will give us user interface feedback and insight into whether or not this application has solved a variety of problems linked to the movie watching experience. Once the results of the focus group has been analyzed and shared our company will secure a second round of funding which will be phase two of building CREDITs into a major game changer in the movie ticket subscription service. The goal is to soft launch starting on August 20, 2020 (One year) with a full launch starting on August 20, 2021. This will help pace the company out to the market so the company does not burn raised capital.  I have researched all major movie subscription services that are currently in the market and I have found one common mistake. Each competitor grew faster than the company could sustain its own service. This led to a fast cash burn rate and constant changes in the companyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s terms of service agreement. In the end, this resulted in high customer attrition rates and poor customer experience. These companies also failed to collaborate with key companies, which could have helped a customer, have a richer experience. This also caused the companies to focus solely in one area and that is acquiring subscribers who are loyal to their own brand. My subscription service model is different and not meant to single out any theater chain or subscription service, but rather to reset the entire field and give movie chains the ability to fill theater seats. These seats would otherwise go unused and create a deficit in ticket sales. Low-ticket sales also would lead to low foot traffic at theater concession stands. My service plan and mobile application can create fair and open options to moviegoers everywhere.  I do plan to use round two funding to secure important partnerships with major companies. This will help drive customer traffic to our application and even reduce customer acquisition cost. Additionally, all revenue generated from each partnership will be reinvested in to the company and used to build out their corresponding area of the mobile application. Because I plan to limit the amount of subscribers during each trial run this will reduce the cash burn rate and allow us to plan for maximum liabilities taken on by the company and investors.  When I first came up with the idea of CREDITs it was because I allowed myself to forget what it was like to plan a date night with my beautiful wife. In addition, I saw how families were affected by the unaffordable price tag that a movie night brought. I can see how the changes in alcohol consumption at the theaters can be a catalyst for DUI or even severe injury when out with friends. I saw that I could help bring the movies back to the movie watchers. This is why CREDITs needs your support and with it, I know we can change the way we go to the movies!      Risks and challenges  I do have the upmost confidence in seeing this idea through to a company and onto a family of employees who have a goal in seeing, everyone back out and at the movie theaters. However, I must be clear in stating that in order for this idea to be fully attainable I must break the funding into two phases so that I can limit risk for all investors. Each phase is meant to accomplish a small goal so that the struggles of growing too fast or becoming too complicated does not kill the company. Some of the hurdles that we can encounter is failure to have a full patent in less than 24 months. Another hurdle can be the timeline that the mobile application is completed. Additionally, the focus group may not return favorable results, which could affect timeline for soft launch. Finally, if the technology cannot be produced or the partnerships with other companies cannot be attained then the ability to have a full functional application can be jeopardized, which means as the founder I will have a moral duty to halt further movement. I kindly seek your pledge and this is why your seed money will always be recognized on our company's landing page. Without your investment, this company would fail to exist. Please invest with caution and understanding that this is a risk, but worth the reward.

Each member of our team was assigned a specific area for the development of the project, given the fact that in addition to the race, the judges will evaluate other elements, such as:     A portfolio of entrepreneurship, which contains the management of the project, the identity of the team, the marketing used, the relevance of the Pit Display, sponsorships and fundraising strategy, as well as a self-evaluation of the process. A set of renders, images that illustrate the three dimensions of an object.ÃÂÃÂ           PROPÃÂ<U+0093>SITO   Nuestro propÃÂÃÂ³sito es continuar desarrollando habilidades intelectuales y humanas, que podamos emplear a lo largo de nuestra vida cotidiana, acadÃÂÃÂ©mica y profesional. PURPOSE    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Our purpose is to continue developing intellectual and human skills that we can apply throughout our academic, professional and everyday lives. As well as complementing these skills with the acquisition of STEM knowledge in the competition process. In addition, we would like to help provide a path for our School to be internationally recognized, by winning a pass to the final competition in Abu Dhabi. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ             Risks and challenges  El mayor desafÃÂÃÂ­o que se nos presenta ahora es la Competencia Nacional, en la que debemos desempeÃÂÃÂ±ar un mayor esfuerzo al enfrentarnos contra escuderÃÂÃÂ­as de otros estados de la RepÃÂÃÂºblica, entre los que se en encuentran los ganadores de las competencias regionales en CDMX, Sonora y Campeche. Sin embargo, todo este proceso puede llevarse ÃÂÃÂºnicamente a cabo gracias a los patrocinadores y donadores que nos han apoyado, ya que es necesario cubrir los gastos de transporte, hospedaje y viÃÂÃÂ¡ticos. AsÃÂÃÂ­ como gastos adicionales para el desarrollo del proyecto, como son la manufactura y pruebas del prototipo que se llevarÃÂÃÂ¡n a cabo en Durango; y los portafolios y elementos para el montaje del Pit Display. Es por eso que el equipo de Tecnosihuatl pide su apoyo econÃÂÃÂ³mico agradeciendo la confianza depositada y les envÃÂÃÂ­a su mayor agradecimiento.  Risks and challenges The biggest challenge that we face now is the National Competition, in which we must put an even  greater effort when facing against teams from other states of the Country, amongst which are the winners of the regional competitions in Mexico City, Sonora and Campeche. However, this entire process can only be carried out with the support of sponsors and donors who have provided us with their invaluable help, for it is necessary to cover the transportation, accommodation and travel expenses. As well as additional costs for the development of the project, such as the manufacturing and testing of the prototype that will be carried out in Durango; and, the portfolios and elements for the Pit Display assembly. That is why the Tecnosihuatl Team asks for your financial support, feeling grateful for the trust invested in us and sending you our deepest gratitude.

Blurb: If You Have a Smart Home, Guard Dog Will Protect You and the \\
Creator_description: Jay Hartley is a hands on technology executive, having led many companies in developing innovative technology solutions.    He has been responsible for designing, implementing and managing security programs in a variety of industries. Through his leadership, companies have gained PCI, HIPAA, SOC 2 and HighTrust security compliance.  Jay  is passionate about creating simple to use solutions that provide security and privacy solutions to protect individuals, families and businesses.
Project_description: Protecting You from the "Things" in Your Home   Guard Dog, by A Cloud of My Own     We love gadgets. ÃÂÃÂ Automated devices that make your life easier are fantastic. ÃÂÃÂ Lights, plugs, appliances, locks, heating and cooling, security cameras. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We love them. ÃÂÃÂ However, they do create risk. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     Each network connected device in your home creates a target for hackers or automated 'malware'. ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ These devices are poorly protected and incredibly easy to hack, making them prime targets for hackers.    Once a device is infected, it becomes a jumping off point to watch, listen, capture your information and control these devices. ÃÂÃÂ Your information and data can be send anywhere in the world, and you will have no idea it's happening. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ  Your firewall, cable company and anti-virus programs don't protect you from these threats.    Large companies spend loads of time and money protecting themselves against these threats. ÃÂÃÂ The bad news is no one is protecting your home or small business.ÃÂÃÂ       New, Terrifying Hacks are being reported every day     If you have a devices connected to the internet in your home, it's time to add a Guard Dog to keep you safe. ÃÂÃÂ We have developed products specifically to protect you against these attacks on your privacy and security. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     Winner of multiple Innovation awards.ÃÂÃÂ ( Mass Innovations - Best Product, New England Business Association - Innovation Technology Finalist, CEDIA - Innovation Alley [Custom Electronics Design and Installation Association)    A pledge of $29 for a Guard Dog Lite can start protecting your home, apartment, or office. ÃÂÃÂ Simple to install. ÃÂÃÂ Doesn't disrupt anything in your home. ÃÂÃÂ $29 to protect the security and privacy of yourself, family, your business. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Please contribute to our mission of protecting your privacy and security today.ÃÂÃÂ       Guard Dog Lite Prototype - showing how small and unobtrusive it is - easy installation - just plug in the power cord       Guard Dog    Several years ago, our founder was installing a simple web security camera in his home. ÃÂÃÂ After a few frustrating hours of home network setup, the camera was streaming live feeds to his phone. ÃÂÃÂ Always curious and a veteran of cybersecurity work for large companies, ÃÂÃÂ he decided to monitor the network traffic flowing in his home. ÃÂÃÂ What he discovered was shocking. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ All of the devices in his home were sending data to various servers around the world. ÃÂÃÂ There was no way to tell what communication was valid and what devices might have already been compromised by hackers. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ He searched for a reasonably priced, consumer friendly solution, but came up empty.ÃÂÃÂ   Thus,  Guard Dog by A Cloud of My Own  was born. ÃÂÃÂ Our goals our straightforward. ÃÂÃÂ    Keep you safe from hackers gaining access to the IOT devices in your home. ÃÂÃÂ Once the have access to one or more of these devices, they can monitor audio, visual and activities in your home. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ They become embedded inside of your home.ÃÂÃÂ     Make the device  incredibly simple to install .ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     Make setup of the Guard Dog safe. ÃÂÃÂ By eliminating the separate app to setup and maintain your security devices, your Guard Dog is dramatically safer. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Security setup through the  Guard Dogs built in screen eliminates the risk of the App (or the App connection points) from being hacked or compromised.  ÃÂÃÂ The app connection points are like a door to the control room. ÃÂÃÂ Even if it has a lock, it presents an incredibly high risk target to compromise your home. ÃÂÃÂ     Allow it to be added to your  existing network without disrupting it . ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ No need to throw out everything you have already.    Provide the protection that Enterprise Companies have, at a fraction of the cost.   We are focused on protecting you, your family and your home from hackers taking advantage of the poor security in the vast majority of IOT devices that are on the market today.ÃÂÃÂ      Sample display of where your smart home devices have been 'chatting'.  How would you know if this are expected or an intruder collecting data in your home or apartment?     Simplify and Automate Installation   By simplifying installation (with a built-in touchscreen and no need to download and connect through a separate app), we have trained the Guard Dog to automatically create an  optimal, secure, separate Wifi network  in your home. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Unlike other network security devices, your Guard Dog has a built-in Touch Screen Interface. ÃÂÃÂ It will guide you through the safe and simple way to add Internet of Things(IOT) and Smart Devices to your home.ÃÂÃÂ   Many of the most basic 'open external doors' in a home network setup occur due to misconfiguration. ÃÂÃÂ Install and setup are unnecessarily difficult because the systems are too 'tech folk' oriented. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Straight Forward Approach to IOT Security   Reading most marketing material on security devices is entertaining. ÃÂÃÂ It sometimes feels like a magical potion, mix this and that ( Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning are some common ones) , and magically all of your challenges are over.ÃÂÃÂ   We do have AI and ML in our solution, but let focus on the basic approach that we use. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ It is straightforward and you can see how what we are doing makes sense. ÃÂÃÂ There are 4 major functions that we perform to keep you and your "things" safe.   Isolate    Identify    Profile    Protect    Isolate   First, we automatically create a secure wifi network in your home connected to your existing network. ÃÂÃÂ Through our expertise in security, we automate the whole task. ÃÂÃÂ The  Guard Dog  senses and analyzes your current network and then configure the optimal network for your smart things. ÃÂÃÂ Once its complete, ÃÂÃÂ All the information you need to begin connecting your devices to your secure network is right there on the screen. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   No need to download another app, try and connect to the device, configure and then reboot and try to reconnect to the device. ÃÂÃÂ (By the way - having the setup controlled via an app creates a whole new set of security risks. ÃÂÃÂ By having the devices core configuration managed on the Guard Dog itself, the setup is inherently more secure.   Identify   As Internet of Things / Smart Home devices are added to the A Cloud of My Own secure network, they are immediately under the protection of the Guard Dog. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ As devices are added, the  Guard Dog  will prompt you to approve the addition to your home. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ This prevents a common method where malicious programs and malware attempt to 'hop onto' your network. ÃÂÃÂ This is known as 'Positive Acknowledge'. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Only when you are at home acknowledging the addition of the device, will it be allowed into your network.ÃÂÃÂ   As it is added, A Cloud of My Own's large proprietary database of IOT device behavior is used by the Guard Dog to determine the devices expected behavior. ÃÂÃÂ    Profile   The Guard Dog and A Cloud of My Own work together to monitor, learn and validate multiple dimensions of your IOT / Smart Home devices behavior. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ These extremely powerful technologies combine to create continuously learning, incredibly strong, layers of always on cyber protection.   Protect   Now your Guard Dog is continuously prowling and protecting your Smart Home. ÃÂÃÂ Any attempts to communicate with inappropriate or potentially dangerous systems around the world will be stopped. ÃÂÃÂ Attempts to inject malware onto unprotected 'things' is blocked. ÃÂÃÂ If a 'Thing' appears to be compromised, the Guard Dog will prevent only hackers 'channel' from being used, and you will be notified if you have requested. ÃÂÃÂ   Are you ready to protect your Smart Home? ÃÂÃÂ Order your Guard Dog today!    Project Timeline / Milestones:ÃÂÃÂ     Development got underway in the Fall of 2017, with the First bench test units available in the Spring of 2018. ÃÂÃÂ   Leveraging open source security projects - like  Zeek  - a security product which was started in 1995 - built and supported by such talented organizations as Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, the National Science Foundation, International Computer Science Institute and National Center for Supercomputing Applications, we have created a production ready, highly tested security product.  At this point, it became obvious to the team that we needed to make this solution very scalable, in order to provide the best solutions to our future customers. ÃÂÃÂ We determined that we needed a scalable solution for developing, testing and deploying code to the devices distributed around the world. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   In September 2018, we completed our port from native code into GitHub, docker and Resin.io. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ This provides a secure, controlled method to perform iterated product development in a safe, secure, repeatable method.  The link below commemorates our movements of the entire product into this new environment. ÃÂÃÂ This was a huge leap towards making this product scale for our customers.  https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6451992114057265152   Early Functionality Demo During User Testing - Fall 2018ÃÂÃÂ   So very rough looking looking back. ÃÂÃÂ This was before the 'Auto-Configure' portions of the product had been completed.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             Summer 2018  Early Cad Drawing of Case Bottom     Early CAD Drawing for the Device Case    Summer2018     Early Working Prototype    November 2018ÃÂÃÂ   Elimination of the Cloud carve out in the CaseÃÂÃÂ      Improved Case Design        Boston New Technology Meetup - December 2018     Showing the Prototype at Mass Innovations Night (Burlington MA). ÃÂÃÂ The teams excitement started to build with strong feedback from the public.  January 2019     Demo Night - Mass Innovations Night (Burlington MA) . A Basic Demo setup - A Cloud of My Own , Google Home Hub , Smart Home Switches and Bulbs    January 2019      Grand Prize Winner - Best New Product Mass Innovation Nights - January 2019     Current State (March 2019)  We continue to optimize the design and feature set.ÃÂÃÂ      Since February 2019 we have been finalizing our testing, optimizing our case design and preparing for product launch.   Based on test feedback, we have added a 'notch' to the case.  This makes connecting the device (which was already simple, even earier).      Update (May 2019)  We have created a low cost, no subscription variation of the Guard Dog product, called Guard Dog Lite. ÃÂÃÂ    Guard Dog Lite will monitor your smart home / home wireless network and report any security or potential privacy issues it finds with your home or office.ÃÂÃÂ     Provides active monitoring of your smart home / home automation devices, and reports abnormal behavior to you.ÃÂÃÂ     Ongoing reports available for you to review a complete review of your smart home devices - security, privacy, and other critical details that you would never know. ÃÂÃÂ     Highlights devices using non-secure protocols    Access to our community to see the latest smart device / internet connected gadget security risks    Simple to install - just plug in the power cord    Through a web browser (on your computer, tablet or phone), select your wifi network.    ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s it !    No subscription Fees    Only 1 thing to connect - a power cord    Dimensions - about the size of a credit card and an inch thick (20mm)      Sample Report - highlighting non-secure devices and a device that appears hacked      We look forward to sharing our project updates as we move through the Kickstarter Campaign.ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Guard Dog by A Cloud of My Own is highly developed.  We are continuing to adjust the User Interface/User Experience on the Guard Dog to ensure that is remains easy and straight forward for non technical users.   Our goal is to eliminate the 'magic' and 'mystery' in security devices for you, and through our built-in touchscreen give you only as much or as little information as you want.      Securely patching devices once they are in your home is a huge challenge in the security space for Smart Homes and Internet of Things devices.  Through our experience is managing tens of thousands of medical applications running simultaneously on user owned devices throughout the world, we have build in the ability to securely update the Guard Dog in a very secure, efficient manner.   This will allow us to continue to keep you safe as new threats emerge and to continue to improve your user experience with the Guard dog.   On the manufacturing side, our main risk is in managing the supply chain of parts to ensure that we can assemble and ship to match demand.  To mitigate this risk, the Guard Dog is built using high quality, commercially available parts.     Because the threats continue to evolve, the team will be continuously researching, testing and enhancing our product.   The team has worked together on many corporate security projects and ensuring regulatory security compliance compliance since before the original HIPAA regulations were made law in the US. From HIPAA, PCI and High Trust - we understand how to secure technology environments.

ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ABOUT ME  ÃÂÃÂ  I was a maintenance technician for 6 years and if I had to sum up the job I would say ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>To every problem a solutionÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ. Despite the defaults it helped me learn a lot : silicon is unusable because it serapes the case from the phone. I then got a hold of a small 3D printer. REWARDS DELIVERY       The rewards will be delivered during August and September so you can fully enjoy the product during the post-summer activities.        HOW TO HELP   ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ Any feedback, advice or criticism are much appreciated. The product will most likely change throughout the years and you be a part of it.    Some upgrades IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m thinking about : a bumper, fabric inside the case, a mini logo printed on the back of the case and a stainless steal hook made by a French craftsman.ÃÂÃÂ     ABOUT FUNDING   ÃÂÃÂ The funding will help me purchase a industrial 3D printer. It has a big adhesion surface, high precision and multiple possible extrusions, colors and materials. Thanks to itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>sÃÂÃÂ big surface, it will be possible to print more than 10 cases at the same time.ÃÂÃÂ     I will also need to invest in a 3D scanner to have an easier and more precise sketching. Everything else will be used for buying materials and shipping out your rewards.ÃÂÃÂ                 Choose your color! Diam: 0.2mm       Choose your color! Diam: 0.5mm    WHY THIS PROJECT   Since the very beginning of this project and every time I spoke about it, people would tell me it was a great idea. My objectives were to make a product that doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t exist, made in France and most of all a good product accessible for everyone. But eventually , I was faced with a problem : the delocalisation of French phone case making industries. After some thinking, I decided to start experimenting with additive manufacturing. Surprised with the possible outcome with good quality impression, I realized that additive manufacturing has itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s place in this industry.    With NowFalls and your backing, I hope to help stop pickpocketing and the chances of dropping your phone but I also want to proove the ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>industry worldÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ that you can produce for cheap and stop delocalisation!       Risks and challenges  The most obvious risk would be that the idea or use of the product does not interest people. Then it would be that I might not get the full financing. In terms of the challenge it would be to fall behind on the delivery of the rewards

Blurb: BondezzÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is a chemical and glue free denture adhesive pad, that comfortably adheres your dentures to your gums in 15 seconds. No Pain!
Creator_description: BondezzÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is a chemical and glue free denture adhesive pad, that comfortably adheres your dentures to your gums in 15 seconds.
Project_description: Every so often a simple but revolutionary product comes around that has the potential to improve the daily routines of millions of people. That is the case with Bondezz adhesive free denture pad. These denture pads seem too good to be true, they are cheaper then traditional denture products, longer lasting, more comfortable, TASTE FREE (this is a big one), and require less maintenance. The secret is the pad uses suction rather than chemicals to hold the denture in place.ÃÂÃÂ   Fortunately for denture users worldwide Bondezz creator Joseph Scivoletto is a innovator and denture user himself. Joseph has designed this incredible patented product and is trying to get it out to the public. If you have dentures you are well aware, of the pain, labor, discomfort and even embarrassment that comes along with the process, if you don't have dentures, we are sure some of your loved ones do. Take a moment in your life to ask them how much discomfort there dentures cost them, or just ask them how the denture glue taste, that should sum it up nicely.  ÃÂÃÂ Bondezz is here to give denture users a comfortable, simple, and confident lifestyle change in their daily routine, enabling them to Eat, Drink, Chew and Smile with Confidence! Best part, its is 100 percent glue and chemical free! By supporting this Kickstarter you are helping launch a product which will positively affect millions of people's lives. For under $1 a day you can greatly improve the comfort and confidence for you or one of your loved ones with this miracle product.ÃÂÃÂ          BondezzÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ is a soft multi-layered, non-adhesive Pad designed to eliminate the need for liquid, gel or pad adhesives as well as the need for denture reline kits made of silicone or acrylic. Daily use of BondezzÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ pad improves the comfort because it conforms to your gums. It adheres to your denture and gums within 15 seconds, the bond actually grows stronger the more you chew. The comfortable ÃÂÃÂ Bondezz pad also eases the soreness on gums from dentures or partials. The Secret is using suction to eliminate the need for bad tasting chemicals and adhesives.     Here is the rundown.    BONDEZZ is a US patented and international patented adhesive free denture pad.ÃÂÃÂ    translation: NO GLUE! NO TASTE! JUST COMFORT!   Bondezz pads are easy to apply right out of the box with no need for trimming.   Less prep time, just gently wet them, insert, and place in your mouth! 15 seconds later your ready to eat. (like to sped up video of the procedure)   BONDEZZ pads help to seal out food particles between denture and gums; preventing pain while chewing.ÃÂÃÂ    This product actually adds to your comfort and hygiene   BONDEZZ pads makes cleaning dentures easy, with no scraping of glue from the gum or denture. Your denture can be removed, rinsed and returned after eating without removing the pad.   Less prep time, and less cleanup time!   BONDEZZ pads do not melt like adhesives. Adhesives and paraffin wax products can liquefy and drip down the back of the throat, especially after drinking warm liquids.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Bondezz doesn't have the bad taste chemicals do, in fact it doesn't have any taste at all!   BONDEZZ pads bond to the gums and denture. lasting all day.ÃÂÃÂ    Did we mention this is ALL DAY comfort, just 1 pad all day. You can even clean your dentures without the need to replace a pad.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                              BONDEZZ pads prevents rocking or clacking noises while talking or eating.ÃÂÃÂ    The pad actually on top of everything above, these pads have even more positive effects when compare to adhesives.   BONDEZZ pads create a cushion to the gums relieving the hard effect of the denture. It softens the pressure on the gum when chewing, minimizing the acceleration of bone loss and irritations to the gum which occurs when pressure is transmitted through the gum tissues to the jaw. This helps to prevent atrophy which further accelerates the bone loss.ÃÂÃÂ    but wait, there are more positive effects! Bondezz will cushion the bones in your jaw.   BONDEZZ pads can be used immediately following extractions, providing soothing comfort.ÃÂÃÂ    If you had to get your teeth extracted you can get right back on track with Bondezz, and use them immediately, they will even help the healing process.ÃÂÃÂ    BONDEZZ pads do not contain any chemicalÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s and is affirmed by the FDA as GRAS (generally recognized as safe)ÃÂÃÂ    Less chemicals in your body, what is not to love? Blurb: Designing a robust do it all portable heat generator.
Creator_description: I have completed a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Engineering and a Master of Science degree in Biotechnology at Florida Institute of Technology in Melbourne, Florida.  I have worked as an engineer on various projects with NASA engineers in Florida's Space Coast. During my studies in Biotechnology, I conducted extensive laboratory research at Florida Tech on AlzheimerÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s disease while collaborating with NASA researchers.  Currently, I work as a Pilot Plant Sr. Associate Engineer supporting Amgen's next generation of molecules designed to treat serious illnesses.My roots:My ancestors left Germany in the early 1940s and immigrated into the United States.  I grew up in NY, VA, and FL with many adventurous activities, social networking, and STEM projects.  The moment that really changed my life was when I was diagnosed with a curable thyroid cancer around the same time that my father developed cancer.  Since then I have shifted gears to researching several fields related with medicine.  I stumbled on a new technique to target cancer cells using radio waves and gold nanoparticles, AKA the Kanzius Machine.  Since that time I have always wanted to integrate a smaller version of the technology to several other industries that can benefit substantially.   Contact: tech.jra@gmail.com
Project_description: Since the dawn of time, humanity has strived to break barriers that were once deemed impossible. ÃÂÃÂ Climbing the highest peak, hiking the most difficult trail, sailing the longest stretch of ocean, and exploring the deepest reaches of the unknown in space all benefit from technology that harnesses the physical elements of nature to allow a pioneer to survive, breaking the physical boundaries. ÃÂÃÂ The waterproof   portable radiowave heat generator   sets the stage for potential use in several industries with an emphasis on survival.  The design in simple terms:  Born from the nanotechnology revolution, this invention leverages cost effective gold nanoparticles which are incorporated into surrounding objects. ÃÂÃÂ The gold nanoparticles are excitable via radiofrequency waves, which then generate heat. ÃÂÃÂ This device will allow you to cook while on the move, keep your body warm, and provide heat energy to your other tools. ÃÂÃÂ Throw in a built in GPS beacon system, high fidelity speakers, and intelligent API that connects to a smartphone and you've got the ultimate package. ÃÂÃÂ This device will be rechargeable via multiple mechanisms, including movement. ÃÂÃÂ In addition, this invention sets the stage for a green future, completely eliminating propane and flammable, toxic gases.   Backpacking/Camping ?  -> Use it for cooking a delicious stir fry or preparing your favorite cup of tea/coffee in the outdoors. ÃÂÃÂ   -> Never experience a cold night in your tent again by incorporating a nanoparticle-laced sleeping bag.   Trekking the North Pole ?  -> Use it to provide critical warmth to your wearables during spontaneous weather swings.   Stranded on a boat in the Deep Sea ?  -> Use it to separate salt from water using heat energy.   Lucky enough to land a seat on a Space exploration mission ?  -> Use it as a viable means to prepare your food.ÃÂÃÂ    Diving in shivering waters?   -> Include it with your scuba equipment and never get cold again.   THE POTENTIAL OF THE INVENTION DETAILED  In present times, hikers, extended backpackers, touring cyclists, mountain climbers, trekking hunters, and other participants in outdoor activities are known to need a reliable, portable, safe source of on-demand heat. A source of heat provides comfort, protection from hypothermia, a means of purifying water and foodstuffs, and may be the single most important factor in the comfort or survival of an extended trip exposed to the elements. Fire has been the go-to source of heat and light since before antiquity; a universally useful asset to anyone hoping to brave the harsher conditions of the wilderness. However, fire may not be desirable in certain environments for fear of losing control of the fire or it may be impossible to start due to excessive dampness, or otherwise unattainable due to a lack of suitable fuel. In any of these scenarios, individuals may turn to chemical heater packs, gas-powered stoves, or electrical resistive coils. However, these all have notable drawbacks for an individual on the move. Chem-heaters are only active for a short time before completing their exothermic reaction and losing their potency. Gas-powered stoves require bulky, heavy cannisters to function (in addition to the base devices). Resistive coils are likewise difficult to use in a variety of situations; coils suitable for cooking are too hot for heating a body, and coils for a body too cool for cooking. So the need for a universal, effective, safe, portable source of heat remains.  The present invention relates to an apparatus capable of generating heat via the exposure of a resonant metallic suspension to radiofrequency irradiation. More specifically, the present invention utilizes this phenomenon to remotely generate heat within specifically constructed bodies outwardly similar to various existing unfulfilled, with users choosing an option that best fits their projected needs. In an adjacent field, an inventor named John S. Kanzius has pioneered an experimental method for treating cancer involving injecting a solution containing gold or carbon nanoparticles into a tumor, then exposing said solution (within the tumor) to radio waves. Given the low absorption rate of living tissues for radio- frequency energy, the waves may ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>targetÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ the metals for dielectric heating. This process has been observed to elicit an exothermic response from the solution; as the nanoparticles absorb the radio-frequency energy, they convert said energy to local thermal energy, heating the solution and any surrounding materials. It is hoped that this effect may be used to point-target malignant tissue for non-invasive radio-frequency radiation therapy. The present invention aims to harness the dialectic heating effect of radio waves on metallic nanoparticles to generate controllable, user-safe, highly variable heat with the use of a specific supporting structure. The present invention may be applied to a variety of existing assemblies, such as a knife, a cooking pot, a jacket, and other embodiments that may be realized by an individual skilled in the art of tool or clothing manufacture.ÃÂÃÂ          FIG 1 - Cooking Knife       FIG 2       FIG 3       FIG 4       FIG 5         FIG 6 - Backpacker Mini Stove       FIG 7       FIG 8       FIG 9        FIG 10 - Variably Controlled Warmth to Clothing       FIG 11       FIG 12       FIG 13       FIG 14        Risks and challenges  To produce a robust and portable radio frequency wave heat generator, funding in 3 Kickstarter phases with increasing rewards is needed for the following:  1) Materials 2) Patent attorneys  3) Engineering and scientific support 4) Machine shop/lab rental space 5) Marketing  To develop prototypes of the invention, fundraising will be established in several phases, with increasing financial demand.  Each phase will demonstrate progress and accomplishment.  Eventually, lab and machine shop space near a prominent university will be established;  particularly, California Institute of Technology near Pasadena.    Funding will follow the following Phases:  Phase 1 Fundraising: (current Kickstarter goal): Secure intellectual property and advertise. Phase 2 Fundraising:  Procure materials and recruit likeminded passionate engineers/scientists to allow the first prototype to come to fruition. Phase 3 Fundraising: Reserve lab/machine shop space to pilot prototypes into a larger scale production process.  Note: As this is Kickstarter Phase 1 of fundraising, money will only be used for intellectual property procurement and advertising.  There is no guarantee of a physical product as a result of Phase 1 and 2 fundraising.  Phase 3 will guarantee a free, tangible radio frequency wave generator to supporters who pledge for the reward specified at that time.

Project_description: StepSkooter is the first and only exercise riding stepper that brings together the fitness benefits of a stair stepper and the fun of a scooter.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        Intended for kids and adults alike, StepSkooter is a combination of a regular kick scooter and an exercise stepper that can be used indoors and outdoors. In a step-pedal motion, StepSkooter delivers fun everywhere: neighborhood sidewalks, parks and even your own living room (used with the stationary stand).       ÃÂÃÂ StepSkooter provides the rider with great outdoor exercise when the weather permits. When the weather is not favorable, bring it indoors to use with the stationary support. Riding StepSkooter provides a low-impact workout, toning oneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s quads, calves, hamstrings & glutes while improving overall balance. ÃÂÃÂ         ÃÂÃÂ Interchangeable wheels adjust the speed of the scooter, allowing years of enjoyment as your children grow. Another unique feature of the StepSkooter is its push pedals, which always stay parallel to the ground and work the same muscles as a stair stepper.       Childhood obesity has become an epidemic. Children will want to ride this for the fun of riding a scooter, not realizing the health benefits they're receiving of a lower body workout, cardio and muscle-toning exercise. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s suitable for both adults and children at any level of fitness. Anyone struggling with finding an enjoyable workout will love getting active with this unique piece of equipment!ÃÂÃÂ               StepSkooter is very easy to ride, kids as young as 4 can learn in less than 5 minutes. ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ To start riding, put one foot on a pedal and push forward with your other leg, then just start pedaling. It's that easy! StepSkooter is powered by both feet, but the rider can also coast, just like riding a regular kick scooter. Variable speed is dependent upon the amount of force and the frequency the rider pushes, with a maximum speed of 10 mph (using larger size wheels).ÃÂÃÂ        A fold-up design, StepSkooter is lightweight and convenient to carry. At less than 20 lbs, the StepSkooter is easy to pack for your next getaway.        What makes StepSkooter differentÃÂÃÂ from otherÃÂÃÂ scooters?  StepSkooter is based on a unique, patented design. There is no other scooter/stepper that is propelled with pedals parallel to the ground. The wheels can easily be changed to add speed or to be used by different age groups, making StepSkooter ultra versatile. It can be used in a stationary position, as an exercise Stepper, or as a regular scooter, giving you 3 options in 1. Other self propelled scooters and bikes in the market use different types of pedals, requiring the riders to pedal at an angle to the ground and making it difficult to ride.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             The StepSkooter is available in 2 sizes and a choice of 5 colors: red, gray, pink, blue, and green.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ                                                      The idea and motivation to create StepSkooter:         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                FAQ   What is the max weight?   We recommend the max weight of 60 Kg (120 lbs.) for the kids version and 110Kg (220 lbs.) for the adult version.   Are all the wheels easy to change?   StepSkooter wheels are designed to be very simple and easy to change. It takes less than 5 minutes.   Is StepSkooter easy to ride?   It's remarkably easy to ride. There is virtually no learning curve and nearly anyone can ride it or exercise on it.ÃÂÃÂ    Is there a recommended age for younger riders?   Kids as young as three to four years old have enjoyed the StepSkooter prototypes during development. Learning to ride is intuitive and fast.   Can I ride StepSkooter like a Kick scooter?   Yes, absolutely! Riding StepSkooter using the pedals as an intense workout and it was designed to accommodate lighter riding as well.   Do you provide warranty for the StepSkooter?   Yes. We offer six (6) months limited warranty on all stepskooter purchases. We will ship replacement parts free of charge. Please note this warranty does not cover damage caused by improper use according to the directions in our user manual.   How much does the StepSkooter weigh? ÃÂÃÂ   The child size weight is 7.5kg (16 lbs) and the adult size weight is 9kg (19.5 lbs)   Where can I buy different size wheels, replacement parts, and other accessories?   After the campaign ends, we will sell different size wheels through our website where you can purchase components, accessories, and even StepSkooter.   What is the difference between StepSkooter and other pedal scooters?ÃÂÃÂ    There is no other pedal scooter with pedals always parallel to the ground. StepSkooter's patent is unique. Furthermore, our easy to change wheels and simple conversion to an exercise stepper put the StepSkooter ahead of competition.   Do you ship worldwide?ÃÂÃÂ    Yes. Shipping costs vary according to location.   How can I contact you?   You can email us anytime at  contact@stepskooter.com   Or like us on Facebook / follow us on Instagram @stepskooter       If you love StepSkooter but canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t financially back us at this time, please take the time to share with your network on your social media pages. It would really help us out. You can reach more people than you think! If you know anyone that would enjoy StepSkooter, please let them know. Our official hashtag is #StepSkooter      Risks and challenges  Delivering the highest quality product to our backers on time is our #1 priority.  Dozens of prototypes have been tested and we have already fabricated many parts.  Final assembly and some part fabrication will take place at our own facilities in Elmsford, NY. This will minimize risks and challenges, and will allow us to keep a close eye on quality.   Preliminary agreements with multiple parts suppliers are already negotiated.  We have the knowledge and business experience to build the most awesome scooter ever made.  Despite our detailed planning, development and manufacturing can always experience unforeseen circumstances. Although we have multiple suppliers for each component, we cannot control problems with customs or freight logistics. We have done our homework and feel confident that if any problems do occur it will have minimum manufacturing disruptions as we keep a large inventory of parts.   Currently, we cannot predict anything that would jeopardize the project. We will be sure to keep you informed and work to resolve any unforeseen issues. We love our Stepskooter and we think that everybody should get the chance to ride, exercise and have fun with one. Your support will help us to make our dream of having a Stepskooter in every household a reality.   Thank you!

Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                Green Power Bank open box, internal components       Italian Patent 1       Italian Patent 2       Italian Patent 3       Italian Patent 4       Box Green Power Bank    The GREEN POWER BANK, is an ecological rechargeable battery to support smartphones and tablets.  The Greeen Power Bank differs from all the other rechargeable batteries on the market, because it recharges itself, simply by keeping it on during the day, as with any movement, more or less slight, the patented device inside recharges the battery itself.  In practice, within the Green Power Bank there is a small linear energy generator, also called linear dynamo, with a very simple but effective operation, which does not compromise the use of the charger itself.  In doing so, we have the security during the day to be able to recharge our smartphone or tablet, even if we have forgotten it in the evening, to put it under charge, like common chargers.      Risks and challenges  The product in question, of very high worldwide diffusion, is in a sector in continuous evolution and development, always looking for innovative products with new technologies, such as the Green Power Bank. In our opinion, a product with a very low investment risk.
