Creator_description: Developing the future of stormwater management.
Project_description: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   Back to the beginningÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦   To best explain and describe our project and why it is important we first need to explain and describe what stormwater is and why it is important. Stormwater is often overlooked but impacts everyone and everywhere. It is water from rain or snow fall that can soak into soil (infiltrate) or runoff into water bodies. Some runoff is natural, but too much, especially from impervious surfaces like parking lots and from increasingly intense rain events, can carry pollutants like litter, fertilizer, or exposed soil into nearby streams, rivers, lakes, and oceans. This diminishes water quality, sometimes to the point of impacting drinking water, and damages natural habitat.ÃÂÃÂ   Runoff can also cause erosion of streambanks, sloped areas, and exposed soil due to the power of the quickly moving water. This can result in degradation of stream bank stability and thus the natural stream processes and habitat, damage and destruction of infrastructure like bridges and pipes, and property loss and damage for landowners as well as a general decrease in aesthetics.ÃÂÃÂ   This is a problem faced around the country and around the world. A few recent examples include the California forest fires, the Hypoxic Zone in the Gulf of Mexico, and Iowa water quality issues. The links below can tell you more about each of these issues.ÃÂÃÂ    https://www.estormwater.com/runoff-treatment/storm-water-runoff-threatens-sacramento-river-watershed-post-carr-fire    https://www.epa.gov/ms-htf/hypoxia-101    https://coastalscience.noaa.gov/news/price-of-shrimp-affected-by-gulf-of-mexico-dead-zone/    https://news.nationalgeographic.com/2017/12/iowa-agriculture-runoff-water-pollution-environment/   In the pictures below you see stream bank erosion, undercutting, and loss of flow (because the channel is so much wider and there is less baseflow (water that feeds streams between rain events) from infiltration to feed the stream), algae growth (caused by excessive fertilizer in runoff), and erosion on a hillside. All of these were caused by increased runoff from increased impervious cover and more intense storms.ÃÂÃÂ      Stream bank erosion, undercutting, and loss of flow        Algae growth       Erosion on a hillside     So what is the project?   We have an agreement with the Missouri Department of Natural Resources, Division of State Parks to install two configurations of the patented stormwater management device we are developing in Rock Bridge Memorial State Park. The goal of the project is to further research, increase stormwater education in the park and around mid-Missouri, and address the negative impacts of excessive stormwater runoff in two areas of the park. This partnership between Infiltronics Environmental and Rock Bridge Memorial State Park will be beneficial to both parties and will further the development of this technology.We believe this device will change how people think about stormwater management and provide superior outcomes for the environment and those installing management methods such as developers and engineers. Because of the scale of these two installs including the labor, raw materials, and soil moisture sensors required, and the fact that we do not have an outside source of revenue, we need help funding this project to make it a reality.ÃÂÃÂ      Site 1       Site 2       Site 2       Site 1       Site 2     What is this device and how does it work? ÃÂÃÂ   This technology works to mimic natural stormwater processes by using redistribution (spreading water out) to increase infiltration. It is a patented technology and is comprised of geotextile fabric tubes with a variety of segments filled with different aggregate like gravel and sand. It is placed in shallow trenches (approximately 18ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ deep) around the site and then covered with the original top soil. The main innovation of the technology is three-dimensional flow. That is, vertical, longitudinal, and transverse (horizontal) flow. Changing the configuration and size of aggregate allows us to engineer how the concentrated water on a site moves through the soil. Each installation is site specific based on soil, slope, amount of rain in an area, and amount of impervious cover.ÃÂÃÂ      Patent Figure 1       Patent Figures 3 & 4       Patent Figure 5A       Device Installation      What is Infiltronics Environmental and who are you?   Infiltronics Environmental is a company based in Columbia, MO that is developing a patented stormwater management device that works to undo the impacts of unmanaged or poorly managed stormwater runoff by mimicking natural processes of redistribution to increase infiltration. We want to provide efficient management solutions for engineers and developers while also improving environmental outcomes.ÃÂÃÂ   In the summer of 2017 we received a National Science Foundation I-Corps grant. The I-Corps program works with scientists and engineers to move out of the laboratory and into the real world with their technology. It helps teams understand all of the parts necessary to have a successful company and where they are on the path to becoming a successful company. A huge part of this is customer discovery work, going out and speaking to the people who will use it or be involved in the process of using it. The program gives each team $50,000, primarily for customer discovery. With these funds we spoke to almost 200 individuals in the stormwater industry around the country including engineers, developers, installers, and competing technology companies in California, Washington, New Jersey, Florida, Washington D.C., Texas, Illinois, and Missouri. From these interviews we learned about what is really needed in a solution and we are building this technology and our company around those needs, not just what we think is cool.ÃÂÃÂ   Before participating in the national I-Corps program we participated in the site program based out of Missouri S&T. In this program we received $3,000 for customer discovery and prototype development. We used part of these funds for lab testing. In these lab tests we were able to show three-dimensional flow and continuation of flow from segment to segment. In the national I-Corps program a maximum of $5,000 of the grant could be used for prototype development. We used this portion of the grant to pay for part of our first field installation. We are currently collecting soil moisture data on the first field installation so we can provide quantitative evidence on how the device is redistributing and infiltrating concentrated runoff.ÃÂÃÂ   The team at Infiltronics Environmental is composed of Kathleen Trauth, Ph.D., P.E. and Virginia Trauth, E.I. Kathleen is an associate professor in the Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering at the University of Missouri. She is a licensed professional engineer in Missouri and New Mexico and has over 30 years of engineering experience. Virginia has a degree in civil engineering from the University of Missouri and has earned her engineering intern certification from the State of Missouri, the first step towards licensure. She has engineering experience in the utility and civil engineering consulting industries as well as experience building and running research experiments. Oh yeah, and we are mother and daughter. See any resemblance?ÃÂÃÂ      Kathleen Trauth       Virginia Trauth     Check out this article on our acceptance into the I-Corps Program:ÃÂÃÂ    https://engineering.missouri.edu/2017/08/mu-mother-daughter-duo-receives-nsf-i-corps-support/   And these two on this project:   https://engineering.missouri.edu/2019/04/team-trauth-takes-big-step-toward-sustainable-stormwater-solution/ ÃÂÃÂ    https://www.columbiatribune.com/news/20190428/rock-bridge-state-park-tests-new-drain-system ÃÂÃÂ   At Infiltronics Environmental we have the mission to completely change and improve standard stormwater management by mimicking natural stormwater processes. At the end of the day we want to make the natural and built environments better and healthier places.   Why is this project important to you? ÃÂÃÂ   We are passionate about stormwater management because it impacts everyone and everywhere and because it is such an important resource but also has the potential for harm if not managed properly. We hate to see the negative impacts of poorly managed stormwater around the country and here in mid-Missouri and think we can help solve this problem.ÃÂÃÂ    How will you make this project happen?   To make this project a reality we will follow a blue-print similar to our first install but on a larger scale and with the added knowledge and experience from that install. We will use a soil scientist who is also a licensed onsite wastewater system designer to ensure that we understand the soil we are installing in. We will also use the services of a licensed septic installer to ensure that we have the minimal impact on the soil structure and the park as possible. The installer has extensive experience excavating on difficult terrain while maintaining necessary slopes and minimally impacting the site and soil structure. We will also use locally sourced aggregate and geotextile fabric intended and commonly used for permanent underground installation. The fabric has already been procured through a donation from Hanes Geo, a large supplier of geosynthetic and environmental products, whose parent company, Leggett & Platt, is based out of Carthage, Missouri. We will use the same manufacturer of soil moisture sensors to collect our data and production of the units themselves has already begun to ensure that the installs can take place in a timely manner. As we mentioned above, we already have an agreement in place and have had our installation designs approved so we have a guaranteed location and approval to proceed. The only missing piece to make this project happen is the funding.   Why do we need your help?   We need your help because the scale of this project, financially, is a lot for a new two-person company without an existing source of revenue to handle. We have the team, expertise, site, technology, and plan in place to make this project a smashing success, but need your help to make it a reality. The $30,000 we are trying to raise is needed to cover raw materials, supplies, and labor for the installation. As a reminder, for a project to receive funds from Kickstarter, at a minimum the target goal must be met.   Rewards   Check out the sweet rewards you can get for donating to our campaign! Backers will be kept in the loop with regular updates and rewards will be delivered as quickly as possible. Hopefully they quench your thirst for water related swag!   Check out our website, LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram below!   ÃÂÃÂ  https://infiltronicsenvironmental.com ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.linkedin.com/company/infiltronics-environmental-llc/ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.facebook.com/Infiltronics-Environmental-LLC-1541774572539231/ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ  https://www.instagram.com/infiltronicsenvironmental/ ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  Although we have a set team, location, and plan for the project, things out of our control, such as weather, could impact our install timeline and thus the timeline for some of our rewards.

Creator_description: Night Cyclist. Love to innovate. Not afraid of hard work.
Project_description: I was appalled to see the ineffectiveness of rear lights and head lights while cycling. Those who drive know that they see cyclist from far not from their rear lights but from their silhouette. When I was cycling with my friends at night, the idea suddenly popped up in my head. Why not create a bicycle light that can be seen from any direction? 360 degrees. And the rest was history.     How my bicycle looks after installation    Installation is simple. You can simply use tape or nylon cable ties (which will come in the package free of charge). I have cycled over 50 kilometers (or over 31 miles) on both methods without either one falling off.ÃÂÃÂ Ever since installing the lights on my bike, I can't count the amount of compliments I have received from passerby.  This bicycle light is specially made to be waterproof to protect it from the rain, and long-lasting with a lifespan of 8000 hours. Bendable into any shapes you like. Fret not, it does not dazzle others. Best still, it looks incredible!  Here is a simple demonstration of the light's effectiveness.                      Risks and challenges  This is my first time selling a product to a marketplace so inexperience would be an obstacle. However, coming into this project, I am fully aware of my shortcomings and I will be completely open to any lessons that can be taken home.  I am also a student. Hence, time might be a little tight. Thankfully, I have a flexible schedule that I can work with. I am definitely not afraid of hard work so let's get this thing going.

Blurb: DissOil helps us save our environment from the harm of oil and fuel spills. It is a 100% organic and sustainable product!

Creator_description: Our story? Who are we? That is quite simple, we are not a big company with unlimited financial and human resourcesÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ we are three guys with a dream and a fantastic product! We need your helpWe believe that we can make a difference with DissOil in this world but in order to do that we need your help. We have great ideas and a great product but we are missing the funding necessary for building a production facility. We are also in great need of publicity and help with spreading the word about DissOil.
Project_description: Unfortunately oil and fuel spills happen all over the world, both on land and at sea, and they happen frequently. Most spills are of course very small but they still have an impact on our nature, animal life and ground water. The best way to deal with an oil spill is to act quickly and get it under control before it cause great damage.ÃÂÃÂ   DissOil is according to us a win-win solution both for the ÃÂÃÂ environment but also saving costs for the companies dealing with oil ÃÂÃÂ spills. Compared to many other products DissOil is; Very easy to use, ÃÂÃÂ highly efficient, cost-effective, requires no personal protection for ÃÂÃÂ use and it has no negative effects on the environment.  The greatest advantage with DissOil is that it does not only absorb ÃÂÃÂ the oil but also ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>eats upÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ the oil. Thus meaning that you only need ÃÂÃÂ to spread DissOil once on spilled oil ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> nothing more! No extra work ÃÂÃÂ effort for collecting the absorbed oil. No cost for transport and ÃÂÃÂ disposal of the absorbed oil ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> simply cost-effective and easy to use.        DissOil  is a product for quick control and clean-up of oil/fuel spills. DissOil works on land and at sea and is very effective for cleaning up of shorelines and spills in forests.  DissOil is NatureÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s own method for ÃÂÃÂ breaking down oil/fuel spill (biodegradation) ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the only difference is that ÃÂÃÂ the natural process takes years compared to weeks. In other words, we ÃÂÃÂ have only boosted NatureÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s own way of dealing with oil/fuel spills.       Before and after picture of an oil spill north of Uppsala, SWEDEN. The after picture is taken 7 days after DissOil was added to the oil spill. All of the oil has been neutralized and only the harmless cork remains floating on the surface of the water.       Support our project and recieve DissOil First Aid Kit - Special edition. It is a smaller 250g bag which will be produced for this Kickstarter campaign. It is suitable to keep in your home, your car or your boat. Perfect to have available if an oil or fuel spill occurs - a perfect way to contribute to a cleaner nature!            DissOil is NatureÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s own method for breaking down ÃÂÃÂ oil spill (biodegradation) ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the only difference is that the natural ÃÂÃÂ process takes years compared to weeks. In other words, we have only ÃÂÃÂ boosted NatureÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s own way of dealing with oil spill.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             DissOil works in three steps, see description below:  STEP 1 - ABSORBS   DissOil absorbs oil spills within seconds to minutes    Absorbs about 10 times its own weight    Does not absorb water    Floats on water even when saturated with oil    Saturated DissOil does not bleed up to 40ÃÂÃÂ° C    Saturated DissOil does not bleed at high pressure (equivalent to a 90 kg person standing on it for 15 minutes) ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    STEP 2 - BREAKS DOWN OILS AND FUELS   Enzymatic breaking down is activated by moisture, i.e. dew and rain    Absorbed oils are broken down into harmless residues    Active temperature range is 0ÃÂÃÂ°- 40ÃÂÃÂ°C    Enzymes ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>hibernateÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ below freezing point ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> re-activated once above freezing point    Breaks down absorbed oils in 1 to 4 weeks at ambient temperatures above freezing point   STEP 3 - WHAT REMAINS   Once the oil is broken down the enzymes are de-activated    Remaining absorbent, cork, is a natural material    DissOil is free from chemicals and other additives    DissOil is made from 100% natural and organic materials from abundant sources    Only rejects from manufacturing of other products are used    DissOil is carbon dioxide neutral     DissOil - Interview with co-founder Johan de Faire          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                   How effective is DissOil at ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>eating upÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ spills of oils and fuel under various conditions?   Active substance of DissOil ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>eats upÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ petroleum products, such asÃÂÃÂ oils and diesel. This process is called biodegradation and the rate,ÃÂÃÂ i.e. how fast DissOil eats up absorbed spills, is dependent on certainÃÂÃÂ factors. One is temperature and DissOil is active when the temperatureÃÂÃÂ is above freezing point. When below the active substance of DissOil is ÃÂÃÂ dormant. Absorption properties of DissOil still work for spills on snow ÃÂÃÂ and ice and the biodegradation will start again at temperatures aboveÃÂÃÂ freezing point..  Another factor that effects biodegradation rate is the texture of theÃÂÃÂ surface where a spill happens. The rate differs a bit between spills onÃÂÃÂ gravel, soil and water.  Third factor is moisture, i.e. access to water, which is theÃÂÃÂ accelerator for the process. This means that biodegradation rate isÃÂÃÂ fastest for spills on water.ÃÂÃÂ        For more results on how effective DissOil is, see  https://dissoil.com/how-effective/   DissOil has been tested by independent labs and has been evaluated by Skogforsk ÃÂÃÂ (The central research body for the Swedish forestry sector). Read the Skogforsk report here:ÃÂÃÂ    https://www.skogforsk.se/contentassets/c5b762110b3c4bcb8bcf11374cef03d2/arbetsrapport-986-2018.pdf        DissOil already has real users. We decided to evaluate and test DissOil within the forest sector first - and it is also here we have our first customers. Our first customers is BillerudKorsnÃÂÃÂ¤s followed by SCA - both some of the largest forestry companies in Europe.  Bellow is an interview with Caroline Rothpfeffer, Sustainability and Public Affairs, BillerudKorsnÃÂÃÂ¤s.         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                             We are currently introducing DissOil to the construction sector with very good results. Implenia Sweden AB is currently evaluating DissOil in the field, Trafikverket (The Swedish transportation administration) is observant in this project. If all goes well they will approve DissOil as a method for oil and fuel spill clean-up without the need for removing contaminated ground.  After forestry and construction markets we are aiming for markets like defence industry and offshore industry - both very large markets, the potential for DissOil is virtually unlimited. We truly have the chance to make a big difference for our precious nature!        TOMMY BLOM - WHY DISSOIL ÃÂÃÂ   I have worked all my professional life with wood supply to forest industry and power plants. All this activities is carbon dioxide neutral but still there are some negative impact on nature.ÃÂÃÂ   My driving force have been to reduce the negative effects by supporting processes and creating new harvesting methods and new techniques. One ongoing project is ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>On TrackÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ that we started some years ago. ItÃÂÃÂ´s a forestry machine that has rubber tracks instead of wheels and steel tracks. The idea is to reduce the damage to a minimum when the timber is transported out from the forest.ÃÂÃÂ   I think we all want to make a difference for the future with the effort and work we are doing every day. Now IÃÂÃÂ´m really happy and excited that we together, Johan, Jesper and I have developed an amazing product. I believe that DissOil will be a small revolution for all activities that have problem with oil spillage in the nature.ÃÂÃÂ   We are a small but hard working team with total different skills. Together with support from people that feel bad about oil spill in nature IÃÂÃÂ´m sure we will be successful with DissOil and that we together will reduce the negative effects from oil spills.ÃÂÃÂ     JOHAN DE FAIRE ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> WHY DISSOILÃÂÃÂ    Over a long carrier I have invented, discovered and been part of many exiting projects for the good of people and the environment ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> all based on naturally occurring phenomena. Enzymes from shrimp species for wound healing, proteins from mollusks for preservation of foodstuff and microbes for water purification are a few of my inventions. These are complicated mechanisms of action that cannot be seen by the naked eye, the results take long time to achieve and they are very hard to communicate in a laymanÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s way.ÃÂÃÂ   DissOil is the opposite ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> the actions are tangible and observable in minutes, the results are easy to measure and the product is basically self-explanatory ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> if there is an oil spill you spread DissOil over it. You cannot do wrong.ÃÂÃÂ   First generation DissOil is now ready for a market introduction and it will be a very thrilling journey as the responses from the field have been extremely positive. My wish is to be part of coming generations in the DissOil-family.ÃÂÃÂ     JESPER BLOM ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> WHY DISSOILÃÂÃÂ    For me personally DissOil is almost a too good to be true product. I have been working with product development for over 10 years and I have helped many other entrepreneurs to realize their products during these years and not once have I stumbled on a product this great!ÃÂÃÂ   DonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t get me wrong, there are many great products that I have been involved developing but all of these products have some sort of negative side. Function is great but the product is not environmentally friendly to produce. Or design of the product is great but the usability is not so good. This is normality and that is why I am so excited about DissOil ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> a product that is a win ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> win solution for everybody, both the environment but also for the companies responsible for oil spills.ÃÂÃÂ   DissOil has fantastic function, it helps clean up oil spills in nature, it is made from 100% organic products and it is carbon dioxide neutral ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> what more can you ask from a product! So that is why I work late nights and weekends trying to get DissOil on the market.ÃÂÃÂ        We need your help to fund a better package solution and a small production facility.ÃÂÃÂ    A better package solution   Today we just pack DissOil in a plastic bag and then seal it. This is very labour intense and the bag is not user friendly. We have conducted studies together with end users and the conclution is clear - Everyone wants a resealable bag.ÃÂÃÂ    Production facility   Today we produce DissOil 100% manually which means that we can only produce a small quantity and at a very high cost. The goal is to build a small production facility which is semi-automatic. This would result in high volume capacity (compared to today) and lower production costs. This would mean that our business model would work and that we can offer our customers DissOil at an affordable price!  In other words - without your help we have no way of getting DissOil out on the market, helping to save our nature from the harm of oil spills.      Risks and challenges  The greatest risk right now is that we need funding for a better package solution and funding for a small production facility. Without this we have no cost effective way of producing DissOil. We also donÃÂÃÂ´t have the capacity to produce DissOil in higher volumes.

Blurb: A Transimpedance Pre-amplifier suitable for ELF/VLF Magnetic Loop Antennas.
Creator_description: Magnetics Specialist generating Virtual Prototypes with COMSOL.  Design Virtual Reality Laboratory environments. RF specialty designs.
Project_description: Magnetic Loop Antenna with Pre-amp    Magnetic Loop Antennas used over the ELF to VLF bandwidths are common. ÃÂÃÂ Search engines will display dozens of images over a large number of antenna variations. ÃÂÃÂ These antennas have numerous applications which includes many areas of research. ÃÂÃÂ The one thing they all have in common is a pre-amp located right at the loop antenna terminals.   Applications and Other Uses    Atmospheric Phenomena    Lightning Detection and Triangulation    Volcanic Eruption Precursors    Seismic Precursors    Sensors    Security Systems    Bio-Hacking ÃÂÃÂ     Existing Amplifiers   The pre-amp is always some variation of low noise high gain voltage amplifier, Figure 1. ÃÂÃÂ There are even standard antenna SPICE models available to simulate their performance. ÃÂÃÂ The antenna SPICE models all assume a voltage driven voltage source. ÃÂÃÂ This model is inconsistent with data collected on some actual devices. ÃÂÃÂ Then I realized, the magnetic loop antenna is basically a current loop. ÃÂÃÂ So, we should be looking at a current to voltage amplifier or transimpedance amplifier, as they are called.     Figure 1: Low Noise High Gain Voltage Amplifier    I have been using this voltage amplifier, shown in Figure 1, for several years. ÃÂÃÂ I discovered problems with expected performance when using it on enhanced and miniaturized loop antennas. ÃÂÃÂ It became obvious that there is a discrepancy between actual output and realized output. ÃÂÃÂ This requires a different approach to modeling.     Figure 2: Transimpedance Amplifier    I simulated, built and tested the transimpedance amplifier, shown in Figure 2. ÃÂÃÂ There did not appear to be any output at all. ÃÂÃÂ Apparently, this problem may have been solved in some sensor applications. ÃÂÃÂ This may also be why no one has tried this before. ÃÂÃÂ There are no instances of transimpedance amplifiers on magnetic loop antennas that I know of.   Proposed Amplifier Development   I am proposing a research effort to determine the conditions of successful applications of transimpedance amplifiers used by other sensors and adapt the circuitry to magnetic loop antennas. ÃÂÃÂ The present antenna simulation model needs to be modified to reflect the current loop approach, which is inconsistent with a voltage loop approach. ÃÂÃÂ Then, I want to actually built up one unit and compare performance to the voltage amplifier shown in Figure 1. ÃÂÃÂ This requires time and resource expenditure. ÃÂÃÂ What I a need is a research grant to do this.   What you get   This is basically a research grant type project. ÃÂÃÂ The result is a document with a circuit diagram, real data, and an explanation of theory of operation. ÃÂÃÂ    Design and Engineering   The research time is rather short, since I already have some idea of where to look for related information. ÃÂÃÂ Once I see how similar problems were solved with other sensors, the design will be straight forward with the use of simulators. All of the equipment to build the prototype is already in place from the last project. ÃÂÃÂ Collecting data is the last step before writing the research paper. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Timeline   After the basic research phase, it will take some time to obtain semiconductors and parts to build up one experimental unit. ÃÂÃÂ Bread boarding it should not take more than a few days. ÃÂÃÂ Testing and any necessary modifications will take the most time. ÃÂÃÂ The time to write a final research and development paper is short in comparison. ÃÂÃÂ The entire project should take only 30 days from funding to completion.      Risks and challenges  I already have several scientific publications in professional journals, so I have professional experience doing this many times.  I have over 20 years of professional experience designing new products and taking them to market.  Many examples of this can be found on my website.  Whether or not the transimpedance amplifier will work with a current loop magnetic antenna will be determined by experiment.  From that point of view, there is no risk.  There is only data as to whether or not it works and what is necessary to make it work.

Blurb: An application that helps people with nightlife on deciding where and when to go.
Creator_description: Just an ambitious college student trying to have better weekends!
Project_description: Hey guys! My name is Michael DeMaria and I am born and raised in NYC. I am currently a college student at Pace University graduating this May. With the stress of studying and internships over the past four years of college, without going out and having fun on the weekends, I would not have made it this far. Living in NYC my whole life, I have spent countless weekends traveling all over the City to find the perfect bars for my friends and I. ÃÂÃÂ To this day, I still find myself on the weekends barhopping from LES to the Meatpacking to FIDI to Midtown spending countless amounts of money on cabs and I am TIRED OF IT. If you're like me, you were probably stressed out all week, why not spend your weekend right.   "I always go out to one bar thinking there's going to be people there, and I end up having to take a cab to the other side of the city."  - NightOut allows you to see which bars/areas are heating up!   "I want to play beer pong tonight"  - NightOut can filter out bars with specific activities!   "I'm planning on hitting a club for my friends birthday this weekend, but I can't find a promoter!" -  NightOut has a list of promoters for each specific club!  All of these problems ÃÂÃÂ are solved with my new project "NightOut."ÃÂÃÂ Many people I know that aren't from the city are always texting me and other friends about where to go. This app will solve all of those issues.ÃÂÃÂ   This is going to be an application on the phone that has a map of NYC (and major cities/college towns) and names of bars that are going to be on the app. When someone goes on the app they can see who checked in to what bars (friends or anonymous) and also when the user zooms out they can see which areas (Saint mark's, LES, Meatpacking) are ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>heating upÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ and where the people are. Some Bars will have drink deals when you check in at their bar. You can also see when pressing on each bar what they have on different days (1 dollar beers on monday) or you can filter the bar into other things like beer pong, darts, pool. Under each bar you click it will also tell you all of the details of that bar/club including dress codes, types of liquors, and more! The app will also have a specific tab for going clubbing! You can quickly link up with some of the best promoters in NYC for a night out!      Risks and challenges  I do not expect any risks with the development of this app. The only risk I can possibly see is if not enough people use it, which I will make sure does not happen. Living in NYC my whole life and going out every weekend has led me to meet many people including bar owners, promoters, and bartenders at bars across the city!

Blurb: A true console with access to thousands of games from past, present and future, powered by a spiritual successor to Commodore Amiga OS.

Creator_description: ARES Computer inh. Pascal Papara was founded in order to boost AROS development and provide a target reference computer for this operating system. Money earned is reused to invest in further developments and bounties (see www.power2people.org)Ours team biography shortened to the project relevant bits:2009 ARES Computer provides AROS compatible PC's2010 AROS Broadway 2010 AMC the Amiga media Center2012 AEROS for PC2012 Broadway X for Efika MX2012 Starting development of indieGO! console and App Store 2013 AEROS for Raspberry Pi2014 indieGO! Appstore and AEROS Plus2014 Starting development of AmiCloud2015 AEROS Premium for Pi with execution of x86 binaries, Broadway 1.0 preview, VAN a vector based lossless video format ...to be continued....
Project_description: As featured on:       What is it?  The ultimate all-in-one-Retro console with a built-in DVD-RW drive to run games forÃÂÃÂ Amiga CD32, Sony PlayStation, Sega Saturn*, Sega CD*, TurboGrafx* and more .  The (*)-marked Systems will require additional ROM files in order to work. Easy-to-follow installation-instructions are provided in our included user manual.  Of course it can also play ROMS for other consoles such as SNES/Super Famicom, Genesis/MegaDrive and more.  The indieGO! is silent, power efficient and very unique, when compared with other ARM-based consoles, because of the integrated DVD-Drive.     Compatible to tons of consoles - a App Store with optional downloads makes it future proof     The Hardware consists of:    IndieGo Classic    Odroid XU4    DVD-RW or BlueRay drive allows to execute CD-Based AmigaCD32, Playstation and PC gamesÃÂÃÂ     front SD-Card reader    attractive mini-itx case    3D-Printed I/O-shield and ARM-Cpu board holder    2x Front- USB    IndieGo XS    Odroid XU4    DVD-RW or BlueRay drive allows to execute CD-Based AmigaCD32, Playstation and PC gamesÃÂÃÂ     3D-Printed case in color(s) of your choice    1x Front- USB    1x Back- USB    IndieGo XS Barebone    DVD-RW or BlueRay drive allows to execute CD-Based AmigaCD32, Playstation and PC gamesÃÂÃÂ     3D-Printed case in color of your choice    1x Front- USB    1x Back- USB    Possible colors for XS case:    Silver    Wood    Green    Black    Blue    Red    glowing Green    Brown    Purple    White    Yellow    Examples:        ÃÂÃÂ  The OS:    compatible to Linux (ARM and i386 binaries side by side)ÃÂÃÂ     compatible to ARM AROS binariesÃÂÃÂ     Wine is included and allows the execution of Windows ARM And i386 SoftwareÃÂÃÂ     boots fast.ÃÂÃÂ     KODI (former known as XBMC) is included    Moonlight included to stream games from from your personal computer    AmiCloud (cloud without a traffic limit)ÃÂÃÂ     EmuLA (emulatorlauncher)ÃÂÃÂ     indieGO!-AppstoreÃÂÃÂ     EmulationStation a front-end for several emulations    it is Open! You can modify it and run games from all available sources. The main idea is to run original CD32 and Playstation games but you can run everything! Get games from USB-stick, DVD/CD, Internet, Pi-store, indieGO!-Marketplace and so on   Pre-installed games include Doom (sharware), Quake (Shareware), Duke Nukem (Shareware) and Whacky Wheels (shareware) and Jim Power Full-Version -ÃÂÃÂ more areÃÂÃÂ accessible from our appstore.  For games you add by yourself andÃÂÃÂ which are normally played via Keyboard and mouse we will offer a joypad-mapping tool. (a Default mapping will cover a lot of games) - Of course you can also connect a USB-Keyboard and Mouse if you like to  Games downloaded from the indieGO!-store are ready2play (mapped to be played with a pad)     Enjoy your favorite console and home computer games on a single device    The system will keep itself updated. You get also access to a member area on our Websites  www.aeros-os.org ÃÂÃÂ and  www.indiego-gaming.com   Unlike other "Retro-console campaigns" we will not just put a Raspberry Pi with a Retropie like distro on it..  Well... to be honest you can install it still if you like.. side by side or on top of our solution ; ) And to be even more honest you will get a dual boot to enable you both worlds..ÃÂÃÂ   Our system is called indieGO!-OS and is based on EmulationStation, Kodi, AEROS, AMC, indieGO!-Marketplace and EmuLA.ÃÂÃÂ   AEROS itself is based on Debian linux and indieGO!-OS is again a fork of AEROS aimed for gaming and emulation purposes.  The indieGO! allows to choose between indieGO!-OS(ÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢), AEROS and Android(ÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢) - Just reboot into a indie-Console, a Android console or a Mini PC.           3in1 Multiboot - For more details and performance information just click on the picture       theme-able console launcher       Every indieGO! can play PSX games at full speed       Moonlight included for streaming modern games from a PC       Desktop-mode for doing homework ; )      Unlike older "hand-glued" projects we offer you a real AppStore which will be filled with tons of free games, demos and commercial full versions of games for all kind of retro platforms but also NEW stuff exclusively for indieGO!-compatible systems.  But you are 100% free to add own stuff to your console from every existing source! Your home, your castle.  On top and included in the price is your own Cloud-Storage (25GB) to store games, data and media... just logIN on a friends machine and access your data from everywhere on the globe.ÃÂÃÂ   We include a DVD-RW because so you can just insert Amiga CD32 and Playstation original games! And if you take care to include needed rom-files you can also run Saturn, SegaCD and other CD-based console games.  One special feature of indieGO!-OS is a recognition layer for PC and console games on CD/DVD. If you insert a ROM it will be scanned and a wizard will help you to add it to your library. No manual config is needed.  Insert, install run! = FUN  Thank you very much for supporting us! Please spread the word! it is time to show how much more "enthusiasm" can be vs. money driven mainstream ; )   Instant fun!   Plug and Play! With the launch of the console you will get access to the indieGO!-library which consists of Games (demos, full versions, shareware, public domain) of all platform the system is capable to emulate or execute natively.ÃÂÃÂ   Remember: insert a disk an the system will install it.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ If it is not recognized, just use the member-forum to request compatibility and we will work on it.                 A store filled with Games from all platforms             Skype and Spotify on ARM     Strech goals! (Only for backers who pledged for more than 100 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬)   If we reach  10000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬  we will send you a controller of your choice.        If we reach  15000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬  we will add a copy of Project Lila  If we reach  20000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬  we will add a copy of Heroes of Gorluth  If we reach  25000 ÃÂ¢<U+0082>ÃÂ¬  we will add a Wifi-USB Stick      example for packaging     Why this campaign?   hmm... good point : ) You should ask yourself if you need something like indieGO! + 25GB Cloud-storage + Kodi Media Center + ARM based Computer?    Timeline   1. Product Prototyping (done)  january-april 2019  2. building and packaging  april-may 2019  3. shipping  Juni-JulyÃÂÃÂ 2019    How the Classic looks in real life:      The case holds a DVD-RW, optional SSD/HD, the Pi or odroid       another one       To get a feeling for the size     IndieGo XS:   The first prototype is already done  We will print the complete case in Duisburg (Germany) via 3D-printers.  The final design may vary!                         Black and White XS Prototype    The following videos show my black and white XS (shown games are not ÃÂÃÂ included!) Risks and challenges  There are no particular risks, or at least we don't foresee any particular risks when it comes to fulfilling our backers rewards. We've built our prototype, our custom OS, we have carefully researched sources for materials and components.  The only small thing we can think of is not being able to get enough ARM SoC boards in time from our suppliers, thus shipping of consoles could be delayed slightly. All other parts are readily available and are not a problem to get high quantities at any time. The I/O shield and SoC-mounting frames and the case for IndieGo XS are done by us directly in the workshop.

Converter adapters are also sold separately which allows you to pair an iPhone and an Android at the same time. Allowing you to charge your mobile devices without plugging into a socket in the wall. ALMOST TWICE THE TORQUE OUTPUT OF THE BICYCLE IN THE VIDEO ABOVE.     Pulley Wheel Machines   as well as   Lever Machines   are ancient and have been used to decrease effort for thousands of years, when lifting extremely heavy objects. Below are some images of the currently filed design with the USPTO. This bicycle is evolving, so the final product may look more streamline than the concept you are looking at. We care about this project because it have believe it would improve the human condition and of course we like mind blowing technology you can use every day.                 ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ In fact, we are so confident of this bicycle's performance, we would be willing to set aÃÂÃÂ  Guinness World Record  of the lightest human powered bicycle with the most torque per range.ÃÂÃÂ        I intend to use the funds to pay for a ÃÂÃÂ Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) patent application. The reason why I think this is important is because this bicycle is design is a universal machine that is beneficial to all Humans and will make the Human condition easier. Furthermore, a ÃÂÃÂ PCT application would open more doors to revenue generation and increase the value of the patent application already filed with the USPTO. Here are the benefits this bicycle would provide:  1. Green transportation, which does not harm the environment.  2. It promotes exercise, which is healthy for individuals, community and society.  3. A healthier community reduces the financial toll on America's healthcare system.  4. The building of these bicycles creates jobs and economic opportunity.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ a. Bike sharing companies could be formed creating more administrative jobs, as well as ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ technical service jobs when it comes to bicycle maintenance and repair.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ b. This bicycle technology would help companies by giving them new ways of promotingÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ their products through new bike sharing programs.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ c. ÃÂÃÂ Offshoot businesses could be created due to the creation of this bicycle.  5. The new Pulley Wheel Machine bicycle would make exercise fun again, which is healthyÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ for society as a whole.  6. Building these bicycles in America would give the US industrial machine the lead in thisÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ particular technology and an advantage over foreign competition in bicycle technology.  7. The Pulley Wheel Machine bicycle would get the youth interested in math, engineeringÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ as well as the physical sciences and make this field fun!  My name is Rashad Scarborough. I was born in Newark, NJ and raised in North Carolina. I have been developing this technology for 14 years and getting close to perfection in bicycle performance. The book, entitled: The Science behind Superior Performance Bicycles, would explain how two force multiplying machines combined (Pulley wheel and Lever machine) would amplify torque output, while maintaining significant amount of range useful to all humans worldwide. This machine is a useful tool for aiding humans in the journey of life. I founded the company call Precisia Bikes LLC. A company that specializes in lever propelled bicycles.  PRECISIA BIKES IS PROBABLY THE MOST ADVANCED IN LEVER PROPELLED BICYCLES AND HERE IS WHY. CHECK OUT HOW THE COMPANY EVOLVED THIS NICHE.       2011 Original P       2014 P Classic       2018 HTC       2019 SPB       1. Scientifically proven to have more torque per range than  any  conventional bicycle.  2. Gravitational advantage, force vector advantage and mechanical advantage, especially at the peak of the bicycleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s pedal stroke.  3. More powerful and consistent angular force vectors from the peak of the pedal movement to the base of the pedal movement. Therefore, there is less fluctuation in force needed to pedal this bicycle.  4. Hollow lever machine structure that canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t be bent by human weight, because the steel cable reinforcement from the outside harnesses the whole tubular structure of the lever machine instead at just on point on the lever machine.  5. Hollow lever machine tubes makes this bicycle conventional light and lighter than some conventional bicycles on the market.  6. Multispeed hub on the bicycle makes it easy to shift gears while moving and standing still.  7. Low top tube makes this bicycle easy to mount for women and men, while being consistent with bike sharing frame designs.  8. The bicycleÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s design is very simple and pleasing to look at.  9. Propelled by DyneemahÃÂÃÂ® rope, which is stronger than steel cable yet 8 times lighter than steel cable.  10. Easier to climb hills on the Wraparound ÃÂ¢<U+0084>ÃÂ¢ bicycle, because one could take advantage of gravity and oneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s weight at the pedaling peak instead of just leg muscles at the pedaling peak like conventional bicycles.  11. Hollow lever tubes make it easy to store batteries in this bicycle, if you wanted to convert this bicycle into an E-bike. The batteries donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t stick out like an eye sore and you would not know if the bicycle was electronically powered.  12. Low friction dry steel, non-sealed bearings reduces friction and increases torque.  13. Lower longer stirring cylinder leaves space for a promotional pendant flag to bear promotional trademarks, while this flag can double for a pouch for carrying pocket items.  14. Optional rear disk brakes are available with applicable multispeed hubs.  15. Easy to manufacture, because most components are already manufactured. Only the frame, lever machines and radial drive cylinder mechanisms are unique.  16. This frame can be built from aluminum, chromoly or carbon fiber tubes be to lighter.  17. Can easily be rented in bike sharing programs.  18. Extra fail safety feature include steel cable along sided DyneemahÃÂÃÂ® rope so pedals never hit the ground.  19. Steel wire over radial drive cylinders to prevent the blue rope from jumping off the aluminum rail.  20. Multiple shock absorbent materials such as rubber disk around the DyneemahÃÂÃÂ® rope and steel cable on lever machines when moving the pedal to base position.  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ REWARDS  "So since this project is mainly to established domestic and foreign intellectual property rights, our main objective at this stage of the business is to educate the masses in how this technology works. Thus, it would be very sustainable to deliver an E-book so that potential buyers of the product would understand the nature of the bicycle , how to maintain it and what to expect from it."  Here are some pages of the E-book describing how we determined how the SPB has more torque per range than conventional bicycles:   1. Torque test and proof of superior torque. How less vector force resistance results in superior performance  Three tube bending dies were tied together on a plastic rope and looped around the pedal of conventional bicycle while the pedals were at an 180 degree turn (approx.).       Then a tube taped to the handle bars was pressed up against a digital scale when the pull of the weights pushed the bicycle forward. The Red tube bending machines props the bicycle up with the plastic rope in order to get accurate scale readings.       The scale reads 3 lbs and 10.6 oz of forward pressure.  The same experiment was conducted on the SPB using the same weight.            The same tube was taped to the handle bar of the SPB and pressed up against the digital scale when the weight on the pedal pushed the bicycle forward.  The digital scale yielded 6 lbs and 11.2 oz. Almost twice as much as than a conventional bicycle using the same weight. Thus this bicycle cranks out almost twice as much horse power than a conventional bicycle when the pedal movement to rear wheel movement ratios are matched.          This demonstration was necessary to illustrate how both bicycles can be tested, if you have a SPB in your possession and wish to try this experiment on your own to verify the results.   Here is an article from Ideaing live smarter about technology from inventors. Just click on the blue link below to find out about their awesome technology.    ideaing live smarter    Don't you wish your suitcase could move by itself? I always have a hard time collecting my purse, gripping my phone, and dealing with my luggage on airports. You know what? There are actually suitcases that followÃÂÃÂ you around like a puppy and the Cowarobot R1 is one of them.    The Cowarobot is a carry-on sized robot suitcase that stays with you all the time. It moves by itself, so you can drink your coffee and talk on the phone while you walk around. It's smart enough to avoid obstacles and it may lag a bit if it does, but it will always find its way to you and catch up with you.    This nifty robot is a loyal little travel companion that can hit speeds up to 4.5 mph and can take on slopes at a 15-degree inclination. Security is not an issue either. Aside from GPS tracking feature, the bag has a CO-SMART intelligent lock that your R1 bracelet can unlock. The bracelet, byÃÂÃÂ the way, also serves as a keyless remote for you to control the bag.  Best Features:    Robotic suitcase that follows you around    Runs up to 4.5 mph and can cover 12.5 miles at full charge    Portable powerbank that charges your iPhone 6s Plus 9 times    Complies with airport regulations       Risks and challenges  This product is safe to use and fail safe mechanisms are designed into the product to guarantee safety and customer satisfaction. So the blue rope in the 2019 version of the Wraparound is made out of Dyneema rope. This rope is 8 times lighter than steel, but stronger than steel.  Its breaking point is 7,700 lbs, so not human weight can break this rope. Other safety features would include a steel fail safe cable that would flex along side the Dyneema rope as a backup in order to keep the rider safe. The steel cable's maximum operating load would be 640 lbs. Maximum human weight on the bicycle would 300 lbs, so this steel cable structure could not be broken by human weight, even though there would not be sustained pressure on the looped steel cable. Other safety features would include a steel bent wire over each rail that would guard the dyneema rope from jumping off of a radial drive cylinder. The frame of the bicycle has been welded by HLS Precision Welding. The individual welder of the bicycle Mr. Howard is very skilled and professional of critical welds. So riders can rest assured that these frames won't break. The company Precisia Bikes LLC currently uses Shamano Nexus 7 speed hub to give riders options to change gears when pedaling this bicycle. These hubs are rugged and have a know reputation for long lasting quality. The bow and arrow looking lever machines look scary, but they are the safest and lightest lever machines on a bicycle for forward propulsion that you will find. That is because the steel cable over the aluminum tube has a breaking point of 5480 lbs. No human weight can break this steel cable. The reason why this cable is position like this is because it increases the strength of the aluminum tube 10 times. If this tube was supported by a steel cable from a point along the aluminum tube that lever machine would be less safe and heavier. That is because the load point at that tube would by subject to bending at that point, even if it were reinforced from the inside of the tube with metal. So when a steel cable is suspended from the ends of the tube and then suspended from that cable the whole tubular structure of the tube is harnessed thus make it human load impossible to bend the tube, because the force of the steel cable is pointing horizontally and not vertically like older models. Thus, it is easier to bend a tube at a point, than to crush a tube from on end to the other end. There are two types of shock absorbents for the riders joints. Each lever machine has a rubber disk about 3/8" thick. So when a lever machine makes contact with the frame of the bike, the rubber absorbs the shock. Furthermore, it's opposite adjacent lever machine steel cable stretches slightly to provide a spring like absorption.  The main risk is that the financial goals would not be met.

Blurb: 3rd brake light for Trucks, Trailers, Vans, Busses and Old Cars

Creator_description: Innovating Products Company
Project_description: There are about 1.7 million rear-end collisions on U.S. roads each year ÃÂÃÂ   The NTSB (National Transportation Safety Board) estimated that 80 percent of the deaths and injuries resulting from rear-end collisions could be prevented by collision avoidance systems, which are available in some cars but not required on all of them.ÃÂÃÂ    The source:    The Washington Post          3rd red light is the brake   You have probably often drived behind a truck without being able to overtake it. Sure, the lower speed gives you a sense of security and you may not keep your eyes on the rear lights of the front truck all the time.ÃÂÃÂ   If the front truck will braking while you're looking at the dashboard, the radio, the phone, the rearview mirror, the cigarette pack, then you could confuse easilyÃÂÃÂ the brake light with ÃÂÃÂ the night lights.ÃÂÃÂ   During one second of hesitation you'll cross over 72 feet or 22 meters without doing anything. You'll lose another second until your brain will take decision to brake and to place your leg on the brake pedal, which means you've across over 140 feet or 40 meters until you start to brake behind a vehicle that's already is in braking at over 140 feet or 40 meters.ÃÂÃÂ    Vizy license plate holder, reduce braking distance                              It could be too late for you and for the one behind you, much too late.ÃÂÃÂ    The third brake light on cars has avoided many rear-end accidents and saved millions of lives up to today and it's incomprehensible why the third brake light is not mandatory for truck, trailers or semi-trailers.  Now you've found out why we thought to innovate this product.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ   Our product is a license plate holder, which provides illumination of the white light plate and, most importantly, offers the third brake light.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    Three in one:ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ     license plate holderÃÂÃÂ     license plate illuminationÃÂÃÂ     third brake lightÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ          The license plate holder is very easy to install    Look at these animations                              Vizy - visibility! Safety first of all.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ    When you see 3 red lights in front of you, you'll definitely press the brake pedal without losing a second.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                              No confusion, 3rd red light is the brake.              That happened in Italy a few months ago   A LPG tanker driver pushed the brake pedal a few seconds late.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                              Vizy license plate holder will not be available to end users before 2022.    This Kickstarter project is the only chance to get this product before 2022.        Our target is to provide this product first to the automotive industry, for truck manufacturers, semi-trailers and trailers, buses and commercial vehicles.ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   After we can satisfy this huge industry, we will certainly want to offer this device to the more than 300 million vehicles that are in traffic and do not have the third brake light. ÃÂÃÂ    Pledge now to enjoy earlier from this gadget, for your safety and those around you. ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    A truck on the way brings you money, a truck in workshop spends your money.         Spread the word, PLEASE!ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ                                        Thank you!    Help Vizy license plate holder to be born and you will save a lot of lives.  Maybe even yours.        Stage   At this moment Vizy license plate holder is just a patent of invention, a prototype 3D drawing and a completed prototype. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   With your help, Vizy can become a reality. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Because we have to take into account the production costs, we will produce this product in China. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   Due to the unpleasant experience we had with the previous Chinese manufacturers, we would like to closely supervise all stages of production without paying any money in advance. ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   For this product to be born, we estimate:   up to 30 days to select from the list of received offers a manufacturer who can offer us the best quality and technical capacity for mass production ÃÂÃÂ     30 days required to make molds according to 3D drawings ÃÂÃÂ     30 days required for zero series production ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ     45-60 days required for homologation of the product for the EU and US market, along with the delivery of the product to your location.   Therefore, we hope that in 150 days we can offer you the product and the certification approvals to be able to use it under legal conditions.       If you have a fleet of trucks / trailers / semi-trailers and want a customized package, you can contact us at kickstarter@vizybrake.com.ÃÂÃÂ     Official Vizy Brake website                        Risks and challenges  SUPPLY CHAIN RISKS  Vizy Island is a new company and there is always risk inherent with new products coming to the market, regardless of whether Kickstarter is involved or not. We cannot control the factory, the raw material production, nor the weather that affects when their workers arrive. We don't anticipate any setbacks, but we also canÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t predict the future. Not yet.  DELIVERY, SHIPPING, CUSTOMS AND DUTIES INFORMATION  One challenge will be the shipping freight, because this is out of our control.  We'll have backers from all over the world and in order to avoid logistic problems, we will ship all orders from our manufacturing location in China.  Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other taxes but we can mark the package as gift or commercial samples for companies. In most countries, you will not need to pay any taxes when marked as gift or sample, but we advise you to check with your local authorities. In general, parcels under $ 100 are exempt from taxes.  As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.  If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't receive it because youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not there, it's the wrong address, moved without notifying us, the package returns back to China and you will have to pay for shipping both ways if you want us to re-send your product.  When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.  COMMUNICATION CHALLENGES  We was surprised at the number of backers that DO NOT complete their surveys and supply an address for delivery. If you want your awesome swag in a timely manner, PLEASE do yourself a favor and provide a REAL email address that you use frequently.  Many backers used an email address that they donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t check very often, probably because they wanted to avoid unnecessary spam. However weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not spamming you. PLEASE make sure you read our messages and emails in a timely manner. We plan on communicating weekly via campaign updates, so check your email, and youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll be in the loop!  Campaign updates will be the primary way we communicate with you. Please donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t rely VizyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s Facebook Community or email newsletters. We wonÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t share updates about the campaign on those platforms!  We can promise a pretty smooth experience if you stay abreast of shipping requirements and project updates throughout the campaign lifecycle.  No matter what obstacles lie ahead we promise you that we will be 100% transparent in our communication with you. We want the best and we know you do too!
