Creator_description: Kazem is an Engineer/Inventor/Entrepreneur. Developer of the Levitating CloudIX, CloudIX ambient lights and Tatsumaki (miniature tornado).
Project_description: WROOM the Truck!    My name is Kazem and i am a mechatronist engineer. I work as Process Simulation Engineer, simulating and programming the robots in automotive sites to weld and assemble the car's body parts.ÃÂÃÂ   I had two successful projects in university.  1. Humanoid robot with metal detection, it's purpose was to collect metal parts in certain area and take them to a defined place.  2. Robotic arm commanded via wireless connection.ÃÂÃÂ   ÃÂÃÂ Now i present you WROOM the Truck!     Suitable for adults and children (+3 years old).    - A 4WD RC car (Ratio 1:16). It has the feature of wireless charging and offers 95 minutes of playtime on one charge. 5 times more than standard rechargeable batteries.     WROOM the Truck while charging wirelessly!    Why WROOM the Truck is so special??!  I began to think for a solution to include wireless charging in toys, after my 2 year old nephew swallowed a battery from one of his toys. i did some researches and noticed there are thousands of children around the world with battery ingestion reported annually. So, i made WROOM the Truck with wireless charging capacity and a sealed battery. This way children will be safe and the cost for the AA batteries is gone.ÃÂÃÂ    Why wireless charging is better than buying normal batteries?ÃÂÃÂ   In the chart below you can see that 1 kWh of energy in AA batteries cost's 233.92 GBP, because a battery can provide only 4.1 Wh of energy, this means you will need 244 batteries to produce 1 kWh electricity.ÃÂÃÂ        Today many products sold with batteries included, use low grade, low energy carbon type batteries as a marketing ploy. These batteries will often perform poorly and need to be replaced promptly. It is not uncommon for the manufacturers to install the very type of battery they recommend against! But in WROOM the Truck we use the high quality battery to last more and play longer.   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ From idea to prototype!  Step 1: ÃÂÃÂ Choose the best design.     Idea model No.1       Idea model No.2       Idea model No.3    Step 2: How to charge it wirelessly and where to fit all the parts ?                            -Step 3: How to make the wireless charger suitable for WROOM the Truck?                                 -Step 4: Take prototypes for the outdoor test.                             Bonus: Below you can see a video of WROOM the Truck, chased using a drone while testing it's off-road capabilities!!!                  Technical Details       UPDATE:ÃÂÃÂ   A new Electric Blue Wroom the Truck was added to the project!     Blue WROOM!    If you like the project, then please back it and let's WROOM the Truck!      Risks and challenges  As a person who works and maintain a production level of 50 vehicles per hour i am confident that shipment risks have been considered and we hope everyone will receive their rewards before August 2019.

Blurb: Pod Talk will allow people who love podcasts to share their opinions with friends or people they meet.
Creator_description: I am 18 years old and founder of Macht Development. I love to code and when I was 16 I gathered classmates who shared my interest and we began to create apps.
Project_description: My name is Henry and I am the founder of Pod Talk. I am 18 years old and am a senior at High School and a passionate coder. Me and a group of my classmates have put 14 months into this project and we are excited to launch! We are raising funds in-order to grow the pod talk community and connect people. Pod Talk is a podcast platform that allows users to create clubs where they can discuss podcasts. Similar to a book club the club creator picks a new podcast for the week and members listen to it and talk about in the chat rooms. You can create a private club for just your friends or have a public one for everyone to use. You can also steam or download over 400,000 podcast and listen to them anywhere. We want people to be social when listening to podcast and we believe this is the best way. Hope you donate!      Risks and challenges  The main problem we face is gaining a large user base.

Blurb: Inform8r: ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the first business-first messaging app that will revolutionize the way your public receives messages from you.
Creator_description: Hi, my name is Kristjan Marin, and I am the founder and inventor of inform8r. A few years ago, I realized that I was spending far too much time on social media. While I still enjoy using it, I felt like it was taking over my life and I was growing too reliant on it, looking at my phone more than I was living life. I wanted to come up with some sort of solution that would provide the benefits of being in touch with the people I need to be in touch with, but that felt less invasive into my engagement with the real world. That's when I came up with inform8r.ÃÂÃÂ
Project_description: inform8rÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> The Business-First App that Bridges the Gap Between One-to-One Communication and Social Media   Meet inform8r , a brand new,  business-first  app that will revolutionize the way your public receives messages from you. The first  business-first messaging app  is perfect for any business or group leader, from small-scale or colossal, to reach their public in an entirely new, cleaner, less-cluttered way.ÃÂÃÂ    inform8r  allows you to set up closed groups of any size to send out messages without using social media, without giving up your personal information or requesting personal info from recipients.ÃÂÃÂ    Simple, clean messaging  that  doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t rob you of your time  or your personal information.   Inform8r can help any business or group manager, likeÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦    a  small business  that wants to inform your customers of a sale    a  teacher  sending a note to your students (and you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to use social media and arenÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t sure if theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll actually check their email)    an  event organizer  keeping your audience up to date    a  coach  letting his team know about training    a  business owner or manager  letting staff know about a meeting    a  fitness  or  yoga instructor  letting their students know about the next class    a  musician  telling fans about a forthcoming gig    a  food truck  announcing 50% off chili dogs from 4-6pm that day    or, on a bigger scale, a local  shopping mall  announcing a holiday sale to thousands of customers, or a  software company  taking preorders for a new video game         Why is inform8r the ideal messaging app for businesses?    minimum data needed to create an account (inform8r doesnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t need your personal data)    extremely easy to use with multilingual support (10 languages and counting)    respect for the anonymity of members    discretion among members guaranteed    extremely easy to subscribe and share using QR codes ÃÂÃÂ     no fiddly confirmations whatsoever to subscribe to a group    100% assurance that everyone receives the messages sent out    message scheduling supportedÃÂÃÂ     time-sensitive messaging logic (members only see what is relevant to them RIGHT NOW)    self-cleaning groups, which means no archiving    only active/relevant data is shown to your members (if a message was relevant only until yesterday, we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t show it today)    no replies to the whole group, only to the sender, which means no clutter    get instant feedback from your members    your group memberÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s count shows your REAL members only    GDPR compliant    no personal data stored    The Problem for Businesses Messaging  Social media scrambles for usersÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> attention and is dizzying in the amount of info and ads and notices it throws at us. Messages get lost. Email can be good, but most of us get so many emails, that we race through them, and often lose track of the importantÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>or we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t check our email in time. With inform8r, thereÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s finally a messaging app that complies with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), because it never asks for personal information. This means that you, and your audience, can feel entirely comfortable using it.       The Business Messaging Solution  You need to inform your audience. You want to be sure theyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ll see the message and give it their full attention. Social media isnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t the answer, nor are emails. inform8r is the better way forward.   The Problem for Users  ÃÂÃÂ We spend an average of anywhere from  2-9 hours  a day on social media. That can mean over  100 days  per year! While it can be fun, it can also feel like it's taking over our lives. And yet being a part of it can be necessary.  ÃÂÃÂ        What if there was a way to reach all the people who are important to you? This is crucial for any organizer of events, leaders of groups, business managers and many others--anyone who needs to reach a specific group of people. What if you could do this in a non-invasive way, sending and receiving only the information you absolutely need, without getting caught up in the web of social media? What if you could  spend less time staring into your phone and more time embracing life,  while still resting assured that you are connected to all the messages that are important to you? Now you can. The answer is  inform8r .ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ    The  UsersÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>  Solution    inform8r  is an entirely new type of messaging app, one that is aimed at organizers, managers, and anyone who has to reach out to a specific group of people to provide them with information. This app never asks for or retains your personal information. It is a pure way to communicate with exactly the people you want to communicate with, with none of the clutter. Clean communication, clean messaging, that's what inform8r is all about. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ   A cleaner, more streamlined alternative to messaging apps like Viber, WhatsApp and Messenger    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ With inform8r, there are no group replies and no comments. It is just a clean messaging system. It is more powerful and useful for organizers and managers than other apps, like Viber and WhatsApp. It is quick and easy to make groups of any size, with all members ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>BCCed,ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ for privacy and functionality. It is a one-way messaging system in which the manager can send out necessary messages in a clean manner. ÃÂÃÂ This sounds cool, but ... ÃÂÃÂ    How does it work?   Find out here ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ The App lets you write and edit your message in a few simple steps, create and segment your audience according to your needs, sort your audience into groups for a more targeted distribution, create one message and distribute it repeatedly, get feedback on your message instantlyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ A group organizer invites members via their emails or MMS by scanning a QR code. The organizer can then send out messages to all group members. Only the organizer (and other group members he can allow to send out messages) can see who is in the group. This guarantees privacy. ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ Group members receive these messages instantly but can only respond directly to the group organizer(like replying to an event). This eliminates the often annoying frequency of messages pinging into your phone when a group of thirty friends keep messaging and everyone in the group receives every message, even if the content is not intended for all. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s the  crucial difference between inform8r and existing messaging apps,  which are perfectly good (like Viber, Whatsapp and Messenger) but different and not quite as good at what inform8r can do.  ÃÂÃÂ      A group organizer invites members via their emails or MMS by scanning a QR code. You can share a groupÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s QR code or groupÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s content to social media or simply make the group public, so it can be found inside the app.    ÃÂÃÂ  Features ÃÂÃÂ    What makes inform8r unique?        ÃÂÃÂ   A word from the inventor ÃÂÃÂ         Hi, my name is Kristjan Marin, and I am the founder and inventor of inform8r. A few years ago, I realized that I was spending far too much time on social media. While I still enjoy using it, I felt like it was taking over my life and I was growing too reliant on it, looking at my phone more than I was living life. I wanted to come up with some sort of solution that would provide the benefits of being in touch with the people I need to be in touch with, but that felt less invasive into my engagement with the real world. That's when I came up with inform8r.   Man has invented languages and media channels to share thoughts and communicate ideas. The world today, however, is cluttered with messages and to find relevant information and be heard is not an easy task. No matter what you do for a living, whether you are an entrepreneur, an artist or a teacher, there is always some relevant audience out there with which you would like to communicate. If you need to say something to one person or are in the same physical location as your audience (at an office, for instance), then there is no problem. But if you are trying to reach hundreds or thousands of people who would like to hear from you, well, that is a completely different story.     Every significant discovery in human history has been made with a solution to a certain problem in mind. I have many interests and I've used many Social Media platforms ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s always frustrating to have to browse through numerous selfies and food pictures when you would just like to see if your favorite brand has something new for you. If IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m a fan of a certain product or service, I want to be spoken to directly and without being forced to jump through hoops for them. And if I have something important to share with my clients, I wouldnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t like to send them messages one by one and waste time that could be spent improving solutions IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m working on with them. And thatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s exactly what we are trying to achieve with the    inform8r   .  ÃÂÃÂ    Why we need your helpÃÂÃÂ     ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s important to me that inform8r be free of charge . I didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t design it to make money, but with a genuine desire to help free people from their smartphones, while letting them still feel connected with whatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s important. IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve invested my last four years in this project, with thousands of hours of time and energy, not to mention a whole lot of my own money. IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>d  like to keep inform8r free , but I need some help to do so. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m turning to you, to ask for your support.   ÃÂÃÂ  Ways inform8r can be used ÃÂÃÂ   Imagine that your children's field trip at school will result in pickup delayed by two hours. With a touch of a button, the teacher can let all the parents know and be 100% certain that the messages will be received. Imagine a business manager who needs to communicate with all the people in his department, quickly and with certainty. How about a soccer teamÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s coach who needs to cancel practice and wants to get the message out to all 25 team members? Or on a bigger scale, imagine a marketing department manager for a multinational company who wants to send a promotional message or coupon to several thousand interested clients, but wants to do so in a discreet way that will not get lost in the tidal wave of information that overwhelms us in social media apps?ÃÂÃÂ          inform8r  is perfect for sending out instant messages to groups that you are organizing. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s great for   ÃÂÃÂ small businesses who wish to inform their customers ÃÂÃÂ     teachers who wish to inform parents of their students ÃÂÃÂ     coaches who wish to inform their team members ÃÂÃÂ     event organizers who wish to inform their audiences ÃÂÃÂ     marketing directors or publicists who wish to inform the media or customers    business centers who wish to inform their clients or tenants    fitness instructors who wish to inform their participants    business owners and CEOS who wish to inform their staff    chefs who wish to place orders on produce and ingredients    food trucks which wish to inform fans of a 2-for-1 deal on hot dogs    and so much more!ÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ  inform8r  can do all this and more, more cleanly, efficiently, privately and easily than existing messaging apps.   ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ Wait, this is so cool,  why is it free?ÃÂÃÂ  ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s important to the inventor, Kristjan, that inform8r is free to all. But in order to make it free and keep it free, we need a little help from you. ÃÂÃÂ   See how all began in 2014 ...        Tech SpecsÃÂÃÂ    inform8r is already available in a beta version on  AppStore  & Google Play and has been thoroughly tested for both Android and Apple smartphones. A desktop version, geared towards mass messaging for businesses and marketing, is a future goal. The app works beautifully, so weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re about 90% there, nearly ready for prime-time! ÃÂÃÂ    We Need Your Help   WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re 90% there, but we need a little help to make inform8r a reality thatÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦and this is the most important partÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ¦ will be free for everyone . At the moment, we put so much time and personal finance into developing the app, that we would need to charge for it in order to climb out of the red and to get our credit cards out of hock.    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ We need a bit of capital to get back into the black and that will allow us to make inform8r free for all. ThatÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s why weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re asking for your help.  ÃÂÃÂ   What Do You Get ÃÂÃÂ   In exchange for backing a worthy project, you get to be the first in the world with this amazing app. You will also get additional benefits that will never be available after the Kickstarter campaign.       ÃÂÃÂ   Planned timeline ÃÂÃÂ        Case study  In order to test how  inform8r  works in practice, we prepared a case study in Maribor, the second-largest city in Slovenia (population around 100,000).  Inform8r  is at its best when a concentration of people and businesses put this new, free group messaging app to work.ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ The case study included a large percentage of MariborÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s population, including:   ÃÂÃÂ  FC Maribor  (football club with 20,000 fans)    ÃÂÃÂ  BMW Selmar  (with 10,000 customers)    ÃÂÃÂ  The Pohorje Region Tourist board , which welcomes more than 180,000 tourists per year    ÃÂÃÂ  Cultural centre Narodni dom Maribor  (over 2220 events & 380.000 visitors per year)    Two major  political groups  have showen interest(with more then 30,000 members) ÃÂÃÂ    In addition to this large constituency, other groups included:   ÃÂÃÂ  Gurmanski hram  (a catering company which feeds students from 5 high schools, with minimum of 1500 meals per day)    ÃÂÃÂ  Jack & Joe Steak House  (with hundreds of customers)    ÃÂÃÂ  INSA  - A local real estate agencyÃÂÃÂ     ÃÂÃÂ  TopPower STUDIO  - a local fitness studio (with hundreds of members)   After using  inform8r  regularly for more than a month, the verdict was in: it is a better way forward, a cleaner way to send messages out and a preferable way of receiving them. The recipients focused more attention on each message, whether it was from the local football team announcing a rally or discount on tickets, or a yoga teacher letting her group know that the session would begin a half hour later that day), since it is not coming in the midst of a tidal wave of other things, as messages and ads do on social media).  The users were pleased that the app does not require or use any personal information, so there were  no privacy concerns  (which can be a big problem with social media). ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s ideal in this world of  GDPR  and when oneÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s goal is to spend less time looking at a screen, but to feel  secure  that youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re not missing anything important.  Inform8r really works and has already won over a city of over 100,000 people. ItÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s a cleaner, better way to send and receive messages, without personal information, and without social media. How can it change your world for the better?  Our teamÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ   In Conclusion ÃÂÃÂ   You want to receive only the information you want to receive. Sounds so obvious as to not be worth mentioning, right? Well, just about every means of communication, from social media to mailing lists, wants to harvest as much information about you, personal information, as they can. They want to sell this information so other people can reach you, people or companies you didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t actually sign up to hear from, or to send you whatever they want to send you, most of which you donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t want to receive. Digital life can feel cluttered, clogging up your thoughts, bombarding your senses. inform8r lets you take back control.  ÃÂÃÂ   Get the information you want without giving away your personal data, and with zero risk of receiving data or ads or messages you didnÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t sign up for. Clean communication, just the way you want it.   Thank you so much for your time, attention and support. As we say in Slovenia: Hvala (aka ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>Thank you!ÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ)  More info :  https://www.inform8r.com   Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/inform8r   ÃÂÃÂ   Sneak peak: inform8r PRO ÃÂÃÂ        ÃÂÃÂ We know what youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re thinking.  inform8r  sounds great, but IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got a portfolio with hundreds of clients, or multiple groups to manage (like several sports teams or a dozen classes at an elementary school) and doing it all on a phone sounds tricky. Not to worry, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>ve got plans to keep you covered. i nform8r PRO  will be the next step for power users who either plan to use inform8r for business, such as marketing promotions, or for larger-scale messaging, for example a football league manager who needs to contact referees and teams, or headmaster of a school, who needs to contact many classes.   inform8r PRO , available in a desktop version, will facilitate larger-scale messaging in many ways.   ÃÂÃÂ manage multiple groups easily and smoothly -post a single message to multiple groups at once with our ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>write-once post-to-manyÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ technology    spread out your working area on your desktop, to drag and drop and import data files with contacts easily    unlimited number of groups created (the phone version supports 5 at a time)    purchase internal app advertising targeting specific group types    use GPS location technology to advertise content within the app    equip your groups with ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>BeaconÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ technology for in-house or external use (special group only in PRO)    support multilingual messaging, so you write a message in one language and it will be sent to your group members in their preferred languageÃÂÃÂ    ÃÂÃÂ ÃÂÃÂ All this and more in  inform8r PRO . Coming as part of a Kickstarter stretch goal.ÃÂÃÂ  ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  We know youÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re supposed to have a ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+009C>risks and challengesÃÂ¢<U+0080>ÃÂ section to your Kickstarter page, but weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re comfortable stating that there basically are no risks, and few challenges. The app is 90% done, extensively tested in a beta version, and works beautifully. Heck, it even looks cool (at least, we think so). The biggest risk is that we know other companies will take one look at inform8r and start making their own copycat version of the app or introduce its functionality into their pre-existing apps. It happens, and we get it. A good idea is a good idea.

Blurb: Finncast Studio a live broadcasting software to be upgraded with a virtual Camera allowing connection to Skype Biber and more
Creator_description: 22 years Electrical engineer 12 years software development. Love technology and love being apart of it.
Project_description: Video streaming software      Finncast Studio is an already developed video broadcasting software  requiring an upgrade . It consists of 4 video inputs for cameras and other devices. A full built-in video switcher allowing switching of all video inputs, images and from the 2 built-in video players.  It has full chroma key for green screen and allows for 3 different virtual sets to be used at the same time. At present the output (what the viewer sees) can be recorded and live streamed to any rtmp supporting server like YouTube, Facebook, Twitch and many others.  This project we want to take Finncast Studio to another level with the output (what the viewer sees) as a  virtual camera . This is not just aimed specifically at  Skype , because it will be a virtual camera it will work with any software take can input a camera like Viber, Bigo Live and so on.  The way it will work is the output (what the viewer sees) will be put into a video stream and the video stream is sent to the virtual camera. The virtual Camera in return outputs Finncast Studio program output. The virtual camera is found on the computer like any other real camera except this camera does not need any drivers or capture cards.  We expect the project to take 12 months which will include testing. ÃÂÃÂ We have many requests for such an addition to Finncast and we know it will be a big success.  View my website for more details ÃÂÃÂ  Finncast.com ÃÂÃÂ       Risks and challenges  The risks are reaching my audience. I will need a full sales and marketing team. With the funding behind me  and the right people this can be achieved.

Blurb: The first-of-its-kind, AI-enabled plant watering system that automatically waters\\nany indoor houseplants to the highest precision.

Creator_description: As an amalgamation of ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>algorithmÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> and ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0098>quantÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>, Algante is all about fusing intelligence with problem solving. WeÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re harnessing the sophisticated power of Artificial Intelligence to solve everyday problems. From an Ai powered DJ system to a fund manager, Algante is here to assist you in a diverse and comprehensive manner.  Engineering intelligence for the purpose of real world solutions is what we dabble in. With Flora, weÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>re doing exactly that. Our products are problem solving, intelligently.
Project_description: Flora was born out of pain points and the stress involved in taking care of plants. Plant owners who travel often need to rely on DIY solutions, store-bought plant watering systems or their neighbours. These plant watering systems may not be optimal as they can stress out plants with overwatering and underwateringÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0093> and may not be the most time efficient. In comparison, Flora conserves water on a daily or weekly basis, allowing owners to raise the greenest plants while saving water. The broader vision is to help the world conserve water, one Flora at a time.    FloraÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s AI sensors measure the moisture level near the roots of the plants. Flora will understand how much water is being used or evaporated, it will then automatically dispense the exact amount of water needed for the plant.        Plants do more than look good, they enrich your immediate surroundings and are comforting fixtures in your homes.ÃÂÃÂ   As lifestyles grow increasingly fast-paced, having to nurture plants and keep to watering schedules can be demanding and cause unnecessary stress. The time taken to care for your plants adds up and can be put to better use.ÃÂÃÂ   Introducing Flora, the first-of-its-kind, artificial intelligence-enabled plant watering system that automatically waters any indoor houseplants to the highest precision. By detecting soil moisture levels, Flora will adjust for the frequency of water release and maintain the optimal moisture level in the soil. Its water tank ensures that plants can be watered for up to three weeks before being refilled. Imagine how much time you can save on a weekly basis!ÃÂÃÂ   What's being said about Flora:         You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                  Flora can be used straight out of the box with an easy set up. SimplyÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094>ÃÂÃÂ   1. Put your potted plant on top of FloraÃÂÃÂ   2. Attach the included pipe and sensor to FloraÃÂÃÂ   3. Fill the water tank at the platformÃÂÃÂ   4. Place the sensor in the soil up to the given markingÃÂÃÂ   5. Adjust the angle of the pipe such that it is close to the stem and away from the sensorÃÂÃÂ   6. Switch on the power ÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0094> easy as thatÃÂÃÂ   Have a peace of mind that your plants are well taken care of.ÃÂÃÂ   When the water tank runs low on water, you will receive an alert to refill it. Refill the tank and add a few drops of liquid fertilizer if you wish. Relax while Flora does the rest of the caretaking!ÃÂÃÂ   For the tech savvy, plant owners can monitor their plantsÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099> progress on the Flora app remotely, ensuring that their plants are kept healthy and beautiful even when they travel often. The app can monitor soil moisture levels, water level of each individual platform, battery levels, and show watering histories.ÃÂÃÂ          You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.      Play                                      Replay with sound          Play with   sound                   00:00    00:00                                                       While Flora can be used independently without the app, the app allows for monitoring and notifications.ÃÂÃÂ   In subsequent upgrades to the app, plant owners can also input location data and pictures of their plants. Flora will be able to process this information including weather conditions and plant type. Using its cloud-based API, Flora will be able to manage water requirement schedules and dispense the most optimal amount of water for your plants.ÃÂÃÂ             It is the platform on which your plant snugly rests and is sturdily designed to uphold the pot.  Flora comes in three sizes to cater to the different size requirements of your pots, at an affordable price of 25USD to benefit all current and potential plant owners. They come in diameters of 6, 8 and 12 inches for small, medium and large sizes respectively.ÃÂÃÂ        The sleek design, the minimal look and the Ai technology have been thoughtfully designed to ensure that the focus remains on your plant while Flora cares for it. Our design also comes with an additional component of a soil sensor to gauge the moisture levels in your plant and ensure that your plants have a healthy day in the sun without being watered down.ÃÂÃÂ                                 Take a break, Flora will care of your plants.ÃÂÃÂ   Even if you expect to be away for two weeks, that is perfectly all right. With a water tank that waters plants for up to three weeks, you never have to worry on your travels. Say goodbye to DIY solutions or store-bought plant watering systems, and never trouble your neighbours again. No more overwatering or underwatering, Flora ensures your plant gets the exact amount of water it needs. Enjoy your holidays to the fullest!ÃÂÃÂ            Risks and challenges  Taking a product from prototype stage (where we control the process in entirety with critical components outsourced and manufacturing done using 3D printing) to a full production line set up may present new challenges.  While we have studied in detail options available and have preliminary understanding with factories where we will produce, some factors may still be out of our control and may affect delivery schedules.   Other than delays to deliver we donÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>t see any risks that we cannot manage.

Blurb: Help find the next largest prime number!
Creator_description: Hardware enthusiast and hobbyist prime hunter. I like all things computer what can I say.
Project_description: What is prime hunting?  Prime hunting is a distributed computing effort that spans thousands of computers globally. It's compute-intensive and takes many forms, utilising every type of hardware out there including desktop computers, servers and GPUs. Computers are particularly suited to finding a special type of prime called a  Mersenne Prime . The  Great Internet Mersenne Prime Search (GIMPS)  is a collaborative effort to systematically test prime candidates, weeding out composites and finding new very large prime numbers.  Why crowd fund?  I want to build a server farm to perform efficient PRP testing on prime candidates in the search for the next biggest prime number. The results will be made public by submitting them to GIMPS. Efficient PRP testing at scale requires more resources than I have as a hobbyist. Initial outlay for the hardware is only part of it, running costs including electricity and maintenance end up being a much bigger factor when you consider that powerful hardware is running 24/7.  What makes a farm so efficient?   The compute hardware (GPUs) can share the enabling hardware to run them (motherboard, CPU, RAM, storage, PSU), reducing platform and running cost overhead    Using a titanium rated PSU wastes less energy converting from mains power to a form the PC can use which reduces running overhead. A titanium rated PSU is rated for a very high wattage and needs to be mostly occupied for best efficiency    The Radeon VII GPUs used are a perfect storm of efficiency specifically for this niche. They have a lot of performance per node, a lot of performance for the price, and are very power efficient thanks to the new 7nm manufacturing process they are on   What are the guarantees of the project?  The funding and stretch goal targets are based on the total cost and expected throughput of running the hardware at 100% load for however many years the goal is for. This is idealistic and not easily measurable, instead the guarantees are based on the number of record-attempting PRP tests it is estimated can be performed by the hardware in that time. This way at worst the date of completion may be slightly longer if unforeseen circumstances arise but the goals can still be measurably met.  Is there any point funding beyond the minimum target?  Yes there is. The minimum target is enough to slightly undercut current cloud service prices for PRP testing purposes. Increasing beyond the minimum target into the stretch goals allows for more nodes and/or more years of run time paid for, making every penny go further by reducing the impact of overheads like outlay, maintenance and platform costs.  Funding Goals        The estimated wavefront increases as the time frame does. This impacts the number of wavefront PRP tests that can be performed in a given time which is why doubling the run time slightly less than doubles the number of PRP tests performed   Cost Breakdown        Prices shown are estimates based on their current cost and may vary slightly at time of purchase    The float is for anything unexpected or hard to account for, helping pay for some unforeseen circumstance like hardware failure, the cost of downtime, an unexpectedly high electricity rate hike or otherwise    Cooling varies throughout the year dependent on climate and is estimated. It may be higher which is accounted for by the float   Projections        PRP test count is based on where the wavefront is expected to be during the crowdfunded tests. tl;dr larger candidates take longer to test. Short of someone finding a prime much larger than the current wavefront suggests is likely these numbers are reasonably accurate    The longer the hardware is used the more likely hardware failure is. 4 years is a particularly long time to run 24/7, itÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>s longer than IÃÂ¢<U+0080><U+0099>m prepared to guarantee the hardware will still be working for. At this timescale the estimated PRP count also cannot be accurately forecast    Cost per test in these projections is before accounting for Kickstarter fees    Wavefront refers to the smallest Mersenne number that is a candidate to be the next largest known Mersenne prime. This increases over time as tests complete and Mersenne numbers are determined composite   Is this an "official" GIMPS project?  No. This is a crowdfunding effort undertaken solely by me. I am a hobbyist prime hunter and hardware enthusiast. I know prime hunting and I know hardware, this project allows me to contribute to GIMPS while also getting to maintain some nice hardware.  Can I sponsor a particular candidate for testing and take credit for its discovery if it turns out to be prime?  Unfortunately not. Depending on rule interpretation sponsoring candidates in this way could be considered a breach of Kickstarter's anti-raffle rules. Not only that but the discoverer is the first human who notices that a prime has been found; ensuring that that's a backer would be time intensive and get in the way of automated systems that make administering the farm more manageable.  What happens to the GIMPS prize money if a record prime is found by one of the crowdfunded PRP tests?  Technically there is a $3000 reward if your computer finds the next record prime under 100,000,000 digits and you submit proof to GIMPS. In the unlikely event that that occurs I promise to refuse the prize money. The servers to maintain a distributed computing effort cost money and without them none of this would be possible.      Risks and challenges  The main risks include hardware failure and insufficient cooling in the summer months. I've taken steps to mitigate these factors including budgeting for maintenance, sourcing quality components, familiarising myself with the hardware to be used (including maintenance and benchmarking tests to ensure it fulfills the requirements), and accounting for underclocking the cards during summer to alleviate thermal constraints. A UPS will guard from power irregularities, every component will be tuned for efficiency and longevity. The kWh price of electricity is fixed for the majority of the planned duration of the farm. The target up-and-running date of the farm is September 2019, plenty of time to source components for the cheapest price, prepare the cards for longevity, assembling and testing the components, and assembling the farm into its final form and putting it to work.

It is about creating international blockchain platform for healthcare purpose. Please note that this project is about creating an advanced Blockchain platform only .
